aham yathā yena jīvanmukta sthiti kathanena
śrī vālmīkiḥ śrī rāma vṛttānta śravaṇa adhikāri tva sampādana artham tāvat sāmānyena upadeśam
bhramasya jāgatasya asya jātasya ākāśa varṇa vat

original: apunaḥsmaraṇam manye sādho vismaraṇaṃ varam // MU_1,2.2

original: he sādho / aham asya puraḥ sphurataḥ /

a punar smaraṇam punar smṛti viṣaya bhāva ānayanam

original: nanu tad apunaḥsmaraṇaṃ kenopāyena bhaviṣyatīty / atrāha

original: kadācit kenacin nāma sa bodho 'nviṣyatām ataḥ // MU_1,2.3

yaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ deha ādi viṣayaḥ ahambhāvaḥ

punar janma karī punar api bhava karī
punar janma aṅkura tyaktā sthitā sambhṛṣṭa bīja vat

original: dehāntaṃ dhriyate jñātajñeyā śuddheti socyate // MU_1,2.13
analyzed: deha antam dhriyate jñāta jñeyā śuddhā iti sā ucyate

yathā sambhṛṣṭam bījam ākāra mātreṇa tiṣṭhati
śuddhā vāsanā api ākāra mātreṇa eva tiṣṭhati
janma aṅkura utpādana samarthā na bhavati iti arthaḥ
jñātam jñeyam avaśya jñeya tvena sthitam paramātma tattvam

original: vāsanā vidyate śuddhā dehe cakra iva bhramaḥ // MU_1,2.14

analyzed: sarvam eva punar yena tava bhetsyanti na ādhayaḥ

original: ity uktam asya sa mune raghuvaṃśaketur ākarṇya vākyam ucitārthavilāsagarbham /
analyzed: iti uktam asya sa muneḥ raghu vaṃśa ketuḥ ākarṇya vākyam ucita artha vilāsa garbham

original: tatyāja khedam abhigarjati vārivāhe barhī yathābhyanumitābhimatārthasiddhiḥ // MU_1,10.37
analyzed: tatyāja khedam abhigarjati vārivāhe barhī yathā abhyanumita abhimata artha siddhiḥ

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ vairāgyaprakaraṇe daśamaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām vairāgya prakaraṇe daśamaḥ sargaḥ

original: iti pṛṣṭo munīndreṇa samāśvāsya ca rāghavaḥ /
analyzed: iti pṛṣṭaḥ muni indreṇa samāśvāsya ca rāghavaḥ
uvāca vacanam cāru dhīra pūrṇa artha mantharam

original: dhīraṃ ca tat pūrṇārthena mantharaṃ nirbharaṃ ca dhīrapūrṇārthamantharam // (MT_1,11.1)
analyzed: dhīram ca tat pūrṇa arthena mantharam nirbharam ca dhīra pūrṇa artha mantharam

original: *smṛtvā tattvam paramagahanaṃ svasvarūpākhyam ādyaṃ spṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā gurucaraṇayor dhūlipuñjam prayatnāt /
analyzed: smṛtvā tattvam parama gahanam sva svarūpa ākhyam ādyam spṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā guru caraṇayoḥ dhūli puñjam prayatnāt

original: kṛtvā devaṃ śaraṇam aniśaṃ vighnarājaṃ ca ṭīkā vairāgyākhye prakaraṇavare tanyate bhāskareṇa //
analyzed: kṛtvā devam śaraṇam aniśam vighnarājam ca ṭīkā vairāgya ākhye prakaraṇa vare tanyate bhāskareṇa

original: samāśvāsanaparaṃ śrīvasiṣṭhaśrīviśvāmitrayor vākyaṃ śrutvā śrīrāmo hṛdgataṃ vairāgyam prakaṭīkaroti
analyzed: samāśvāsana param śrī vasiṣṭha śrī viśvāmitrayoḥ vākyam śrutvā śrī rāmaḥ hṛd gatam vairāgyam prakaṭīkaroti
śrī vasiṣṭha śrī viśvāmitrayoḥ ṣṭha vi
bhagavan bhavatā pṛṣṭaḥ yathāvat adhunā kila

original: kathayāmy aham ajño 'pi ko laṅghayati sadvacaḥ // MU_1,11.2
analyzed: kathayāmi aham ajñaḥ pi kaḥ laṅghayati sat vacaḥ

original: ahaṃ tāvad ayaṃ jāto nije 'smin pitṛsadmani /
analyzed: aham tāvat ayam jātaḥ nije smin pitṛ sadmani

original: krameṇa vṛddhiṃ samprāptaḥ prāptavidyaś ca saṃsthitaḥ // MU_1,11.3
analyzed: krameṇa vṛddhim samprāptaḥ prāpta vidyaḥ ca saṃsthitaḥ
tatas sat ācāra paraḥ bhūtvā aham muni nāyaka
vihṛtaḥ tīrtha yātrā artham urvīm ambudhi mekhalām

original: svaviveko jahārāntar oghas taṭalatām iva // MU_1,11.5
analyzed: sva vivekaḥ jahāra antar oghaḥ taṭa latām iva

original: vivekena parītātmā tenāhaṃ tad anu svayam /
analyzed: vivekena parīta ātmā tena aham tat anu svayam

original: kiṃ nāmedaṃ vata sukhaṃ yo 'yaṃ saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ /
analyzed: kim nāma idam vata sukham yaḥ yam saṃsāra saṃsṛtiḥ

original: jāyate mṛtaye loko mriyate jananāya ca // MU_1,11.7
analyzed: jāyate mṛtaye lokaḥ mriyate jananāya ca

original: vata kaṣṭe / idaṃ sukhaṃ kiṃ nāma bhavati /

original: mṛtijananarūpasya saṃsaraṇasya duḥkhatvam uktvā tadāśrayabhūtānām bhāvānāṃ duḥkhayuktatvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: mṛti janana rūpasya saṃsaraṇasya duḥkha tvam uktvā tad āśraya bhūtānām bhāvānām duḥkha yukta tvam kathayati

original: āpadām patayaḥ pāpā bhāvā vibhavabhūmayaḥ // MU_1,11.8
analyzed: āpadām patayaḥ pāpāḥ bhāvāḥ vibhava bhūmayaḥ

original: śliṣyante kevalam bhāvā manaḥkalpanayā svayā // MU_1,11.9
analyzed: śliṣyante kevalam bhāvāḥ manaḥ kalpanayā svayā

original: ayam mama putrādiḥ ayam mama pitrādir iti manaḥkalpitena saṅkalpenaiva bhāvānām parasparaṃ sambandho 'sti /
analyzed: ayam mama putra ādiḥ ayam mama pitṛ ādiḥ iti manaḥ kalpitena saṅkalpena eva bhāvānām parasparam sambandhaḥ sti

original: nanu manasaḥ katham etāvatī śaktir astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu manasaḥ katham etāvatī śaktiḥ asti iti atra āha
manaḥ samāyattam idam jagat ābhogi dṛśyate

original: manaś cāsad ihābhāti kena smaḥ parimohitāḥ // MU_1,11.10
analyzed: manaḥ ca asat iha ābhāti kena smaḥ parimohitāḥ

original: mṛgatṛṣṇāmbhasā dūre vane mugdhamṛgā iva // MU_1,11.11
analyzed: mṛgatṛṣṇā ambhasā dūre vane mugdha mṛgāḥ iva

original: na kenacic ca vikrītā vikrītā iva saṃsthitāḥ /
analyzed: na kenacid ca vikrītāḥ vikrītāḥ iva saṃsthitāḥ

analyzed: vata mūḍhāḥ vayam sarve janānāḥ api śambaram

original: mudhaiva hi vayam mohāt saṃsthitā baddhabhāvanāḥ // MU_1,11.13
analyzed: mudhā eva hi vayam mohāt saṃsthitāḥ baddha bhāvanāḥ

original: āpātamātraramaṇīyatvāt na kiñcid api bhavantīty arthaḥ /

analyzed: ajñāte bahu kālena vyarthe eva vayam ghane

original: mohe nipatitā mugdhāḥ śvabhre mugdhamṛgā iva // MU_1,11.14

original: kim me rājyena kim bhogaiḥ ko 'haṃ kim idam āgatam /
analyzed: kim me rājyena kim bhogaiḥ kaḥ ham kim idam āgatam

original: yan mithyaivāstu tan mithyā kasya nāma kim āgatam // MU_1,11.15
analyzed: yat mithyā evā astu tat mithyā kasya nāma kim āgatam

original: yat mithyā bhavati tat mithyaivāstu iti sambandhaḥ // (MT_1,11.15)
analyzed: yat mithyā bhavati tat mithyā eva astu iti sambandhaḥ

original: evaṃ vimṛśato brahman sarveṣv eva tato mama /

analyzed: bhāveṣu aratiḥ āyātā pathikasya maruṣu iva

original: tad etad bhagavan brūhi kim idam parinaśyati /
analyzed: tat etat bhagavan brūhi kim idam parinaśyati

original: paśya jarjaratāṃ nītā vātair iva giridrumāḥ // MU_1,11.19
analyzed: paśya jarjara tām nītāḥ vātaiḥ iva giri drumāḥ

original: evaṃ sāmānyena saṃsārapadārthānāṃ duḥkhadatām uktvā tad viśeṣeṣu pradhānabhūtāyāḥ śriyaḥ kathayati
analyzed: evam sāmānyena saṃsāra padārthānām duḥkha da tām uktvā tat viśeṣeṣu pradhāna bhūtāyāḥ śriyaḥ kathayati

original: evaṃ śriyaḥ duḥkhadatvam uktvā tat pradhānāvayavabhūtasya dhanasyāpi duḥkhadatvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: evam śriyaḥ duḥkha da tvam uktvā tat pradhāna avayava bhūtasya dhanasya api duḥkha da tvam kathayati

original: ugrāpadāṃ hi bahukalatrāṇi gṛhāṇi duḥkhāyaiva bhavanti // (MT_1,11.26)

original: mama na nirvṛtim eti mano mune nigaḍitasya yathā vanahastinaḥ // MU_1,11.27

original: satataṃ bhaṅgurāṇi yāni kāraṇāni bhogarūpāṇi kāraṇāni /
analyzed: satatam bhaṅgurāṇi yāni kāraṇāni bhoga rūpāṇi kāraṇāni

analyzed: pravṛttāḥ prodyuktāḥ diśi diśi viveka eka haraṇe raṇe śaktāḥ teṣām vadata vibudhāḥ ke su bhaṭāḥ

tathā su caturāḥ ati cāturya yuktāḥ

original: teṣāṃ viṣayahaṭhacaurāṇāṃ raṇe ke subhaṭāḥ śaktāḥ bhavanti /

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ vairāgyaprakaraṇe ekādaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām vairāgya prakaraṇe ekādaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: śrīr mune parimohāya sāpi nūnam anarthadā // MU_1,12.1
analyzed: śrīḥ mune parimohāya sā api nūnam anartha dā
anartha dā iti viśeṣaṇa dvāra hetuḥ

original: jaḍān prasravati sphārān prāvṛṣīva taraṅgiṇī // MU_1,12.2

iyam śrīḥ ullāsa bahulān ullāsa pūrṇān

original: cañcalāḥ prabhavanty asyās taraṅgāḥ sarito yathā // MU_1,12.3
analyzed: cañcalāḥ prabhavanti asyāḥ taraṅgāḥ saritaḥ yathā

original: eṣā hi padam ekatra na nibadhnāti durbhagā /

original: vināśam eva dhatte 'ntar dīpalekheva kajjalam // MU_1,12.5

original: rājāpi hi guṇāguṇavicārarahitam eva pārśvagam avalambate //

original: vātyayeva himaṃ yāvac chriyā na paruṣīkṛtaḥ // MU_1,12.8
analyzed: vā atyayā iva himam yāvat śriyā na paruṣīkṛtaḥ

original: śrīsparśe janaḥ svasmin pare ca mahākaṭhina eva bhavatīti piṇḍārthaḥ /
analyzed: śrī sparśe janaḥ svasmin pare ca mahā kaṭhinaḥ eva bhavati iti piṇḍa arthaḥ

analyzed: vātyā hi himam paruṣīkaroti iti upamāna tvena gṛhītā

original: prājñāḥ śūrāḥ kṛtajñāś ca peśalā mṛdavaś ca ye /
analyzed: prājñāḥ śūrāḥ kṛtajñāḥ ca peśalāḥ mṛdavaḥ ca ye

original: na śrīḥ sukhāya bhagavan duḥkhāyaiva hi kalpate /
analyzed: na śrīḥ sukhāya bhagavan duḥkhāya eva hi kalpate

original: guptaṃ vināśanaṃ dhatte mṛtiṃ viṣalatā yathā // MU_1,12.10
analyzed: guptam vināśanam dhatte mṛtim viṣa latā yathā

original: śrīmān ajananindyaś ca śūraś cāpy avikatthanaḥ /
analyzed: śrīmān a jana nindyaḥ ca śūraḥ ca api a vikatthanaḥ

original: samadṛṣṭiḥ prabhuś caiva durlabhāḥ puruṣās trayaḥ // MU_1,12.11
analyzed: samadṛṣṭiḥ prabhuḥ ca eva durlabhāḥ puruṣāḥ trayaḥ

original: śriyā spṛṣṭaḥ sāhaṅkāratvena jananindya eva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_1,12.11)
analyzed: śriyā spṛṣṭaḥ sa ahaṅkāra tvena jana nindyaḥ eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: eṣā hi viṣamā duḥkhabhogināṃ gahanā guhā /
analyzed: eṣā hi viṣamā duḥkha bhoginām gahanā guhā

himam vairāgya vallīnām vikāra ulūka yāminī

original: ata eva ratyā varjitā kutrāpi ratim akurvatīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ratyā varjitā kutra api ratim akurvatī iti arthaḥ
tathā nakulī ati cāpala tvena nakula strī sarūpā
tasya hetuḥ ca asau ugra mṛgatṛṣṇikā kaṭhina mṛgatṛṣṇā svarūpā

calā dīpa śikhā iva ati durjñeyā agati gocarā

original: paśyāmy abhavyayā lakṣmyā kiñcid duḥkhād ṛte sukham // MU_1,12.20
analyzed: paśyāmi abhavyayā lakṣmyā kiñcid duḥkhāt ṛte sukham

original: aho vata hṛtasthānā nirlajjā durjanāspadā // MU_1,12.21
analyzed: aho vata hṛta sthānā nirlajjā durjana āspadā

original: manoramā karṣati cittavṛttiṃ kadaryasādhyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurā ca /
analyzed: manoramā karṣati citta vṛttim kadarya sādhyā kṣaṇa bhaṅgurā ca
vyāla āvalī garbha nivṛtta dehā śvabhra utthitā puṣpa latā iva lakṣmīḥ

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ vairāgyaprakaraṇe dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām vairāgya prakaraṇe dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: unmattam iva santyajya yāty akāṇḍe śarīrakam // MU_1,13.1
analyzed: unmattam iva santyajya yāti akāṇḍe śarīrakam

original: yujyate veṣṭanaṃ vāyāv ākāśasya ca khaṇḍanam /
analyzed: yujyate veṣṭanam vāyau ākāśasya ca khaṇḍanam

original: grathanaṃ ca taraṅgāṇām āsthā nāyuṣi yujyate // MU_1,13.5

analyzed: sa jīvati manaḥ yasya mananena na jīvati

original: bhāro 'vivekinaḥ śāstram bhāro jñānaṃ ca rāgiṇaḥ /
analyzed: bhāraḥ vivekinaḥ śāstram bhāraḥ jñānam ca rāgiṇaḥ

original: rūpam āyur mano buddhir ahaṅkāras tathehitam /

original: bhāro bhāradharasyeva sarvaṃ duḥkhāya durdhiyaḥ // MU_1,13.14

original: avalokyate kadā etat grase iti dṛśyate // (MT_1,13.19)

original: na bhuñje na pibāmy ambhaḥ kim u bhogān bhaje mune // MU_1,14.4

analyzed: śeṣeṇa iti ahaṅkāra āśrayaṇam tyaktvā yat kiñcid samājñāpayasi tat sampādayāmi iti bhāvaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ

original: kiñcit prāpto hi punaḥ kiñcid api na prārthayed iti bhāvaḥ //

original: parityajya kṣaṇam api na mano yāti nirvṛtim // MU_1,15.5

original: dhṛtim badhnāti naikatra kesarī pañjare yathā // MU_1,15.10

original: vajrād api dṛḍho brahman durnigrahamanograhaḥ // MU_1,15.21

original: cetaḥ patati kāryeṣu vihagaś cāmiṣeṣv iva /

original: kṣaṇena viratiṃ yāti bālaḥ krīḍanakād iva // MU_1,15.22

original: mano'bdhir īhitavyālo dūrān nayati tāta mām // MU_1,15.23

original: yadīdṛśam manas tavāsti tarhi tasya nigrahaṃ kurv ity / atrāha

analyzed: jvalati iva jarā dehe pravisphūrjati duṣkṛtam

analyzed: nīyate kevalam kvāpi nityam bhūta paramparā

original: vilobhyamānā janatā jagatyāṃ na vetty upāyātam aho na yātam // MU_1,26.21

original: yiyāsubhiḥ kālamukhaṃ kriyante janaiḍakais te hatakarmabandhāḥ /
analyzed: yiyāsubhiḥ kāla mukham kriyante jana eḍakaiḥ te hata karma bandhāḥ

original: ye pīnatām eva balād upetya śarīrabandhe nanu te bhavanti // MU_1,26.22

analyzed: karma vaśāt eva hi puruṣaḥ deha bandham prāpnoti

original: ajasram āgacchati satvareyam anārataṃ gacchati satvaraiva /

itas nyatas ca upagatā mudhā eva samāna saṅketa nibandha bhāvā

original: yathā yātrāyām mārge janā anyo'nyaṃ rātrau militvā prabhāte samānaṃ gantavyaṃ deśaṃ gacchanti /
analyzed: yathā yātrāyām mārge janāḥ anyonyam rātrau militvā prabhāte samānam gantavyam deśam gacchanti

analyzed: tathā saṃsāre pi putra ādibhiḥ militvā mṛtvā para loka ākhyam

original: atas teṣu bhāvabandhanaṃ na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_1,26.25)
analyzed: atas teṣu bhāva bandhanam na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: asāvadhānasya janasya buddhau cirasthirapratyayam ātanoti // MU_1,26.27
analyzed: asau adhānasya janasya buddhau cira sthira pratyayam ātanoti

original: atyantam bhramyamāṇā cakrikāpi asāvadhānasya janasya buddhau sthiratāpratyayam ādadhāti /

analyzed: bhikṣukaḥ maṅga lebhena nṛpaḥ yat kriyate balāt

original: tad amātyebhapaurāṇāṃ prayatnasya mahat phalam // MU_2,6.10
analyzed: tat amātya ibha paurāṇām prayatnasya mahat phalam

original: balāt yat kriyate amātyebhapaurāṇāṃ rājyapradātṝṇāṃ mantrimaṅgalahastināgarāṇāṃ /
analyzed: balāt yat kriyate amātya ibha paurāṇām rājya pradātṝṇām mantri maṅgala hasti nāgarāṇām
prayatnasya tat rājya dāna rūpasya pauruṣasya saha phalam bhavati
pauruṣena annam ākramya yathā dantaiḥ vicūrṇyate

original: alpaṃ pauruṣam ākramya tathā śūreṇa cūrṇyate // MU_2,6.11
analyzed: alpam pauruṣam ākramya tathā śūreṇa cūrṇyate

original: yathā dantaiḥ pauruṣeṇa annam ākramya svavaśīkṛtya /
analyzed: yathā dantaiḥ pauruṣeṇa annam ākramya svavaśīkṛtya
tathā śūreṇa adyatana pauruṣa yuktena puruṣeṇa
anubhūtam hi mahatām lāghavam yatna śālinām

original: yatheṣṭaṃ viniyujyante te taiḥ karmasu loṣṭavat // MU_2,6.12
analyzed: yathā iṣṭam viniyujyante te taiḥ karmasu loṣṭa vat
hi yasmāt asmābhiḥ yatna śālinām pauruṣa śālinām

original: śaktasya pauruṣaṃ dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vāpi yad bhavet /
analyzed: śaktasya pauruṣam dṛśyam adṛśyam vā api yat bhavet

original: tad daivam ity aśaktena buddham ātmany abuddhinā // MU_2,6.13
analyzed: tat daivam iti aśaktena buddham ātmani abuddhinā
dṛśyasya puruṣa ādeḥ adṛśyasya kāla ādeḥ ca

original: dṛśyam adṛśyaṃ vā yat pauruṣaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: dṛśyam a dṛśyam vā yat pauruṣam bhavet
aśaktena tad apekṣayā śakti rahitena puruṣeṇa

original: anyathā daivena me kṛtam iti na brūyāt //
analyzed: anyathā daivena me kṛtam iti na brūyāt
bhūtānām balavat bhūta yatnaḥ daivam iti sthitam

original: tasthuṣām apy adhiṣṭhātṛvatām etat sphuṭaṃ mithaḥ // MU_2,6.14
analyzed: tasthuṣām api adhiṣṭhātṛvatām etat sphuṭam mithas

original: puruṣo hi yatra na paryāpto bhavati tatraiva daivena me kṛtam iti kathayati
analyzed: puruṣaḥ hi yatra na paryāptaḥ bhavati tatra eva daivena me kṛtam iti kathayati

original: / na kevalam etan mayaiva jñātaṃ kiṃtv anyair apīty āha /
analyzed: na kevalam etat mayā eva jñātam kiṃtu anyaiḥ api iti āha

original: adhiṣṭhātṛvatāṃ tasthuṣām prerakayuktānāṃ sthitānām puruṣāṇām api /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhātṛvatām tasthuṣām preraka yuktānām sthitānām puruṣāṇām api
te hi parasparam kṣudrataratama ādi bhedena adhiṣṭheyāḥ bhavanti
adhiṣṭhātā eva ca adhiṣṭheyam prati daivam
nanu bhikṣuka rājya viṣaye yam nyāyaḥ na asti iti atra āha
śāstra amātya ibha paurāṇām avikalpyā svabhāva dhīḥ

original: sā yā bhikṣukarājyasya kartrī dhartrī prajāsthiteḥ // MU_2,6.15
analyzed: sā yā bhikṣuka rājyasya kartrī dhartrī prajā sthiteḥ

original: sā svabhāvadhīḥ svabhāvāt utthitā bhikṣurājyadānarūpā buddhiḥ /
analyzed: sā svabhāva dhīḥ svabhāvāt utthitā bhikṣu rājya dāna rūpā buddhiḥ

original: avikalpyā nāśayitum aśakyāśaktā iti yāvat bhavati /
analyzed: avikalpyā nāśayitum aśakyāśaktā iti yāvat bhavati
tad dvāreṇa prajā sthiteḥ dhartrī ca bhavati

original: ato 'trāpy ayam eva nyāya iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas tra api ayam eva nyāyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: mriyate / tasya putraś ca na syāt /
analyzed: mriyate tasya putraḥ ca na syāt
aihikaḥ prāktanam hanti prāktanaḥ dyatanam balāt
sarvadā puruṣa spandaḥ tatra an udvegavān jayī

original: nanu tatra kaḥ prāyaḥ balavān astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tatra kaḥ prāyaḥ balavān asti iti atra āha
dvayoḥ adyatanasya eva pratyakṣāt bali tā bhavet

original: daivaṃ jetum ato yatnair bālo yūneva śakyate // MU_2,6.17
analyzed: daivam jetum atas yatnaiḥ bālaḥ yūnā iva śakyate

original: dṛśyate hi adyatanaḥ śubhācāraḥ hyastanam aśubhaṃ nāśayan /
analyzed: dṛśyate hi adyatanaḥ śubha ācāraḥ hyastanam aśubham nāśayan

original: yathā yūnā bālaḥ jetuṃ śakyate tathety arthaḥ // (MT_2,6.17)
analyzed: yathā yūnā bālaḥ jetum śakyate tathā iti arthaḥ

original: meghena nīyate yad vā vatsaropārjitā kṛṣiḥ /
analyzed: meghena nīyate yat vā vatsara upārjitā kṛṣiḥ

original: atrāpi na daivasya kācic chaktir astīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,6.18)
analyzed: atrā api na daivasya kācid śaktiḥ asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: krameṇopārjite 'py arthe naṣṭe kāryā na kheditā /
analyzed: krameṇa upārjite pi arthe naṣṭe kāryā na kheditā

original: na balaṃ yatra me śaktaṃ tatra kā paridevanā // MU_2,6.19
analyzed: na balam yatra me śaktam tatra kā paridevanā

original: na hi janaḥ aśakyaḥ rājyādivastuprāptyarthaṃ pratyahaṃ paridevanāyukto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na hi janaḥ aśakyaḥ rājya ādi vastu prāpti artham pratyaham paridevanā yuktaḥ bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: yan na śaknomi tasyārthe yadi duḥkhaṃ karomy aham /
analyzed: yat na śaknomi tasya arthe yadi duḥkham karomi aham

original: tad amānitamṛtyor me yuktaṃ pratyaharodanam // MU_2,6.20
analyzed: tat a mānita mṛtyoḥ me yuktam pratyaha rodanam
amānita mṛtyoḥ tāvat mṛtyu pātam api an aṅgīkurvataḥ
deśa kāla kriyā dravya vaśataḥ visphuranti amī

original: sarva eva jagadbhāvā jayaty adhikayatnavān // MU_2,6.21
analyzed: sarve eva jagat bhāvāḥ jayati adhika yatnavān
tasmāt pauruṣam āśritya sat śāstraiḥ sat samāgamaiḥ

original: prajñām amalatāṃ nītvā saṃsārāmbunidhiṃ tara // MU_2,6.22
analyzed: prajñām amala tām nītvā saṃsāra ambunidhim tara
amala tām rāga ādi mala rāhityam
prāktanaḥ ca aihikaḥ ca asau puruṣa arthau phala drumau

original: aihikaḥ puruṣārthaś ca jagaty abhyadhikas tayoḥ // MU_2,6.23
analyzed: aihikaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ ca jagati abhyadhikaḥ tayoḥ

original: karma yaḥ prāktanaṃ tucchaṃ na nihanti śubhehitaiḥ /
analyzed: karma yaḥ prāktanam tuccham na nihanti śubha īhitaiḥ
ajñaḥ jantuḥ vāc manaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ

original: vāṅmanaḥsukhaduḥkhau apy asau nāśayituṃ na śaknoti /
analyzed: vāc manaḥ sukha duḥkhau api asau nāśayitum na śaknoti
śarīra duḥkha nāśe tu kā kathā iti bhāvaḥ
yaḥ tu udāra camatkāraḥ sat ācāra vihāravān

original: sa niryāti jaganmohān mṛgendraḥ pañjarād iva // MU_2,6.25
analyzed: sa niryāti jagat mohāt mṛgendraḥ pañjarāt iva
saḥ eva śubha pauruṣa bhājanam iti bhāvaḥ

original: kaścin māṃ prerayaty evam ity anarthakukalpane /
analyzed: kaścid mām prerayati evam iti anartha kukalpane

original: yaḥ sthito dṛṣṭam utsṛjya tyājyo 'sau dūrato 'dhamaḥ // MU_2,6.26
analyzed: yaḥ sthitaḥ dṛṣṭam utsṛjya tyājyaḥ sau dūratas dhamaḥ
vyavahāra sahasrāṇi yāni upāyānti yānti ca

original: yathāśāstraṃ vihartavyaṃ teṣu tyaktvā sukhāsukhe // MU_2,6.27
analyzed: yathāśāstram vihartavyam teṣu tyaktvā sukha asukhe

original: upatiṣṭhanti sarvāṇi ratnāny ambunidher iva // MU_2,6.28

analyzed: sva artha prāpaka kārya eka prayatna para tā budhaiḥ

original: proktā pauruṣaśabdena sā siddhyai śāstrayantritā // MU_2,6.29
analyzed: proktā pauruṣa śabdena sā siddhyai śāstra yantritā
sva artha prāpake sva prayojana sādhake kārye
prayatna para tā śāstra yantritā śāstra buddhā
kriyāyāḥ spanda dharmiṇyāḥ sva artha sādhaka tā svayam
sādhu saṅgama śāstra artha tīkṣṇayā abhyūhyate dhiyā
sva artha sādhaka tā svayam anya nirapekṣam bhavati

original: sādhusaṅgamaśāstrārthatīkṣṇayā dhiyā sambandhinī svārthasādhakatā abhyūhyate vivecyate /
analyzed: sādhu saṅgama śāstra artha tīkṣṇayā dhiyā sambandhinī sva artha sādhaka tā abhyūhyate vivecyate
kā śubhā iti vyavasthāpyate iti arthaḥ
anantam samatā ānandam paramārtham viduḥ budhāḥ

original: sa yebhyaḥ prāpyate 'nantaṃ te sevyāḥ śāstrasādhavaḥ // MU_2,6.31
analyzed: sa yebhyaḥ prāpyate nantam te sevyāḥ śāstra sādhavaḥ
sarvatra sama darśi tvam sama tā

original: prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ tac ced daivaśabdena kathyate /
analyzed: prāktanam pauruṣam tat ced daiva śabdena kathyate

original: tad yuktam etad etasmin nāsti nāpavadāmahe // MU_2,6.32
analyzed: tat yuktam etat etasmin na asti na apavadāmahe
prāktanam pauruṣam daiva śabdena ced yadi
yatas etat samatā ānanda prāpti upāya tvam

original: ataḥ vayaṃ nāpavadāmahe tadapavādaṃ na kurmaḥ /
analyzed: atas vayam na apavadāmahe tad apavādam na kurmaḥ

original: mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivam anyad yais te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitam daivam anyat yaiḥ te kṣayam gatāḥ

original: nityaṃ svapauruṣād eva lokadvayahitaṃ bhavet // MU_2,6.33
analyzed: nityam sva pauruṣāt eva loka dvaya hitam bhavet
hyastanī duṣkriyā abhyeti śobhām satkriyayā yathā

original: adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava // MU_2,6.34
analyzed: adyā evam prāktanī tasmāt yatnāt satkāryavān bhava

original: yathā adyatanayā satkriyayā hyastanī duṣkriyā śobhāṃ abhyeti /
analyzed: yathā adyatanayā satkriyayā hyastanī duṣkriyā śobhām abhyeti
prāktanī prāc janma bhavā vāsanā rūpā duṣkriyā
adya adyatanayā sat śāstra sevana ādi rūpayā satkriyayā

original: karāmalakavad dṛṣṭaṃ pauruṣād eva yat phalam /
analyzed: kara āmalaka vat dṛṣṭam pauruṣāt eva yat phalam

original: mūḍhaḥ pratyakṣam utsṛjya daivamohe nimajjati // MU_2,6.35
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ pratyakṣam utsṛjya daiva mohe nimajjati
pratyakṣam pratyakṣa pramāṇa siddham pauruṣam utsṛjya
daiva mohe daiva rūpe bhrame majjati

original: asmābhiḥ phalam karāmalakavat pauruṣād eva dṛṣṭam pratyakṣam anubhūtam // (MT_2,6.35)
analyzed: asmābhiḥ phalam kara āmalaka vat pauruṣāt eva dṛṣṭam pratyakṣam anubhūtam
sakala kāraṇa kārya vivarjitam nija vikalpa balāt upakalpitam

original: tad anapekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam ātmanaḥ // MU_2,6.36
analyzed: tat an apekṣya hi daivam asat mayam śraya śubha āśaya pauruṣam ātmanaḥ
atas eva nija vikalpa balāt upakalpitam saṃpāditam
tat asat mayam daivam an apekṣya
daiva vaśaḥ mā bhava iti bhāvaḥ

original: śāstraiḥ sadācaritajṛṃbhitadeśadharmair yat kalpitaṃ phalam atīva ciraprarūḍham /
analyzed: śāstraiḥ sat ācarita jṛṃbhita deśa dharmaiḥ yat kalpitam phalam atīva cira prarūḍham

original: tasmin hṛdi sphurati no 'param eti cittam aṅgāvalī tad anu pauruṣam etad āhuḥ // MU_2,6.37
analyzed: tasmin hṛdi sphurati no param eti cittam aṅga āvalī tat anu pauruṣam etat āhuḥ
avicchinna pravāheṇa āgatāḥ ye deśa dharmāḥ

original: taiḥ cātīva ciraprarūḍhaṃ atyantabahukālāt prabhṛti prasiddhaṃ /
analyzed: taiḥ ca atīva cira prarūḍham atyanta bahu kālāt prabhṛti prasiddham

original: yat phalaṃ kalpitam sādhyatvena niścitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yat phalam kalpitam sādhya tvena niścitam bhavati
hṛdi sphurati saṃpādanīya tayā vilasati sati
cittam aparam prokta phala itaram vastu yat
aṅga āvalī hasta ādi avayava paṅktiḥ
api tu tat sādhana eka param bhavati

original: na tu yathā tathā hastādicālanam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na tu yathā tathā hasta ādi cālanam iti bhāvaḥ

original: buddhvaiva pauruṣaphalaṃ puruṣatvam etad ātmaprayatnaparataiva sadaiva kāryā /
analyzed: buddhvā eva pauruṣa phalam puruṣa tvam etat ātma prayatna para tā eva sadā eva kāryā

original: neyā tataḥ saphalatāṃ paramām athāsau sacchāstrasādhujanapaṇḍitasevanena // MU_2,6.38
analyzed: neyā tatas sa phala tām paramām atha asau sat śāstra sādhu jana paṇḍita sevanena
ātma prayatna para tā pauruṣa nirvṛtta tvam
puruṣeṇa asau ātma prayatna para tā
sat śāstra sādhu jana paṇḍita sevanena paramām utkṛṣṭām
sa phala tām mokṣa ākhya phala yukta tām neyā
daiva pauruṣa vicāra cārubhiḥ cetasā caritam ātma pauruṣam

original: nityam eva jayatīti bhāvitaiḥ kārya āryajanasevanodyamaḥ // MU_2,6.39
analyzed: nityam eva jayati iti bhāvitaiḥ kāryaḥ ārya jana sevana udyamaḥ
puruṣaiḥ ārya jana sevana udyamaḥ kāryaḥ
daiva pauruṣayoḥ yaḥ vicāraḥ svarūpa vivecanam
sarva phala janaka tvāt sarva utkarṣeṇa vartate iti
sarga anta ślokena api etat eva kathayati

original: janmaprabandhamayam āmayam eṣa jīvo buddhvaihikaṃ sahajapauruṣam eva siddhyai /
analyzed: janma prabandha mayam āmayam eṣa jīvaḥ buddhvā aihikam sahaja pauruṣam eva siddhyai

original: śāntiṃ nayatv avitathena varauṣadhena pṛṣṭena tuṣṭiparapaṇḍitasevanena // MU_2,6.40
analyzed: śāntim nayatu avitathena vara auṣadhena pṛṣṭena tuṣṭi para paṇḍita sevanena

original: aihikaṃ iha loke śakyatvena sthitaṃ pauruṣaṃ /
analyzed: aihikam iha loke śakya tvena sthitam pauruṣam
tatas tad āśrayaṇena anuṣṭhitena tuṣṭi para paṇḍita sevanena hetunā
vara auṣadhena samyak jñāna ākhya vara auṣadhena
janma prabandha mayam janma santāna rūpam
iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu vyavahāra prakaraṇe ṣaṣṭhaḥ

original: oṃ atyantopādeyatvena punar api pauruṣacarcām eva prastauti
analyzed: om atyanta upādeya tvena punar api pauruṣa carcām eva prastauti
prāpya vyādhi vinirmuktam deham alpa adhivedhitam

original: tathātmānaṃ samādadhyād yathā bhūyo na jāyate // MU_2,7.1
analyzed: tathā ātmānam samādadhyāt yathā bhūyas na jāyate
alpaḥ yaḥ ādhiḥ jīvana upāya ādi nimittā citta pīḍā
samādadhyāt cit mātra tattve samādhāna yuktam kuryāt

original: iha cāmutra ca jayet sa saṃpūrṇābhivāñchitaḥ // MU_2,7.2
analyzed: iha ca amutra ca jayet sa saṃpūrṇa abhivāñchitaḥ

original: saṃpūrṇe abhivāñchite bhogamokṣarūpe kāṅkṣite yasya saḥ //
analyzed: saṃpūrṇe abhivāñchite bhoga mokṣa rūpe kāṅkṣite yasya saḥ
ye samudyogam utsṛjya sthitāḥ daiva parāyaṇāḥ

original: te dharmam arthakāmau ca nāśayanty ātmavidviṣaḥ // MU_2,7.3
analyzed: te dharmam artha kāmau ca nāśayanti ātma vidviṣaḥ
ātma vidviṣ tvam ca teṣām bhoga mokṣa rūpa ātmaka kārya nāśaka tvāt jñeyam
saṃvid spandaḥ manaḥ spandaḥ indriya spandaḥ eva ca

original: etāni puruṣārthasya rūpāṇy ebhyaḥ phalodayaḥ // MU_2,7.4
analyzed: etāni puruṣa arthasya rūpāṇi ebhyaḥ phala udayaḥ
saṃvid tattvāt eva pauruṣa utthānam kathayati
yathā saṃvedanam cetaḥ tathā antar spandam ṛcchati

original: tathaiva kāyaś calati tathaiva phalabhoktṛtā // MU_2,7.5
analyzed: tathā eva kāyaḥ calati tathā eva phala bhoktṛ tā
tathā eva citta spanda anusāreṇa eva

original: kāyaḥ calati hitāhitaprāptiparihārarūpāṃ kriyāṃ prati ceṣṭate /
analyzed: kāyaḥ calati hita ahita prāpti parihāra rūpām kriyām prati ceṣṭate
tatas tathā eva kāya calana anusāreṇa eva

original: ābālam etat saṃsiddhaṃ yatra yatra yathā tathā /
analyzed: ābālam etat saṃsiddham yatra yatra yathā tathā

original: daivaṃ tu na kvacid dṛṣṭam ato jayati pauruṣam // MU_2,7.6
analyzed: daivam tu na kvacid dṛṣṭam atas jayati pauruṣam
puruṣa arthena deva īśa guruḥ eṣa bṛhaspatiḥ
śukraḥ daitya indra guru tām puruṣa arthena ca āsthitaḥ
dainya dāridrya duḥkha ārtāḥ api sādho nara uttamāḥ
pauruṣeṇa eva yatnena yātāḥ devendra tulya tām
deva indra tulya tām indra sāmyam
mahāntaḥ vibhava āḍhyāḥ ye nānā āścarya samāśrayāḥ
pauruṣeṇa eva doṣeṇa naraka atithi tām gatāḥ
bhāva abhāva sahasreṣu daśāsu vividhāsu ca
sva pauruṣa vaśāt eva vivṛttāḥ bhūta jātayaḥ
bhāva abhāva ādi āviṣṭāḥ saṃpannāḥ iti yāvat

original: śāstrato gurutaś caiva svataś ceti trisiddhitā /
analyzed: śāstrataḥ gurutaḥ ca eva svatas ca iti tri siddhi tā

original: sarvatra puruṣārthasya na daivasya kadācana // MU_2,7.11
analyzed: sarvatra puruṣa arthasya na daivasya kadācana
tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ siddhi tā tri siddhi tā
svatas śāstra ādi vinā sva pratibhā mātrāt eva

original: yatnena cittam ity āśu sarvaśāstrārthasaṃgrahaḥ // MU_2,7.12
analyzed: yatnena cittam iti āśu sarva śāstra artha saṃgrahaḥ
aśubheṣu bhoga arjana rūpeṣu aśubha kāryeṣu

original: yac chreyo yad atucchaṃ ca yad apāyavivarjitam /
analyzed: yat śreyaḥ yat a tuccham ca yat apāya vivarjitam

original: tat tad ācara yatnena putreti guravaḥ sthitāḥ // MU_2,7.13
analyzed: tat tat ācara yatnena putra iti guravaḥ sthitāḥ

original: yathā yathā prayatno me phalam āśu tathā tathā /
analyzed: yathā yathā prayatnaḥ me phalam āśu tathā tathā

original: ity ahaṃ pauruṣād eva phalabhāṅ na tu daivataḥ // MU_2,7.14
analyzed: iti aham pauruṣāt eva phala bhāj na tu daivataḥ

original: ity evaṃ / niścayavān bhaved iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,7.14)
analyzed: iti evam niścayavān bhavet iti bhāvaḥ

original: pauruṣād dṛśyate siddhiḥ pauruṣaṃ dhīmatāṃ kramaḥ /
analyzed: pauruṣāt dṛśyate siddhiḥ pauruṣam dhīmatām kramaḥ
daivam āśvāsanā mātram duḥkha pelava buddhiṣu
pratyakṣa pramukhāt nityam pramāṇam pauruṣaḥ kramaḥ
phalataḥ dṛśyate loke deśa antara gama ādikāt
pāda cālana ādi rūpam pauruṣam iti yāvat
deśa antara gama ādikāt phalataḥ phalāt

original: bhoktā tṛpyati nābhoktā gantā gacchati nāgatiḥ /
analyzed: bhoktā tṛpyati na abhoktā gantā gacchati na agatiḥ

original: vaktā vakti na cāvaktā pauruṣaṃ saphalaṃ nṛṇām // MU_2,7.17
analyzed: vaktā vakti na ca avaktā pauruṣam sa phalam nṛṇām

original: samuttaranty ayatnena na tu mūkatayānayā // MU_2,7.18
analyzed: samuttaranti ayatnena na tu mūka tayā anayā
mūka tayā daiva para tva rūpeṇa udyoga rāhityena

original: yo yo yathā prayatate sa sa tadvat phalaikabhāk /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ yathā prayatate sa sa tadvat phala eka bhāj

original: na tu tūṣṇīṃ sthiteneha kenacit prāpyate phalam // MU_2,7.19
analyzed: na tu tūṣṇīm sthitena iha kenacid prāpyate phalam
śubhena puruṣa arthena śubham āsādyate phalam

original: aśubhenāśubhaṃ rāma yathecchasi tathā kuru // MU_2,7.20
analyzed: aśubhena aśubham rāma yathā icchasi tathā kuru
puruṣa artha phala prāptiḥ deśa kāla vaśāt iha

original: prāptā cireṇa śīghraṃ vā yāsau daivam iti smṛtā // MU_2,7.21
analyzed: prāptā cireṇa śīghram vā yā asau daivam iti smṛtā

original: prāptiḥ prāpteti kāryaṃ karoti itivat prayogaḥ /
analyzed: prāptiḥ prāptā iti kāryam karoti iti vat prayogaḥ

original: na daivaṃ dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā na ca lokāntare sthitam /
analyzed: na daivam dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā na ca loka antare sthitam

original: uktaṃ daivābhidhānena svaṃ loke karmaṇaḥ phalam // MU_2,7.22
analyzed: uktam daiva abhidhānena svam loke karmaṇaḥ phalam

original: puruṣo jāyate loke vardhate kṣīyate punaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ jāyate loke vardhate kṣīyate punar

original: na tatra dṛśyate daivaṃ jarāyauvanabālyavān // MU_2,7.23
analyzed: na tatra dṛśyate daivam jarā yauvana bālyavān
deśāt deśa antara prāptiḥ hasta stha dravya dhāraṇam

original: vyāpāraś ca tathāṅgānāṃ pauruṣeṇa na daivataḥ // MU_2,7.24
analyzed: vyāpāraḥ ca tathā aṅgānām pauruṣeṇa na daivataḥ
artha prāpaka kārya eka prayatna para tā budhaiḥ
proktā pauruṣa śabdena sarvam āsādyate nayā
anartha prāpti kārya eka prayatna para tā tu yā

original: soktā pronmattaceṣṭeti na kiṃcit prāpyate 'nayā // MU_2,7.26
analyzed: sā uktā pronmatta ceṣṭā iti na kiṃcid prāpyate nayā
anartha prāptau anartha prāpti artham yat kāryam
kriyāyāḥ spanda dharmiṇyāḥ sva artha sādhaka tā svayam
sādhu saṅgam asat śāstra tīkṣṇayā unnīyate dhiyā
anantam samatā ānandam paramārtham svakam viduḥ

original: tad yebhyaḥ prāpyate yatnāt sevyās te śāstrasādhavaḥ // MU_2,7.28
analyzed: tat yebhyaḥ prāpyate yatnāt sevyāḥ te śāstra sādhavaḥ
svakam parama artham nijam parama prayojanam
sat śāstra ādi guṇaḥ matyā sat śāstra ādi guṇāt matiḥ

original: vardhete te mitho 'bhyāsāt sarobdāv iva kālataḥ // MU_2,7.29
analyzed: vardhete te mithas bhyāsāt saraḥ bdau iva kālataḥ
sat śāstra ādi rūpaḥ guṇaḥ matyā bhavati
buddhi rahitasya sat śāstra ādau pravṛtti abhāvāt
matiḥ sat śāstra ādi guṇāt bhavati
te sat śāstra ādi guṇa matī
kālataḥ mithas vardhete tathā iti arthaḥ

original: kadācid dhi saraḥ meghavṛṣṭena jalena vardhate /
analyzed: kadācid hi saraḥ megha vṛṣṭena jalena vardhate
ā bālyāt alam abhyastaiḥ śāstra sat saṃgama ādibhiḥ

original: guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svo 'rthaḥ saṃprāpyate hitaḥ // MU_2,7.30
analyzed: guṇaiḥ puruṣa yatnena svaḥ rthaḥ saṃprāpyate hitaḥ
svaḥ arthaḥ mokṣa ākhyam nijam prayojanam
pauruṣeṇa jitāḥ daityāḥ sthāpitāḥ bhuvana kriyāḥ

original: racitāni jagantīha viṣṇunā na tu daivataḥ // MU_2,7.31
analyzed: racitāni jaganti iha viṣṇunā na tu daivataḥ

original: jagati puruṣakārakāraṇe 'smin kuru raghunātha ciraṃ tathā prayatnam /
analyzed: jagati puruṣakāra kāraṇe smin kuru raghunātha ciram tathā prayatnam

original: vrajasi tarusarīsṛpābhidhānāṃ subhaga yathā na daśām aśaṅkam eva // MU_2,7.32
analyzed: vrajasi taru sarīsṛpa abhidhānām subhaga yathā na daśām aśaṅkam eva
cit mātra pauruṣāt eva hi jagat utpannam
taru sarīsṛpa abhidhānām daśām taru ādi rūpa tām iti arthaḥ
taru ādayaḥ hi pauruṣa rāhityena eva duḥkham anubhavanti iti
iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu vyavahāra prakaraṇe saptamaḥ
om punar daiva nirākaraṇam karoti om

original: nākṛtir na ca karmāṇi nāspadaṃ na parākramaḥ /
analyzed: na ākṛtiḥ na ca karmāṇi na āspadam na parākramaḥ

original: tan mithyājñānavat prauḍhaṃ daivaṃ nāma kim ucyate // MU_2,8.1
analyzed: tat mithyā jñāna vat prauḍham daivam nāma kim ucyate
sva karma phala saṃprāptau idam ittham iti iha yāḥ

original: giras tā daivanāmnaitāḥ prasiddhiṃ samupāgatāḥ // MU_2,8.2
analyzed: giraḥ tāḥ daiva nāmnā etāḥ prasiddhim samupāgatāḥ

original: idam ittham iti gira idaṃ itthaṃ saṃpannam iti vācaḥ //
analyzed: idam ittham iti giraḥ idam ittham saṃpannam iti vācaḥ
tathā eva mūḍha matibhiḥ daivam asti iti niścayaḥ

original: ātto duravabodhena rajjāv iva bhujaṅgamaḥ // MU_2,8.3

analyzed: hyastanī duṣkriyā abhyeti śobhām satkriyayā yathā

original: adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmād yatnāt satkāryavān bhava // MU_2,8.4
analyzed: adyā evam prāktanī tasmāt yatnāt satkāryavān bhava
mūḍha anumāna saṃsiddham daivam yasya asti durmateḥ

original: daivād dāho 'stu mā veti vaktavyaṃ tena pāvake // MU_2,8.5
analyzed: daivāt dāhaḥ stu mā vā iti vaktavyam tena pāvake
mūḍha anumāna saṃsiddham daivam yasya durmateḥ ajñāninaḥ

original: daivād dāhaḥ astu māstu veti vaktavyam /
analyzed: daivāt dāhaḥ astu mā astu vā iti vaktavyam

original: tatra tv asau naitad vaktuṃ śaknoti dāhaikalabdher iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tatra tu asau na etat vaktum śaknoti dāha eka labdheḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: daivam eveha cet karma puṃsaḥ kim iva ceṣṭayā /
analyzed: daivam evā iha ced karma puṃsaḥ kim iva ceṣṭayā
snāna dāna aśana ādārān daivam eva kariṣyati

original: na caitat saṃbhavati akiṃcitkurvataḥ snānādyanupapatter iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,8.6)
analyzed: na ca etat saṃbhavati a kiṃcid kurvataḥ snāna ādi anupapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: kiṃ vā śāstropadeśena mūko 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ kila /
analyzed: kim vā śāstra upadeśena mūkaḥ yam puruṣaḥ kila

original: saṃcāryate tu daivena kiṃ kasyehopadiśyate // MU_2,8.7
analyzed: saṃcāryate tu daivena kim kasya iha upadiśyate

original: daivāṅgīkāre na ko 'pi kasyāpy upadeśaṃ kuryād iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,8.7)
analyzed: daiva aṅgīkāre na kaḥ pi kasya api upadeśam kuryāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: na ca niḥspandatā loke dṛṣṭeha śavatāṃ vinā /
analyzed: na ca niḥspanda tā loke dṛṣṭā iha śava tām vinā

original: spandaś ca phalasaṃprāptis tasmād daivaṃ nirarthakam // MU_2,8.8
analyzed: spandaḥ ca phala saṃprāptiḥ tasmāt daivam nirarthakam

original: nanu daivena sahaiva puruṣaḥ kāryaṃ karotīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu daivena saha eva puruṣaḥ kāryam karoti iti atra āha
na ca amūrtena daivena mūrtasya sahakartṛ tā

original: hastādīn īhataś caiva na daivena kvacit kṛtam // MU_2,8.9
analyzed: hasta ādīn īhataḥ ca eva na daivena kvacid kṛtam
atas daivena kṛtam daiva kartṛkam kāryam

original: nanu manobuddhyādivad amūrtasyāpi daivasya mūrtena saha kartṛtvam asty evety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu manaḥ buddhi ādi vat amūrtasya api daivasya mūrtena saha kartṛ tvam asti eva iti atra āha
manaḥ buddhi vat api etat daivam na iha anubhūyate

original: āgopālaṃ kila prājñais tena daivam asat sadā // MU_2,8.10
analyzed: āgopālam kila prājñaiḥ tena daivam asat sadā
mṛta śarīre kartṛ tva adarśanāt manaḥ buddhī kalpyete

original: na ca daivasyātra kaścid upayoga iti /
analyzed: na ca daivasya atra kaścid upayogaḥ iti
na tad kalpanā avasaraḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu kadācit tasmād eva dṛśyāt śarīrādeḥ kāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kadācin na dṛṣṭam iti adṛṣṭasya daivasya kalpanā yuktaivety
analyzed: nanu kadācid tasmāt eva dṛśyāt śarīra ādeḥ kāryam dṛṣṭam kadācid na dṛṣṭam iti adṛṣṭasya daivasya kalpanā yuktā eva iti

original: pṛthak ced buddhir anyo 'rthaḥ saiva cet kānyatā tayoḥ /
analyzed: pṛthak ced buddhiḥ anyaḥ ṛthaḥ sā eva ced kā anyatā tayoḥ

original: kalpanā vā pramāṇaṃ cet pauruṣaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate // MU_2,8.11
analyzed: kalpanā vā pramāṇam ced pauruṣam kim na kalpyate

original: tadārthaḥ anya ekasmāt dvitīyaḥ pṛthag iti yāvat /
analyzed: tadā arthaḥ anyaḥ ekasmāt dvitīyaḥ pṛthak iti yāvat

original: tadā tayoḥ arthayoḥ kā anyatā bhavati /
analyzed: tadā tayoḥ arthayoḥ kā anyatā bhavati

original: ato 'tra kevalasaddṛśyāc charīrāder eva kāryaṃ bhavatv iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kevala sat dṛśyāt śarīra ādeḥ eva kāryam bhavatu iti bhāvaḥ
nanu atra buddhi pṛthaktva upayogaḥ na asti
kalpanā prathamam pramāṇam na asti ced

original: punar api prakṛtaṃ mūrtāmūrtayoḥ sahakartṛtvāsaṃbhavam eva kathayati
analyzed: punar api prakṛtam mūrta amūrtayoḥ sahakartṛ tva asaṃbhavam eva kathayati
na amūrtena ca saṅgaḥ sti nabhasā iva vapuṣmataḥ

original: mūrtaṃ ca dṛśyate lagnaṃ tasmād daivaṃ na vidyate // MU_2,8.12
analyzed: mūrtam ca dṛśyate lagnam tasmāt daivam na vidyate

original: nanu tathāpi amūrtam eva kartṛ bhavatv ity /
analyzed: nanu tathā api amūrtam eva kartṛ bhavatu iti

original: asmābhiḥ mūrtam eva lagnaṃ kāryalagnaṃ dṛśyate /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ mūrtam eva lagnam kārya lagnam dṛśyate

original: ataḥ tasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas tasya eva kartṛ tvam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ
viniyoktā atha bhūtānām asti anyat tat jagattraye

original: śeratāṃ bhūtavṛndāni daivaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati // MU_2,8.13
analyzed: śeratām bhūta vṛndāni daivam sarvam kariṣyati
daivena ittham niyuktaḥ smi kim karomi īdṛśam sthitam

original: samāśvāsanavāg eṣā na daivaṃ paramārthataḥ // MU_2,8.14
analyzed: samāśvāsana vāc eṣā na daivam paramārthataḥ

original: mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivaṃ tatparās te kṣayaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitam daivam tad parāḥ te kṣayam gatāḥ

original: prājñās tu puruṣārthena padam uttamam āgatāḥ // MU_2,8.15
analyzed: prājñāḥ tu puruṣa arthena padam uttamam āgatāḥ
tad parāḥ svayam kalpita daiva parāḥ
uttamam padam mokṣa ākhyam utkṛṣṭam sthānam

original: ye śūrā ye ca vikrāntā ye prājñā ye ca paṇḍitāḥ /
analyzed: ye śūrāḥ ye ca vikrāntāḥ ye prājñāḥ ye ca paṇḍitāḥ

original: tais taiḥ kair iva loke 'smin vada daivaṃ pracakṣyate // MU_2,8.16
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ kaiḥ iva loke smin vada daivam pracakṣyate
na kena api pracakṣyate iti bhāvaḥ
kāla vidbhiḥ vinirṇītā yasya asti cira jīvi tā

original: sa cej jīvati saṃchinnaśirās tad daivam uttamam // MU_2,8.17
analyzed: sa ced jīvati saṃchinna śirāḥ tat daivam uttamam
kāla vidbhiḥ vinirṇītam pāṇḍityam yasya rāghava

original: anadhyāpita evāsau tajjñaś ced daivam uttamam // MU_2,8.18
analyzed: an adhyāpitaḥ eva asau tad jñaḥ ced daivam uttamam

original: pauruṣeṇaiva saṃprāptaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ rāma nānyathā // MU_2,8.19
analyzed: pauruṣeṇa eva saṃprāptam brāhmaṇyam rāma na anyathā

original: amībhir na parai rāma puruṣair munitāṃ gataiḥ /
analyzed: amībhiḥ na paraiḥ rāma puruṣaiḥ muni tām gataiḥ
pauruṣeṇa eva saṃprāptā ciram gagana gamitā
utsādya deva saṃghātān cakruḥ tribhuvana udare
pauruṣeṇa eva yatnena sāmrājyam dānava īśvarāḥ
ālūna śīrṇam ābhogi jagat ājahruḥ ojasā

original: rāma pauruṣayuktyaiva salilaṃ dhāryate na vā /
analyzed: rāma pauruṣa yuktyā eva salilam dhāryate na vā

original: ciraṃ karaṇḍake yuktyā na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam // MU_2,8.23
analyzed: ciram karaṇḍake yuktyā na daivam tatra kāraṇam
karaṇḍake randhra yukte kāṇḍa sādhite dravya viśeṣe

original: kenacit prayogena hi karaṇḍe 'pi jalaṃ tiṣṭhati // (MT_2,8.23)
analyzed: kenacid prayogena hi karaṇḍe jalam tiṣṭhati
haraṇa ādāna saṃrambha vibhrama bhrama bhūmiṣu

original: śaktatā dṛśyate rāma na daivasyauṣadher iva // MU_2,8.24
analyzed: śakta tā dṛśyate rāma na daivasya oṣadheḥ iva
sakala kāraṇa kārya vivarjitam nija vikalpa vaśāt upakalpitam

original: tvam anavekṣya hi daivam asanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣam uttamam // MU_2,8.25
analyzed: tvam an avekṣya hi daivam asat mayam śraya śubha āśaya pauruṣam uttamam
iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe ṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ
bhagavan sarva dharma jña pratiṣṭhām alam āgatam

original: yal loke tad vada brahman daivam evaṃ kim ucyate // MU_2,9.1
analyzed: yat loke tat vada brahman daivam evam kim ucyate

original: yat daivam loke evam pratiṣṭhām prasiddhim /
analyzed: yat daivam loke evam pratiṣṭhām prasiddhim

original: na hi asiddhaṃ vastu prasiddhim āyāti iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,9.1)
analyzed: na hi asiddham vastu prasiddhim āyāti iti bhāvaḥ
pauruṣam sarva kāryāṇām kartṛ rāghava na itarat

original: phalabhoktṛ ca sarvatra na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam // MU_2,9.2
analyzed: phala bhoktṛ ca sarvatra na daivam tatra kāraṇam

original: he rāghava / pauruṣaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ kartṛ bhavati /
analyzed: he rāghava pauruṣam sarva kāryāṇām kartṛ bhavati
kim tu phala bhoktṛ ca bhavati
sva āviṣṭa puruṣa dvāreṇa iti bhāvaḥ
atas daivam na asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: daivaṃ na kiṃcit kurute na ca bhuṅkte na vidyate /
analyzed: daivam na kiṃcid kurute na ca bhuṅkte na vidyate

original: na dṛśyate nādriyate kevalaṃ kalpanedṛśī // MU_2,9.3
analyzed: na dṛśyate na ādriyate kevalam kalpanā īdṛśī

original: īdṛśī daivam eva sarvaṃ karotīty evaṃrūpā /
analyzed: īdṛśī daivam eva sarvam karoti iti evaṃrūpā

original: na ca kalpanāyāḥ satyatvam iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,9.3)
analyzed: na ca kalpanāyāḥ satya tvam iti bhāvaḥ
siddhasya pauruṣeṇa iha phalasya phala śālinām

original: śubhāśubhā vā saṃpattir daivaśabdena kathyate // MU_2,9.4
analyzed: śubha aśubhā vā saṃpattiḥ daiva śabdena kathyate

original: siddhasya phalasya śubhā aśubhā vā saṃpattiḥ daivaśabdena kathyate /
analyzed: siddhasya phalasya śubhā aśubhā vā saṃpattiḥ daiva śabdena kathyate
pauruṣa uparatāḥ nityam iṣṭa aniṣṭasya vastunaḥ

original: prāptir iṣṭāpy aniṣṭā vā daivaśabdena kathyate // MU_2,9.5
analyzed: prāptiḥ iṣṭā api aniṣṭā vā daiva śabdena kathyate

original: iṣṭāniṣṭasya vastunaḥ iṣṭā aniṣṭā vā prāptiḥ daivaśabdena kathyate /
analyzed: iṣṭa aniṣṭasya vastunaḥ iṣṭā aniṣṭā vā prāptiḥ daiva śabdena kathyate

original: iṣṭāniṣṭasya vastunaḥ iṣṭā aniṣṭā vā prāptiḥ daivaśabdena kathyate ] *iṣṭāniṣṭasya ... kathyate* (MT_2,9.5)
analyzed: iṣṭa aniṣṭasya vastunaḥ iṣṭā aniṣṭā vā prāptiḥ daiva śabdena kathyate iṣṭa aniṣṭasya kathyate
bhāvī tu avaśyam evā arthaḥ puruṣa artha eka sādhanaḥ

original: yaḥ so 'smiṃl lokasaṃghāte daivaśabdena kathyate // MU_2,9.6
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ smin loka saṃghāte daiva śabdena kathyate
puruṣa arthaḥ pauruṣam ekam sādhanam yasya

original: na tu rāghava lokasya kasyacit kiṃcid eva hi /
analyzed: na tu rāghava lokasya kasyacid kiṃcid eva hi

original: daivam ākāśakalpaṃ hi karoti na karoti vā // MU_2,9.7
analyzed: daivam ākāśa kalpam hi karoti na karoti vā
ākāśa kalpam ākāśa vat atyanta tuccham

original: na hi vandhyāsutaḥ kasyacit kiṃcit karoti na karoti veti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi vandhyā sutaḥ kasyacid kiṃcid karoti na karoti vā iti bhāvaḥ
puruṣa arthasya siddhasya śubha aśubha phala udaye

original: idam itthaṃ sthitam iti yoktis tad daivam ucyate // MU_2,9.8
analyzed: idam ittham sthitam iti yā uktiḥ tat daivam ucyate

original: itthaṃ mamābhavad buddhir itthaṃ me niścayo hy abhūt /
analyzed: ittham mama abhavat buddhiḥ ittham me niścayaḥ hi abhūt

original: iti karmaphalāvāptau yoktis tad daivam ucyate // MU_2,9.9
analyzed: iti karma phala avāptau yā uktiḥ tat daivam ucyate
ukti mātram eva daivam iti bhāvaḥ
iṣṭa aniṣṭa phala prāptau evam iti artha vācakam

original: āśvāsanāmātravaco daivam ity eva kathyate // MU_2,9.10
analyzed: āśvāsanā mātra vacaḥ daivam iti eva kathyate
tasya vācakam niyama vācakam iti arthaḥ
bhagavan sarva dharma jña prāk yat karma upasaṃcitam

original: tad etad daivam ity uktam apamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tvayā // MU_2,9.11
analyzed: tat etat daivam iti uktam apamṛṣṭam katham tvayā
prāk pitṛ antargata bīja tā avasthāyām

original: sādhu rāghava jānāsi śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te 'khilam /
analyzed: sādhu rāghava jānāsi śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te khilam

original: daivaṃ nāstīti te yena sthirā buddhir bhaviṣyati // MU_2,9.12
analyzed: daivam nā asti iti te yena sthirā buddhiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: yā magnā vāsanā pūrvaṃ babhūva kila bhūriśaḥ /
analyzed: yā magnā vāsanā pūrvam babhūva kila bhūriśas

original: saiveyaṃ karmabhāvena nṝṇāṃ pariṇatiṃ gatā // MU_2,9.13
analyzed: sā eva iyam karma bhāvena nṝṇām pariṇatim gatā
pūrvam pitṛ antargata bīja tā avasthāyām

original: vartamānā yā vāsanā śubhāśubhā vā bhāvanā /
analyzed: vartamānā yā vāsanā śubha aśubhā vā bhāvanā
sā eva iyam nṝṇām karma bhāvena karma rūpeṇa

original: tadanurūpam eva sarve karma kurvantīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,9.13)
analyzed: tad anurūpam eva sarve karma kurvanti iti bhāvaḥ

original: jantur yadvāsano nāma tatkarmā bhavati kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: jantuḥ yad vāsanaḥ nāma tad karmā bhavati kṣaṇāt
anya karma anya bhāvaḥ ca iti etat na eva upapadyate

original: grāmago grāmam āpnoti pattanārthī ca pattanam /
analyzed: grāma gaḥ grāmam āpnoti pattana arthī ca pattanam

original: yo yo yadvāsanas tat tat sa sa prayatate tathā // MU_2,9.15
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ yad vāsanaḥ tat tat sa sa prayatate tathā

original: grāmagasya ca grāmagamanavāsanā sphuṭā evānyathā na yāyāt // (MT_2,9.15)
analyzed: grāma gasya ca grāma gamana vāsanā sphuṭā eva anyathā na yāyāt

original: yad eva tīvrasaṃvegād iha karma kṛtaṃ purā /
analyzed: yat eva tīvra saṃvegāt iha karma kṛtam purā

original: tad eva daivaśabdena paryāyeṇa hi kathyate // MU_2,9.16
analyzed: tat eva daiva śabdena paryāyeṇa hi kathyate
iha ihaloka paraloka tayā dvirūpe saṃsāre
purā pitṛ antargata bīja tā avasthāyām
karma karaṇam ca atra pitṛ dvāreṇa eva jñeyam

original: evaṃ daivaṃ svakarmāṇi karma prauḍhā svavāsanā /
analyzed: evam daivam sva karmāṇi karma prauḍhā sva vāsanā

original: vāsanā manaso nānyā mano hi puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // MU_2,9.17
analyzed: vāsanā manasaḥ na anyā manaḥ hi puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
sva karmāṇi prāk kṛtāni nija karmāṇi
tad anusāreṇa eva tasya prakṛta tvāt

original: ataḥ daivasya puruṣād vyatiriktā sattā nāstīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas daivasya puruṣāt vyatiriktā sattā na asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: yad daivaṃ tāni karmāṇi karma sādho mano hi tat /
analyzed: yat daivam tāni karmāṇi karma sādho manaḥ hi tat

original: mano hi puruṣas tasmād daivaṃ nāstīti niścayaḥ // MU_2,9.18
analyzed: manaḥ hi puruṣaḥ tasmāt daivam na asti iti niścayaḥ
karma iti atra yad śabda adhyāhāraḥ

original: ekam eva mano jantor yathā prayatate hi yat /
analyzed: ekam eva manaḥ jantoḥ yathā prayatate hi yat

original: nūnaṃ tat tad avāpnoti svata eva na daivataḥ // MU_2,9.19
analyzed: nūnam tat tat avāpnoti svatas eva na daivataḥ

original: manaś cittaṃ vāsanā ca karma daivaṃ svaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ cittam vāsanā ca karma daivam sva niścayaḥ

original: rāma puṃniścayasyaitāḥ saṃjñāḥ sadbhir udāhṛtāḥ // MU_2,9.20
analyzed: rāma puṃniścayasya etāḥ saṃjñāḥ sadbhiḥ udāhṛtāḥ
evaṃnāmā hi puruṣaḥ dṛḍha bhāvanayā yathā

original: nityaṃ prayatate rāma phalam āpnoty alaṃ tathā // MU_2,9.21
analyzed: nityam prayatate rāma phalam āpnoti alam tathā

original: prāpyate netareṇeha tasmāt sa śubhado 'stu te // MU_2,9.22
analyzed: prāpyate na itareṇa iha tasmāt sa śubha daḥ stu te

original: tena sarveṣāṃ śubhaphalapradaḥ bhavatu ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: tena sarveṣām śubha phala pradaḥ bhavatu iti arthaḥ
prāktanam vāsanā jālam niyojayati mām yathā

original: mune tathaiva tiṣṭhāmi kṛpaṇaḥ kiṃ karomy aham // MU_2,9.23
analyzed: mune tathā eva tiṣṭhāmi kṛpaṇaḥ kim karomi aham

original: ataḥ pauruṣaṃ kiṃcid api nāstīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,9.23)
analyzed: atas pauruṣam kiṃcid api na asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: ata eva hi he rāma śreyaḥ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam /
analyzed: atas eva hi he rāma śreyaḥ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam
sva prayatna upanītena pauruṣeṇa eva na anyathā

original: hi niścaye / ata eva pūrvoktāt kāraṇād eva /
analyzed: hi niścaye atas eva pūrva uktāt kāraṇāt eva
rāhoḥ śiraḥ iti vat ayam prayogaḥ

original: dvividho vāsanāvyūhaḥ śubhaś caivāśubhaś ca te /
analyzed: dvividhaḥ vāsanā vyūhaḥ śubhaḥ ca eva aśubhaḥ ca te

original: prāktano vidyate rāma dvayor ekataro 'tha vā // MU_2,9.25
analyzed: prāktanaḥ vidyate rāma dvayoḥ ekataraḥ vā

original: vāsanaughena śuddhena tatra ced adya nīyase /
analyzed: vāsanā oghena śuddhena tatra ced adya nīyase

original: tat krameṇa śubhenaiva padaṃ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam // MU_2,9.26
analyzed: tat krameṇa śubhena eva padam prāpnoṣi śāśvatam

original: atha ced aśubho bhāvas tvāṃ yojayati saṅkaṭe /
analyzed: atha ced aśubhaḥ bhāvaḥ tvām yojayati saṅkaṭe

original: prāktanas tad asau yatnāj jetavyo bhavatā balāt // MU_2,9.27
analyzed: prāktanaḥ tat asau yatnāt jetavyaḥ bhavatā balāt

original: nanv anyaḥ cetanārūpaḥ kaścin māṃ prerayati /
analyzed: nanu anyaḥ cetanā rūpaḥ kaścid mām prerayati

original: tat katham ahaṃ svayaṃ kiṃcit kartuṃ
analyzed: tat katham aham svayam kiṃcid kartum

original: prājña cetanāmātras tvaṃ na dehas tvaṃ jaḍātmakaḥ /
analyzed: prājña cetanā mātraḥ tvam na dehaḥ tvam jaḍa ātmakaḥ

original: tad eva cetasy anyena cet tat tvaṃ kveva vidyase // MU_2,9.28
analyzed: tat eva cetasi anyena ced tat tvam kva iva vidyase

original: he prājña / asmiñ śloke vakṣyamāṇe upadeśe yogyatvam /
analyzed: he prājña asmin śloke vakṣyamāṇe upadeśe yogya tvam
tat eva cetanā mātram eva san
tvam anyena hetu kartṛ bhūtena kṛtvā
cetasi citi kriyām prati kartṛ tvam bhajasi

original: na hi dvayoḥ sattā yuktā vyarthatvāt //
analyzed: na hi dvayoḥ sattā yuktā vyartha tvāt

original: punar api pūrvaślokottarārdhaniścitam artham eva kathayati
analyzed: punar api pūrva śloka uttara ardha niścitam artham eva kathayati

original: anyas tvāṃ cetayati cet tat tvayy asati ko 'paraḥ /
analyzed: anyaḥ tvām cetayati ced tat tvayi asati kaḥ paraḥ

original: kam imaṃ cetayet tasmād anavasthā na vāstavī // MU_2,9.29
analyzed: kam imam cetayet tasmāt anavasthā na vāstavī

original: anyaḥ tvām cet cetayati citikriyākartṛtvam prerayati /
analyzed: anyaḥ tvām ced cetayati citi kriyā kartṛ tvam prerayati

original: tvayi asati pūrvoktayuktyā sattām abhajati sati /
analyzed: tvayi asati pūrva ukta yuktyā sattām abhajati sati
i t anta ā spandam tvām
cetayet citi kriyā kartṛ tvam prati prerayet

original: na hy asataḥ preraṇaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ / ataḥ
analyzed: na hi asataḥ preraṇam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ atas
saḥ pi tvad samāna yogakṣemaḥ evā iti kutra api prerya tayā

original: ataḥ tvam eva preryaprerakabhāvena sthito 'sīty abhiprāyeṇopasaṃhāraṃ
analyzed: atas tvam eva prerya preraka bhāvena sthitaḥ si iti abhiprāyeṇa upasaṃhāram
tava eva prerya preraka tvābhyām sthita tvāt
atas na kaścid tava anyaḥ prerakaḥ
citi kriyā kartṛ tvam tvamaḥ asiḥ
i t anta a spandam spanda
śubha aśubhābhyām mārgābhyām vahantī vāsanā sarit

original: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yojanīyā śubhe pathi // MU_2,9.30
bhogatyāgaparāmarśākhyaṃ śubhānusandhānam eva satataṃ kāryam iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,9.30)
svamanaḥ puruṣārthena balena balināṃ vara // MU_2,9.31
analyzed: sva manaḥ puruṣa arthena balena balinām vara

original: aśubhāc calitaṃ yāti śubhaṃ tasmād apītarat /
analyzed: aśubhāt calitam yāti śubham tasmāt api itarat

original: jantoś cittaṃ tu paśuvat tasmāt tat pālayed balāt // MU_2,9.32
analyzed: jantoḥ cittam tu paśu vat tasmāt tat pālayet balāt
aśubhāt bhoga arjana parāmarśa rūpāt aśubha anusandhānāt

original: samatāsāntvanenāśu na drāg iti śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
analyzed: sama tā sāntvanena āśu na drāk iti śanais śanais

original: samatā sarvam idaṃ brahmety evaṃrūpā buddhiḥ /
analyzed: sama tā sarvam idam brahma iti evaṃrūpā buddhiḥ
na tu prāṇa rodhana ādi rūpeṇa haṭhena iti arthaḥ
vāsanā oghaḥ tvayā pūrvam abhyāsena ghanīkṛtaḥ

original: śubho vāpy aśubho rāma śubham adya ghanīkuru // MU_2,9.34
analyzed: śubhaḥ vā api aśubhaḥ rāma śubham adya ghanīkuru
prāk abhyāsa vaśāt yātāḥ yadā te vāsanā udayam

original: tadābhyāsasya sāphalyaṃ viddhi tvam arimardana // MU_2,9.35
analyzed: tadā abhyāsasya sāphalyam viddhi tvam ari mardana

original: idānīm api te yāti ghanatāṃ vāsanānagha /
analyzed: idānīm api te yāti ghana tām vāsanā anagha
abhyāsa vaśataḥ tasmāt śubha abhyāsam upāhara

original: pūrvaṃ ced ghanatāṃ yātā nābhyāsāt tava vāsanā /
analyzed: pūrvam ced ghana tām yātā na abhyāsāt tava vāsanā

original: vardhiṣyate tu nedānīm api tāta sukhī bhava // MU_2,9.37
analyzed: vardhiṣyate tu nā idānīm api tāta sukhī bhava

original: vāsanārāhityamātrasyaiva parame pade yatatvāt iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: vāsanā rāhitya mātrasya eva parame pade yata tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: saṃdigdhāyām api bhṛśaṃ śubham eva samāhara /
analyzed: saṃdigdhāyām api bhṛśam śubham eva samāhara

original: asyāṃ tu vāsanāvṛddhau śubhād doṣo na kaścana // MU_2,9.38
analyzed: asyām tu vāsanā vṛddhau śubhāt doṣaḥ na kaścana

original: asyāṃ vāsanāvṛddhau saṃdigdhāyām kim abhyāsād vardhate na veti sandehaviṣayāyām api satyāṃ /
analyzed: asyām vāsanā vṛddhau saṃdigdhāyām kim abhyāsāt vardhate na vā iti sandeha viṣayāyām api satyām

original: tvaṃ bhṛśaṃ śubham eva samāhara abhyāsaviṣayīkuru /
analyzed: tvam bhṛśam śubham eva samāhara abhyāsa viṣayīkuru

original: yataḥ śubhāt kaścana doṣo na bhavati //
analyzed: yatas śubhāt kaścana doṣaḥ na bhavati

original: yad yad abhyasyate loke tanmayenaiva bhūyate /
analyzed: yat yat abhyasyate loke tanmayena eva bhūyate

original: ity ākumāraṃ prajñeṣu dṛṣṭaṃ sandehavarjitam // MU_2,9.39
analyzed: iti ākumāram prajñeṣu dṛṣṭam sandeha varjitam

original: śubhavāsanayā yuktas tad atra bhava bhūtaye /
analyzed: śubha vāsanayā yuktaḥ tat atra bhava bhūtaye
param pauruṣam āśritya vijitya indriya pañcakam
avyutpanna manāḥ yāvat bhavān ajñāta tad padaḥ

original: guruśāstrapramāṇais tu nirṇītaṃ tāvad ācara // MU_2,9.41
analyzed: guru śāstra pramāṇaiḥ tu nirṇītam tāvat ācara
atas eva ajñāta tad padaḥ ajñāta brahma ākhya utkṛṣṭa sthānaḥ
bhāve kta prayoge nirṇītam iti siddham
tatas kaṣāya pākena nūnam vijñāta vastunā

original: śubho 'py asau tvayā tyājyo bhāvanaugho nirādhinā // MU_2,9.42
analyzed: śubho pi asau tvayā tyājyaḥ bhāvanā oghaḥ nirādhinā
kaṣāya pākena lakṣaṇayā para koṭi prāptyā
nirādhinā śubha vāsanā ākhya citta pīḍā rahitena

original: yad atisubhagam āryasevitaṃ tac chubham anusṛtya manojñabhāvabuddhyā /
analyzed: yat ati subhagam ārya sevitam tat śubham anusṛtya manojña bhāva buddhyā

original: adhigamaya padaṃ sadāviśokaṃ tad anu tad apy avamucya sādhu tiṣṭha // MU_2,9.43
analyzed: adhigamaya padam sadā a viśokam tat anu tat api avamucya sādhu tiṣṭha

original: tvaṃ / yat atisubhagam ata evāryasevitam bhavati /
analyzed: tvam yat ati subhagam atas eva ārya sevitam bhavati
manojña bhāvā śubha vāsanā yā matiḥ
anusṛtya satata anuṣṭhāna viṣaya tām nītvā
tat api jīvanmukti padam api avamucya

original: tiṣṭha videhamuktau sthirībhavety arthaḥ / iti śivam //
analyzed: tiṣṭha videha muktau sthirībhava iti arthaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe navamaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe navamaḥ sargaḥ
atas pauruṣam āśritya śreyase nitya bāndhavam

original: ekāgraṃ kuru cittaṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu coktam idaṃ mama // MU_2,10.1
analyzed: ekāgram kuru cittam tvam śṛṇu ca uktam idam mama

original: pauruṣeṇendriyāṇy āśu saṃyamya samatāṃ naya // MU_2,10.2
analyzed: pauruṣeṇa indriyāṇi āśu saṃyamya samatām naya
avāntareṣu bhoga rūpeṣu madhyameṣu viśrānti sthāneṣu
na tu paramātma rūpe parame viśrānti sthāne
sama tām rāga dveṣa rahita tvam naya
iha amutra ca siddhi artham puruṣa artha phala pradām
mokṣa upāya mayīm vakṣye saṃhitām sāra sammitām

original: mokṣopāyamayīṃ mokṣasya yaḥ upāyaḥ tanmayīm tadvācakām ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: mokṣa upāya mayīm mokṣasya yaḥ upāyaḥ tad mayīm tad vācakām iti arthaḥ
saṃpūrṇau śama santoṣau ādāya udārayā dhiyā

original: manaḥ samarasaṃ kṛtvā sānusandhānam ātmani // MU_2,10.5
analyzed: manaḥ samarasam kṛtvā sa anusandhānam ātmani

original: mokṣopāyam imaṃ rāma vakṣyamāṇaṃ mayā śṛṇu // MU_2,10.6
analyzed: mokṣa upāyam imam rāma vakṣyamāṇam mayā śṛṇu

original: he rāma / tvaṃ mayā vakṣyamāṇaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: he rāma tvam mayā vakṣyamāṇam mokṣa upāyam śṛṇu

original: suṣuptau tyaktām api vāsanāṃ puruṣaḥ punaḥ gṛhṇātīti apunargrahaṇāyety uktam /
analyzed: suṣuptau tyaktām api vāsanām puruṣaḥ punar gṛhṇāti iti apunargrahaṇāya iti uktam
anyathā na śrotum śaknoṣi iti bhāvaḥ
tathā sa pūrva aparaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ yaḥ vākya artha vicāraḥ

original: imāṃ mokṣakathāṃ śrutvā saha sarvair vivekibhiḥ /
analyzed: imām mokṣa kathām śrutvā saha sarvaiḥ vivekibhiḥ

original: padaṃ yāsyasi nirduḥkhaṃ nāśo yatra na vidyate // MU_2,10.7
analyzed: padam yāsyasi nirduḥkham nāśaḥ yatra na vidyate

original: evaṃ śrīrāmasya pauruṣam āśrayaṇīyatvenopadiśya viśvāmitrapreraṇayā smṛtaṃ brahmoktam upadeśaṃ kathayituṃ prastāvaṃ karoti
analyzed: evam śrī rāmasya pauruṣam āśrayaṇīya tvena upadiśya viśvāmitra preraṇayā smṛtam brahma uktam upadeśam kathayitum prastāvam karoti
sarva duḥkha kṣaya karam parama āśvāsanam dhiyaḥ
kena uktam kāraṇena idam brahman pūrvam svayaṃbhuvā

original: kathaṃ ca bhavatā prāptam etat kathaya me prabho // MU_2,10.9
analyzed: katham ca bhavatā prāptam etat kathaya me prabho
asti ananta vilāsa ātmā sarva gaḥ sarva saṃśrayaḥ
cit ākāśaḥ vināśa ātmā pradīpaḥ sarva vastuṣu

original: cidākāśaḥ cid iti nāmadheyaḥ ākāśaḥ cidākāśaḥ /
analyzed: cit ākāśaḥ cit iti nāmadheyaḥ ākāśaḥ cit ākāśaḥ
saḥ asti parama artha san bhavati
ye vilāsāḥ sarga avabhāsana saṃkocana rūpāḥ vilāsāḥ te
tathā sarvagaḥ sarva vyāpaka tvāt upacāreṇa sarva gantā
