original: sargād anantaraṃ buddhiḥ pravṛttā parameṣṭhinaḥ // MU_2,11.3

analyzed: parame brahmaṇi brahmā svabhāva vaśataḥ svayam

original: jātaḥ spandamayo nityam ūrmir ambunidhāv iva // MU_2,11.4
analyzed: jātaḥ spanda mayaḥ nityam ūrmiḥ ambunidhau iva

original: sṛṣṭvaivam ātataṃ sargaṃ sargasya sakalā gatīḥ /
analyzed: sṛṣṭvā evam ātatam sargam sargasya sakalāḥ gatīḥ
bhūta bhavya bhaviṣyat sthāḥ dadarśa parameśvaraḥ
satkriyā krama kālasya kṛta ādeḥ kṣaye āgate

original: moham ālokya lokānāṃ kāruṇyam agamat prabhuḥ // MU_2,11.6
analyzed: moham ālokya lokānām kāruṇyam agamat prabhuḥ

original: tato mām īśvaraḥ sṛṣṭvā jñānenāyojya cāsakṛt /
analyzed: tatas mām īśvaraḥ sṛṣṭvā jñānena āyojya ca asakṛt
visasarja mahī pīṭhe lokasya ajñāna śāntaye
yathā aham prahitaḥ tena tathā anye mahā ṛṣayaḥ
sanatkumāra pramukhāḥ nārada ādyāḥ ca bhūriśas

original: etena ye bhūtā bhaviṣyantaś copadeṣṭāraḥ santi tatrāpīyam eva rītir astīti sūcitam // (MT_2,11.8)
analyzed: etena ye bhūtāḥ bhaviṣyantaḥ ca upadeṣṭāraḥ santi tatra api iyam eva rītiḥ asti iti sūcitam
kriyā krameṇa puṇyena tathā jñāna krameṇa ca
manaḥ mahā āmaya uttabdham uddhartum lokam īritāḥ

original: lokam adhikāribhedāt kriyākrameṇa jñānakrameṇa ca uddhartum /
analyzed: lokam adhikāri bhedāt kriyā krameṇa jñāna krameṇa ca uddhartum

original: maharṣibhis tatas tais tu kṣīṇe kṛtayuge purā /
analyzed: mahā ṛṣibhiḥ tatas taiḥ tu kṣīṇe kṛta yuge purā

original: kramāt kriyākrame śuddhe pṛthivyāṃ tanutāṃ gate // MU_2,11.10
analyzed: kramāt kriyā krame śuddhe pṛthivyām tanu tām gate
kriyā krama vidhāna artham maryādā niyamāya ca
bahūni smṛti śāstrāṇi yajña śāstrāṇi ca avanau

original: dharmakāmārthe siddhyarthaṃ kalpitāny uditāny atha // MU_2,11.12
analyzed: dharma kāma arthe siddhi artham kalpitāni uditāni atha

original: yal lokaiḥ teṣām upadeśaḥ na śruta iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yat lokaiḥ teṣām upadeśaḥ na śruta iti bhāvaḥ

original: kālacakre vahaty asmiṃs tato vigalite krame /
analyzed: kālacakre vahati asmin tatas vigalite krame
pratyaham bhojana pare jane śāli arjana unmukhe

original: daṇḍyatāṃ saṃprayātāni bhūtāni bhuvi bhūriśaḥ // MU_2,11.14

analyzed: para dāra gamana ādi pāpa karaṇāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: tato yuddhaṃ vinā bhūpā mahīṃ pālayituṃ kramāt /
analyzed: tatas yuddham vinā bhūpāḥ mahīm pālayitum kramāt

original: asamarthās tad āyātāḥ prajābhiḥ saha dīnatām // MU_2,11.15
analyzed: asamarthāḥ tat āyātāḥ prajābhiḥ saha dīna tām
teṣām dainya apanoda artham samyak sṛṣṭi kramāya ca
tatas smat ādibhiḥ proktāḥ mahatyaḥ jñāna dṛṣṭayaḥ
adhyātma vidyā tena iyam pūrvam rājasu varṇitā

original: tad anu prasṛtā loke rājavidyety udāhṛtā // MU_2,11.17
analyzed: tat anu prasṛtā loke rāja vidyā iti udāhṛtā

original: rājavidyā rājaguhyam ityādinā gītādau rājavidyāśabdena vyavahārāt iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,11.17)
analyzed: rāja vidyā rāja guhyam ityādinā gīta ādau rāja vidyā śabdena vyavahārāt iti bhāvaḥ
rāja vidyā rāja guhyam adhyātma grantham uttamam

original: jñātvā rāghava rājānaḥ parāṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ gatāḥ // MU_2,11.18
analyzed: jñātvā rāghava rājānaḥ parām nirduḥkha tām gatāḥ
rājaguhyam iti adhyātma vidyāyāḥ aparam nāma
atha rājasu atīteṣu bahuṣu amala kīrtiṣu

original: asmād daśarathād rāma jāto 'dya tvam ihāvanau // MU_2,11.19
analyzed: asmāt daśarathāt rāma jātaḥ dya tvam iha avanau
tava ca ati prasanne smin jātam manasi pāvanam

original: nirnimittam idaṃ cāru vairāgyam arimardana // MU_2,11.20
analyzed: nirnimittam idam cāru vairāgyam ari mardana
nirnimittam bībhatsā ādi rūpam nimittam vinā
nanu nirnimitta vairāgyena kaḥ atiśayaḥ mama asti iti atra āha

original: sarvasyaiva hi bhavyasya sādhor api vivekinaḥ /
analyzed: sarvasya eva hi bhavyasya sādhoḥ api vivekinaḥ

original: nimittapūrvaṃ vairāgyaṃ jāyate rāma rājasam // MU_2,11.21
analyzed: nimitta pūrvam vairāgyam jāyate rāma rājasam

original: idaṃ tv apūrvam utpannaṃ camatkārakaraṃ satām /
analyzed: idam tu apūrvam utpannam camatkāra karam satām
tava animittam vairāgyam sāttvikam sva viveka jam

original: bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko nāma na virajyate /
analyzed: bībhatsam viṣamam dṛṣṭvā kaḥ nāma na virajyate

original: satāṃ tūttamavairāgyaṃ vivekād eva jāyate // MU_2,11.23
analyzed: satām tu uttama vairāgyam vivekāt eva jāyate

original: te mahānto mahāprajñā nimittena vinaiva hi /
analyzed: te mahāntaḥ mahā prajñāḥ nimittena vinā eva hi

original: vairāgyaṃ jāyate yeṣāṃ ta evāmalamānasāḥ // MU_2,11.24
analyzed: vairāgyam jāyate yeṣām te eva amala mānasāḥ

original: amalamānasatvaṃ vinā hi nirnimittaṃ vairāgyaṃ notpadyate iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,11.24)
analyzed: amala mānasa tvam vinā hi nirnimittam vairāgyam nā utpadyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: rājate hi dhiyā jantur yuveva vanamālayā // MU_2,11.25
analyzed: rājate hi dhiyā jantuḥ yuvā iva vanamālayā
tena viraktayā bāhya padārtha rāga rahitayā

original: virāgaṃ ye 'dhigacchanti ta eva puruṣottamāḥ // MU_2,11.26
analyzed: virāgam ye dhigacchanti te eva puruṣa uttamāḥ
sva viveka vaśāt eva vicārya idam punar punar
indrajālam parityājyam sa bāhya abhyantaram balāt
parityājyam samantāt tyāga viṣaya tām neyam

original: śmaśānam āpadaṃ dainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na virajyate /
analyzed: śmaśānam āpadam dainyam dṛṣṭvā kaḥ na virajyate

original: tad vairāgyaṃ paraṃ śreyaḥ svato yad abhijāyate // MU_2,11.28
analyzed: tat vairāgyam param śreyaḥ svatas yat abhijāyate
akṛtrima virāgaḥ tvam mahat tām alam āgataḥ
yogyaḥ si jñāna sārasya bījasya iva mṛdu sthalam

original: tvādṛśasya śubhā buddhir vivekam anudhāvati // MU_2,11.30
na tv atrātmaprayatnaḥ kaścit prabhavatīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,11.30)
analyzed: na tu atra ātma prayatnaḥ kaścid prabhavati iti bhāvaḥ
kriyā krameṇa mahatā tapasā niyamena ca
dānena tīrtha yātrābhiḥ cira kāla vivekataḥ
duṣkṛte kṣayam āpanne parama artha vicāraṇe
kākatālīya yogena iti anena kriyā krama ādeḥ śaithilyam sūcitam
kākatālīyena paramātma vicāraṇa nimitta buddhi yogaḥ
tāvat tu kriyā krama ādiḥ avaśyam anuṣṭheyaḥ
tasya api leśataḥ tam prati upāya tvāt

original: sadgurūpāsāder anyasya mukhyasyopāyasyāpi sattvāt ity alam //
analyzed: sat guru upāsā ādeḥ anyasya mukhyasya upāyasya api sattvāt iti alam
kriyā parāḥ tāvat alam cakra āvṛttibhiḥ ādṛtāḥ

original: bhramantīha janā yāvan na paśyanti paraṃ padam // MU_2,11.33
analyzed: bhramanti iha janāḥ yāvat na paśyanti param padam
kriyā parāḥ kriyām eva upāya tvena manyamānāḥ
param padam cit mātra ākhyam utkṛṣṭam sthānam

original: cakrāvṛttibhiḥ kriyāparāḥ paunaḥpunyena sakriyāratā ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: cakrāvṛttibhiḥ kriyā parāḥ paunaḥpunyena sa kriyā ratāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yathābhūtam imaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃsāraṃ tanmayīṃ dhiyam /
analyzed: yathābhūtam imam dṛṣṭvā saṃsāram tanmayīm dhiyam

original: parityajya paraṃ yānti nirālānā gajā iva // MU_2,11.34
analyzed: parityajya param yānti nirālānāḥ gajāḥ iva
yathābhūtam dṛṣṭvā yathā asti tathā dṛṣṭvā
param uttīrṇam śuddha cit mātra tattvam
yānti tad rūpam sva ātmānam anubhavanti
viṣamā iyam anantā īhā rāma saṃsāra saṃsṛtiḥ

original: dehamuktā mahātantur vinā jñānaṃ na naśyati // MU_2,11.35
analyzed: deha muktā mahā tantuḥ vinā jñānam na naśyati
anantāḥ īhāḥ bhāva abhāva rūpāḥ ceṣṭāḥ yasyāḥ
dehamuktā nāma mahā tantuḥ dehamuktā mahā tantuḥ
jñāna yukti plavena eva saṃsāra abdhim su dustaram
mahā dhiyaḥ samuttīrṇāḥ na itareṇa raghūdvaha
tām imām jñāna yuktim tvam saṃsāra aṃbhodhi tāriṇīm
śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ buddhyā nitya avahitayā anayā

original: avahitayā buddhyā vinā śrotuṃ na śaknoṣīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,11.37)
analyzed: avahitayā buddhyā vinā śrotum na śaknoṣi iti bhāvaḥ
yasmāt ananta saṃrambhāḥ jagataḥ duḥkha rītayaḥ

original: cirāyāntar dahanty etā vinā yuktim anindita // MU_2,11.38
analyzed: cirāya antar dahanti etāḥ vinā yuktim anindita
śīta vāta ātapa ādīni dvandva duḥkhāni rāghava

original: jñānayuktiṃ vinā kena sahyatāṃ yānti sādhuṣu // MU_2,11.39
analyzed: jñāna yuktim vinā kena sahyatām yānti sādhuṣu

original: atra tu bālavṛddhayoḥ maricabhakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvena yojyam //
analyzed: atra tu bāla vṛddhayoḥ marica bhakṣaṇam dṛṣṭānta tvena yojyam

original: duḥkhacintā naraṃ mūḍhaṃ tṛṇam agniśikhā iva // MU_2,11.40
analyzed: duḥkha cintā naram mūḍham tṛṇam agni śikhā iva
prājñam vijñāta vijñānam samyak darśinam ādhayaḥ

original: na dahanti vanaṃ varṣadabdam agniśikhā iva // MU_2,11.41
analyzed: na dahanti vanam varṣat abdam agni śikhāḥ iva
vijñānam vijñāna rūpam ātma tattvam yena tam
ādhi vyādhi parāvarte saṃsāra maru mārute

original: kṣubhite 'pi na tattvajño bhajyate kalpavṛkṣavat // MU_2,11.42
analyzed: kṣubhite na tattva jñaḥ bhajyate kalpavṛkṣa vat
ādhi vyādhyoḥ parāvartaḥ paunaḥpunyena āvṛttiḥ yasmin
tādṛśe kṣubhite bhāva abhāva ākhyaḥ kṣobha yukte
na bhajyate harṣa śoka vaśam na yāti
saṃsāra maru mārute kṣubhite sati iti yojyam

original: kalpavṛkṣo 'pi mārute kṣubhite sati na bhajyate //
tattvaṃ jñātum ato yatnād dhīmān eva hi dhīmatā /
analyzed: tattvam jñātum atas yatnāt dhīmān eva hi dhīmatā
prāmāṇikaḥ prabuddha ātmā praṣṭavyaḥ praṇaya anvitam
ātmā cit mātra rūpaḥ paramātmā yena

original: etadvyatiriktas tu pṛṣṭaḥ viruddham eva kiṃcid brūyād iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: etad vyatiriktaḥ tu pṛṣṭaḥ viruddham eva kiṃcid brūyāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: yatnena vacanaṃ grāhyam aṃśukeneva kuṅkumam // MU_2,11.44
analyzed: yatnena vacanam grāhyam aṃśukena iva kuṅkumam
a tattva jñam anādeya vacanam vāc vidām vara

original: yaḥ pṛcchati naraṃ tasmān nāsti mūḍhataro 'paraḥ // MU_2,11.45
analyzed: yaḥ pṛcchati naram tasmāt na asti paraḥ
deha ādau ātma abhimāninam iti arthaḥ
prāmāṇikasya tad jñasya vaktuḥ pṛṣṭasya yatnataḥ

original: nānutiṣṭhati yo vākyaṃ nānyas tasmān narādhamaḥ // MU_2,11.46
analyzed: na anutiṣṭhati yaḥ vākyam na anyaḥ tasmāt nara adhamaḥ

original: vākyaṃ nānutiṣṭhati taduktavākyavācyam arthaṃ na saṃpādayati //
analyzed: vākyam na anutiṣṭhati tad ukta vākya vācyam artham na saṃpādayati
tajjña tā a tajjña te pūrvam vaktuḥ nirṇīya kāryataḥ

original: yaḥ karoti naraḥ praśnaṃ pṛcchakaḥ sa mahāmatiḥ // MU_2,11.47
analyzed: yaḥ karoti naraḥ praśnam pṛcchakaḥ sa mahāmatiḥ

original: vacanamātreṇa hi bahavaḥ brahmajñāninam ātmānam darśayanti // (MT_2,11.47)
analyzed: vacana mātreṇa hi bahavaḥ brahma jñāninam ātmānam darśayanti

original: anirṇīya pravaktāraṃ bālaḥ praśnaṃ karoti yaḥ /
analyzed: a nirṇīya pravaktāram bālaḥ praśnam karoti yaḥ

original: adhamaḥ pṛcchakaḥ sa syān na mahārthasya bhājanam // MU_2,11.48
analyzed: adhamaḥ pṛcchakaḥ sa syāt na mahā arthasya bhājanam
pūrva apara samādhāna kṣama buddhau anindite

original: pṛṣṭaṃ prājñena vaktavyaṃ nādhame paśudharmiṇi // MU_2,11.49
analyzed: pṛṣṭam prājñena vaktavyam na adhame paśu dharmiṇi
tathā pūrva aparayoḥ pūrva apara vākya bhāga arthayoḥ
yat samādhānam anyonya viruddha tā apanayanam

original: adhame ata eva paśudharmiṇi mūḍhatayā paśusadṛśe praṣṭari /
analyzed: adhame atas eva paśu dharmiṇi mūḍha tayā paśu sadṛśe praṣṭari
prāmāṇika artha yogya tvam pṛcchakasya a vicārya vā

original: yo vakti tam iha prājñāḥ prāhur mūḍhatamaṃ naram // MU_2,11.50
analyzed: yaḥ vakti tam iha prājñāḥ prāhuḥ mūḍhatamam naram
pṛcchakasya mūḍhatara tvāt asya mūḍhatama tvam

original: pṛcchakād api mūḍhaḥ asau kiṃ brūyād iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: pṛcchakāt api mūḍhaḥ asau kim brūyāt iti bhāvaḥ
tvam atīva guṇa ādhāraḥ pṛcchakaḥ raghunandana

original: ahaṃ ca vaktuṃ jānāmi sa ca yogo 'yam āvayoḥ // MU_2,11.51
analyzed: aham ca vaktum jānāmi sa ca yogaḥ yam āvayoḥ

original: saḥ tava guṇādhārapṛcchakatvam mama tādṛk vaktṛtvam iti yogaḥ sadṛśasaṃbandhaḥ // (MT_2,11.51)
analyzed: saḥ tava guṇa ādhāra pṛcchaka tvam mama tādṛś vaktṛ tvam iti yogaḥ sadṛśa saṃbandhaḥ

original: yad ahaṃ vacmi tad yatnāt tvayā śabdārthakovida /
analyzed: yat aham vacmi tat yatnāt tvayā śabda artha kovida

original: etad vastv iti nirṇīya hṛdi kāryam akhaṇḍitaṃ // MU_2,11.52
analyzed: etat vastu iti nirṇīya hṛdi kāryam akhaṇḍitam
pūrvam bhakti mātreṇa eva mad vacanam satya tayā grāhyam
tatas tad satyatā svayam eva prakaṭībhaviṣyati
anyathā āraṃbha mātre eva sva vikalpa kṛtābhiḥ

original: sūkṣmekṣikābhiḥ tava kiṃcid api na setsyatīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,11.52)
analyzed: sūkṣma īkṣikābhiḥ tava kiṃcid api na setsyati iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu yadi tvaduktaṃmayi na lagati tadā kiṃ kāryam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi tvad uktam mayi na lagati tadā kim kāryam iti atra āha
mahān asi viraktaḥ si tajjñaḥ si janatā sthitau

original: tvayi vastu lagaty antaḥ kuṅkumāmbu yathāṃśuke // MU_2,11.53
analyzed: tvayi vastu lagati antar kuṅkuma ambu yathā aṃśuke

original: yataḥ tvam mahān na tu nīcaḥ asi /
analyzed: yatas tvam mahān na tu nīcaḥ asi
nīcaḥ hi nīca tayā su alpena api kṣubhyati
tathā viraktaḥ saṃsārika padārtheṣu viraktaḥ asi

original: anyathā hi padārthāviṣṭabuddheḥ te yogyatā na syāt /
analyzed: anyathā hi padārtha āviṣṭa buddheḥ te yogyatā na syāt

original: anyathā hi taddṛṣṭāntānusāreṇa proktaḥ upadeśaḥ tvayi na laget /
analyzed: anyathā hi tad dṛṣṭānta anusāreṇa proktaḥ upadeśaḥ tvayi na laget
atas vastu mad ukta paramārtha tattvam

original: yathā tat aṃśuke lagati tathety arthaḥ //
analyzed: yathā tat aṃśuke lagati tathā iti arthaḥ

original: viśaty arthaṃ tava prajñā jalamadhyam ivārkabhā // MU_2,11.54
analyzed: viśati artham tava prajñā jala madhyam iva arka bhā
tat eva paramam grāhya tvena utkṛṣṭam yasyāḥ
tathā parama arthasya mad ukta vākya antara arthasya
vivecinī tava prajñā artham mad vākya artham

original: yad yad vacmi tavādeyaṃ hṛdi kāryaṃ prayatnataḥ /
analyzed: yat yat vacmi tava adeyam hṛdi kāryam prayatnataḥ

original: na cet praṣṭavya evāhaṃ na tvayeha nirarthakam // MU_2,11.55
analyzed: na ced praṣṭavyaḥ eva aham na tvayā iha nirarthakam

original: ādeyaṃ ādānārham tat tad ity adhyāhāryam // (MT_2,11.55)
analyzed: ādeyam ādāna arham tat tat iti adhyāhāryam

original: nanu tvadvākyahṛtkaraṇe kaḥ prayāsaḥ asti yenaivaṃ bravīṣīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tvad vākya hṛd karaṇe kaḥ prayāsaḥ asti yena evam bravīṣi iti atra āha
manaḥ hi capalam rāma saṃsāra vana markaṭam

original: saṃrodhya hṛdi yatnena śrotavyā paramārthagīḥ // MU_2,11.56
analyzed: saṃrodhya hṛdi yatnena śrotavyā parama artha gīḥ
hi yasmāt manaḥ nirodhe vaśyam prayāsaḥ

original: taṃ vinā ca madvākyahṛtkaraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati / ato 'sty
analyzed: tam vinā ca mad vākya hṛd karaṇam na saṃbhavati atas sti
eva mad vākya hṛd karaṇe prayāsaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu svakīyaṃ bāndhavajanaṃ tyaktvā kathaṃ tvadvākyamātraparo bhaveyam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu svakīyam bāndhava janam tyaktvā katham tvad vākya mātra paraḥ bhaveyam iti atra āha
avivekinam ajñānam asat jana ratim janam

original: ciraṃ dūrataraṃ kṛtvā pūjanīyā hi sādhavaḥ // MU_2,11.57
analyzed: ciram dūrataram kṛtvā pūjanīyāḥ hi sādhavaḥ
a vidyamānam jñānam yasya tam ajñānam

original: asajjanebhyaḥ viratiḥ sajjaneṣu ratiś ca prathamaṃ mokṣasādhanam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: asat janebhyaḥ viratiḥ sat janeṣu ratiḥ ca prathamam mokṣa sādhanam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu sādhupūjanena mama kiṃ setsyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu sādhu pūjanena mama kim setsyati iti atra āha
nityam sat jana saṃparkāt vivekaḥ upajāyate
viveka pādapasya ete bhoga mokṣau phale smṛte

original: śamo vicāraḥ saṃtoṣaś caturthaḥ sādhusaṃgamaḥ // MU_2,11.59
analyzed: śamaḥ vicāraḥ saṃtoṣaḥ caturthaḥ sādhu saṃgamaḥ

original: etaiḥ vyastaiḥ samastair vā vinā na kaścin mokṣaṃ prāpnotīti vivekasya mokṣasādhakatvam astīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: etaiḥ vyastaiḥ samastaiḥ vā vinā na kaścid mokṣam prāpnoti iti vivekasya mokṣa sādhaka tvam asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: ete sevyāḥ prayatnena catvāro dvau trayo 'thavā /
analyzed: ete sevyāḥ prayatnena catvāraḥ dvau trayaḥ

original: dvāram udghāṭayanty ete mokṣarājagṛhe balāt // MU_2,11.60
analyzed: dvāram udghāṭayanti ete mokṣarāja gṛhe balāt

original: ekaṃ vā sarvayatnena prāṇāṃs tyaktvā samāśrayet /
analyzed: ekam vā sarva yatnena prāṇān tyaktvā samāśrayet

original: etasmin vaśage yānti catvāro 'pi vaśaṃ yataḥ // MU_2,11.61
analyzed: etasmin vaśa ge yānti catvāraḥ pi vaśam yatas
ekaḥ ca atra uttaraśloka anurodhena vivekī jñeyaḥ

original: nanu katham ekenaiva kāryaṃ setsyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham ekena eva kāryam setsyati iti atra āha

original: saviveko hi śāstrasya jñānasya tapaso dyuteḥ /
analyzed: sa vivekaḥ hi śāstrasya jñānasya tapasaḥ dyuteḥ

original: bhājanaṃ bhūṣaṇākāro bhāskaras tejasām iva // MU_2,11.62
analyzed: bhājanam bhūṣaṇa ākāraḥ bhāskaraḥ tejasām iva
viveka paripanthinaḥ prajñā māndyasya anartha utpādaka tvam kathayati
ghana tām upayātam hi prajñā māndyam acetasām

original: yāti sthāvaratām ambu jāḍyāt pāṣāṇatām iva // MU_2,11.63
analyzed: yāti sthāvara tām ambu jāḍyāt pāṣāṇa tām iva
prajñā māndyam ghana tām upayātam sat

original: nanu yady ahaṃ prajñāmāndyena vivekayogyo na syāṃ tarhi kiṃ kāryam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi aham prajñā māndyena viveka yogyaḥ na syām tarhi kim kāryam iti atra āha
tvam tu rāghava saujanya guṇa śāstra artha dṛṣṭibhiḥ
vikāsita antaḥkaraṇaḥ sthitaḥ padmaḥ iva udaye

original: imāṃ jñānadṛśaṃ śrotum avaboddhuṃ ca sanmate /
analyzed: imām jñāna dṛśam śrotum avaboddhum ca sat mate
arhasi uddhṛta karṇa stha jantuḥ vīṇā dhvanim yathā
te ca śāstra artha dṛṣṭayaḥ ca

original: tābhiḥ vikāsitaṃ prajñāmāndyarahitam antaḥkaraṇaṃ yasya saḥ /
analyzed: tābhiḥ vikāsitam prajñā māndya rahitam antaḥkaraṇam yasya saḥ
karṇa stham jantu malam yasya saḥ
atas viveka yogyaḥ eva asi iti bhāvaḥ
nanu katham etat iti atra āha
vairāgya abhyāsa yogena sama saujanya saṃpadā

original: tat padaṃ prāpyate rāma yatra nāśo na vidyate // MU_2,11.66
analyzed: tat padam prāpyate rāma yatra nāśaḥ na vidyate
atyanta mukhya bhūtasya vivekasya vardhana upāyam āha
śāstraiḥ sat jana saṃparka pūrvakaiḥ su tapaḥ damaiḥ
ādau saṃsāra mukti artham prajñām eva abhivardhayet
saṃsāra viṣa vṛkṣaḥ grasa ikam āspadam āpadām

original: añjanaṃ mohayāminyā maurkhyaṃ yatnena nāśayet // MU_2,11.68
analyzed: añjanam moha yāminyāḥ maurkhyam yatnena nāśayet

original: añjanena hi māntrikāḥ divāpi yāminīṃ prakaṭayanti ity añjanam ity uktam // (MT_2,11.68)
analyzed: añjanena hi māntrikāḥ divā api yāminīm prakaṭayanti iti añjanam iti uktam

original: nanu mama maurkhyaṃ kathaṃ naśyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu mama maurkhyam katham naśyati iti atra āha

original: etad eva ca maurkhyasya paramaṃ viddhi nāśanam /
analyzed: etat eva ca maurkhyasya paramam viddhi nāśanam

original: yad idaṃ prekṣyate śāstraṃ kiṃcitsaṃskṛtayā dhiyā // MU_2,11.69
analyzed: yat idam prekṣyate śāstram kiṃcid saṃskṛtayā dhiyā
kiṃcid saṃskṛtayā kiṃcid pada padārtha jñāna mātreṇa
na tu kṣobha utpādakena mahatā vyākaraṇa jāla jñānena
durāśā sarpa gatena maurkhyena hṛdi valgatā

original: cetaḥ saṃkocam āyāti carmāgnāv iva yojitam // MU_2,11.70
analyzed: cetaḥ saṃkocam āyāti carma agnau iva yojitam
maurkhyāt eva durāśāḥ niryānti iti bhāvaḥ
saṃkocam cit vimarśa ākhya vikāsa rāhityam
prājñe yathārtha bhūtā iyam vastu dṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati
dṛś iva indau nirambhoda sakala amala maṇḍale
tasmin na eva viśrāntim bhajati iti bhāvaḥ

original: savikāsā matir yasya sa pumān iti kathyate // MU_2,11.72
analyzed: sa vikāsā matiḥ yasya sa pumān iti kathyate
tvam si iti sarga anta ślokena kathayati
vikasitena sitena manomuṣā vara vicāraṇa śītala rociṣā

original: guṇavatā hṛdayena virājase tvam amalena nabhaḥ śaśinā yathā // MU_2,11.73
analyzed: guṇavatā hṛdayena virājase tvam amalena nabhaḥ śaśinā yathā
tādṛśena guṇavatā maitrī ādi guṇa yuktena hṛdayena
yathā tat amalena nīhāra ādi mala ā dūṣitena

original: śaśinā virājate tathety arthaḥ / iti śivam //
analyzed: śaśinā virājate tathā iti arthaḥ iti śivam
iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu vyavahāra prakaraṇe ekādaśaḥ

original: śrīrāmasya buddhisamādhānāya punar api śrīrāme samyakpraṣṭṛtvaṃ svasmiṃś ca samyagvaktṛtvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī rāmasya buddhi samādhānāya punar api śrī rāme samyak praṣṭṛ tvam svasmin ca samyak vaktṛ tvam kathayati
paripūrṇa manāḥ mānyaḥ praṣṭum jānāsi rāghava

original: vetsi coktaṃ ca tenāhaṃ pravṛtto vaktum ādarāt // MU_2,12.1
analyzed: vetsi ca uktam ca tena aham pravṛttaḥ vaktum ādarāt
he rāghava paripūrṇam bhoga āśā rāhityena tṛptam
tena aham tava vaktum ādarāt pravṛttaḥ
rajaḥ tamobhyām rahitām śuddha sattva anupātinīm

original: matim ātmani saṃsthāpya jñānaṃ śrotuṃ sthiro bhava // MU_2,12.2
analyzed: matim ātmani saṃsthāpya jñānam śrotum sthiraḥ bhava
vidyate tvayi sarvā eva pṛcchakasya guṇa āvalī

original: vaktur guṇālī ca mayi ratnaśrīr jaladhau yathā // MU_2,12.3
analyzed: vaktuḥ guṇa ālī ca mayi ratna śrīḥ jaladhau yathā

original: āttavān asi vairāgyaṃ vivekāt saṅgajaṃ muneḥ /
analyzed: asi vairāgyam vivekāt saṅga jam muneḥ
candrakāntaḥ iva ārdra tvam lagna candrakara utkaraḥ

original: ciram ā śaiśavād eva tavābhyāso 'sti sadguṇaiḥ /
analyzed: ciram ā śaiśavāt eva tava abhyāsaḥ sti sat guṇaiḥ

original: śuddhaḥ śuddhasya dīrghaiś ca padmasyevātisaṃtataiḥ // MU_2,12.5
analyzed: śuddhaḥ śuddhasya dīrghaiḥ ca padmasya iva ati saṃtataiḥ

original: ataḥ śṛṇu kathāṃ vakṣye tvam evāsyā hi bhājanam /
analyzed: atas śṛṇu kathām vakṣye tvam eva asyāḥ hi bhājanam

original: na hi candraṃ vinā śuddhā savikāsā kumudvatī // MU_2,12.6
analyzed: na hi candram vinā śuddhā sa vikāsā kumudvatī
kathām brahma uktām svatas sphuritām vā mokṣa kathām

original: itaḥ paraṃ brahmoktam evopadeśaṃ śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ śrīrāmāya karotīti
analyzed: itas param brahma uktam eva upadeśam śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ śrī rāmāya karoti iti

original: ye kecana samārambhā yāś ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: ye kecana samārambhāḥ yāḥ ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: te ca tāś ca pade dṛṣṭe niḥśeṣaṃ yānti vai śamam // MU_2,12.7
analyzed: te ca tāḥ ca pade dṛṣṭe niḥśeṣam yānti vai śamam

original: nanu etā dṛṣṭayaḥ adya tāvat kasyacic chāntiṃ gatā adya vā nety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu etāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ adya tāvat kasyacid śāntim gatāḥ adya vā na iti atra āha
yadi vijñāna viśrāntiḥ na bhavet bhavya cetasaḥ

original: tad asyāṃ saṃsṛtau sādhuś cintāṃ soḍhuṃ saheta kaḥ // MU_2,12.8
analyzed: tat asyām saṃsṛtau sādhuḥ cintām soḍhum saheta kaḥ  /
yadi vijñāna viśrāntiḥ vijñāne vijñāna svarūpe ātmani

original: kaḥ sādhuḥ cintāṃ viśrāmānāsādanāvyabhicāriṇīṃ saṃsāracintāṃ saheta /
analyzed: kaḥ sādhuḥ cintām viśrāma anāsādana avyabhicāriṇīm saṃsāra cintām saheta

original: viśrāmāsādanena tasya cintā eva nāsti yenāsau iha tiṣṭhatīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: viśrāma āsādanena tasya cintā eva na asti yena asau iha tiṣṭhati iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu bhavyasya cintā kutra gacchatīty / āha
analyzed: nanu bhavyasya cintā kutra gacchati iti āha
para prāptyā vilīyante sarvāḥ manana vṛttayaḥ
kalpa anta arka gaṇa āsaṅgāt kula śaila śilā iva ā

original: sarvāḥ mananavṛttayaḥ manomananavyāpārāḥ cintā iti yāvat /
analyzed: sarvāḥ manana vṛttayaḥ manaḥ manana vyāpārāḥ cintā iti yāvat
duḥsahā rāma saṃsāra viṣa āveśa viṣūcikā

original: saṃsāra eva viṣāveśakṛtā viṣūcikā viṣūcikākhyo rogaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāraḥ eva viṣa āveśa kṛtā viṣūcikā viṣūcikā ākhyaḥ roga viśeṣaḥ
gāruḍa mantreṇa hi viṣa āveśaḥ naśyati

original: saḥ yogaḥ kathaṃ prāpyata ity apekṣāyāṃ gadyena kathayati
analyzed: saḥ yogaḥ katham prāpyate iti apekṣāyām gadyena kathayati

original: sa ca yogaḥ sujanena saha śāstrārthavicārāt /
analyzed: sa ca yogaḥ su janena saha śāstra artha vicārāt

original: saḥ mananavṛttivilayahetuḥ yogaḥ sujanena saha śāstrārthavicārāt labhyata eva /
analyzed: saḥ manana vṛtti vilaya hetuḥ yogaḥ su janena saha śāstra artha vicārāt labhyate eva
na tu prāṇa rodhana ādi rūpaḥ

original: nanu yadi vicāreṇāpi na kiṃcit setsyati tarhi kiṃ kāryam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi vicāreṇa api na kiṃcid setsyati tarhi kim kāryam iti atra āha

original: avaśyam iha hi vicāre kṛte sakaladuḥkhakṣayo bhavatīti mantavyam // (MU_2,12.12)
analyzed: avaśyam iha hi vicāre kṛte sakala duḥkha kṣayaḥ bhavati iti mantavyam
na atas vicāra dṛṣṭayaḥ vahelayā draṣṭavyāḥ

original: vicāravaśataḥ puruṣeṇa sakalam idam ādhipañjaraṃ sarpeṇa tvacam iva
analyzed: vicāra vaśataḥ puruṣeṇa sakalam idam ādhi pañjaram sarpeṇa tvacam iva

original: paripakvāṃ parityajya vigatajvareṇa śītalāntaḥkaraṇena vinoda iva jagad akhilam ālokyate samyagdarśanavatā // (MU_2,12.13)
analyzed: paripakvām parityajya vigata jvareṇa śītala antaḥkaraṇena vinodaḥ iva jagat akhilam ālokyate samyak darśanavatā

original: yataḥ paramārthatattvaṃ vicārād eva labhyate ataḥ vicāradṛṣṭayaḥ vicārākhyāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: yatas paramārtha tattvam vicārāt eva labhyate atas vicāra dṛṣṭayaḥ vicāra ākhyāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ
vicāra vaśataḥ samyak darśanavatā samyak darśana yuktena satā puruṣeṇa
jagat vinodaḥ iva krīḍā iva ālokyate
tad bhāva abhāva prayukta harṣa śoka rahita tvāt

original: sarpeṇa paripakvāṃ tvacam iva parityajya vigatajvareṇa tāparahitenāta eva śītalāntaḥkaraṇena //
analyzed: sarpeṇa paripakvām tvacam iva parityajya vigata jvareṇa tāpa rahitena atas eva śītala antaḥkaraṇena

original: nanv asamyagdarśanavattvasya ko doṣo yena vicārāt samyagdarśanavattvam āśrīyate ity
analyzed: nanu asamyak darśanavat tvasya kaḥ doṣaḥ yena vicārāt samyak darśanavat tvam āśrīyate iti
asamyak darśanavataḥ hi param duḥkham idam
viṣamaḥ hi atitarām saṃsāra rogaḥ bhogī iva
a śaṅkita paripātita paruṣa pāṣāṇaḥ iva vivaśīkaroti

original: asti kiṃcid duḥkhaṃ saṃsārī yan na prāpnoti // (MU_2,12.14)
analyzed: asti kiṃcid duḥkham saṃsārī yat na prāpnoti

original: nanu kena kṛtaṃ duḥkham asyāsamyagdarśanavataḥ syād ity /
analyzed: nanu kena kṛtam duḥkham asya a samyak darśanavataḥ syāt iti

original: viśeṣeṇa kathanam aśakyaṃ jñātvā sāmānyena kathayati /
analyzed: viśeṣeṇa kathanam aśakyam jñātvā sāmānyena kathayati

original: ataḥ saṃsārakṛtam evehāsamyagdarśanavato duḥkham astīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,12.14)
analyzed: atas saṃsāra kṛtam eva iha asamyak darśanavataḥ duḥkham asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu viṣayarūpo 'yaṃ saṃsāra evam eva bhavati /
analyzed: nanu viṣaya rūpaḥ yam saṃsāraḥ evam eva bhavati
kim asmākam karoti iti atra āha
durantā iyam kila viṣaya viṣama viṣa viṣūcikā

original: yadi na cikitsyate tad atitarāṃ narakanagaranikaraphalānubandhinī
analyzed: yadi na cikitsyate tat atitarām naraka nagara nikara phala anubandhinī
yatra śita asi śata pāte utpala tāḍanam
ghūrṇat vāta antaḥ paripeṣaḥ ṅga parimālanam
anavarata anala jvālā vicalita cāmara nārāca nikara nipāto
atitarām naraka nagarāṇām yaḥ nikaraḥ samūhaḥ

original: saḥ asyām astīti tādṛśī satī sā /
analyzed: saḥ asyām asti iti tādṛśī satī sā

original: tat tat tādṛśaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ karoti /
analyzed: tat tat tādṛśam tādṛśam duḥkham karoti
aṅga parimālanam aṅga komala tā pādakam mardanam bhavati
vāta madhye cūrṇībhāvāt api tat kaṣṭataram iti
vinodana artham dūrīkaraṇa artham yāni dhārāgṛhāṇi

original: tad evaṃvidhe kaṣṭaceṣṭāsahasradāruṇe saṃsāracapalayantre 'smin rāghava nāvahelā kartavyā
analyzed: tat evaṃvidhe kaṣṭa ceṣṭā sahasra dāruṇe saṃsāra capala yantre smin rāghava na avahelā kartavyā
evaṃvidhe pūrva ukta mahā kaṭhina duḥkha dāyini
atas eva kaṣṭa ceṣṭā sahasra dāruṇe asmin anubhūyamāne
avahelā kim mama ayam karoti iti anādaraḥ
idam iti vicāra viṣaya tām nayet
anyat kim karaṇīyam iti atra āha

original: evaṃ cāvaboddhavyam yathā kilāsti vicārāc chreyo'vāptir iti // (MU_2,12.17)
analyzed: evam ca avaboddhavyam yathā kila asti vicārāt śreyaḥ avāptiḥ iti
vicārāt śreyaḥ avāptiḥ mokṣa prāptiḥ asti iti

original: nanv ayaṃ vivekaḥ kasyacid asty athavā nety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu ayam vivekaḥ kasyacid asti athavā na iti atra āha

original: yadi naite mahānto munayo maharṣayaś ca viprāś ca rājānaś
analyzed: yadi na ete mahāntaḥ munayaḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ ca viprāḥ ca rājānaḥ

original: ca jñānakavacenāvaguṇṭhitaśarīrās tat katham aduḥkhakṣamā api duḥkhamayīṃ tamovṛttipūrvakasaṃsārakadarthanām
analyzed: ca jñāna kavacena avaguṇṭhita śarīrāḥ tat katham aduḥkha kṣamāḥ api duḥkha mayīm tamaḥ vṛtti pūrvaka saṃsāra kadarthanām
anubhavantaḥ satatam eva mudita manasaḥ tiṣṭhanti

original: mahāntaḥ munayaḥ maharṣayaś ca viprāś ca rājānaś ca jñānakavacena vivekākhyakavacenāvaguṇṭhitāni valitāni /
analyzed: mahāntaḥ munayaḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ ca viprāḥ ca rājānaḥ ca jñāna kavacena viveka ākhya kavacena avaguṇṭhitāni valitāni

original: ete munyādayaḥ aduḥkhakṣamāḥ api katham duḥkhamayīṃ /
analyzed: ete muni ādayaḥ aduḥkha kṣamāḥ api katham duḥkha mayīm
tathā tamaḥ vṛtti pūrvikā tamaḥ vṛtti kāraṇā

original: satatam eva na tu abhimataprāptyā kadācid eva /
analyzed: satatam eva na tu abhimata prāptyā kadācid eva

original: ataḥ asty evaiṣāṃ viveka iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas asti eva eṣām vivekaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
gadya aṃśa yuktena padyena atra hetum kathayati
vikautukāḥ vigata vikalpa viplavāḥ yathā sthitāḥ hari hara padmaja ādayaḥ

original: narottamāḥ samadhigatātmadīpakās tathā sthitā jagati vibuddhabuddhayaḥ // MU_2,12.19
analyzed: nara uttamāḥ samadhigata ātma dīpakāḥ tathā sthitāḥ jagati vibuddha buddhayaḥ

original: narottamāḥ narebhyaḥ samastamanuṣyebhyaḥ teṣāṃ madhye vā uttamāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: nara uttamāḥ narebhyaḥ samasta manuṣyebhyaḥ teṣām madhye vā uttamāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ
tathā samadhigataḥ viveka vibhavena samyak anubhūtaḥ
tādṛśāḥ vibuddha buddhayaḥ viveka yukta buddhayaḥ pūrvoktāḥ muni ādayaḥ

original: parikṣīṇe mohe galati ca ghane 'jñānajalade parijñāte tattve samadhigata ātmany abhimate /
analyzed: parikṣīṇe mohe galati ca ghane jñāna jalade parijñāte tattve samadhigate ātmani abhimate

original: vicāryāryaiḥ sārdhaṃ galitavapuṣor vai sadasator dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam // MU_2,12.20
analyzed: vicārya āryaiḥ sārdham galita vapuṣoḥ vai sat asatoḥ dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanam jāgatam idam
vicārya saṃsāram ātma tattvam ca vicārya
mohe ajñāna kārye sāvadhāna tve parigalite sati
tatas sat asatoḥ sat asat buddhi viṣayībhūtayoḥ arthayoḥ
sat asat buddhi parigalanena galita vapuṣoḥ satoḥ
parijñāte deha ādi vyatirikta tayā samyak niścite sati

original: na kevalaṃ parijñāte kiṃ tu samadhigate dehādityāgena svātmatayā samyag anubhūte sati /
analyzed: na kevalam parijñāte kim tu samadhigate deha ādi tyāgena sva ātma tayā samyak anubhūte sati
tatas tattve jīva ādi sākṣi tayā sthite śuddha cit mātra tattve
dṛṣṭe jīva sattā prada tvena dṛṣṭe sati

original: prasanne cittattve hṛdi savibhave valgati pare samābhogībhūtāsv akhilakalanādṛṣṭiṣu puraḥ /
analyzed: prasanne cit tattve hṛdi sa vibhave valgati pare samābhogībhūtāsu akhila kalanā dṛṣṭiṣu puras

original: śamaṃ yāntīṣv antaḥkaraṇaghaṭanāsv āhitarasaṃ dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idam // MU_2,12.21
analyzed: śamam yāntīṣu antaḥkaraṇa ghaṭanāsu āhita rasam dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanam jāgatam idam
he rāghava aham anyat ca bravīmi
cit tattve śuddha cit mātra ākhye tattve
prasanne sva prakāśana para tayā prasāda unmukhe sati

original: ata eva tasmin pare cittattve savibhave śaktisahite /
analyzed: atas eva tasmin pare cit tattve sa vibhave śakti sahite
vimarśa viṣaya tām āyāte sati iti yāvat
tatas akhila kalanā dṛṣṭiṣu samasta jīva ādi kalanā rūpāsu dṛṣṭiṣu
vyāpaka cit mātra svarūpa tā āsādanena vistāra rahitāsu api vistāra yuktāsu saṃpannāsu
satīṣu tatas antaḥkaraṇa ghaṭanāsu antaḥkaraṇa racanāsu
tatas ca dhiyā galana unmukhayā buddhyā
tattve śuddha cit mātra ākhye tattve
punar api pūrva abhiprāyeṇa eva āha

original: rathaḥ sphāro dehas turagaracanā cendriyagatiḥ parispando vātād aham akalitānantaviṣamaḥ /
analyzed: rathaḥ sphāraḥ dehaḥ turaga racanā ca indriya gatiḥ parispandaḥ vātāt aham a kalita ananta viṣamaḥ

original: paro vārvā dehī jagati viharāmīty anaghayā dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanaṃ jāgatam idaṃ // MU_2,12.22
analyzed: paras vā arvā dehī jagati viharāmi iti anaghayā dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇam aṭanam jāgatam idam
indriya gatiḥ indriya racanā turaga racanā bhavati
heya upādeya rūpa ādi prāpti parihāra artham darśana ādi dvāreṇa deha ratha cālaka tvāt

original: / parispandaḥ turagaracanābhūtānāṃ indriyagatīnāṃ ceṣṭā dehaṃ prati preraṇasāmarthyaṃ vātāt bhavati /
analyzed: parispandaḥ turaga racanā bhūtānām indriya gatīnām ceṣṭā deham prati preraṇa sāmarthyam vātāt bhavati

original: vātena hi indriyāṇi darśanādikriyābhāñji santi dehaṃ cālayanti /
analyzed: vātena hi indriyāṇi darśana ādi kriyā bhāñji santi deham cālayanti
paryantataḥ tasya eva deha cālaka tvāt

original: puraḥ dehādibhyaḥ uttīrṇaśuddhacinmātrarūpaḥ aham jagati viharāmi vihāraṃ karomi /
analyzed: puras deha ādibhyaḥ uttīrṇa śuddha cit mātra rūpaḥ aham jagati viharāmi vihāram karomi
a kalitāni sva ātma tva niścayena duḥkha da tvena aniścitāni
anantāni viṣamāni sukha duḥkha rūpāḥ saṃkaṭāḥ yena

original: rājā hi rathādibhyaḥ paraḥ san akalitānantanimnonnataś
analyzed: rājā hi ratha ādibhyaḥ paraḥ san a kalita ananta nimna unnataḥ
anaghayā svasmin baddha tva jñāna ādi doṣa rahitayā

original: idam jāgatam aṭanaṃ ramaṇaṃ bhavati / iti śivam //
analyzed: idam jāgatam aṭanam ramaṇam bhavati iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: oṃ pūrvoktāṃ dṛṣṭim anūdya tadavaṣṭaṃbhena subuddhīnāṃ vicaraṇaṃ kathayati
analyzed: om pūrva uktām dṛṣṭim anūdya tad avaṣṭaṃbhena su buddhīnām vicaraṇam kathayati
etām dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya puṣṭa ātmānaḥ su buddhayaḥ
vicaranti a samunnaddhāḥ mahāntaḥ bhyuditāḥ iva
puṣṭaḥ atyanta abhivyakti yogya tām gataḥ
ātmā śuddha cit mātra ākhyaḥ ātmā yeṣām te

original: na śocanti na yācante na vāñchanti śubhāśubham /
analyzed: na śocanti na yācante na vāñchanti śubha aśubham

original: sarvam eva ca kurvanti kurvanti na ca kiṃcana // MU_2,13.2
analyzed: sarvam eva ca kurvanti kurvanti na ca kiṃcana
sarvam eva pravāha āgatam sarvam eva
kiṃcana na kurvanti svasmin kartṛ tva abhimāna abhāvāt

original: svastham evāvatiṣṭhanti svasthaṃ kurvanti yānti ca /
analyzed: svastham eva avatiṣṭhanti svastham kurvanti yānti ca
heya upādeya tā pakṣa rahitāḥ sva ātmani sthitāḥ

original: svastham ity ubhayatra kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ niścitam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: svastham iti ubhayatra kriyā viśeṣaṇam niścitam iti arthaḥ
heya upādeya tā pakṣa rahitāḥ upekṣā pakṣe sthitāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: āyānti ca na cāyānti vanaṃ yānti na yānti ca /
analyzed: āyānti ca na ca āyānti vanam yānti na yānti ca

original: na kurvanty api kurvanti na vadanti vadanti ca // MU_2,13.4
analyzed: na kurvanti api kurvanti na vadanti vadanti ca
atra sarvatra api kriyā karaṇam jīvanmukta tayā āśrita deha ādi dvāreṇa jñeyam

original: ye kecana samārambhā yāś ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: ye kecana samārambhāḥ yāḥ ca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: heyādeyadṛśo yās tāḥ kṣīyante 'dhigate pade // MU_2,13.5
analyzed: heya adeya dṛśaḥ yāḥ tāḥ kṣīyante dhigate pade
para pada rūpa tayā eva sphuranti iti yāvat
para pada rūpa tayā eva rūṣpa
parityakta samasta īham manaḥ madhura vṛttimat

original: sarvataḥ sukham abhyeti candrabimba iva sthitam // MU_2,13.6
analyzed: sarvatas sukham abhyeti candra bimbe iva sthitam
api nirmanana ārambham api asta akhila kautukam

original: ātmany eva na māty antar indāv iva rasāyanam // MU_2,13.7
analyzed: ātmani eva na māti antar indau iva rasāyanam

original: ātmany eva na māti na prabhavati /
analyzed: ātmani eva na māti na prabhavati

original: mananārambharahitasya kautukarahitasya ca ānandena svātmani amānaṃ na yuktam iti lokaprasiddhir apiśabdābhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: manana ārambha rahitasya kautuka rahitasya ca ānandena sva ātmani amānam na yuktam iti loka prasiddhiḥ apiśabda abhiprāyaḥ
na karoti indrajālāni na anudhāvati vāsanām

original: bālacāpalam utsṛjya pūrṇam eva virājate // MU_2,13.8
analyzed: bāla cāpalam utsṛjya pūrṇam eva virājate  /
indrajālāni mantra ādi prabhāvena siddhāni ākāśa gamana ādīni

original: vāsanām nānudhāvati api tu tato nivṛttim eva karoti /
analyzed: vāsanām na anudhāvati api tu tatas nivṛttim eva karoti
bāla vat cāpalam bāla cāpalam utsṛjya

original: ātmatattvāvalokanasyaiva pūrvoktāsu vṛttiṣu kāraṇatvaṃ gadyena kathayati
analyzed: ātma tattva avalokanasya eva pūrvoktāsu vṛttiṣu kāraṇa tvam gadyena kathayati
evaṃvidhāḥ hi vṛttayaḥ ātma tattva avalokanāt labhyante

original: upāsanīyo jñātavyo yāvajjīvaṃ puruṣena netarad iti // (MU_2,13.9)
analyzed: upāsanīyaḥ jñātavyaḥ yāvajjīvam puruṣena na itarat iti
tasmāt puruṣeṇa yāvajjīvam vicāreṇa ātmā eva anveṣṭavyaḥ
upāsanam ca atra avicchinna pravāheṇa anusandhāna viṣayīkaraṇam eva jñeyam
sthūla deha ādi vyatirekena sthūla deha vat niḥsaṃśayam ātma tattvena jñātavyaḥ
nanu ātma avalokanam kartavya tvena tvayā pratipāditam
sva anubhūteḥ su śāstrasya guroḥ ca eva eka vākya tā
yatra abhyāsena tena ātmā santatena avalokyate

original: kaṣṭām apy āpadaṃ prāpto na mūḍhaiḥ samatām iyāt // MU_2,13.11
analyzed: kaṣṭām api āpadam prāptaḥ na mūḍhaiḥ sama tām iyāt

original: svasthas tu katham iyād ity apiśabdābhiprāyaḥ // (MT_2,13.11)
analyzed: svasthaḥ tu katham iyāt iti apiśabda abhiprāyaḥ

original: na vyādhir na viṣaṃ nāpat tathā nāmāsti bhūtale /
analyzed: na vyādhiḥ na viṣam na āpad tathā nāma asti bhū tale

original: khedāya svaśarīrasthaṃ maurkhyam eva yathā nṛṇām // MU_2,13.12
analyzed: khedāya sva śarīra stham maurkhyam eva yathā nṛṇām
kiṃcid saṃskṛta buddhīnām śravyam śāstram idam yathā

original: maurkhyāpahaṃ tathā śāstram anyad asti na kiṃcana // MU_2,13.13
analyzed: maurkhya apaham tathā śāstram anyat asti na kiṃcana
kiṃcid saṃskṛta buddhīnām pada padārtha jñānām iti arthaḥ
maurkhya apaham maurkhyam upahanti iti maurkhya apaham
idam śravyam sukha karam kathā dṛṣṭānta sundaram
a viruddham aśeṣeṇa śāstra vākya artha bandhunā

original: āpado yā duruttārā yāś ca tucchāḥ kuyonayaḥ /
analyzed: āpadaḥ yāḥ duruttārāḥ yāḥ ca tucchāḥ ku yonayaḥ

original: tās tā maurkhyāt prasūyante khadirāt kaṇṭhakā iva // MU_2,13.15
analyzed: tāḥ tāḥ maurkhyāt prasūyante khadirāt kaṇṭhakāḥ iva

original: bhikṣārtham aṭanaṃ rāma na maurkhyahatajīvitam // MU_2,13.16
analyzed: bhikṣā artham aṭanam rāma na maurkhya hata jīvitam
imam ālokam āsādya mokṣa upāyam ayam janaḥ

original: andhatām eti na punaḥ kaścin mohatamasy api // MU_2,13.17
analyzed: andha tām eti na punar kaścid moha tamasi api

original: tāvan nayati saṃkocaṃ tṛṣṇā śyāmā narāmbujam /
analyzed: tāvat nayati saṃkocam tṛṣṇā śyāmā nara ambujam

original: yāvad vivekasūryasya noditā vimalā prabhā // MU_2,13.18
analyzed: yāvat viveka sūryasya nā uditā vimalā prabhā
saṃsāra duḥkha mokṣa artham mādṛśaiḥ saha bandhubhiḥ
sva rūpam ātmanaḥ jñātvā guru śāstra pramāṇataḥ
guru śāstra ākhyam yat pramāṇam pramā karaṇam
jñātvā iti asya anantaram stheyam iti śeṣaḥ
jīvanmuktāḥ caranti iha yathā hari hara ādayaḥ

original: yathā brahmarṣayaś cānye tathā vihara rāghava // MU_2,13.20
analyzed: yathā brahmarṣayaḥ ca anye tathā vihara rāghava
vihara harṣa amarṣa rahita tvena krīḍām kuru
anantāni iha duḥkhāni sukham kṣaṇa lava upamam

original: nātaḥ sukheṣu badhnīyād dṛṣṭiṃ duḥkhānubandhiṣu // MU_2,13.21
analyzed: na atas sukheṣu badhnīyāt dṛṣṭim duḥkha anubandhiṣu
punar kim kāryam iti atra āha

original: yad anantam anāyāsaṃ tat padaṃ sārasiddhaye /
analyzed: yat anantam anāyāsam tat padam sāra siddhaye
sāra siddhaye parama puruṣa artha siddhaye
sādhanīyam sva upalabdhi viṣaya tām neyam
vijānatā kiṃcid mātra jñāna yuktena mūrkhasya atra anadhikara tvāt
te eva puruṣa arthasya bhājanam puruṣa uttamāḥ
anuttama pada ālambi manaḥ yeṣām gata jvaram

original: avidyamāna uttamaḥ yasmāt tat anuttamam niratiśayam iti yāvat /
analyzed: a vidyamāna uttamaḥ yasmāt tat anuttamam niratiśayam iti yāvat
saṃbhoga aśana mātreṣu rājya ādiṣu sukheṣu ye

original: saṃtuṣṭā duṣṭamanaso viddhi tān andhadundubhān // MU_2,13.24
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭāḥ duṣṭa manasaḥ viddhi tān andhadundubhān
ye śaṭheṣu duranteṣu duṣkṛta ārambha śāliṣu

original: dviṣatsu mitrarūpeṣu bhaktā vai bhogabhogiṣu // MU_2,13.25
analyzed: dviṣatsu mitra rūpeṣu bhaktāḥ vai bhoga bhogiṣu

original: te yānti durgamād durgaṃ duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ bhayād bhayam /
analyzed: te yānti durgamāt durgam duḥkhāt duḥkham bhayāt bhayam
narakāt narakam mūḍhāḥ moha manthara buddhayaḥ

original: mitrarūpeṣu dviṣatsu ā mukhe sukhakāritvāt mohamantharā mohanirbharā /
analyzed: mitra rūpeṣu dviṣatsu ā mukhe sukha kāri tvāt moha mantharā moha nirbharā
paraspara vināśa utke śreyasyau na kadācana
sukha duḥkha daśe rāma taḍit prasara bhaṅgure
ye viraktāḥ mahātmānaḥ su viviktāḥ bhavādṛśaḥ

original: puruṣān viddhi tān vandyān bhogamokṣaikabhāginaḥ // MU_2,13.28
analyzed: puruṣān viddhi tān vandyān bhoga mokṣa eka bhāginaḥ
bhoga bhāj tvam ca eṣām pravāha gatam eva jñeyam
vivekam param āśritya vairāgya abhyāsa yogataḥ

original: saṃsārasaritaṃ ghorām imām āpadam uttaret // MU_2,13.29
analyzed: saṃsāra saritam ghorām imām āpadam uttaret

original: na suptavyaṃ tu saṃsāramāyāsv iha hi jānatā /
analyzed: na suptavyam tu saṃsāra māyāsu iha hi jānatā

original: saṃsāram imam āsādya yas tiṣṭhaty avahelayā /
analyzed: saṃsāram imam āsādya yaḥ tiṣṭhati avahelayā

original: jvalitasya gṛhasyoccaiḥ śete tārṇasya so 'ntare // MU_2,13.31
analyzed: jvalitasya gṛhasya uccais śete tārṇasya saḥ ntare

original: yat prāpya na nivartante yad āsādya na śocyate /
analyzed: yat prāpya na nivartante yat āsādya na śocyate

original: tat padaṃ śemuṣīlabhyam asty evātra na saṃśayaḥ // MU_2,13.32
analyzed: tat padam śemuṣī labhyam asti eva atra na saṃśayaḥ
śemuṣī labhyam eva buddhi labhyam eva

original: nanu yadi tat padaṃ nāsti tat kiṃ śemuṣyā labhyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi tat padam na asti tat kim śemuṣyā labhyate iti atra āha

original: nāsti cet tad vicāreṇa doṣaḥ ko bhavatāṃ bhavet /
analyzed: na asti ced tat vicāreṇa doṣaḥ kaḥ bhavatām bhavet

original: asti cet tat samuttīrṇā bhaviṣyatha bhavārṇavāt // MU_2,13.33
analyzed: asti ced tat samuttīrṇāḥ bhaviṣyatha bhava arṇavāt
pravṛttiḥ puruṣasya iha mokṣa upāya vicāraṇe

original: yadā bhavaty āśu tadā mokṣabhāgī sa ucyate // MU_2,13.34
analyzed: yadā bhavati āśu tadā mokṣa bhāgī saḥ ucyate

original: na vinā kevalībhāvaṃ vidyate bhuvanatraye // MU_2,13.35

analyzed: tad prāptau uttama prāptau na kleśaḥ upayujyate

original: na mitrāṇy upakurvanti na dhanāni na bāndhavāḥ // MU_2,13.36
analyzed: na mitrāṇi upakurvanti na dhanāni na bāndhavāḥ
na hasta pāda calanam na deśa antara saṃgamaḥ
kleśa atiśaya sādhyaḥ vā na tīrtha āyatana āśrayaḥ
asmin arthe hasta pāda ādi calanam na bhavati
deśa antara saṃgamaḥ ca na bhavati
ayam arthaḥ kleśa atiśaya sādhyaḥ na bhavati
tīrtha āyatana āśrayaḥ ca na bhavati
puruṣa artha eka sādhyena vāsanā eka artha karmaṇā
kevalam tat manaḥ mātra jayena āsādyate padam
evalam manaḥ mātra jayena āsādyate prāpyate
punar kathaṃbhūtena vāsanā eka artha karmaṇā
viveka mātra sādhyam tat vicāra ekānta niścayam

original: tyajatā duḥkhajālāni nareṇa tad avāpyate // MU_2,13.39
analyzed: tyajatā duḥkha jālāni nareṇa tat avāpyate
sukha sevya āsana sthena tad vicāravatā svayam

original: na śocyate padaṃ prāpya na ca bhūyo 'bhijāyate // MU_2,13.40
analyzed: na śocyate padam prāpya na ca bhūyas bhijāyate
tat samasta sukha āsāra sīmāntam sādhavaḥ viduḥ

original: tad anuttamaniṣṣyandaṃ param āhū rasāyanam // MU_2,13.41
analyzed: tat anuttama niṣṣyandam param āhuḥ rasāyanam
kṣayi tvāt sarva bhāvānām svarga mānuṣyayoḥ dvayoḥ

original: sukhaṃ nāsty eva salilaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāsv ivaitayoḥ // MU_2,13.42
analyzed: sukham na asti eva salilam mṛgatṛṣṇāsu iva etayoḥ
svarga mānuṣyayoḥ svar loka manuṣya lokayoḥ
atas manaḥ jayaḥ cintyaḥ śama saṃtoṣa sādhanaḥ
ananta śama saṃbhogaḥ tasmāt ānandaḥ āpyate

original: jīvatā gacchatā caiva bhramatā patatā tathā /
analyzed: jīvatā gacchatā ca eva bhramatā patatā tathā

original: rakṣasā dānavenāpi devena puruṣeṇa vā // MU_2,13.44
analyzed: rakṣasā dānavena api devena puruṣeṇa vā
manaḥ praśamana udbhūtam tat prāpya paramam sukham
vikāsi śama puṣpasya viveka ucca taroḥ phalam
vyavahāra pareṇa api kārya vṛndam a cinvatā

original: bhānunevāmbarasthena nojjhyate na ca vāñchyate // MU_2,13.46
analyzed: bhānunā iva ambara sthena nā ujjhyate na ca vāñchyate

original: rakṣasā dānavenāpi devena puruṣeṇa vā manaḥpraśamanodbhūtaṃ tathā vikāsiśamapuṣpasya vivekoccataroḥ phalam /
analyzed: rakṣasā dānavena api devena puruṣeṇa vā manaḥ praśamana udbhūtam tathā vikāsi śama puṣpasya viveka ucca taroḥ phalam
tat paramam sukham nirvāṇa ākhyam sukham

original: prāpyāmbarasthena bhānunā iva nojjhyate na ca vāñchyate sūryavat upekṣām eva sarvatra kriyate ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: prāpya ambara sthena bhānunā iva na ujjhyate na ca vāñchyate sūrya vat upekṣām eva sarvatra kriyate iti arthaḥ
vyavahāra pareṇa api kārya vṛndam kārya samūham
acinvatā na ahaṃkartā iti niścayāt sva kṛta tvena ananubhavatā
manaḥ praśāntam ati accham viśrāntam gata vibhramam
anīham vigata abhīṣṭam na abhivāñchati na ujjhati
vigata abhīṣṭam abhīṣṭam idam iti niścaya rahitam
pravāha āgatam upekṣayā eva karoti iti bhāvaḥ
pūrvataram prakṛtānām śama ādi dvārapālānām nirṇayam prastauti
tatra api prathama uddiṣṭam śamam nirūpayati
duḥkha doṣa daśā dīrghā saṃsāra maru maṇḍalī

original: jantoḥ śītalatām eti śītalena śamāmbunā // MU_2,13.49
analyzed: jantoḥ śītala tām eti śītalena śama ambunā
duḥkha doṣa rūpā daśā yasyām sā duḥkha doṣa daśā

original: śamenāsādyate śreyaḥ śamo hi paramaṃ padam /
analyzed: śamena āsādyate śreyaḥ śamaḥ hi paramam padam

original: śamaḥ śivaṃ śamaḥ śāntiḥ śamo bhrāntinivāraṇam // MU_2,13.50
analyzed: śamaḥ śivam śamaḥ śāntiḥ śamaḥ bhrānti nivāraṇam
paramam padam cit mātra ākhyam utkṛṣṭam sthānam
puṃsaḥ praśama tṛptasya śītala acchatara ātmanaḥ

original: śamatoṣitacittasya śatrur apy eti mitratām // MU_2,13.51
analyzed: śama toṣita cittasya śatruḥ api eti mitra tām

original: sa ca tasya nāstīti tasya śatruḥ mitratām etīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,13.51)
analyzed: sa ca tasya na asti iti tasya śatruḥ mitra tām eti iti bhāvaḥ
kṣīrābdhīnām iva udeti teṣām parama śuddha tā
parama śuddha tā vāsanā ākhya mala rāhityam
hṛd kuśeśaya kośeṣu yeṣām śama kuśeśayam

original: satāṃ vikasitaṃ te hi dvihṛtpadmāḥ samā hareḥ // MU_2,13.53
analyzed: satām vikasitam te hi dvi hṛd padmāḥ samāḥ hareḥ

original: harer dvihṛtpadmatvaṃ nābhisthasya padmasya sthitatvāj jñeyam // (MT_2,13.53)

analyzed: śama śrīḥ śobhate yeṣām mukha indau akalaṅkite
te mī kula indavaḥ vandyāḥ saundarya vijita indavaḥ
a kalaṅkita tvam eva atra indu jaye hetuḥ
trailokya udara vartinyaḥ na ānandāya tathā śriyaḥ
sāmrājya saṃpad pratimāḥ yathā śama vibhūtayaḥ

original: yāni duḥkhāni yās tṛṣṇā duḥsahā ye durādhayaḥ /
analyzed: yāni duḥkhāni yāḥ tṛṣṇāḥ duḥsahāḥ ye durādhayaḥ

original: tat sarvaṃ śāntacetassu tamo 'rkeṣv iva naśyati // MU_2,13.56
analyzed: tat sarvam śānta cetassu tamaḥ rkeṣu iva naśyati
manaḥ hi sarva bhūtānām prasādam anugacchati

original: na tathendau yathā śānte jane janitakautukam // MU_2,13.57
analyzed: na tathā indau yathā śānte jane janita kautukam

original: sujane paramaṃ tattvaṃ svayam eva prasīdati // MU_2,13.58
analyzed: su jane paramam tattvam svayam eva prasīdati
prasīdati sva rūpa darśana ākhyam prasādam karoti iti arthaḥ

original: mātarīva paraṃ yānti viṣamāṇi mṛdūni ca /
analyzed: mātari iva param yānti viṣamāṇi mṛdūni ca

original: viśvāsam iha bhūtāni sarvāṇi śamaśālini // MU_2,13.59
analyzed: viśvāsam iha bhūtāni sarvāṇi śama śālini

original: tathā sukham avāpnoti śamenāntar yathā janaḥ // MU_2,13.60
analyzed: tathā sukham avāpnoti śamena antar yathā janaḥ

original: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi śamaśītalayā dhiyā /
analyzed: yat karoṣi yat aśnāsi śama śītalayā dhiyā

original: tat te 'tisvadate svādu netarat tāntamānasam // MU_2,13.62
analyzed: tat te tisvadate svādu na itarat tānta mānasam

original: chinnāny api tayāṅgāni manye rohanti rāghava // MU_2,13.63
analyzed: chinnāni api tayā aṅgāni manye rohanti rāghava

original: na piśācā na rakṣāṃsi na daityā na ca śatravaḥ /
analyzed: na piśācāḥ na rakṣāṃsi na daityāḥ na ca śatravaḥ

original: na ca vyāghrabhujaṅgādyā dviṣanti śamaśālinam // MU_2,13.64
analyzed: na ca vyāghra bhujaṅga ādyāḥ dviṣanti śama śālinam

original: vedhayanti na duḥkhāni śarā vajraśilāṃ iva // MU_2,13.65
analyzed: vedhayanti na duḥkhāni śarāḥ vajra śilām iva

original: prāṇāt priyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭim eti na tāṃ janaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇāt priyataram dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭim eti na tām janaḥ

original: yām āyāti janaṃ śāntam avalokya samāśayam // MU_2,13.67
analyzed: yām āyāti janam śāntam avalokya sama āśayam

original: samayā śamaśālinyā vṛttyā yaḥ sādhu vartate /
analyzed: samayā śama śālinyā vṛttyā yaḥ sādhu vartate

original: abhinanditayā loke jīvatīha sa netaraḥ // MU_2,13.68
analyzed: abhinanditayā loke jīvati iha sa nā itaraḥ

original: anuddhatamanāḥ śāntaḥ sādhu karma karoti yat /
analyzed: anuddhata manāḥ śāntaḥ sādhu karma karoti yat

original: tat sarvam abhinandanti tasyemā bhūtajātayaḥ // MU_2,13.69
analyzed: tat sarvam abhinandanti tasya imāḥ bhūta jātayaḥ

original: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā śubhāśubham /
analyzed: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā śubha aśubham

original: na hṛṣyati glāyati yaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate // MU_2,13.70
analyzed: na hṛṣyati glāyati yaḥ sa śāntaḥ iti kathyate

original: jitvendriyāṇi yatnena sa śānta iti kathyate // MU_2,13.71
analyzed: jitvā indriyāṇi yatnena sa śāntaḥ iti kathyate

original: maraṇotsavayuddheṣu sa śānta iti kathyate // MU_2,13.72
analyzed: maraṇa utsava yuddheṣu sa śāntaḥ iti kathyate

original: sthito 'pi na sthita iva na hṛṣyati na kupyati /
analyzed: na sthitaḥ iva na hṛṣyati na kupyati

original: yaḥ suṣuptamanāḥ svasthaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate // MU_2,13.73
analyzed: yaḥ suṣupta manāḥ svasthaḥ sa śāntaḥ iti kathyate
suṣupta manāḥ harṣa amarṣa anusandhāna rahitaḥ

original: dṛṣṭiḥ prasarati prītā sa śānta iti kathyate // MU_2,13.74
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ prasarati prītā sa śāntaḥ iti kathyate

original: dṛśyante yasya kāryāṇi sa śānta iti kathyate // MU_2,13.75
analyzed: dṛśyante yasya kāryāṇi sa śāntaḥ iti kathyate

original: apy āpatsu durantāsu kalpānteṣu dahatsv api /
analyzed: api āpatsu durantāsu kalpa anteṣu dahatsu api

original: tucchehaṃ na mano yasya sa śānta iti kathyate // MU_2,13.76
analyzed: tuccha īham na manaḥ yasya sa śāntaḥ iti kathyate

original: yo 'ntaḥ śītalatāṃ yāto yo bhāveṣu na majjati /

analyzed: vyavahārī na saṃmūḍhaḥ sa śāntaḥ iti kathyate

original: vyavahārarahitasya hi amajjanaṃ vyavahārābhāvakṛtam eva na
analyzed: vyavahāra rahitasya hi amajjanam vyavahāra abhāva kṛtam eva na

original: balavatsu guṇāḍhyeṣu śamavān eva rājate // MU_2,13.79

analyzed: saṃkaṭeṣu abhaya sthānam śamaḥ śrīmān virājate

analyzed: śamam amṛtam a hāryam ārya juṣṭam param avalambya padam param prayātāḥ

original: raghutanaya yathā mahānubhāvāḥ kramam anupālaya siddhaye tam eva // MU_2,13.82
analyzed: raghu tanaya yathā mahā anubhāvāḥ kramam anupālaya siddhaye tam eva

analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: nanu vicāreṇa kiṃ setsyati ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu vicāreṇa kim setsyati iti atra āha

original: vicārāt tīkṣṇatām etya dhīḥ paśyati paraṃ padam /
analyzed: vicārāt tīkṣṇa tām etya dhīḥ paśyati param padam

original: sarveṣv eva mahāprājña vicāro hi satāṃ gatiḥ // MU_2,14.4

original: na vicāraṃ vinā kaścid upāyo 'sti vipacchame /

original: balaṃ buddhiś ca tejaś ca pratipattiḥ kriyāphalam /

original: avivekena tu kṛtāni etāni anartham evotpādayantīti bhāvaḥ //

original: sphāraṃ vicāram āśritya saṃsārajaladhiṃ taret // MU_2,14.7

original: yuktāyuktamahādīpaṃ idaṃ yuktaṃ idaṃ tv ayuktam iti prakāśakam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yukta ayukta mahā dīpam idam yuktam idam tu ayuktam iti prakāśakam iti arthaḥ

original: kālena hi mūḍhā api śuddhacinmātrākhyaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ prāpnuvanti /
analyzed: kālena hi mūḍhāḥ api śuddha cit mātra ākhyam paramam padam prāpnuvanti

original: rājyāni saṃpadaḥ sphāro bhogo mokṣaś ca śāśvataḥ /
analyzed: rājyāni saṃpadaḥ sphāraḥ bhogaḥ mokṣaḥ ca śāśvataḥ

original: na tā vipadi majjanti tumbakānīva vāriṇi // MU_2,14.11
analyzed: na tāḥ vipadi majjanti tumbakāni iva vāriṇi

original: phalānām atyudārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ hi bhavanti te // MU_2,14.12
analyzed: phalānām ati udārāṇām bhājanam hi bhavanti te
mūrkha hṛd kānana sthānām āśā prasara rodhinām

original: avicāramayī nidrā yātu te rāghava kṣayam // MU_2,14.14
analyzed: avicāra mayī nidrā yātu te rāghava kṣayam

analyzed: avicāra mayī avicāra svarūpā tām eva kṣayam naya iti bhāvaḥ

original: na nimajjati moheṣu tejorāśis tamassv iva // MU_2,14.15
analyzed: na nimajjati moheṣu tejaḥ rāśiḥ tamassu iva

original: nūnaṃ vikasito yasya himavān iva bhāti saḥ // MU_2,14.16
analyzed: nūnam vikasitaḥ yasya himavān iva bhāti saḥ

original: mānase sarasi hṛdayākhye sarasi mānasākhye sarasīti ca // (MT_2,14.16)
analyzed: mānase sarasi hṛdaya ākhye sarasi mānasa ākhye sarasi iti ca

analyzed: tasya udeti aśaniḥ candrāt mudhā yakṣaḥ śiśoḥ iva

original: aśaniḥ bhāvābhāvakṛtaharṣāmarṣarūpaṃ vajram āścaryaṃ ca candrād aśaner utpādaḥ //
analyzed: aśaniḥ bhāva abhāva kṛta harṣa amarṣa rūpam vajram āścaryam ca candrāt aśaneḥ utpādaḥ

original: rāma dūre parityājyo nirviveko narādhamaḥ // MU_2,14.18
analyzed: rāma dūre parityājyaḥ nirvivekaḥ nara adhamaḥ

original: avicāreṇa te bhānti vetālās tamasā yathā // MU_2,14.19
analyzed: avicāreṇa te bhānti vetālāḥ tamasā yathā

original: akṣamaṃ sādhukāryeṣu dūre kuru raghūdvaha // MU_2,14.20
analyzed: akṣamam sādhu kāryeṣu dūre kuru raghūdvaha

original: parāṃ nirvṛtim abhyeti pūrṇaś candra ivātmani // MU_2,14.21

āśā vaivaśya varjitam iti viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetuḥ
āśā vaivaśyasya eva nirvṛti rodhaka tvāt

original: alaṃkaroti cātyantaṃ jyotsneva bhuvanam navā // MU_2,14.22
analyzed: alaṃkaroti ca atyantam jyotsnā iva bhuvanam navā

analyzed: vicāraḥ rājate jantoḥ rajanyām iva candramāḥ
paramārthasya śuddha cit mātra tattva ākhya paramārthasya
dhavala cāmaram śobhā dāyaka tvena dhavala cāmara rūpam
vicāra cāravaḥ bhāvāḥ bhāsayantaḥ diśaḥ daśa
bhānti bhāskara vat bhagna bhūyas bhava bhaya āmayāḥ

original: bhagnāḥ bhūyāṃsi bhavabhayāni evāmayāḥ yaiḥ te /
analyzed: bhagnāḥ bhūyāṃsi bhava bhayāni eva āmayāḥ yaiḥ te

original: rātrau tamasi vetālo vicāreṇa vilīyate // MU_2,14.25

analyzed: sarve eva jagat bhāvāḥ avicāreṇa cāravaḥ
sarve eva jagat bhāvāḥ jagat padārthāḥ

original: ata eva ca vicāraviśarāravaś ca vicārāsahatvāt // (MT_2,14.26)
analyzed: atas eva ca vicāra viśarāravaḥ ca vicāra asaha tvāt
puṃsaḥ nija manaḥ moha kalpitaḥ nalpa duḥkha daḥ
viddhi imam kevalībhāvam vicāraḥ grataroḥ phalam
samam ca tat svaccham sama svaccham
nirābādham kena api pramāṇena bādhayitum aśakyam
acala sthitinā udāra prakaṭa ābhoga tejasā
tena niṣkāma tā udeti śīta tā iva udita indunā
udāra prakaṭa ābhogam udbhaṭa prakaṭa vistāram
nanu niṣkāma tayā kim setsyati iti atra āha
cintā jvara mahā oṣadhyā sādhuḥ citta niṣaṇṇayā
tayā uttama tva pradayā na abhivāñchati na ujjhati

original: nābhivāñchati nojjhati sarvatropekṣām eva bhajate ity arthaḥ // (MT_2,14.30)
analyzed: na abhivāñchati na ujjhati sarvatra upekṣām eva bhajate iti arthaḥ
punar kim karoti iti atra āha
tat sat ālambanam cetaḥ sphāram ābhāsam āgatam

original: nāstam eti na codeti kham ivātitatāntaram // MU_2,14.31
analyzed: na astam eti na ca udeti kham iva atitata antaram

original: sā niṣkāmatā sadā ālambanam āśrayo yasya /
analyzed: sā niṣkāma tā sadā ālambanam āśrayaḥ yasya

original: ābhāsam āgatam vivekayuktaṃ jātam ity arthaḥ // (MT_2,14.31)
analyzed: ābhāsam āgatam viveka yuktam jātam iti arthaḥ

original: na jahāti na cādatte nottāmyati na śāmyati /
analyzed: na jahāti na ca ādatte na uttāmyati na śāmyati

original: kevalaṃ sākṣivat paśyañ jagad ātmani tiṣṭhati // MU_2,14.32
analyzed: kevalam sākṣi vat paśyam jagat ātmani tiṣṭhati

original: na ca śāmyati nāpy antar nāpi bāhye 'vatiṣṭhati /
analyzed: na ca śāmyati na api antar na api bāhye vatiṣṭhati

original: na ca naiṣkarmyam ādatte na ca karmāṇi majjati // MU_2,14.33
analyzed: na ca naiṣkarmyam ādatte na ca karmāṇi majjati
sarvatra upekṣayā eva vartate iti bhāvaḥ

original: na kṣubdho nāti cākṣubdho bhāti pūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ // MU_2,14.34
analyzed: na kṣubdhaḥ na ati ca a kṣubdhaḥ bhāti pūrṇaḥ iva arṇavaḥ

original: jīvanmuktā jagaty asmin viharanti hi yoginaḥ // MU_2,14.35
analyzed: jīvanmuktāḥ jagati asmin viharanti hi yoginaḥ

original: uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ dhīrās te yāvadīpsitam /
analyzed: uṣitvā su ciram kālam dhīrāḥ te yāvat īpsitam

original: tanum ante parityajya yānti kevalatāṃ tatām // MU_2,14.36
analyzed: tanum ante parityajya yānti kevala tām tatām

original: yāvadīpsitam ity anena sarvam eva bhagavatkṛtam teṣām īpsitam evāstīti sūcitam // (MT_2,14.36)
analyzed: yāvat īpsitam iti anena sarvam eva bhagavat kṛtam teṣām īpsitam eva asti iti sūcitam

original: ko 'haṃ kasya ca saṃsāra ity āpady api dhīmatā /
analyzed: kaḥ ham kasya ca saṃsāraḥ iti āpadi api dhīmatā
kim uta vaktavyam saṃpadi iti apiśabda abhiprāyaḥ
pratīkāraḥ ca atra bhoga tyāgaḥ eva jñeyaḥ
kārya saṃkaṭa sandeham rājā jānāti rāghava

original: niṣphalaṃ saphalaṃ vāpi vicāreṇaiva nānyathā // MU_2,14.38
analyzed: niṣphalam sa phalam vā api vicāreṇa eva na anyathā

original: bahir api vicārasyaiva sāmrājyam iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,14.38)
analyzed: bahis api vicārasya eva sāmrājyam iti bhāvaḥ
veda vedānta siddhānta sthitayaḥ sthiti kāraṇam

original: nirṇīyante vicāreṇa dīpeneva bhuvo niśi // MU_2,14.39
analyzed: nirṇīyante vicāreṇa dīpena iva bhuvaḥ niśi
veda vedānta rūpāḥ sthitayaḥ maryādāḥ veda vedānta sthitayaḥ
sthiti kāraṇam saṃsāra maryādā kāraṇa bhūtāḥ
a naṣṭam andhakāreṣu bahu tejassu a jihmitam

original: paśyaty api vyavahitaṃ vicāraś cārulocanam // MU_2,14.40
analyzed: paśyati api vyavahitam vicāraḥ cāru locanam

original: ajihmitam tejo'bhimukhe hi cakṣuṣi pratīghātena jihmitatvaṃ parivartitatvaṃ bhavati / tac cātra
analyzed: a jihmitam tejaḥ abhimukhe hi cakṣuṣi pratīghātena jihmita tvam parivartita tvam bhavati tat ca atra

original: vivekāndho hi jātyandhaḥ śocyaḥ sarvasya durmatiḥ /
analyzed: viveka andhaḥ hi jāti andhaḥ śocyaḥ sarvasya durmatiḥ
divya cakṣuḥ viveka ātmā jayati akhila vastuṣu

original: sarvasya śocyaḥ sarvaiḥ śocanīya ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: sarvasya śocyaḥ sarvaiḥ śocanīyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: vivekaḥ ātmā pradhānaṃ yasya saḥ vivekātmā vivekānvita ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: vivekaḥ ātmā pradhānam yasya saḥ viveka ātmā viveka anvitaḥ iti arthaḥ
jayati sarva utkarṣeṇa vartate iti arthaḥ

original: kṣaṇam ekaṃ parityājyā na vicāracamatkṛtiḥ // MU_2,14.42
analyzed: kṣaṇam ekam parityājyā na vicāra camatkṛtiḥ
vicāra cāruḥ puruṣaḥ mahatām api rocate
vicāra kānta matayaḥ na anekeṣu punar punar
luṭhanti duḥkha śvabhreṣu jñāta ūrdhva gatayaḥ narāḥ
na virauti tathā rogī na anartha śata jarjaraḥ
a vicāra vinaṣṭa ātmā yathājñaḥ pariroditi
na anartha śata jarjaraḥ iti atra caśabdaḥ dhyā āhāryaḥ
varam kardama kīṭa tvam śvabhra kaṇṭaka tā varam
varam andha guhā ahi tvam na narasya avicāri tā
sarva anartha nija āvāsam sarva sādhu tiraskṛtam
āvāsaḥ sarva anartha śrayam iti arthaḥ

original: bhavāndhakūpe patatāṃ vicāro hy avalambanam // MU_2,14.48
analyzed: bhava andhakūpe patatām vicāraḥ hi avalambanam
svayam eva ātmanā ātmānam avaṣṭabhya vicārataḥ
saṃsāra moha jaladheḥ tārayet sva manaḥ mṛgam

original: ko 'haṃ katham ayaṃ doṣaḥ saṃsārākhya upāgataḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ ham katham ayam doṣaḥ saṃsāra ākhyaḥ upāgataḥ

original: nyāyeneti parāmarśo vicāra iti kathyate // MU_2,14.50
analyzed: nyāyena iti parāmarśaḥ vicāraḥ iti kathyate
andha andha moha mukharam ciram duḥkhāya kevalam

original: kṛtaṃ śilāyā hṛdayaṃ durmateś cāvicāriṇaḥ // MU_2,14.51
analyzed: kṛtam śilāyāḥ hṛdayam durmateḥ ca avicāriṇaḥ
tādṛśam ca tat moha mukharam ca
duḥkhāya svasya parasya ca iti jñeyam
bhāva abhāva graha utsarga dṛśām iha hi rāghava

original: na vicārād ṛte tattvaṃ jñāyate sādhu kiṃcana // MU_2,14.52
analyzed: na vicārāt ṛte tattvam jñāyate sādhu kiṃcana

original: vicārāj jñāyate tattvaṃ tattvād viśrāntir ātmani /
analyzed: vicārāt jñāyate tattvam tattvāt viśrāntiḥ ātmani
tatas manasi śānta tvam sarva duḥkha parikṣayaḥ
tattvam cit mātra ākhyam paramam tattvam
ātmani śuddha cit mātra rūpe ātmani
sarva duḥkha kṣayasya eva śānti rūpa tvāt

original: saphalatā phalate bhuvi karmaṇāṃ prakaṭatāṃ kila gacchata uttamāt /
analyzed: saphala tā phalate bhuvi karmaṇām prakaṭa tām kila gacchataḥ uttamāt

original: sphuṭavicāradṛśaiva vicāritā śamavate bhavate 'pi virocatām // MU_2,14.54
analyzed: sphuṭa vicāra dṛśā eva vicāritā śamavate bhavate virocatām
sphuṭa vicāra dṛśā eva sphuṭā yā vicāra dṛś
prakaṭa tām gacchataḥ vivekasya eva sarva prakaṭane śakta tvāt

original: ataḥ iyaṃ vicāritā śamavate bhavate 'pi virocatām / iti śivam //
analyzed: atas iyam vicāritā śamavate bhavate virocatām iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe caturdaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe caturdaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: oṃ evaṃ vicārasvarūpaṃ nirṇīya tṛtīyasya saṃtoṣasya svarūpaṃ kathayati
analyzed: om evam vicāra svarūpam nirṇīya tṛtīyasya saṃtoṣasya svarūpam kathayati

original: saṃtoṣo 'pi paraṃ śreyaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ sukham ucyate /
analyzed: saṃtoṣaḥ pi param śreyaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ sukham ucyate

original: saṃtuṣṭaḥ param abhyeti viśrāmam arisūdana // MU_2,15.1
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭaḥ param abhyeti viśrāmam ari sūdana
saṃtoṣa aiśvarya sukhinām cira viśrānta cetasām
saṃtoṣa śālinī buddhī rāma saṃsāra vṛttiṣu

original: viṣamāsv apy anudvignā na kadācana dūyate // MU_2,15.3
analyzed: viṣamāsu api anudvignā na kadācana dūyate
saṃtoṣa amṛta pānena ye parām tṛptim āgatāḥ

original: bhogaśrīr atulā teṣām eṣā prativiṣāyate // MU_2,15.4
analyzed: bhoga śrīḥ atulā teṣām eṣā prativiṣāyate
na tathā tarpayanti etāḥ pīyūṣa rasa vīcayaḥ

original: yathā hi madhurāsvādaḥ saṃtoṣo doṣanāśanaḥ // MU_2,15.5
analyzed: yathā hi madhura āsvādaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ doṣa nāśanaḥ
saṃtuṣṭa svarūpa kathana dvāreṇa saṃtoṣa svarūpam kathayati
a prāpta vāñchām utsṛjya saṃprāpte sama tām gataḥ
adṛṣṭa kheda akhedaḥ ntar sa saṃtuṣṭaḥ iha ucyate

original: ātmanātmani saṃtoṣaṃ yāvad yāti na mānasam /
analyzed: ātmanā ātmani saṃtoṣam yāvat yāti na mānasam

original: udbhavanty āpadas tāval latā iva manovanāt // MU_2,15.7
analyzed: udbhavanti āpadaḥ tāvat latāḥ iva manaḥ vanāt
saṃtoṣa śītalam cetaḥ śuddha vijñāna dṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: bhṛśaṃ vikāsam āyāti sūryāṃśubhir ivāmbujam // MU_2,15.8
analyzed: bhṛśam vikāsam āyāti sūrya aṃśubhiḥ iva ambujam
saṃtuṣṭasya eva jñāne adhikāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ
āśā vaivaśya vivaśe citte saṃtoṣa varjite

original: mlāne vaktram ivādarśe na jñānaṃ pratibimbati // MU_2,15.9
analyzed: mlāne vaktram iva ādarśe na jñānam pratibimbati
ajñāna ghana yāminyā saṃkocam na nara ambujam

original: yāty asāv udito yasya nityaṃ saṃtoṣabhāskaraḥ // MU_2,15.10
analyzed: yāti asau uditaḥ yasya nityam saṃtoṣa bhāskaraḥ

original: tat narāmbujam ajñānaghanayāminyā saṃkocaṃ na yāti /
analyzed: tat nara ambujam ajñāna ghana yāminyā saṃkocam na yāti
yasya asau saṃtoṣa bhāskaraḥ nityam uditaḥ bhavati
akiṃcanaḥ u pi asau jantuḥ sāmrājya sukham aśnute
ādhi vyādhi vinirmuktam saṃtuṣṭam yasya mānasam
na abhivāñchati a saṃprāptam prāptam bhuṅkte yathākramam

original: yaḥ sasomyaḥ sadācāraḥ saṃtuṣṭa iti kathyate // MU_2,15.12
analyzed: yaḥ sa somyaḥ sat ācāraḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ iti kathyate

original: kṣīrābdher iva śuddhasya mukhe lakṣmīr virājate // MU_2,15.13
analyzed: kṣīrābdheḥ iva śuddhasya mukhe lakṣmīḥ virājate

original: pūrṇatām alam āśritya svātmany evātmanā svayam /
analyzed: pūrṇa tām alam āśritya sva ātmani eva ātmanā svayam

original: pauruṣeṇa prayatnena tṛṣṇāṃ sarvatra varjayet // MU_2,15.14

analyzed: saṃtoṣa amṛta pūrṇasya svāntaḥ śītala tā svayam

original: sthairyam āyāty ariktasya śītāṃśor iva śāśvatam // MU_2,15.15
analyzed: sthairyam āyāti ariktasya śītāṃśoḥ iva śāśvatam
saṃtoṣa puṣṭa manasam bhṛtyāḥ iva mahā ṛddhayaḥ

original: yathā kiṃkaratvam upāgatāḥ bhṛtyāḥ rājānam upatiṣṭhante tathā saṃtoṣapuṣṭamanasaṃ maharddhayaḥ upatiṣṭhante //
analyzed: yathā kiṃkara tvam upāgatāḥ bhṛtyāḥ rājānam upatiṣṭhante tathā saṃtoṣa puṣṭa manasam mahā ṛddhayaḥ upatiṣṭhante
ātmanā eva ātmani svacche saṃtuṣṭe puruṣe sthite

original: praśāmyanty ādhayaḥ sarve prāvṛṣīvāśu pāṃsavaḥ // MU_2,15.17
analyzed: praśāmyanti ādhayaḥ sarve prāvṛṣi iva āśu pāṃsavaḥ

original: puruṣaḥ śuddhayā vṛttyā bhāti pūrṇatayenduvat // MU_2,15.18
analyzed: puruṣaḥ śuddhayā vṛttyā bhāti pūrṇa tayā indu vat
kalaṅka hīnayā asantoṣa ākhya mala rahitayā
saṃtoṣa vivecanam sarga anta ślokena samāpayati

original: samatayā matayā guṇaśālināṃ puruṣarāḍ iha yaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sama tayā matayā guṇa śālinām puruṣa rāj iha yaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ

original: tam amalaṃ praṇamanti nabhaścarā api mahāmunayo raghunandana // MU_2,15.19
analyzed: tam amalam praṇamanti nabhaścarāḥ api mahā munayaḥ raghunandana

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: oṃ evaṃ saṃtoṣasvarūpaṃ nirṇīya caturthaṃ satsaṃgaṃ nirūpayati
analyzed: om evam saṃtoṣa sva rūpam nirṇīya caturtham sat saṃgam nirūpayati
sarvatra upakaroti iha sādhuḥ sādhu samāgamaḥ
sādhu saṃga taroḥ jātam viveka kusumam śubham

original: rakṣanti ye mahātmāno bhājanaṃ te phalaśriyaḥ // MU_2,16.2
analyzed: rakṣanti ye mahātmānaḥ bhājanam te phala śriyaḥ
phala śriyaḥ mokṣa ākhya phala lakṣmyāḥ

original: śūnyam ākīrṇatām eti mṛtir apy utsavāyate /
analyzed: śūnyam ākīrṇa tām eti mṛtiḥ api utsavāyate
āpad saṃpad iva ābhāti vidvas jana samāgame
ākīrṇa tām loka bharita deśa tām
himam āpat sarojinyāḥ moha nīhāra mārutaḥ

original: jayaty eko jagaty asmin sādhu sādhusamāgamaḥ // MU_2,16.4
analyzed: jayati ekaḥ jagati asmin sādhu sādhu samāgamaḥ
param vivardhanam buddheḥ ajñāna taru nāśanam
vivekaḥ paramaḥ dīpaḥ jāyate sādhu saṃgamāt

original: manoharojjvalo nūnam aśokād iva gucchakam // MU_2,16.6
analyzed: manohara ujjvalaḥ nūnam aśokāt iva gucchakam

original: api kaṣṭatarāṃ prāptair daśāṃ vivaśatāṃ gataiḥ /
analyzed: api kaṣṭatarām prāptaiḥ daśām vivaśa tām gataiḥ

original: manāg api na saṃtyājyā mānavaiḥ sādhusaṃgatiḥ // MU_2,16.8
analyzed: manāk api na saṃtyājyā mānavaiḥ sādhu saṃgatiḥ
sādhu saṃgatayaḥ loke sat mārga śubha dīpakāḥ
yaḥ snātaḥ śīta sitayā sādhu saṃgati gaṅgayā

original: kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ // MU_2,16.10
analyzed: kim tasya dānaiḥ kim tīrthaiḥ kim tapobhiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ
nīrāgāḥ chinna saṃdehāḥ galita granthayaḥ nagha

original: sādhavo yadi vidyante kiṃ tapastīrthasaṃgrahaiḥ // MU_2,16.11
analyzed: sādhavaḥ yadi vidyante kim tapaḥ tīrtha saṃgrahaiḥ
galita granthayaḥ naṣṭa kāma ākhya granthayaḥ
viśrānta manasaḥ vandyāḥ prayatnena pareṇa hi

original: daridreṇeva maṇayaḥ prekṣaṇīyā hi sādhavaḥ // MU_2,16.12
analyzed: daridreṇa iva maṇayaḥ prekṣaṇīyāḥ hi sādhavaḥ
sat samāgama saundarya śālinī dhīmatām matiḥ
kamalā iva apsaraḥ vṛnde sarvadā eva virājate
tena amala vilāsasya padasya agra avacūla tā

original: grathitā yena bhavyena na tyaktā sādhusaṃgatiḥ // MU_2,16.14
analyzed: grathitā yena bhavyena na tyaktā sādhu saṃgatiḥ
agra avacūla tā śiraḥ bhūṣaṇa tā

original: sādhusaṃgatiḥ na tyaktā sādhusaṃgatiḥ kāryaiva cinmātrākhye pade rājate iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: sādhu saṃgatiḥ na tyaktā sādhu saṃgatiḥ kāryā eva cit mātra ākhye pade rājate iti bhāvaḥ
vicchinna granthayaḥ tad jñāḥ sādhavaḥ sarva sammatāḥ

original: sarvopāyena saṃsevyās te hy upāyā bhavāmbudhau // MU_2,16.15
analyzed: sarva upāyena saṃsevyāḥ te hi upāyāḥ bhava ambudhau
te ete naraka agnīnām saṃśuṣka indhana tām gatāḥ

original: yair dṛṣṭā helayā santo narakānalavāridāḥ // MU_2,16.16
analyzed: yaiḥ dṛṣṭāḥ helayā santaḥ naraka anala vāridāḥ
dāridryam maraṇam duḥkham ityādi viṣamaḥ bhramaḥ

original: saṃtoṣaḥ sādhusaṃgaś ca vicāro 'tha śamas tathā /
analyzed: saṃtoṣaḥ sādhu saṃgaḥ ca śamaḥ tathā

original: eta eva bhavāmbhodhāv upāyās taraṇe nṛṇām // MU_2,16.18
analyzed: ete eva bhava ambhodhau upāyāḥ taraṇe nṛṇām

original: saṃtoṣaḥ paramo lābhaḥ satsaṃgaḥ paramā gatiḥ /
analyzed: saṃtoṣaḥ paramaḥ lābhaḥ sat saṃgaḥ paramā gatiḥ

original: vicāraḥ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śamo hi paramaṃ sukhaṃ // MU_2,16.19
analyzed: vicāraḥ paramam jñānam śamaḥ hi paramam sukham
atas param lābha ādi na asti iti para pada abhiprāyaḥ
catvāraḥ ete vimalāḥ upāyāḥ bhava bhedane

original: yair abhyastās ta uttīrṇā mohavārer bhavārṇavāt // MU_2,16.20
analyzed: yaiḥ abhyastāḥ te uttīrṇāḥ moha vāreḥ bhava arṇavāt
ekasmin eva ca eteṣām abhyaste vimala udaye

original: catvāro 'pi kilābhyastā bhavanti sudhiyāṃ vara // MU_2,16.21
analyzed: catvāraḥ pi kila abhyastāḥ bhavanti sudhiyām vara

original: eko 'py eko 'pi sarveṣāṃ eṣāṃ prasavabhūr iva /
analyzed: ekaḥ pi ekaḥ pi sarveṣām eṣām prasava bhūḥ iva
sarva saṃsiddhaye tasmāt yatnena ekam samāśrayet
sat samāgama saṃtoṣa vicārāḥ tu avicāritam
pravartante śama su acche vahanāni iva sāgare  /
vicāra saṃtoṣa śamāḥ sat samāgama śālini

original: pravartante śriyo jantau kalpavṛkṣāśrite yathā // MU_2,16.24
analyzed: pravartante śriyaḥ jantau kalpavṛkṣa āśrite yathā
vicāra śama sat saṃgāḥ saṃtoṣavati mānave

original: pravartante prapūrṇendau saundaryādyā guṇā iva // MU_2,16.25
analyzed: pravartante prapūrṇa indau saundarya ādyāḥ guṇāḥ iva
sat saṃga saṃtoṣa śamāḥ vicāravati sat matau
pravartante mantri vare rājani iva jaya śriyaḥ

original: pauruṣeṇa mano jitvā yatnenābhyāhared guṇam // MU_2,16.27
analyzed: pauruṣeṇa manaḥ jitvā yatnena abhyāharet guṇam
ekatamam guṇam saṃtoṣa ādi rūpam guṇam
param pauruṣam āśritya jitvā citta mataṅga jam

original: yāvan nābhiniviṣṭaṃ te mano rāma guṇārjane // MU_2,16.29

original: devo bhavātha yakṣo vā puruṣaḥ pādapo 'tha vā /
analyzed: devaḥ bhavātha yakṣaḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā

analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe ṣoḍaśaḥ sargaḥ

analyzed: rājā iva yathā rājā naya bhāratīḥ nīti vākyāni śrotum yogyaḥ bhavati

original: śilāpattre hi taraṅgākāraḥ utpalākārāś ca rekhāḥ bhavanti / tā evātra
analyzed: śilā pattre hi taraṅga ākāraḥ utpala ākārāḥ ca rekhāḥ bhavanti tāḥ eva atra

original: nanu sthitiprakaraṇe kim uktam ity / atrāha

original: sarvāsām ṛtumatīnām anutpannasya varasya mardaḥ mardanam /

etaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ ca upaśānti prakaraṇa śravaṇa anantaram buddhi āroha mātra svarūpā

original: ālokena gṛhītasya rūpasya manasi anusandhānam iti yāvat // (MT_2,17.45)
analyzed: ālokena gṛhītasya rūpasya manasi anusandhānam iti yāvat
sa dehaḥ eva nirdehaḥ sa saṃsāraḥ pi asaṃsṛtiḥ
cit mayaḥ hana pāṣāṇa jaṭhara jaṭhara upamaḥ
hana pāṣāṇa jaṭhara jaṭhara upamaḥ jaṭharaṃjaṭha
sa dehaḥ sattva śeṣam tāvat śarīrasya sthita tvāt
cit mayaḥ cit svarūpa aham iti niścayāt
cit ādityaḥ tapan loke pi andhakāra udara upamaḥ
para prakāśa rūpaḥ pi param āndhyam iva āgataḥ

original: na hi citsparśarahitaḥ kaścit bhāvaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na hi cit sparśa rahitaḥ kaścid bhāvaḥ saṃbhavati
sattve pi tasya asaṃkalpa tva prasaṅgāt
andhakāra udara upamaḥ andhakārasya yat udaram
tādṛśaḥ padārtha vibhāga rahita tvāt na
hi andhakāra udare padārtha vibhāgaḥ bhavati
para prakāśa rūpaḥ pi uttīrṇa cit prakāśa rūpaḥ pi

original: param āndhyam āgataḥ iva na kiṃciddraṣṭṛtvāt //
analyzed: param āndhyam āgataḥ iva na kiṃcid draṣṭṛ tvāt
ruddha saṃsṛti durlīlaḥ prakṣīṇa āśā viṣūcikāḥ

original: jagallakṣmīr mahāmeroḥ puṣpe kvacid ivālinī // MU_2,17.49
analyzed: jagat lakṣmīḥ mahā meroḥ puṣpe kvacid

original: kaśmiṃscit atisūkṣmatayā vaktum aśakye svapnavad iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: kaśmiṃscid ati sūkṣma tayā vaktum aśakye svapna vat iti śeṣaḥ

original: svapne hi puruṣasya kasmiṃścid aṃśe svapnajagad avatiṣṭhate // (MT_2,17.49)

original: jagallakṣmīsahasrāṇi dhatte kṛtvā ca paśyati // MU_2,17.50

original: tulanam eti na muktimato bata pravitatāsti na nūnam avastunaḥ // MU_2,17.51

analyzed: sā hari hara abja ja lakṣa śataiḥ api tulanam māpana viṣaya tām naḥ eti

analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe saptadaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: yathā tathaiva saṃsāraḥ sthita evopaśāmyati // MU_2,18.41
analyzed: yathā tathā eva saṃsāraḥ sthitaḥ evā upaśāmyati
nanu parama artha prāptiḥ asmākam ati duṣkarā eva
tathā ca tad prāpti artham etad śāstra avagāhanam
sumanaḥ pallava āmarśe kiṃcid vyatikaraḥ bhavet

original: paramārthapadaprāptau na tu vyatikaro 'sti naḥ // MU_2,18.42
analyzed: parama artha pada prāptau na tu vyatikaraḥ sti naḥ
sumanaḥ pallava āmarśe puṣpa pallava āmarde

original: na tv ayuktijñānāṃ bhavatām ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: na tu ayukti jñānām bhavatām iti arthaḥ
gacchati avayava spandaḥ sumanaḥ patra mardane
iha dhī mātra bodhaḥ tu na aṅga avayava bodhanam

original: anekārthatvād dhātūnāṃ gacchatir atrāsminn arthe vartate /
analyzed: aneka artha tvāt dhātūnām gacchatiḥ atra asmin arthe vartate
bhoga jālam sat ācāra viruddheṣu na tiṣṭhatā
yathā sambhava sat saṅgam idam śāstram atha itarat
āsādyate mahā jñāna bodhaḥ saṃsāra śānti daḥ

original: sa bhūyo yena nāyāti yoniyantraprapīḍanam // MU_2,18.46
analyzed: sa bhūyas yena na āyāti yoni yantra prapīḍanam

original: sadācāraviruddheṣu tiṣṭhato hi hānopādānakāritvarūpo doṣaḥ āyātīti na tiṣṭhatety uktam /
analyzed: sat ācāra viruddheṣu tiṣṭhataḥ hi hāna upādāna kāri tva rūpaḥ doṣaḥ āyāti iti na tiṣṭhatā iti uktam
yathā sambhavaḥ sat saṅgaḥ yatra tat
idam śāstram mayā vakṣyamāṇa mokṣa upāya ākhyam śāstram
itarat etad sadṛśam anyat śāstram vā
saḥ iti asya pūrva ardhena sambandhaḥ

original: etāvaty eva ye bhūtā bhogān prāpya rase sthitāḥ /
analyzed: etāvati eva ye bhūtāḥ bhogān prāpya rase sthitāḥ
sva mātṛ viṣṭhā krimayaḥ kīrtanīyāḥ na te dhamāḥ
evam śāstra māhātmyam uktvā śrī rāmam saṃmukhīkaroti

original: śṛṇu tāvad idānīṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ mayā /
analyzed: śṛṇu tāvat idānīm tvam kathyamānam idam mayā
rāghava jñāna vistāram buddhi sāratara antaram
madhye śrī rāma kṛtān codyān āśaṅkya āha

original: yayedaṃ śrūyate śāstraṃ tāṃ tu vistarataḥ śṛṇu /
analyzed: yayā idam śrūyate śāstram tām tu vistarataḥ śṛṇu

original: vicāryate tathārtho 'yaṃ yayā ca paribhāṣayā // MU_2,18.49
analyzed: vicāryate tathā arthaḥ yam yayā ca paribhāṣayā

original: tāṃ ca śṛṇv iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ // (MT_2,18.49)
analyzed: tām ca śṛṇu iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ
yena iha ananubhūte rthe dṛṣṭena artha avabodhanam

original: bodhopakāraphaladaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ vidur budhāḥ // MU_2,18.50
analyzed: bodha upakāra phala dam tam dṛṣṭāntam viduḥ budhāḥ
ananubhūte arthe artha avabodhanam jñānam bhavati
dṛṣṭānta dāne kim phalam iti atra āha
dṛṣṭāntena vinā rāma na apūrvaḥ rthaḥ

original: yathā dīpaṃ vinā rātrau bhāṇḍopakaraṇaṃ gṛhe // MU_2,18.51
analyzed: yathā dīpam vinā rātrau bhāṇḍa upakaraṇam gṛhe

original: yair yaiḥ kākutstha dṛṣṭāntais tvaṃ mayehāvabudhyase /
analyzed: yaiḥ yaiḥ kākutstha dṛṣṭāntaiḥ tvam mayā iha avabudhyase

original: sarve sakāraṇās te hi prāpyaṃ tu sad akāraṇam // MU_2,18.52
analyzed: sarve sa kāraṇāḥ te hi prāpyam tu sat akāraṇam

original: nanu sarvāṇi dārṣṭāntikāni etādṛśāni eva santy utānyāny athety apekṣāyām āha
analyzed: nanu sarvāṇi dārṣṭāntikāni etādṛśāni eva santi uta anyāni atha iti apekṣāyām āha
upamāna upameyānām kārya kāraṇa tā uditā

original: varjayitvā paraṃ brahma sarveṣām eva vidyate // MU_2,18.53
analyzed: varjayitvā param brahma sarveṣām eva vidyate  /

original: brahma na kāryam asti nāpi kāraṇam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: brahma na kāryam asti na api kāraṇam iti arthaḥ

original: ato na brahmasadṛśāni sarvāṇi dārṣṭāntikāni iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas na brahma sadṛśāni sarvāṇi dārṣṭāntikāni iti bhāvaḥ
brahma upadeśa dṛṣṭāntaḥ yasya vā iha hi kathyate
eka deśa sadharma tvam tatra atas parigṛhyate

original: yasya vā brahmopadeśadṛṣṭāntaḥ kathyate tatra brahmadṛṣṭānte /
analyzed: yasya vā brahma upadeśa dṛṣṭāntaḥ kathyate tatra brahma dṛṣṭānte
eka deśa sadharma tvam eka deśa sadṛśa tvam

original: na tu sarvathā sadṛśatvam dārṣṭāntikasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryakāraṇatvāyogyāt /
analyzed: na tu sarvathā sadṛśa tvam dārṣṭāntikasya brahmaṇaḥ kārya kāraṇa tva ayogyāt

original: dṛṣṭāntasya tu kāryatayā kāraṇatayā ca sthitatvād
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntasya tu kārya tayā kāraṇa tayā ca sthita tvāt
yaḥ yaḥ nāma iha dṛṣṭāntaḥ brahma tattva avabodhane

original: dīyate sa sa boddhavyaḥ svapnadṛṣṭajagadgataḥ // MU_2,18.55
analyzed: dīyate sa sa boddhavyaḥ svapna dṛṣṭa jagat gataḥ

original: evaṃ sati nirākāre brahmaṇy ākāravān katham /
analyzed: evam sati nirākāre brahmaṇi ākāravān katham
dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti nā udyanti mūrkha vaikalpika uktayaḥ

original: asmābhir ata eva pratyuktatvād iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ atas eva pratyukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
anyā siddha viruddha ādi dṛś dṛṣṭānta pradūṣaṇe

original: svapnopamatvāj jagataḥ samudeti na kācana // MU_2,18.57
analyzed: svapna upama tvāt jagataḥ samudeti na kācana

original: anyā pūrvoktāyāḥ dṛṣṭeḥ sakāśāt itarā kā /
analyzed: anyā pūrvoktāyāḥ dṛṣṭeḥ sakāśāt itarā kā

original: siddhaviruddhādidṛk idaṃ siddhaṃ idaṃ viruddham ityādirūpā uktiḥ /
analyzed: siddha viruddha ādi dṛś idam siddham idam viruddham ityādi rūpā uktiḥ

original: jagataḥ svapnopamatvāt dṛṣṭāntapradūṣaṇe dṛṣṭāntapradūṣaṇārtham na samudeti /
analyzed: jagataḥ svapna upama tvāt dṛṣṭānta pradūṣaṇe dṛṣṭānta pradūṣaṇa artham na samudeti

original: ādiśabdenedaṃ leśena siddhaṃ viruddhaṃ veti dṛṣṭer grahaṇam /
analyzed: ādi śabdena idam leśena siddham viruddham vā iti dṛṣṭeḥ grahaṇam

original: svapnopame jagati idaṃ siddhaṃ idam viruddham iti /
analyzed: svapna upame jagati idam siddham idam viruddham iti

original: kathanaṃ na yuktaṃ sarvasyāyuktatvād iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: kathanam na yuktam sarvasya ayukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
siddha viruddha ādi dṛś siddha ia

original: yathā jāgrat tathā svapnaḥ siddham ābālam akṣatam // MU_2,18.58
analyzed: yathā jāgrat tathā svapnaḥ siddham ā bālam akṣatam

original: vartamāne hi bhūtasya gatatvāt bhaviṣyataḥ anāgatatvāt asattvaṃ vicārapadavīm
analyzed: vartamāne hi bhūtasya gata tvāt bhaviṣyataḥ anāgata tvāt asattvam vicāra padavīm

original: āyāti / tadabhinnasya vartamānasyāpi avastutvam aparihāryam eveti svayam eva jñeyam /

analyzed: svapna saṃkalpana dhyāna vara śāpa auṣadha ādibhiḥ

original: ye 'rthās ta iha dṛṣṭāntās tadrūpatvāj jagatsthiteḥ // MU_2,18.59
analyzed: ye rthāḥ te iha dṛṣṭāntāḥ tad rūpa tvāt jagat sthiteḥ

original: ye 'rthā ity / atra dṛṣṭā iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: ye rthāḥ iti atra dṛṣṭāḥ iti śeṣaḥ
tad rūpa tvāt svapna ādi artha rūpa tvāt

original: ata ihāsatyaiḥ padārthaiḥ satyasya brahmaṇaḥ upamānopameyabhāvaḥ ekadeśasādharmyeṇeti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas iha asatyaiḥ padārthaiḥ satyasya brahmaṇaḥ upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ eka deśa sādharmyeṇa iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tvayā kṛteṣv anyeṣu grantheṣu kā vārtety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tvayā kṛteṣu anyeṣu grantheṣu kā vārttā iti atra āha
mokṣopāya kṛtāḥ granthakāreṇa anye ye kṛtāḥ

original: granthās teṣv iyam evaikā vyavasthā bodhyabodhane // MU_2,18.60
analyzed: granthāḥ teṣu iyam evā ekā vyavasthā bodhya bodhane
mokṣopāya kṛtā granthakāreṇa mayā iti arthaḥ
nanu katham svapna sadṛśa tvam jagataḥ sti iti atra āha
svapna ābha tvam ca jagataḥ śrute śāstre vabhotsyate

original: śīghraṃ na pāryate vaktuṃ vāk kila kramavartinī // MU_2,18.61
analyzed: śīghram na pāryate vaktum vāc kila krama vartinī

original: tarhi yugapad eva sarvaṃ śāstraṃ kathayety /
analyzed: tarhi yugapad eva sarvam śāstram kathaya iti
vācaḥ krama varti tvam sphuṭam eva

original: na hi ekaṃ vākyam anirvāhya dvitīyādikaṃ vākyaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate //
analyzed: na hi ekam vākyam a nirvāhya dvitīya ādikam vākyam vaktum śakyate
svapna saṃkalpa su dhyāna nagara ādi upamam jagat

original: yatas ta eva dṛṣṭāntās tasmād bhāntīha netare // MU_2,18.62
analyzed: yatas te eva dṛṣṭāntāḥ tasmāt bhānti iha na itare
svapna saṃkalpa sudhyāneṣu dṛṣṭāḥ ye nagara ādayaḥ

original: tasmāt ta eva sudhyānanagarādaya eva dṛṣṭāntāḥ bhānti asmākaṃ buddhau sphuranti /
analyzed: tasmāt te eva sudhyāna nagara ādayaḥ eva dṛṣṭāntāḥ bhānti asmākam buddhau sphuranti
tasmāt te eva sudhyāna nagara ādayaḥ sudhyāna

original: na tatra sarvasādharmyaṃ sambhavaty upamābhramaiḥ // MU_2,18.63
analyzed: na tatra sarva sādharmyam sambhavati upamā bhramaiḥ
upamā bhramaiḥ anya upamā dṛṣṭa sarvathā sādharmya rūpaiḥ viparyayaiḥ
upameyasya upamānāt eka aṃśena sadharma tā

original: sa hi ārambha eva vivādapara eva tiṣṭhatīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,18.64)
analyzed: sa hi ārambhe eva vivāda paraḥ eva tiṣṭhati iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanv ekena dharmeṇa sadṛśena upamānaṃ katham upameyasya pratītiṃ kartuṃ śaknotīty
analyzed: nanu ekena dharmeṇa sadṛśena upamānam katham upameyasya pratītim kartum śaknoti iti
artha avalokane dīpāt ābhā mātrāt ṛte kila

original: na sthālatailavartyādi kiṃcid apy upajāyate // MU_2,18.65
analyzed: na sthāla taila vartī ādi kiṃcid api upajāyate
eka deśa sadharma tvāt upameya avabodhanam
