original: upamānaṃ karoty aṅga dīpo 'rthaṃ prabhayā yathā // MU_2,18.66
analyzed: upamānam karoti aṅga dīpaḥ ṛtham prabhayā yathā
dṛṣṭāntasya aṃśa mātreṇa bodhya bodha udaye sati
upādeya tayā grāhyaḥ mahā vākya artha niścayaḥ

original: na tu dṛṣṭāntamātra eva sthātavyam iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,18.67)
analyzed: na tu dṛṣṭānta mātre eva sthātavyam iti bhāvaḥ
na ku tārkika tām etya nāśanīyā prabuddha tā

original: kutārkikāḥ hi ārambha eva codyān dattvā prabuddhatāṃ nāśayanti /
analyzed: kutārkikāḥ hi ārambhe eva codyān dattvā prabuddha tām nāśayanti

original: nanu purāṇāni śāstrāṇi ca tyaktvā kimarthaṃ tvaduktaṃ śāstraṃ gṛhṇīmaḥ ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu purāṇāni śāstrāṇi ca tyaktvā kimartham tvad uktam śāstram gṛhṇīmaḥ iti atra āha

original: vicāraṇād anubhavakāri vāṅmaya- prasaṅgatām upagatam asmadādiṣu /
analyzed: vicāraṇāt anubhava kāri vāṅmaya prasaṅga tām upagatam asmat ādiṣu

original: striyoktam apy aparam athāpi vaidikaṃ vaco vacaḥpralapanam eva nāgamaḥ // MU_2,18.69
analyzed: striyā uktam api aparam atha api vaidikam vacaḥ vacaḥ pralapanam eva na āgamaḥ

original: striyā uktam api strīkartṛkaṃ pralapitam api /
analyzed: striyāḥ uktam api strī kartṛkam pralapitam api
vāc maya prasaṅga tām śāstra prasaṅga tām

original: vaidikaṃ vacaḥ api vacaḥpralapanam eva pralāpa eva bhavati /
analyzed: vaidikam vacaḥ api vacaḥ pralapanam eva pralāpaḥ eva bhavati
na āgamaḥ bhavati anubhava kāri tva abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
sarga anta ślokena api etat eva kathayati

original: asmākam asti matir aṅga tayeti sarva- śāstraikavākyakaraṇaṃ phalitaṃ yato 'taḥ /
analyzed: asmākam asti matiḥ aṅga tayā iti śāstra eka vākya karaṇam phalitam

original: prātītikārthamayaśāstranijāṅgapuṣṭāt saṃvedanād itarad asti na naḥ pramāṇam // MU_2,18.70
analyzed: prātītika artha maya śāstra nija aṅga puṣṭāt saṃvedanāt itarat asti na naḥ pramāṇam

original: he aṅga / asmākaṃ matir asti iti /
analyzed: he aṅga asmākam matiḥ asti iti
sarva śāstra eka vākya karaṇam yatas phalitam

original: sarvasmiñ śāstre saṃvedanam evāsmābhiḥ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: sarvasmin śāstre saṃvedanam eva asmābhiḥ pramāṇam dṛṣṭam
tat eva nija aṅgam upakāraka tvāt sva aṅgam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe aṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe aṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: oṃ pūrvoktam evārthaṃ punar api spaṣṭayati
analyzed: om pūrva uktam eva artham punar api spaṣṭayati
viśiṣṭa aṃśa sadharma tvam upamāneṣu gṛhyate
kaḥ bhedaḥ sarva sādṛśye tu upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: ekāṃśenāpi kāryasya siddhatvān na ko 'pīty arthaḥ // (MT_2,19.1)
analyzed: eka aṃśena api kāryasya siddha tvāt na kaḥ pi iti arthaḥ
dṛṣṭānta buddhāt eka ātma jñāna śāstra artha vedanāt

original: dṛṣṭāntaiḥ buddhāt jñātāt siddhād iti yāvat //
analyzed: dṛṣṭāntaiḥ buddhāt jñātāt siddhāt iti yāvat
tasmāt dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭānta vikalpa ullasitaiḥ alam

original: yayā kayācid yuktyāśu mahāvākyārtham āśrayet // MU_2,19.3
analyzed: yayā kayācid yuktyā āśu mahā vākya artham āśrayet

original: alam kṛtam / naitaiḥ prayojanam ity arthaḥ // (MT_2,19.3)
analyzed: alam kṛtam na etaiḥ prayojanam iti arthaḥ

original: śāntiḥ śreyaḥ paraṃ viddhi tatprāptau yatnavān bhavet /
analyzed: śāntiḥ śreyaḥ param viddhi tad prāptau yatnavān bhavet

original: bhoktavya odanaḥ prāptaḥ kiṃ tatsiddhivikalpitaiḥ // MU_2,19.4
analyzed: bhoktavyaḥ odanaḥ prāptaḥ kim tad siddhi vikalpitaiḥ
śāntiḥ manaḥ vikalpa rūpa kṣobha rāhityam

original: siddhivikalpitaiḥ katham etat sampannam iti vikalpaiḥ // (MT_2,19.4)
analyzed: siddhi vikalpitaiḥ katham etat sampannam iti vikalpaiḥ
upamānaiḥ tu upameya sadṛśaiḥ eka deśataḥ
sthātavyam nā iha bhogeṣu viveka vikala ātmanā
upala udara saṃjāta paripīna andha bheka vat
dṛṣṭāntaiḥ yuktibhiḥ yatnāt vāñchitam tyajata itarat
vicāraṇavatā bhāvyam śānti śāstra artha śālinā

original: śāntiś ca śāstrārthaś ca tābhyāṃ śālate iti tādṛśena // (MT_2,19.7)
analyzed: śāntiḥ ca śāstra arthaḥ ca tābhyām iti tādṛśena
śāstra upaśama saujanya prajñā tad jña samāgamaiḥ
antara antara sampanna dharmya artha upārjana kriyaḥ
śāstra upaśama saujanya prajñā tad jña samāgamaiḥ tad jña

original: tāvad vicārayet prājño yāvad viśrāntim ātmani /
analyzed: tāvat vicārayet prājñaḥ yāvat viśrāntim ātmani
samprayāti apunarnāśām śāntim turya pada abhidhām

original: śāstraṃ ca upaśamaś ca saujanyaṃ ca prajñā ca tajjñasamāgamaś ca /
analyzed: śāstram ca upaśamaḥ ca saujanyam ca prajñā ca tad jña samāgamaḥ ca
dharmyānām dharmāt an apetānām arthānām upārjanam
ātmani viśrāntim ātma viśrānti lakṣaṇām śāntim

original: nanv ātmani viśrāntyā kiṃ setsyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu ātmani viśrāntyā kim setsyati iti atra āha
turya viśrānti yuktasya pratīrṇasya bhava arṇavāt

original: jīvato 'jīvataś caiva gṛhasthasyātha vā yateḥ // MU_2,19.10
analyzed: jīvataḥ jīvataḥ ca eva gṛhasthasya atha vā yateḥ
na kṛtena akṛtena arthaḥ na śruti smṛti vibhramaiḥ

original: nirmandara ivāṃbhodhiḥ sa tiṣṭhati yathāsthitam // MU_2,19.11
analyzed: nirmandaraḥ iva aṃbhodhiḥ sa tiṣṭhati yathāsthitam
jīvataḥ jīvanmuktasya a jīvataḥ videha muktasya
eka aṃśena upamānānām upameya sadharma tā

original: boddhavyā bodhyabodhāya na stheyaṃ codyacañcunā // MU_2,19.12
analyzed: boddhavyāḥ bodhya bodhāya na stheyam codya cañcunā
iti codya cañcuḥ codya śīlena iti arthaḥ

original: yayā kayācid yuktyāśu boddhavyaṃ bodhyam eva te /
analyzed: yayā kayācid yuktyā āśu boddhavyam bodhyam eva te

original: muktaye tan na paśyanti vyākulāś codyacañcavaḥ // MU_2,19.13
analyzed: muktaye tat na paśyanti vyākulāḥ codya cañcavaḥ
hṛdaye saṃvid ākāśe viśrānte nubhava ātmani

original: vastuny anarthaṃ yaḥ praṣṭā codyacañcuḥ sa ucyate // MU_2,19.14
analyzed: vastuni anartham yaḥ praṣṭā codya cañcuḥ saḥ ucyate
viśrānte anubhava ātmani saṃvid ākāśe cit ākāśe
vastuni yaḥ anartham saṃśaya rūpam anartham

original: svānubhavāviṣṭe 'pi vastuni yaḥ punaḥ punaḥ codyān utpādayati saḥ codyacañcur iti
analyzed: sva anubhava āviṣṭe vastuni yaḥ punar punar codyān utpādayati saḥ codya cañcuḥ iti
abhimāna vikalpa aṃśaiḥ ajñaḥ jñaptim vikalpayan

original: bodhaṃ malinayaty antar mukhaṃ sarpa ivāmalam // MU_2,19.15
analyzed: bodham malinayati antar mukham sarpaḥ iva amalam

original: abhimānenāhaṃ samyak codanaśīla ity abhimānena kṛtaiḥ vikalpāṃśaiḥ /
analyzed: abhimānena aham samyak codana śīlaḥ iti abhimānena kṛtaiḥ vikalpa aṃśaiḥ
bodham malinayati bheda mālinya dūṣitam karoti
sarva pramāṇa sattānām padam abdhiḥ apām iva

original: pramāṇam ekam eveha pratyakṣaṃ rāma tac chṛṇu // MU_2,19.16
analyzed: pramāṇam ekam evā iha pratyakṣam rāma tat śṛṇu
sarvāsām anumāna ādi bheda bhinnānām samastānām pramāṇa sattānām

original: ekam pratyakṣam eva iha loke pramāṇam asti /
analyzed: ekam pratyakṣam eva iha loke pramāṇam asti

original: na hi anumānādayaḥ pratyakṣaṃ vinā sthātuṃ śaknuvanti /
analyzed: na hi anumāna ādayaḥ pratyakṣam vinā sthātum śaknuvanti

original: tvam tat pratyakṣaṃ nāma pramāṇaṃ / śṛṇu //
analyzed: tvam tat pratyakṣam nāma pramāṇam śṛṇu
sarva artha sāram adhyakṣam vedanam viduḥ uttamāḥ

original: nūnaṃ tat prati yat siddhaṃ tat pratyakṣam udāhṛtam // MU_2,19.17
analyzed: nūnam tat prati yat siddham tat pratyakṣam udāhṛtam

original: sarvārthānāṃ sāraprakāśanadvāreṇa siddhipradatvāt sārabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ jñānam eva /
analyzed: sarva arthānām sāra prakāśana dvāreṇa siddhi prada tvāt sāra bhūtam vedanam jñānam eva
adhyakṣam viduḥ sāra bhūta vastu vācaka tvāt adhyakṣa śabdasya
tat prati vedana rūpam adhyakṣam prati

original: akṣaṃ prati siddhaṃ pratyakṣam iti vyutpatteḥ /
analyzed: akṣam prati siddham pratyakṣam iti vyutpatteḥ
akṣa śabdasya ca bhāmā iti vat adhyakṣa vācaka tvam

original: pratyakṣam iti nāmeha kṛtaṃ jīvaḥ sa eva ca // MU_2,19.18
analyzed: pratyakṣam iti nāma iha kṛtam jīvaḥ saḥ eva ca

original: vedanasyaiva vedanaṃ prati siddhatvād anyasya sarvasya tasmiṃl layāsādanāt sa eva jīvaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: vedanasya eva vedanam prati siddha tvāt anyasya sarvasya tasmin laya āsādanāt saḥ eva jīvaḥ bhavati

original: vedanād anyasya śarīrādeḥ pāṣāṇatulyatvena jīvatvāyogāt anubhūtipratipattyoḥ
analyzed: vedanāt anyasya śarīra ādeḥ pāṣāṇa tulya tvena jīva tva ayogāt anubhūti pratipattyoḥ
sphuṭa tva asphuṭa tva kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ jñeyaḥ
padārthānām etad rūpa tvam eva kathayati

original: sa eva saṃvit sa punar ahaṃtāpratyayātmakaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva saṃvid sa punar ahaṃtā pratyaya ātmakaḥ

original: sa yayodeti saṃvittyā sā padārtha iti smṛtā // MU_2,19.19
analyzed: sa yayā udeti saṃvittyā sā padārthaḥ iti smṛtā
saḥ eva avaroha avasthāyām ahaṃtā pratyaya ātmakaḥ bhavati
yayā saṃvittyā yena ghaṭa ādi saṃvedanena rūpeṇa

original: na hi padārthasya saṃvittivyatirekeṇa pṛthaksvarūpam asti /
analyzed: na hi padārthasya saṃvitti vyatirekeṇa pṛthak svarūpam asti

original: na hi saṃvittiṃ vinā sat sat bhavati //
analyzed: na hi saṃvittim vinā sat sat bhavati
sa saṃkalpa vikalpa ādyaiḥ kṛta nānā kramaḥ bhramaiḥ

original: jagattayā sphuraty ambu taraṅgāditayā yathā // MU_2,19.20
analyzed: jagat tayā sphurati ambu taraṅga ādi tayā yathā
saṃkalpa vikalpa ādyaiḥ saṃkalpa vikalpa prabhṛtibhiḥ pramātṛ niṣṭaiḥ viparyaya jñānaiḥ

original: yathā tat taraṅgāditayā sphurati tathety arthaḥ // (MT_2,19.20)
analyzed: yathā tat taraṅga ādi tayā sphurati tathā iti arthaḥ

original: nanu śuddhasya vedanasya katham evaṃrūpatā sampannety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu śuddhasya vedanasya katham evaṃrūpa tā sampannā iti atra āha
prāk akāraṇam eva āśu sarga ādau sarga līlayā

original: sphuritvā kāraṇībhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svayam ātmani // MU_2,19.21

analyzed: sarga ādau sarga unmukha tā samaye

original: na ca svātantryakṛte katham iti paryanuyogaḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na ca svātantrya kṛte katham iti paryanuyogaḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu vedanarūpasya jīvasya kāraṇatvaṃ kiṃrūpam astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu vedana rūpasya jīvasya kāraṇa tvam kiṃrūpam asti iti atra āha
kāraṇa tvam jīvasya asat api sthitam

original: sad ivāsyāṃ jagadrūpasampattau vyaktim āgatam // MU_2,19.22
analyzed: sat iva asyām jagat rūpa sampattau vyaktim āgatam
asat api paramārthataḥ asat svarūpam api

original: nanu punar api kiṃ tasya jīvasya kāraṇatvaṃ naśyaty atha vā nety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu punar api kim tasya jīvasya kāraṇa tvam naśyati atha vā na iti atra āha

original: svayam eva vicāras tu sanañarthaṃ svakaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: svayam eva vicāraḥ tu sa nañ artham svakam vapuḥ

original: nāśayitvā karoty āśu pratyakṣaṃ paramaṃ padam // MU_2,19.23
analyzed: nāśayitvā karoti āśu pratyakṣam paramam padam
svayam eva vicāraḥ sa nañ artham sva abhāva yuktam
svakam vapuḥ nija vicāra ākhyam svarūpam nāśayitvā

original: punar api jīvasya kāraṇatvaṃ naśyatīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,19.23)
analyzed: punar api jīvasya kāraṇa tvam naśyati iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu vicāraḥ kathaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ pratyakṣīkarotīty apekṣāyām āha
analyzed: nanu vicāraḥ katham paramam padam pratyakṣīkaroti iti apekṣāyām āha
vicārayan vicāraḥ pi na ātmānam adhigacchati

original: yadā tadā nirullekhaṃ param evāvaśiṣyate // MU_2,19.24
analyzed: yadā tadā nirullekham param eva avaśiṣyate
ātmānam vicārayan kiṃrūpaḥ ham iti vimarśa viṣayīkurvan

original: yadā ātmānaṃ nādhigacchati na kiṃcidrūpatvāt na labhate /
analyzed: yadā ātmānam na adhigacchati na kiṃcid rūpa tvāt na labhate
param padam śuddha cit mātra ākhya śreṣṭham svarūpam
eva avatiṣṭhate vicāraṇīya abhāvāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanu puruṣa etasyām avasthāyāṃ buddhīndriyakarmāṇi karoti na vety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu puruṣaḥ etasyām avasthāyām buddhīndriya karmāṇi karoti na vā iti atra āha
manasi anīhite śānte taiḥ buddhīndriya karmabhiḥ

original: neha kaiścit kṛtair artho nākṛtair apy abhāvanāt // MU_2,19.25
analyzed: na iha kaiścid kṛtaiḥ arthaḥ na akṛtaiḥ api abhāvanāt

original: nanu tadā karmendriyāṇāṃ kā vārtety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tadā karmendriyāṇām kā vārttā iti atra āha

original: manasy anīhite śānte na pravartanta eva te /
analyzed: manasi anīhite śānte na pravartante eva te
karmendriyāṇi karma ādau asaṃcārita yantra vat

original: karmendriyāṇāṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ pravartanam eva nāsti /
analyzed: karmendriyāṇām tasyām avasthāyām pravartanam eva na asti

original: kā vārtā tatkarmaṇāṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: kā vārtā tad karmaṇām syāt iti bhāvaḥ
etādṛśī ca avasthā jīvanmuktānām durlabhā eva

original: / na hi sarvadā te atraiva tiṣṭhanti /
analyzed: na hi sarvadā te atra eva tiṣṭhanti

original: videhamuktās tu sarvadā etanmayā evety alaṃ bahunā //
analyzed: videha muktāḥ tu sarvadā etad mayāḥ eva iti alam bahunā
vedana rūpa vicāra śāntyā eva manaḥ śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati iti abhiprāyeṇa āha
manaḥ yantrasya calane kāraṇam vedanam viduḥ

original: prāṇālī dārumeṣasya rajjur antargatā yathā // MU_2,19.27
analyzed: prāṇālī dāru meṣasya rajjuḥ antargatā yathā

original: paṇḍitāḥ manomantrasya calane vedanam eva kāraṇaṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: paṇḍitāḥ manaḥ mantrasya calane vedanam eva kāraṇam viduḥ
vedanā anantaram eva hi manaḥ calati

original: prāṇālī asya manasaḥ antargatā rajjuḥ bhavati /
analyzed: prāṇālī asya manasaḥ antargatā rajjuḥ bhavati
iti vedanasya eva manaḥ pravṛttau kāraṇa tvāt
nanu bhavatu vedana śāntyā manaḥ śāntiḥ

original: vedanakṣobhena manasaḥ kṣobhe sati jagat kuto
analyzed: vedana kṣobhena manasaḥ kṣobhe sati jagat kutas
rūpa āloka manaskāra padārtha ādi ākulam jagat

original: vidyate vedanasyāntar vāte 'ntaḥ spandanaṃ yathā // MU_2,19.28
analyzed: vidyate vedanasya antar vāte ntar spandanam yathā

original: ato vedanād eva rūpādirūpam jagan niryātīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,19.28)
analyzed: atas vedanāt eva rūpa ādi rūpam jagat niryāti iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu svabhāvataḥ śuddhasya vedanasyāntaḥ katham etad astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu svabhāvataḥ śuddhasya vedanasya antaḥ katham etat asti iti atra āha
sarva ātma vedanam śuddham yathā udeti tad ātmakam
bhāti prasṛta diś kāla bāhya anta a rūpa dehakam
śuddham kena api rūpeṇa a pariniṣṭhitam

original: ata eva sarvātmavedanam yathodeti tadātmakaṃ bhāti sphurati /
analyzed: atas eva sarva ātma vedanam yathā udeti tad ātmakam bhāti sphurati

original: na tu tanmadhye malam iva jagad astīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tu tad madhye malam iva jagat asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: dik kālaś ca bāhyaṃ cāntaś ca /
analyzed: diś kālaḥ ca bāhyam ca antar ca
diś ādi rūpaḥ dehaḥ svarūpam yasya
diś ādi dihaḥ svarūpam yasya ak ādi

original: punaḥ punaḥ ślokāntareṇa tad eva pratipādayati
analyzed: punar punar śloka antareṇa tat eva pratipādayati

original: draṣṭaiva dṛśyatābhāsaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ dhārayan sthitaḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭā eva dṛśya tā ābhāsam svam rūpam dhārayan sthitaḥ

original: svaṃ yathā tatra yad rūpaṃ pratibhāti tathaiva tat // MU_2,19.30
analyzed: svam yathā tatra yat rūpam pratibhāti tathā eva tat
draṣṭā eva vedana svarūpaḥ draṣṭā eva

original: iti tādṛśaṃ svarūpaṃ dhārayan sthitaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: iti tādṛśam svarūpam dhārayan sthitaḥ bhavati

original: tasya draṣṭuḥ svaṃ rūpaṃ yathā bhāti sphurati /
analyzed: tasya draṣṭuḥ svam rūpam yathā bhāti sphurati
na anyathā svapna vat iti śeṣaḥ

original: sarvam ātmā yathā yatra saṃkalpatvam ivāgataḥ /
analyzed: sarvam ātmā yathā yatra saṃkalpa tvam iva āgataḥ

original: tiṣṭhaty āśu tathā tatra tadrūpa iva rājate // MU_2,19.31
analyzed: tiṣṭhati āśu tathā tatra tad rūpaḥ iva rājate

original: ataḥ sa ātmā yatra yathā tiṣṭhati tatra tathā tadrūpa iva rājate /
analyzed: atas saḥ ātmā yatra yathā tiṣṭhati tatra tathā tad rūpaḥ iva rājate
svarūpe tathā eva sthita tvāt iti iva śabda upādānam

original: gata ivānyathā nānārūpatvam asya na yujyeteti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: gataḥ iva anyathā nānā rūpa tvam asya na yujyeta iti bhāvaḥ
sarva ātmaka tayā draṣṭuḥ dṛśya tvam iva yujyate

original: draṣṭṛtvaṃ draṣṭṛsadbhāve dṛśyasya tv asti nāsataḥ // MU_2,19.32
analyzed: draṣṭṛ tvam draṣṭṛ sadbhāve dṛśyasya tu asti na asataḥ
draṣṭuḥ sarva ātmaka tayā śuddha tayā sthitena sarva bhāvena

original: paramārthatas tu na yujyate draṣṭṛtvād apracyuter itīvaśabdopādānaṃ /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu na yujyate draṣṭṛ tvāt apracyuteḥ iti iva śabda upādānam
draṣṭṛ tayā sambhāvite svasmin sva apekṣa tvena ātma āśraya āpatteḥ
akāraṇakam eva atas brahma kalpam idam sthitam

original: pratyakṣam eva nirmātṛ tasyāṃśās tv anupādhayaḥ // MU_2,19.33
analyzed: pratyakṣam eva nirmātṛ tasya aṃśāḥ tu an upādhayaḥ

original: ataḥ akāraṇakam paramārthataḥ śuddhasya brahmaṇaḥ akartṛkatvāt kāraṇarahitam /
analyzed: atas akāraṇakam paramārthataḥ śuddhasya brahmaṇaḥ akartṛka tvāt kāraṇa rahitam
nirmātṛ pramātṛ rahitam śuddhasya brahmaṇaḥ mātṛ tā yogāt
tad aṃśānām tu tat bhavatu iti
aṃśāḥ anupādhayaḥ kāraṇa tva ādi rūpa upādhi rahitāḥ bhavanti
anyathā tad dvāreṇa tasya api sopādhi tva prasaṅgāt
evam prāsaṅgi tvam parityajya prakṛtam eva anusarati

original: svayatnamātretararūpako yas tad daivaśabdārtham apāsya dūre /
analyzed: sva yatna mātra itara rūpakaḥ yaḥ tat daiva śabda artham apāsya dūre

original: śūreṇa sādho padam uttamaṃ tat svapauruṣeṇaiva hi labhyate 'ntaḥ // MU_2,19.34
analyzed: śūreṇa sādho padam uttamam tat sva pauruṣeṇa eva hi labhyate ntar
yaḥ sva yatna mātrakāt itara rūpakaḥ itara rūpa tvena kalpitaḥ
tat daiva śabda artham dūre apāsya

original: śūreṇa tat uttamaṃ padaṃ antaḥ svapauruṣeṇa mānasikena pauruṣeṇa / labhyate // (MT_2,19.34)
analyzed: śūreṇa tat uttamam padam antar sva pauruṣeṇa mānasikena pauruṣeṇa labhyate  /
vicāraya ācārya paramparāṇām matena satyena sitena tāvat

original: yāvad viśuddhāṃ svayam eva buddhām anantarūpāṃ paratām upaiṣi // MU_2,19.35
analyzed: yāvat viśuddhām svayam eva buddhām ananta rūpām para tām upaiṣi
yāvat para tām uttīrṇa cit rūpa tām upaiṣi
viśuddhām ca iti ākhya mala rahitām
ananta rūpām aparicchinna svarūpām iti śivam
iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu prakaraṇe ekonaviṃśaḥ
ārya saṃgama yukti ādau prajñām vṛddhim nayet balāt
puruṣaḥ ādau ārya saṃgama yuktyā sādhu saṃga ākhyena upāyena
buddhim vṛddhim viveka kṣama tvam nayet
tatas buddhyā asādhitaiḥ mahāpuruṣa lakṣaṇaiḥ mahāpuruṣa tā bhavet

original: nanu mahāpuruṣaguṇair vinā mahāpuruṣatā kathaṃ sidhyatīty apekṣāyāṃ tadguṇāharaṇam eva kartavyatvena kathayati
analyzed: nanu mahāpuruṣa guṇaiḥ vinā mahāpuruṣa tā katham sidhyati iti apekṣāyām tad guṇa āharaṇam eva kartavya tvena kathayati

original: yo yo yena guṇeneha puruṣaḥ pravirājate /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ yena guṇena iha puruṣaḥ pravirājate

original: śikṣeta taṃ tam evāśu tasmād buddhivivṛddhaye // MU_2,20.2
analyzed: śikṣeta tam tam eva āśu tasmāt buddhi vivṛddhaye
ārya saṃgama yuktyā vivṛddhayā buddhyā iti arthaḥ
katham para guṇa grahaṇa sāmarthyam syāt

original: nanu tarhi guṇagrahaṇaṃ suṣamam eveti mahāpuruṣatāpi susādhyaiva syād / ity atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi guṇa grahaṇam suṣamam eva iti mahāpuruṣa tā api su sādhyā eva syāt iti atra āha
eva iti su śṣamam eva iti
mahā puruṣa tā tu eṣā śama ādi guṇa śālinī

original: samyagjñānaṃ vinā rāma siddhim eti na kasyacit // MU_2,20.3
analyzed: samyak jñānam vinā rāma siddhim eti na kasyacid

original: ataḥ samyagjñānam evāryasaṃgamayuktyā prathamaṃ sādhyam iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_2,20.3)
analyzed: atas samyak jñānam eva ārya saṃgama yuktyā prathamam sādhyam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu samyak jñānena kim setsyati iti atra āha
jñānāt śama ādayaḥ yānti vṛddhim sat puruṣa kramāt

original: ślāghanīyāḥ phalenāntar vṛṣṭer iva navāṅkurāḥ // MU_2,20.4
analyzed: ślāghanīyāḥ phalena antar vṛṣṭeḥ iva nava aṅkurāḥ

original: nanu śamādibhir api kiṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha
analyzed: nanu śama ādibhiḥ api kim syāt iti apekṣāyām āha

original: śamādibhyo guṇebhyaś ca vardhate jñānam uttamam /
analyzed: śama ādibhyaḥ guṇebhyaḥ ca vardhate jñānam uttamam
anna ātmakebhyaḥ yajñebhyaḥ śāli vṛṣṭiḥ iva uttamā
uttamam paramātma viṣaya tvena sarvebhyaḥ jñānebhyaḥ śreṣṭham

original: guṇāḥ śamādayo jñānāc chamādibhyas tathā jñatā /
analyzed: guṇāḥ śama ādayaḥ jñānāt śama ādibhyaḥ tathā jña tā
parasparam vivardhete ete bda sarasī yathā
jñānam sat puruṣa ācārāt jñānāt sat puruṣa kramaḥ
parasparam gatau vṛddhim jñāna sat puruṣa kramau
sat puruṣa ācārāt śama ādeḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu jñānaśamayoḥ saṃpattau puruṣasya kena yatnenottamapadaprāptir bhavatīty / atra
analyzed: nanu jñāna śamayoḥ saṃpattau puruṣasya kena yatnena uttama pada prāptiḥ bhavati iti atra
yathā kamala rakṣiṇyā gītyā vitata tārayā
jñāna sat puruṣa ihābhyām akartrā kartṛ rūpiṇā

original: tathā puṃsā niricchena samam āsādyate padam // MU_2,20.9
analyzed: tathā puṃsā niricchena samam āsādyate padam

original: vitatā cāsau tārā ceti tādṛśyā gītyā karaṇabhūtayā /
analyzed: vitatā ca asau tārā ca iti tādṛśyā gītyā karaṇa bhūtayā
na hi tasyāḥ tatra yatnaḥ u sti
gīti mātreṇa eva gīta ānanda khaga utsādayoḥ siddha tvāt

original: mṛgāṇāṃ hi ayaṃ svabhāva eṣa yat gītiṃ śrutvā bhakṣyam api tyajantīti /
analyzed: mṛgāṇām hi ayam svabhāvaḥ eṣa yat gītim śrutvā bhakṣyam api tyajanti iti

original: karteti niścayāt kartṛtvaleparahitena kartṛrūpiṇā kartṛvad bhāsamāneneti yāvat /
analyzed: kartā iti niścayāt kartṛ tva lepa rahitena kartṛ rūpiṇā kartṛ vat bhāsamānena iti yāvat
jñāna sat puruṣa īhābhyām jñāna śama ādibhyām karaṇābhyām
jñānam śama ādikam ca iti etad mātrakam eva atra upāyaḥ
niricchena jñāna śama ādi pūrṇa tayā pada prāptau api icchā rahitena
anyathā icchā rūpasya kṣobhasya sthita tvāt
pūrṇa tā na syāt iti bhāvaḥ
mumukṣu vyavahāra prakaraṇa abhidheyam vastu upasaṃharati
sat ācāra kramaḥ proktaḥ mayā eṣa raghunandana
tathā upadiśyate samyak ayam jñāna kramaḥ dhunā

original: proktaḥ etadyuktasyaiva vakṣyamāṇe jñānakrame 'dhikāritvād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: proktaḥ etad yuktasya eva vakṣyamāṇe jñāna krame dhikāri tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
idam yaśasyam āyuṣyam puruṣa artha phala pradam

original: tajjñād āptātmaśāstrārthāc chrotavyaṃ kila dhīmatā // MU_2,20.11
analyzed: tad jñāt āpta ātma śāstra arthāt śrotavyam kila dhīmatā

original: bāhyadṛṣṭīn saṃmukhīkartum iti āyuṣyam iti ca idaṃ mumukṣuvyavahārākhyaṃ prakaraṇam /
analyzed: bāhya dṛṣṭīn saṃmukhīkartum iti āyuṣyam iti ca idam mumukṣu vyavahāra ākhyam prakaraṇam

original: nanv etacchravaṇena kiṃ syād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu etad śravaṇena kim syāt iti atra āha

original: śrutvā tu buddhinairmalyād balād yāsyasi satpadam /
analyzed: śrutvā tu buddhi nairmalyāt balāt yāsyasi sat padam

original: yathā katakasaṃśleṣāt prasādam avaśam payaḥ // MU_2,20.12
analyzed: yathā kataka saṃśleṣāt prasādam avaśam payaḥ

original: nanu katham etacchravaṇena puruṣaḥ satpadaṃ yātīty /
analyzed: nanu katham etad śravaṇena puruṣaḥ sat padam yāti iti
atra sarga anta ślokena uttaram kathayati

original: viditavedyam idaṃ hi mano mune vivaśam eva hi yāti paraṃ padam /
analyzed: vidita vedyam idam hi manaḥ mune vivaśam eva hi yāti param padam

original: yad avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamaṃ tad avabodhadaśāṃ na jahāti hi // MU_2,20.13
analyzed: yat avabuddham akhaṇḍitam uttamam tat avabodha daśām na jahāti hi
he mune muni karma anvita tvāt muni rūpa śrī rāma

original: viditavedyaṃ manaḥ vivaśam eva paraṃ padaṃ yāti /
analyzed: vidita vedyam manaḥ vivaśam eva param padam yāti

original: ato viditavedyatvakāriṇaḥ etacchāstraśravaṇāt satpadaprāptir yuktaiveti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas vidita vedya tva kāriṇaḥ etad śāstra śravaṇāt sat pada prāptiḥ yuktā eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu viditavedyam api manaḥ yadi kadācid viditavedyatāṃ jahāti tadā kiṃ kāryam /
analyzed: nanu vidita vedyam api manaḥ yadi kadācid vidita vedya tām jahāti tadā kim kāryam

original: manasā yat uttamaṃ na tv adharaṃ bhogarūpaṃ vastu /
analyzed: manasā yat uttamam na tu adharam bhoga rūpam vastu
tad avabodha daśām tasya uttamasya vastunaḥ

original: viditavedyo hi kadācid api viditavedyatāṃ na jahātīti tātparyam /
analyzed: vidita vedyaḥ hi kadācid api vidita vedya tām na jahāti iti tātparyam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ mumukṣuprakaraṇe viṃśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣuprakaraṇe viṃśaḥ sargaḥ
śrotṝṇām bhāvanā āveśa satkṛta svānta śālinām
yat śakti āveśa vaśataḥ sāmarthyam kārya gocaram
bhāvānām astu yatnaḥ yam tad kārya tvena niścitaḥ
mumukṣu vyavahāraḥ yam sphuratāt mama mānase
iti śrī kāśmīra maṇḍala antarvarti ārādhya pāda mahā māheśvara vaiḍūryakaṇṭha ātmaja śrīmat avatārakaṇṭha putra śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām
śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām mumukṣu vyavahāra prakaraṇam samāptam iti śivam

original: kṛtvā cittaṃ svabodhasmaraṇavinihataṃ prauḍhamohāndhakāraṃ smṛtvā jñānapradāṃ tāṃ sumahitavibhavāṃ śrīguroḥ pādukāṃ ca /
analyzed: kṛtvā cittam sva bodha smaraṇa vinihatam prauḍha moha andhakāram smṛtvā jñāna pradām tām su mahita vibhavām śrī guroḥ pādukām ca

original: dhyātvā vighnāntakaṃ taṃ śivasutam anaghaṃ śrīgaṇeśaṃ sureśam utpattyākhyāvagāhiprakaraṇavivṛtis tanyate bhāskareṇa //
analyzed: dhyātvā vighna antakam tam śivasutam anagham śrī gaṇeśam sureśam utpatti ākhyā avagāhi prakaraṇa vivṛtiḥ tanyate bhāskareṇa

original: evaṃ mumukṣuvyavahārākhye prakaraṇe vakṣyamāṇopadeśādhikāritvasampādananimittaṃ vyavahāraṃ pratipādya tacchravaṇamātreṇa ca śrīrāmaṃ prāptatadanuṣṭhānaphalaṃ  #
analyzed: evam mumukṣuvyavahāra ākhye prakaraṇe vakṣyamāṇa upadeśa adhikāri tva sampādana nimittam vyavahāram pratipādya tad śravaṇa mātreṇa ca śrī rāmam prāpta tad anuṣṭhāna phalam
vibhāvya prapañcasya anutpatti sa tattva utpatti jñānam upādeya bhūta mokṣa prāptau mūla kāraṇa tayā niścitya

original: tadupapādakam utpattiprakaraṇam ārabhamāṇaḥ vakṣyamāṇabrahmaikatvāśrayaṇena guruśiṣyabhāvānupapattiṃ puraskṛtya svavyatiriktaśiṣyopadeśabhāvena  #
analyzed: tad upapādakam utpatti prakaraṇam ārabhamāṇaḥ vakṣyamāṇa brahma ekatva āśrayaṇena guru śiṣya bhāva anupapattim puraskṛtya sva vyatirikta śiṣya upadeśa bhāvena

original: paraprayuktaṃ codyam abhiśaṅkamānaḥ taduddhāranimittabhūtaṃ brahmaikatve 'pi svapnadṛṣṭāntena
analyzed: para prayuktam codyam abhiśaṅkamānaḥ tad uddhāra nimitta bhūtam brahma ekatve svapna dṛṣṭāntena
padārtha bheda grāhakam brahma vid anubhavam prathamam kathayati
vakṣyamāṇa upadeśa adhikāri tva sampādana nimittam
sva vyatirikta śiṣya upadeśa bhāvena deśa bhāvena

original: vāgbhābhir brahmavid brahma bhāti svapna ivātmani /
analyzed: vāc bhābhiḥ brahma vid brahma bhāti svapne iva ātmani

original: yad-idaṃ-tat-sva-śabdārthair yo yad vetti sa vettu tat // MU_3,1.1
analyzed: yat idam tat sva śabda arthaiḥ yaḥ yat vetti sa vettu tat
uttara vākya stham vetti iti padam pūrva vākye yojanīyam

original: kim iti karmāpekṣāyāṃ paśya mṛgo dhāvatītivat vākyaṃ karmatvena kathayati
analyzed: kim iti karma apekṣāyām paśya mṛgaḥ dhāvati iti vat vākyam karma tvena kathayati

original: brahma nānāpadārthabhāvena bṛṃhitaṃ kim api sūkṣmaṃ vastu /
analyzed: brahma nānā padārtha bhāvena bṛṃhitam kim api sūkṣmam vastu
yat idam tat sva śabda arthaiḥ
yad ādi sarvanāma śabda vācya bhūtaiḥ padārthaiḥ
padārthānām ca yad ādi sarvanāma vācya tvam vastu upalakṣaṇam

original: yatra sarvanāma prayujyate dravyam ity ucyate /
analyzed: yatra sarvanāma prayujyate dravyam iti ucyate
saḥ rthaḥ bhedya tvena vivakṣitaḥ iti abhiyukta smaraṇāt

original: idaṃ bhānaṃ ca arthāt jāgratkālīnaṃ jñeyam /
analyzed: idam bhānam ca arthāt jāgrat kālīnam jñeyam
svapnasya dṛṣṭānta tayā upādānāt suṣupteḥ śūnya mātra bhāna āspada tvāt ca
yat idam tat sva śabda arthaiḥ kābhiḥ
vāc atra samāna viṣaya tvena vikalpaḥ abhipretaḥ
tena vikalpa bhāna rūpaiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: / bhāsamānā ete padārthāḥ hi svapnapadārthavat vikalparūpā eva /
analyzed: bhāsamānāḥ ete padārthāḥ hi svapna padārtha vat vikalpa rūpāḥ eva
śuddha cit mātrasya eva vastutas artha tvāt
yat idam tat sva śabda arthaiḥ bhāti

original: svapne hi ātmabhāvena sthitasya brahmaṇaḥ padārthabhāvena bhānaṃ sarvasākṣikam eva /
analyzed: svapne hi ātma bhāvena sthitasya brahmaṇaḥ padārtha bhāvena bhānam sarva sākṣikam eva

original: tat kathaṃ tvayaivam uktam ity āha yo yad iti /
analyzed: tat katham tvayā evam uktam iti āha yaḥ yat iti

original: yaḥ yaḥ kaścit brahmavidaḥ bauddhādiḥ yat yat padārthānāṃ sarvathā asattvādi
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ kaścid brahma vidaḥ bauddha ādiḥ yat yat padārthānām sarvathā asattva ādi

original: atra ca yacchabdaḥ idamāditrayeṇa saha samānādhikaraṇyadarśanāt sāmānyaniṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca yad śabdaḥ idam ādi trayeṇa saha samāna adhikaraṇya darśanāt sāmānya niṣṭhaḥ
śiṣṭāḥ idam ādayaḥ trayaḥ viśeṣa niṣṭhāḥ

original: tatrāpi idaṃśabdaḥ pratyakṣavedyaniṣṭhaḥ iti sarvanāmacatuṣkenaiva sarvapadārthākṣepasiddhāv anupayuktatvād
analyzed: tatra api idam śabdaḥ pratyakṣa vedya niṣṭhaḥ iti sarva nāma catuṣkena eva sarva padārtha ākṣepa siddhau anupayukta tvāt

original: atha vā brahmavid ity āmantraṇapadaṃ brahmajñānādhikṛte śrīrāme viśiṣṭādhikāritvasūcanāya prayuktaṃ
analyzed: atha vā brahma vid iti āmantraṇa padam brahma jñāna adhikṛte śrī rāme viśiṣṭa adhikāri tva sūcanāya prayuktam
nā api duryojaka tva ākhya doṣa āpattiḥ
uttara vākya stham uttara vākya stham
prokta brahma vid anubhava āśrayaṇena śaṅkā viṣayīkṛtam para prayuktam codyam pariharati
nyāyena anena sarvasmin sarge brahma ambare sati

original: kim idaṃ kasya vakṣīti codyacañcur nirākṛtaḥ // MU_3,1.2
analyzed: kim idam kasya vakṣi iti codya cañcuḥ nirākṛtaḥ

original: anena nyāyena anayā padārthānāṃ brahmamayatve 'pi bhedasādhikayā brahmavidanubhavarūpayā yuktyā
analyzed: anena nyāyena anayā padārthānām brahma maya tve pi bheda sādhikayā brahma vid anubhava rūpayā yuktyā
na tu padārthānām sarvathā apahnava kāriṇyā bauddha ādi yuktyā
sarge sṛji kriyā karmaṇi bhāva jāte

original: tvam kim idaṃ kiṃrūpam idaṃ śāstraṃ /
analyzed: tvam kim idam kiṃrūpam idam śāstram

original: paramārthena brahmaikatve 'pi vyavahāradaśāyāṃ svapnatulyasya śiṣyasya yādṛśo yakṣaḥ
analyzed: paramārthena brahma ekatve vyavahāra daśāyām svapna tulyasya śiṣyasya yādṛśaḥ yakṣaḥ

original: tādṛśo balir iti nyāyāśrayaṇena tadrūpopadeśakaraṇaṃ yuktam eva svapnatulyasya jagataḥ
analyzed: tādṛśaḥ baliḥ iti nyāya āśrayaṇena tad rūpa upadeśa karaṇam yuktam eva svapna tulyasya jagataḥ

original: sarvathā padārthāpahnavakāriṇāṃ bauddhādīnām evedaṃ codyaṃ yuktam iti //
analyzed: sarvathā padārtha apahnava kāriṇām bauddha ādīnām evā idam codyam yuktam iti

original: evaṃ śaṅkitacodyanirāsaṃ kṛtvā svopadeśaṃ prati śrotṝn saṃmukhīkaroti
analyzed: evam śaṅkita codya nirāsam kṛtvā sva upadeśam prati śrotṝn saṃmukhīkaroti

original: yathāsvabhāvaṃ vacmīdaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrūyatāṃ budhāḥ // MU_3,1.3
analyzed: yathāsvabhāvam vacmi idam tat sarvam śrūyatām budhāḥ
jñāna ādayaḥ catvāraḥ eva hi śāstra pravṛtti nimitta bhūtāḥ

original: budhā ity āmantraṇapadaṃ budhānām evaitacchāstraśravaṇe adhikāritvaṃ sūcayati /
analyzed: budhāḥ iti āmantraṇa padam budhānām eva etad śāstra śravaṇe adhikāri tvam sūcayati

original: sarvam ity anena sakalam idaṃ śrutvā paramaprayojanāvāptiḥ bhaviṣyatīty ardhād utthāya na
analyzed: sarvam iti anena sakalam idam śrutvā parama prayojana avāptiḥ bhaviṣyati iti ardhāt utthāya na

original: evaṃ śravaṇayogyaṃ budhavargaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtyotpattiprakaraṇatātparyārthaṃ ślokena saṅgṛhya
analyzed: evam śravaṇa yogyam budha vargam saṃmukhīkṛtya utpatti prakaraṇa tātparya artham ślokena saṅgṛhya
svapna vat paśyati jagat cit nabhaḥ deha vid mayam
svapna saṃsāra dṛṣṭāntāḥ iha eva antar samanvitāḥ

original: cetayati pāṣāṇaprakhyaṃ karaṇavargaṃ svāveśena cetanakriyākartṛtve prerayatīti cit sarvāntargataṃ kim api śuddhaṃ tattvaṃ /
analyzed: cetayati pāṣāṇa prakhyam karaṇa vargam sva āveśena cetana kriyā kartṛ tve prerayati iti cit sarva antargatam kim api śuddham tattvam

original: atha vā cetatīti cit citikriyākartṛbhūtaṃ kim api tattvam /
analyzed: atha vā cetati iti cit citi kriyā kartṛ bhūtam kim api tattvam
sā eva nabhaḥ sarva vyāpaka tvāt ākāśam

original: svapnavat paśyati svapnavat svayaṃ kalpayitvā anubhavati /
analyzed: svapna vat paśyati svapna vat svayam kalpayitvā anubhavati
deha vid dehaḥ ham iti jñānam
tasya vikāraḥ dehavid mayam ahaṅkāra svarūpam
nanu svapnaḥ kim iha dṛṣṭānta tvena
datte iti atra āha svapna iti
te svapna saṃsāra dṛṣṭāntāḥ iha eva asmin jāgrat prapañce eva antar

original: saṅgraheṇoktam arthaṃ mūḍhabuddhiṣu praveśanāya svataḥ sarvajñaṃ śrīrāmaṃ madhyekṛtya
analyzed: saṅgraheṇa uktam artham mūḍha buddhiṣu praveśanāya svatas sarvajñam śrī rāmam madhyekṛtya
atha utpatti prakaraṇam mayā idam parikathyate
mumukṣu vyavahārasya uktiḥ prācuryeṇa prastutā yasmin
mumukṣu vyavahāra ākhyāt prakaraṇāt iti yāvat
bandhaḥ yam dṛśya sadbhāvaḥ dṛśya abhāve na bandhanam

original: na sambhavati dṛśyaṃ tu yathedaṃ tac chṛṇu kramāt // MU_3,1.6
analyzed: na sambhavati dṛśyam tu yathā idam tat śṛṇu kramāt
dṛśya sadbhāvaḥ dṛśyena dṛśi kriyā viṣayeṇa bhāva jātena
na hi rajju abhāve bandhanam dṛṣṭam

original: tuśabdaḥ sambhavinaḥ śuddhadraṣṭuḥ sakāśāt dṛśyasya vyatirekadyotakaḥ /
analyzed: tuśabdaḥ sambhavinaḥ śuddha draṣṭuḥ sakāśāt dṛśyasya vyatireka dyotakaḥ

original: dṛśyaṃ na sambhavati sambhavanakriyākartṛtvaṃ na bhajati /
analyzed: dṛśyam na sambhavati sambhavana kriyā kartṛ tvam na bhajati
svapna nyāyena pratīti mātra siddha tvāt nanu

original: nanu kimartham utpattiprakaraṇam eva prathamaṃ kathayasīty apekṣāyām āha
analyzed: nanu kimartham utpatti prakaraṇam eva prathamam kathayasi iti apekṣāyām āha

original: utpadyate yo jagati sa eva kila vardhate /
analyzed: utpadyate yaḥ jagati saḥ eva kila vardhate

original: sa eva mokṣam āpnoti svargaṃ vā narakaṃ ca vā // MU_3,1.7
analyzed: saḥ eva mokṣam āpnoti svargam vā narakam ca vā
nanu tatas kim iti atra āha

original: atas teṣv avabodhārthaṃ tat tāvat kathayāmy aham /
analyzed: atas teṣu avabodha artham tat tāvat kathayāmi aham

original: utpattiṃ saṃsṛtāv eti pūrvam eva hi yo yathā // MU_3,1.8
analyzed: utpattim saṃsṛtau eti pūrvam eva hi yaḥ yathā
yatas utpatti ādīnām eka adhikaraṇa tvam asti
atas teṣu krama bhāviṣu utpatti ādiṣu madhye

original: utpattim eti brahmaṇaḥ vyatiriktatvena sattāṃ bhajati /
analyzed: utpattim eti brahmaṇaḥ vyatirikta tvena sattām bhajati
tatas nantaram sthiti prakaraṇa ādau vardhana ādikam

original: ata evāsya prakaraṇasyotpattiprakaraṇam iti nāmāpi bhavatīti jñeyam //
analyzed: atas eva asya prakaraṇasya utpatti prakaraṇam iti nāma api bhavati iti jñeyam

original: ava°: Tilgung eines ursprünglichen Explicans tava eines te der Mūla- (MT_3,1.8)
analyzed: ava tilgung eines ursprnglichen explacans tava eines te der mūla

original: idaṃ prakaraṇārthaṃ tvaṃ saṅkṣepāc chṛṇu rāghava /
analyzed: idam prakaraṇa artham tvam saṅkṣepāt śṛṇu rāghava

original: tataḥ prakathayiṣyāmi vistaraṃ te yathepsitam // MU_3,1.9
analyzed: tatas prakathayiṣyāmi vistaram te yathā īpsitam
he rāghava tvam idam jagat utpatti rūpam
yathā īpsitam īpsita anusāri vistaram kathayiṣyāmi

original: saṅkṣepakathanena vinā tvatsandehānutthānāt vistareṇa kathanaṃ na sambhavati /
analyzed: saṅkṣepa kathanena vinā tvad sandeha anutthānāt vistareṇa kathanam na sambhavati
sandeha viṣaya tvāt vistarasya iti bhāvaḥ

original: pratijñātāṃ saṅkṣepataḥ jagadutpattiṃ kathayiṣyan prapañcākrāntabuddheḥ śiṣyasya vidhimukhena
analyzed: pratijñātām saṅkṣepataḥ jagat utpattim kathayiṣyan prapañca ākrānta buddheḥ śiṣyasya vidhi mukhena

original: mūlakāraṇasvarūpakathanam ayuktaṃ jñātvā sthūṇānikhanananyāyam āśritya jagannāśamukhena
analyzed: mūla kāraṇa svarūpa kathanam ayuktam jñātvā sthūṇā nikhanana nyāyam āśritya jagat nāśa mukhena

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam / /
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate sarvam jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam

original: tat suṣupta iva svapnaḥ kalpānte pravinaśyati // MU_3,1.10
analyzed: tat suṣupte iva svapnaḥ kalpa ante pravinaśyati

original: tat kalpānte āntarārthavivakṣāyāṃ sarvadṛśyakṣayarūpāyāṃ turyāvasthāyāṃ viśeṣataḥ tadatītāvasthāyāṃ
analyzed: tat kalpa ante āntara artha vivakṣāyām sarva dṛśya kṣaya rūpāyām turya avasthāyām viśeṣataḥ tad atīta avasthāyām
ca bāhya artha vivakṣāyām tu kāla antara bhāvini pralaya kāle

original: pravinaśyati prakarṣeṇa saṃskārākhyāt mūlād ādhārād naśyati /
analyzed: pravinaśyati prakarṣeṇa saṃskāra ākhyāt mūlāt ādhārāt naśyati
mūla kāraṇa bhāvena avasthānāt adarśanam yāti

original: nanu suṣuptau jagato bījabhāvenāvasthānāt anyathā punarbhavāyogāt
analyzed: nanu suṣuptau jagataḥ bīja bhāvena avasthānāt anyathā punarbhava ayogāt
katham ayam upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ siddhi ati iti ced
staimitya ākhyasya sāmānya dharmasya ubhayatra api
avasthānāt sāmānya dharma mātra āśrayaṇena eva hi upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ uttiṣṭhati

original: yatsvarūpaprakaṭanārtham ayaṃ yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ tan mūlakāraṇaṃ śeṣatvena kathayati
analyzed: yad svarūpa prakaṭana artham ayam yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ tat mūlakāraṇam śeṣa tvena kathayati

original: tataḥ stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam /
analyzed: tatas stimita gambhīram na tejaḥ na tamaḥ tatam

original: anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ yat kiñcid avaśiṣyate // MU_3,1.11
analyzed: an ākhyam an abhivyaktam yat kiñcid avaśiṣyate

original: yat kiñcit kenāpi nāmnā vaktum aśākyaṃ kim api sūkṣmaṃ vastu /
analyzed: yat kiñcid kena api nāmnā vaktum aśākyam kim api sūkṣmam vastu

original: tasyāpi nāśe nāśopalabdhur abhāvena sampanno 'pi prapañcanāśaḥ
analyzed: tasya api nāśe nāśa upalabdhuḥ abhāvena prapañca nāśaḥ
asat kalpaḥ eva syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu nāmataḥ tad vastu kathaṃ noktam ity / atra
analyzed: nanu nāmataḥ tat vastu katham na uktam iti atra
viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum āha anākhyam iti

original: anākhyam ākhyākartṛtvena sthitatvāt ākhyākarmatāṃ netum aśakyam /
analyzed: anākhyam ākhyā kartṛ tvena sthita tvāt ākhyā karmatām netum aśakyam
nanu katham tat anākhyam asti iti
atra api viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum āha anabhivyaktam iti

original: bāhyāntaratvena sthitair indriyair apratyakṣīkṛtam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: bāhya antara tvena sthitaiḥ indriyaiḥ apratyakṣīkṛtam iti arthaḥ
bāhya antara indriya apratyakṣasya ca anākhya tvam
nanu anabhivyakta tvam api katham tasya asti iti

original: / atrāpi viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetum āha na tejo na tama iti /
analyzed: atra api viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum āha na tejaḥ na tamaḥ iti
andhakāraḥ tamaḥ tad vyatirikta svarūpam iti arthaḥ
tathā ca tasya anabhivyakta tvam eva

original: tathāpi śūnyatāpattim āśaṅkya viśeṣaṇam āha tatam iti /
analyzed: tathā api śūnyatā āpattim āśaṅkya viśeṣaṇam āha tatam iti
sarvatra prota sva rūpam iti arthaḥ

original: śūnyatve kathaṃ tatatvaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: śūnya tve katham tata tvam syāt iti bhāvaḥ
kena svarūpeṇa tasya prota tvam asti iti

original: stimitaṃ ca tat gambhīraṃ ceti stimitagambhīram /
analyzed: stimitam ca tat gambhīram ca iti stimita gambhīram
cit mātra rūpa tvena cetya bhāva rūpasya prasaraṇasya abhāvāt niḥspandam

original: nirālambanatvena svabhinnasyāvagāḍhuḥ abhāvāt duravagāhaṃ cety arthaḥ / ataś ca
analyzed: nirālambana tvena sva bhinnasya avagāḍhuḥ abhāvāt duravagāham ca iti arthaḥ atas ca
nirālamba śuddha cit mātra rūpa tayā protam asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: / param iti vakṣyamāṇanītyā tasya tattvasya prapañcodbhāvanaṃ prati sarvadaiva spando vartata eveti /
analyzed: param iti vakṣyamāṇa nītyā tasya tattvasya prapañca udbhāvanam prati sarvadā eva spandaḥ vartate eva iti

original: sthitasya tasyopalabdhiḥ kadāpi na sambhavaty eva /
analyzed: sthitasya tasya upalabdhiḥ kadāpi na sambhavati eva

original: tathāpi deśād deśāntaraṃ dūram ityādivakṣyamāṇanītyā madhyavṛttiṣu sadā tadupalabdhiḥ sambhavaty eveti na vimukhena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: tathā api deśāt deśa antaram dūram ityādi vakṣyamāṇa nītyā madhya vṛttiṣu sadā tad upalabdhiḥ sambhavati eva iti na vimukhena bhavitavyam
tu sarvadā tanmaya tvam api sambhavati
yatas asya cit mātra tattvasya īdṛśaḥ eva mahimā

original: bhavati / yat sarvadā viśvamayaṃ tad uttīrṇaṃ ca bhavatīti na kiñcid viruddham //
analyzed: bhavati yat sarvadā viśva mayam tat uttīrṇam ca bhavati iti na kiñcid viruddham

original: nanu yadi tat tattvam anākhyam asti tat kathaṃ budhaiḥ tasya tattvasya ṛtaṃ ātmetyādikāḥ sañjñāḥ kṛtāḥ ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi tat tattvam anākhyam asti tat katham budhaiḥ tasya tattvasya ṛtam ātmā ityādikāḥ sañjñāḥ kṛtāḥ iti atra āha

original: ṛtam ātmā paraṃ brahma satyam ityādikā budhaiḥ /
analyzed: ṛtam ātmā param brahma satyam iti ādikāḥ budhaiḥ

original: kalpitā vyavahārārthaṃ yasya sañjñā mahātmanaḥ // MU_3,1.12
analyzed: kalpitā vyavahāra artham yasya sañjñā mahātmanaḥ
vyavahāra artham śiṣya upadeśa ākhya vyavahāra sampādana artham

original: na tu kiñcit pravṛttinimittam upādāya ṛtādikāḥ sañjñāḥ tatra pravartante iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,1.12)
analyzed: na tu kiñcid pravṛtti nimittam upādāya ṛta ādikāḥ sañjñāḥ tatra pravartante iti bhāvaḥ

original: sa tathābhūta evātmā svayam anya ivollasan /
analyzed: sa tathābhūtaḥ eva ātmā svayam anyaḥ iva ullasan
jīvatām upayāti iva bhāvinām a kadarthanām

original: tathābhūta eva paramārthataḥ proktāt svarūpād apracyuta eva /
analyzed: tathābhūtaḥ eva paramārthataḥ proktāt svarūpāt apracyutaḥ eva

original: saḥ ātmā proktaviśeṣaṇayuktam sarvadā bhātatvena sātatyagamanakriyākartṛbhūtaṃ cinmātrākhyaṃ
analyzed: saḥ ātmā prokta viśeṣaṇa yuktam sarvadā bhāta tvena sātatya gamana kriyā kartṛ bhūtam cit mātra ākhyam
tattvam jīvatām sātatya gamana viruddha svabhāva prāṇa dhāraṇa kriyā kartṛ bhūtam jīva bhāvam
svayam sva viṣaya tā āsādanena sva vyatiriktam

original: svaparāmarśanamātreṇaiva hi cinmātrasya cetyarūpo jīvādibhāvaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: sva parāmarśana mātreṇa eva hi cit mātrasya cetya rūpaḥ jīva ādi bhāvaḥ bhavati

original: tathābhūta iti padam ivaśabdadvayasya yogyatāṃ kathayati /
analyzed: tathābhūtaḥ iti padam iva śabda dvayasya yogyatām kathayati

original: na hi tathābhūtasya paramārthataḥ atathābhāvo yuktaḥ
analyzed: na hi tathābhūtasya paramārthataḥ atathābhāvaḥ yuktaḥ

original: / na hi sadā jalabhāvāt apracyutasya jalasya taraṅgatāsādane 'pi paramārthataḥ ajalabhāvo
analyzed: na hi sadā jala bhāvāt apracyutasya jalasya taraṅga tā āsādane pi paramārthataḥ
bhavana śīlā nāma kadarthanā jīvā iti nāma rūpā
jīva iti nāma yogyām iti arthaḥ
bhāvi tvam ca nāmnaḥ vaikharī prādurbhāve
adhunā tasya eva jīva tva anantara bhāvinīm manaḥ tām kathayati
tatas sa jīva śabda artha kalanā ākula tām gataḥ

original: mano bhavati maunātma mananān mantharībhavan // MU_3,1.14
analyzed: manaḥ bhavati mauna ātma mananāt mantharībhavan

original: yataḥ mantharībhavan alasībhavan bhavati ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: yatas mantharībhavan alasībhavan bhavati iti arthaḥ
mananāt jīva tva manana ākhyāt dharmāt

original: mananaparatvenaiva hi ātmā svaparāmarśaṃ prati mantharībhavati /
analyzed: manana para tvena eva hi ātmā sva parāmarśam prati mantharībhavati
jīva śabda artha kalanā ākula tām
tasya yaḥ kalanā sva rūpa tayā parāmarśaḥ
sarvathā ca iti a vyatirikta svarūpam cit mātram prathamam cit tvena aham

original: tatra grāhakatayā sthitasya bhāgasya cid iti nāma /
analyzed: tatra grāhaka tayā sthitasya bhāgasya cit iti nāma

original: tataḥ tasya jīvasya svasmin aṇutvaparāmarśo bhavati / tad
analyzed: tatas tasya jīvasya svasmin aṇu tva parāmarśaḥ bhavati tat
eva ca tasya manaḥ tvam iti

original: susthirād asthirākāras taraṅga iva vāridheḥ // MU_3,1.15
analyzed: susthirāt asthira ākāraḥ taraṅgaḥ iva vāridheḥ
atra ca susthira tvam taraṅga apekṣayā jñeyam

original: manasaḥ utpattim uktvā tatkāryabhūtasya jagataḥ utpattiṃ kathayati
analyzed: manasaḥ utpattim uktvā tad kārya bhūtasya jagataḥ utpattim kathayati

original: tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: tat svayam svairam eva āśu saṅkalpayati nityaśas
tena iyam indrajāla śrīḥ vitatā iva vitanyate

original: indrajālaśrīḥ mithyābhātattvena indrajālavat bhāsamānatvāt indriyajālasampadrūpā sṛṣṭiḥ /

analyzed: yathā kaṭaka śabda arthaḥ pṛthaktva arhaḥ sti kānake

original: na nāma kaṭake tadvaj jagacchabdārthatā pare // MU_3,1.17
analyzed: na nāma kaṭake tadvat jagat śabda artha tā pare
yathā kaṭaka śabda arthaḥ kaṭaka śabda abhidheya bhūtaḥ sanniveśa viśeṣaḥ
arthāt kānakāt pṛthaktva yogyaḥ na bhavati

original: kānake kaṭake kanakanirmite kaṭake ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: kānake kaṭake kanaka nirmite kaṭake iti arthaḥ
tadvat pare jagat śabda artha tā bhavati

original: tadvad ity anena dṛṣṭāntagataṃ sarvam ākṣipyate /
analyzed: tadvat iti anena dṛṣṭānta gatam sarvam ākṣipyate

original: arthāt proktanītyā jagattayā sthite uttīrṇe cinmātre /
analyzed: arthāt prokta nītyā jagat tayā sthite uttīrṇe cit mātre

original: mūḍhabuddhiṣu saṅkramaṇārthaṃ punar apy etad eva kathayati
analyzed: mūḍha buddhiṣu saṅkramaṇa artham punar api etat eva kathayati

original: brahmaṇy evāsty ananyātma yathāsthitam idaṃ jagat /
analyzed: brahmaṇi eva asti an anya ātma yathā sthitam idam jagat
na sti hemni iva kaṭaka ādi tā

original: na tv anyaṃ prakāram āsādyeti yāvat /
analyzed: na tu anyam prakāram āsādya iti yāvat
idam jagat brahmaṇi bṛṃhite cit mātre
an anya ātma an anya svarūpam asti
arthaḥ brahma vyatirikta padārtha racanā rūpam abhidheyam
tat tayā abhimatasya jagataḥ brahma tva sādhanāt
yathā kaṭaka ādi tā kaṭaka ādi bhāvaḥ

original: asattvasādhikām ata evoktārthadārḍhyakāriṇīṃ manasaḥ sakāśāt jagadutpattim anuvadati
analyzed: asattva sādhikām atas eva ukta artha dārḍhya kāriṇīm manasaḥ sakāśāt jagat utpattim anuvadati
asatā evā asatī tāpa nadyā iva laharī calā
manasā eva indrajāla śrīḥ jāgatī pravitanyate

original: manasā eva / na tv anyena kenacit /
analyzed: manasā eva na tu anyena kenacid

original: na hi brahmavyatirekeṇa manasaḥ pṛthak sattā asti /
analyzed: na hi brahma vyatirekeṇa manasaḥ pṛthak sattā asti
asatī sva kāraṇa bhūta manaḥ vat asat svarūpā

original: yathā asatyā tāpanadyā asatī calā laharī pravitanyate /
analyzed: yathā asatyā tāpa nadyā asatī calā laharī pravitanyate

original: nanu kathaṃ pūrvaśloke kanakakaṭakasya dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ iha tāpanadīlaharyāḥ
analyzed: nanu katham pūrva śloke kanaka kaṭakasya dṛṣṭānta tvam iha tāpanadīlaharyāḥ
pūrva śloke jagataḥ paramārthataḥ brahma rūpa tva kathana artham kanaka kaṭakasya
asmin śloke tu tasya eva anupapatti nivāraṇāya brahma vyatirekeṇa asattva kathana artham

original: tāpanadīlaharyāḥ dṛṣṭāntatvam ity ekaphalasādhakatvān na dṛṣṭāntadvayasya vaiṣamyam

analyzed: jagataḥ manaḥ nirmāṇa tva abhāve hi paramārtha sattvam prāpnoti
tasya brahma tva kathanam ayuktam syāt

original: na hi ghaṭe paṭo 'yam iti vaktuṃ yuktam / ity
analyzed: na hi ghaṭe paṭaḥ yam iti vaktum yuktam iti
iti tad antargatasya dṛṣṭāntasya api tad artham

original: avidyā saṃsṛtir bandho māyā moho mahat tamaḥ /
analyzed: avidyā saṃsṛtiḥ bandhaḥ māyā mohaḥ mahat tamaḥ
kalpitāni iti nāmāni yasyāḥ sakala vedibhiḥ

original: adhunā proktāyāḥ indrajālaśriyāḥ sakāśāt mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaṃ śiṣyaṃ jñātvā mokṣasvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ
analyzed: adhunā proktāyāḥ indrajāla śriyāḥ sakāśāt mokṣa kāṅkṣiṇam śiṣyam jñātvā mokṣa svarūpa nirūpaṇam

original: vinā śiṣyasya mokṣāvāptim ajānan mokṣasvarūpanirūpaṇam api tadviruddhabandhasvarūpajñānaṃ
analyzed: vinā śiṣyasya mokṣa avāptim a jānan mokṣa sva rūpa nirūpaṇam api tad viruddha bandha sva rūpa jñānam
vinā aśakyam manyamānaḥ tad svarūpa nirūpaṇam pratijānīte

original: bandhasya tāvad rūpaṃ tvaṃ kathyamānam idaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: bandhasya tāvat rūpam tvam kathyamānam idam śṛṇu
tatas sva rūpam mokṣasya jñāsyasi indu sama ānana
anupādeya bandha svarūpa nirūpaṇa pratijñayā vyākulībhūtam
heya nirūpaṇa anantaram upādeya nirūpaṇasya yukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
draṣṭuḥ dṛśya tva sattā aṅga bandhaḥ iti abhidhīyate

original: draṣṭā dṛśyavaśād baddho dṛśyābhāvād vimucyate // MU_3,1.22
analyzed: draṣṭā dṛśya vaśāt baddhaḥ dṛśya abhāvāt vimucyate
he aṅga paṇḍitaiḥ dṛśya sattā dṛśya sadbhāvaḥ
etat eva anvaya vyatirekābhyām āśvāsa yogyam karoti
draṣṭā iti dṛśya vaśāt dṛśya vaśena
tad abhāve tasya api abhāvāt iti
hetu dvayam vākya dvaye svayam yojyam

original: jagat tvam aham ityādi sargātmā dṛśyam ucyate /
analyzed: jagat tvam aham ityādi sarga ātmā dṛśyam ucyate

original: yāvad etat sambhavati tāvan mokṣo na vidyate // MU_3,1.23
analyzed: yāvat etat sambhavati tāvat mokṣaḥ na vidyate

original: paṇḍitaiḥ jagat tvam aham ityādi dṛśyam dṛśikriyākarmocyate /
analyzed: paṇḍitaiḥ jagat tvam aham ityādi dṛśyam dṛśi kriyā karma ucyate

original: kuta ity ākāṅkṣāyām viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetuṃ kathayati /
analyzed: kutas iti ākāṅkṣāyām viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum kathayati

original: sṛjyamānasya ca dṛśyatvaṃ sphuṭam eva darśanapūrvakatvāt
analyzed: sṛjyamānasya ca dṛśya tvam sphuṭam eva darśana pūrvaka tvāt

original: / sarjanasya ca darśanapūrvakatvaṃ tad aikṣatetyādiśrutisāmarthyāt jñeyam /
analyzed: sarjanasya ca darśana pūrvaka tvam tat aikṣata ityādi śruti sāmarthyāt jñeyam
yāvat etat idam jagat ādi dṛśyam
sattā mātreṇa eva ca dṛśyasya bandha nimitta tva svabhāva tvāt
tat aikṣata ityādi śruti sāmarthyāt chu

original: nedam iti vacanakathanamātreṇaiva śāntadṛśyatvābhimānayuktaṃ śiṣyaṃ prati āha
analyzed: na idam iti vacana kathana mātreṇa eva śānta dṛśya tva abhimāna yuktam śiṣyam prati āha

original: nedaṃ nedam iti vyarthaiḥ pralāpair nopaśāmyati /
analyzed: na idam na idam iti vyarthaiḥ pralāpaiḥ nā upaśāmyati
saṅkalpa janakaiḥ dṛśya vyādhiḥ pratyuta vardhate

original: idaṃ dṛśyaṃ na bhavati iti evaṃrūpeṇa sthitaiḥ vyarthaiḥ dṛśyaśāntyākhyaphalarahitaiḥ /
analyzed: idam dṛśyam na bhavati iti evaṃrūpeṇa sthitaiḥ vyarthaiḥ dṛśya śānti ākhya phala rahitaiḥ
tathā saṅkalpa janakaiḥ niṣedha ākhya saṅkalpa utpādakaiḥ
na upaśāmyati niṣedha rūpa tayā sthita tvāt

original: / satyam / draṣṭṛviṣayatvāt niṣedho 'pi hi draṣṭuḥ svataḥ bhinnatayā bhāti //
analyzed: satyam draṣṭṛ viṣaya tvāt hi draṣṭuḥ svatas bhinna tayā bhāti

original: nanu nedam iti vacanamātreṇa dṛśyaśāntiḥ mā bhavatu /
analyzed: nanu na idam iti vacana mātreṇa dṛśya śāntiḥ mā bhavatu
tarka ādibhiḥ tad śāntim sādhayāmaḥ iti atra āha
na ca tarka bhara kṣodaiḥ na tīrtha niyama ādibhiḥ

original: sato dṛśyasya jagato yasmād ete vicārakāḥ // MU_3,1.25
analyzed: sataḥ dṛśyasya jagataḥ yasmāt ete vicārakāḥ
tarka bharāṇām bheda pradhāna tvena dṛśya satya tva āpādakānām tarka samūhānām
tathā tīrtha niyama ādibhiḥ dṛśya vyādhiḥ na upaśāmyati

original: yataḥ ete tarkabharādayaḥ dṛśyasya jagataḥ sataḥ vicārakāḥ satyatvavicārakā bhavanti /
analyzed: yatas ete tarka bhara ādayaḥ dṛśyasya jagataḥ sataḥ vicārakāḥ satya tva vicārakāḥ bhavanti
tatra tarkāṇām sākṣāt eva padārtha sādhaka tvam
tīrtha ādīnām tu svarga ādi phala niṣṭha tvāt
na hi asatya niṣṭha tvam yuktam

original: nanu tarkāḥ sad api jagat paryante bhāgataḥ anityatvena kathayantīti teṣām api bhāgataḥ
analyzed: nanu tarkāḥ sat api jagat paryante bhāgatas anitya tvena kathayanti iti teṣām api bhāgatas

original: jagad dṛśyaṃ tu yady asti na śāmyaty eva tat kvacit /
analyzed: jagat dṛśyam tu yadi asti na śāmyati eva tat kvacid

original: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ // MU_3,1.26
analyzed: na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ
yadi asti yadi paramārtha sat bhavati
kvacid kutra api deśe kāle vā
yatas asataḥ astikriyā kartṛ tvam abhajataḥ
tathā sataḥ astikriyā kartṛ tvam bhajataḥ
acetya cit svarūpa ātmā yatra yatra eṣa tiṣṭhati

original: draṣṭā tatrāsya dṛśyaśrīḥ samudety apy aṇūdare // MU_3,1.27
analyzed: draṣṭā tatra asya dṛśya śrīḥ samudeti api aṇu udare
citā svayam āvirbhāvya sva viṣayīkṛtam bhāva jātam cetyam
prokta svarūpa cetya vyatiriktā iti yāvat
aṇu udare pi parama sūkṣma udare pi

original: nanu tādṛśe sūkṣmatare deśe 'rme katham etādṛśasya prapañcasyāvasthānaṃ
analyzed: nanu tādṛśe sūkṣmatare deśe rme katham etādṛśasya prapañcasya avasthānam
sthūla dṛśya saṃskāra utpāditayā smṛtyā tatra tasya prādurbhāvaḥ
atha tapaḥ dhyāna ādibhiḥ satya dṛśya śānti abhimāna grastān prati kathayati
tapaḥ dhyāna ādibhiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ siddhi ati eva tvāt

original: draṣṭur asti jagad dṛśyaṃ tat pramṛṣṭam idaṃ mayā /
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ asti jagat dṛśyam tat pramṛṣṭam idam mayā
tyaktam tapaḥ dhyāna japaiḥ iti kāñcika tṛpti vat
jagat dṛśyam sva bhinna tayā dṛśi kriyā viṣayaḥ bhavati
mayā tapodhyāna japaiḥ tyaktam śāntim nītam

original: kāñcikatṛptivat kāñcikadravyeṇa mama tṛptir jāteti vacanavat bhavati /
analyzed: kāñcika tṛpti vat kāñcika dravyeṇa mama tṛptiḥ jātā iti vacanavat bhavati
tathā sva bhinna devatā ārādhana artham anuṣṭhitaiḥ

original: tapaḥprabhṛtibhiḥ api dṛśyavṛddhir eva jāyate iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tapaḥ prabhṛtibhiḥ api dṛśya vṛddhiḥ eva jāyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: mokṣāvasthāyāṃ dṛśyān nirgatasyāta eva viśeṣaguṇāsaṃvedanapātratāṃ gatasyātisūkṣmasya jīvasyedaṃ dṛśyaṃ kiṃ karoti /
analyzed: mokṣa avasthāyām dṛśyāt nirgatasya atas eva viśeṣa guṇa asaṃvedana pātra tām gatasya ati sūkṣmasya jīvasya idam dṛśyam kim karoti

original: na hi suptasya bāhyajagatkṛtaṃ vyākulatvaṃ dṛśyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: na hi suptasya bāhya jagat kṛtam vyākula tvam dṛśyate iti atra āha

original: yadi nāma jagad dṛśyam asti tat pratibimbati /
analyzed: yadi nāma jagat dṛśyam asti tat pratibimbati

original: paramāṇūdare 'py asmiṃś cidādarśe na saṃśayaḥ // MU_3,1.29
analyzed: paramāṇu udare pi asmin cit ādarśe na saṃśayaḥ

original: yadi nāmāsti yadi nāma paramārthasat bhavati /
analyzed: yadi nāma asti yadi nāma paramārtha sat bhavati
tadā paramāṇu udare ati sūkṣma madhye

original: yatra tatra sthitaṃ rāma yathādarśe prabimbati /
analyzed: yatra tatra sthitam rāma yathā ādarśe prabimbati
adri dyūrvī nadīśa ādi cit ādarśe tathā eva hi

original: adridyūrvīnadīśādi adrayaś ca dyauś ca ūrvī ca nadīśāḥ samudrāś ca /
analyzed: adri di ūrvī nadīśa ādi adrayaḥ ca dyauḥ ca ūrvī ca nadīśāḥ samudrāḥ ca
tat adri di ūrvī nadī īśa ādi
sphurat tā eva hi sattā bhavati

original: sā ced dṛśye paramārthataḥ asti tadā sphurattāmātramayī cinmātratvāt /
analyzed: sā ced dṛśye paramārthataḥ asti tadā sphurat tā mātra mayī cit mātra tvāt

original: sā svasphurattātvataḥ kadāpi na vyatiriktā bhavet iti kadāpi cidādarśaḥ
analyzed: sā sva sphurat tātvataḥ kadāpi na vyatiriktā bhavet iti kadāpi cit ādarśaḥ
dṛśya pratibimba rahitaḥ na bhavet iti
tathā ca mokṣa abhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: tatas tatra punar duḥkhaṃ jarā maraṇajanmanī /
analyzed: tatas tatra punar duḥkham jarā maraṇa janmanī
bhāva abhāva graha utsargāḥ sthūla sūkṣma cala acalāḥ

original: tataḥ yadi cidādarśaḥ dṛśyasadbhāvena punaḥ punaḥ pratibimbayukto bhavet /
analyzed: tatas yadi cit ādarśaḥ dṛśya sadbhāvena punar punar pratibimba yuktaḥ bhavet
tathā bhāva abhāva graha utsargāḥ prādurbhāva nāśa ādāna tyāgāḥ bhaveyuḥ
tatra jāgrat kālīnānām sthūla tvam acala tvam ca
svapna kālīnānām sūkṣma tvam cala tvam
tathā ca sthūla sūkṣma duḥkha ādi rūpa saṃsāra grasta tvena

original: jīvasya kadāpi muktiḥ na syād iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,1.31)
analyzed: jīvasya kadāpi muktiḥ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ
tathā api samādhi parāṇām anartham utpādayitum kā asya

original: idaṃ pramārjitaṃ dṛśyaṃ mayā nātrāham āsthitaḥ /
analyzed: idam pramārjitam dṛśyam mayā na atra aham āsthitaḥ

original: etad evākṣayaṃ bījaṃ samādhau saṃsṛtismṛteḥ // MU_3,1.32
analyzed: etat eva akṣayam bījam samādhau saṃsṛti smṛteḥ

original: mayā idam dṛśyam pramārjitam samādhyupāyena nāśitam /
analyzed: mayā idam dṛśyam pramārjitam samādhi upāyena nāśitam

original: yataḥ aham atra āsthitaḥ āsthāyuktaḥ nāsmi /
analyzed: yatas aham atra āsthitaḥ āsthā yuktaḥ na asmi
etat eva pūrva ardha uktam vastu eva
saṃsṛti viṣayasya dṛśyasya saṃsṛti śabda vācya tvam lakṣaṇayā jñeyam

original: / samādhipariṇatasya dṛśyapramārjanaṃ tadanāsthā ca siddhatvena sphurati na vā / na
analyzed: samādhi pariṇatasya dṛśya pramārjanam tad anāsthā ca siddha tvena sphurati na vā na

original: cet tadā sampannam apy etad dvayam asad eva /
analyzed: ced tadā sampannam api etat dvayam asat eva
sphurat tāyāḥ eva paramārthataḥ sattā svarūpa tvāt
sphurati ced tad āsthitā eva saṃsṛti smṛtiḥ

original: nanu tvadabhimate dṛśyātyantābhāve 'pi ayaṃ doṣaḥ prasajati /
analyzed: nanu tvad abhimate dṛśya atyanta abhāve pi ayam doṣaḥ prasajati

original: sphurati cet dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ tat sthitam eva dṛśyaṃ
analyzed: sphurati ced dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ tat sthitam eva dṛśyam

original: na cet tad asann eva dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ / iti
analyzed: na ced tat asan eva dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ iti

original: cen / na / na hi dṛśyātyantābhāvavādinaḥ sarvoparamasvarūpaḥ samādhiḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvatayā
analyzed: ced na na hi dṛśya atyanta abhāva vādinaḥ sarva uparama svarūpaḥ samādhiḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāva tayā
abhipretaḥ yena prokta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ syāt
kim tu dṛśya atyanta abhāva niścaya mātram eva
na hi rajju sarpa nivāraṇa artham mantra paṭhanam yuktam
iti sarpa atyanta abhāva niścaya mātrasya eva tatra upayogaḥ
atyanta abhāva niścayaḥ ca guru śāstra saṅga udbhūtena adhiṣṭhāna bhūta cit mātra vijñānena eva

original: sidhyati / na pāṣāṇabhāvāpādakaiḥ samādhibhir ity alaṃ prapañcena //
analyzed: sidhyati na pāṣāṇa bhāva āpādakaiḥ samādhibhiḥ iti alam prapañcena
na kevalam jagat satya tva vāci abhyupagata dṛśya uparama svarūpasya samādheḥ dṛśya bīja dhāra tva mātram

original: evāsty / api tu kāryakaraṇe asāmarthyam apy astīty abhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: eva asti api tu kārya karaṇe asāmarthyam api asti iti abhiprāyeṇa āha
sati tu asmin jagat dṛśye nirvikalpa samādhinā

original: na cākṣayasuṣuptatvaṃ turyaṃ vāpy upapadyate // MU_3,1.33
analyzed: na ca akṣaya suṣupta tvam turyam vā api upapadyate
asmin jagat dṛśye jagat svarūpe dṛśye sati
nirvikalpa samādhinā sarva uparama svarūpeṇa samādhānena

original: akṣayasuṣuptatvaṃ turyaṃ vāpi nopapadyate na sidhyati /
analyzed: akṣaya suṣupta tvam turyam vā api nā upapadyate na sidhyati
akṣaya suṣupta tvam videha mukta gocarā turyātīta avasthā
videha mukta gocarā tvam turyam vā vi
vyutthāne hi samādhīnām suṣupta ante iva akhilam

original: jagadduḥkham idam bhāti yathāsthitam akhaṇḍitam // MU_3,1.34

analyzed: samādhīnām vyutthāne avaśya bhāvini samādhibhyaḥ vyutthāne

original: ata eva akhaṇḍitam kenāpy aṃśena na nyūnam /
analyzed: atas eva akhaṇḍitam kena api aṃśena na nyūnam

original: yathā rātrau suṣuptiṃ gatasyāta eva vismṛtasamastajagatprapañcasya
analyzed: yathā rātrau suṣuptim gatasya atas eva vismṛta samasta jagat prapañcasya

original: tataḥ prabhāte prabuddhasya puruṣasya punaḥ api pūrvavat jagatprapañcaḥ sphurati /
analyzed: tatas prabhāte prabuddhasya puruṣasya punar api pūrvavat jagat prapañcaḥ sphurati

original: tathā yena tenopāyena sarvoparamasvarūpasamādhiṃ gatasya puruṣasyāvaśyambhāvini vyutthānasamaye punar api pūrvavat jagatprapañcaḥ
analyzed: tathā yena tena upāyena sarva uparama sva rūpa samādhim gatasya puruṣasya avaśyambhāvini vyutthāna samaye punar api pūrvavat jagat prapañcaḥ
anyathā asmad abhimata atyanta abhāva prasaṅgāt

original: tathā ca mātulānībhakṣaṇavat kṣaṇamātraṃ jagaduparamasādhakena samādhinā sarvadā
analyzed: tathā ca mātulānī bhakṣaṇa vat kṣaṇa mātram jagat uparama sādhakena samādhinā sarvadā

original: jagadabhāvasvarūpasya turyasya tadatītasya ca siddhir na yukteti //
analyzed: jagat abhāva svarūpasya turyasya tad atītasya ca siddhiḥ na yuktā iti
etena āyātām samādheḥ niṣphala tām kathayati

original: prāptaṃ bhavati he rāma tat kiṃ nāma samādhibhiḥ /
analyzed: prāptam bhavati he rāma tat kim nāma samādhibhiḥ

original: bhūyo 'narthanipāte 'pi kṣaṇasāmye hi kiṃ sukham // MU_3,1.35
analyzed: bhūyas nartha nipāte kṣaṇa sāmye hi kim sukham

original: kiñcid api prāptaṃ na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: kiñcid api prāptam na bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: katham etad ity atrāha bhūya iti /
analyzed: katham etat iti atra āha bhūyaḥ iti
bhūyas anartha nipātaḥ bheda rūpa anartha nipātaḥ

original: tādṛśe kṣaṇasāmye 'pi kṣaṇaṃ sphuraṇaśīlāyāṃ samatāyām api /
analyzed: tādṛśe kṣaṇa sāmye kṣaṇam sphuraṇa śīlāyām sama tāyām api

original: yataḥ kṣaṇabhātaṃ sāmyaṃ sukhadaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: yatas kṣaṇa bhātam sāmyam sukha dam na bhavati
api śabdaḥ sāmyasya asandigdham sukha āspada tvam dyotayati

original: nanu samādhau satataṃ līnasya vyutthānābhāvena kathaṃ bhūyaḥ jarāduḥkhaprādurbhāvaḥ
analyzed: nanu samādhau satatam līnasya vyutthāna abhāvena katham bhūyas jarā duḥkha prādurbhāvaḥ

original: yadi vāpi samādhāne nirvikalpe sthitiṃ vrajet /
analyzed: yadi vā api samādhāne nirvikalpe sthitim vrajet

original: tad akṣayasuṣuptābhaṃ tan manye nāmalaṃ padam // MU_3,1.36
analyzed: tat akṣaya suṣupta ābham tat manye na amalam padam

original: yadi vā vrajet yadi vā gacchet /
analyzed: yadi vā vrajet yadi vā gacchet
amalam padam jāḍya mala rahitam śuddha cit mātra ākhyam mahā sthānam
dṛśya darśana asāmarthya rūpasya jāḍya ākhyasya malasya supti vat sthita tvāt
akṣaya suṣupta ābham turyātīta avasthāvat bhāsamānam

original: na ca turyātītāvasthāyāḥ vyutthānaṃ kadāpi sambhavati /
analyzed: na ca turyātīta avasthāyāḥ vyutthānam kadāpi sambhavati
dṛśya satya tva vādinaḥ nirvikalpa samādhiḥ eva na sambhavati

original: prāpyate sati dṛśye 'smin na ca tan nāma kenacit /
analyzed: prāpyate sati dṛśye smin na ca tat nāma kenacid

original: yatra tatra kilāyāti cittabhrāntyā jagadbhramaḥ // MU_3,1.37
analyzed: yatra tatra kila āyāti citta bhrāntyā jagat bhramaḥ

original: yataḥ yatra tatra sthitasyāpi samādhideśe taditaradeśe vā sthitasya puruṣasya /
analyzed: yatas yatra tatra sthitasya api samādhi deśe tad itara deśe vā sthitasya puruṣasya

original: yathā dṛśyasatyatāyāṃ niścitaḥ puruṣaḥ rātrau supto 'pi dṛśyaṃ paśyaty
analyzed: yathā dṛśya satya tāyām niścitaḥ puruṣaḥ rātrau dṛśyam paśyati

original: eva / tathā samādhiṃ gato 'pi paśyed eva samānanyāyatvāt /
analyzed: eva tathā samādhim gataḥ pi paśyet eva samāna nyāya tvāt
tathā ca dṛśya satya tva vādinaḥ
tatra sthiti vrajanasya tu kā kathā iti

original: nanu dṛśyasatyatve niścitasyāpi yathā tathā prayuktena dhāraṇopāyena na kiñcid bhānarūpo
analyzed: nanu dṛśya satya tve niścitasya api yathā tathā prayuktena dhāraṇa upāyena na kiñcid bhāna rūpaḥ
nirvikalpa samādhiḥ sidhyati eva iti atra āha
draṣṭā atha yadi pāṣāṇa rūpa tām bhāvayan balāt

original: kilāste tat tadante 'pi bhūyo 'syodeti dṛśyatā // MU_3,1.38
analyzed: tat tad ante pi bhūyas syā udeti dṛśya tā
yadi balāt kena api haṭha prayogena
pāṣāṇa rūpa tām bhāvayan āste tiṣṭhati
asya svasmin pāṣāṇa bhāvam bhāvayataḥ draṣṭuḥ
tad ante avaśya bhāvini pāṣāṇa bhāva ante
dṛṣya tā paṭa ādi viṣayaḥ dṛśya bhāvaḥ

original: na hi jīvataḥ sarvadā pāṣāṇabhāvabhāvanaṃ śakyaṃ /
analyzed: na hi jīvataḥ sarvadā pāṣāṇa bhāva bhāvanam śakyam

original: sthiraḥ nirvikalpasamādhiḥ na sidhyaty eveti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,1.38)

analyzed: pāṣāṇa rūpa tā gamanasya asambhavam kathayati
na ca pāṣāṇa tā tulyāḥ nirvikalpa samādhayaḥ

original: keṣāñcit sthitim āyānti sarvair ity anubhūyate // MU_3,1.39
analyzed: keṣāñcid sthitim āyānti sarvaiḥ iti anubhūyate
pāṣāṇa tāyāḥ tulyāḥ pāṣāṇa tā tulyāḥ

original: pāṣāṇatābhāvanam eva tasya draṣṭuḥ pāṣāṇabhāvaṃ nāśayati
analyzed: pāṣāṇa tā bhāvanam eva tasya draṣṭuḥ pāṣāṇa bhāvam nāśayati

original: / na hi pāṣāṇaḥ svaṃ pāṣāṇatvaṃ bhāvayituṃ śaknotīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,1.39)
analyzed: na hi pāṣāṇaḥ svam pāṣāṇa tvam bhāvayitum śaknoti iti bhāvaḥ

original: yathātathāsiddhasyāpi pāṣāṇabhāvasya na paramapadatvaṃ yuktaṃ jaḍatvānapāyād / iti
analyzed: yathā tathā asiddhasya api pāṣāṇa bhāvasya na parama pada tvam yuktam jaḍa tva anapāyāt iti

original: na ca pāṣāṇatātulyā rūḍhiṃ yātāḥ samādhayaḥ /
analyzed: na ca pāṣāṇa tā tulyāḥ rūḍhim yātāḥ samādhayaḥ

original: bhavanty agryaṃ padaṃ śāntaṃ cidrūpam ajam avyayam // MU_3,1.40
analyzed: bhavanti agryam padam śāntam cit rūpam ajam avyayam
dṛśya darśana asāmarthyena jaḍa tva anapāyāt pāṣāṇa bhāvasya cit mātra tvam

original: ayuktam / cinmātraṃ hi sarvadā cetyacetanasamartham eva bhavati /
analyzed: ayuktam cit mātram hi sarvadā cetya cetana samartham eva bhavati

original: yadi kadācit tac cetanaṃ na karoti tena nāsya jāḍyāpātaḥ /
analyzed: yadi kadācid tat cetanam na karoti tena na asya jāḍya āpātaḥ

original: kāryam akurvan aśakta iti vaktuṃ yujyate iti // (MT_3,1.40)
analyzed: kāryam akurvān aśaktaḥ iti vaktum yujyate iti

original: tasmād yadīdaṃ sad dṛśyaṃ tan na śāmyet kadācana /
analyzed: tasmāt yadi idam sat dṛśyam tat na śāmyet kadācana

original: śāmyet tapojapadhyānair dṛḍham ity ajñakalpanā // MU_3,1.41
analyzed: śāmyet tapaḥ japa dhyānaiḥ dṛḍham iti ajña kalpanā
ya tvena para bodha tva ayogāt
cittamātram padmaja bhāvena sthitam śuddham cittam
vasudhā ādi tām paramārtha santam pṛthvī ādi bhāvam
nirvāṇa sva rūpa śuddha bodha maya tvāt
atas eva padmajasya ādhibhautika deha abhāvaḥ iti

original: nanu pratijīvaṃ manobhedasya sthitatvān nānāvidhāni manāṃsi santi /
analyzed: nanu pratijīvam manaḥ bhedasya sthita tvāt nānāvidhāni manāṃsi santi
manasaḥ eva jagat utpattiḥ uktā iti atra āha
sau praticchandaḥ citta dehaḥ svatā udayaḥ

original: saṃsāre vyavaharantīti tādṛśānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtamanasāṃ madhye /
analyzed: saṃsāre vyavaharanti iti tādṛśānām sarveṣām bhūta manasām madhye

original: prathamaḥ praticchandaḥ bhāvimanaḥsṛṣṭikāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ pratibhānam bhavati /
analyzed: prathamaḥ praticchandaḥ bhāvi manaḥ sṛṣṭi kāraṇam prathamam pratibhānam bhavati

original: udayānantaram api pūrvabhāvenaiva sthita ity arthaḥ
analyzed: udaya anantaram api pūrva bhāvena eva sthitaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: / ata eva asmād evotpattikathanam iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,3.14)
analyzed: atas eva asmāt eva utpatti kathanam iti bhāvaḥ
asmāt pūrvāt praticchandāt ananyā etad svarūpiṇī

original: iyaṃ pravisṛtā sṛṣṭiḥ spandadṛṣṭir ivānilāt // MU_3,3.15
analyzed: iyam pravisṛtā sṛṣṭiḥ spanda dṛṣṭiḥ iva anilāt
atas eva etad svarūpiṇī etad mayī
atas sya eva prathama praticchanda tvam yuktam
pratibhā na ākṛteḥ asmāt pratibhā mātra rūpa dhṛt

original: vibhāty evam ayaṃ sargaḥ satyānubhavavat sthitaḥ // MU_3,3.16
analyzed: vibhāti evam ayam sargaḥ satya anubhava vat sthitaḥ
evam sati pratibhāna ākṛteḥ pratibhāna svarūpāt
ayam sargaḥ idam sṛji kriyā viṣayaḥ dṛśya maṇḍalam
pratibhā mātra rūpa dhṛt eva pratibhāna mātra rūpa dhārī eva
na tu sthūlabhūta maya rūpa dhārī

original: na hi dravaguṇayuktāt jalāt dravaguṇarahitaḥ taraṅgaḥ utpadyate /
analyzed: na hi drava guṇa yuktāt jalāt drava guṇa rahitaḥ taraṅgaḥ utpadyate

original: paramārthatas tu svapnavat pratibhānamātram eveti vatigrahaṇam // (MT_3,3.16)
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu svapna vat pratibhāna mātram eva iti vati grahaṇam
asat api artha sampattyā satya anubhava bhāsvaram
sargasya pratibhāna mātra rūpa tāyām iti yāvat
svapna strī suratam svapna dṛṣṭa strī suratam
asat api pratīti mātra sāra tvena asat svarūpam api
satya anubhava bhāsvaram satya anubhava yukta vastu vat bhāsana śīlam
padmajasya deha abhāve deha bhānam kathayati

original: sadeha iva bhūteśaḥ svātmabhūḥ puruṣākṛtiḥ // MU_3,3.18
analyzed: sa dehaḥ iva bhūteśaḥ sva ātma bhūḥ puruṣa ākṛtiḥ
a pṛthvī ādi mayaḥ pṛthvī ādi vyatirikta svarūpaḥ
atas eva vyoma ākṛtiḥ ākāśa ākṛtiḥ
atas eva ca adehaḥ ādhibhautika deha rahitaḥ
sa deha kārya nānāvidha prapañca kartṛ tvāt
anyathā śāstreṣu caturmukha tva kalpanām na
asya udaya śāntī tad abhāvam ca kathayati

original: sa cit saṅkalparūpatvād udety apy atha śāmyati /
analyzed: sa cit saṅkalpa rūpa tvāt udeti api atha śāmyati

original: svāyattatvāt svabhāvasya nodeti na ca śāmyati // MU_3,3.19
analyzed: sva āyatta tvāt svabhāvasya na udeti na ca śāmyati
saṅkalpa rūpa tvāt cit mātra āśraya sva parāmarśa svarūpa saṅkalpa rūpa tvena udeti prādurbhavati
saṅkalpasya udaya śānti niyata ādhāra tvāt
sva āyatta tvāt tat eva aham iti parāmarśa viṣaya tvāt

original: na hi svabhāvāparaparyāyasya sadābhātasya cinmātrasyodayaśāntī yukte iti / tatra
analyzed: na hi svabhāva apara paryāyasya sat ābhātasya cit mātrasya udaya śāntī yukte iti tatra

original: svātmatve niścitasya tatsvarūpasya ca padmajasyāpi te na yukte iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: sva ātma tve niścitasya tad svarūpasya ca padmajasya api te na yukte iti bhāvaḥ
atha asya eva jagat kāraṇa tvam kathayati
kevalaḥ cittamātra ātmā kāraṇam tri jagat sthiteḥ
tathā pṛthvī ādi rahita ākṛtiḥ sthūla deha rahitaḥ
tathātve pi cittamātra ātmā śuddha saṅkalpa rūpa śuddha citta svarūpaḥ

original: nanu advitīyāc cinmātrāt kasya preraṇayā śuddhamanorūpaḥ padmajaḥ uttiṣṭhatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu advitīyāt cit mātrāt kasya preraṇayā śuddha manaḥ rūpaḥ padmajaḥ uttiṣṭhati iti atra āha

original: saṅkalpa eṣa kacati yathā nāma svasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: saṅkalpaḥ eṣa kacati yathā nāma sva sambhavaḥ
vyoma ātmā eṣa tathā bhāti bhavat saṅkalpa śaila vat
tathā eṣaḥ śuddha manaḥ rūpaḥ padmajaḥ sva sambhavaḥ
bhavataḥ saṅkalpa śailaḥ bhavat saṅkalpa śailaḥ
saḥ iva bhavat saṅkalpa śaila vat
yathā bhavataḥ saṅkalpa śailaḥ sva sambhavaḥ bhāti

original: ca svataḥ sphuraṇaṃ sarveṣu prasiddham eveti /
analyzed: ca svatas sphuraṇam sarveṣu prasiddham eva iti
saḥ eva sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvābhyām dvis

original: asya padmajasyādhibhautikadeharāhityaṃ tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ sahetukaṃ kathayati
analyzed: asya padmajasya ādhibhautika deha rāhityam tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ sa hetukam kathayati
ātivāhika tā ekānta vismṛtyā dṛḍha rūḍhayā

original: ādhibhautikatā yena mudhā bhāti piśācavat // MU_3,3.22
analyzed: ādhibhautika tā yena mudhā bhāti piśāca vat
idam prathamatas udyoga samprabuddha mahā citeḥ
nā udeti śuddha saṃvid tvāt ātivāhika vismṛtiḥ
ādhibhautika tā tena na asya udeti piśācikā
asatyā mṛgatṛṣṇā iva mithyā jāḍya bhrama pradā
ādhibhautika tā sādanena hi manasaḥ jāḍyam adhikībhavati
nanu ādhibhautika tā ātivāhika tā vismṛti kāraṇikā

original: bhavatu / kathaṃ sā tena śuddhamanorūpe padmaje na bhavatīty /
analyzed: bhavatu katham sā tena śuddha manaḥ rūpe padmaje na bhavati iti

original: dvitīyaṃ ślokaṃ samarthakatvena kathayati idam iti /
analyzed: dvitīyam ślokam samarthaka tvena kathayati idam iti
yaḥ udyogaḥ sva parāmarśam prati ābhimukhyam
ātivāhika vismṛtiḥ bhāva pradhāna nirdeśa āśrayaṇena ātivāhika tā vismaraṇam

original: ata evāsyātivāhikatāvismṛtikāraṇikā ādhibhautikatā na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: atas eva asya ātivāhika tā vismṛti kāraṇikā ādhibhautika tā na bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: / dṛṣṭaṃ hi svam eva bhedarūṣitasaṃvidaḥ aśuddhasya manasa eva sthūlapurādibhāvena bhānam iti nātrāyastam //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam hi svam eva bheda rūṣita saṃvidaḥ aśuddhasya manasaḥ eva sthūla pura ādi bhāvena bhānam iti na atra ayastam

original: padmajasya manomātrarūpatvena tatkāryasya jagato 'pi manomātrarūpatvaṃ yogyatayā atidiśati
analyzed: padmajasya manaḥ mātra rūpa tvena tad kāryasya jagataḥ api manaḥ mātra rūpa tvam yogyatayā atidiśati
manaḥ mātram yadā brahmā na pṛthvī ādi maya ātmakaḥ

original: manomātram ato viśvaṃ yad yatas tat tad eva hi // MU_3,3.25
analyzed: manaḥ mātram atas viśvam yat yatas tat tat eva hi
yadā iti yatas iti asya arthe
manaḥ mātram śuddha manaḥ mātram bhavati
mṛdaḥ sattā kartṛ tvam bhajataḥ ghaṭasya mṛd tva darśanāt

original: ato jagataḥ manovat anutpattisatattvā evotpattir iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas jagataḥ manaḥ vat anutpatti sa tattvā eva utpattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu padmajasya sva kāraṇa bhūta cit mātra vyatirikta sahakāri kāraṇa abhāvena cit mātra sthūla tā mātra rūpam
tad jasya jagataḥ adṛṣṭa ādi sahakāri kāraṇa sadbhāvāt katham manaḥ mātra rūpa tvam

original: ajasya sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi yat /
analyzed: ajasya sahakārīṇi kāraṇāni na santi yat

original: tajjasyāpi na santy eva tāni tasmāt tu kānicit // MU_3,3.26
analyzed: tad jasya api na santi eva tāni tasmāt tu kānicid
manaḥ kāryāṇām adṛṣṭa ādīnām manaḥ prati sahakāri tva ayogāt
saḥ eva tad sahakārī bhavitum arhati
eva sahakāri kāraṇa tva abhyupagame sva utpattau sahakāri kāraṇa antara apekṣāyāḥ sthita tvāt
kāraṇāt kārya vaicitryam tena atrā asti na kiñcana

original: yādṛśaṃ kāraṇaṃ śuddhaṃ kāryaṃ tādṛg iha sthitam // MU_3,3.27
analyzed: yādṛśam kāraṇam śuddham kāryam tādṛś iha sthitam

original: tena / yataḥ jagataḥ sahakārikāraṇāni na santi /
analyzed: tena yatas jagataḥ sahakāri kāraṇāni na santi
daṇḍa ādi sahakāri kāraṇa sānnidhye eva mṛdaḥ ghaṭa ākhya kārya vaicitryasya dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: ataḥ iha kāraṇaṃ yādṛśaṃ śuddhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: atas iha kāraṇam yādṛśam śuddham bhavati
bhinna tā āpādakānām sahakāri kāraṇānām abhāvāt
padmaja jagat viṣaye padmaja dvijagat viṣaye
kārya kāraṇa tā ādi atra na kiñcid upapadyate

original: yādṛg eva paraṃ brahma tādṛg eva jagattrayam // MU_3,3.28
analyzed: yādṛś eva param brahma tādṛś eva jagattrayam
yatas atra cit mātra padmajayoḥ padmaja jagatoḥ ca
kārya kāraṇatā ādi kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādi
atas param brahma śuddha cit mātram
kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādeḥ eva bheda āpādaka tvāt

original: nanu cinmātrād utpannasya śuddhamanorūpasya padmajasya cinmātrarūpatvaṃ bhavatu /
analyzed: nanu cit mātrāt utpannasya śuddha manaḥ rūpasya padmajasya cit mātra rūpa tvam bhavatu

original: śuddhamanorūpāt padmajād utpannasya trailokyasya tu kathaṃ tad yuktam ity / atrāha
analyzed: śuddha manaḥ rūpāt padmajāt utpannasya trailokyasya tu katham tat yuktam iti atra āha

original: manastām iva yātena brahmaṇā tanyate jagat /
analyzed: manaḥ tām iva yātena brahmaṇā tanyate jagat

original: ananyad ātmanaḥ śuddhād dravatvam iva vāriṇā // MU_3,3.29
analyzed: an anyat ātmanaḥ śuddhāt drava tvam iva vāriṇā
manaḥ tām padmajā iti apara nāmadheya yukta śuddha manaḥ bhāvam
brahmaṇā padārtha rūpa tayā bṛṃhitena śuddha cit mātreṇa

original: ātmanaḥ ananyat dravatvam ādyaspandanāsamavāyikāraṇabhūtaḥ dravatvākhyaḥ guṇaḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ ananyat drava tvam ādi aspandana asamavāyi kāraṇa bhūtaḥ drava tva ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ

original: ataḥ jagato 'pi cinmātrād utpannatvena cinmātratvam eva yuktam iti
analyzed: atas jagataḥ api cit mātrāt utpanna tvena cit mātra tvam eva yuktam iti

original: nanu tarhi katham ayaṃ bhedo bhāsate ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi katham ayam bhedaḥ bhāsate iti atra āha

original: manasā tanyate sarvam asad evedam ātatam /
analyzed: manasā tanyate sarvam asat eva idam ātatam
manasā padmajā iti prasiddhena śuddha manasā

original: tanyate paraṃ brahmaṇaḥ bhinnayā sattayā prakaṭīkriyate /
analyzed: tanyate param brahmaṇaḥ bhinnayā sattayā prakaṭīkriyate
yathā gandharva pattanam sat eva bhavati

original: / gandharvāḥ hi svāvāsārthaṃ kalpanayā śūnye nagaraṃ racayanti /
analyzed: gandharvāḥ hi sva āvāsa artham kalpanayā śūnye nagaram racayanti

original: ucyate / cinmātrād utthitena manasā eva idaṃ bhinnatayā vistāryate /
analyzed: ucyate cit mātrāt utthitena manasā eva idam bhinna tayā vistāryate

original: anyathā manasaḥ kimartham utthānaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: anyathā manasaḥ kimartham utthānam syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: atyantaniścayatvena punar api ādhibhautikatāyāḥ asatyatvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: atyanta niścaya tvena punar api ādhibhautika tāyāḥ asatya tvam kathayati
ādhibhautika tā na asti rajjvām iva bhujaṅga tā

original: brahmādayaḥ prabuddhās tu kathaṃ tiṣṭhantu tatra te // MU_3,3.31
analyzed: brahma ādayaḥ prabuddhāḥ tu katham tiṣṭhantu tatra te

original: ādiśabdena śuddhabuddhirūpasya viṣṇoḥ śuddhāhaṅkārarūpasya rudrasya ca grahaṇam /
analyzed: ādi śabdena śuddha buddhi rūpasya viṣṇoḥ śuddha ahaṅkāra rūpasya rudrasya ca grahaṇam
prabuddhāḥ atyanta śuddha tvena prakṛṣṭena bodhena yuktāḥ
daṇḍāpūpikā nyāyena ādhibhautika tāyāḥ asatya tām punar api kathayati
ātivāhikaḥ evā asti na prabuddha mateḥ kila
ādhibhautika dehasya carcā eva atra kutas katham
prabuddha mateḥ samyak niścita mateḥ puruṣasya

original: ātivāhika eva ativahanaśīlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ deha eva /
analyzed: ātivāhikaḥ eva ativahana śīlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ dehaḥ eva
svasmin cit mātra rūpa tā jñānāt
ādhibhautika dehasya carcā eva kathā eva

original: ādhibhautikadeharahitāt padmajād utpannasya jagataḥ asatyatvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: ādhibhautika deha rahitāt padmajāt utpannasya jagataḥ asatya tvam kathayati
manaḥ nāmnaḥ manuṣyasya vividha ākāra dhāriṇaḥ

original: manorājyaṃ jagad iti satyarūpam iva sthitam // MU_3,3.33
analyzed: manaḥ rājyam jagat iti satya rūpam iva sthitam

original: vividhān ākārān dhārayatīti tādṛśasya manonāmnaḥ mana iti nāmadheyayuktasya /
analyzed: vividhān ākārān dhārayati iti tādṛśasya manaḥ nāmnaḥ manaḥ iti nāmadheya yuktasya
manuṣyasya ādhibhautika deha rahitasya padmaja ākhyasya manuṣyasya
jagat iti sthitam jagat rūpeṇa sthitam

original: paramārthatas tu kalpanāmātrarūpatvān na satyarūpam itīvaśabdopādānam /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu kalpanā mātra rūpa tvāt na satya rūpam iti iva śabda upādānam

original: svapnasya cātra dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ sphuṭam eveti nātrāyastam /
analyzed: svapnasya ca atra dṛṣṭānta tvam sphuṭam evā iti na atra āyastam

original: manonāmnaḥ manuṣyasya manorājyam iti rāhoḥ śira itivaj jñeyam // (MT_3,3.33)
analyzed: manonāmnaḥ manuṣyasya manorājyam iti rāhoḥ śiraḥ itivat jñeyam  /

original: nanu śāstreṣu caturmukhasya kasyāpi devaviśeṣasyaiva padmajatvam uktam asti / tat
analyzed: nanu śāstreṣu caturmukhasya kasya api deva viśeṣasya eva padmaja tvam uktam asti tat

original: kathaṃ tvayā śuddhasya manasa eva tad uktam ity / atrāha
analyzed: katham tvayā śuddhasya manasaḥ eva tat uktam iti atra āha

original: mana eva viriñcaṃ tvaṃ viddhi saṅkalpanātmakam /
analyzed: manaḥ eva viriñcam tvam viddhi saṅkalpanā ātmakam

original: svavapuḥ sphāratāṃ nītvā manasedaṃ vitanyate // MU_3,3.34
analyzed: sva vapuḥ sphāra tām nītvā manasā idam vitanyate
tvam saṅkalpanā ātmakam cit mātra ukta sva parāmarśa svarūpam

original: viriñcasya hi viriñcatvam etad eva / yaj jagad
analyzed: viriñcasya hi viriñca tvam etat eva yat jagat

original: utpādyate tac ca manasā eva svapnanyāyena sphuṭam utpādyate /
analyzed: utpādyate tat ca manasā eva svapna nyāyena sphuṭam utpādyate

original: yuktam / caturmukhadevaviśeṣakalpanā tu sthūladṛṣṭīn praty eveti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,3.34)
analyzed: yuktam caturmukha deva viśeṣa kalpanā tu sthūla dṛṣṭīn prati eva iti bhāvaḥ
viriñca manasoḥ atyantam abhinna tvam kathayati

original: viriñco manaso rūpaṃ viriñcasya mano vapuḥ /
analyzed: viriñcaḥ manasaḥ rūpam viriñcasya manaḥ vapuḥ

original: pṛthvyādi vidyate nātra tena pṛthvyādi kalpitam // MU_3,3.35
analyzed: pṛthvī ādi vidyate na atra tena pṛthvī ādi kalpitam
utpādana ākhya eka kārya kāri tvāt

original: nanu viriñcarūpaṃ manaḥ upādānakāraṇaṃ vinā kathaṃ jagad utpādayati /
analyzed: nanu viriñca rūpam manaḥ upādānakāraṇam vinā katham jagat utpādayati

original: kulālasya mṛdākhyam upādānakāraṇaṃ vinā ghaṭodbhāvane śaktir astīty / atrāha
analyzed: kulālasya mṛd ākhyam upādānakāraṇam vinā ghaṭa udbhāvane śaktiḥ asti iti atra āha
padma akṣe padminī vā antar manohṛdī asti dṛśya tā

original: manodṛśyadṛśau bhinne na kadācana kiñcana // MU_3,3.36
analyzed: manaḥ dṛśya dṛśau bhinne na kadācana kiñcana
sarva śakti yuktāt cit mātrāt tathā eva utthānāt

original: padminyāś ca padmākṣāntargatatvaṃ tataḥ nirgamenānumeyam / na
analyzed: padminyāḥ ca padma akṣa antargata tvam tatas nirgamena anumeyam na

original: hi yat yadantar na bhavati tat tataḥ niryāti /
analyzed: hi yat yad antar na bhavati tat tatas niryāti
a taḥ manaḥ dṛśya dṛśau manaḥ dṛś dṛśya dṛś ca
atas svatas bhinnasya upādānakāraṇasya atra apekṣā
tathā ca atra bhavat svapna saṅkalpaḥ citta rājya dhīḥ

original: svānubhūtyaiva dṛṣṭāntas tasmād dhṛdy asti dṛśyabhūḥ // MU_3,3.37
analyzed: sva anubhūtyā eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ tasmāt hṛdi asti dṛśya bhūḥ
ca atra ca iti spaṣṭam ā atra
tasmāt citta vikalpa sthaḥ piśācaḥ bālakam yathā

original: vinihanty evam eṣāntar draṣṭāraṃ dṛśyarūpikā // MU_3,3.38
analyzed: vinihanti evam eṣā antar draṣṭāram dṛśya rūpikā
yathā aṅkuraḥ ntar bījasya saṃsthitaḥ deśa kālataḥ

original: karoti bhāsuraṃ dehaṃ tanoty evaṃ hi dṛśyadhīḥ // MU_3,3.39
analyzed: karoti bhāsuram deham tanoti evam hi dṛśya dhīḥ

original: idaṃ ślokatrayaṃ ca prathamasargāntyabhāge gatam iti na punar āyastam //
analyzed: idam śloka trayam ca prathama sarga antya bhāge gatam iti na punar āyastam

original: sac cen na śāmyati kadācana dṛśyaduḥkhaṃ dṛśye tv aśāmyati na boddhari kevalatvam /
analyzed: sat ced na śāmyati kadācana dṛśya duḥkham dṛśye tu a śāmyati na boddhari kevala tvam

original: dṛśye tv asambhavati boddhari boddhṛbhāvaḥ śāmyet sthite 'pi hi tad asya vimokṣam āhuḥ // MU_3,3.40
analyzed: dṛśye tu asambhavati boddhari boddhṛ bhāvaḥ śāmyet sthite hi tat asya vimokṣam āhuḥ
idam anubhūyamānam dṛśya duḥkham dṛśya ākāram duḥkham

original: nābhāvo vidyate sata iti nyāyād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ iti nyāyāt iti arthaḥ
a boddhṛ rūpa tā iti yāvat
sva vyatiriktasya dṛśya stha bodhya tayā sthita tvāt
ukta nyāyena anutpatti sa tattva utpatti yukte sati

original: na hi dṛśyarahitasya draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛtvaṃ nāma kiñcid asti /
analyzed: na hi dṛśya rahitasya draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛ tvam nāma kiñcid asti
nanu tena boddhṛ bhāva śamanena kim setsyati iti
atra āha hi tat asya iti

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe tṛtīyaḥ sargaḥ
om śrī vālmīkiḥ bharadvājam prati kathayati
kathayati evam uddāma vacanam muni nāyake

original: śrotum ekarase jāte jane mauna iva sthite // MU_3,4.1
