analyzed: śrotum ekarase jāte jane maune iva sthite  /
śānteṣu kiṅkiṇī jāla svaneṣu spandanam vinā
pañjara antara hārīta śukeṣu api asta keliṣu

original: cirasthitiḥ dhīḥ iti dārḍhyaṃ gatā ātivāhikadehaviṣayā buddhir iti /
analyzed: cira sthitiḥ dhīḥ iti dārḍhyam gatā ātivāhika deha viṣayā buddhiḥ iti

original: manaḥsvarūpātivāhikadehaviṣayā buddhir eva hi dārḍhyaṃ gatādhibhautikabhāvena sphurati
analyzed: manaḥ svarūpa ātivāhika deha viṣayā buddhiḥ eva hi dārḍhyam gata ādhibhautika bhāvena sphurati

original: / na tu māṃsamayaḥ ādhibhautiko nāma kaścit pṛthag asti yathā tathā sato 'pi tasya buddhiviṣayatvaṃ vinā asatkalpatvāt /
analyzed: na tu māṃsa mayaḥ ādhibhautikaḥ nāma kaścid pṛthak asti yathā tathā tasya buddhi viṣaya tvam vinā asat kalpa tvāt
buddhi viṣaya tve tu buddhi rūpa tva anapāyāt

original: viṣayo hi sa evocyate yaḥ viṣayyagrastha iva bhāsate /
analyzed: viṣayaḥ hi saḥ eva ucyate yaḥ viṣayi agra sthaḥ iva bhāsate
anyathā pīta dravyasya api nīla jñāna viṣaya tva āpātāt
dṛśya tva sādhana artham manasaḥ dṛśya paryāya tvam kathayati

original: avidyā saṃsṛtiś cittaṃ mano bandho malaṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: avidyā saṃsṛtiḥ cittam manaḥ bandhaḥ malam tamaḥ

original: iti paryāyanāmāni dṛśyasya vidur uttamāḥ // MU_3,4.46
analyzed: iti paryāya nāmāni dṛśyasya viduḥ uttamāḥ

original: ataḥ manaḥ dṛśyam evānyathā dṛśyaparyāyatvam asya na syād iti // (MT_3,4.46)
analyzed: atas manaḥ dṛśyam eva anyathā dṛśya paryāya tvam asya na syāt iti

original: nanu padārthagrāhakatayā bhāsamānasya manasaḥ kathaṃ dṛśyaparyāyatvaṃ yuktam ity /
analyzed: nanu padārtha grāhaka tayā bhāsamānasya manasaḥ katham dṛśya paryāya tvam yuktam iti

original: na hi dṛśyād ṛte kiñcin manaso rūpam asti hi /
analyzed: na hi dṛśyāt ṛte kiñcid manasaḥ rūpam asti hi

original: dṛśyaṃ cotpannam evaitan neti vakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ // MU_3,4.47
analyzed: dṛśyam ca utpannam eva etat na iti vakṣyāmi aham punar
dṛśyāt ṛte kiñcid dṛśya vyatiriktam kiñcid

original: ataḥ manasaḥ dṛśyaparyāyatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: atas manasaḥ dṛśya paryāya tvam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: etat dṛśyaṃ ca utpannaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: etat dṛśyam ca utpannam na bhavati

original: ataḥ manaḥ api anutpannam eva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ / nanu
analyzed: atas manaḥ api anutpannam eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ nanu

original: dṛśyānutpannatve mama pūrvaṃ niścayo na jāta ity atrāhetīti /
analyzed: dṛśya anutpanna tve mama pūrvam niścayaḥ na jātaḥ iti atra āha iti iti
aham iti etat dṛśya anutpanna tvam
yathā kamala bīje ntar sthitā kamalamañjarī

original: mahācitparamāṇvantas tathā dṛśyaṃ jagat sthitam // MU_3,4.48
analyzed: mahā cit paramāṇu antar tathā dṛśyam jagat sthitam
tathā dṛśyam jagat dṛśi kriyā viṣayībhūtam jagat
sā eva ati sūkṣma tvāt paramāṇuḥ

original: anyathā kutaḥ asyāḥ nirgamaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anyathā kutas asyāḥ nirgamaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ
atas dṛśyasya mahā citaḥ pṛthaktva abhāvena anutpanna tvam
prakāśasya yathā ālokaḥ yathā vātasya copanam

original: yathā dravatvaṃ payaso dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭur īdṛśam // MU_3,4.49
analyzed: yathā drava tvam payasaḥ dṛśya tvam draṣṭuḥ īdṛśam
ālokaḥ artha prākaṭya hetuḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ
draṣṭṛ vyatirikta dṛśyasya sattā na asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: aṅgadatvaṃ yathā hemni mṛganadyāṃ yathā jalam /
analyzed: aṅgada tvam yathā hemni mṛga nadyām yathā jalam

original: bhittir yathā svapnapure tathā draṣṭari dṛśyadhīḥ // MU_3,4.50
analyzed: bhittiḥ yathā svapna pure tathā draṣṭari dṛśya dhīḥ

original: anena nyāyena draṣṭuḥ dṛśyamayatvaṃ yat siddhaṃ tad api malatvenonmṛjyatayā pratijānīte
analyzed: anena nyāyena draṣṭuḥ dṛśya maya tvam yat siddham tat api mala tvena unmṛjya tayā pratijānīte

original: evaṃ draṣṭari dṛśyatvam ananyad iva yat sthitam /
analyzed: evam draṣṭari dṛśya tvam ananyat iva yat sthitam

original: tad apy unmārjayāmy āśu tvaccittādarśato malam // MU_3,4.51
analyzed: tat api unmārjayāmi āśu tvad citta ādarśataḥ malam
evam sati draṣṭari dṛśi kriyā kartari
yat dṛśya tvam dṛśi kriyā viṣaya tvam

original: tat api draṣṭur abhinnaṃ dṛśyatvam api /
analyzed: tat api draṣṭuḥ abhinnam dṛśya tvam api
tvad citta ādarśataḥ tvad citta darpaṇāt

original: yena sarvathā tvanmanasi dṛśyasparśo na syād /
analyzed: yena sarvathā tvad manasi dṛśya sparśaḥ na syāt
duḥkha dam eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu draṣṭur abhinnasya dṛśyatvasya kathaṃ malatvaṃ
analyzed: nanu draṣṭuḥ abhinnasya dṛśya tvasya katham mala tvam
vyatiriktasya eva mala tvāt iti ced

original: draṣṭā svābhinnatvenāpi niścitaṃ dṛśyatvaṃ svabhinnatvam api āpādayati /
analyzed: draṣṭā sva abhinna tvena api niścitam dṛśya tvam sva bhinna tvam api āpādayati

original: pratiyoginaṃ vinā svābhinnatvasyāsiddher iti svabhinnatvāpādakasya dṛśyasya malatvaṃ
analyzed: pratiyoginam vinā sva abhinnatvasya asiddheḥ iti sva bhinnatva āpādakasya dṛśyasya mala tvam
sphuṭam evā iti na kaḥ pi virodhaḥ

original: nanu kimarthaṃ draṣṭur ananyatvena sthitasya malarūpasya api dṛśyatvasyonmārjanaṃ karoṣīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kimartham draṣṭuḥ ananya tvena sthitasya mala rūpasya api dṛśya tvasya unmārjanam karoṣi iti atra āha

original: yad draṣṭur asyādraṣṭṛtvaṃ dṛśyābhāve bhaved balāt /
analyzed: yat draṣṭuḥ asya adraṣṭṛ tvam dṛśya abhāve bhavet balāt

original: tad viddhi kevalībhāvam ata evāsataḥ sataḥ // MU_3,4.52
analyzed: tat viddhi kevalībhāvam atas eva asataḥ sataḥ

original: na hi dṛśyaṃ vinā draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛtvaṃ nāma kiñcid asti /
analyzed: na hi dṛśyam vinā draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛ tvam nāma kiñcid asti
draṣṭuḥ dṛśya an aunmukhya mātrasya eva mukti tvāt

original: sarvathā dṛśyonmārjanam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: sarvathā dṛśya unmārjanam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu dṛśyābhāvaprabhāvāt siddhe 'pi adraṣṭṛtve kevalībhāvo na sidhyati /
analyzed: nanu dṛśya abhāva prabhāvāt siddhe pi adraṣṭṛ tve kevalī bhāvaḥ na sidhyati

original: dṛśyaviṣayasya rāgādeḥ suṣuptivat vāsanābhāvena sthitatvād ity / atrāha
analyzed: dṛśya viṣayasya rāga ādeḥ suṣupti vat vāsanā bhāvena sthita tvāt iti atra āha
tad tām upagate bhāve rāga dveṣa ādi vāsanā

original: śāmyaty aspandite vāte spandasaṅkṣubdhatā yathā // MU_3,4.53
analyzed: śāmyati aspandite vāte spanda saṅkṣubdha tā yathā
tad tām dṛśya abhāva kṛtām adraṣṭṛ tām
rāga dveṣa ādi vāsanā pūrvam bhāta dṛśya viṣaya rāga dveṣa ādi saṃskāraḥ
suṣuptau tu āśraya viṣayayoḥ vāsanā bhāvena

original: sthitatvāt tadanugatayoḥ rāgadveṣādikayor api vāsanābhāvenāvasthānam asti / na hi
analyzed: sthita tvāt tad anugatayoḥ rāga dveṣa ādikayoḥ api vāsanā bhāvena avasthānam asti na hi
suṣuptau draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ sa mūlam nāśaḥ asti
tatas utthitasya punar tad āsthā bhāva prasaṅgāt

original: dṛśyābhāve niścitānāṃ tu bhāsamāne 'pi dṛśye kadācid āsthā na
analyzed: dṛśya abhāve niścitānām tu bhāsamāne dṛśye kadācid āsthā na

original: vidyate / atra svamana eva sākṣikam ity alaṃ prapañcena /
analyzed: vidyate atra sva manaḥ eva sākṣikam iti alam prapañcena
rāga dveṣa ādi vāsanā kā yathā
vāta kṛtā spanda saṅkṣubdha tā spanda rūpā saṅkṣubdha tā
atas dṛśya abhāva kṛtasya adraṣṭṛ tvasya
kevalībhāva tvam yuktam evā iti bhāvaḥ

original: etad eva atidurbodhatvāt punaḥ punaḥ kathayati
analyzed: etat eva ati durbodha tvāt punar punar kathayati
asambhavati sarvasmin diś bhūmi ākāśa rūpiṇi

original: prakāśye yādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ prakāśasyāmalaṃ bhavet // MU_3,4.54
analyzed: prakāśye yādṛśam rūpam prakāśasya amalam bhavet

original: trijagat tvam ahaṃ ceti dṛśye 'sattām upāgate /
analyzed: trijagat tvam aham ca iti dṛśye sattām upāgate

original: draṣṭuḥ syāt kevalībhāvas tādṛśo vimalātmanaḥ // MU_3,4.55
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ syāt kevalībhāvaḥ tādṛśaḥ vimala ātmanaḥ
diś bhūmi ākāśa rūpiṇi diś bhūmi ākāśa svarūpe
sambhava kriyā kartṛ tvam abhajati sati

original: na hi sūryamaṇḍalāt niṣkrāntaḥ bhittau apatitaḥ prakāśaḥ netragamyaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: na hi sūrya maṇḍalāt niṣkrāntaḥ bhittau apatitaḥ prakāśaḥ netra gamyaḥ bhavati

original: trijagat tvaṃ ahaṃ ceti dṛśye asattām abhāvam /
analyzed: trijagat tvam aham ca iti dṛśye asattām abhāvam
draṣṭuḥ dṛśya prakāśaka tayā sthitasya draṣṭuḥ
amala ātmanaḥ ca iti amala rūṣita cit mātra svarūpasya anyathā kevalībhāva apara paryāyaḥ nirmalībhāvaḥ ayuktaḥ
ananta akhila śaila ādi pratibimbe hi yādṛśī
syāt darpaṇe darpaṇa tā kevala ātma svarūpiṇī

original: ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ityādau praśānte dṛśyasambhrame /
analyzed: aham tvam jagat ityādau praśānte dṛśya sambhrame

original: syāt tādṛśī kevalatā sthite draṣṭary avīkṣake // MU_3,4.57
analyzed: syāt tādṛśī kevala tā sthite draṣṭari avīkṣake

original: dārṣṭāntikagataṃ praśānte iti padaṃ dṛṣṭānte 'pi yojanīyaṃ /
analyzed: dārṣṭāntika gatam praśānte iti padam dṛṣṭānte yojanīyam

original: dārṣṭāntikatayā gṛhīte darpaṇe pratibimbabhāvam abhajati sati iti yāvat /
analyzed: dārṣṭāntika tayā gṛhīte darpaṇe pratibimba bhāvam abhajati sati iti yāvat
darpaṇe kevala ātma svarūpiṇī kevala darpaṇa ākhya svarūpa mayī

original: ahaṃ tvaṃ jagad ityādau dṛśyasambhrame dṛśyākāre sambhrame /
analyzed: aham tvam jagat ityādau dṛśya sambhrame dṛśya ākāre sambhrame

original: yathā pratibimbābhāve śuddhaṃ darpaṇamātram eva tiṣṭhati tathā dṛśyābhāve śuddhaḥ
analyzed: yathā pratibimba abhāve śuddham darpaṇa mātram eva tiṣṭhati tathā dṛśya abhāve śuddhaḥ
dṛśya abhāva asambhavam manyamānaḥ śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: sac cen na śāmyatīdaṃ vā nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
analyzed: sat ced na śāmyati idam vā na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ

original: asattāṃ ca na vidmo 'smin dṛśye doṣapradāyini // MU_3,4.58
analyzed: asat tām ca na vidmaḥ smin dṛśye doṣa pradāyini
anyathā vahneḥ api dāhaka tva hāniḥ syāt
atra āha asat tām ca iti

original: asataḥ doṣapradāyitvaṃ na yuktaṃ vandhyāsutasyāpi tattvāpatter iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: asataḥ doṣa pradāyi tvam na yuktam vandhyā sutasya api tattva āpatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: tasmāt katham iyaṃ śāmyed brahman dṛśyaviṣūcikā /
analyzed: tasmāt katham iyam śāmyet brahman dṛśya viṣūcikā

original: unmārjayāmīti pratijñāṃ saphalīkartuṃ śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ uttaraṃ kathayati
analyzed: unmārjayāmi iti pratijñām saphalīkartum śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ uttaram kathayati

original: asya dṛśyapiśācasya śāntyai mantram imaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: asya dṛśya piśācasya śāntyai mantram imam śṛṇu

original: rāmātyantam ayaṃ yena mṛtim eṣyati naṅkṣyati // MU_3,4.60
analyzed: rāma atyantam ayam yena mṛtim eṣyati naṅkṣyati

original: yuktaṃ ca piśācasya mantreṇa maraṇam adarśanaṃ ca //
analyzed: yuktam ca piśācasya mantreṇa maraṇam adarśanam ca

original: yad asti tasya nāśo 'sti na kadācana rāghava /
analyzed: yat asti tasya nāśaḥ sti na kadācana rāghava

original: yasmāt tan naṣṭam apy antar bījabhūtaṃ bhaved dhṛdi // MU_3,4.61
analyzed: yasmāt tat naṣṭam api antar bīja bhūtam bhavet dhṛdi

original: naṣṭam api kenacit parābhimatena samavāyikāraṇanāśādinā naṣṭam api /
analyzed: naṣṭam api kenacid para abhimatena samavāyi kāraṇa nāśa ādinā naṣṭam api

original: bījabhāvena sthitam vā sattārūpeṇa sthitam iti yāvat /
analyzed: bīja bhāvena sthitam vā sattā rūpeṇa sthitam iti yāvat

original: dṛśyate hi naṣṭam api vastu hṛdi punaḥ punaḥ āvartamānam //
analyzed: dṛśyate hi naṣṭam api vastu hṛdi punar punar āvartamānam
samavāyi kāraṇa nāśa ādinā na anśa ādi

original: nanu tataḥ ko doṣaḥ ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tatas kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atra āha
smṛti bījā cit ākāśe punar udbhūya dṛśya dhīḥ
loka śāila ambara ākāram doṣam vitanute tanum

original: lokaśailāmbarākāram doṣam punaḥ vitanute sūkṣmaprapañcabhāvena viśeṣeṇa vistārayati /
analyzed: loka śaila ambara ākāram doṣam punar vitanute sūkṣma prapañca bhāvena viśeṣeṇa vistārayati

original: itthaṃ nirmokṣadoṣaḥ syān na ca tasyāṃśasambhavaḥ /
analyzed: ittham nirmokṣa doṣaḥ syāt na ca tasya aṃśa sambhavaḥ
yasmāt deva ṛṣi munayaḥ dṛśyante mukti bhājanam
sthūla sūkṣma bhāvena dvividhasya dṛśya abhāvasya eva mokṣa tvāt
aṃśena api sambhavaḥ na ca bhavati
yasmāt deva ṛṣi munayaḥ mukti bhājanam dṛśyante

original: yadi syāj jagadādīdaṃ tat syān mokṣo na kasyacit /
analyzed: yadi syāt jagat ādi idam tat syāt mokṣaḥ na kasyacid

original: bāhyastham astu hṛtsthaṃ vā dṛśyaṃ nāśāya kevalam // MU_3,4.64
analyzed: bāhya stham astu hṛd stham vā dṛśyam nāśāya kevalam

original: yadi idam jagadādi syāt sattāṃ bhajet /
analyzed: yadi idam jagat ādi syāt sattām bhajet

original: yathā tathā sambhāvite 'pi dṛśyanāśe smṛtiprabhāvāt sūkṣmatayā punaḥ dṛśyasphuraṇāt
analyzed: yathā tathā sambhāvite pi dṛśya nāśe smṛti prabhāvāt sūkṣma tayā punar dṛśya sphuraṇāt
hṛd stham sūkṣma rūpam vai astu
nāśāya bandha ākhya nāśa utpāda artham bhavati
ādi śabdena suṣupti staimitya ādeḥ grahaṇam

original: nanu tarhi kiṃ kāryam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi kim kāryam iti atra āha

original: tasmād imāṃ pratijñāṃ tvaṃ śṛṇu rāmātibhīṣaṇām /
analyzed: tasmāt imām pratijñām tvam śṛṇu rāma ati bhīṣaṇām

original: yām uttareṇa granthena nūnaṃ tvam avabudhyase // MU_3,4.65
analyzed: yām uttareṇa granthena nūnam tvam avabudhyase
ati bhīṣaṇa tvam ca pratijñāyāḥ asambhava pravṛtta tvena jñeyam
śrī rāma avabodha nimittam uttara grantham eva kathayati
ayam ākāśa bhūta ādi rūpaḥ haṃ ca iti lakṣitaḥ

original: jagacchabdasya rāmārtho nanu nāsty eva kaścana // MU_3,4.66
analyzed: jagat śabdasya rāma arthaḥ nanu na asti eva kaścana
tathā aham ca iti lakṣitaḥ niścitaḥ

original: paramārthataḥ nāsty eva sattāṃ na bhajati eva /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ na asti eva sattām na bhajati eva
na tu sattā bhāj bhūtvā naśyati
tathā ca sati na nirmokṣa doṣa prasaṅgaḥ

original: / na hi asataḥ bandhakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi asataḥ bandhaka tvam dṛṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ
ākāśasya bhūta tve pi prādhānyena pṛthak nirdeśaḥ

original: nanu puraḥsphurataḥ ahamādikasya jagataḥ kathaṃ sarvathā sattvaṃ yuktam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu puras sphurataḥ aham ādikasya jagataḥ katham sarvathā sattvam yuktam iti atra āha

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcid dṛśyajālaṃ purogatam /
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate kiñcid dṛśya jālam purogatam

original: evaṃ brahmaiva tat sarvam ajarāmaram avyayam // MU_3,4.67
analyzed: evam brahma eva tat sarvam ajara amaram avyayam

original: asmābhiḥ yad idaṃ purogataṃ dṛśyajālaṃ nīlasukhādirūpaḥ dṛśyasamūhaḥ /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ yat idam purogatam dṛśya jālam nīla sukha ādi rūpaḥ dṛśya samūhaḥ
tat sarvam ajara amaram deha rahita tvāt tanmātra gata jarā ādi rahitam
brahma eva jagat tayā bṛṃhitam śuddha cit tattvam eva
dṛśyate hi jalasya taraṅga bhāvena bhavanam

original: tathā ca sati bhāsamānasyāpi jagataḥ asattvaṃ yuktam eva / na hi jale
analyzed: tathā ca sati bhāsamānasya api jagataḥ asattvam yuktam eva na hi jale

original: bhāsamānasyāpi taraṅgasya sattvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: bhāsamānasya api taraṅgasya sattvam dṛṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ
dṛśyasya brahma mātra tvam eva dṛḍhīkaroti

original: pūrṇe pūrṇaṃ prasarati pare śāntaṃ paraṃ sthitam /
analyzed: pūrṇe pūrṇam prasarati pare śāntam param sthitam

original: vyomany evoditaṃ vyoma brahma brahmaṇi tiṣṭhati // MU_3,4.68
analyzed: vyomani eva uditam vyoma brahma brahmaṇi tiṣṭhati
atra saptamī antaiḥ śuddhacit tattvasya kathanam
nanu katham pūrṇa tva ādi guṇa yukte śuddha cit tattve
avasthānam atra ādheya bhāvena na asti

original: kiṃ tu tanmātratābhāveneti nātra doṣaprasaṅgaḥ / ity alaṃ
analyzed: kim tu tanmātra tā bhāvena iti na atra doṣa prasaṅgaḥ iti alam

original: na dṛśyam asti no dṛk ca na draṣṭā na ca darśanam /
analyzed: na dṛśyam asti no dṛś ca na draṣṭā na ca darśanam

original: na śūnyaṃ na jaḍaṃ no cic chāntam evedam ātatam // MU_3,4.69
analyzed: na śūnyam na jaḍam na u cit śāntam eva idam ātatam
sarveṣām eṣām pratīti mātra sāra tvāt

original: nanu tarhi etad abhāva evāstī-ty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi etat abhāvaḥ eva asti iti atra āha

original: na hi sar-vathā asataḥ bhānaṃ yuktaṃ /
analyzed: na hi sarvathā asataḥ bhānam yuktam
śaśi śṛṅga ādeḥ api bhāna āpatteḥ nanu tarhi

original: jāḍye hi sarveṣām asattā eva bhavatīty /
analyzed: jāḍye hi sarveṣām asat tā eva bhavati iti
tattve hi dṛśya ādi bhānam ayuktam syāt

original: nanu tarhi śiṣṭā cid eva syād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi śiṣṭā cit eva syāt iti atra āha
no cit iti cit cit mātram
cetya apekṣa tvena tasyāḥ sthita tvāt
ca ityasya ca ukta nyāyena asambhavāt nanu

original: na hi sarvathā asattā buddhyai ārohatīty /
analyzed: na hi sarvathā asattā buddhyai ārohati iti
cetya kṣobha rahitam cit mātram bhavati

original: atra niścayam anāpnuvan śrīrāmaḥ muneḥ asambhavārthābhidhāyitvam āsañjayati
analyzed: atra niścayam an āpnuvan śrī rāmaḥ muneḥ asambhava artha abhidhāyi tvam āsañjayati
vandhyāputreṇa piṣṭaḥ driḥ śaśa śṛṅgam pramāyate

original: prasārya bhujasaṅghātaṃ śilā nṛtyati tāṇḍavam // MU_3,4.70
analyzed: prasārya bhuja saṅghātam śilā nṛtyati tāṇḍavam

original: garjanti citrajaladā itīvedaṃ vacaḥ prabho // MU_3,4.71
analyzed: garjanti citra jaladāḥ iti iva idam vacaḥ prabho

original: janaiḥ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ pramāyate pramātum ārabhyate ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: janaiḥ śaśa śṛṅgam pramāyate pramātum ārabhyate iti arthaḥ

original: sarvathā asambaddhārthābhidhāyy eva tava vacanam iti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: sarvathā asambaddha artha abhidhāyi eva tava vacanam iti bhāvaḥ
asambhava artha pratipādaka tva āropa prakāśi tā vinaya nirāsana artham prabho iti āmantraṇam
jarā maraṇa duḥkha ādi śaila ākāśa mayam jagat

original: nāstīti kim idaṃ nāma bhavatāpi mamocyate // MU_3,4.72
analyzed: na asti iti kim idam nāma bhavatā api mama ucyate

original: na hi pratyakṣam anubhūyamānasya jarādirūpasya bhāvajātasyāpahnavaḥ yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi pratyakṣam anubhūyamānasya jarā ādi rūpasya bhāva jātasya apahnavaḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
api śabdaḥ śrī vasiṣṭhasya asambhava vādi tva ayogya tva sūcana arthaḥ
mama iti anena svasya sat śiṣya tvam dyotayati

original: yathety etat satyam evāsti tarhi yuktaṃ kathayety /
analyzed: yathā iti etat satyam eva asti tarhi yuktam kathaya iti

original: yathedaṃ na sthitaṃ viśvaṃ notpannaṃ na ca vidyate /
analyzed: yathā idam na sthitam viśvam na utpannam na ca vidyate

original: tathā kathaya me brahman yenaitan niścitaṃ bhavet // MU_3,4.73
analyzed: tathā kathaya me brahman yena etat niścitam bhavet
na a samanvita vāc asmi śṛṇu rāghava kathyate

original: yathedam asad ābhāti vandhyāputra ivāravī // MU_3,4.74
analyzed: yathā idam asat ābhāti vandhyā putraḥ iva āravī

original: idam ādāv anutpannaṃ sargādau tena nāsty alam /
analyzed: idam ādau anutpannam sarga ādau tena nā asti alam

original: idaṃ hi manasā bhāti svapnādau pattanaṃ yathā // MU_3,4.75
analyzed: idam hi manasā bhāti svapna ādau pattanam yathā
sarga ādau cit mātrasya cetya unmukha tā rūpe sarga ārambhe

original: acyuteḥ / tataḥ bhinnayā sattayāśritaṃ na āsīt /
analyzed: acyuteḥ tatas bhinnayā sattayā āśritam na āsīt

original: na hi bahir api mṛdaḥ utpadyamānasya ghaṭasya mṛdaḥ bhinnā sattā dṛśyate /
analyzed: na hi bahis api mṛdaḥ utpadyamānasya ghaṭasya mṛdaḥ bhinnā sattā dṛśyate
svapna pattana vat cit mātra sākṣi tā mātreṇa labdha sattāka tvāt

original: nanu tarhi katham idaṃ bhāsate ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi katham idam bhāsate iti atra āha
yathā svapna ādau pattanam manasā bhāti

original: nanu satsvarūpeṇa manasā bhātasya dṛśyasya sattvaṃ yuktam evety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu sat sva rūpeṇa manasā bhātasya dṛśyasya sattvam yuktam eva iti atra āha

original: mana eva ca sargādāv anutpannam asadvapuḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ eva ca sarga ādau anutpannam asat vapuḥ

original: tathaitac chṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathaitad anubhūyate // MU_3,4.76
analyzed: tathā etat śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā etat anubhūyate
sarga ādau prokta svarūpe sarga ārambhe
atas eva asat vapuḥ asat svarūpam bhavati

original: nanu prakṛtaṃ dṛśyāsattvakathanaṃ vihāya mano'sattvakathanam ayuktam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu prakṛtam dṛśya asattva kathanam vihāya manaḥ sattva kathanam ayuktam iti atra āha
manaḥ dṛśya mayam doṣam tanoti imam kṣaya ātmakam

original: asad evāsadākāraṃ svapnaḥ svapnāntaraṃ yathā // MU_3,4.77
analyzed: asat eva asat ākāram svapnaḥ svapna antaram yathā
dṛśya mayam doṣam dṛśya svarūpam doṣam
asat eva sphuraṇa mātra rūpa tvāt asat svarūpam eva

original: na hy asatā vistāritaṃ sat bhavituṃ yogyam
analyzed: na hi asatā vistāritam sat bhavitum yogyam
vandhyāputra vistāritasya vāc jālasya api sattā āpatteḥ

original: yathā asatsvarūpaḥ svapnaḥ asadākāraṃ svapnāntaraṃ tanoti /
analyzed: yathā asat svarūpaḥ svapnaḥ asat ākāram svapna antaram tanoti

original: dṛśyate hi svapne svapnāntaram iti nātra vivādaḥ // (MT_3,4.77)
analyzed: dṛśyate hi svapne svapna antaram iti na atra vivādaḥ

original: svāśrayabhūtaṃ dehaṃ praty api asyaiva kāraṇatvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: sva āśraya bhūtam deham prati api asya eva kāraṇa tvam kathayati

original: tat svayaṃ svairam evāśu saṅkalpayati dehakam /
analyzed: tat svayam svairam evā āśu saṅkalpayati dehakam
tena iyam indrajāla śrīḥ vitatena vitanyate

original: tat manaḥ / idaṃ dehakam ātmatayā bhāsamānaṃ sthūladeham /
analyzed: tat manaḥ idam dehakam ātma tayā bhāsamānam sthūla deham

original: punar api prakṛtam eva kathayati teneyam iti /
analyzed: punar api prakṛtam eva kathayati tena iyam iti
uktam artham sarga anta ślokena saṅgṛhya kathayati

original: sphurati gacchati valgati yācate bhavati majjati saṃharati svayam /
analyzed: sphurati gacchati valgati yācate bhavati majjati saṃharati svayam

original: aparatām upayāty api kevalaṃ calati cañcalaśaktitayā manaḥ // MU_3,4.79
analyzed: apara tām upayāti api kevalam calati cañcala śakti tayā manaḥ

original: tena yā kācit kriyā iha bhavati sā manaḥkṛtā eva bhavatīti saṅkṣiptārtha
analyzed: tena yā kācid kriyā iha bhavati sā manaḥ kṛtā eva bhavati iti saṅkṣipta artha

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe caturthaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe caturthaḥ sargaḥ

original: evaṃ manonirṇayam avaśyakartavyatayā śrutvā śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: evam manaḥ nirṇayam avaśya kartavya tayā śrutvā śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: bhagavan muniśārdūla kim iveha mano bhrame /
analyzed: bhagavat muni śārdūla kim iva iha manaḥ bhrame

original: vidyate katham utpannaṃ mano māyāmayaṃ kutaḥ // MU_3,5.1
analyzed: vidyate katham utpannam manaḥ māyā mayam kutas
bhagavat muni śārdūla he bhagavat muni śreṣṭha
iha bhrame asmin jagat rūpe bhrame

original: manaḥ kim iva vidyate kiṃsvarūpam ivāsti /
analyzed: manaḥ kim iva vidyate kiṃsvarūpam iva asti

original: tathā katham utpannam kena prakāreṇa prādurbhūtam /
analyzed: tathā katham utpannam kena prakāreṇa prādurbhūtam
manaḥ māyā mayam māyā svarūpam kutas bhavati

original: tatrāpy ādau utpattim eva kathayety abhiprāyeṇāha
analyzed: tatra api ādau utpattim eva kathaya iti abhiprāyeṇa āha

original: utpattim ādāv iti me samāsena vada prabho /
analyzed: utpattim ādau iti me samāsena vada prabho

original: pravakṣyasi tataḥ śiṣṭaṃ vaktavyaṃ vadatāṃ vara // MU_3,5.2
analyzed: pravakṣyasi tatas śiṣṭam vaktavyam vadatām vara
svayam eva śiṣṭa tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
aśeṣa dṛśye sarga ādau śāntam eva avaśiṣyate
mahāpralayasya turya ākhyasya avasthā viśeṣasya mahākalpa anta samayasya vā
sarga ādau aśeṣa dṛśye sṛṣṭi saṃhāra tad saṃskāra rūpe samaste dṛśye

original: śāntam eva śanaiḥ śanaiḥ sargādināśasākṣitākhyāt kṣobhād api niṣkrāntam kim apy anirvācyaṃ tattvam
analyzed: śāntam eva śanais śanais sarga ādi nāśa sākṣi tā ākhyāt kṣobhāt api niṣkrāntam kim api anirvācyam tattvam
atra sargaḥ sva viṣayam padārtha jāta sākṣi prati

original: / tayoḥ saṃskāraḥ padārthasaṃskāraṃ padārthābhāvasaṃskāraṃ ceti vibhāgo jñātavyaḥ //
analyzed: tayoḥ saṃskāraḥ padārtha saṃskāram padārtha abhāva saṃskāram ca iti vibhāgaḥ jñātavyaḥ
āste nastamitaḥ bhāsvān ajaḥ devaḥ nirāmayaḥ

original: sarvadā sarvakṛt sarvaḥ paramātmā maheśvaraḥ // MU_3,5.4
analyzed: sarvadā sarva kṛt sarvaḥ paramātmā maheśvaraḥ

original: paramātmā sarveṣāṃ paramārthataḥ ahantāviṣayatayā bhāsamānam kim apy āntaraṃ tattvam /
analyzed: paramātmā sarveṣām paramārthataḥ ahantā viṣaya tayā bhāsamānam kim api āntaram tattvam

original: prathamam mahāpralayasākṣibhāvena tadanantaram api yathā tathā kalpyamānānāṃ
analyzed: prathamam mahāpralaya sākṣi bhāvena tad anantaram api yathā tathā kalpyamānānām
sva abhāvānām sākṣi bhāvena sthita tvāt

original: atra sarvadā sthitasyātmanaḥ sthitivartamānatākathanaṃ pramātrapekṣayā prayuktatvāt na doṣāvaham
analyzed: atra sarvadā sthitasya ātmanaḥ sthiti vartamāna tā kathanam pramātṛ apekṣayā prayukta tvāt na doṣa āvaham

original: / kathambhūtaḥ asau paramātmety apekṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇāni kathayati anastamita iti /
analyzed: kathaṃbhūtaḥ asau paramātmā iti apekṣāyām viśeṣaṇāni kathayati an astamitaḥ iti

original: anastamitaḥ yathā tathā kalpitasya svāstasyāpi grāhakatvena sthitatvāt phalataḥ astarahitaḥ /
analyzed: an astamitaḥ yathā tathā kalpitasya sva astasya api grāhaka tvena sthita tvāt phalataḥ asta rahitaḥ
bhāsvān sākṣi tayā sarva prakāśaka tvāt sūrya svarūpaḥ
āścaryam ca bhāsvataḥ an astamita tvam

original: / na hy ātmanaḥ aprādurbhūtatvaṃ kadāpi yuktam /
analyzed: na hi ātmanaḥ aprādurbhūta tvam kadāpi yuktam
sva a prādurbhūteḥ api grāhaka tayā sthita tvāt
a krīḍā śīlaḥ hi hasta cālana mātrāt

original: anyathā māyākhyāmayagrastatvāt māyāprerakatvam ayuktam syāt / na hi
analyzed: anyathā māyā ākhyā āmaya grasta tvāt māyā preraka tvam ayuktam syāt na hi

original: sarvadā sarvakṛt sarveṣu deśeṣu kāleṣu ca sarvakārī /
analyzed: sarvadā sarva kṛt sarveṣu deśeṣu kāleṣu ca sarva kārī
anyathā anubhūyamānaḥ sarvadā sarva udbhavaḥ ayuktaḥ

original: anyathā sarve svasvabhāve niyatāḥ na syuḥ //
analyzed: anyathā sarve svasvabhāve niyatāḥ na syuḥ

original: yato vāco nivartante yo muktair avagamyate /
analyzed: yatas vācaḥ nivartante yaḥ muktaiḥ avagamyate

original: yasya cātmādikāḥ sañjñāḥ kalpitā na svabhāvajāḥ // MU_3,5.5
analyzed: yasya ca ātma ādikāḥ sañjñāḥ kalpitāḥ na svabhāva jāḥ

original: vācaḥ samastāḥ laukikāḥ vaidikāś ca vācaḥ /
analyzed: vācaḥ samastāḥ laukikāḥ vaidikāḥ ca vācaḥ

original: vāk hi saṅketaṃ puraskṛtya vastuni pravartate /
analyzed: vāc hi saṅketam puraskṛtya vastuni pravartate
indriya gocare eva vastuni hasta grāhikayā saṅketa karaṇam
dṛśyate tarhi asau na asti iti
muktaiḥ eva dṛśya anāsakta cittaiḥ eva

original: muktāḥ hi śuddhaṃ kim api tattvaṃ ātmatayā jānanti /
analyzed: muktāḥ hi śuddham kim api tattvam ātma tayā jānanti

original: / tathā cāsattā asya na yukteti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca asattā asya na yuktā iti bhāvaḥ
nanu vācām tatas nivartana kathanam ayuktam
ātma ādi śabdānām tad vācaka tvāt iti

original: kalpitāḥ pravṛttinimittam anapekṣyaiva tailapāyikādisañjñāvat kalpanayā sthāpitāḥ //
analyzed: kalpitāḥ pravṛtti nimittam an apekṣya eva tailapāyika ādi sañjñā vat kalpanayā sthāpitāḥ

original: nanu yadi saḥ eka evāsti tat kathaṃ sāṅkhyādibhiḥ puruṣādayaḥ kathitā ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi saḥ ekaḥ eva asti tat katham sāṅkhya ādibhiḥ puruṣa ādayaḥ kathitāḥ iti atra āha
yaḥ pumān sāṅkhya dṛṣṭīnām brahma vedānta vādinām
vijñāna mātram vijñāna vidām ekānta nirmalam

original: sāṅkhyāḥ hi prakṛtivyatiriktam jīvāparaparyāyaṃ puruṣam eva śeṣatvena kathayanti /
analyzed: sāṅkhyāḥ hi prakṛti vyatiriktam jīva apara paryāyam puruṣam eva śeṣa tvena kathayanti

original: sa ca vicāryamāṇaḥ uktaparamātmarūpatve eva viśrāmyatīti
analyzed: sa ca vicāryamāṇaḥ ukta paramātma rūpa tve eva viśrāmyati iti

original: yuktam uktaṃ yaḥ pumān sāṅkhyadṛṣṭīnām iti /
analyzed: yuktam uktam yaḥ pumān sāṅkhya dṛṣṭīnām iti
tathā ca nāma bhedasya eva sthita tvāt na ukta doṣa prasaṅga

original: iti bhāvaḥ / nanu śrīvasiṣṭhena kiṃ darśanam āśrityedaṃ śāstram uktam iti cet / satyam
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ nanu śrī vasiṣṭhena kim darśanam āśritya idam śāstram uktam iti ced satyam

original: / sarveṣāṃ darśanānāṃ sāram āśritya etenedaṃ śāstraṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: sarveṣām darśanānām sāram āśritya etena idam śāstram kṛtam
bāhulyena vedānta śāstra carcā atra dṛśyate
tad apekṣayā stokena mahā rahasya bhūtasya
śiva śāstrasya api iti alam aprakṛta cintanena
vijñānamātram ghaṭa paṭa ādi viṣayam nirākāram jñānam
yaḥ śūnya vādinām śūnyam bhāsakaḥ yaḥ rka tejasām

original: vaktā smartā ṛtaṃ bhoktā draṣṭā kartā sadaiva yaḥ // MU_3,5.7
analyzed: vaktā smartā ṛtam bhoktā draṣṭā kartā sadā eva yaḥ

original: tena sarveṣāṃ darśanānāṃ yat vastu viśrāntisthānaṃ bhavati tad asāv eveti jñeyam /
analyzed: tena sarveṣām darśanānām yat vastu viśrānti sthānam bhavati tat asau eva iti jñeyam
bhavati iti atra āha bhāsakaḥ iti
yaḥ arka tejasām arka ādi svarūpāṇām tejasām

original: tathā yaḥ sadā eva nityam eva /
analyzed: tathā yaḥ sadā eva nityam eva

original: vaktā smartā bhoktā draṣṭā kartā bhavati /
analyzed: vaktā smartā bhoktā draṣṭā kartā bhavati
samasta vaktra ādi ātma tvena sthita tvāt

original: sad apy asad yo jagati yo dehastho 'pi dūragaḥ /
analyzed: sat api asat yaḥ jagati yaḥ deha sthaḥ dūra gaḥ

original: citprakāśo hy ayaṃ yasmād āloka iva bhāsvataḥ // MU_3,5.8
analyzed: cit prakāśaḥ hi ayam yasmāt ālokaḥ iva bhāsvataḥ

original: yaḥ ātmā / sad api etāvataḥ jagadbhramasyādhiṣṭhānatayā sthitatvāt satsvarūpam api /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmā sat api etāvataḥ jagat bhramasya adhiṣṭhāna tayā sthita tvāt sat svarūpam api

original: dehasthaḥ api pāṣāṇarūpasya dehasyānyathā ceṣṭāśrayatvāyogāt tatrastho 'pi /
analyzed: deha sthaḥ api pāṣāṇa rūpasya dehasya anyathā ceṣṭā āśraya tva ayogāt tatrasthaḥ pi
anyathā ākāśa sthitānām sūrya ādīnām grahaṇam na syāt
ayam cit prakāśaḥ padārtha cetana rūpaḥ prakāśaḥ

original: yasmād viṣṇvādayo devāḥ sūryād iva marīcayaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt viṣṇu ādayaḥ devāḥ sūryāt iva marīcayaḥ

original: yasmāj jaganty anantāni budbudā jaladher iva // MU_3,5.9
analyzed: yasmāt jaganti anantāni budbudāḥ jaladheḥ iva

original: devāś cādhyātmikāḥ ādhidaivikāś ceti dvividhāḥ jñeyāḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ ca ādhyātmikāḥ ādhidaivikāḥ ca iti dvividhāḥ jñeyāḥ
yam yānti dṛśya vṛndāni payāṃsi iva mahā arṇavam

original: ya ātmānaṃ padārthaṃ ca prakāśayati dīpavat // MU_3,5.10
analyzed: yaḥ ātmānam padārtham ca prakāśayati dīpa vat
dṛśya vṛndāni yam draṣṭṛ rūpam yam

original: ākāśe yaḥ śarīre ca dṛśatsv apsu latāsu ca /
analyzed: ākāśe yaḥ śarīre ca dṛśatsu apsu latāsu ca

original: pāṃsuṣv adriṣu vāteṣu pātāleṣu ca saṃsthitaḥ // MU_3,5.11
analyzed: pāṃsuṣu adriṣu vāteṣu pātāleṣu ca saṃsthitaḥ

sthitatvam ātmanaḥ katham asti iti ced

original: anirvācyatā eva ca ātmanaḥ svarūpam iti na kaścid
analyzed: anirvācyatā eva ca ātmanaḥ svarūpam iti na kaścid

original: virodhaḥ / atha vā sthāvarāḥ tāvat ātmayuktāḥ nirātmakāḥ vā /
analyzed: virodhaḥ atha vā sthāvarāḥ tāvat ātmayuktāḥ nirātmakāḥ vā

analyzed: teṣām syāt sātmaka tve tu sphuṭam eva teṣu ātmanaḥ avasthānam iti yojyam

original: yaḥ plāvayati saṃrabdhaṃ puryaṣṭakam itas tataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ plāvayati saṃrabdham puryaṣṭakam itas tatas

analyzed: yena mūkīkṛtāḥ mūḍhāḥ śilādhyānam iva āsthitāḥ

original: yaḥ ātmā / puryaṣṭakam antaḥkaraṇatrayaṃ tanmātrapañcakam itisvarūpaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmā puryaṣṭakam antaḥkaraṇa trayam tanmātra pañcakam iti svarūpam puryaṣṭakam

original: itaḥ tataḥ plāvayati yatra tatra gamayati /
analyzed: itas tatas plāvayati yatra tatra gamayati
atyanta jaḍāḥ iva bhavanti iti yāvat
mūḍhānām api paramārthataḥ śuddha cit mātra rūpa tvāt

original: vyoma yena kṛtaṃ śūnyaṃ śailā yena ghanīkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: vyoma yena kṛtam śūnyam śailāḥ yena ghanīkṛtāḥ

original: āpo drutāḥ kṛtā yena dīpto yasya vaśād raviḥ // MU_3,5.13
analyzed: āpaḥ drutāḥ kṛtāḥ yena dīptaḥ yasya vaśāt raviḥ

tathā yena mṛd śilā bhāvam śritena yena ātmanā
tathā yena drava tva bhāvam gatena yena ātmanā
drutāḥ drava tva ākhya guṇa yuktāḥ

original: yasya vaśāt dīpanaśīlatejobhāvaṃ gatasya yasyātmanaḥ vaśena /
analyzed: yasya vaśāt dīpana śīla tejaḥ bhāvam gatasya yasya ātmanaḥ vaśena

saṃsāra asāra vṛṣṭayaḥ saṃsāra rūpāḥ dhārā sāra vṛṣṭayaḥ
yathā akṣaya amṛta sampūrṇāt avināśi jala pūrṇāt

original: sphuranty avirataṃ yasmin ghṛṇāv iva marīcayaḥ // MU_3,5.15

āvirbhāva tirobhāva mayyaḥ āvirbhāva tirobhāva yuktāḥ

original: gupto yo vyatirikto 'pi sarvabhāveṣu saṃsthitaḥ // MU_3,5.16

original: anyathā ātmarahitasya nāśasya kena rūpeṇa bhānaṃ

original: syāt / tathā vyatiriktaḥ api śuddhacinmātrarūpatvena samastapadārthottīrṇasvarūpaḥ api /

analyzed: anubhava mātra gamye smin vastuni pratibhāvadbhiḥ svayam api yatanīyam iti alam

original: jaḍaṃ paramaratnasya śāntam ātmani tiṣṭhataḥ // MU_3,5.21

original: yasya paramaratnasya sannidhau jaḍaṃ grāhyaikarūpatvena acetanam /

idam kāya ayaḥ śarīra ākhyam ayaḥ

original: niyatir deśakālau ca calanaṃ spandanaṃ kriyāḥ /

analyzed: kālaḥ sūrya cāra ādi anumeyaḥ kalanā mātra svarūpaḥ padārtha parivarti kārakaḥ vastu viśeṣaḥ

original: śuddhā kenāpi rūpeṇa niṣṭhāṃ na gatā /

original: kurvann apīva jagatāṃ mahatām ananta- spandaṃ na kiñcana karoti kadācanāpi /

original: svātmany anastamayasaṃvidi nirvikāre tyaktodayasthitimatiḥ sthita eka eva // MU_3,5.24

original: yaḥ ātmā mahatām jagatām anantaspandam kurvan api iva jagatprādurbhāvānyathānupapattyā mahājagadviṣayam anantaṃ spandaṃ kurvann apīva /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmā mahatām jagatām ananta spandam kurvan api iva jagat prādurbhāva anyathā anupapattyā mahā jagat viṣayam anantam spandam kurvan api iva

original: kadācana kiñcana na karoti atiśuddhena kartṛtvābhimānābhāvāt /

analyzed: anastamayā yathā tathā kalpitasya sva astamayasya api sākṣi tvena avasthānāt paramārthataḥ astamaya rahitā

original: jagataḥ udaye sthitau arthāt saṃhāre ca nirapekṣa ity arthaḥ
analyzed: jagataḥ udaye sthitau arthāt saṃhāre ca nirapekṣaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe pañcamaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe pañcamaḥ sargaḥ

original: oṃ evaṃ paramātmanaḥ svarūpaṃ māhātmyaṃ ca pratipādya śrīrāmaṃ tatprāptiṃ prati tvaramāṇaṃ
analyzed: om evam paramātmanaḥ svarūpam māhātmyam ca pratipādya śrī rāmam tad prāptim prati tvaramāṇam

tam dadāti iti tādṛśī na bhavati

original: nanv anuṣṭhānaṃ vinā kathaṃ yuktatā syād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu anuṣṭhānam vinā katham yukta tā syāt iti atra āha

original: atra jñānam anuṣṭhānaṃ na tv anyad upayujyate /
analyzed: atra jñānam anuṣṭhānam na tu anyat upayujyate

original: nanv īdṛśo 'sāv ātmā kutra tiṣṭhatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu īdṛśaḥ saḥ ātmā kutra tiṣṭhati iti atra āha

original: na caiṣa dūre nākāśe nālabhyo viṣamo na ca /
analyzed: na ca eṣa dūre na ākāśe na a labhyaḥ viṣamaḥ na ca
sva ānanda bhāsa rūpaḥ sau sva dehāt eva labhyate

original: eṣaḥ ātmā / dūre na ca bhavati /
analyzed: eṣaḥ ātmā dūre na ca bhavati
etena dūra stha mahā tīrtha āśraya tva śaṅkā nivāritā

na hi kaṭhine prema āspada tvam yuktam
etena aiśvarya leśa mada grasta rāja ādi vat kraurya āśaṅkā nivāritā
sva dehāt iti anena dūra stha tva ākāśa stha tvayoḥ nirāsaḥ
labhyate iti anena alabhya tva nirāsaḥ

original: nanu tapaḥprabhṛtināpi kecid ātmaprāptiṃ kathayantīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tapaḥ prabhṛtinā api kecid ātma prāptim kathayanti iti atra āha

original: tapodānavratādikam kiñcit nopakaroti leśenāpi upakāraṃ na karoti /
analyzed: tapaḥ dāna vrata ādikam kiñcid na upakaroti leśena api upakāram na karoti
bāhya aṅga tvena ārāt upakāraka tvāt
tapaḥ prabhṛtinā hi sattva śuddhiḥ eva
svabhāva viśrāntim ṛte svarūpa viśrāntim vihāya
svabhāva viśrāntau asamarthān prati upāyam kathayati
śāstra sat saṅga sat yogi para tā eva atra kevalam

original: sādhanaṃ bodhanaṃ mohajālasya yad akṛtrimam // MU_3,6.5
analyzed: sādhanam bodhanam moha jālasya yat akṛtrimam

original: śāstrādiparatāphalabhūtasyātmaviśrāntim prati sādhanabhūtasya mukhyam upāyatvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: śāstra ādi para tā phala bhūtasya ātma viśrāntim prati sādhana bhūtasya mukhyam upāya tvam kathayati

original: ayaṃ sa deva ity eva samparijñānamātrataḥ /
analyzed: ayam sa devaḥ iti eva samparijñāna mātrataḥ

original: jantor na jāyate duḥkhaṃ jīvanmuktatvam eti ca // MU_3,6.6

original: ayam ahantayā idantayā ca puraḥsphuraṇaśīlaḥ ahaṅkārādikaḥ saṃsāraḥ /

original: saḥ sarveṣāṃ paramārthataḥ ātmabhāvena sthitatvāt prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ sarveṣām paramārthataḥ ātma bhāvena sthita tvāt prasiddhaḥ

original: devaḥ dyotanaśīlaṃ krīḍāśīlaṃ ca cittattvaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: devaḥ dyotana śīlam krīḍā śīlam ca cit tattvam bhavati
