bharita avasthānena svasmin sthitāyāḥ cetana tāyāḥ
asatya tva jñānena tad ukte duḥkhe pi asatya tva jñānāt
atra ca cetya nirmukta tā jīvanmukta tā avasthāyām bhavati
acetya unmukha tā videha mukta tā avasthāyām iti vibhāgaḥ jñeyaḥ

original: nanu tadā asya cetanasya kīdṛśī avasthā bhaviṣyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tadā asya cetanasya kīdṛśī avasthā bhaviṣyati iti atra āha
bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ chidyante sarva saṃśayāḥ

original: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāpare // MU_3,7.10
analyzed: kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāpare
tasmin sarva ātma tvena sthita tvāt prasiddhe
parāpare para rūpa cinmātra apara rūpa cetana svarūpe mahā cit mātre
dṛṣṭe paramārthataḥ ātma bhāvena niścite sati
asyām bharita avasthāyām jñātāyām iti yāvat
tathā sarva saṃśayāḥ padārtha sva rūpa viṣayāḥ sarve sandehāḥ
tathā karmāṇi śarīra yātrā nimittam kṛtāni karmāṇi

original: nanu tarhi atyantopādeyabhūtaṃ acetyonmukhatvam evāhaṃ sādhayāmīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi atyanta upādeya bhūtam acetya unmukha tvam eva aham sādhayāmi iti atra āha
tasya cetya unmukha tvam tu cetyā sambhavanam vinā

original: roddhuṃ na śakyaṃ dṛśyaṃ tu cetyaṃ śāmyatu vai katham // MU_3,7.11
analyzed: roddhum na śakyam dṛśyam tu cetyam śāmyatu vai katham

original: cetyāsambhavanaṃ vinā roddhuṃ śakyaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: cetya asambhavanam vinā roddhum śakyam na bhavati

original: na hi tūlapiṇḍe patitaḥ agniḥ śānto bhavati /
analyzed: na hi tūla piṇḍe patitaḥ agniḥ śāntaḥ bhavati
na śāmyati eva sataḥ nāśā yogāt

original: cetyaṃ yadi asti tarhi kathaṃ śāmyet
analyzed: cetyam yadi asti tarhi katham śāmyet

original: / yadi nāsti tadā cetyānaunmukhyaṃ svayam eva siddhaṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: yadi nā asti tadā cetyā an aunmukhyam svayam eva siddham bhavati iti

original: na hi vandhyāputranāśacintā kenāpi kriyate iti //
analyzed: na hi vandhyā putra nāśa cintā kena api kriyate iti

original: dṛśyate paramātmā yaḥ sa brahman vada kīdṛśaḥ // MU_3,7.12
analyzed: dṛśyate paramātmā yaḥ sa brahman vada kīdṛśaḥ
he brahman puruṣeṇa sādhu saṅgama sat śāstraiḥ

original: śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ śrīrāmapraśnam anādṛtya pūrvoktam evārthaṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ śrī rāma praśnam an ādṛtya pūrva uktam eva artham kathayati

original: yad etac cetanaṃ jīvo viśīrṇo janmajaṅgale /
analyzed: yat etat cetanam jīvaḥ viśīrṇaḥ janma jaṅgale

original: etam ātmānam icchanti ye te 'jñāḥ paṇḍitā api // MU_3,7.13
analyzed: etam ātmānam icchanti ye te jñāḥ paṇḍitāḥ api

original: yad etat cetanam janmajaṅgale viśīrṇaḥ paricchinnatāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: yat etat cetanam janma jaṅgale viśīrṇaḥ paricchinna tām gataḥ

original: etam ye ātmānam icchanti te paṇḍitāḥ api dehātmābhimānibhyaḥ sakāśāt kiñcinmātram vicāriṇaḥ api /
analyzed: etam ye ātmānam icchanti te paṇḍitāḥ api deha ātma abhimānibhyaḥ sakāśāt kiñcinmātram vicāriṇaḥ api
jīvaḥ eva iha saṃsārāḥ cetanāt duḥkha santateḥ

original: asmiñ jñāte na vijñātaṃ kiñcid bhavati kutracit // MU_3,7.14
analyzed: asmin jñāte na vijñātam kiñcid bhavati kutracid
saṃsārāḥ jāgrat ādi bheda bhinnāḥ saṃsārāḥ
duḥkha santateḥ cetanāt saṃsāra gata duḥkha santateḥ

original: tarhi kasya jñānena kiñcit prāptaṃ bhavatīty / atrāha
analyzed: tarhi kasya jñānena kiñcid prāptam bhavati iti atra āha

original: jñāyate paramātmā ced rāma tad duḥkhasantatiḥ /
analyzed: jñāyate paramātmā ced rāma tat duḥkha santatiḥ

original: kṣayam eti viṣāveśaśāntāv iva viṣūcikā // MU_3,7.15
analyzed: kṣayam eti viṣa āveśa śāntau iva viṣūcikā

original: he rāma / paramātmā proktasya jīvasya sāratayā sthitam paramātmatattvam /
analyzed: he rāma paramātmā proktasya jīvasya sāra tayā sthitam paramātma tattvam
duḥkha santatiḥ saṃsāra rūpā duḥkha santatiḥ
tadā eva kiñcid prāptam bhavati iti arthaḥ
yathā sā viṣa āveśa śāntau kṣayam eti
śrī rāmaḥ paramātma svarūpa śravaṇa ākāṅkṣā nirbhara tvena kathana ayogya tvāt śrī vasiṣṭhena an ādṛtam
api ātma svarūpa praśnam punar karoti

original: rūpaṃ kathaya me brahman yathāvat paramātmanaḥ /
analyzed: rūpam kathaya me brahman yathāvat paramātmanaḥ

original: yasmin dṛṣṭe naro mohāt samagrāt santariṣyati // MU_3,7.16
analyzed: yasmin dṛṣṭe naraḥ mohāt samagrāt santariṣyati
śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ ākāṅkṣā nirbhara tvena śrī rāmasya adhikāri tvam niścitya uttaram kathayati

original: deśād deśāntaraṃ dūraṃ prāptāyāḥ saṃvido vapuḥ /
analyzed: deśāt deśa antaram dūram prāptāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ vapuḥ

original: nimeṣeṇaiva yan madhye tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // MU_3,7.17
analyzed: nimeṣeṇa eva yat madhye tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ
deśāt ālambanīkṛtāt ekasmāt saṃvedya rūpāt deśāt
madhye pūrva apara saṃvedya rāga arūṣitāyām madhya avasthāyām

original: * yat vapuḥ bhavati yat anirvācyaṃ svarūpaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yat vapuḥ bhavati yat anirvācyam svarūpam bhavati
sarva maya tve pi sarva uttīrṇa tvāt

original: nanu pūrvasaṃvedyam ālambanīkṛtya tadaivottarasaṃvedyam ālambanīkurvantyāḥ saṃvidaḥ kim idaṃ madhyaṃ nāma yatrasthāyāḥ
analyzed: nanu pūrva saṃvedyam ālambanīkṛtya tadā eva uttara saṃvedyam ālambanīkurvantyāḥ saṃvidaḥ kim idam madhyam nāma yatrasthāyāḥ
pūrva saṃvedyena rañjitāyāḥ saṃvidaḥ svam nirmalam
rūpam a prāpya uttara saṃvedyena kariṣyamāṇasya rāgasya ayukta tvāt nirmala sva rūpa tā mayam
madhyam avaśyam eva asti iti jñātavyam

original: yathā nīlīrāgarañjitasya paṭasya pītarāgakaraṇecchayā prakṣālaṇena sphuṭīkṛtaṃ śuddhapaṭatāmayaṃ madhyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yathā nīlī rāga rañjitasya paṭasya pīta rāga karaṇa icchayā prakṣālaṇena sphuṭīkṛtam śuddha paṭa tā mayam madhyam bhavati

original: nanu pūrvasaṃvedyaviṣayā saṃvit pūrvam eva kṣīṇā /
analyzed: nanu pūrva saṃvedya viṣayā saṃvid pūrvam eva kṣīṇā
uttara saṃvedya viṣayā tu navīnā jātā

original: tathā ca madhyaṃ nāma śūnyam evāstīti /
analyzed: tathā ca madhyam nāma śūnyam eva asti iti
kim śūnya rūpaḥ eva ātmā asti iti
ced na uttara saṃvedya grahaṇa kāle pūrva saṃvedya smṛti anupapatteḥ

original: na hi pūrvasaṃvedyagrahaṇakālasthāṃ madhye śuddharūpatayā sthitāṃ uttarasaṃvedyagrahaṇakāle
analyzed: na hi pūrva saṃvedya grahaṇa kāla sthām madhye śuddha rūpa tayā sthitām uttara saṃvedya grahaṇa kāle

original: 'pi sthitām ekāṃ saṃvidam antareṇa pūrvasaṃvedyaviṣayā smṛtiḥ upapadyate /
analyzed: pi sthitām ekām saṃvidam antareṇa pūrva saṃvedya viṣayā smṛtiḥ upapadyate
etena saṃvedya uparāga rahitam saṃvid tattvam paramātma tvena uktam

original: / atra cābhyāsaṃ kurvatām acirād ayatnenaiva paramātmalābho bhaviṣyaty / asyaiva ca
analyzed: atra ca abhyāsam kurvatām acirāt ayatnena eva paramātma lābhaḥ bhaviṣyati asya eva ca
madhya dhāma āveśaḥ iti nāma asti iti alam rahasya udghāṭanena

original: madhyam atidurlabham iti dūram ity uktam //
analyzed: madhyam ati durlabham iti dūram iti uktam
atyanta abhāvaḥ eva asti saṃsārasya jagat sthiteḥ

original: yasmin bodhamahāmbhodhau tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // MU_3,7.18
analyzed: yasmin bodha mahā ambhodhau tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ
yasmin bodha mahā ambhodhau bodha ākhye mahā samudre

original: atyantābhāva eva budbudavat traikālikaḥ abhāvaḥ eva /

analyzed: mumukṣuḥ sat śāstra ādibhiḥ prathamam rajju sarpa ādi dṛṣṭāntena

original: tataḥ kanakakaṭakādidṛṣṭāntena dṛśyasya brahmavyatiriktasattābhāvaṃ niścitya śuddhacittattvaikye jātaniścayaḥ yadā abhyāsabalena sarvatra śuddhacittattvamātram
analyzed: tatas kanaka kaṭaka ādi dṛṣṭāntena dṛśyasya brahma vyatirikta sattā bhāvam niścitya śuddha cit tattva aikye jāta niścayaḥ yadā abhyāsa balena sarvatra śuddha cit tattva mātram

original: evānubhavati suvarṇakāra iva kaṭakādiṣu suvarṇatām tadā tasya jñānam yatsvarūpaṃ bhavati
analyzed: eva anubhavati suvarṇakāraḥ iva kaṭaka ādiṣu suvarṇa tām tadā tasya jñānam yat svarūpam bhavati

original: jagadatyantābhāve niścitasyāpi hi pūrvaṃ jagad bhāsamānam āsīd eveti ced / asat etat
analyzed: jagat atyanta abhāve niścitasya api hi pūrvam jagat bhāsamānam āsīt eva iti ced asat etat

original: / paurvakālikaṃ mithyābhānaṃ hi vastunaḥ uttarakāle niścitaṃ traikālikābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ na nihanti /
analyzed: paurvakālikam mithyā bhānam hi vastunaḥ uttara kāle niścitam traikālika abhāva pratiyogi tvam na nihanti
pūrvam rajjau bhāte sarpe pi atyanta abhāva pratiyogi tva ghāti tva prasaṅgāt

original: / pūrvaṃ sarpatvena bhātāyāṃ rajjau tu sarve sarpasya traikālikātyantābhāvapratiyogitvaṃ sphuṭam eva paśyantīti
analyzed: pūrvam sarpa tvena bhātāyām rajjau tu sarve sarpasya traikālika atyanta abhāva pratiyogi tvam sphuṭam eva paśyanti iti

original: draṣṭṛdṛśyakramo yatra sthito 'py astam alaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ dṛśya kramaḥ yatra sthitaḥ pi astam alam gataḥ

original: yad anākāśam ākāśas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // MU_3,7.19
analyzed: yat an ākāśam ākāśaḥ tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: draṣṭṛdṛśyakramaḥ ayaṃ draṣṭā idaṃ dṛśyam ity evaṃrūpaḥ kramaḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ dṛśya kramaḥ ayam draṣṭā idam dṛśyam iti evaṃrūpaḥ kramaḥ

original: nanu sthitasya draṣṭṛdṛśyakramasya katham anyasmin layasambhavaḥ / tathā
analyzed: nanu sthitasya draṣṭṛ dṛśya kramasya katham anyasmin laya sambhavaḥ tathā

original: cānena dvāreṇa paramātmasvarūpakathanam ayuktam eveti cen /
analyzed: ca anena dvāreṇa paramātma svarūpa kathanam ayuktam evā iti ced

original: draṣṭṛdṛśyau tāvat kasyacit sākṣiṇaḥ bhātau bhavataḥ na vā /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ dṛśyau tāvat kasyacid sākṣiṇaḥ bhātau bhavataḥ na vā

original: na cet kathaṃ tarhi tayoḥ draṣṭṛdṛśyatve
analyzed: na ced katham tarhi tayoḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśya tve

original: sidhyataḥ / yathā tathā tatsiddhau api kathaṃ tayoḥ vyavasthā sidhyati /
analyzed: sidhyataḥ yathā tathā tad siddhau api katham tayoḥ vyavasthā sidhyati

original: ayaṃ draṣṭaivedaṃ dṛśyam eveti bhātau cet tarhi tasmin layaḥ tayoḥ sukaraḥ eva /
analyzed: ayam draṣṭā eva idam dṛśyam eva iti bhātau ced tarhi tasmin layaḥ tayoḥ sukaraḥ eva
na hi svapna sākṣiṇam atikramya svapna bhāte

original: draṣṭṛdṛśye kenāpi svarūpeṇa yukte sambhavataḥ iti na kaścid virodhaḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ dṛśye kena api sva rūpeṇa yukte sambhavataḥ iti na kaścid virodhaḥ

original: anākāśam grāhakaikasvabhāvatvena grāhyatvābhāvāt grāhyaikasvarūpākāśavyatiriktam api sat /
analyzed: anākāśam grāhaka eka svabhāva tvena grāhya tva abhāvāt grāhya eka svarūpa ākāśa vyatiriktam api sat
vyāpaka tva svaccha tva ādi guṇaiḥ ākāśa śabda vācyaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
na tu tad sadṛśam anyat kiñcid

original: aśūnyam iva yac chūnyaṃ yasmiñ śūnye jagat sthitam /
analyzed: a śūnyam iva yat śūnyam yasmin śūnye jagat sthitam

original: sargaughe sati yac chūnyaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // MU_3,7.20
analyzed: sarga oghe sati yat śūnyam tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ
śūnyam bāhya antaḥkaraṇa a grāhya tvena na kiñcid rūpam
anyathā jagat rūpa bhrama adhiṣṭhāna tva asambhavāt na hi asat
vandhyā putrasya api maitra bhrama adhiṣṭhāna tva prasaṅgāt
tathā śūnye prokta nyāyena śūnya svarūpe

original: anyathā jagataḥ kiṃrūpatvaṃ syāt iti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: anyathā jagataḥ kiṃrūpa tvam syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: sati adhiṣṭheyatayā kāryatayā vā sthitiṃ bhajati sati /
analyzed: sati adhiṣṭheya tayā kārya tayā vā sthitim bhajati sati
yat śūnyam sva vyatirikta vastu rahitam eva

original: na hi rajjau sarpāvasthānena mṛdi vā ghaṭāvasthānena svavyatiriktavastuyuktatvaṃ
analyzed: na hi rajjau sarpa avasthānena mṛdi vā ghaṭa avasthānena sva vyatirikta vastu yukta tvam

original: eva ] eva ⟨tayā vā sthitiṃ bhajati sati yat śūnyam svavyatiriktavasturahitam eva⟩ (MT_3,7.20)
analyzed: eva eva tayā vā sthitim bhajati sati yat śūnyam sva vyatirikta vastu rahitam eva
yat mahā cit mayam api bṛhat pāṣāṇa vat sthitam

original: jaḍaṃ tv ajaḍam evāntas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // MU_3,7.21
analyzed: jaḍam tu ajaḍam eva antar tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: mahācinmayam api samastajagatsākṣitānyathānupapattyā mahācitprakāśasvarūpam api sat /

analyzed: ati śānta tvena sva parāmarśe pi svātantryeṇa vimukha tvāt

original: jaḍaṃ tu jaḍam iva ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: jaḍam tu jaḍam iva iti arthaḥ

original: idaṃ viśeṣaṇadvayam yathāsaṅkhyātikrameṇa pūrvārdhoktasyārthasya samarthakatvena jñeyam /
analyzed: idam viśeṣaṇa dvayam yathā saṅkhyā atikrameṇa pūrva ardha uktasya arthasya samarthaka tvena jñeyam
sa bāhya abhyantaram sarvam yena samprāpya saṅgamam

original: svarūpasattām āpnoti tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // MU_3,7.22
analyzed: sva rūpa sattām āpnoti tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: sarvaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ bāhyābhyantaratvena vartamānaṃ samastaṃ jagat /
analyzed: sarvam sa bāhya abhyantaram bāhya abhyantara tvena vartamānam samastam jagat
yena sākṣi tayā sthitena yena vastunā
yad viṣaya tvam prāpya iti yāvat

original: sākṣipratītau sphuraṇaṃ vinā hi sato 'pi nīlasukhādeḥ sattā asatkalpā eva dṛśyate
analyzed: sākṣi pratītau sphuraṇam vinā hi nīla sukha ādeḥ sattā asat kalpā eva dṛśyate
prakāśasya yathā ālokaḥ yathā śūnya tvam ambare

original: tathedaṃ saṃsthitaṃ yatra tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // MU_3,7.23
analyzed: tathā idam saṃsthitam yatra tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: yathā ālokaḥ padārthaprākaṭyahetuḥ bhāsvaratākhyo guṇaviśeṣaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: yathā ālokaḥ padārtha prākaṭya hetuḥ bhāsvara tā ākhyaḥ guṇa viśeṣaḥ bhavati

original: yathā bhāsamānaḥ ālokaḥ svapradhānatvena na kathyate / anyathā
analyzed: yathā bhāsamānaḥ ālokaḥ sva pradhāna tvena na kathyate anyathā
prakāśaḥ ca vicāryamāṇaḥ anirvācya tām eva avagāhate

original: / tathā bhāsamānam idaṃ jagat api anirvācye kasmin citsārabhūte pradhāne sthitam iti
analyzed: tathā bhāsamānam idam jagat api anirvācye kasmin cit sāra bhūte pradhāne sthitam iti

original: jñeyam / yasmin tu sthitam asti tad eva paramātmā bhavatīti /
analyzed: jñeyam yasmin tu sthitam asti tat eva paramātmā bhavati iti
kasya api vastunaḥ paramātma tvam sādhitam

original: tathā cāsau paramātmā kalpita iti jñeyam
analyzed: tathā ca asau paramātmā kalpitaḥ iti jñeyam
nirvikalpa pratyakṣa mātra gamyasya sva lakṣaṇasya eva
upadeśyasya pratikṣaṇam madhya avasthāsu ātma tvena

original: pratyakṣaṃ sphuraṇaśīlam apy ātmatayā ajñātam paramātmasvarūpaṃ /
analyzed: pratyakṣam sphuraṇa śīlam api ātma tayā ajñātam paramātma svarūpam

original: ciravismṛtapuraḥsthitabāndhavavat tavātmā bhavatīti na ko 'py atra pratibhāvataḥ prati anumānasparśaḥ /
analyzed: cira vismṛta puraḥsthita bāndhava vat tava ātmā bhavati iti na kaḥ pi atra pratibhāvataḥ prati anumāna sparśaḥ

original: tv atrādhikāra eva nāstīty alaṃ paradoṣaguṇavicāraṇena //
analyzed: tu atra adhikāraḥ eva na asti iti alam para doṣa guṇa vicāraṇena
cira vismṛta puras sthita bāndhava vat
sarvatas paramātmā eṣa katham nāma abhibudhyate
iyataḥ sya jagat nāmnaḥ dṛśyasya asambhavaḥ kutas
etābhyaḥ vyatiriktā tu avasthā na asti iti

original: ayaṃ ca praśnaḥ sarvadā paramātmamayatvāsādanākāṅkṣiṇā śrīrāmeṇa jāgrati pratikṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: ayam ca praśnaḥ sarvadā paramātma maya tva āsādana ākāṅkṣiṇā śrī rāmeṇa jāgrati pratikṣaṇam
sphuramāṇāḥ śuddha paramātma svarūpa mayyaḥ madhya avasthāḥ an āśritya kṛtaḥ
bhramasya jāgatasya asya jātasya ākāśa varṇa vat

original: taj jñātaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ bhaven nānyena karmaṇā /
analyzed: tat jñātam brahmaṇaḥ rūpam bhavet na anyena karmaṇā

original: dṛśyātyantābhāvatas tu ṛte nānyā śubhā gatiḥ // MU_3,7.26
analyzed: dṛśya atyanta abhāvataḥ tu ṛte nā anyā śubhā gatiḥ
anyena karmaṇā etad vyatiriktena tapaḥ prabhṛtinā
yatas dṛśya atyanta abhāvataḥ ṛte dṛśya atyanta abhāvāt ṛte

original: prayatnasādhitasya abhāvasya pradhvaṃsābhāvatvād iti śuktau rajatātyantābhāvavat

analyzed: mṛdi ghaṭa atyanta abhāva vat vā atyanta abhāva sambodhasya upāya tva kathanam

original: nanu samyagjñānadvāreṇa siddhasya dṛśyatvarūpajagadatyantābhāvasyaiva kathaṃ paramātmaprāptau
analyzed: nanu samyak jñāna dvāreṇa siddhasya dṛśya tva rūpa jagat atyanta abhāvasya eva katham paramātma prāptau
upāya tvam asti iti atra āha
atyanta abhāva sampattau dṛśyasya asya yathā sthiteḥ

original: śiṣyate paramārtho 'sau budhyate jñāyate tataḥ // MU_3,7.27

analyzed: atyanta abhāva sampattau atyanta abhāvasya sampattau
śuktau bhāta rajata atyanta abhāva vat mṛdi bhāta ghaṭa atyanta abhāva vat

original: asau paramārthaḥ dṛśyādhiṣṭhānabhūtaḥ dṛśyasārabhūtaḥ vā asau paramātmā /
analyzed: asau paramārthaḥ dṛśya adhiṣṭhāna bhūtaḥ dṛśya sāra bhūtaḥ vā asau paramātmā
rajata atyanta abhāva jñāne iva śuktiḥ ghaṭa atyanta abhāva jñāne

original: iva vā mṛt / tadvyatirekeṇānyasya kasyāpy asattvāt tataḥ puruṣeṇāsau budhyate /
analyzed: iva vā mṛd tad vyatirekeṇa anyasya kasya api asattvāt tatas puruṣeṇa asau budhyate

original: nanu jñānopāyikaḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvo mā sidhyatu prāṇarodhanādyupāyajālasādhitayā vismṛtyā eva paramātmajñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu jñāna upāyikaḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ mā sidhyatu prāṇa rodhana ādi upāya jāla sādhitayā vismṛtyā eva paramātma jñānam bhaviṣyati iti atra āha
prāṇa rodhana ādi upāya jāla sādhitayā

original: na cid apratibimbāsti dṛśyābhāvād ṛte kvacit /
analyzed: na cit apratibimbā asti dṛśya abhāvāt ṛte kvacid
kva vinā pratibimbena kila ādarśaḥ vatiṣṭhate
cit sākṣi bhāvena sthitam cit tattvam
dṛśya abhāvāt ṛte sva sākṣi bhāva siddhāt dṛśya abhāvāt ṛte
dṛśya sākṣi tām a kurvatī iti yāvat

original: na hi bimbasattāyāṃ pratibimbarahitaḥ ādarśaḥ dṛśyate iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi bimba sattāyām pratibimba rahitaḥ ādarśaḥ dṛśyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanv anyadeśasthe bimbe sattāṃ bhajaty api ādarśaḥ pratibimbarahitaḥ
analyzed: nanu anya deśa sthe bimbe sattām bhajati api ādarśaḥ pratibimba rahitaḥ
dṛśyate tathā bahis dṛśya sattā bhavatu
dṛśya sparśa rahitā bhaviṣyati iti ced

original: anyathā nidritasyāntaḥ svapnaprapañcabhānaṃ na syāt / nanu
analyzed: anyathā nidritasya antar svapna prapañca bhānam na syāt nanu
tasya prāṇa rodha ādi upāya rāhityāt svapna pratibhānam asti iti ced
tarhi dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñāna hīnān
kapaṭa rahitān prāṇa rodha ādi kāriṇaḥ eva pṛccha

original: na veti / nanu kapaṭarahitāḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānayuktā api asmābhiḥ pṛṣṭā eva / tair
analyzed: na vā iti nanu kapaṭa rahitāḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñāna yuktāḥ api asmābhiḥ pṛṣṭāḥ eva taiḥ
api svasya svapna pradarśaka tvam uktam

original: eva jagataḥ atyantābhāvajñānaṃ teṣām asti tathā svapne 'pi /
analyzed: eva jagataḥ atyanta abhāva jñānam teṣām asti tathā svapne pi

original: na hi te bhāsamānam eva dṛśyaṃ dṛśyatayā paśyanti / kiṃ tu
analyzed: na hi te bhāsamānam eva dṛśyam dṛśya tayā paśyanti kim tu

original: nanu tathāpi dṛśyātyantābhāvena vinaivātmatattvaṃ paśyāma ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tathā api dṛśya atyanta abhāvena vinā eva ātma tattvam paśyāmaḥ iti atra āha

original: budhyate paramaṃ tattvaṃ na kadācana kenacit // MU_3,7.29
analyzed: budhyate paramam tattvam na kadācana kenacid
jagat nāmnaḥ jagat iti nāmadheya yuktasya
dṛśyasya dṛśi kriyā viṣayasya bhāva jātasya

original: tasmāt dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ samyagjñānopāyena sādhyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,7.29)
analyzed: tasmāt dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ samyak jñāna upāyena sādhyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
dṛśya asattāyām sandihānaḥ śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati
iyataḥ dṛśya jālasya brahmāṇḍasya jagat sthiteḥ

original: mune katham asattāsti kva meruḥ sarṣapodare // MU_3,7.30
analyzed: mune katham asattā asti kva meruḥ sarṣapa udare

original: yathā meruḥ sarṣapodare astīti kenacid ukte sati /
analyzed: yathā meruḥ sarṣapa udare asti iti kenacid ukte sati
tasmin asambhava artha pratipādaka tvam eva viśrāmyati tathā

original: jagataḥ sattā nāstīti pratipādake tvayy apīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,7.30)
analyzed: jagataḥ sattā na asti iti pratipādake tvayi api iti bhāvaḥ

original: dināni katicid rāma yadi tiṣṭhasy akhinnadhīḥ /
analyzed: dināni katicid rāma yadi tiṣṭhasi a khinna dhīḥ
sādhu saṅgama sat śāstra paramaḥ tat aham kṣaṇāt

original: pramārjayāmi te dṛśyaṃ bodho mṛgajalaṃ yathā /
analyzed: pramārjayāmi te dṛśyam bodhaḥ mṛga jalam yathā

original: dṛśyābhāve draṣṭṛtā ca śāmyed bodho 'vaśiṣyate // MU_3,7.32
analyzed: dṛśya abhāve draṣṭṛ tā ca śāmyet bodhaḥ

original: cet yadi katicit dināni kiyanti dināni /
analyzed: ced yadi katicid dināni kiyanti dināni
a khinna dhīḥ an udvigna matiḥ san
jñāna dvāreṇa atyanta abhāva yukta tvam sampādayāmi iti yāvat
anena sādhu saṅga ādeḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñānam prati
nanu dṛśya mārjanena kim setsyati iti
dṛśya abhāve jñāna dvāreṇa dṛśya abhāve siddhe sati
draṣṭṛ tā ca śāmyet layam vrajet

original: nanu tarhi abhāva eva śiṣyate ity /
analyzed: nanu tarhi abhāvaḥ eva śiṣyate iti
anyathā siddhasya api dṛśya atyanta abhāvasya asat kalpa tvam syāt

original: nanu kathaṃ dṛśyamātrātyantābhāvenaiva draṣṭṛtā śāntiṃ vrajatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham dṛśya mātra atyanta abhāvena eva draṣṭṛ tā śāntim vrajati iti atra āha

original: draṣṭṛtvaṃ sati dṛśye 'smin dṛśyatvaṃ saty avekṣake /
analyzed: draṣṭṛ tvam sati dṛśye smin dṛśya tvam sati avekṣake

original: ekatvaṃ sati hi dvitve dvitvaṃ caikatvavedane // MU_3,7.33
analyzed: eka tvam sati hi dvi tve dvi tvam ca eka tva vedane
dṛśye dṛśi kriyā viṣaye bhāva jāte
draṣṭṛ tvam paramārthataḥ śuddha cit mātra svarūpa draṣṭṛ viṣayaḥ draṣṭṛ bhāvaḥ syāt

original: taṇḍulādiṣu hi satsu tadviṣayāṃ pākakriyāṃ prati
analyzed: taṇḍula ādiṣu hi satsu tad viṣayām pāka kriyām prati
kartṛ tvam bhajataḥ puruṣasya eva pācaka tvam bhavati

original: api tu draṣṭṛsattayāpi dṛśyasya dṛśyatvam astīty abhiprāyeṇāha dṛśyatvam iti /
analyzed: api tu draṣṭṛ sattayā api dṛśyasya dṛśya tvam asti iti abhiprāyeṇa āha dṛśya tvam iti
dṛśya tvam paramārthataḥ śuddha cit mātra svarūpa dṛśya āśrayaḥ dṛśya bhāvaḥ syāt
pāka kriyā viṣayīkṛtam taṇḍula ādikam odana avasthā ādi apara paryāyam pāci abhāvam avalambate

original: ataḥ anyo'nyāpekṣatvena dṛśyamātrātyantābhāvena draṣṭṛviṣayā draṣṭṛtā naśyaty eveti
analyzed: atas anyonya apekṣa tvena dṛśya mātra atyanta abhāvena draṣṭṛ viṣayā draṣṭṛ tā naśyati eva iti
bhāvaḥ draṣṭṛ tva dṛśya tva anyonya āśraya kathana prasaṅgena tayoḥ ekatva dvitvayoḥ api

original: ekatvam mukhyatayā pūrvaṃ gaṇanārhe draṣṭari gatam ekatvam /
analyzed: ekatvam mukhya tayā pūrvam gaṇanā arhe draṣṭari gatam ekatvam
dvi tve avara tayā paścāt gaṇanā arha dṛśya gate dvi tve
dvi tva abhāve gaṇanasya eva apravṛtteḥ

original: gaṇanaṃ hi dvitvādikaṃ vīkṣyaiva vyavasthātuṃ pravartate /
analyzed: gaṇanam hi dvi tva ādikam vīkṣya eva vyavasthātum pravartate
dvi tva ādi abhāve tu kimartham tasya pravartanam

original: syāt / vyavasthāyāḥ svayaṃ vṛttau ca tatprathamāvayavabhūtasya ekatvasya sphuṭā evāsiddhiḥ

analyzed: tathā dvi tvam dṛśya gatam dvi tvam

original: ekaṃ vigaṇayyaiva dvitīyo gaṇanaviṣayatāṃ yātīti sphuṭā eva hi ekatvaṃ vinā
analyzed: ekam vigaṇayya eva dvitīyaḥ gaṇana viṣaya tām yāti iti sphuṭāḥ eva hi eka tvam vinā

original: ekābhāve dvayor eva siddhir bhavati nātra hi /
analyzed: eka abhāve dvayoḥ eva siddhiḥ bhavati na atra hi
dvi tva aikya draṣṭṛ dṛśya tva kṣaye sat avaśiṣyate

original: hi niścaye / ataḥ atra anayoḥ ekatvadvitvayoḥ madhye /
analyzed: hi niścaye atas atra anayoḥ ekatva dvitvayoḥ madhye

original: ekābhāve ekasya dvitvasya vā abhāve sati /
analyzed: eka abhāve ekasya dvi tvasya vā abhāve sati
dvayoḥ eva ubhayoḥ dvitva ekatvayoḥ eva
dvi tva aikyayoḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ ca kṣayaḥ dvi tva aikya draṣṭṛ dṛśya kṣayaḥ

original: tasmin sati sat dvitvādisākṣitvena sthitaṃ sadākhyaṃ vastu /
analyzed: tasmin sati sat dvi tva ādi sākṣi tvena sthitam sat ākhyam vastu
vyavahitam dṛśya pramārjana pratijñām punar api karoti

original: ahantādi jagad dṛśyaṃ sarvaṃ te mārjayāmy aham /
analyzed: ahantā ādi jagat dṛśyam sarvam te mārjayāmi aham
te manaḥ makurataḥ tvad manaḥ darpaṇāt
atyanta asattva saṃvittyā atyanta abhāva jñānena
dṛśya viṣaya atyanta abhāva jñāna utpādanena iti yāvat

original: nanv etāvataḥ dṛśyasya pramārjanaṃ kathaṃ kartuṃ śaknoṣīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu etāvataḥ dṛśyasya pramārjanam katham kartum śaknoṣi iti atra āha

original: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ / /
analyzed: na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ

original: yat tu nāsti svabhāvena kaḥ kleśas tatpramārjane // MU_3,7.36
analyzed: yat tu nā asti svabhāvena kaḥ kleśaḥ tad pramārjane
agneḥ api agni tva hāni prasaṅgāt

original: na hi śaśiśṛṅgatroṭane kasyāpi yatnaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: na hi śaśi śṛṅga troṭane kasya api yatnaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: nanu tathāpi pravartane kim āyātam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tathā api pravartane kim āyātam iti atra āha
atra āha atrām iti atra āha

original: jagad ādāv anutpannam yac cedaṃ dṛśyate tatam /
analyzed: jagat ādau anutpannam yat ca idam dṛśyate tatam

original: tat svātmany eva vimale brahma cittvāt svabṛṃhitam // MU_3,7.37
analyzed: tat sva ātmani eva vimale brahma cit tvāt sva bṛṃhitam
atas jagat pramārjane kleśaḥ na asti iti bhāvaḥ
nanu yadi jagat prathamam eva anutpannam

original: bhavati tarhi kim idaṃ bhāsata ity /
analyzed: bhavati tarhi kim idam bhāsate iti
atra āha yat ca idam iti
yat ca idam yat ca etat

original: tat brahma eva brahmākhyaṃ vastu eva /
analyzed: tat brahma eva brahma ākhyam vastu eva
vimale sva ātmani śuddha cit mātra svarūpāyām sva bhittau
cit tvāt sva bṛṃhitam atiśayena bṛṃhā gatam bhavati
bṛṃha a yuktam eva hi brahma ucyate

original: / na ca vastuni bṛṃhaṇaṃ nāmānyavastunaḥ utpattiḥ vaktuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na ca vastuni bṛṃhaṇam nāma anya vastunaḥ utpattiḥ vaktum śakyate

original: jale 'pi dravatvāt prādurbhūtasya taraṅgatayā bṛṃhaṇasyānyavastūtpattitvaprasaṅgāt / na
analyzed: jale pi drava tvāt prādurbhūtasya taraṅga tayā bṛṃhaṇasya anya vastu utpatti tva prasaṅgāt na

original: ca mūrkho 'pi jale taraṅgānām anyatvam aṅgīkaroti /
analyzed: ca mūrkhaḥ pi jale taraṅgānām anya tvam aṅgīkaroti
cit rūpasya ātmanaḥ eva svapna padārtha bhāvena

original: bṛṃhaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam iti cittvād ity uktam //
analyzed: bṛṃhaṇam dṛṣṭam iti cit tvāt iti uktam

original: jagan nāma na cotpannaṃ na cāsti na ca dṛśyate /
analyzed: jagat nāma na ca utpannam na ca asti na ca dṛśyate

original: hemnīva kaṭakāditvaṃ kim etanmārjane śramaḥ // MU_3,7.38
analyzed: hemni iva kaṭaka ādi tvam kim etad mārjane śramaḥ
brahmaṇaḥ eva etad rūpa tayā sthita tvāt
yathā hemni bhāsamānam kaṭaka ādi tvam na asti
hemnaḥ eva tad rūpa tayā sthita tvāt
atas etad pramārjane śramaḥ kim bhavati
brahma tā jñāna mātreṇa eva pramārjita tvāt
kaṭaka ādi tvam aśakya pramārjanam bhavati
hema tā jñāna mātreṇa eva tasya pramārjita tvāt

original: etāvata āśvāsarahitaṃ śiṣyaṃ jñātvā tasya samāśvāsanaṃ karoti
analyzed: etāvataḥ āśvāsa rahitam śiṣyam jñātvā tasya samāśvāsanam karoti
tathā etat vistareṇa iha vakṣyāmaḥ bahu yuktibhiḥ

original: abādhitaṃ yathā nūnaṃ svayam evānubhūyate // MU_3,7.39
analyzed: a bādhitam yathā nūnam svayam eva anubhūyate
vistareṇa bahu yuktibhiḥ tathā iha asmin śāstre

original: yathā tvayā etat abādhitaṃ svayam evānubhūyate // (MT_3,7.39)
analyzed: yathā tvayā etat abādhitam svayam eva anubhūyate

original: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ yat tasyehāstitā kutaḥ /
analyzed: ādau eva hi na utpannam yat tasya iha astitā kutas

original: kuto marau jalasarid dvitīyendau kuto grahaḥ // MU_3,7.40
analyzed: kutas marau jala sarit dvitīya indau kutas grahaḥ
atra dṛṣṭānta dvayam kathayati kutas ityādi

original: yathā vandhyāsuto nāsti yathā nāsti marau jalam /
analyzed: yathā vandhyā sutaḥ nā asti yathā nā asti marau jalam

original: yathā nāsti nabhovṛkṣas tathā nāsti jagadbhramaḥ // MU_3,7.41
analyzed: yathā nā asti nabhaḥ vṛkṣaḥ tathā nā asti jagat bhramaḥ

original: tarhi kim idaṃ bhāsate ity / atrāha
analyzed: tarhi kim idam bhāsate iti atra āha

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate rāma tad brahmaiva nirāmayam /
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate rāma tat brahma eva nirāmayam

original: etat purastād vakṣyāmo yuktito na giraiva vaḥ // MU_3,7.42
analyzed: etat purastāt vakṣyāmaḥ yuktitaḥ na girā eva vaḥ
tat nirāmayam bhāva abhāva ākhya āmaya rahitam
sārvavibhaktikaḥ tasil vgl pāṇ vā ṛ t
sarga anta ślokena yukti yukta vākya upekṣām tyājya tvena kathayati

original: yan nāma yuktibhir iha pravadanti tajjñās tatrāvahelanam ayuktam udārabuddheḥ / /
analyzed: yat nāma yuktibhiḥ iha pravadanti tad jñāḥ tatra avahelanam ayuktam udāra buddheḥ

original: yo yuktiyuktam avamatya vimūḍhabuddhyā kaṣṭāvaho bhavati taṃ vidur ajñam eva // MU_3,7.43
analyzed: yaḥ yukti yuktam avamatya vimūḍha buddhyā kaṣṭa āvahaḥ bhavati tam viduḥ ajñam eva

original: asambhavaprayatnair ātmana iti śeṣaḥ / iti śivam // (MT_3,7.43)
analyzed: asambhava prayatnaiḥ ātmanaḥ iti śeṣaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe saptamaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe saptamaḥ sargaḥ

original: kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati /
analyzed: kayā etat jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati

original: nyāye 'nubhūta etasmin na jñeyam avaśiṣyate // MU_3,8.1
analyzed: nyāye nu bhūte etasmin na jñeyam avaśiṣyate
nanu kimartham atra yuktim pṛcchasi iti
śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ vistara kathana pratijñām sampādayiṣyan uttaram kathayati

original: jagannāmnī vicārākhyād ṛte mantrān na śāmyati // MU_3,8.2

analyzed: jagataḥ ca mithyājñāna rūpa tvam śukti rajata vat jñeyam
vakṣyamāṇa upadeśa śravaṇam prati śrī rāmam dṛḍhīkaroti

original: vadāmy ākhyāyikā rāma yā imā bodhasiddhaye /
analyzed: vadāmi ākhyāyikāḥ rāma yāḥ imāḥ bodha siddhaye

original: tāś cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān // MU_3,8.3
analyzed: tāḥ ced śṛṇoṣi tat sādho muktaḥ evā asi buddhimān

original: no ced udvegaśīlatvād ardhād utthāya gacchasi /
analyzed: no ced udvega śīla tvāt ardhāt utthāya gacchasi

original: tat tiryagdharmiṇas te 'dya kiñcin nāpi tu setsyati // MU_3,8.4
analyzed: tat tiryagdharmiṇaḥ te kiñcid na api tu setsyati

original: atha vā udvegaśīlatvāt ardhād utthāya gacchasi /
analyzed: atha vā udvega śīla tvāt ardhāt utthāya gacchasi

original: nanu dṛḍhatayā śravaṇenāpi yadi kiñcin na setsyati tadā kiṃ kāryam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu dṛḍha tayā śravaṇena api yadi kiñcid na setsyati tadā kim kāryam iti atra āha

original: yo yam arthaṃ prārthayate tadarthaṃ yatate tathā /
analyzed: yaḥ yam artham prārthayate tad artham yatate tathā

original: so 'vaśyaṃ tad avāpnoti na cec chrānto nivartate // MU_3,8.5
analyzed: saḥ vaśyam tat avāpnoti na ced śrāntaḥ nivartate

original: nanv aham asmin prārthite vastuni kiṃrūpaṃ yatnaṃ karomīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu aham asmin prārthite vastuni kiṃrūpam yatnam karomi iti atra āha
sādhu saṅgam asat śāstra paraḥ bhavasi rāma ced

original: tad dinair eva vā māsaiḥ prāpnoṣi paramaṃ padam // MU_3,8.6
analyzed: tat dinaiḥ eva vā māsaiḥ prāpnoṣi paramam padam

original: śrīvasiṣṭhasādhutve niścitaḥ śrīrāmaḥ ātmajñānaprabodhanimittaṃ śāstraṃ pṛcchati
analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭha sādhu tve niścitaḥ śrī rāmaḥ ātma jñāna prabodha nimittam śāstram pṛcchati
ātma jñāna prabodhāya śāstram śāstra vidām vara

original: kiṃnāma tatpradhānaṃ syād yasmiñ jñāte na śocyate // MU_3,8.7
analyzed: kiṃnāma tat pradhānam syāt yasmin jñāte na śocyate
ātma jñāna prabodhāya ātma jñāna āvirbhāva artham
na śocyate dṛśya āsakti rūpam śocanam na anubhūyate
ātma jñāna pradhānānām idam eva mahāmate
ātma jñānam pradhānam vācya tayā sāra bhūtam yeṣām
idam rāmāyaṇa abhidham ayam mahārāmāyaṇa ākhyaḥ itihāsaḥ
nanu śrī vālmīkinā svena upanibaddhe śrī mahārāmāyaṇe

original: śrīrāmavṛttāntakathanaprasaṅgataḥ śrīrāmaṃ prati śrīvasiṣṭhena kṛtaḥ upadeśaḥ nibaddhaḥ
analyzed: śrī rāma vṛttānta kathana prasaṅgataḥ śrī rāmam prati śrī vasiṣṭhena kṛtaḥ upadeśaḥ nibaddhaḥ

original: yaḥ kenāpi dayālunā asmāc chrīmahārāmāyaṇād uddhṛtaḥ tat katham upadeśakālānantarabhāvinaḥ śrīmahārāmāyaṇasya śrīvasiṣṭhena idam ity anena  #
analyzed: yaḥ kena api dayālunā asmāt śrī mahārāmāyaṇāt uddhṛtaḥ tat katham upadeśa kāla anantara bhāvinaḥ śrī mahārāmāyaṇasya śrī vasiṣṭhena idam iti anena
anena hi śrī mahārāmāyaṇasya śrī vasiṣṭha kṛta tvam dyotate

original: iti cet / ārambhe evāsmābhiḥ ayaṃ nirṇayaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: iti ced ārambhe eva asmābhiḥ ayam nirṇayaḥ kṛtaḥ
svayam asya arthasya avabodhaka tvam uktam

original: eva pṛccha / yadi na pratibhā asti tadānadhikāritvān maunam eva kāryam ity alaṃ prapañcena //
analyzed: eva pṛccha yadi na pratibhā asti tadā anadhikāri tvāt maunam eva kāryam iti alam prapañcena
itihāsa uttamāt asmāt paraḥ bodhaḥ pravartate

original: sarveṣām itihāsānām ayaṃ sāra udāhṛtaḥ // MU_3,8.9

analyzed: śrute smin vāṅmaye yasmāt jīvanmukta tvam akṣatam

original: udeti svayam evāta idam evātipāvanam // MU_3,8.10
analyzed: udeti svayam eva atas idam eva ati pāvanam
sthitam eva astam āyāti jagat dṛśyam vicāraṇāt

original: yathā svapne parijñāte svapnārthād eva bhāvanā // MU_3,8.11
analyzed: yathā svapne parijñāte svapna arthāt eva bhāvanā

original: sthitam eva na tu mudgarādiprahāraiḥ nāśaṃ nītam /
analyzed: sthitam eva na tu mudgara ādi prahāraiḥ nāśam nītam
yathā svapne jāgrat avasthāyām asatya tayā parijñāte

original: sati / tatrānubhūtaiḥ bhāvābhāvaiḥ harṣāmarṣau na jñāyete /
analyzed: sati tatra anubhūtaiḥ bhāva abhāvaiḥ harṣa amarṣau na jñāyete

original: atītair api bhāvābhāvair iva tatratyaiḥ bhāvābhāvaiḥ harṣāmarṣotpādaḥ syāt / tathā
analyzed: atītaiḥ api bhāva abhāvaiḥ iva tatratyaiḥ bhāva abhāvaiḥ harṣa amarṣa utpādaḥ syāt tathā

original: mahārāmāyaṇavicāraṇena dṛśye asatyatayā jñāte sati dṛśyaviṣayaiḥ bhāvābhāvaiḥ harṣāmarṣau
analyzed: mahārāmāyaṇa vicāraṇena dṛśye asatya tayā jñāte sati dṛśya viṣayaiḥ bhāva abhāvaiḥ harṣa amarṣau

original: nanv anyāny api śāstrāṇi santy eva /
analyzed: nanu anyāni api śāstrāṇi santi eva
tat katham asya eva asādhāraṇa kāraṇa tvam kathayasi iti atra āha

original: yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kvacit /
analyzed: yat iha asti tat anyatra yat na iha asti na tat kvacid
idam samasta vijñāna śāstra kośam viduḥ budhāḥ
asti vyasta tvena bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: yat iha nāsti tat kvacit kutrāpi śāstre /
analyzed: yat iha na asti tat kvacid kutrāpi śāstre
atas budhāḥ samasta śāstra sāra jñāḥ
samasta vijñāna śāstra kośam sakala adhyātma śāstra bhāṇḍāgāram
ukta lakṣaṇa śrī mahārāmāyaṇa śravaṇe phalam kathayati
yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt nityam tasya udāra camatkṛteḥ

original: bālasyāpi paraṃ bodhaṃ buddhir eti na saṃśayaḥ // MU_3,8.13
analyzed: bālasya api param bodham buddhiḥ eti na saṃśayaḥ
bālasya api mūrkhasya api iti arthaḥ
paṇḍitasya tu kā kathā iti bhāvaḥ

original: yasmai nedaṃ tv abhavyāya rocate duṣkṛtodayāt /
analyzed: yasmai na idam tu abhavyāya rocate duṣkṛtā udayāt

original: vicārayatu yatkiñcit sa śāstraṃ jñānavāṅmayam // MU_3,8.14
analyzed: vicārayatu yat kiñcid sa śāstram jñāna vāc mayam
jñāna vāc mayam jñāna vākya nirbharam

original: nanu muktikāmasya mama kim etacchravaṇenety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu mukti kāmasya mama kim etad śravaṇena iti atra āha
jīvanmukta tvam asmin tu śrute samanubhūyate

original: svayam eva yathā pīte nīrogatvaṃ varauṣadhe // MU_3,8.15
analyzed: svayam eva yathā pīte nīroga tvam vara auṣadhe

original: śrūyamāṇe hi śāstre 'smiñ śrotā vetty etad ātmanā /
analyzed: śrūyamāṇe hi śāstre smin śrotā vetti etat ātmanā

original: yathāvad idam asmābhir na tūktaṃ varaśāpavat // MU_3,8.16
analyzed: yathāvat idam asmābhiḥ na tu uktam vara śāpa vat

original: nanu yady etacchravaṇe pravṛttasya kiñcit pratyavāyādi syāt tadā
analyzed: nanu yadi etad śravaṇe pravṛttasya kiñcid pratyavāya ādi syāt tadā
śāmyati saṃsṛti duḥkham idam te sva ātma vicāra mahā kathayā eva
naḥ dhana dāna tapaḥ śruta vedaiḥ tad kathana ujjhita yatna śatena
te tava idam dṛśya sva rūpam
yā mahā kathā anyonyam mahatī kathā
dhana dāna tapaḥ śruta vedaiḥ idam saṃsṛti duḥkham no śāmyati
yat kathanam sādhubhiḥ saha anyonya kathanam
yatna śatāni kathana vyatiriktāni yatna śatāni
iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe ṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ
om pūrva sarga anta śloka artham eva sphuṭam kathayati
tad cittāḥ tad gata prāṇāḥ bodhayantaḥ parasparam

original: kathayantaś ca taṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ramayanti ye // MU_3,9.1
analyzed: kathayantaḥ ca tam nityam tuṣyanti ramayanti ye
teṣām jñāna eka niṣṭhānām ātma jñāna vicāraṇāt
sā jīvanmukta tā udeti videha unmukta tā eva yā
tad cittāḥ tasmin sva ātma vicāre
tathā ramayanti anyān tuṣṭi yuktān sampādayanti
ātma jñāna eka niṣṭhānām ātma vicāra eka parāṇām
ātma jñāna vicāraṇāt sā jīvanmukta tā udeti prādurbhavati
yā videha mukta tā eva bhavati

original: brūhi yena tathaivāhaṃ yate śāstradṛśā dhiyā // MU_3,9.3
analyzed: brūhi yena tathā eva aham yate śāstra dṛśā dhiyā
jīvanmuktasya iti atra caśabdaḥ dhyā āhāryaḥ

original: astaṃ gataṃ sthitaṃ vyoma sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.4
analyzed: astam gatam sthitam vyoma sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate
vyavahāravataḥ pi viśva padārtheṣu vyavahāram kurvataḥ pi
na tu kena api prayatnena nāśita svarūpam
atas eva vyoma śūnya rūpam bhavati

original: bhāsamānasya jagataḥ śuktikārajatavat asatyatvadarśitvaṃ jīvanmuktalakṣaṇam iti
analyzed: bhāsamānasya jagataḥ śuktikā rajata vat asatya tva darśi tvam jīvanmukta lakṣaṇam iti
bodha eka niṣṭha tām yātaḥ jāgrati eva suṣupta vat

original: ya āste vyavahartaiva sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.5
analyzed: yaḥ āste vyavahartā eva sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate
bodhe dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñāna pūrvake ātma jñāne
tatra api vyavahartā eva pravāha āgata vyavahāra kārī eva

original: dṛśyate ca stryādiniṣṭhasya puruṣasya jāgrati vyavahartur eva sataḥ suṣuptavad avasthitir iti nāyastam //
analyzed: dṛśyate ca strī ādi niṣṭhasya puruṣasya jāgrati vyavahartuḥ eva sataḥ suṣupta vat avasthitiḥ iti na āyastam

original: nodeti nāstam āyāti sukhe duḥkhe mukhaprabhā /
analyzed: na udeti na astam āyāti sukhe duḥkhe mukha prabhā

original: yathāprāptasthiter yasya sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.6
analyzed: yathā prāpta sthiteḥ yasya sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate

original: sukhe duḥkhe ca mukhaprabhā nodeti nāstam āyāti harṣāmarṣarāhityāt /
analyzed: sukhe duḥkhe ca mukha prabhā na udeti na astam āyāti harṣa amarṣa rāhityāt

original: yo jāgarti suṣuptastho yasya jāgran na vidyate /
analyzed: yaḥ jāgarti suṣupta sthaḥ yasya jāgrat na vidyate

original: yasya nirvāsano bodhaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.7
analyzed: yasya nirvāsanaḥ bodhaḥ sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate
jāgarti bāhya padārtha viṣayam bodham bhajati
eka cit mātra tā niścayena bāhya prapañca anusandhāna rahita tvāt

original: jīvanmukto hi jāgrati sarvaṃ cinmātramayaṃ paśyan turyāvasthāviṣṭa
analyzed: jīvanmuktaḥ hi jāgrati sarvam cit mātra mayam paśyan turya avasthā āviṣṭa
tathā yasya nirvāsanaḥ ahaṃmamatā rūpa vāsanā rahitaḥ
rāga dveṣa bhaya ādīnām anurūpam caran api

original: yo 'ntar vyomavad atyacchaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.8
analyzed: yaḥ ntar vyoma vat ati acchaḥ sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate
rāga dveṣa bhaya ādīnām anurūpam caran api
dveṣa ādhāre śatrau vimukhaḥ bhavan api
putra ādi viṣayasya rati ādeḥ pravāha balena niranusandhāna karaṇāt

original: anusandhāna eva hi manasi malaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: anusandhāne eva hi manasi malam bhavati
ādi śabdena deha ādi viṣayāṇām asmitā ādīnām grahaṇam

original: yasya nāhaṅkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate / /
analyzed: yasya na ahaṅkṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ buddhiḥ yasya na lipyate

original: kurvato 'kurvato vāpi sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.9
analyzed: kurvataḥ kurvataḥ vā api sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate
ahaṅkṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ ahaṅkāra mayī citta vṛttiḥ

original: buddhiḥ na lipyate lepayuktā na kriyate /
analyzed: buddhiḥ na lipyate lepa yuktā na kriyate
rāga ādi rūpaiḥ pāpaiḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: kurvataḥ śarīrayātrānimittaṃ pravāhāgataṃ vā karma kurvataḥ /
analyzed: kurvataḥ śarīra yātrā nimittam pravāha āgatam vā karma kurvataḥ
tathā kena api kāraṇena akurvataḥ vā
tatra karaṇa kāle niranusandhāna karaṇāt akaraṇa kāle śuddha cit mātra parāmarśa niṣṭha tvāt
yaḥ ca unmeṣa nimeṣābhyām vidheḥ pralaya sambhavau

original: paśyet trilokyāḥ khasamaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.10
analyzed: paśyet trilokyāḥ kha samaḥ sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate
trilokyāḥ vidheḥ bhū ādi bāhya trilokī vidhānasya jāgrat ādya antara trilokī vidhānasya ca

original: arthāt paramātmatayā niścitasya cittattvasya unmeṣeṇa cetyānaunmukhyākhyena prādurbhāvena /
analyzed: arthāt parama ātma tayā niścitasya cit tattvasya unmeṣeṇa cetyān aunmukhya ākhyena prādurbhāvena
nimeṣeṇa ca iti aunmukhya ākhyena svarūpa gopanena
bhū ādi bāhya trilokī vidhānasya bhūḥ ādi

original: bhoktaiva yo na bhokteva śuddhabodhaikatāṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: bhoktā eva yaḥ na bhoktā iva śuddha bodha eka tām gataḥ

original: buddhaḥ supta ivāste 'ntaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.11
analyzed: buddhaḥ suptaḥ iva āste sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate
śuddha bodha ekatām śuddha bodhena eka tvam gataḥ
bhoktā eva bhuji kriyā kartṛ tvam bhajan eva

original: abhoktā iva svasmin śuddhabodhatājñānena bhoktāham ity abhimānābhāvāt /
analyzed: abhoktā iva svasmin śuddha bodha tā jñānena bhoktā aham iti abhimāna abhāvāt

original: nityaṃ draṣṭaiva cādraṣṭā jīvann eva mṛtopamaḥ /
analyzed: nityam draṣṭā eva ca adraṣṭā jīvan eva mṛta upamaḥ

original: vyavahartaiva śailābhaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.12
analyzed: vyavahartā eva śailābhaḥ sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate
yaḥ draṣṭā eva dṛśi kriyā kartṛ tvam bhajan eva

original: tathā yaḥ jīvann eva jīvanakriyākartṛtvaṃ bhajann eva /
analyzed: tathā yaḥ jīvan eva jīvana kriyā kartṛ tvam bhajan eva
mṛta vat bhoga ādi vāñchā abhāvāt

original: tathā yaḥ vyavahartā eva vyavahāraṃ kurvan eva /
analyzed: tathā yaḥ vyavahartā eva vyavahāram kurvan eva

original: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt na udvijate lokaḥ lokāt na udvijate ca yaḥ
harṣa amarṣa bhaya unmuktaḥ sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate

original: yasmāt nodvijate udvegakāraṇābhāvena udvegaṃ na yāti /
analyzed: yasmāt na udvijate udvega kāraṇa abhāvena udvegam na yāti

original: tathā yaḥ lokāt na udvijate niṣprayojanatvāt /
analyzed: tathā yaḥ lokāt na udvijate niṣprayojana tvāt

original: svaprayojanaparaḥ eva hi yebhyaḥ svaprayojanaṃ na paśyati tebhyaḥ
analyzed: sva prayojana paraḥ eva hi yebhyaḥ sva prayojanam na paśyati tebhyaḥ
harṣa amarṣa bhaya unmuktaḥ harṣa amarṣa bhaya rahitaḥ
svasmin śuddha bodha eka tā jñānāt
śānta saṃsāra kalanaḥ kalāvān api niṣkalaḥ

original: yaḥ sacitto 'pi niścittaḥ sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.14

analyzed: śāntā ātmani cit mātra tā darśanena layam gatā
kalāvān api jñāna ākhya kalā yuktaḥ pi

original: tathā yaḥ sacittaḥ api śuddhasattvasvarūpacittayuktaḥ api /
analyzed: tathā yaḥ sa cittaḥ api śuddha sattva sva rūpa citta yuktaḥ api
yaḥ samasta artha jāteṣu vyavahārī api śītalaḥ

original: parārtheṣv iva pūrṇātmā sa jīvanmukta ucyate // MU_3,9.15
analyzed: parārtheṣu iva pūrṇa ātmā sa jīvanmuktaḥ ucyate
yaḥ samasta artha jāteṣu pravāha āgateṣu sakaleṣu prayojana samūheṣu

original: śītalaḥ kim ayaṃ sidhyati na veti santāparahitaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: śītalaḥ kim ayam sidhyati na vā iti santāpa rahitaḥ bhavati
jīvanmuktim uktvā krama prāptām videha muktim kathayati
jīvanmukta padam tyaktvā dehe kāla vaśāt kṣate

original: cid yāty adehamuktatvaṃ pavanaḥ spandanām iva // MU_3,9.16
analyzed: cit yāti a deha mukta tvam pavanaḥ spandanām iva
adeha mukta tvam videha mukta bhāvam
pavanaḥ spandatām iva iti vā pāṭhaḥ
jīvanmukta vat tasya api lakṣaṇāni leśataḥ kathayati

original: videhamukto nodeti nāstam eti na śāmyati /
analyzed: videha muktaḥ na udeti na astam eti na śāmyati

original: na san nāsan na dūrasthaṃ na cāhaṃ na ca vetarat // MU_3,9.17
analyzed: na sat na asat na dūra stham na ca aham na ca vā itarat

original: videhamuktaḥ anahambhāvena gṛhītasya dehasyāpy abhāvena videhamuktiṃ gataḥ puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: videha muktaḥ anahambhāvena gṛhītasya dehasya api abhāvena videha muktim gataḥ puruṣaḥ
na udeti sadā udita cit mātra bhāvena avasthānāt

original: yathā tathā kalpitasya tadastasya tataḥ evotthānāt /
analyzed: yathā tathā kalpitasya tad astasya tatas eva utthānāt
tathā na śāmyati saṃsāra bhāna abhāva prasaṅgāt
etādṛś prapañca bhāvena bhāna abhāva prasaṅgāt
na hi śaśa śṛṅgam kena api rūpeṇa
sarveṣām ahantā sāra tvena sthita tvāt
aparimita pramātṛ tvena sthita tvāt tathā
viśva uttīrṇa tām uktvā viśva maya tām leśataḥ kathayati

original: sūryo bhūtvā pratapati viṣṇuḥ pāti jagattrayam /
analyzed: sūryaḥ bhūtvā pratapati viṣṇuḥ pāti jagattrayam

original: rudraḥ sarvān saṃharati sarvān sṛjati padmajaḥ // MU_3,9.18
analyzed: rudraḥ sarvān saṃharati sarvān sṛjati padmajaḥ

original: asau śuddhacinmātratāṃ yātaḥ videhamuktaḥ sūryo bhūtvā sūryabhāvam āsādya /
analyzed: asau śuddha cit mātra tām yātaḥ videha muktaḥ sūryaḥ bhūtvā sūrya bhāvam āsādya
pratapati tāpa kriyā kartṛ tvam bhajati

original: tathā viṣṇuḥ bhūtvā jagattrayaṃ pāti rakṣati /
analyzed: tathā viṣṇuḥ bhūtvā jagattrayam pāti rakṣati

original: eṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ ca bāhyāntaratvena dvaividhyaṃ jñeyam
analyzed: eṣām sūrya ādīnām ca bāhya antara tvena dvaividhyam jñeyam

original: / bāhye hi sūryaḥ yaḥ vyomni dṛśyate /
analyzed: bāhye hi sūryaḥ yaḥ vyomni dṛśyate
sūrya vat śarīra pāka kāri tvāt

original: videhamuktaḥ sūryādicarācarapadārthabhāvam āgatya tadgatāḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karotīti cet /
analyzed: videha muktaḥ sūrya ādi carācara padārtha bhāvam āgatya tad gatāḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karoti iti ced

original: tatra carāḥ tāvat sphuṭam eva antaryāmiśuddhacittattvādhiṣṭhitāḥ lakṣyante /
analyzed: tatra carāḥ tāvat sphuṭam eva antaryāmi śuddha cit tattva dhiṣṭhitāḥ lakṣyante

original: anyathā maraṇāvasthāṃ gateṣv api teṣu prāgvat kriyādhāratvaprasaṅgāt
analyzed: anyathā maraṇa avasthām gateṣu api teṣu prāgvat kriyā dhāra tva prasaṅgāt

original: / nanu tatkriyāyāṃ prāṇa eva prerakaḥ dṛśyate /
analyzed: nanu tad kriyāyām prāṇaḥ eva prerakaḥ dṛśyate
niṣprāṇānām acara śarīrāṇām niṣkriya tva darśanāt

original: na hi prāṇo nāmātra prerakatve samarthaḥ kaścic cetana iva lakṣyate /
analyzed: na hi prāṇaḥ nāma atra preraka tve samarthaḥ kaścid cetanaḥ iva lakṣyate

original: kiṃ tv anyasya kasyāpi svatantrasya cetanasya preraṇayā
analyzed: kim tu anyasya kasya api svatantrasya cetanasya preraṇayā

original: / devadattapreryamāṇakandukavat nirgamapraveśakārīva dṛśyate iti śuddhasya cinmātrasyaiva carāntaryāmitvena caragatakriyākartṛtvaṃ
analyzed: devadatta preryamāṇa kanduka vat nirgama praveśa kārī iva dṛśyate iti śuddhasya cit mātrasya eva cara antaryāmi tvena cara gata kriyā kartṛ tvam

original: jñāyate / acareṣv api dṛśyamāṇā avasthitikriyā kriyātvāt caragatakriyāvat tatkṛtā
analyzed: jñāyate acareṣu api dṛśyamāṇā avasthiti kriyā kriyā tvāt cara gata kriyā vat tad kṛtā

original: eva jñeyā / yataḥ yatra sākṣāc cetanatayā bhāsamānānāṃ carāṇāṃ svakriyāyām asāmarthyam
analyzed: eva jñeyā yatas yatra sākṣāt cetana tayā bhāsamānānām carāṇām sva kriyāyām asāmarthyam

original: asti tatra sākṣāj jaḍatvena bhāsamānānāṃ acarāṇāṃ kā kathā kriyākāritve / tena yathā
analyzed: asti tatra sākṣāt jaḍa tvena bhāsamānānām acarāṇām kā kathā kriyākāri tve tena yathā

original: adhiṣṭhātṛbhūtena devadattena kvacit sthāpitāḥ stambhādayaḥ tiṣṭhanti tathā svāntargatena kenāpi tattvena sthāpitāḥ acarāḥ tiṣṭhantīti jñeyam
analyzed: adhiṣṭhātṛ bhūtena devadattena kvacid sthāpitāḥ stambha ādayaḥ tiṣṭhanti tathā sva antargatena kena api tattvena sthāpitāḥ acarāḥ tiṣṭhanti iti jñeyam

original: tebhyaḥ bahiḥsthatā pratyakṣam eva dṛśyate iti na tatra tasya tadantargatatvaṃ kalpyate /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ bahis stha tā pratyakṣam eva dṛśyate iti na tatra tasya tad antargata tvam kalpyate
atra tu bahis sthūlasya kasya api

original: bahirgatatvam api tasya na virudhyate ity āstām
analyzed: bahis gata tvam api tasya na virudhyate iti āstām

original: etat / evaṃ ca śuddhacinmātre paryavasitaṃ sarvakriyākartṛtvaṃ tanmayatāgate tasminn
analyzed: etat evam ca śuddha cit mātre paryavasitam sarva kriyā kartṛ tvam tad maya tā gate tasmin

original: samudre līnasya jalabindoḥ iva samudraguṇaviśiṣṭatvam / avaśiṣṭaṃ
analyzed: samudre līnasya jala bindoḥ iva samudra guṇa viśiṣṭa tvam avaśiṣṭam
mṛta śarīram api pakṣa ākṣiptam eva jñeyam

original: nanu tathāpi videhamuktaḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karotīty etāvanmātram eva siddham
analyzed: nanu tathā api videha muktaḥ sarvāḥ kriyāḥ karoti iti etāvat mātram eva siddham

original: / na tu sarvaṃ bhūtvety etat siddham /
analyzed: na tu sarvam bhūtvā iti etat siddham

original: / carācarāḥ bhāvāḥ kimmayāḥ iti vicāryamāṇe tatsvarūpaṃ hastagrāhābhāvāt anirvācyatāyām
anirvācyatā eva ca śuddhacittattvasya svarūpam iti śuddhacidrūpatāṃ
analyzed: anirvācya tā eva ca śuddha cit tattvasya svarūpam iti śuddha cit rūpa tām

original: gatasya videhamuktasya sarvabhāvo yukta eveti na ko 'pi virodhaḥ /
analyzed: gatasya videha muktasya sarva bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ evā iti na kaḥ virodhaḥ

original: tadavidvadarthe tu ayaṃ prayatnaḥ kṛta ity alaṃ
analyzed: tad avidvat arthe tu ayam prayatnaḥ kṛtaḥ iti alam
kham bhūtvā pavana skandhān dhatte sa ṛkṣa sura asurān
kula acala gaṇaḥ bhūtvā lokapāla pura āspadam
sa ṛkṣa sura asurān nakṣatra deva asura sahitān
kula acala gaṇaḥ bhūtvā lokapāla pura āspadam bhavati iti sambandhaḥ
bhūmiḥ bhūtvā bibharti imām loka sthitim akhaṇḍitām
tṛṇa gulma latā bhūtvā dadāti phala santatim
bibhrat jala anala ākāram jvalati bhavati drutaḥ

original: candro 'mṛtaṃ prasravati mṛtiṃ hālāhalaṃ viṣam // MU_3,9.21
analyzed: candraḥ mṛtam prasravati mṛtim hālāhalam viṣam
jala ākāram bibhrat drutaḥ drava guṇa yuktaḥ
anala ākāram bibhrat jvalati iti yojyam
candraḥ bhūtvā hālāhalam bhūtvā iti sambandhanīyam

original: tejaḥ prakaṭayaty āśās tanoty āndhyaṃ tamo bhavat /
analyzed: tejaḥ prakaṭayati āśāḥ tanoti āndhyam tamaḥ bhavat

original: śūnyaṃ sad vyomatām eti giriḥ san rodhayaty alam // MU_3,9.22
analyzed: śūnyam sat vyoma tām eti giriḥ san rodhayati alam
karoti jaṅgamam cit tve sthāvaram sthāvara ākṛtiḥ

original: bhūtvārṇavo valayati bhūstriyaṃ valayo yathā // MU_3,9.23
analyzed: bhūtvā arṇavaḥ valayati bhū striyam valayaḥ yathā

original: jaṅgamaṃ karoti sthāvarākṛtiḥ san sthāvaraṃ karoti /
analyzed: jaṅgamam karoti sthāvara ākṛtiḥ san sthāvaram karoti

original: arṇavaḥ bhūtvā bhūstriyaṃ bhūr eva strī /
analyzed: arṇavaḥ bhūtvā bhū striyam bhūḥ eva strī
parama arka vapuḥ bhūtvā prakāśe ntar visārayan
trijagat trasa reṇu ogham śāntam eva avatiṣṭhati
trijagat trasa reṇu ogham trijagat ākhyam paramāṇu samūham

original: śāntam eva sākṣibhāvena sthitatvāt tatkṛtakṣobharahitam evāvatiṣṭhati /
analyzed: śāntam eva sākṣi bhāvena sthita tvāt tad kṛta kṣobha rahitam eva avatiṣṭhati

original: yuktaṃ cārkasya prakāśe trasareṇvoghavisāraṇaṃ śāntam avasthānaṃ ca // (MT_3,9.24)
analyzed: yuktam ca arkasya prakāśe trasareṇu ogha visāraṇam śāntam avasthānam ca

original: yat kiñcid idam ābhāti bhātaṃ vā bhām upaiṣyati /
analyzed: yat kiñcid idam ābhāti bhātam vā bhām upaiṣyati

original: kālatrayagataṃ dṛśyaṃ tad asau sarvam eva vā // MU_3,9.25
analyzed: kāla traya gatam dṛśyam tat asau sarvam eva vā

original: tat kālatrayagatam sarvaṃ dṛśyam asau uktaḥ videhamuktaḥ / bhavati // (MT_3,9.25)
analyzed: tat kāla traya gatam sarvam dṛśyam asau uktaḥ videha muktaḥ bhavati

original: katham evaṃ vada brahman bhūyate viṣamā hi me /
analyzed: katham evam vada brahman bhūyate viṣamā hi me

original: dṛṣṭir eṣā tu duṣprāpā durākramyeti niścayaḥ // MU_3,9.26
analyzed: dṛṣṭiḥ eṣā tu duṣprāpā durākramyā iti niścayaḥ
puruṣeṇa evam etādṛś guṇa yuktena videha muktena

original: nirvāṇam etat kathitaṃ śṛṇu samprāpyate katham // MU_3,9.27
analyzed: nirvāṇam etat kathitam śṛṇu samprāpyate katham

original: he rāma / paṇḍitaiḥ eṣā etat videhamuktatvaṃ /
analyzed: he rāma paṇḍitaiḥ eṣā etat videha mukta tvam
jīvanmukta tvasya sattva rūpa citta āśraya tvena amukti kalpa tvāt
sarva padārtha bhāvena bṛṃhaṇa abhāk tvāt

original: paṇḍitaiḥ etat nirvāṇaṃ kathitam sarvathā parimitāhantāyāḥ layībhāvāt /
analyzed: paṇḍitaiḥ etat nirvāṇam kathitam sarvathā parimita ahantāyāḥ layībhāvāt

original: tvaṃ śṛṇu etat puruṣeṇa kathaṃ prāpyate // (MT_3,9.27)
analyzed: tvam śṛṇu etat puruṣeṇa katham prāpyate

original: sato 'py asyāpy anutpattyā buddhyā vaitad avāpyate // MU_3,9.28
analyzed: sataḥ pi asya api anutpattyā buddhyā vā etat avāpyate

original: asmābhiḥ / ahaṃtvattādisaṃyutaṃ yad idam dṛśyaṃ jagat /
analyzed: asmābhiḥ aham tvad tā ādi saṃyutam yat idam dṛśyam jagat
sataḥ api evam eva sthitasya api

original: anutpattyāḥ buddhyā anutpannam evedam ity evaṃrūpasya abhāvasya jñānenaiva /
analyzed: anutpattyāḥ buddhyāḥ anutpannam eva idam iti evaṃrūpasya abhāvasya jñānena eva
tad jagat viṣaya anutpannatva jñānena iti
yāvat etat ukta guṇam videha mukta tvam

original: etena dṛśyātyantābhāvasya videhamuktiṃ prati kāraṇatvam uktam // (MT_3,9.28)

analyzed: videha muktāḥ trailokyam sampadyante yadā tadā

original: manye te sargatām eva gatā vedyavidāṃ vara // MU_3,9.29
analyzed: manye te sarga tām eva gatāḥ vedya vidām vara

original: tadā te sargatām eva gatāḥ sargabhāvam eva gatāḥ bhavanti /

original: vidyate cet tribhuvanaṃ tat tattāṃ samprayāntu te /

original: yatra trailokyaśabdārtho na sambhavati kaścana // MU_3,9.30
analyzed: yatra trailokya śabda arthaḥ na sambhavati kaścana

original: tatra trilokatāṃ yātaṃ brahmety uktyarthadhīḥ kutaḥ /
analyzed: tatra tri loka tām yātam brahmā iti ukti artha dhīḥ kutas

original: tasmān no sambhavaty anyā jagacchabdārthakalpanā // MU_3,9.31
analyzed: tasmāt no sambhavati anyā jagat śabda artha kalpanā
kaścana trailokya śabda arthaḥ trailokya śabda yuktaḥ arthaḥ

original: trailokyaśabdārthaḥ trailokyākhyaḥ śabdaḥ tadarthaś ceti yāvat /
analyzed: trailokya śabda arthaḥ trailokya ākhyaḥ śabdaḥ tad arthaḥ ca iti yāvat
iti ukti artha dhīḥ evaṃrūpa ukti artha ākārā dhīḥ

original: evaṃrūpā uktiḥ evaṃrūpaḥ arthaś ceti yāvat /
analyzed: evaṃrūpā uktiḥ evaṃrūpaḥ arthaḥ ca iti yāvat
jagat śabda artha kalpanā jagat śabda artha rūpā kalpanā na bhavati

original: anena prasaṅgena jagadbrahmaṇoḥ aikyam eva punaḥ punaḥ kathayati
analyzed: anena prasaṅgena jagat brahmaṇoḥ aikyam eva punar punar kathayati

original: brahmaiva jagad ity eva satyaṃ satyāvabodhinaḥ // MU_3,9.32
analyzed: brahmā eva jagat iti eva satyam satya avabodhinaḥ

original: yathā hi hemakaṭake vicāryāpi na dṛśyate /

analyzed: kaṭaka tvam kvacid nāma ṛte nirmala hāṭakam

analyzed: nirmala hāṭakam ṛte kaṭaka tvam nāma kvacid na dṛśyate

original: yathā kaṭakaṃ hemaiva bhavati tathā jagat brahmaiva bhavatīti pūrvaślokadṛṣṭāntatayā
analyzed: yathā kaṭakam hema eva bhavati tathā jagat brahma eva bhavati iti pūrva śloka dṛṣṭānta tayā

original: jalād ṛte payovīcau nāhaṃ paśyāmi kiñcana /
analyzed: jalāt ṛte payaḥ vīcau na aham paśyāmi kiñcana

original: vīcitvaṃ tvādṛśair dṛṣṭaṃ yat tu nāsty eva tatra hi // MU_3,9.34
analyzed: vīci tvam tvādṛśaiḥ dṛṣṭam yat tu na asti eva tatra hi

analyzed: jalāt ṛte kiñcana na paśyāmi payaḥ vīcau na asti

original: spandatvaṃ pavanād anyan na kadācana kutracit /
analyzed: spanda tvam pavanāt anyat na kadācana kutracid

original: spanda eva sadā vāyur jagat tasmān na vidyate // MU_3,9.35
analyzed: spandaḥ eva sadā vāyuḥ jagat tasmāt na vidyate

original: yataḥ jagataḥ brahmatve dṛṣṭāntatrayam asti tasmāt jagat na vidyate /
analyzed: yatas jagataḥ brahmatve dṛṣṭānta trayam asti tasmāt jagat na vidyate

original: ataś ca videhamuktasya sargatāgamanaṃ kathaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas ca videha muktasya sarga tā gamanam katham bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: punar api pūrvoktam artham eva sadṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati
analyzed: punar api pūrva uktam artham eva sa dṛṣṭāntam kathayati

original: yathā śūnyatvam ākāśas tāpa eva marau jalam /
analyzed: yathā śūnya tvam ākāśaḥ tāpaḥ eva marau jalam

original: teja eva yathāloko brahmaiva trijagat tathā // MU_3,9.36
analyzed: tejaḥ eva yathā lokaḥ brahmā eva trijagat tathā

original: yayodeti mune yuktyā tāṃ mamopadiśottamām // MU_3,9.37
analyzed: yayā udeti mune yuktyā tām mama upadiśa uttamām
he mune jagat dṛśyasya jagat rūpasya dṛśyasya
yayā yuktyā atyanta abhāva sampattyā atyanta abhāva sampādanena

original: jagadviṣayasyātyantābhāvasya muktatāsādhane kathaṃ sāmarthyam astīty atra yuktiṃ

analyzed: nanu yuktim eva kim punar punar pṛcchasi iti atra uttara kathana pūrvam praśna antaram karoti
mithas sampannayoḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ eka saṅkṣaye

original: dvayābhāve sthitiṃ yāte nirvāṇam avaśiṣyate // MU_3,9.38
analyzed: dvaya abhāve sthitim yāte nirvāṇam avaśiṣyate
