original: brahma cetthaṃ svabhāvasthaṃ budhyate vada me tathā // MU_3,9.39
analyzed: brahma ca ittham svabhāva stham budhyate vada me tathā

original: uktanītyā mithaḥ sampannayoḥ yataḥ tvayaivaitad uktam iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: ukta nītyā mithas sampannayoḥ yatas tvayā eva etat uktam iti śeṣaḥ

original: yataḥ tvayā eva uktaṃ mithaḥ sampannayoḥ uktanītyā mithaḥ siddhayoḥ /
analyzed: yatas tvayā eva uktam mithas sampannayoḥ ukta nītyā mithas siddhayoḥ
tatas dvaya abhāve sthitim yāte sati
tathā brahma jagat bhāvena bṛṃhitam śuddha cit tattvam

original: tvaṃ tathā ca me vada kathaya // (MT_3,9.38-39)
analyzed: tvam tathā ca me vada kathaya

original: rasāveśenonmattavat punar api dṛśyātyantābhāvasiddhiyuktiṃ brahmaṇaḥ itthaṃsvabhāvāvasthitiyuktiṃ
analyzed: rasa āveśena unmatta vat punar api dṛśya atyanta abhāva siddhi yuktim brahmaṇaḥ ittham svabhāva avasthiti yuktim

original: kayaitaj jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati / /
analyzed: kayā etat jñāyate yuktyā katham etat prasidhyati

original: etasmiṃs tu mune siddhe na sādhyam avaśiṣyate // MU_3,9.40
analyzed: etasmin tu mune siddhe na sādhyam avaśiṣyate

original: etat ayaṃ dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ idam brahmaṇaḥ itthaṃsvabhāvāvasthānaṃ ca /
analyzed: etat ayam dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ idam brahmaṇaḥ ittham svabhāva avasthānam ca
atra punar punar praśnān karoṣi iti
mukti mātrasya eva ākāṅkṣita tvāt tasya ca anena eva siddha tvāt

original: iyaṃ mithyājñānaviṣūcikā śuddhacinmātre dṛśyam idam ity evaṃrūpo jñānaviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: iyam mithyā jñāna viṣūcikā śuddha cit mātre dṛśyam idam iti evaṃrūpaḥ jñāna viśeṣaḥ

original: vicāraś cātra kiṃrūpam idaṃ dṛśyam ity evaṃrūpo jñeyaḥ // (MT_3,9.41)
analyzed: vicāraḥ ca atra kiṃrūpam idam dṛśyam iti evaṃrūpaḥ jñeyaḥ

original: nanv asmin samaye mayā kṛta eva leśato vicāraḥ /
analyzed: nanu asmin samaye mayā kṛtaḥ eva leśataḥ vicāraḥ

original: tat katham idaṃ dṛśyaṃ na śāntam
analyzed: tat katham idam dṛśyam na śāntam

original: na śakyate jhagity eva samucchedayituṃ kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: na śakyate jhagiti eva samucchedayitum kṣaṇāt
sama prayatane hi adrau samāroha avarohaṇe

original: yathā kaścit parvatāgram ārūḍhaḥ tataś cāvataritum icchan na jhagity evāvatarituṃ śaknoti /
analyzed: yathā kaścid parvata agram ārūḍhaḥ tatas ca avataritum icchan na jhagiti eva avataritum śaknoti

original: tathā cirarūḍhā dṛśyasatyatāpratītiḥ na jhagiti dūrīkartuṃ śakyate iti bahukālaṃ vicāraḥ kartavya iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,9.42)
analyzed: tathā cira rūḍhā dṛśya satya tā pratītiḥ na dūrīkartum śakyate iti bahu kālam vicāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
tasmāt abhyāsa yogena yuktyā nyāya upapattibhiḥ

original: jagadbhrāntir yathā śāmyet tathedaṃ kathyate śṛṇu // MU_3,9.43
analyzed: jagat bhrāntiḥ yathā śāmyet tathā idam kathyate śṛṇu
tathā yuktyā sva buddhi kṛtayā yuktyā
tathā nyāya upapattibhiḥ nyāya śāstreṣu uktābhiḥ yuktibhiḥ
tvam tat śṛṇu śravaṇa viṣayam kuru

original: nanu tacchravaṇena mama kiṃ setsyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tad śravaṇena mama kim setsyati iti atra āha

original: vadāmy ākhyāyikāṃ rāma yām imāṃ bodhasiddhaye /
analyzed: vadāmi ākhyāyikām rāma yām imām bodha siddhaye

original: tāṃ cec chṛṇoṣi tat sādho mukta evāsi buddhimān // MU_3,9.44
analyzed: tām ced śṛṇoṣi tat sādho muktaḥ evā asi buddhimān

original: samanantarakṛtāṃ pratijñāṃ sampādayan prakaraṇārambhe pratijñātaṃ savistarakathanaṃ
analyzed: samanantara kṛtām pratijñām sampādayan prakaraṇa ārambhe pratijñātam sa vistara kathanam
atha utpatti prakaraṇam mayā idam tava kathyate

original: yaḥ kilotpadyate rāma tena muktena bhūyate // MU_3,9.45
analyzed: yaḥ kila utpadyate rāma tena muktena bhūyate
atha śabdaḥ ānantarya arthaḥ saṅkṣepa kathana anantara tām dyotayati

original: ataḥ muktikathane pravṛttair asmābhiḥ utpattiprakaraṇakathanam eva kāryam / anyathā
analyzed: atas mukti kathane pravṛttaiḥ asmābhiḥ utpatti prakaraṇa kathanam eva kāryam anyathā

original: nirādhārāyāḥ mukteḥ kathanam ayuktaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: nirādhārāyāḥ mukteḥ kathanam ayuktam syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: vistareṇa kathayiṣyamāṇe 'sminn utpattiprakaraṇe tvaṃ kiṃ kathayasīty / atrāha
analyzed: vistareṇa kathayiṣyamāṇe smin utpatti prakaraṇe tvam kim kathayasi iti atra āha

original: iyam itthaṃ jagadbhrāntir bhāty ajātaiva khātmikā /
analyzed: iyam ittham jagat bhrāntiḥ bhāti ajātā eva kha ātmikā
iti utpatti prakaraṇe kathyate smin mayā adhunā
atas kha ātmikā ākāśa svarūpā satī
mayā adhunā asmin utpatti prakaraṇe kathyate
utpatti prakaraṇam eva kathayiṣyan sthūṇā nikhanana nyāyena utpatti mūla kāraṇa bhūta śuddha cit mātra prakaṭana artham
ādau tad āvaraka prapañca layam tāvat kathayati

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcij jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam / /
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate kiñcid jagat sthāvara jaṅgamam
sarvam sarva prakāra āḍhyam sa sura asura kiṃnaram
tat mahāpralaye prāpte rudra ādi pariṇāmini

original: bhavaty asad adṛśyaṃ ca kvāpi yāti vinaśyati // MU_3,9.48
analyzed: bhavati asat adṛśyam ca kvāpi yāti vinaśyati
sarva prakāra āḍhyam samasta bhāva abhāva ādi prakāra yuktam
mahāpralaye turya ākhye avasthā viśeṣe mahākalpa anta samaye ca
rudra ādi pariṇāmini rudra ādi laya yukte
ahaṅkāraḥ saṃhāra adhikārī śrī mahādevaḥ jñeyaḥ

original: ādiśabdena buddhyādeḥ sṛṣṭisthityadhikāriṇaḥ viṣṇvādeś ca grahaṇam /
analyzed: ādi śabdena buddhi ādeḥ sṛṣṭi sthiti adhikāriṇaḥ viṣṇu ādeḥ ca grahaṇam
nanu katham adṛśyam ca bhavati iti

original: kvāpi yāti anirvācye kasmin cittattve ekatāṃ yāti /
analyzed: kvāpi yāti anirvācye kasmin cit tattve ekatām yāti

original: na hi bhāsamānasya sarvathā vināśo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na hi bhāsamānasya sarvathā vināśaḥ yuktaḥ
na hi śuktikā rajatam sarvathā vinaśyati

original: nanu bhāsamānasyaitasya jagataḥ nāśe kiṃ śiṣyate /
analyzed: nanu bhāsamānasya etasya jagataḥ nāśe kim śiṣyate
hi śuktikā śiṣyate iti atra āha

original: tataḥ stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamas tatam /
analyzed: tatas stimita gambhīram na tejaḥ na tamaḥ tatam

original: anākhyam anabhivyaktaṃ sat kiñcid avaśiṣyate // MU_3,9.49
analyzed: an ākhyam an abhivyaktam sat kiñcid avaśiṣyate

original: kiñcit arthāt dṛśyavināśasākṣisvarūpaṃ kim api anirvācyaṃ vastu /
analyzed: kiñcid arthāt dṛśya vināśa sākṣi svarūpam kim api anirvācyam vastu

original: anyathā bhāsamānasya iyataḥ jagataḥ kutrāvasthānaṃ syān / na hi
analyzed: anyathā bhāsamānasya iyataḥ jagataḥ kutra avasthānam syāt na hi
bhāsamānasya vināśaḥ ghaṭa sva rūpa nāśa vat yuktaḥ
śuktikā rajata nāśa vat anya rūpa tayā

original: anyarūpatayā sphuraṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ vinā nopapadyata iti /
analyzed: anya rūpa tayā sphuraṇam prādhānyam vinā na upapadyate iti
stimitam ca iti aunmukhya ākhya spanda rahitam
gambhīram sva viṣaya avagāhitṛ abhāvena avagāhana kriyā viṣaya tva abhāvena ca avagāhitum aśakyam tādṛśam

original: na tejaḥ śuddhacinmātrarūpatvena jīvādisvarūpalaukikacetanavyatiriktam ity arthaḥ / tathā
analyzed: na tejaḥ śuddha cit mātra rūpatvena jīva ādi svarūpa laukika cetana vyatiriktam iti arthaḥ tathā
na tamaḥ jaḍa padārtha vyatiriktam iti arthaḥ
atha vā cit mātra rūpa tvena cetya svarūpa bāhya tejaḥ tamaḥ vyatiriktam

original: anākhyam ākhyākartṛtvenāvasthānāt ākhyāviṣayatvābhāvāc cākhyātum aśakyam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: anākhyam ākhyā kartṛ tvena avasthānāt ākhyā viṣaya tva abhāvāt ca ākhyātum aśakyam iti arthaḥ
anabhivyaktam bāhya antaḥkaraṇa agocara tvena aprakaṭa svarūpam

original: kṛtaś ca pūrvam eṣāṃ viśeṣaṇānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena
analyzed: kṛtaḥ ca pūrvam eṣām viśeṣaṇānām hetu hetumat bhāvena
śṛṅkhalā bandhaḥ iti na punar āyastam
ākhyā kartṛ tvena avasthānāt ākhyā kartṛ

original: avaśiṣṭatayā proktaṃ vastu punar api vistareṇa viśinaṣṭi
analyzed: avaśiṣṭa tayā proktam vastu punar api vistareṇa viśinaṣṭi

original: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cākāśaṃ na dṛśyaṃ na ca darśanam /
analyzed: na śūnyam na api ca ākāśam na dṛśyam na ca darśanam

original: na ca bhūtapadārthaugho yad anantatayā sthitam // MU_3,9.50
analyzed: na ca bhūta padārtha oghaḥ yat ananta tayā sthitam
tattve hi jagat adhiṣṭhāna tvam ayuktam syāt

original: na hi śūnyaṃ kasyāpi adhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: na hi śūnyam kasya api adhiṣṭhānam dṛṣṭam
tatra bhāsamānasya picchikā ādeḥ na ayana raśmi adhiṣṭhāna tvāt
ākāśasya ca śūnya eka maya tvāt
yat bhūta padārtha oghaḥ na bhavati
kim api a vyapadeśa ātma pūrṇāt pūrṇatara ākṛti

original: na san nāsan na sadasan nābhāvo bhavanaṃ na ca // MU_3,9.51
analyzed: na sat na asat na sat asat na abhāvaḥ bhavanam na ca
pūrṇāt pūrṇa tvena abhimatāt ākāśa ādeḥ

original: kim apy avyapadeśātma kim apy anirvācyasvarūpaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: kim api a vyapadeśa ātma kim api anirvācya svarūpam bhavati

original: [...]Explikation des Vorangegangenen sowie pratīka 'nāsadḥ' haplographisch verloren?
analyzed: explikation des vorangegangenen sowie pratīka nāsadḥ haplographisch verloren
tad viruddha abhāva tayā api avasthānāt
cit mātram cetya rahitam anantam ajaram śivam
anādi madhya paryantam yat anādhi nirāmayam

original: evaṃvidhaṃ kīdṛg ity apekṣāyām āha cinmātram ityādi /
analyzed: evaṃvidham kīdṛś iti apekṣāyām āha cit mātram ityādi
atas eva cetya rahitam cetya a rūṣitam
anantam svāntasya api sākṣi tvena sthita tvāt
tatra hi anādi madhya paryantam ādi madhya paryanta vyavasthā kāri deśa kāla bhāsaka tvāt ādi madhya paryanta rahitam
anādhi citta abhāvena tad āśrita ādhi rahitam
nirāmayam bhāva abhāva ādi svarūpa roga rahitam
yasmin jagat prasphurati dṛṣṭi mauktika haṃsa vat

original: yaś cedaṃ yaś ca naivedaṃ devaḥ sadasadātmakaḥ // MU_3,9.53
analyzed: yaḥ ca idam yaḥ ca na eva idam devaḥ sat asat ātmakaḥ
dṛṣṭau sphuritau mauktika haṃsau dṛṣṭi mauktika haṃsau

original: rogavaśena hi dṛṣṭyavayavabhūtāḥ raśmayaḥ mauktikabhāvena haṃsabhāvena cākāśe sphuranti
analyzed: roga vaśena hi dṛṣṭi avayava bhūtāḥ raśmayaḥ mauktika bhāvena haṃsa bhāvena ca ākāśe sphuranti
yaḥ krīḍā śīlaḥ dyotana śīlaḥ ca
idam idantayā viṣayīkṛtam bhāva jātam bhavati
a karṇa jihvaḥ nāsā tvac netraḥ sarvatra sarvadā

original: yaḥ śṛṇoty āsvādayati jighran spṛśati paśyati // MU_3,9.54
analyzed: yaḥ śṛṇoti āsvādayati jighran spṛśati paśyati
nāsā tvac netraḥ tvac ṅ ne
a karṇa jihvaḥ śrotra indriya rasana indriya rahitaḥ
tathā an āsā tvac netraḥ ghrāṇa indriya tvac indriya netra indriya rahitaḥ
śṛṇoti samasta śabda śravaṇa kriyām karoti
āsvādayati samasta āsvāda āsvādana kriyām karoti
samasta gandha śiṅghaṇa kriyām kurvan bhavati
spṛśati samsta sparśa sparśana kriyām karoti
paśyati samasta rūpa darśana kriyām karoti
samasta deśa kāla gata samasta prasāda samasta indriya sāra tvena sthita tvāt śravaṇa ādi kriyā kartṛ tva abhimāna grasta samasta deśa kāla gata samasta pramātṛ bhāvena
na ca indriya sāra tvena sthitasya asya anya indriya apekṣā yuktā
indriya antara nairapekṣyeṇa tad sārasya api tadvat tad apekṣāyāḥ ayukta vāt
api teṣām etad sāra tvam vinā na kiñcid rūpa tva āpatteḥ
etad sāra tve tu etasya eva tad bhāvena api
sarva pramātṛ bhāvena sthita tve api na indriya antara apekṣā
samasta deśa kāla gata samasta prasāda samasta indriya sāra tvena
saḥ eva sat asat rūpam yena ālokena lakṣyate

original: sargacitram anādyantaṃ kharūpaṃ cāpy arañjanam // MU_3,9.55
analyzed: sarga citram anādi antam kha rūpam ca api arañjanam

original: sa eva cinmātrasvarūpaḥ san draṣṭṛtām āpannaḥ sa eva /
analyzed: saḥ eva cit mātra svarūpaḥ san draṣṭṛ tām āpannaḥ saḥ eva
anādi antam an ādi anta cit mātra sāra tvena ādi anta rahitam iti arthaḥ
ābhāsa mātra rūpa tvena svapna vat ākāśa rūpam ca iti arthaḥ

original: arañjanam bhāsamānābhiḥ bhāvābhāvarañjanābhiḥ śuddhatvena paramārthato muktam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: arañjanam bhāsamānābhiḥ bhāva abhāva rañjanābhiḥ śuddha tvena paramārthataḥ muktam iti arthaḥ
ardha unmīlita dṛś bhrū bhū madhya tāraka vat jagat
vyoma ātmā eva sat ābhāsam svarūpam yaḥ abhipaśyati
yaḥ svarūpam cit mātra ākhyam svabhāvam
vyoma ātmā eva paramārthataḥ jagat rūpatā bhāvāt nakiñcidrūpam eva
sat ābhāsam sat iva ābhāsate iti sat ābhāsam
ardha unmīlita dṛś bhrū bhū madhya tāraka vat
ardha unmīlita dṛśaḥ bhrū bhū madhye bhāsamānā yā tārakā

original: ardhonmīlitanetraḥ puruṣaḥ svabhrūmadhye svadṛṣṭiraśmim eva tārakākārāṃ yathā paśyati /
analyzed: ardha unmīlita netraḥ puruṣaḥ sva bhrū madhye sva dṛṣṭi raśmim eva tāraka ākārām yathā paśyati

original: yasyānyad asti na vibhoḥ kāraṇaṃ śaśaśṛṅgavat /
analyzed: yasya anyat asti na vibhoḥ kāraṇam śaśa śṛṅga vat

original: yasyedaṃ ca jagat kāryaṃ taraṅgaugha ivāmbhasaḥ // MU_3,9.57
analyzed: yasya idam ca jagat kāryam taraṅga oghaḥ iva ambhasaḥ
yasya vibhoḥ kāraṇam na asti iti arthaḥ
nanu katham na asya kāraṇam asti
tad kāraṇam cit rūpam acit rūpam
vā na antyaḥ cit rūpam prati acit rūpa kāraṇatva ayogāt

original: ādye tu sa eva cidrūpaḥ cidrūpasya
analyzed: ādye tu saḥ eva cit rūpaḥ cit rūpasya

original: iti sarvasya jagataḥ tatkāryatvaṃ kathayati yasyedam iti /
analyzed: iti sarvasya jagataḥ tad kārya tvam kathayati yasya idam iti
jagataḥ cit mātra kārya tvam svapna jagat vat jñeyam
jvalataḥ sarvatas jasram citta sthālīṣu tiṣṭhataḥ

original: yasya cinmātradīpasya bhāsā bhāti jagattrayam // MU_3,9.58
analyzed: yasya cit mātra dīpasya bhāsā bhāti jagattrayam
dīpa tvam ca asya prakāśaka tvena jñeyam
bhāsā indriya dvāra nirgatayā cit prabhayā
jvalataḥ sarvam prakaṭayitum samarthasya iti arthaḥ

original: cittaṃ līyata eva tathāpi bījatvenātrāsyāvasthānāt evam uktam /
analyzed: cittam līyate eva tathā api bīja tvena atra asya avasthānāt evam uktam
yam vinā arka ādayaḥ pi ete prakāśāḥ timira upamāḥ

original: yaṃ vinā cakṣurindriyasārabhāvena sthitaṃ yaṃ vinā /
analyzed: yam vinā cakṣuḥ indriya sāra bhāvena sthitam yam vinā
arka ādayaḥ pi timira upamāḥ andhakāra sadṛśāḥ

original: cakṣuṣā aprakāśitāḥ sūryādayo hi sphuṭam evāndhakārasadṛśā
analyzed: cakṣuṣā aprakāśitāḥ sūrya ādayaḥ hi sphuṭam evā andhakāra sadṛśā

original: eva / satīti / yathā sūryasannidhāne mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ pravartante /
analyzed: eva sati iti yathā sūrya sannidhāne mṛgatṛṣṇikāḥ pravartante
tathā yad sannidhāne trijagat iti arthaḥ
sa spande samudeti iva niḥspande ntargatā iva ca

original: iyaṃ yasmiñ jagallakṣmīr alāta iva cakratā // MU_3,9.60
analyzed: iyam yasmin jagat lakṣmīḥ alāte iva cakratā
yasmin sa spande dṛśya aunmukhya ākhya spanda yukte sati
antargatā iva tad antargatā iva ca bhavati
paramārthataḥ na udeti na antargacchati iti iva śabda upādānam
yathā alāte sa spande bhrāmite sati
spanda aspanda ātmakaḥ yasya svabhāvaḥ nirmalaḥ kṣayaḥ

original: vā ity etasyāsatkalpatvād alaṃ taccintayādye cidviṣayatayā cidantargatatvāt tadrūpa eveti
analyzed: vā iti etasya asat kalpa tvāt alam tad cintayā ādye cit viṣaya tayā cit antargata tvāt tad rūpe eva iti
spanda aspanda ātmakaḥ spanda aspanda svarūpaḥ
spanda aspanda mayī yasya pavanasya iva sarva gā

original: sattā nāmnaiva bhinneva vyavahārān na vastutaḥ // MU_3,9.62
analyzed: sattā nāmnā eva bhinnā iva vyavahārāt na vastutas

original: vyavahārān nāmnaiva vyavahārārthaṃ kṛtena nāmnā eva /
analyzed: vyavahārāt nāmnā eva vyavahāra artham kṛtena nāmnā eva

original: sarvagā viśve taduttīrṇe ca svarūpe gatā /
analyzed: sarva gā viśve tad uttīrṇe ca sva rūpe gatā

original: pavanasya spandamayī sattā yayā vṛkṣādayaḥ kampante /
analyzed: pavanasya spanda mayī sattā yayā vṛkṣa ādayaḥ kampante
spanda aspanda mayyāḥ sattāyāḥ eka tvam

original: saspandasya niḥspandasya ca jalasyaikatvaṃ yathā nipuṇair niścīyate tathātrāpīti na virodhaḥ //
analyzed: sa spandasya niḥspandasya ca jalasya eka tvam yathā nipuṇaiḥ niścīyate tathā atra api iti na virodhaḥ

original: sarvadaiva prabuddho yaḥ supto yaḥ sarvadaiva ca /
analyzed: sarvadā eva prabuddhaḥ yaḥ suptaḥ yaḥ sarvadā eva ca

original: na prasupto na buddhaś ca yaḥ sarvatraiva sarvadā // MU_3,9.63
analyzed: na prasuptaḥ na buddhaḥ ca yaḥ sarvatra eva sarvadā
yaḥ sarvadā eva sarvāsu daśāsu eva
prabuddhaḥ sākṣi tayā avasthānāt prakṛṣṭa jñāna yuktaḥ eva
tad parāmarśa rahita tvāt suptim gataḥ ca bhavati
yaḥ sarvatra eva sarva deśeṣu eva
upekṣayā sva parāmarśe pi vimukha tvāt
yad aspandaḥ śivam śāntam yad spandaḥ trijagat sthitiḥ
spanda aspanda vilāsa ātmā yaḥ ekaḥ bharita ākṛtiḥ
iti yat aspandaḥ yat ca iti aunmukhya rāhityam
yad spandaḥ yat ca iti aunmukhyam
yaḥ ekaḥ spanda aspanda vilāsa ātmā cetya aunmukhya tā yukta tad rahita svarūpaḥ
ekasya yugapad spanda maya tvam vaicitrya āvaham

original: āmoda iva puṣpeṣu na naśyati vināśiṣu /
analyzed: āmodaḥ iva puṣpeṣu na naśyati vināśiṣu

original: pratyakṣastho 'py athāgrāhyaḥ śauklyaṃ śuklapaṭeṣv iva // MU_3,9.65
analyzed: pratyakṣa sthaḥ pi atha agrāhyaḥ śauklyam śukla paṭeṣu iva
na naśyati tad nāśe pi tad upādāna tayā sūkṣma tvena avasthānāt
na hi ghaṭe naṣṭe tad apekṣayā
sūkṣmam upādāna bhūtam mṛd svarūpam naśyati

original: yathā puṣpe naṣṭe 'pi tadāmodaḥ ākāśe bhrāmyan kiñcit kālaṃ na naśyati /
analyzed: yathā puṣpe naṣṭe tad āmodaḥ ākāśe bhrāmyan kiñcid kālam na naśyati

original: yaḥ agrāhyaḥ kenāpi bāhyenāntareṇa vendriyeṇa grahītuṃ śakyo na bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ agrāhyaḥ kena api bāhyena antareṇa vā indriyeṇa grahītum śakyaḥ na bhavati
pratyakṣa sthaḥ pi pratyakṣe vartamānaḥ pi

original: na hi kasyacit svātmāpratyakṣaḥ nāham atrāsmīti /
analyzed: na hi kasyacid sva ātmā apratyakṣaḥ na aham atra asmi iti

original: yathā paṭe vartamānaṃ śuklatvaṃ pratyakṣam api na hastena grāhyaṃ bhavati / tathety
analyzed: yathā paṭe vartamānam śukla tvam pratyakṣam api na hastena grāhyam bhavati tathā iti

original: mūkopamo 'pi yo vaktā mantā yo 'py upalopamaḥ /
analyzed: mūka upamaḥ pi yaḥ vaktā mantā yaḥ pi upala upamaḥ

original: yo bhoktā nityatṛpto 'pi kartā yaś cāpy akiñcana // MU_3,9.66
analyzed: yaḥ bhoktā nitya tṛptaḥ u pi kartā yaḥ ca api akiñcana
sarva vaktṛ rūpa tayā sthita tvāt
mūka upama tvam ca asya nirvikalpa tvāt

original: na hi taṃ vinā ko 'py anyo mantā nāma syāt /
analyzed: na hi tam vinā kaḥ api anyaḥ mantā nāma syāt
cit mātra svarūpa tvena mantṛ tva lepa rahita tvāt

original: yaḥ nityatṛpto 'pi parānandarūpatvena sarvadaiva svenaiva tṛpto 'pi /
analyzed: yaḥ nitya tṛptaḥ u pi parānanda rūpa tvena sarvadā eva svena eva tṛptaḥ u pi

original: yaḥ kartāpi sarvakartṝṇāṃ sāmarthyāpādakatvena kartṛtvam āpanno 'pi /
analyzed: yaḥ kartā api sarva kartṝṇām sāmarthya āpādaka tvena kartṛ tvam āpannaḥ u pi
kartā atas na bhavati iti arthaḥ
akartṛ tvam ca asya nakiñcana tvena eva jñeyam

original: na kiñcit saṃsthitenāpi yena vyāptam idaṃ jagat // MU_3,9.67
analyzed: na kiñcid saṃsthitena api yena vyāptam idam jagat
yaḥ śuddha cit mātra tvena aṅga rahitaḥ api
sahasra padam atra ananta tā vācakam
tena ananta kara locanaḥ iti arthaḥ
ca asya ananta dehe sva ātma bhūta tayā jñeyam

original: anyathā kiṃmayam etat syād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anyathā kiṃmayam etat syāt iti bhāvaḥ
na saṃsthitena api kutra api na vartamānena api
na saṃsthita tvam vā asya grahītum aśakya tvāt
nirindriya balasya api yasya aśeṣa indriya kriyāḥ
yasya nirmanasaḥ pi etāḥ manaḥ nirmāṇa rītayaḥ
aśeṣa indriya kriya tvam asya indriya sāra rūpa tayā
yasya nirmanasaḥ nirvikalpa cit mātra tayā manaḥ rūpasya api

original: anyathā yena tena rūpeṇa bhāsamānānām āsāṃ kuta utthānaṃ syāt //
analyzed: anyathā yena tena rūpeṇa bhāsamānānām āsām kutas utthānam syāt
yad anālocanāt bhānti saṃsāra uraga bhītayaḥ

original: yasmin dṛṣṭe palāyante sarvathā sarvadetayaḥ // MU_3,9.69
analyzed: yasmin dṛṣṭe palāyante sarvathā sarvadā etayaḥ
yad anālocanāt yad viṣaya samyak jñāna abhāvāt
saṃsāra uraga bhītayaḥ saṃsāra ākhya sarpa udbhavāni bhayāni
yathā rajju samyak jñāna abhāvāt uraga bhītayaḥ sphuranti iti uraga pada abhiprāyaḥ

original: paramātmājñānād eva hi tasmin saṃsāraḥ tadbhītayaś ca bhānti /
analyzed: paramātma ajñānāt eva hi tasmin saṃsāraḥ tad bhītayaḥ ca bhānti
dṛṣṭe sva rūpa tvena anubhūte sati
ītīnām palāyanam īti rūpa tā viparyayeṇa paramātma rūpa tā jñānam eva
tāsām api paramārthataḥ tad rūpa tvāt

original: sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpa iva kriyāḥ /
analyzed: sākṣiṇi sphāra ābhāse dhruve dīpe iva kriyāḥ

original: sati yasmin pravartante citrehāḥ spandapūrvikāḥ // MU_3,9.70
analyzed: sati yasmin pravartante citra īhāḥ spanda pūrvikāḥ
sākṣiṇi sarvāsām staimitya spanda avasthānām grāhaka tvena sākṣi bhūte
yasmin sati sannidhi mātram bhajati sati

original: asati āntare kasmin cittattve vikalpānāṃ śarīraceṣṭānāṃ
analyzed: asati āntare kasmin cit tattve vikalpānām śarīra ceṣṭānām

original: cotthānaṃ yuktaṃ na syād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: ca utthānam yuktam na syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: yathā dīpe sannidhimātraṃ bhajati lokakriyā svayam eva pravartante /
analyzed: yathā dīpe sannidhi mātram bhajati lokakriyā svayam eva pravartante
yasmāt ghaṭa paṭa ākāra padārtha śata paṅktayaḥ
taraṅga kaṇa kallola vīcayaḥ vāridheḥ iva
yatas ghaṭa paṭa ākāra padārtha śata paṅktayaḥ ghaṭa paṭa sva rūpāḥ padārtha śata samūhāḥ
yadi api paramāṇu ādeḥ eva upādāna tvam

original: anyair uktaṃ tathāpi cetanān prati tasyopādānatvābhāvāt kim api cetanācetanasvarūpam
analyzed: anyaiḥ uktam tathā api cetanān prati tasya upādāna tva abhāvāt kim api cetana acetana svarūpam
saḥ eva anya tayā udeti yaḥ padārtha śata bhramaiḥ
kaṭaka aṅgada keyūra nūpuraiḥ iva kāñcanam

original: sa eva cidākhyo 'pūrvarūpeṇa vartamāna evānyatayānyasvarūpeṇodeti udayaṃ yāty /
analyzed: saḥ eva cit ākhyaḥ pūrva rūpeṇa vartamānaḥ eva anyatayā anya svarūpeṇa udeti udayam yāti
anya svarūpa tām iva bhajate iti arthaḥ
padārtha śata bhramaiḥ padārtha śata rūpāḥ bhramāḥ
śata padam ca atra ananta tā param
tat eva kaṭaka aṅgada keyūra nūpuraiḥ udeti

original: yas tvam ekāvabhāsātmā yo 'ham ete janāś ca ye /
analyzed: yaḥ tvam eka avabhāsa ātmā yaḥ ham ete janāḥ ca ye

original: yaś ca na tvam abuddhātman nāhaṃ naite janāś ca yaḥ // MU_3,9.73
analyzed: yaḥ ca na tvam a buddha ātman na aham na ete janāḥ ca yaḥ
he abuddha ātman adya tāvat ajñāta paramātma tattva
eka avabhāsa ātmā kevala jñāna svarūpaḥ

original: yaś ca ya ete janāḥ asti /
analyzed: yaḥ ca ye ete janāḥ asti

original: nanu paricchinna eva tarhy asau nety āha yaś ceti /
analyzed: nanu paricchinnaḥ eva tarhi asau na iti āha yaḥ ca iti
tvad tā ādi vikalpa rahita śuddha cit mātra rūpeṇa paramārthataḥ sthita tvāt iti arthaḥ
anyā iva a vyatiriktā eva ca bhaṅgurā

original: payasīva taraṅgālī yasmin sphurati dṛśyabhūḥ // MU_3,9.74
analyzed: payasi iva taraṅga ālī yasmin sphurati dṛśya bhūḥ
tat eva bhūḥ nānā racanā ādhāra tvāt bhūmiḥ
kathambhūtā evā a vyatiriktā eva tatas vyatirekam an āpannā eva

original: 'pi jātivyaktyor iva aikyābhāvam āśaṅkya tanmayatāṃ kathayati saiveti /
analyzed: pi jāti vyaktyoḥ iva aikya abhāvam āśaṅkya tad maya tām kathayati sā eva iti
sā eva na tu leśena api a tad rūpa tā matī

original: taraṅgālyāḥ ca payasi tadrūpatāyām apy atadrūpatayeva bhāsanaṃ sarvapratītisiddham eva //
analyzed: taraṅgālyāḥ ca payasi tad rūpa tāyām api a tad rūpa tayā iva bhāsanam sarva pratīti siddham eva
a tad rūpa tā matī rūpa tā

original: yataḥ kālasya kalanā yato dṛśyasya dṛśyatā /
analyzed: yatas kālasya kalanā yatas dṛśyasya dṛśya tā

original: mānasī kalanā yena yena bhāsāṃ vibhāsanam // MU_3,9.75
analyzed: mānasī kalanā yena yena bhāsām vibhāsanam
kālasya vartamāna ādi upādhya sahitasya vastunaḥ

original: na hy āntaraṃ kalpayitāraṃ vinā kālasya kalpanā yukteti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: na hi āntaram kalpayitāram vinā kālasya kalpanā yuktā iti bhāvaḥ

original: na hi draṣṭāraṃ vinā dṛśyasya dṛśyatvam upapadyate /
analyzed: na hi draṣṭāram vinā dṛśyasya dṛśya tvam upapadyate

original: na hi sākṣiṇaṃ vinā mano 'pi sidhyati /
analyzed: na hi sākṣiṇam vinā manaḥ sidhyati

original: na hi jñātāraṃ vinā jñānāny utpadyante //
analyzed: na hi jñātāram vinā jñānāni utpadyante

original: kriyāṃ rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ ca cetanam /
analyzed: kriyām rūpam rasam gandham sparśam śabdam ca cetanam

original: yad vetsi tad asau devo yena vetsi tad apy asau // MU_3,9.76
analyzed: yat vetsi tat asau devaḥ yena vetsi tat api asau  /

original: kriyām ity anena vetsīty asya sthāne karoṣīty etat sambandhanīyam /
analyzed: kriyām iti anena vetsi iti asya sthāne karoṣi iti etat sambandhanīyam

original: tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ yad vetsi tad vedanam /
analyzed: tathā rūpam rasam gandham sparśam śabdam yat vetsi tat vedanam

original: yena dhīndriyapañcakena vetsi tad apy asau devaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: yena dhīndriya pañcakena vetsi tat api asau devaḥ bhavati

original: yad vetsi tad asau devaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: yat vetsi tat asau devaḥ bhavati

original: vetsi tad apy asau devaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: vetsi tat api asau devaḥ bhavati

original: etena kriyāphalasya tatkaraṇasya ca tanmayatā kathitā /
analyzed: etena kriyā phalasya tad karaṇasya ca tad maya tā kathitā
kartuḥ tu sā nirvivāda siddhā eva

original: evaṃ viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa tatsvarūpam uktvā tatpraveśopāyam āha
analyzed: evam viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa tad svarūpam uktvā tad praveśa upāyam āha
draṣṭṛ darśana dṛśyānām madhye yat darśanam sthitam
sādho tad avadhānena sva ātmānam avabudhyase
tvam tad avadhānena tatra avadhāna dānena

original: sarvo vyavahāraḥ tāvat tripuṭyām eva sampadyate /
analyzed: sarvaḥ vyavahāraḥ tāvat tripuṭyām eva sampadyate
tatra aham draṣṭā iti abhimāna grastāt
draṣṭuḥ grāhya eka rūpa dṛśya viṣayam darśanam utpadyate
nyathā tayoḥ draṣṭṛ dṛśya tā yogāt
draṣṭā abhimāna grasta tvāt na jha c iti śuddhīkartum śakyate

original: tattulyayogakṣemam evātaḥ tau hitvā darśana evāvadhānaṃ vihitaṃ /
analyzed: tad tulya yogakṣemam eva atas tau hitvā darśane eva avadhānam vihitam

original: ahantāyāḥ dṛśyasthāyāḥ jaḍatāyāś ca nivāraṇam aśakyam eva /
analyzed: ahantāyāḥ dṛśya sthāyāḥ jaḍa tāyāḥ ca nivāraṇam aśakyam eva

original: darśanasya tu aṃśabhāvena sthitadoṣadvayanivāraṇaṃ suśakam eva /
analyzed: darśanasya tu aṃśa bhāvena sthita doṣa dvaya nivāraṇam su śakam eva

original: madvyatiriktatvaṃ cāsya draṣṭṛtvābhāvāt dṛśyarūpam api nāsti /
analyzed: mad vyatirikta tvam ca asya draṣṭṛ tva abhāvāt dṛśya rūpam api nā asti

original: ataḥ tābhyāṃ vyatiriktaṃ kim api grahītum aśakyam
analyzed: atas tābhyām vyatiriktam kim api grahītum aśakyam

original: avyapadeśyaṃ darśanaṃ nāmāstīti siddhā darśanasya paramātmarūpatā /
analyzed: avyapadeśyam darśanam nāma asti iti siddhā darśanasya paramātma rūpa tā
tatas draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ ca sā siddhatarā eva

original: na hi darśanasambandhavilaye draṣṭṛdṛśyayoḥ sthitiḥ sambhavati /
analyzed: na hi darśana sambandha vilaye draṣṭṛ dṛśyayoḥ sthitiḥ sambhavati
darśana āśraya tvena eva draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛ tvāt
tad viṣaya tvena ca dṛśyasya dṛśya tvāt
athavā darśanam atra darśana icchā kālīnam jñeyam
tat hi tadā āśraya viṣaya uparāga abhāvena śuddha tayā eva
sphurati paścāt tu sthūla tām yāti
pūrva uktam sarga anta ślokena saṅgṛhṇāti

original: ajam ajaram ajāḍyaṃ śāśvataṃ brahma nityaṃ śivam amalam anādyaṃ vandhyavedyair anindyam /
analyzed: ajam ajaram ajāḍyam śāśvatam brahma nityam śivam amalam anādyam vandhya vedyaiḥ anindyam

original: sakalakalanaśūnyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇānām anubhavanam avedyaṃ vedanaṃ vittvam antaḥ // MU_3,9.78
analyzed: sakala kalana śūnyam kāraṇam kāraṇānām anubhavanam avedyam vedanam vid tvam antar
sarvasya dṛśya jātasya paryavasāna rūpam bhavati
śāśvatam viśva ātmaka tve pi svarūpāt acyuta tvāt
anādyam kasya api tad ādya tvena āvartamāna tvāt
tad sthaiḥ bhāva abhāvaiḥ a dūṣita tvāt
sakala kalana śūnyam nirvikalpa svarūpa tvāt
kāraṇānām kāraṇa tvena abhimatānām brahma ādīnām
teṣām api ākṛtimat tvena sa kāraṇa tvāt
anubhavaḥ eva pūrva ukta viśeṣāṇām sambhavāt
anubhava svarūpa tve pi vedya mālinyam āśaṅkya āha a vedyam iti
acetya cit rūpam iti yāvat iti śivam

original: vittvaṃ vettīti yāvat ] [vittvaṃ] vettīti ⟨jātasya paryavasānarūpaṃ bhavati mahāpralaye śiṣyate iti⟩ yāvat
analyzed: vid tvam vetti iti yāvat vid tvam vetti iti jātasya paryavasāna rūpam bhavati mahāpralaye śiṣyate iti yāvat

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe navamaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe navamaḥ sargaḥ

original: oṃ / atra moham āpanna iva śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: om atra moham āpannaḥ iva śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: bhavatv etad anākāraṃ nāma nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // MU_3,10.1
analyzed: bhavatu etat anākāram nāma na asti atra saṃśayaḥ
atra mama api viśvāsaḥ sti iti iti bhāvaḥ

original: bahir anubhūyamānākārarahitaśūnyādivasturūpatānirāsas tu tasya na yujyata iti kathayati
analyzed: bahis anubhūyamāna ākāra rahita śūnya ādi vastu rūpa tā nirāsaḥ tu tasya na yujyate iti kathayati

original: na śūnyaṃ katham etat syān na prakāśaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: na śūnyam katham etat syāt na prakāśaḥ katham bhavet

original: kathaṃ vā na tamorūpaṃ kathaṃ vā naiva khātmakam // MU_3,10.2
analyzed: katham vā na tamaḥ rūpam katham vā nā eva kha ātmakam

original: kathaṃ vā naiva cidrūpaṃ jīvo vā na kathaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: katham vā nā eva cit rūpam jīvaḥ vā na katham bhavet

original: kathaṃ na buddhitattvaṃ syāt kathaṃ vā na mano bhavet // MU_3,10.3
analyzed: katham na buddhi tattvam syāt katham vā na manaḥ bhavet

original: cidrūpatvasyāpi tatra paramārthatayā nivāraṇād etad uktam // (MT_3,10.3)
analyzed: cit rūpa tvasya api tatra paramārtha tayā nivāraṇāt etat uktam

original: kathaṃ vā na na kiñcit syāt kathaṃ vā sarvam ity api /
analyzed: katham vā na na kiñcid syāt katham vā sarvam iti api

original: anayā ca vacobhaṅgyā mama moha ivoditaḥ // MU_3,10.4
analyzed: anayā ca vacaḥ bhaṅgyā mama mohaḥ iva uditaḥ

original: na kiñcit kenāpi rūpeṇa sthitaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: na kiñcid kena api rūpeṇa sthitam na bhavati

original: sarvam ity api kathaṃ vā na bhavati // (MT_3,10.4)
analyzed: sarvam iti api katham vā na bhavati
viṣamaḥ yam ati praśnaḥ bhavatā samudāhṛtaḥ

original: bhinadmy enaṃ tv ayatnena naiśaṃ tama ivāṃśumān // MU_3,10.5
analyzed: bhinadmi enam tu ayatnena naiśam tamaḥ iva aṃśumān
bhavatā ayam praśnaḥ ati viṣamaḥ durbodhataraḥ
manaḥ granthi rūpa tvāt praśnasya bhinadmi iti kathanam
kaḥ iva aṃśumān iva sūryaḥ iva
mahā kalpānta sampattau yat tat sat avaśiṣyate

original: tad rāma na yathā śūnyaṃ tad idaṃ śṛṇu kathyate // MU_3,10.6
analyzed: tat rāma na yathā śūnyam tat idam śṛṇu kathyate
mahākalpa anta sampattau turye turyātīte mahāpralaya samaya niṣpattau vā
tat prasiddham kena api apalapitum aśakyam
tat yat śabda kathitam sat vastu

original: tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatra tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam // MU_3,10.7
analyzed: tathā viśvam sthitam tatra tena śūnyam na tat padam
an utkīrṇā takṣakāreṇa nistakṣya na prakaṭīkṛtā
stambhe saṃsthita tvam asyāḥ agre prakaṭībhāvāt
sthita tvam adyā eva bhāsamāna tvāt

original: yadi tac chūnyaṃ syāt tadā jagat kutra bhūyāt /
analyzed: yadi tat śūnyam syāt tadā jagat kutra bhūyāt
niradhiṣṭhānasya bhramasya ayukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
bhedena eva bhāti iti an utkīrṇā iti uktam
ayam ittham mahā bhogaḥ jagat ākhyaḥ vabhāsate

original: satyo bhavatv asatyo vā yatra tatra kva śūnyatā // MU_3,10.8
analyzed: satyaḥ bhavatu asatyaḥ vā yatra tatra kva śūnyatā
asatyaḥ vā asat svarūpaḥ vā bhavatu
saḥ yatra ādhāra bhūte yasmin vastuni
yathā na putrikā śūnyaḥ stambhaḥ n utkīrṇa sālikaḥ

original: tathā tāta jagad brahma tena śūnyaṃ na tat padam // MU_3,10.9
analyzed: tathā tāta jagat brahma tena śūnyam na tat padam
an utkīrṇa sālikaḥ an utkīrṇa putrikaḥ

original: tathety anena pūrvavākyasthaṃ neti śūnya iti ca padadvayam ākṛṣyate /
analyzed: tathā iti anena pūrva vākya stham na iti śūnyaḥ iti ca pada dvayam ākṛṣyate
tathā brahma jagat śūnyam na bhavati

original: somyāmbhasi yathā vīcir na cāsti na ca nāsti ca /
analyzed: somya ambhasi yathā vīciḥ na ca asti na ca na asti ca

original: tathā jagad brahmaṇīdaṃ śūnyāśūnyapadaṃ gatam // MU_3,10.10
analyzed: tathā jagat brahmaṇi idam śūnyāśūnya padam gatam
bhāsamāna tvāt a śūnya padam gatam

original: paramārthato nakiñcidrūpatvāc chūnyapadaṃ gatam iti yojyam // (MT_3,10.10)
analyzed: paramārthataḥ na kiñcid rūpa tvāt śūnya padam gatam iti yojyam

original: nanu tarhi putrikādisādṛśyena siddhā eva brahmaṇi jagatsthitir ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi putrikā ādi sādṛśyena siddhā eva brahmaṇi jagat sthitiḥ iti atra āha
deśa kāla ādi śānta tvāt putrikā racanam drume

original: sambhavaty ajadhātau tu kena nāntar vimuhyate // MU_3,10.11
analyzed: sambhavati aja dhātau tu kena nā antar vimuhyate

original: putrikāracanaṃ deśavaśena kālavaśena kartrādivaśena ca sambhavati /
analyzed: putrikā racanam deśa vaśena kāla vaśena kartṛ ādi vaśena ca sambhavati
deśa kāla kartṛ ādi śānteḥ iti arthaḥ
tad śāntiḥ ca atra śuddha cit mātra tayā eva jñeyā
mohaḥ ca deśa kāla ādi sparśa rahite

original: brahmaṇi kathaṃ jagad bhāti ity evaṃrūpo jñeyaḥ //
analyzed: brahmaṇi katham jagat bhāti iti evaṃrūpaḥ jñeyaḥ
deśa kāla kartṛ ādi śānteḥ karttṛ ādi
tat stambhaputrikā ādi etat paramārtha jagat sthiteḥ

original: ekadeśena sadṛśam upamānaṃ na sarvataḥ // MU_3,10.12
analyzed: eka deśena sadṛśam upamānam na sarvatas
yatas deśa kāla ādi sambhavena stambhe putrikā racanam yuktam
etat samanantaram eva uktam stambhaputrikā ādi
tasyāḥ eka deśena śūnyatā nivāraṇa mātreṇa
jagat ādhāra tvena śūnyatvam nirasya tad rūpatayā nirasyati

original: na kadācid udetīdaṃ parasmān na ca śāmyati /
analyzed: na kadācid udeti idam parasmāt na ca śāmyati

original: idaṃrūpaṃ kevalaṃ sad brahma svātmani saṃsthitam // MU_3,10.13
analyzed: idaṃrūpam kevalam sat brahma sva ātmani saṃsthitam

original: nanu yadi jagan nodeti na ca śāmyati tarhi kim idaṃ bhāsata ity /
analyzed: nanu yadi jagat na udeti na ca śāmyati tarhi kim idam bhāsate iti
śānti udaya sahitasya jagataḥ brahmatvam brahma āśraya bṛṃhā viṣaya tvena

original: jñeyaṃ / bṛṃhāviṣayo hi brahmasvarūpam eva bhavati /
analyzed: jñeyam bṛṃhā viṣayaḥ hi brahma svarūpam eva bhavati
a śūnyatva asambhavena śūnyatva nirāsam āha
a śūnya apekṣayā śūnya śabda artha parikalpanā
a śūnyatva asambhavataḥ śūnyatva aśūnyate kutas
a śūnyatva apekṣayā a śūnyatvasya kiñcid rūpatvasya apeksayā tat apekṣya iti arthaḥ
a śūnyatva asambhavataḥ ukta yuktyā kiñcid rūpatva asambhavena

original: sāpekṣayor ekanāśe dvayor api nāśād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sāpekṣayoḥ eka nāśe dvayoḥ api nāśāt iti bhāvaḥ
ca nirālamba śuddha cit mātra tayā jñeyaḥ
śūnya tvam nivārya prakāśa rūpa tvam nivārayati

original: brahmaṇy ayaṃ prakāśo hi na sambhavati bhūtajaḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇi ayam prakāśaḥ hi na sambhavati bhūta jaḥ
sūrya anala indu tārā ādi kutas tatra kila avyaye
bhūta jaḥ agni ādi bhūta utpannaḥ
cit mātra tayā tad uttīrṇa tvāt
atra hetu tvena uttara ardham āha sūrya iti

original: sūryādīnām ākṛtimattvena nāśasambhavān nātra sthitir yuktā /
analyzed: sūrya ādīnām ākṛtimat tvena nāśa sambhavāt na atra sthitiḥ yuktā

original: tadrūpatāyās tu kā kathā iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tad rūpa tāyāḥ tu kā kathā iti bhāvaḥ

original: mahābhūtābhāvajaṃ tu tenātra na tamaḥ kvacit // MU_3,10.16
analyzed: mahābhūta abhāva jam tu tena atra na tamaḥ kvacid

original: tejo'bhāvasyaiva tamastvaṃ vādibhiḥ pratipāditam iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tejaḥ bhāvasya eva tamaḥ tvam vādibhiḥ pratipāditam iti bhāvaḥ
mahābhūta abhāva jam lakṣaṇayā mahābhūta prakāśa abhāvāt jātam
tena mahābhūta prakāśa abhāva tvena hetunā
kvacid kasmin api aṃśe mahābhūta sthiti āyatane
mahābhūta pratiyogika abhāva asambhavena tamaḥ pi atra na yuktam

original: nanu tejaso 'bhāve kathaṃ tat prakāśata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tejasaḥ bhāve katham tat prakāśate iti atra āha

original: yo 'ntar asti sa tenaiva na tv anyenānubhūyate // MU_3,10.17
analyzed: yaḥ ntar asti sa tena eva na tu anyena anubhūyate
vyoma rūpiṇaḥ na kiñcid rūpasya asya sat vastunaḥ
sva anubhūtiḥ sva asvarūpa bhūtā ca asau anubhūtiḥ anubhavaḥ
sā eva prakāśaḥ prākaṭya karaṇa bhūtam tejaḥ
sva anubhūtyā eva asau bhāti na bāhya tejasā iti arthaḥ
iti atra āha yaḥ ntar iti
puruṣeṇa sa tena eva akaraṇa bhūtena tena eva anubhūyate
svayam eva asau anubhavaḥ nubhavitā anubhavanam anubhūti viṣayaḥ

original: ceti / na tatra kasyāpy apekṣeti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: ca iti na tatra kasya api apekṣā iti bhāvaḥ

original: muktaṃ tamaḥprakāśābhyām ity etad ajaraṃ padam /
analyzed: muktam tamaḥ prakāśābhyām iti etat ajaram padam

original: ākāśakośam evainaṃ viddhi kośaṃ jagatsthiteḥ // MU_3,10.18
analyzed: ākāśa kośam eva enam viddhi kośam jagat sthiteḥ
kha ātmaka tvam asya nivārayitum prastauti
ākāśa kośam eva ākāśa madhyam eva

original: bilvasya bilvasaṃjñasya yathā bhedo na kaścana /
analyzed: bilvasya bilva saṃjñasya yathā bhedaḥ na kaścana

original: tatheha brahmajagator na manāg api bhinnatā // MU_3,10.19

original: brahmajagator manāg api bhinnatā na bhavati /
analyzed: brahma jagatoḥ manāk api bhinna tā na bhavati

original: yad eva brahma tad eva jagat /

original: yad eva jagat tad eva brahmeti bhāvaḥ /

original: nanu tathāpi prakṛte kim āyātam ity / atrāha

original: salile 'ntar yathā vīcir mṛdo 'ntar ghaṭako yathā /
analyzed: salile ntar yathā vīciḥ mṛdaḥ ntar ghaṭakaḥ yathā

original: tathā yatra jagatsattā tat kathaṃ khātmakaṃ bhavet // MU_3,10.20
analyzed: tathā yatra jagat sattā tat katham kha ātmakam bhavet

original: brahma tv ākāśaviśadaṃ tasyāntaḥsthaṃ tathaiva tat // MU_3,10.21
analyzed: brahma tu ākāśa viśadam tasya antar stham tathā eva tat
yatas sa ākārā ākāra sahitā bhavati

original: sākāratvena kathaṃ mṛjjalāder upamānayogyatvam ity / atrāha
analyzed: sa ākāra tvena katham mṛd jala ādeḥ upamāna yogya tvam iti atra āha

original: sākārasya mṛdādeḥ nirākāraṃ brahma prati upamānatvaṃ na yuktam
analyzed: sa ākārasya mṛd ādeḥ nirākāram brahma prati upamāna tvam na yuktam

jagat tathā eva nirākāram bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: punar apy upasaṃhāravyājena jagato nirākāratvaṃ sādhayati
analyzed: punar api upasaṃhāra vyājena jagataḥ nirākāra tvam sādhayati

original: tasmād yādṛk cidākāśam ākāśād api nirmalam /
analyzed: tasmāt yādṛś cit ākāśam ākāśāt api nirmalam

original: tadantaḥsthaṃ tādṛg eva jagacchabdārthabhāg api // MU_3,10.22
analyzed: tad antar stham tādṛś eva jagat śabda artha bhāj api

original: ākāśād api nirmalatvaṃ cidākāśasya jaḍatvābhāvena jñeyam /
analyzed: ākāśāt api nirmala tvam cit ākāśasya jaḍa tva abhāvena jñeyam
tena jagat rūpa tayā bhāsamāna tvena jagat śabda artha tā bhāj

original: marice 'ntar yathā taikṣṇyam ṛte bhoktur na lakṣyate /
analyzed: marice ntar yathā taikṣṇyam ṛte bhoktuḥ na lakṣyate

original: cinmātratvaṃ parākāśe tathā cetyakalāṃ vinā // MU_3,10.23
analyzed: cit mātra tvam para ākāśe tathā cetya kalām vinā
yathā kenacid marice ntar marica antare

original: bhoktuḥ ṛte na lakṣyate na dṛśyate /
analyzed: bhoktuḥ ṛte na lakṣyate na dṛśyate

original: bhoktari tu sati tenaiva lakṣyate ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: bhoktari tu sati tena eva lakṣyate iti arthaḥ

original: cetyacarvaṇād eva hi cinmātrasya cinmātratā jñāyate // (MT_3,10.23)
analyzed: cetya carvaṇāt eva hi cit mātrasya cit mātra tā jñāyate
tasmāt cit api a cit rūpā ca iti arikta tayā ātmani
jagat tā tādṛśī evā iyam tādṛś mātra ātma tā vaśā
cetya rikta tayā cetya rāhityena ātmani cit mātra ākhye sva svarūpe
cetyasya eva pūrva nayena cit mātra tā dṛḍhīkaraṇa sāmarthyāt tasya ca atra abhāvāt
tasya abhāvaḥ ca atra brahma antar stha tvena brahma tayā eva jñeyaḥ
brahma abhinne jagati api acit tvam atidiśati
tādṛśī eva cit rūpa brahma abhinna tvena acit rūpā eva bhavati
tādṛś mātra ātma tā vaśā iti
yatas tādṛś mātra ātma tāyāḥ acit rūpa brahma mātra sva rūpa tāyāḥ
etena brahma jagatoḥ sarvathā abhedaḥ sādhitaḥ
na brahmaṇaḥ cit rūpa mātra tā

original: nanu jagataḥ sarvathābhinnatve rūpālokamanaskārāḥ kiṃrūpā ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu jagataḥ sarvathā abhinna tve rūpa āloka manaskārāḥ kiṃrūpāḥ iti atra āha
rūpa āloka manaskārāḥ tad mayāḥ eva na itarat

original: yathāsthitam ato viśvaṃ suṣuptaṃ turyam eva vā // MU_3,10.25
analyzed: yathā sthitam atas viśvam suṣuptam turyam eva vā
ālokaḥ tad darśanam karaṇa bhūtaḥ prakāśaḥ vā
tad viṣayāḥ ete tad mayāḥ eva
eva śabda artham āha na itarat iti
tad maya tvam ca eṣām tad viṣaya tvam vinā asat kalpa tvāt

original: na tu yayā kayāpi śaktyāntardhim āpāditaṃ /
analyzed: na tu yayā kayā api śaktyā antardhim āpāditam
suṣuptau bheda saṃskāram āśaṅkya āha turyam iti

original: jagataḥ turyarūpabrahmatvena yogino vyavahāre 'pi brahmamayatām āha
analyzed: jagataḥ turya rūpa brahma tvena yoginaḥ vyavahāre brahma maya tām āha

original: tena yogī suṣuptātmā vyavahāry api śāntadhīḥ /
analyzed: tena yogī suṣupta ātmā vyavahārī api śānta dhīḥ

original: āste brahma nirābhāsaṃ sarvabhāsāṃ samudgakam // MU_3,10.26
analyzed: āste brahma nirābhāsam sarva bhāsām samudgakam

yatas vyavahārī api vyavahāram kurvāṇaḥ pi
yatas suṣupta ātmā prapañcam prati supta antaḥkaraṇaḥ

original: prapañcaṃ prati suptamanaso hi śāntadhītvaṃ yuktam
analyzed: prapañcam prati supta manasaḥ hi śānta dhī tvam yuktam

original: punar api prakṛtaṃ brahmajagadabhedam eva kathayati

original: ākāriṇi yathā saumye sthitas toye dravakramaḥ /

original: anākṛtau tathā viśvaṃ sthitaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ pare // MU_3,10.27
analyzed: anākṛtau tathā viśvam sthitam tad sadṛśam pare

original: saumye jale yathā sphuṭībhaviṣyamāṇatvena kiñcittvārho 'pi dravākhyo guṇaḥ tanmayaḥ /
analyzed: saumye jale yathā sphuṭībhaviṣyamāṇa tvena kiñcittva arhaḥ drava ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ tad mayaḥ

original: brahmaṇo viśvam ābhātaṃ tad viśvārthavivarjitam // MU_3,10.28
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ viśvam ābhātam tat viśva artha vivarjitam

original: ataḥ brahmaṇaḥ yad viśvam ābhātaṃ bhānam āgataṃ /

original: tat viśvārthavivarjitam viśvārthaiḥ ghaṭapaṭādibhiḥ vivarjitaṃ bhavati /

original: pūrṇāt pūrṇaṃ prasarati saṃsthitaṃ pūrṇam eva tat /

original: ato viśvam anutpannaṃ yac cotpannaṃ tad eva tat // MU_3,10.29
analyzed: atas viśvam an utpannam yat ca utpannam tat eva tat

original: na tu tatprasaraṇena kācit khaṇḍanāsya jāyate ity arthaḥ /

kā iva cit artha tā cit śabda pravṛtti nimitta tā

original: hi citaḥ cid iti nāma yuktam /
analyzed: hi citaḥ cit iti nāma yuktam

original: cidarthatāniṣedhaś cātra taduttīrṇatayā jñeyaḥ na jaḍatayeti / atra
analyzed: cit artha tā niṣedhaḥ ca atra tad uttīrṇa tayā jñeyaḥ na jaḍa tayā iti atra
kā iva na kā api iti arthaḥ
āsvādaka asambhavataḥ āsvādaka asambhavena iti arthaḥ

abhāvāt pratibimbasya pratibimba arha tā kutas

uditā atra dṛṣṭāntam āha abhāvāt iti
yathā darpaṇasya pratibimba arha tā pratibimbena eva jñāyate

original: jñāyate / tadabhāve tu kuto jñāyate iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: jñāyate tad abhāve tu kutas jñāyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: paramāṇor api paraṃ tad aṇīyo 'py aṇīyasaḥ /
analyzed: paramāṇoḥ api param tat aṇīyaḥ pi aṇīyasaḥ

original: śuddhaṃ sūkṣmaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ tad ākāśodarād api // MU_3,10.32
analyzed: śuddham sūkṣmam param śāntam tat ākāśa udarāt api

original: tat brahma / paramāṇor api param aṇīyaḥ atisūkṣmaṃ /
analyzed: tat brahma paramāṇoḥ api param aṇīyaḥ ati sūkṣmam
aṇīyasaḥ pi dvi aṇuka ādi apekṣayā sūkṣmatarāt api

diś kāla ādi anavacchinna rūpa tvāt ati vistṛtam
tat anādi antam ābhāsam bhāsanīya vivarjitam
diś kāla ādi anavacchinna rūpa tvāt
ādi śabdena vastu parigrahaḥ trividha pariccheda śūnya tvāt iti arthaḥ
tathātve pi ati vistṛta tvam iti ced

original: na cet tarhi svayam evāsiddhā katham anyaṃ paricchedayet
analyzed: na ced tarhi svayam evā asiddhā katham anyam paricchedayet

original: / cetyamānā cet tarhi citaiva sā paricchinnā kathaṃ tāṃ paricchedayet /
analyzed: cetyamānā ced tarhi citā eva sā paricchinnā katham tām paricchedayet
diś ādibhiḥ paricchinnam eva paricchinnam bhavati

original: anādyantaṃ yathā tathā kalpyamānayor apy ādyantayoḥ sākṣitvād ādyantarahitam /
analyzed: anādi antam yathā tathā kalpyamānayoḥ api ādi antayoḥ sākṣi tvāt ādi anta rahitam
bhāsanīya vivarjitam ābhāsa jñeya rahita jñāna svarūpam iti arthaḥ
ābhāsa jñeya rahita jñāna svarūpam saṃjñe
prokta viśeṣaṇa avaṣṭambhena jīva ādi rūpa tām asya nivārayati

original: cidrūpam eva no yatra labhyate tatra jīvatā /
analyzed: cit rūpam eva naḥ yatra labhyate tatra jīvatā
katham syāt citta tā ākārā vāsanā anila rūpiṇī

original: cidrūpam eva bhāvapradhāno nirdeśaḥ cidrūpatvam eva /

analyzed: no labhyate pūrva nyāyena na anubhūyate

original: śuddhā cidrūpatāpi yatra nāsti cetyaśayanāviṣṭāyā jīvatāyāḥ kā tatra vārteti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: śuddhā cit rūpa tā api yatra nā asti cetya śayana āviṣṭāyāḥ jīvatāyāḥ kā tatra vārttā iti bhāvaḥ

original: cidrūpānudayād eva tatra nāsty eva jīvatā /

original: na buddhitā na cittattvaṃ nendriyatvaṃ na vāsanāḥ // MU_3,10.35
analyzed: na buddhi tā na cit tattvam na indriya tvam na vāsanāḥ

tad rūpa anudayaḥ tu pūrvam kathitaḥ
sūkṣma rūpeṇa sthitā cetya bhāvanā vāsanā
nanu cit rūpa anudayena katham atra jīva ādi tā

original: ciducchūnatāyā eva jīvādibhāvena tadrūpatvānudaye yuktam eva jīvatādyabhāvatvam
evaṃ sthitaṃ layārambhapūrṇam apy ajaraṃ padam /
analyzed: evam sthitam laya ārambha pūrṇam api ajaram padam

original: asmaddṛṣṭyā sthitaṃ śāntaṃ śūnyam ākāśato 'dhikam // MU_3,10.36
analyzed: asmad dṛṣṭyā sthitam śāntam śūnyam ākāśataḥ dhikam

asmad dṛṣṭi ākāśataḥ ākāśa apekṣayā adhikam śāntam

original: paramātmasvarūpaṃ durbodhaṃ jñātvā punar api śrīrāmaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: paramātma svarūpam durbodham jñātvā punar api śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

original: punar etat samācakṣva nipuṇaṃ bodhavṛddhaye // MU_3,10.37
analyzed: punar etat samācakṣva nipuṇam bodha vṛddhaye
bodha vṛddhaye paramātma viṣaya jñāna vṛddhaye
tasya prasiddhasya ananta cit ākṛteḥ diś ādi aparicchinna cit svarūpasya

original: śiṣyate yat paraṃ brahma tad idaṃ varṇyate śṛṇu // MU_3,10.38
analyzed: śiṣyate yat param brahma tat idam varṇyate śṛṇu
mahāpralaya sampattau turye turyātīte mahākalpa anta samaye vā

original: yat paraṃ brahma jagadbhāvena bṛṃhāṃ gataṃ paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ vastu /
analyzed: yat param brahma jagat bhāvena bṛṃhām gatam paramātma lakṣaṇam vastu
śiṣyate mahāpralaya sākṣi bhāvena śiṣṭam bhavati
nāśayitvā svam ātmānam manasaḥ vṛtti saṅkṣaye

original: yad rūpaṃ yad anākhyeyaṃ tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ // MU_3,10.39
analyzed: yat rūpam yat anākhyeyam tat rūpam tasya vastunaḥ

original: tasya vastunaḥ paraṃ brahmāparaparyāyasya paramātmalakṣaṇasya vastunaḥ /
analyzed: tasya vastunaḥ param brahma apara paryāyasya paramātma lakṣaṇasya vastunaḥ
śiṣyate sva nāśa sākṣi bhāvena śiṣṭam bhavati

original: svam ātmānaṃ nāśayitvā śuddhacinmātre layaṃ nītvā /
analyzed: svam ātmānam nāśayitvā śuddha cit mātre layam nītvā
vṛtti saṅkṣaye vṛtti nāśe sati iti arthaḥ
ati śuddha tvena ākhyā yogyam na bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: manaḥ chittveti nyāyena kiñcinmātraṃ samyakjñānena saṃsārakalanābhyo niṣkrāntaṃ śuddhaṃ manaḥ bhāvanābalena
analyzed: manaḥ chittvā iti nyāyena kiñcid mātram samyak jñānena saṃsāra kalanābhyaḥ niṣkrāntam śuddham manaḥ bhāvanā balena

original: śuddhāśuddhavṛttikṣayeṇa hetunā śuddhāśuddhaṃ svaṃ rūpaṃ nāśayati /
analyzed: śuddha aśuddha vṛtti kṣayeṇa hetunā śuddha aśuddham svam rūpam nāśayati

original: tataḥ tan manaḥ śuddhatare kutrāpy anākhyeye layībhūtam anākhyeyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tatas tat manaḥ śuddhatare kutra api anākhyeye layībhūtam anākhyeyam bhavati

original: tac ca mano yadā tādṛk syāt
analyzed: tat ca manaḥ yadā tādṛś syāt
tadā asya parama ātma tā bhāvaḥ bhavati iti
tatra eva yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti

original: nāsti dṛśyaṃ jagad draṣṭā dṛśyābhāvād vilīnavat /
analyzed: na asti dṛśyam jagat draṣṭā dṛśya abhāvāt vilīna vat

original: bhātīti bhāsanaṃ yat syāt tad rūpaṃ tasya vastunaḥ // MU_3,10.40
analyzed: bhāti iti bhāsanam yat syāt tat rūpam tasya vastunaḥ
jagat na asti pratīti mātra siddha tvāt
dṛśya abhāvāt vilīna vat līnaḥ iva

original: tataḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvena draṣṭāpi layībhūta iva bhavati /
analyzed: tatas dṛśya atyanta abhāvena draṣṭā api layībhūtaḥ iva bhavati

original: tataś ca draṣṭā dṛśyaṃ ca nāstīti sphurati /
analyzed: tatas ca draṣṭā dṛśyam ca na asti iti sphurati
ca draṣṭṛ dṛśya lepa rahita tvena na kiñcid rūpa tvāt anākhyeyam bhavati

original: iti / tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti //
analyzed: iti tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti

original: citer jīvasvabhāvo yo yadi cetyonmukho vapuḥ /
analyzed: citeḥ jīva svabhāvaḥ yaḥ yadi cetya unmukhaḥ vapuḥ

original: cinmātraṃ vimalaṃ śāntaṃ tat tat kāraṇakāraṇam // MU_3,10.41
analyzed: cit mātram vimalam śāntam tat tat kāraṇa kāraṇam
kāraṇa kāraṇam mūlakāraṇa bhūtam paramātma svarūpam bhavati
vimalam ca iti a mālinyena a dūṣitam
śāntam ca iti akṣata kṣobha rahitam
svabhāva śabda apekṣayā yad śabdasya pum liṅga tā

original: nanu kadāsau jīvasvabhāvo bhavatīty āha yadīti /
analyzed: nanu kadā asau jīva svabhāvaḥ bhavati iti āha yadi iti
cetya unmukhāyāḥ citeḥ eva jīva tvāt

original: sat jīvatāṃ yāti tad eva samyagjñānena cetyāsattvaṃ niścitya śuddhīkṛtaṃ sat anākhyeyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: sat jīva tām yāti tat eva samyak jñānena cetya sattvam niścitya śuddhīkṛtam sat anākhyeyam bhavati
tat eva ca paramātma rūpam iti
citiḥ ca sva parāmarśa kāri tayā parāmarśa kartṛ tvena
parāmarśa viṣaya tvena ca dvividhā asti

original: tatra prathamāyāḥ cinmātram iti nāma dvitīyasyāḥ
analyzed: tatra prathamāyāḥ cit mātram iti nāma dvitīyasyāḥ
aṅguṣṭhasya atha vā aṅgulyā vāta ādi asparśane sati

original: jīvataś cetaso rūpaṃ yat tat paramam ātmanaḥ // MU_3,10.42
analyzed: jīvataḥ cetasaḥ rūpam yat tat paramam ātmanaḥ
na tu mūrchā ādi avasthā vat tatra aśaktasya

original: tadā hi tasya mūḍhatvam eva bhavati /
analyzed: tadā hi tasya mūḍha tvam eva bhavati
sarva śarīra avayavānām vāta ādi asparśane sati

original: puruṣasya yasmin kasmiṃścic charīrāvayave kasyāpi dravyasya
analyzed: puruṣasya yasmin kasmiṃścid śarīra avayave kasya api dravyasya

original: sparśe asati tadā nirālambam eva tad avayavavyāpi caitanyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: sparśe asati tadā nirālambam eva tat avayava vyāpi caitanyam bhavet
tadā tad avayava mātra anusandhāna parasya tasya
bāhya grahaṇa samartham api manaḥ śuddha nirālamba acetya cit mātra rūpa paramātma rūpam eva tiṣṭhati iti

original: tadaiva sarvāḥ manovṛttīḥ vihāya yoginā sāvadhānena parīkṣyam iti //
analyzed: tadā eva sarvāḥ manaḥ vṛttīḥ vihāya yoginā sāvadhānena parīkṣyam iti

original: yad rūpaṃ ciracintāyās tat tadānagha śiṣyate // MU_3,10.43
analyzed: yat rūpam cira cintāyāḥ tat tadā anagha śiṣyate
he nagha rāga ādi doṣa rahita
kṛtā yā cintā prāpta iṣṭa viṣayam ādhyānam
tasyāḥ cintā viśeṣaṇāni āha asvapnāyāḥ ityādi
jāgrati kriyamāṇā cintā svapna tvena pariṇamate

original: pariṇatatve tu anāyattatayānyaviṣayiṇy api syād iti yuktam uktam asvapnāyā iti /
analyzed: pariṇata tve tu anāyatta tayā anya viṣayiṇī api syāt iti yuktam uktam asvapnāyāḥ iti

original: anyā kācic cintā tatra madhye nāyātīty arthaḥ
analyzed: anyā kācid cintā tatra madhye na āyāti iti arthaḥ

original: / ajaḍāyāḥ kācid dhi cintā nairantaryeṇa kriyamāṇā mūrchām āvahati /
analyzed: ajaḍāyāḥ kācid hi cintā nairantaryeṇa kriyamāṇā mūrchām āvahati
tad nivāraṇa artham ajaḍāyāḥ iti viśeṣaṇam
kriyamāṇā chinnā jāḍya doṣa rahitā cintyamāna sparśa dūṣitā cintā ācchinna bodha mayā a cetya cit maya tām

original: eva yāty / acetyacinmayam eva ca paramātmarūpam iti yoginā tatra sāvadhānena bhāvyam
analyzed: eva yāti acetya cit mayam eva ca paramātma rūpam iti yoginā tatra sāvadhānena bhāvyam

original: yad vyomno hṛdayaṃ yad vā śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca /
analyzed: yat vyomnaḥ hṛdayam yat vā śilāyāḥ pavanasya ca

original: tasyācetyasya cidvyomnas tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // MU_3,10.44
analyzed: tasya acetyasya cit vyomnaḥ tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: tatra śilāyā hṛdayaṃ anyasya praveśānarhaṃ sūkṣmāvayavanaividdhyarūpaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tatra śilāyāḥ hṛdayam anyasya praveśa anarham sūkṣma avayava naividdhya rūpam bhavati

original: pavanasya hṛdayaṃ mṛgyamānaṃ śūnyatāyām eva viśrāmyati /
analyzed: pavanasya hṛdayam mṛgyamānam śūnyatāyām eva viśrāmyati

original: nanv etena jaḍatvam asyāyātam iti cen / na
analyzed: nanu etena jaḍa tvam asya āyātam iti ced na
vicāre kriyamāṇe vyoma ādīnām hṛdayam yathāyatham
śūnya rūpam anya praveśām arham bhavati

original: tādṛg eva ca paramātmano rūpam iti yoginā tatra sāvadhānena bhāvyam //
analyzed: tādṛś eva ca paramātmanaḥ rūpam iti yoginā tatra sāvadhānena bhāvyam

original: syāt sthitiḥ sā parā śāntā sattā tasyādyavastunaḥ // MU_3,10.45
analyzed: syāt sthitiḥ sā parā śāntā sattā tasya ādya vastunaḥ
tasya ādya vastunaḥ paramātma lakṣaṇasya vastunaḥ
samyak jñānena cetya abhāve niścita tvāt
cetya rahitasya atas eva amanaskasya manaḥ rahitasya

original: cetyaṃ prati manovyāpāram akurvan ata eva sarvathānusandhānaśūnyaḥ
analyzed: cetyam prati manaḥ vyāpāram akurvan atas eva sarvathā anusandhāna śūnyaḥ

original: puruṣaḥ calanādikriyākārī yādṛśo bhavati tādṛg eva sṛṣṭyādivyāpārakāri param ātmatattvaṃ
analyzed: puruṣaḥ calana ādi kriyā kārī yādṛśaḥ bhavati tādṛś eva sṛṣṭi ādi vyāpāra kāri param ātma tattvam

original: bhavatīti / tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti //
analyzed: bhavati iti tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti

original: citprakāśasya yan madhyaṃ prakāśasya ghanasya ca /
analyzed: cit prakāśasya yat madhyam prakāśasya ghanasya ca

original: darśanasya ca yan madhyaṃ tad rūpaṃ brahmaṇo viduḥ // MU_3,10.46
analyzed: darśanasya ca yat madhyam tat rūpam brahmaṇaḥ viduḥ
paṇḍitāḥ brahmaṇaḥ nānā padārtha bhāvena bṛṃhitasya paramātmanaḥ
cit prakāśasya citaḥ utthitasya cetya prakāṭya rūpasya prakāśasya
tathā darśanasya draṣṭuḥ utthitāyāḥ dṛśi kriyāyāḥ
cit prakāśasya bāhya prakāśasya darśanasya ca
ādya avasthā madhya avasthā antya avasthā
utthāna samaye yā ādyā avasthā sā āditya sparśa dūṣitā
yā ca padārtha prakāśana samaye ntyā avasthā
madhya avasthā tu śuddha prakāśa svarūpa anākhyā ca bhavati
tādṛś eva ca paramātma svarūpam iti
cit prakāśasya darśanasya ca parimita tva aparimita tva mātra kṛtaḥ

original: vedanaṃ yad anādyantaṃ tad rūpaṃ paramātmanaḥ // MU_3,10.47
analyzed: vedanam yat anādi antam tat rūpam paramātmanaḥ

original: sāntarasyaiva hi madhye punaḥ punaḥ sāditvaṃ sāntatvaṃ
analyzed: sa antarasya eva hi madhye punar punar sa ādi tvam sa anta tvam
dṛśyasya avaśya darśanīya tayā kalpitasya kasyacid devatā viśeṣasya
jñāna dhāraṇā jñeya eka rūpa devatā dhāraṇā ca nairantaryeṇa pravartamānā

original: jñānaikamayatayā devataikamayatayā ca pariṇatā satī ekasvarūpaparamātmarūpā bhavatīti
analyzed: jñāna eka maya tayā devatā eka maya tayā ca pariṇatā satī eka svarūpa paramātma rūpā bhavati iti

original: bāhyatejasaḥ bāhyatamasaś ca dhāraṇāyāḥ kaiścid uktatvāt //
analyzed: bāhya tejasaḥ bāhya tamasaḥ ca dhāraṇāyāḥ kaiścid ukta tvāt
kṛta cakṣuḥ grāhyasya ā bhāvām kṛ
yatas jagat udeti iva nitya anudita rūpi api

original: vibhinnavad ivābhinnaṃ tad rūpaṃ pāramātmikam // MU_3,10.48
analyzed: vibhinna vat iva abhinnam tat rūpam pāramātmikam
jagat udeti iva udayam yāti iva
nitya anudita rūpi api nityam anuditam
paramārthataḥ cit mātra rūpa tayā jagat rūpeṇa aprādurbhūtam rūpam asya asti iti

original: yataḥ sūkṣmatarād vastuna idaṃ jagat payasa iva vīcikadambakaṃ
analyzed: yatas sūkṣmatarāt vastunaḥ idam jagat payasaḥ iva vīci kadambakam

original: niryāti / tad eva paramātmano rūpam iti /
analyzed: niryāti tat eva paramātmanaḥ rūpam iti
vyavahāra parasya api yat pāṣāṇa vat āsanam

original: avyomna eva vyomatvaṃ tad rūpaṃ pāramātmikam // MU_3,10.49
analyzed: a vyomnaḥ eva vyoma tvam tat rūpam pāramātmikam
yat vyavahāra parasya api vyavahāram kurvāṇasya api
avyomnaḥ eva jaḍa tva ādi vyoma dharma rahita tvena ākāśa svarūpa vyatiriktasya eva
vyavahāram kurvan api puruṣaḥ tatratya siddhi asiddhi anusandhāna rahitaḥ
vedya vedana vettṛ tva rūpa trayam idam punar

original: yatrodety astam āyāti tat tat paramam uttamam // MU_3,10.50
analyzed: yatra udeti astam āyāti tat tat paramam uttamam
teṣām bhāvaḥ vedya vedana vettṛ tvam

original: tadākhyaṃ rūpatrayaṃ vedyavedanavettṛtvarūpatrayaṃ udeti astaṃ yāti /
analyzed: tad ākhyam rūpa trayam vedya vedana vettṛ tva rūpa trayam udeti astam yāti

original: vedyāditripuṭī cetyamānatvena kutracic cinmātrākhye vastuni udeti
analyzed: vedya ādi tripuṭī cetyamāna tvena kutracid cit mātra ākhye vastuni udeti
vedya vedana vettṛ tvam yatra idam pratibimbati

original: abuddhyādau mahādarśe tad rūpaṃ paramaṃ smṛtam // MU_3,10.51
analyzed: a buddhi ādau mahā ādarśe tat rūpam paramam smṛtam
yatra mahādarśe vedya vedana vettṛ tvam vedya ādi tripuṭī
yuktam ca ādarśasya buddhi ādi rahita tvam
ādarśasya jāḍyena buddhi ādi rahita tvam
vedi ādi tripuṭī kṣaṇaḥ eva sphuramāṇā kṣaṇa

original: eva ca layabhāginī svasphūrtyāśrayasya kim api mālinyam anādadhatī pratibimbatayaiva
analyzed: eva ca laya bhāginī sva sphūrti āśrayasya kim api mālinyam an ādadhatī pratibimba tayā eva

original: bhāti / yataḥ pratibimbam api kṣaṇa eva sphurati kṣaṇa eva ca layībhavati svāśrayasya
analyzed: bhāti yatas pratibimbam api kṣaṇe eva sphurati kṣaṇe eva ca layībhavati sva āśrayasya
tava vedi ādi tripuṭī pratibimba āśrayam tripuṭī vyatiriktam
tat eva ca paramātma tattvam iti
manaḥ ṣaṣṭha indriya atītam yat rūpam syāt mahāciteḥ

original: jaṅgame sthāvare vāpi tat sargānte 'vaśiṣyate // MU_3,10.52
analyzed: jaṅgame sthāvare vā api tat sarga ante
manaḥ ṣaṣṭha indriya atītam yā unmuka atītam
tāni ca tāni indriyāṇi manaḥ ṣaṣṭha indriyāṇi
tāni atītam manaḥ ṣaṣṭha indriya atītam
jaṅgame citta tvam tāvat nirvivādam eva

original: sthāvare tṛṇādāv api tathaiva parvatādāv api /
analyzed: sthāvare tṛṇa ādau api tathā eva parvata ādau api
tṛṇa ādi udgamena na eva nirṇītam

original: na hi niścetanāt kasyāpy udgamo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na hi niścetanāt kasya api udgamaḥ yuktaḥ
mṛta śarīrāt roma ādi udgama adarśanāt

original: tathā ca yena rūpeṇa sarvatra cid asti tad anākhyam eva /
analyzed: tathā ca yena rūpeṇa sarvatra cit asti tat anākhyam eva

original: iti / tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti //
analyzed: iti tatra yoginā sāvadhānena bhāvyam iti
roma ādi udgama adarśanāt raāt roma ādi

original: sthāvarāṇāṃ hi yad rūpaṃ tac ced bodhamayaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: sthāvarāṇām hi yat rūpam tat ced bodha mayam bhavet

original: manobuddhyādinirmuktaṃ tat pareṇa samaṃ bhavet // MU_3,10.53
analyzed: manaḥ buddhi ādi nirmuktam tat pareṇa samam bhavet
hi śabda upādānam pāda pūraṇa artham

original: sthāvarāṇāṃ rūpaṃ avaśyaṃ kṣobharahitam eva kiṃ tu jāḍyadūṣitam
analyzed: sthāvarāṇām rūpam avaśyam kṣobha rahitam eva kim tu jāḍya dūṣitam

original: / ataḥ jāḍyaṃ vihāya jñeyāsparśenaiva svaṃ jñānatattvaṃ kṣobharahitaṃ kāryaṃ / tataś
analyzed: atas jāḍyam vihāya jñeya asparśena eva svam jñāna tattvam kṣobha rahitam kāryam tatas
pratyekam paramātma prāpti upāya bhūtāḥ iti sphuṭīkṛtāḥ iti
sarga anta ślokena pūrva uktam upasaṃharati

original: brahmārkaśakraharaviṣṇusadāśivādi- śāntau śivaṃ paramam etad ihaikam āste /
analyzed: brahma arka śakra hara viṣṇu sadāśiva ādi śāntau śivam paramam etat iha ekam āste

original: śiṣṭaṃ pradiṣṭam avinaṣṭam akaṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ na miśram aṇunāśritam āśritena // MU_3,10.54
analyzed: śiṣṭam pradiṣṭam a vinaṣṭam a kaṣṭam iṣṭam miśram na miśram aṇunā āśritam āśritena  /
āste sva svarūpe tathā eva tiṣṭhati
brahma arka śakra hara viṣṇu sadāśiva ādi śāntau satyām
ādi śabdena surā ādi tṛṇa antānām grahaṇam
brahma ādīnām tad tad bhuvana adhipatīnām
śānti rūpe mahā kalpānta samaye sati
atha vā brahma ādīnām saṅkalpa utpatti ādi kāriṇām manaḥ prabhṛtīnām
śāntau turya ākhye sati iti arthaḥ
śiṣṭam pradiṣṭam sarva śānti sākṣi tayā śeṣa tvena kathitam
na miśram śuddha cit mātra rūpam

original: aṇunā parimitenāśritena dharmabhūtena jagatāśritam ādhāratvena gṛhītam / iti śivam //
analyzed: aṇunā parimitena āśritena dharma bhūtena jagatā āśritam ādhāra tvena gṛhītam iti śivam
brahma arka śakra hara viṣṇu sadāśiva ādi śāntau

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe daśamaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe daśamaḥ sargaḥ

original: idaṃrūpam idaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagan nāmāsti bhāsuram /
analyzed: idaṃrūpam idam dṛśyam jagat nāma asti bhāsuram

original: mahāpralayasampattau bho brahman kva nu gacchati // MU_3,11.1
analyzed: mahāpralaya sampattau bho brahman kva nu gacchati

original: idam eva jagat mahāpralayasampattau kva nu gacchati /
analyzed: idam eva jagat mahāpralaya sampattau kva nu gacchati
śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ pi etad sadṛśam kiñcid pṛcchati

original: kuta āyāti kīdṛg vā vandhyāputraḥ kva gacchati /
analyzed: kutas āyāti kīdṛś vā vandhyā putraḥ kva gacchati

original: kva yāti kuta āyāti vada vā vyomakānanam // MU_3,11.2
analyzed: kva yāti kutas āyāti vada vā vyoma kānanam
etad sadṛśaḥ tava praśnaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
śrī rāmaḥ u trā uttaram dadhāti
vandhyā putraḥ vyomavanam na eva asti na bhaviṣyati

original: kīdṛśī dṛśyatā tasya kīdṛśī tasya nāstitā // MU_3,11.3
analyzed: kīdṛśī dṛśya tā tasya kīdṛśī tasya nāstitā
vartamāna bhaviṣyat niṣedhena bhūta niṣedhaḥ pi ākṣiptaḥ
śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ śrī rāma uktam uttaram dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya uttaram āha
vandhyāputra vyomavane yathā na staḥ kadācana

original: jagadādy akhilaṃ dṛśyaṃ tathā nāsti kadācana // MU_3,11.4
analyzed: jagat ādi akhilam dṛśyam tathā na asti kadācana
jagat ādi iti ādi śabdena pralayaḥ gṛhyate

original: na cotpannaṃ na ca dhvaṃsi yat kilādau na vidyate /
analyzed: na ca utpannam na ca dhvaṃsi yat kila ādau na vidyate

original: utpattiḥ kīdṛśī tasya nāśaśabdasya kā kathā // MU_3,11.5
analyzed: utpattiḥ kīdṛśī tasya nāśa śabdasya kā kathā

original: tathā na vidyate sthitiviṣayatāṃ ca na yāti /
analyzed: tathā na vidyate sthiti viṣaya tām ca na yāti
utpatti abhāve ca nāśa śabdasya kā kathā

original: etad vaktum api na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,11.5)
analyzed: etat vaktum api na yuktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: sā yathā nāśajanmāḍhyā tathaivedaṃ na kiṃ bhavet // MU_3,11.6
analyzed: sā yathā nāśa janma āḍhyā tathā evā idam na kim bhavet

original: vandhyāputrādikalpanābhāve vandhyāputretyādikathaiva na yuktā syād iti
analyzed: vandhyā putra ādi kalpanā abhāve vandhyā putra ityādi kathā eva na yuktā syāt iti
asatya tve pi nāśa janma āḍhyā nāśa janma yuktā
asatya tve pi nāśa janma āḍhyam kim na bhavet

original: tathā ca kva nu gacchatīti praśno yukta eveti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,11.6)
analyzed: tathā ca kva nu gacchati iti praśnaḥ yuktaḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: anyatra striyi dṛṣṭasya putrasyāropeṇa yuktaiva vandhyāputrakalpanātra tu dṛśyasya
analyzed: anyatra striyi dṛṣṭasya putrasya āropeṇa yuktā eva vandhyā putra kalpanā atra tu dṛśyasya

original: kva yatrāpi sattaiva nāstīti na tatkalpanā yuktety uttaraṃ śrīvasiṣṭho bhaṅgyāntareṇāha
analyzed: kva yatra api sattā eva na asti iti na tad kalpanā yuktā iti uttaram śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ bhaṅgyā antareṇa āha

original: niranvayā yathaivoktir jagatsattā tathaiva hi // MU_3,11.7
analyzed: niranvayā yathā eva uktiḥ jagat sattā tathā eva hi

original: hi niścaye / jagatsattā tathaiva tena prakāreṇaiva /
analyzed: hi niścaye jagat sattā tathā eva tena prakāreṇa eva

original: niranvayā kam apy artham anuddiśya pravṛttā /
analyzed: niranvayā kam api artham an uddiśya pravṛttā

original: phullasyetyādi kolanam ityantoktir yathā niranvayā bhavati // (MT_3,11.7)
analyzed: phullasya ityādi iti anta uktiḥ yathā niranvayā bhavati

original: kaṭakatvaṃ tu nāsty eva jagattvaṃ tu tathā pare // MU_3,11.8
analyzed: kaṭaka tvam tu nā asti eva jagat tvam tu tathā pare

original: yathā sauvarṇakaṭake sphuṭaṃ dṛśyamānam api kaṭakatvaṃ nāsti paramārthataḥ suvarṇaikamayatvāt /
analyzed: yathā sauvarṇa kaṭake sphuṭam dṛśyamānam api kaṭaka tvam nā asti paramārthataḥ suvarṇa eka maya tvāt

original: ākāśe ca yathā nāsti śūnyatvaṃ vyatirekavat /
analyzed: ākāśe ca yathā na asti śūnyatvam vyatireka vat

original: jagattvaṃ brahmaṇi tathā nāsty evāpy upalabdhimat // MU_3,11.9

original: upalabdhimad api bhāsamānatvena upalabdham apīty arthaḥ //
analyzed: upalabdhimat api bhāsamāna tvena upalabdham api iti arthaḥ

original: kajjalān na yathā kārṣṇyaṃ śvaityaṃ ca na yathā himāt /
analyzed: kajjalāt na yathā kārṣṇyam śvaityam ca na yathā himāt

original: pṛthag evaṃ bhaved buddhaṃ jagan nāsti pare pade // MU_3,11.10
analyzed: pṛthak evam bhavet buddham jagat na asti pare pade

original: pare pade iti saptamīdvayaṃ pañcamīsthāne jñeyam //
analyzed: pare pade iti saptamī dvayam pañcamī sthāne jñeyam

original: yathā śaityaṃ ca śaśino na himād vyatiricyate /
analyzed: yathā śaityam ca śaśinaḥ na himāt vyatiricyate

original: brahmaṇo na tathā sargo vidyate vyatirekavān // MU_3,11.11
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ na tathā sargaḥ vidyate vyatirekavān

original: guṇiguṇanidarśanenaikyam uktvā jagato bhramasiddhatayā aikyaṃ kathayati
analyzed: guṇi guṇa nidarśanena aikyam uktvā jagataḥ bhrama siddha tayā aikyam kathayati

original: nāsty evaivaṃ jagan nāsti dṛṣṭam apy amalātmani // MU_3,11.12
analyzed: na asti eva evam jagat na asti dṛṣṭam api amala ātmani

original: nanu pūrvaṃ kaṭakādayaḥ dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttā iha tu marujalādīti vaiṣamyam
analyzed: nanu pūrvam kaṭaka ādayaḥ dṛṣṭānta tvena upāttāḥ iha tu maru jala ādi iti vaiṣamyam

analyzed: punar api etat eva dṛṣṭānta antareṇa dṛḍhayati
jagat ākhye male vyomni dṛṣṭi muktā āvalī yathā

tathā citaḥ utthitāḥ cit āloka ākhyāḥ raśmayaḥ

original: jagadākhye cidambare sphurantaḥ nānāpadārtharūpeṇa dṛśyante iti // (MT_3,11.13)

original: cidākāśe cidākāśaś cittvād yaḥ kacati svayam /
analyzed: cit ākāśe cit ākāśaḥ cit tvāt yaḥ kacati svayam

original: tad eva tena rūpaṃ svaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate // MU_3,11.14

original: ādāv eva hi yan nāsti kāraṇāsambhavāt svayam /

original: vartamāne 'pi tan nāsti nāśaḥ syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ // MU_3,11.15
analyzed: vartamāne pi tat na asti nāśaḥ syāt tatra kīdṛśaḥ

original: hi niścaye / yat yat jagadākhyaṃ vastu /
analyzed: hi niścaye yat yat jagat ākhyam vastu

original: syāt viṣayābhāvenāyogyatvān na syād ity arthaḥ // (MT_3,11.15)
analyzed: syāt viṣaya abhāvena ayogya tvāt na syāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanu paramātmalakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya sadbhāvāt kāraṇāsambhavaḥ katham udety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu paramātma lakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya sadbhāvāt kāraṇa asambhavaḥ katham udeti atra āha

original: kāraṇaṃ bhavituṃ śaktaṃ chāyāyā ātapo yathā // MU_3,11.16

analyzed: ātapasya chāyāyāḥ nāśaka tvena sphuṭam chāyā kāraṇa tva ayogāt dṛṣṭānta tā

analyzed: nanu kāraṇa abhāve jagat astu iti atra āha

original: yat tatkāraṇam evāsti tad evettham avasthitam // MU_3,11.17
analyzed: yat tad kāraṇam eva asti tat eva ittham avasthitam

original: tatkāraṇam etasya jagataḥ kāraṇatvena śaṅkitaṃ vastu /

original: na tv anyat kiñcid iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,11.17)
analyzed: na tu anyat kiñcid iti bhāvaḥ

original: ajātam eva yad bhāti saṃvido bhānam eva tat /
analyzed: ajātam eva yat bhāti saṃvidaḥ bhānam eva tat

original: yaj jagad dṛśyate svapne saṃvitkacanam eva tat // MU_3,11.18
analyzed: yat jagat dṛśyate svapne saṃvid kacanam eva tat  /
atra anurūpam dṛṣṭāntam āha yat iti

original: sargādau brahmaṇi tathā jagatkacanam ātatam // MU_3,11.19

svapna jagat bhramaḥ svapna jagat rūpaḥ bhramaḥ

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate kiñcit tat sad evātmani sthitam /

original: nāstam eti na codeti jagat kiñcit kadācana // MU_3,11.20
analyzed: na astam eti na ca udeti jagat kiñcid kadācana

original: tat sad eva sad vastv eva /
analyzed: tat sat eva sat vastu eva

original: yathā dravatvaṃ salilaṃ spandatvaṃ pavano yathā /

original: na hi kaścit dravatvādi salilādeḥ pṛthakkṛtya darśayituṃ samartha iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi kaścid drava tva ādi salila ādeḥ pṛthakkṛtya darśayitum samarthaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: yathā puram ivāste 'ntar vid eva svapnasaṃvidi /

analyzed: tathā jagat iva ābhāti svātmā eva paramātmani

original: na tv anyaj jagan nāmāstīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na tu anyat jagat nāma asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ cet tat kathaṃ brahman sughanapratyayaṃ vada /

dṛśyam eva moha ādāyaka tvena viṣam viṣa dravyam
asatī yā svapna anubhūtiḥ svapna ākārā anubhūtiḥ

original: dṛśyātyantāsambhavaṃ vinā muktim amanyamānaḥ tam eva vistareṇa pṛcchati
analyzed: dṛśya atyanta asambhavam vinā muktim a manyamānaḥ tam eva vistareṇa pṛcchati

original: sati dṛśye kila draṣṭā sati draṣṭari dṛśyatā /
analyzed: sati dṛśye kila draṣṭā sati draṣṭari dṛśya tā

original: ekasattve dvayor bandho muktir ekakṣaye dvayoḥ // MU_3,11.24
analyzed: eka sattve dvayoḥ bandhaḥ muktiḥ eka kṣaye dvayoḥ

original: tasmāt muktyartham ekakṣaya eva sādhyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt mukti artham eka kṣayaḥ eva sādhyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tatrāpi kiṃ punaḥ punaḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvam eva pṛcchasīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tatra api kim punar punar dṛśya atyanta abhāvam eva pṛcchasi iti atra āha
atyanta asambhavaḥ yāvat buddhaḥ dṛśyasya na akṣayaḥ

original: tāvad draṣṭur adraṣṭṛtvaṃ na sambhavati mokṣadam // MU_3,11.25
analyzed: tāvat draṣṭuḥ adraṣṭṛ tvam na sambhavati mokṣa dam
śuddha cit mātra tā iti yāvat

original: dṛśyātyantābhāvasya sukaratvād draṣṭṛtānirāsasya ca dṛśyātyantābhāvaṃ vinā duṣkaratvāc ca punaḥ punaḥ dṛśyātyantābhāvapraśna iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: dṛśya atyanta abhāvasya sukara tvāt draṣṭṛ tā nirāsasya ca dṛśya atyanta abhāvam vinā duṣkara tvāt ca punar punar dṛśya atyanta abhāva praśnaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu dṛśya atyanta abhāve tava kim prayojanam
dṛśya dhvaṃsena api kārya siddheḥ iti atra āha

original: dṛśyaṃ cet sambhavaty ādau paścāt kṣayam upāgatam /
analyzed: dṛśyam ced sambhavati ādau paścāt kṣayam upāgatam

original: tad dṛśyasmaraṇānartharūpo bandho na naśyati // MU_3,11.26
analyzed: tat dṛśya smaraṇa anartha rūpaḥ bandhaḥ na naśyati
tat tadā dṛśya smaraṇa anartha rūpaḥ dṛśya smaraṇam eva anarthaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ satyatayā jñātasya tato naṣṭasyārthasya smaraṇaṃ hi durnivāram
analyzed: pūrvam satya tayā jñātasya tatas naṣṭasya arthasya smaraṇam hi durnivāram
eva yathā mātrā ādeḥ iti bhāvaḥ
dṛśyam sambhavati satya tayā upapattimat bhavati
tasmāt traikālikaḥ eva abhāvaḥ trā aṅgīkaraṇīyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu naṣṭasya dṛśyasya kā smṛtir bhavatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu naṣṭasya dṛśyasya kā smṛtiḥ bhavati iti atra āha
yatra kvacana saṃsthasya sva ādarśasya iva cit gateḥ

original: pratibimbo lagaty eva sargasmṛtimayo hy ayam // MU_3,11.27
analyzed: pratibimbaḥ lagati eva sarga smṛti mayaḥ hi ayam

original: yathā yatra kvacana saṃsthitasyādarśasya padārthasānnidhye pratibimbo lagati tathā
analyzed: yathā yatra kvacana saṃsthitasya ādarśasya padārtha sānnidhye pratibimbaḥ lagati tathā

original: yatra kvacana sthitāyāḥ cidgateḥ sūkṣmatvena sthitadṛśyasānnidhyāt pratibimbo lagatīty
analyzed: yatra kvacana sthitāyāḥ cidgateḥ sūkṣma tvena sthita dṛśya sānnidhyāt pratibimbaḥ lagati iti
tarhi muktiḥ kadā sambhavati iti atra āha

original: ādāv eva hi notpannaṃ dṛśyaṃ nāsty eva cet svayam /
analyzed: ādau eva hi na utpannam dṛśyam na asti eva ced svayam
draṣṭṛ dṛśya bhrama abhāvāt tat sambhavati mukta tā
mukta tā sambhavati upapatti yuktā bhavati

original: dṛśyātyantābhāve sati puruṣasyedaṃ dṛśyam iti bhramaḥ śāmyati /
analyzed: dṛśya atyanta abhāve sati puruṣasya idam dṛśyam iti bhramaḥ śāmyati
ca aham draṣṭā iti śāmyati eva
tatas ca śuddha cit mātra svarūpaḥ eva asau śiṣyate
tasmāt asambhavat mukteḥ mama protsāha yuktitaḥ
atyanta asambhavam dṛśye kathaya ātma vidām vara
asambhavat mukteḥ dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñānam vinā anupapadyamāna mukteḥ
protsāha yuktitaḥ prakṛṣṭam udyogam kṛtvā iti arthaḥ

original: asad eva yathā bhāti jagat sarvātmakaṃ tathā /
analyzed: asat eva yathā bhāti jagat sarva ātmakam tathā

original: śṛṇv ahaṃ kathayā rāma dīrghayā kathayāmi te // MU_3,11.30
analyzed: śṛṇu aham kathayā rāma dīrghayā kathayāmi te

original: tvaṃ śṛṇu / ahaṃ tathā taṃ prakāraṃ /
analyzed: tvam śṛṇu aham tathā tam prakāram

original: asad eva bhāti budbudau asatyatayā sphurati // (MT_3,11.30)
analyzed: asat eva bhāti budbudau asatya tayā sphurati

original: nanu kimarthaṃ dīrghayā kathayā kathayasīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kimartham dīrghayā kathayā kathayasi iti atra āha
vyavasāya kathā vākyaiḥ yāvat tat na anuvarṇitam

original: na viśrāmyati te tāvad dhṛdi pāṃsur yathā hrade // MU_3,11.31
analyzed: na viśrāmyati te tāvat hṛdi pāṃsuḥ yathā hrade
vyavasāyasya viśiṣṭasya niścayasya utpādikā kathā vyavasāya kathā
tad abhidhāyakaiḥ vākyaiḥ vyavasāya kathā vākyaiḥ

original: tāvat te hṛdi na viśrāmyati na sthitiṃ karoti /
analyzed: tāvat te hṛdi na viśrāmyati na sthitim karoti

original: nanu dṛśyātyantābhāvajñānena kiṃ mama setsyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñānena kim mama setsyati iti atra āha
atyanta abhāvam asyāḥ tvam jagat sarga bhrama sthiteḥ
buddhvā eka dhyāna niṣṭhā ātmā vyavahāram kariṣyasi
tvam vyavahāram paramparāyātam rājya rūpam vyavahāram
kariṣyasi kūṭa kārṣāpaṇa vyavahāra vat kariṣyasi
na tu vairāgya avasthā vat tad vimukhaḥ bhaviṣyasi
tādṛśaḥ ātmā sattva rūpam manaḥ yasya
bahis vyavahāra bhāj api bhaviṣyasi iti arthaḥ
jagat sarga rūpā jagat sṛṣṭi rūpā

original: nanu tato 'pi kim ity apekṣāyāṃ phalāntaram api kathayati
analyzed: nanu kim iti apekṣāyām phala antaram api kathayati
bhāva abhāva graha utsarga sthūla sūkṣma cala acalāḥ

original: dṛśas tvāṃ vedhayiṣyanti na mahādrim iveṣavaḥ // MU_3,11.33
analyzed: dṛśaḥ tvām vedhayiṣyanti na mahā adrim iva iṣavaḥ

original: dṛśyātyantābhāvajñāne sati bhāvābhāvagrahotsargasthūlasūkṣmacalācalāḥ dṛśaḥ tvāṃ na vedhayiṣyanti harṣāmarṣotpādanarūpāṃ tāḍanāṃ na kurvanti
analyzed: dṛśya atyanta abhāva jñāne sati bhāva abhāva graha utsarga sthūla sūkṣma cala acalāḥ dṛśaḥ tvām na vedhayiṣyanti harṣa amarṣa utpādana rūpām tāḍanām na kurvanti

original: bhāvādīnām api dṛśyatayātyantābhāvasya sampannatvān na tatkṛtā tāḍanā tava
analyzed: bhāva ādīnām api dṛśya tayā atyanta abhāvasya sampanna tvāt na tad kṛtā tāḍanā tava

original: na hi vandhyāputreṇa kaścit tāḍita iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi vandhyā putreṇa kaścid tāḍitaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: yathā iṣavaḥ mahāntaṃ parvataṃ na vidhyanti /
analyzed: yathā iṣavaḥ mahāntam parvatam na vidhyanti

original: sa eṣo 'sty eka evātmā na dvitīyāsti kalpanā /

original: jagad atra yathotpannaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi rāghava // MU_3,11.34
analyzed: jagat atra yathā utpannam tat te vakṣyāmi rāghava

original: tathā ca dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ sphuṭa eveti bhāvaḥ /

asti iti atra āha jagat iti

original: jagat yathā utpannaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi /
analyzed: jagat yathā utpannam tat te vakṣyāmi

original: tasmād imāni sakalāni vijṛmbhitāni yo hīdam aṅga sakale sakalaṃ mahātmā /
analyzed: tasmāt imāni sakalāni vijṛmbhitāni yaḥ hi idam aṅga sakale sakalam mahātmā

original: rūpāvalokanamanomananaprakāśa- kośāspadaṃ svayam udeti ca līyate ca // MU_3,11.35

original: tata eva ca niryāntīty arthaḥ / iti śivam //
analyzed: tatas eva ca niryānti iti arthaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe ekādaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe ekādaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: yathedam utthitaṃ viśvaṃ tac chṛṇūttamayā dhiyā // MU_3,12.1

parama pāvanāt pāvanānām api pāvaka tvena niratiśaya pāvanāt

original: suṣuptaṃ svapnavad bhāti bhāti brahmaiva sargavat /
analyzed: suṣuptam svapna vat bhāti bhāti brahma eva sargavat

original: sarvam ekaṃ ca tac chāntaṃ tatra tāvat kramaṃ śṛṇu // MU_3,12.2

original: brahmaiva sargabhāvena bṛṃhitaṃ cinmātrākhyaṃ vastu eva /

original: nanu tarhi jagadupādānabhūtaṃ brahma jagadvad eva jaḍaṃ syāt /

sarvathā āścaryam eva tat iti bhāvaḥ

analyzed: sattā mātra ātma kacanam yat ajasram svabhāvataḥ

original: tad ātmani svayaṃ kiñcic cetyatām iva gacchati /

original: cetyatām iva gacchati paramārthato na gacchatītīvaśabdopādānam /
analyzed: cetyatām iva gacchati paramārthataḥ na gacchati iti iva śabda upādānam
ātmani sphuraṇa ākhya cetaka svabhāve kha rūpe
tad vyatirekeṇa tadā kasya api abhāvāt

original: tasya sarveṣv aham iti bhāsamānatvena prasiddhasyānantaprakāśātmarūpasyānantaḥ aparicchinnaḥ /
analyzed: tasya sarveṣu aham iti bhāsamāna tvena prasiddhasya ananta prakāśa ātma rūpasya anantaḥ aparicchinnaḥ
tad eka mayaḥ svabhāvaḥ svarūpam yasya
tasya ananta prakāśa rūpasya iti yāvat
sattā mātra ātma sattā mātra svarūpam
sphurat tā rūpe kacana eva sattā vyavahārāt
citā atha a cit rūpasya sambandhaḥ na yujyate viruddha tvāt

original: na hi tejastamasoḥ sambandhaḥ kvāpi dṛṣṭaḥ /

ukta nyāyena cetya asambhavena eva siddham iti
brahma eva kacati svaccham ittham ātma ātmanā ātmani
cit tvāt drava tvāt salilam iva āvarta tayā ātmani

original: cetyarūpajagattayābhāne cittvam eva tasya na syād iti bhāvaḥ /

atra dṛṣṭāntam āha drava tvāt iti

original: yathā salilaṃ dravatvāt ātmani salilākhye svarūpe /

asat eva idam ābhāti sat iva iha anubhūyate

analyzed: vinaśyati asat eva ante svapne sva maraṇam yathā

original: idaṃ jagat / asad eva bhāti vilasati /

original: jagadatyantābhāvaṃ vistareṇoktvā siddhāntabhūtaṃ brahmamayatvaṃ tasya kathayati
analyzed: jagat atyanta abhāvam vistareṇa uktvā siddhānta bhūtam brahma maya tvam tasya kathayati
atha vāja sva rūpa tvāt sadā eva idam anāmayam
akhaṇḍitam anādi antam jñāta mātra ambara udaram
sadā eva aja svarūpa tvāt janma rahita cit mātra svarūpa tvāt
anāmayam pūrva ukta ādhāra tva ādheya tva ādi roga rahitam bhavati

original: tadākrāntabuddhīn satyaṃ tadrūpam apaśyataḥ praty evoktaḥ /
analyzed: tad ākrānta buddhīn satyam tad rūpam a paśyataḥ prati eva uktaḥ
an ādi antam ādi anta rahitam

original: ambarodaram samyagjñānenālocitaṃ hi jagat ambarodaram eva bhavati // (MT_3,13.53)
analyzed: ambara udaram samyak jñānena ālocitam hi jagat ambara udaram eva bhavati

original: tathā ca pūrvoktā sarvā prakriyā sargārambhaṃ vinā atuṣṭamanasaḥ praty
analyzed: tathā ca pūrva uktā sarvā prakriyā sarga ārambham vinā atuṣṭa manasaḥ prati
na tu tad rūpaḥ jaḍa tva āpatteḥ

original: nanu prajeśasyāpṛthvyādirūpatayā kathaṃ na pṛthvyādi sat astīty /
analyzed: nanu prajā īśasya a pṛthvī ādi rūpa tayā katham na pṛthvī ādi sat asti iti

original: śuddhamanorūpasya prajeśasya tadrūpatāgrahaṇena pṛthvyāder jātatvaṃ syān / na
analyzed: śuddha manaḥ rūpasya prajā īśasya tad rūpa tā grahaṇena pṛthvī ādeḥ jāta tvam syāt na

atas pṛthvī ādeḥ api jāta tvam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe trayodaśaḥ sargaḥ

analyzed: om evam tyanta abhāvam paramātma eka maya tām ca punar punar uktvā tāvanmātram

original: tat param eva uttīrṇaṃ cinmātram eva /
analyzed: tat param eva uttīrṇam cit mātram eva

analyzed: yat asti yat bhāsamāna tvena nirākartum na śakyate iti arthaḥ

original: nanu tarhi pūrvaṃ sādhitā jīvatā katham astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi pūrvam sādhitā jīvatā katham asti iti atra āha
parama ākāśe eva asau jīvatām cetati svayam

spanda śabdena atra spanda yuktaḥ lakṣyate

analyzed: na hi tatra salilasya saspandatā kena api aṃśena

original: yuktā / evaṃ brahmaṇy api jīvatāyogyatvamātram eva /
analyzed: yuktāḥ evam brahmaṇi api jīva tā yogya tva mātram eva

original: na tu tatra jīvatā nāma kācid asti /
analyzed: na tu tatra jīvatā nāma kācid asti
brahmaṇi jīva rūpa tayā bhāsanena iti viśeṣaḥ
ākāśa rūpam ajahat eva vetti iva dṛśya tām
svapna saṅkalpa śaila ādau iva cit vṛttiḥ āntarī
asau parama ākāśaḥ dṛśyatām dṛśya bhāvam
ākāśa rūpam cit mātra ākāśa ākhyam rūpam

original: tattyāge tu vedanam asya na syād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tad tyāge tu vedanam asya na syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: svapnasaṅkalpaśailādau svapne saṅkalpe ca svaviṣayīkṛte svasvarūpaparvatādau sthitāṃ /
analyzed: svapna saṅkalpa śaila ādau svapne saṅkalpe ca sva viṣayīkṛte sva svarūpa parvata ādau sthitām
pṛthvī ādi rahitaḥ dehaḥ yaḥ virāj ātmanaḥ mahān
ātivāhikaḥ eva asau cit mātrāt śana bhaḥ mayaḥ
pṛthvī ādi rahitaḥ sthūla pṛthvī ādi sparśāt ūṣitaḥ
virāj ātmanaḥ virāj svarūpa tayā sthitasya paramātmanaḥ
atra hetu tvena viśeṣaṇam āha cit mātra iti
yatas cit mātra ākhya nirmala ākāśa svarūpaḥ
cit mātra mayasya śarīrasya ātivāhika tvam
akṣaya svapna śaila ābhaḥ sthira svapna pura upamaḥ
a nikhāta mahā stambha putrikā ogha sama upamaḥ
brahma ākāśe nikhāta ātmā sustambhe sālabhañjakaḥ
a nikhāta mahā stambha putrikā ogha sama upamaḥ mūputrikau

original: ādyaḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ svayambhūr iti viśrutaḥ /
analyzed: ādyaḥ prajāpatiḥ pūrvam svayambhūḥ iti viśrutaḥ

original: karmaṇāṃ ca janmahetutvaṃ sarvaśāstreṣu prasiddham eva /

cit mātrataḥ sadyas utthita tvena jñeyaḥ
akṣayaḥ itara svapna śaila vat kṣaṇika tva doṣa rahitaḥ yaḥ svapna śailaḥ
itara svapna pura vailakṣyeṇa sthiram sthira ākāram

original: etena viśeṣaṇadvayenātivāhikatāyām apy asya sthiratoktā / citrakṛti
analyzed: etena viśeṣaṇa dvayena ātivāhika tāyām api asya sthira tā uktā citra kṛti

original: tatrasthaṃ yat citrasainyam agre prakaṭībhavad ālekhyasainyaṃ /
