saḥ citra kṛt sthita citta stha citra sainya sama ākṛtiḥ
saḥ a nikhāta mahā stambha putrikā ogha sama upamaḥ
brahma ākāśe su stambhe a nikhāta ātmā an utkīrṇa svarūpaḥ
a nikhātā iti viśeṣaṇasya eva iyam vyākhyā
etena viśeṣaṇa dvayena brahma eka maya tā asya uktā
citrakṛt sthita cittastha citra sainya sama ākṛtiḥ

original: mucyante sarva evātaḥ prāktanaṃ karma teṣu kim // MU_3,14.8
analyzed: mucyante sarve eva atas prāktanam karma teṣu kim
sarve eva ādyāḥ pitāmahāḥ mahāpralaya paryanteṣu

mucyante cit mātra ākhye svarūpe layībhavanti

original: moktavya eva kuḍyātmā dṛśyo 'dṛśyaś ca saṃsthitaḥ /
analyzed: moktavyaḥ eva kuḍya ātmā dṛśyaḥ dṛśyaḥ ca saṃsthitaḥ

original: na ca dṛśyaṃ na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā sarvam eva ca // MU_3,14.9

original: praticchandaḥ padārthānāṃ sarveṣām eṣa eva saḥ /
analyzed: praticchandaḥ padārthānām sarveṣām eṣaḥ eva saḥ

original: asmād udeti jīvālī dīpālī dīpakād iva // MU_3,14.10
analyzed: asmāt udeti jīva ālī dīpa ālī dīpakāt iva

original: eṣa sa eva pūrvoktaḥ prajāpatir eva /

original: 'sau / moktavya eva moktuṃ madhye gantuṃ śakya eva /
analyzed: sau moktavyaḥ eva moktum madhye gantum śakyaḥ eva

original: kuḍyaṃ hi rodhakatvena madhye gantuṃ na śakyate /

asya sarveṣām dṛśya sañcārāṇām praveśa nirgama mahā tvāt

original: adṛśyaś ca sthitaḥ draṣṭṛrūpeṇa ca sthitaḥ /

original: na dṛśyaṃ na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā na sṛjikriyākartā sarvottīrṇarūpatvāt /
analyzed: na dṛśyam na ca draṣṭā na sraṣṭā na sṛji kriyā kartā sarva uttīrṇa rūpa tvāt

original: nanu mṛdo ghaṭālī rajjusamūhāt vā sarpālīnyaṃ tathā udeti /
analyzed: nanu mṛdaḥ ghaṭa āliḥ rajju samūhāt vā sarpa ālīnyam tathā udeti

original: vivartapariṇāmābhyām anya eva praticchandyapraticchandakarūpaḥ prakāraḥ atrāstīti
analyzed: vivarta pariṇāmābhyām anyaḥ eva praticchandya praticchandaka rūpaḥ prakāraḥ atra asti iti

original: kṣmādimān iva niṣkuḍyaḥ svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ yathā // MU_3,14.11
analyzed: kṣmā ādimān iva niṣkuḍyaḥ svapnāt svapna antaram yathā
kṣmā ādi varjitaḥ ābhāsa rūpatvena sthūla pṛthvī ādi rahitaḥ

original: kṣmādimān iva bhāsamānatvena tatsahita iva bhāsamānaḥ /
analyzed: kṣmā ādimān iva bhāsamāna tvena tad sahitaḥ iva bhāsamānaḥ

original: asmād eva praticchandāj jīvāḥ samprasaranty amī /

original: sahakārikāraṇānām abhāvāc ca sa eva te // MU_3,14.12
analyzed: sahakāri kāraṇānām abhāvāt ca saḥ eva te

analyzed: sahakāri kāraṇa abhāve kāryam kāraṇa rūpam eva iti hi prasiddhiḥ

original: ekam etad ato nānyaḥ parasmāt sargavibhramaḥ // MU_3,14.13

original: kāryaṃ ca tat kāraṇaṃ ca kāryakāraṇaṃ /

analyzed: jīva ākāśaḥ saḥ eva ittham sthitaḥ pṛthvī ādi asat yatas

analyzed: jīva ākāśaḥ iti śrutvā kiñcid saṃśayam āpannaḥ śrī rāmaḥ pṛcchati

āhosvit asti ananta ātmā cala upamaḥ

original: parimitaḥ kiṃ syāt āho anantakaḥ aparimitaḥ syāt /
analyzed: parimitaḥ kim syāt āho anantakaḥ aparimitaḥ syāt
āhosvit ananta ātmā jīva piṇḍaḥ acala upamaḥ parvata prakhyaḥ

original: piṇḍaḥ mṛtpiṇḍavat eka eva kaścij jīvamayaḥ piṇḍa iti bhedaḥ //
analyzed: piṇḍaḥ mṛd piṇḍa vat ekaḥ eva kaścid jīva mayaḥ piṇḍaḥ iti bhedaḥ

original: nanu kiṃ tava rāśipiṇḍatvayoḥ praśnenety āśaṅkyāha
analyzed: nanu kim tava rāśi piṇḍa tvayoḥ praśnena iti āśaṅkya āha

original: dhārāḥ payomuca iva śīkarā iva vāridheḥ /
analyzed: dhārāḥ payaḥ mucaḥ iva śīkarāḥ iva vāridheḥ

original: kaṇās taptāyasa iva kasmān niryānti jīvakāḥ // MU_3,14.16
analyzed: kaṇāḥ tapta ayasaḥ iva kasmāt niryānti jīvakāḥ

original: jīvarāśeḥ jīvapiṇḍasya vānaṅgīkāre eteṣāṃ niryāṇaṃ na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,14.16)
analyzed: jīvarāśeḥ jīva piṇḍasya vā anaṅgīkāre eteṣām niryāṇam na sambhavati iti bhāvaḥ
iti me bhagavan brūhi jīva jāla vinirṇayam

original: jñātam etan mayā prāyas tad eva prakaṭīkuru // MU_3,14.17
analyzed: jñātam etat mayā prāyas tat eva prakaṭīkuru

original: etāvad uktvā tvayā kiṃ na śrutam ity /
analyzed: etāvat uktvā tvayā kim na śrutam iti

original: na tv aśeṣeṇātaḥ tad eva prakaṭīkuru yenāśeṣeṇa jānāmīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na tu aśeṣeṇa atas tat eva prakaṭīkuru yena aśeṣeṇa jānāmi iti bhāvaḥ

original: eka eva na jīvo 'sti rāśīnāṃ sambhavaḥ kutaḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva na rāśīnām sambhavaḥ kutas

original: śaśaśṛṅgaṃ samuḍḍīya prayātītīva te vacaḥ // MU_3,14.18
analyzed: śaśa śṛṅgam samuḍḍīya prayāti iti iva te vacaḥ
paramārthataḥ ekaḥ eva jīvaḥ na asti
tvad pṛṣṭānām rāśīnām sambhavaḥ kutas syāt
etat praśnasya asambaddha artha tvam kathayati śaśa iti
śaśa śṛṅgam samuḍḍīya prayāti iti etad vacana sadṛśam
ādau śaśa śṛṅgam eva na asti
kā kathā tad rāśi ādeḥ iti bhāvaḥ
na asti gam eva na asti

original: na jīvo 'sti na jīvānāṃ rāśayaḥ santi rāghava /
analyzed: na jīvaḥ asti na jīvānām rāśayaḥ santi rāghava

original: na caikaḥ parvataprakhyo jīvapiṇḍo 'sti kaścana // MU_3,14.19
analyzed: na ca ekaḥ parvata prakhyaḥ jīva piṇḍaḥ sti kaścana
paramārthataḥ sarvasya śuddha cit mātra eka maya tvāt jīvaḥ na asti

original: na ca ekaḥ kaścana parvataprakhyaḥ jīvapiṇḍo 'sti /
analyzed: na ca ekaḥ kaścana parvata prakhyaḥ jīva piṇḍaḥ sti

original: ataś ca tvatpraśno 'yaṃ na yukta iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas ca tvad praśnaḥ yam na yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
āśīḥ prakāreṇa niścayam asya kartavya tvena kathayati
jīva śabda artha kalanāḥ samasta kalanā anvitāḥ

original: na ca kāścana santīti niścayo 'stu tavācalaḥ // MU_3,14.20
analyzed: na ca kāścana santi iti niścayaḥ stu tava acalaḥ

original: tāḥ samastakalanānvitāḥ samastābhiḥ ahambhāvādikalanābhiḥ anvitāḥ / na santi //
analyzed: tāḥ samasta kalanā anvitāḥ samastābhiḥ ahambhāva ādi kalanābhiḥ anvitāḥ na santi

original: nanu jīvādīnāṃ pratyakṣeṇa sphuraṇāt katham ayaṃ niścayaḥ yuktaḥ syād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu jīva ādīnām pratyakṣeṇa sphuraṇāt katham ayam niścayaḥ yuktaḥ syāt iti atra āha

original: śuddhaṃ cinmātram amalaṃ brahmāstīha hi sarvagam /
analyzed: śuddham cit mātram amalam brahma asti iha hi sarvagam

original: tad yathā sarvaśaktitvād vindate yāṃ svayaṃ kalām // MU_3,14.21
analyzed: tat yathā sarva śakti tvāt vindate yām svayam kalām
cit mātra anukrameṇa eva sampraphullām latām iva

original: nanu mūrtām amūrtāṃ vā tām evāśu prapaśyati // MU_3,14.22
analyzed: nanu mūrtām amūrtām vā tām eva āśu prapaśyati
hi niścaye śuddham cit mātram śuddha cit mātra svarūpam
sarva śakti tvāt yatas sarva śaktiḥ asti
cit mātra anukrameṇa cit mātra paripāṭyā

original: cinmātrasyaiva hīyaṃ paripāṭī yat kalanāḥ vikāsayati /
analyzed: cit mātrasya eva hi iyam paripāṭī yat kalanāḥ vikāsayati

original: mūrtām amūrtāṃ vā sthūlāṃ sūkṣmāṃ vāśu tasminn eva kṣaṇe /
analyzed: mūrtām amūrtām vā sthūlām sūkṣmām vā āśu tasmin eva kṣaṇe

original: jīvaḥ paramārthataḥ svayaṃ siddho nāsti / kasya
analyzed: jīvaḥ paramārthataḥ svayam siddhaḥ nā asti kasya

original: rāśitā piṇḍatā vā bhaved iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: rāśi tā piṇḍa tā vā bhavet iti bhāvaḥ
hi iyam sya eva sthūlām sūkṣmām hi iyam

original: nanu yadi brahma jīvādi paśyati tadā tadbhinnam evaitat syāt /
analyzed: nanu yadi brahma jīva ādi paśyati tadā tat bhinnam eva etat syāt
sva bhinnasya eva dṛṣṭi gocara tvāt

original: jīvo buddhiḥ kriyāspando mano dvitvaikyam ity api /
svasattāṃ prakacantīṃ tāṃ niyojayati vedane // MU_3,14.23
analyzed: sva sattām prakacantīm tām niyojayati vedane
jīvaḥ buddhiḥ kriyā spandaḥ hita ahita prāpti parihāra arthāḥ ceṣṭāḥ

original: dvitvaṃ ca tat aikyaṃ ca dvitvaikyam /
analyzed: dvi tvam ca tat aikyam ca dvi tva aikyam

original: dṛṣṭigocaratve 'pi na jīvāder bhinnatvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭi gocara tve pi na jīva ādeḥ bhinna tvam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu brahmasattā kathaṃ jīvādibhāvena sphuratīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu brahma sattā katham jīva ādi bhāvena sphurati iti atra āha

original: sābuddhaivaṃ bhavaty eva bhaved brahmaiva bodhataḥ /
analyzed: sā abuddhā evam bhavati eva bhavet brahmā eva bodhataḥ

original: abodhaḥ prekṣayā yāti nāśaṃ na tu sa budhyate // MU_3,14.24
analyzed: abodhaḥ prekṣayā yāti nāśam na tu sa budhyate
sā brahma sattā buddhā brahma sattā bhāvena ajñātā satī

original: evaṃ bhavati eva jīvādirūpatayā bhāsata eva /
analyzed: evam bhavati eva jīva ādi rūpa tayā bhāsate eva

original: tu yaḥ abodha āsīt saḥ abodhatvena jñātaḥ san ghaṭādivat tathaiva tiṣṭhati / tathā
analyzed: tu yaḥ abodhaḥ āsīt saḥ abodha tvena jñātaḥ san ghaṭa ādi vat tathā eva tiṣṭhati tathā
ca na brahma eka maya tā sidhyati iti

original: na budhyate bodhaviṣayo na sampadyate viruddhatvāt tadudbodhakāle eva naṣṭatvāt / na hi tamaḥ
analyzed: na budhyate bodha viṣayaḥ na sampadyate viruddha tvāt tad udbodha kāle eva naṣṭa tvāt na hi tamaḥ

original: na cāsya jñāyate tattvam abodhasyaivam eva hi // MU_3,14.25
analyzed: na ca asya jñāyate tattvam abodhasya evam eva hi  /
yathā andhakāraḥ dīpena prekṣyamāṇaḥ draṣṭum ārabdhaḥ

original: 'bodhasyājñānasyaivam eva tattvaṃ na jñāyate ity arthaḥ // (MT_3,14.25)
analyzed: bodhasya ajñānasya evam eva tattvam na jñāyate iti arthaḥ
evam brahmā eva jīvātmā nirvibhāgaḥ nirantaraḥ

original: brahmatvāpādakāny asya viśeṣaṇāny āha nirvibhāga iti /
analyzed: brahma tva āpādakāni asya viśeṣaṇāni āha nirvibhāgaḥ iti

original: na hi jīvasvarūpe kaścid vibhāgo 'sti niravayavatvāt /
analyzed: na hi jīva svarūpe kaścid vibhāgaḥ sti niravayava tvāt
nirantaraḥ prakāśa nirbharita tvena madhye vakāśa hīnaḥ

original: sarvaśaktiḥ sarvaśaktitvaṃ cāsya svapnādau pratyakṣadṛṣṭam eva /
analyzed: sarva śaktiḥ sarva śakti tvam ca asya svapna ādau pratyakṣa dṛṣṭam eva
anādi antaḥ ādi anta rahita tvam ca asya ādi anta paricchedaka tvena eva siddham
tasya rūpam dhārayati mahā cit sāra rūpa dhṛt

original: sarvānantatayā tv asya na kācid bhedakalpanā /
analyzed: sarva ananta tayā tu asya na kācid bheda kalpanā

original: vidyate yā hi kalanā sā tad evānubhūtitaḥ // MU_3,14.27
analyzed: vidyate yā hi kalanā sā tat eva anubhūtitaḥ

original: sarvānantatayā sarvaś cāsāv anantaś ca sarvānantaḥ /
analyzed: sarva ananta tayā sarvaḥ ca asau anantaḥ ca sarva anantaḥ
kācid bheda kalanā bheda ākārā kalanā
sarva rūpasya anantasya ca bheda ayogāt
na hi ghaṭa ādi apekṣayā anantasya ghaṭa śarāva ādi sarva rūpasya

original: nanu sarvatvam anantatvaṃ ca asarvāt sāntāc ca bhedakam eva /
analyzed: nanu sarva tvam ananta tvam ca asarvāt sa antāt ca bhedakam eva

original: tathā ca tābhyām eva tasya bhedaḥ sampadyata ity /
analyzed: tathā ca tābhyām eva tasya bhedaḥ sampadyate iti

original: yā kācit kalanāsti sānubhūtā na vā / na cet sā
analyzed: yā kācid kalanā asti sā anubhūtā na vā na ced sā

original: svayam asiddhā brahmaṇi bhedaṃ kathaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: svayam asiddhā brahmaṇi bhedam katham kuryāt
anubhūtā ced tarhi anubhava rūpā eva anubhavasya
ca cit rūpa tvena brahma tvam siddham eva iti
evam etat katham brahman eka jīva icchayā akhilāḥ
jagat jīvāḥ na yujyante mahā jīva eka tā vaśāt
sarveṣām jīvānām tatra eka jīva icchā anuvarti tvam
mahājīvena cetya tva ādi tanmātra anta prapañca valita cit mātra ākhya mahājīvena
eka jīva icchayā ekasya kasya api sāmānya jīvasya icchayā

original: sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ proktasvarūpamahājīvaikamayatve ekasmin jīve uditayecchayā sarveṣāṃ jīvānāṃ yogo yuktaḥ //
analyzed: sarveṣām jīvānām prokta svarūpa mahājīva eka maya tve ekasmin jīve uditayā icchayā sarveṣām jīvānām yogaḥ yuktaḥ
mahā jīva ātma tat brahma sarva śakti maya ātmakam

original: sthitaṃ yatheccham eveha nirvibhāgaṃ nirantaram // MU_3,14.29
analyzed: sthitam yatheccham evā iha nirvibhāgam nirantaram
tat brahma iha yatheccham sva icchā sadṛśam

original: sarvaśaktimayātmakatvaṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ sarvaśaktīnāṃ tata evotthānāt
analyzed: sarva śakti maya ātmaka tvam ca brahmaṇaḥ sarva śaktīnām tatas eva utthānāt
nirvibhāgam akhaṇḍa svarūpa tvena vibhāgāt niṣkrāntam

original: yad evecchati tat tasya bhavaty āśu mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: yat evā icchati tat tasya bhavati āśu mahātmanaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ tu naśyatīcchā cid ato dvitvam udeti tat // MU_3,14.30
analyzed: pūrvam tu naśyati icchā cit atas dvi tvam udeti tat

original: tat brahma / yad evecchati icchāviṣayaṃ karoti /
analyzed: tat brahma yat eva icchati icchā viṣayam karoti

original: ekatecchānāśena dvitvotpattim asmāt kathayati pūrvam iti /
analyzed: ekatā icchā nāśena dvi tva utpattim asmāt kathayati pūrvam iti
nīlam utpalam iti vat cit viśeṣita icchā jñeyā
cit viśeṣita tvam ca atra cit viṣaya tvam
cit rūpaḥ eva bhavāmi iti evaṃrūpā ekatā icchā
taḥ saptamī arthe tasil asmin brahmaṇi
naśyati tu susphūrti aviṣaya tā rūpam nāśam yāti iva

original: paramārthataḥ tu na naśyati tasyāḥ sarvatrānugamāt /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu na naśyati tasyāḥ sarvatra anugamāt

original: ekatecchānāśahetubhūtatayā dvitvecchayā eva dvitvam udetīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: ekatā icchā nāśa hetu bhūta tayā dvi tva icchayā eva dvi tvam udeti iti bhāvaḥ
dvitva udaya anantaram śakti kriyā krama karaṇam kathayati
paścāt dvi tva vibhaktānām sva śaktīnām prakalpitaḥ

original: anenetthaṃ hi bhavatīty evaṃ tena kriyākramaḥ // MU_3,14.31
analyzed: anena ittham hi bhavati iti evam tena kriyā kramaḥ

original: śaktyādyayā tayā brāhmyā niyamo yaḥ prakalpitaḥ /
analyzed: śaktyā ādyayā tayā brāhmyā niyamaḥ yaḥ prakalpitaḥ

original: taṃ vinā nodayo 'nyāsāṃ pradhānecchaiva rohati // MU_3,14.32
analyzed: tam vinā nā udayaḥ nyāsām pradhāna icchā eva rohati
tayā prasiddhayā ādyayā mūla kāraṇa bhūtayā
yaḥ niyamaḥ sva icchā sadṛśī niyatiḥ
pradhānasya mahā jīva ātma bhūtasya brahmaṇaḥ
icchā eva rohati jīva icchā rūpeṇa pariṇamate
tathā ca pradhāna icchā anuvarti tvam eva

original: uktam / iha tu tacchakter iti cen /
analyzed: uktam iha tu tad śakteḥ iti ced

original: yasyā jīvābhidhānāyāḥ śaktyā yecchā phalaty asau /
analyzed: yasyāḥ jīva abhidhānāyāḥ śaktyāḥ yā icchā phalati asau
pradhāna śakti niyama anuṣṭhānena vinā na tu

original: yasyāḥ jīvābhidhānāyāḥ śaktyāḥ śaktirūpasya yasya jīvasya /
analyzed: yasyāḥ jīva abhidhānāyāḥ śaktyāḥ śakti rūpasya yasya jīvasya
yā icchā phalati phala yuktā bhavati
kā kathā tad phalasya iti bhāvaḥ
pradhāna śakti niyamaḥ su pratiṣṭhaḥ bhavet na ced

original: tat phalaṃ śaktyaśaktatvān nehitānāṃ kvacid bhavet // MU_3,14.34
analyzed: tat phalam śakti aśakta tvāt na īhitānām kvacid bhavet

original: na ced bhavet yadi na syāt /
analyzed: na ced bhavet yadi na syāt

original: rohitānāṃ kvacit kutrāpi deśe kāle vā /
analyzed: rohitānām kvacid kutra api deśe kāle vā
yat śakta tvam phalam prati sāmarthyam

original: yataḥ rohitānāṃ nānāvidhānāṃ kriyāṇāṃ phalaṃ vidyate 'taḥ anumīyate ko 'pi niyamo
analyzed: yatas rohitānām nānāvidhānām kriyāṇām phalam vidyate anumīyate kaḥ pi niyamaḥ

original: 'sti yena kriyāṇāṃ phalotpādanaṃ prati sāmarthyam astīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,14.34)
analyzed: sti yena kriyāṇām phala utpādanam prati sāmarthyam asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: jīvatkoṭimahākoṭī bhavaty atha na kiñcana // MU_3,14.35
analyzed: jīvat koṭi mahā koṭī bhavati atha na kiñcana

original: kuto niryānti jīvakā iti pūrvataroktasya praśnasyottaram āha jīvatkoṭīti /
analyzed: kutas niryānti jīvakāḥ iti pūrvatara uktasya praśnasya uttaram āha jīvat koṭi iti
koṭi mahā koṭī koṭi mahā koṭi saṅkhye
bhavati svayam eva tad rūpaḥ bhavati

original: na tu tato jīvāḥ niryāntīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tu tatas jīvāḥ niryānti iti bhāvaḥ
cit maye svarūpe tathā eva sthita tvāt

original: nanu brahma kena jīvatāṃ yātīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu brahma kena jīvatām yāti iti atra āha
cetya saṃvedanāt jīvaḥ bhavati āyāti saṃsṛtim

original: tadasaṃvedanād rūpaṃ śamam āyāti saṃsṛteḥ // MU_3,14.36
analyzed: tad asaṃvedanāt rūpam śamam āyāti saṃsṛteḥ
cetya saṃvedanāt cit viṣaya bhūta bhāva jāta parāmarśāt
tatas saṃsṛtim yāti sukha duḥkha lepa sva rūpa saṃsāra bhāj bhavati
na vā iti atra āha tat iti

original: nanu saṃsṛtyupaśamena jīvasya kiṃ sampadyata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu saṃsṛti upaśamena jīvasya kim sampadyate iti atra āha
evam kaniṣṭha jīvānām jyeṣṭha jīva kriyā kramaiḥ

original: samudety ādyajīvatvaṃ tāmrāṇām iva hematā // MU_3,14.37
analyzed: samudeti ādya jīva tvam tāmrāṇām iva hema tā
kaniṣṭha jīvānām ādya jīva tvam brahma tvam
jyeṣṭhajīva kriyā kramāḥ atra brahma kṛtāḥ kriyā kramāḥ jñātavyāḥ
brahma kṛta kriyā kramasya eva jīvānām brahmatva āpādane samartha tvāt atra
svarṇakāra kriyā kramaiḥ tāmrāṇām yathā hema tvam samudeti

original: atrānante parākāśe ittham eṣa gaṇo 'py asan /
analyzed: atra anante para ākāśe ittham eṣa gaṇaḥ u pi asan
kha ātmā eva san iva udeti cit camatkaraṇa ātmakaḥ
ittham pūrva ukta krameṇa atra anante para ākāśe prasiddhe parimeye cit ākāśe
kha ātmā eva na kiñcid rūpaḥ eva
citaḥ yat camatkaraṇam sva śakti āsvāda karaṇam
camatkaraṇam vinā svatantrāyāḥ citeḥ cetya unmukha tā yogāt

original: nanu camatkaraṇārtham anyāpekṣāyā avaśyambhāvāt kuto 'syāḥ svatantrādīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu camatkaraṇa artham anya apekṣāyāḥ avaśyambhāvāt kutas syāḥ svatantra ādi iti atra āha

original: svayam eva camatkāro yaḥ samāgamyate citā /
analyzed: svayam eva camatkāraḥ yaḥ samāgamyate citā
bhaviṣyat nāma deha ādi tat ahambhāvanam viduḥ

original: yaḥ camatkāraḥ citā saha svayaṃ cidāśrayeṇa svaviṣayena ca yatnena vinā /
analyzed: yaḥ camatkāraḥ citā saha svayam cit āśrayeṇa sva viṣayena ca yatnena vinā
samāgamyate svayam samāgama viṣaya tām bhajati
kā kathā jīvasya iti ahambhāva grahaṇa abhiprāyaḥ

original: bhaviṣyat nāma ca dehādi ca yasya /
analyzed: bhaviṣyat nāma ca deha ādi ca yasya
cit nairapekṣya dyotanāya samāgamyate iti karma kartṛ vyapadeśaḥ
prakṛtam cit aikyam bahu vistareṇa kathayati

original: cito yaḥ syāc cidālokas tanmayatvād anantakaḥ /
analyzed: citaḥ yaḥ syāt cit ālokaḥ tad maya tvāt anantakaḥ

original: sa eṣa bhuvanābhoga iti tasyāḥ prabimbati // MU_3,14.40
analyzed: saḥ eṣa bhuvana ābhogaḥ iti tasyāḥ prabimbati
yaḥ ālokaḥ bhāva prakaṭana hetuḥ svabhāva viśeṣaḥ
tad maya tvāt cit maya tvāt

original: aparimeyatvaṃ ca citaḥ parimātur abhāvena svayaṃ svasmin parimātṛtāsambhavāc
analyzed: aparimeya tvam ca citaḥ parimātuḥ abhāvena svayam svasmin parimātṛ tā asambhavāt

original: ca jñeyam / sa eṣaḥ pūrvoktaḥ viṣayasya svavyatiriktasya cidālokaḥ /
analyzed: ca jñeyam saḥ eṣaḥ pūrvoktaḥ viṣayasya sva vyatiriktasya cit ālokaḥ
bhuvana ābhogaḥ iti bhuvana vistāraḥ yam iti
pratibimbati mālinyā anādāyaka tvena pratibimba bhāvena sphurati
pariṇāma vikāra ādi śabdaiḥ sā eva cit avyayā
tādṛś rūpyāt abhedyā api sva śaktyā eva vibudhyate

original: svaśaktyā eva pramātṛbhāvena sphurantyā nijaśaktyā eva kartryāvyayā nāśarahitā /
analyzed: sva śaktyā eva pramātṛ bhāvena sphurantyā nija śaktyā eva kartryā avyayā nāśa rahitā
sā eva cit pariṇāma vikāra ādi śabdaiḥ vibudhyate vijñāyate

original: śabdasyārthabodhaṃ prati kāraṇatvaṃ suprasiddham eveti nāyastam /
analyzed: śabdasya artha bodham prati kāraṇa tvam su prasiddham evā iti na āyastam
nanu svarūpāt abhinna tve katham pariṇāma ādi śabda vācyatvam

original: yathā toyaṃ svarūpād abhinnam api taraṅgatām āsādya toyapariṇāmaśabdena tadvikāraśabdena ca kathyate tatheyam apīti na virodhaḥ //
analyzed: yathā toyam sva rūpāt abhinnam api taraṅga tām āsādya toya pariṇāma śabdena tad vikāra śabdena ca kathyate tathā iyam api iti na virodhaḥ
sā eva cit pariṇāma vikāra ādi śabdaiḥ
avicchinna vilāsa ātma svatas yat svadanam citaḥ

original: acetyasya prakāśasya jagad ity eva tat sthitam // MU_3,14.42
analyzed: acetyasya prakāśasya jagat iti eva tat sthitam
acetyasya prakāśasya cetya lepa rahita prakāśa rūpāyāḥ citaḥ
yat svadanam sva śakti āsvādaḥ bhavati

original: tat svadanaṃ jagad ity eva jagatsvarūpeṇa /
analyzed: tat svadanam jagat iti eva jagat svarūpeṇa

original: ākāśād api sūkṣmaiṣā yā śaktir vitatā citaḥ /
analyzed: ākāśāt api sūkṣmā eṣā yā śaktiḥ vitatā citaḥ

original: sā svabhāvata evainām ahantāṃ paripaśyati // MU_3,14.43
analyzed: sā svabhāvataḥ eva enām ahantām paripaśyati
yā eṣā ākāśāt api sūkṣmā a paricchedyā
ātmani ātma ātmanā eva asyāḥ yat prasphurati vārivat

original: jagadantam ahantāṇuṃ tad evāsau prapaśyati // MU_3,14.44
analyzed: jagat antam ahanta aṇum tat eva asau prapaśyati
ātmani sphurat tā ākhye svarūpe sva svarūpe
tat eva sphuraṇam eva asau cit
ahantā aṇum prapaśyati parimita ahantā rūpa tayā parāmṛśati
tat eva parimita ahantā rūpa tayā tat
camatkāra karī cāru yat camatkurute citiḥ

original: iyaṃ svātmani tasyaiva jagannāma kṛtaṃ tatam // MU_3,14.45
analyzed: iyam sva ātmani tasya eva jagat nāma kṛtam tatam

original: citaś cittvam ahaṅkāraḥ saiva rāghava kalpanā /
analyzed: citaḥ cit tvam ahaṅkāraḥ sā eva rāghava kalpanā

original: tanmātrādi cid evāto dvitvaikatve kva saṃsthite // MU_3,14.46
analyzed: tanmātra ādi cit eva atas dvitva ekatve kva saṃsthite
ahaṅkāra tayā cit tvasya eva pariṇāmāt iti arthaḥ
atas tanmātra ādi ahaṅkāra utpannam tanmātra ādikam
ekatvam katham na asti iti ced
mā evam sva pratipakṣam dvitvam vinā ekatvasya api asiddheḥ

original: evaṃ cidekamayatvaṃ sarvasya prasādhya bhedatyāgaṃ śiṣyaṃ prati anuṣṭheyatvena vidadhāti
analyzed: evam cit eka maya tvam sarvasya prasādhya bheda tyāgam śiṣyam prati anuṣṭheya tvena vidadhāti

original: jīvahetāv asantyāge tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti santyaja /
analyzed: jīva hetau a sat tyāge tvam ca aham ca iti santyaja

original: śeṣaṃ sadasator madhye bhavetyarthātmako bhavet // MU_3,14.47
analyzed: śeṣam sat asatoḥ madhye bhava iti artha ātmakaḥ bhavet
iti śabda ākṣipta guru upadeśa vākya artha ātmakaḥ

original: itiśabdākṣiptaṃ gurūpadeśam āha tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti tyaja /
analyzed: iti śabda ākṣiptam guru upadeśam āha tvam ca aham ca iti tyaja
yena jīvatā dūre gacchati iti bhāvaḥ
sat asatoḥ madhye sthitam sattva asattvābhyām anirvacana arham

original: śeṣaṃ sarvaprapañcabādhe 'pi sākṣitayā śuddhaṃ cinmātraṃ / bhava //
analyzed: śeṣam sarva prapañca bādhe sākṣi tayā śuddham cit mātram bhava

original: tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti tyaja ] [tvaṃ cāhaṃ(?)] ceti (MT_3,14.47)
analyzed: tvam ca aham ca iti tyaja tvam ca aham ca iti

original: evaṃ śiṣyaṃ prati abhedaṃ vidheyatvenoktvā tatkṛpayā punar apy abhedam eva kathayati
analyzed: evam śiṣyam prati abhedam vidheya tvena uktvā tad kṛpayā punar api abhedam eva kathayati

original: citā yathādau kalitā svasattā sā tathoditā /
analyzed: citā yathā ādau kalitā sva sattā sā tathā uditā

original: abhinnā dṛśyate vyomnaḥ sattāsatte 'tha vedmy aham // MU_3,14.48
analyzed: abhinnā dṛśyate vyomnaḥ sattā asatte vedmi aham
sva sattā sphurāmi iti rūpā nijā sattā
tathā tena rūpeṇa uditā prādurbhūtā satī
aham iti anena sattā sāmānya pramātā kathitaḥ
atha aham satta asatte vedmi jānāmi
na tu tathā asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: citkhaṃ khaṃ jagadīhāḥ khaṃ kham abdhivibudhācalāḥ /
analyzed: cit kham kham jagat īhāḥ kham kham abdhi vibudha acalāḥ
kha ākāra cit camatkāra rūpa tvāt na anyat asti hi

original: citkhaṃ ] Zu komponieren aufgrund von Bhāskaras Deutung von
analyzed: cit kham  zu komponieren aufgrund von bhāskaras deutung von
jagatām hita ahita prāpti parihāra arthāḥ ceṣṭāḥ
abdhiḥ ca vibudhāḥ ca acalāḥ ca
atra hetu tvena uttara ardham āha kha ākāra iti
tasmāt kha ākāra cit camatkāra rūpa tvāt

original: yataḥ sarvaṃ kharūpaṃ ciccamatkāramātrarūpaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ //
analyzed: yatas sarvam kha rūpam cit camatkāra mātra rūpam bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: yo yadvilāsas tasmāt sa na kadācana bhidyate /
analyzed: yaḥ yad vilāsaḥ tasmāt sa na kadācana bhidyate

original: api sāvayavāt tattvāt kaivānavayave kathā // MU_3,14.50
analyzed: api sa avayavāt tattvāt kā eva anavayave kathā
yaḥ yad vilāsaḥ yasya sphuraṇam bhavati

original: saḥ sāvayavāt tattvād api tasmāt kadā na jātu na /
analyzed: saḥ sa avayavāt tattvāt api tasmāt kadā na jātu na

original: na hi kaścit taraṅgaṃ toyāt bhinnaṃ vadatīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi kaścid taraṅgam toyāt bhinnam vadati iti bhāvaḥ
svapne pi tat vācyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu citaḥ jagadrūpatve 'pi tadgrāhiṇyā anyasyāś citaḥ sadbhāvāt nābhedamayatety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu citaḥ jagat rūpa tve pi tad grāhiṇyāḥ anyasyāḥ citaḥ sadbhāvāt na abheda maya tā iti atra āha

original: citer nityam acetyāyāś cin nāsty avitatākṛteḥ /
analyzed: citeḥ nityam acetyāyāḥ cit na asti avitata ākṛteḥ

original: yad rūpaṃ jagato rūpaṃ tattatsphuraṇarūpiṇaḥ // MU_3,14.51
analyzed: yat rūpam jagataḥ rūpam tad tad sphuraṇa rūpiṇaḥ
na asti cit rūpa tva hāneḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: sūkṣmatayāvitatā kutrāpi na sthitākṛtiḥ rūpaṃ yasyāḥ /
analyzed: sūkṣma tayā avitatā kutra api na sthitā ākṛtiḥ rūpam yasyāḥ
sphurāmi iti rūpeṇa yukta tvāt iti

original: mukhyataḥ cititvaṃ hi sphurāmīty asya grāhikāyāḥ citer eva /
analyzed: mukhyatas citi tvam hi sphurāmi iti asya grāhikāyāḥ citeḥ eva

original: grāhyarūpāyās tu gauṇaṃ cititvaṃ bhavad api na jagattvaṃ vyabhicarati /
analyzed: grāhya rūpāyāḥ tu gauṇam citi tvam bhavat api na jagat tvam vyabhicarati

original: yat kiñcic cetyatām āyāti tat sarvaṃ jagad evety arthaḥ //
analyzed: yat kiñcid cetyatām āyāti tat sarvam jagat eva iti arthaḥ

original: mano buddhir ahaṅkāro bhūtāni girayo diśaḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ bhūtāni girayaḥ diśaḥ

original: iti paryāyaracanā citas tattvāj jagatsthiteḥ // MU_3,14.52
analyzed: iti paryāya racanā citaḥ tattvāt jagat sthiteḥ
manaḥ buddhiḥ ityādi rūpeṇa uktā śabda santatiḥ
jagat sthiteḥ manaḥ buddhi ādi rūpāyāḥ jagat sthiteḥ
sarve śabdāḥ cit vācakāḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: citaś cittvaṃ jagad viddhi nājagac cittvam asti hi /
analyzed: citaḥ cit tvam jagat viddhi na ajagat cit tvam asti hi

original: ajagattvād acic cit syād bhāvābhedāj jagat kutaḥ // MU_3,14.53
analyzed: a jagat tvāt acit cit syāt bhāva abhedāt jagat kutas
citaḥ sambandhi cit tvam cit bhāvam

original: yena sā cid iti nāmayogyā bhavati sa ko 'pi dharmaḥ /
analyzed: yena sā cit iti nāma yogyā bhavati sa kaḥ pi dharmaḥ
cetya rūpa jagat abhāve nirvācyāyāḥ citaḥ sphuṭam cit tva ayogya tvāt
acit syāt cit nāma yogyā na syāt

original: yadi jagan na syād anirvācyāyāḥ citer api cittvaṃ na syād
analyzed: yadi jagat na syāt anirvācyāyāḥ citeḥ api cit tvam na syāt

original: iti bhāvaḥ / paramaṃ phalitam āha bhāvābhedād iti /
analyzed: iti bhāvaḥ paramam phalitam āha bhāva abhedāt iti

original: bhāvābhedāt pūrvanyāyasiddhena cijjagator abhedena siddhāt padārthābhedāt /
analyzed: bhāva abhedāt pūrva nyāya siddhena cit jagatoḥ abhedena siddhāt padārtha abhedāt

original: cittvajagator abhede sati cittvasya cidekamayatayā cita eva sarvathā
analyzed: cit tva jagatoḥ abhede sati cit tvasya cit eka maya tayā citaḥ eva sarvathā
sthita tvāt jagant na asti iti bhāvaḥ
citeḥ marica bījasya nijāḥ yā antaḥ camatkṛtiḥ

original: saivaiṣā jīvatanmātramātraṃ jagad iti sthitā // MU_3,14.54
analyzed: sā eva eṣā jīva tanmātra mātram jagat iti sthitā

original: yā camatkṛtiḥ arthāt tīkṣṇatāsthānīyaḥ svaśaktyāsvādākhyaḥ camatkāraḥ /
analyzed: yā camatkṛtiḥ arthāt tīkṣṇa tā sthānīyaḥ sva śakti āsvāda ākhyaḥ camatkāraḥ
sā eva eṣā jagat iti jagat rūpeṇa
jīva tanmātra mātram kevalam jīva pañca tanmātra svarūpam

original: jagadrūpeṇa ] saiv⟨e⟩[ai]ṣā jagad iti jagadrūpeṇa ⟨saiveṣā jagad iti jagadrūpeṇa⟩ (MT_3,14.54)
analyzed: jagat rūpeṇa sā eva īṃ eṣā jagat iti jagat rūpeṇa sā eva eṣā jagat iti jagat rūpeṇa
cit tvāt sva śakti kacanam yat ahambhāvanam citeḥ

original: jīvaḥ spandātmakarmātmā bhaviṣyadabhidho hy asau // MU_3,14.55
analyzed: jīvaḥ spanda ātma karma ātmā bhaviṣyat abhidhaḥ hi asau
citeḥ sva śakti kacanam sva śakti sphuraṇa rūpam
cit tvāt cit bhāva ākhyāt hetoḥ
yat cit cit tvena kalanam su sampādya abhidhā artha diś

original: vyavacchedavikārais tad bhidyate 'to na vidyate // MU_3,14.56
analyzed: vyavaccheda vikāraiḥ tat bhidyate na vidyate
c it ārṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhī lopaḥ c itaḥ

original: susampādyā sukhena sampādayituṃ śakyābhidhārthadik nāmārthaleśaḥ yena /
analyzed: su sampādyā sukhena sampādayitum śakyā abhidhā artha diś nāma artha leśaḥ yena

original: paricchinnasyaiva hi vastunaḥ nāma tadvācyatvaṃ ca kartuṃ śakyaṃ /
analyzed: paricchinnasya eva hi vastunaḥ nāma tad vācya tvam ca kartum śakyam
tat bhidyate citaḥ bhinna tvena sthīyate
cit tva abhāve ca jagataḥ bhāvaḥ tad abhāve

original: ca śuddhasya cinmātrasyaiva sāmrājyam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: ca śuddhasya cit mātrasya eva sāmrājyam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu bhavatu cit eka maya tvam sarvasya
tad aṃśa bhūtayoḥ kartṛ karmaṇoḥ tu parasparam
cit spanda rūpiṇoḥ asti na bhedaḥ kartṛ karmaṇoḥ

original: spandamātraṃ bhavet karma sa eva puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // MU_3,14.57
analyzed: spanda mātram bhavet karma saḥ eva puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
cit spanda rūpiṇoḥ cit sphūrti ākhya rūpa yuktayoḥ
bahis spandasya eva karma tva darśanāt

original: antaḥ vicāryamāṇaṃ jñānaṃ vinā na kiñcil labhyate /
analyzed: antar vicāryamāṇam jñānam vinā na kiñcid labhyate
ghaṭa paṭa ādiḥ ca bahis bhūtaḥ

original: saha ko 'pi sambandho nāstīti śuddhaṃ jñānaṃ śiṣṭaṃ /
analyzed: saha kaḥ pi sambandhaḥ na asti iti śuddham jñānam śiṣṭam

original: sa eva ca citaḥ sphuraṇākhyaḥ spandaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva ca citaḥ sphuraṇa ākhyaḥ spandaḥ
bahis sthitasya śarīra calana ādi rūpasya
antar anyasya anupalambhāt bahis śarīrasya mṛd piṇḍa rūpasya
puruṣa tva ayogāt iti siddham karmaṇaḥ puruṣa tvam
sarvasya jīva ādeḥ vargasya eka tvam sādhayati

original: jīvaś cittve parispandaḥ puṃsāṃ cittaṃ sa eva ca /
analyzed: jīvaḥ cit tve parispandaḥ puṃsām cittam saḥ eva ca

original: manas tv indriyarūpaṃ san nānānānaiva gacchati // MU_3,14.58
analyzed: manaḥ tu indriya rūpam sat nānā nānā eva gacchati

original: puṃsāṃ sa eva karmāparaparyāyaṃ cittaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: puṃsām saḥ eva karma apara paryāyam cittam bhavati
cit spanda tva vyatiriktasya jīvasya cittasya vā abhāvāt
manaḥ eva cit spanda rūpam cittam
tat cittam api vikalpa ātmakam tathā eva
tat eva ca cittam indriya rūpeṇa

original: tataś ca svapariṇāmabhūtendriyadvāreṇa bahir nirgatya rūpādipañcakasvarūpaviṣayarūpatām
analyzed: tatas ca sva pariṇāma bhūta indriya dvāreṇa bahis nirgatya rūpa ādi pañcaka svarūpa viṣaya rūpa tām
āpadyate tatas ca tad ādhāra bhūta pañcaka tām āsādyate
tatas ca tad kārya bhāvena pariṇamate
iti cit spandaḥ eva sthūla sūkṣma bhāva rūpeṇa sthitaḥ
sa ca cit avyatiriktaḥ iti sarvam
śānta aśeṣa viśeṣam hi cit prakāśa chaṭā jagat

original: kāryakāraṇakāditvaṃ tasmād anyan na vidyate // MU_3,14.59
analyzed: kārya kāraṇaka ādi tvam tasmāt anyat na vidyate

original: 'śeṣaṃ samastaṃ jagat citprakāśacchaṭā citprakāśe siddhapadārthapaṅktimayatvāt citprakāśapaṅktiḥ /
analyzed: śeṣam samastam jagat cit prakāśa chaṭā cit prakāśe siddha padārtha paṅkti maya tvāt cit prakāśa paṅktiḥ
cit prakāśa cha ṭā tva anapāyāt
acchedyaḥ ham a dāhyaḥ yam a kledyaḥ śoṣyaḥ eva ca

original: nityaḥ satatagaḥ sthāṇur acalo 'ham iti sthitam // MU_3,14.60
analyzed: nityaḥ satata gaḥ sthāṇuḥ acalaḥ ham iti sthitam

original: sarvasya jīvāder jagataḥ citprakāśamayatve sati iti sthitam bhavati /
analyzed: sarvasya jīva ādeḥ jagataḥ cit prakāśa maya tve sati iti sthitam bhavati

original: ayaṃ niścaya eva pratiṣṭhito bhavati iti /
analyzed: ayam niścaye eva pratiṣṭhitaḥ bhavati iti
acchedyaḥ aśarīra vat cheda yogyaḥ na asmi

original: evam adāhyo 'yam ity ādāv api sambandhanīyam /
analyzed: evam a dāhyaḥ yam iti ādau api sambandhanīyam

original: nityatve viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetum āha satataga iti /
analyzed: nitya tve viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa hetum āha satata gaḥ iti
atra api hetum viśeṣaṇa tvena āha acalaḥ iti

original: nanu cidekamayatve sati vādinaḥ kimarthaṃ vivadanti ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu cit eka maya tve sati vādinaḥ kimartham vivadanti iti atra āha

original: vivadante yathā hy atra vivadante tathā bhramaiḥ /
analyzed: vivadante yathā hi atra vivadante tathā bhramaiḥ

original: bhramanto na vayaṃ tv ete jātā vigatavibhramāḥ // MU_3,14.61
analyzed: bhramantaḥ na vayam tu ete jātāḥ vigata vibhramāḥ
sāṅkhyāḥ udāsīnam jñāna rūpam api paramāṇu rūpam
evam anye pi anyat kiñcid yadi

original: api ete 'dhikārikṛpayaiva vivadante tathāpi adhikāriṇāṃ tattatpadaniṣṭhānām adhaḥsthaṃ
analyzed: api ete dhikāri kṛpayā eva vivadante tathā api adhikāriṇām tat tat pada niṣṭhānām adhas stham
padam parityajya ūrdhva pada gamana artham vādinām bhramaḥ uktaḥ

original: vivadante tarhi yūyaṃ kathaṃ sthitāḥ ity /
analyzed: vivadante tarhi yūyam katham sthitāḥ iti
ete vayam vigata bhramāḥ vādi ukta nānā guṇa uttīrṇa śuddha cit mātra aṅgīkārāt dūrībhūta mithyājñānāḥ

original: nanu śrīvasiṣṭhena tanmatanirāsapareṇa vivāda eva kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: nanu śrī vasiṣṭhena tad mata nirāsa pareṇa vivādaḥ eva kṛtaḥ
cit mātra aṅgīkāreṇa eva sarva mata aṅgīkārāt
cit mātram hi sarve ṅgīkurvanti eva
punar api cit eka maya tvam eva kathayati
dṛśye mūrte jña saṃrūḍhe vikāra ādi pṛthak bhavet
na amūrte tad jñaka cite cit khe sat asat ātmani
dṛśye dṛśi kriyā viṣaye bhāva jāte
sthūlasya dṛśyasya vikāra ādi dharma adhikaraṇa tve yogyatā asti iti bhāvaḥ
sat asat ātmani sat asat svarūpe

original: vikārādi yadi sat tadāpi tanmayam eva /
analyzed: vikāra ādi yadi sat tadā api tad mayam eva
yadi asat tadā api tathā eva iti
tanoti ākāśa viśadāḥ cit madhu śrīḥ sva mañjarīḥ
kāla ādi nāmikāḥ kāla deśa ādi nāma yuktāḥ
yuktam ca vasanta lakṣmyāḥ rasena mañjarī tananam
cit tattvam cit mātra rūpiṇyaḥ eva
na tu bhāsamāna sthūla rūpa yuktāḥ
svabhāvena cit mātrasya cetya rūpa tayā sphuraṇam kathayati
svayam vicitram sphurati cit kañcukam anāhatam

original: svayaṃ vicitraṃ kacati cidratnam apakāraṇam // MU_3,14.64
analyzed: svayam vicitram kacati cit ratnam apakāraṇam

original: vicitraṃ sphurati citrapaṭavat vicitratāyuktaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ /
analyzed: vicitram sphurati citra paṭa vat vicitra tā yuktam bhavati iti arthaḥ
vicitra tā ca artha cetya kṛtā jñeyā
tathā cit ratnam svayam vicitram kacati

original: svayam ity asyārthaṃ svayam evāhāpakāraṇaṃ iti // (MT_3,14.64)
analyzed: svayam iti asya artham svayam eva āha apakāraṇam iti
svayam vilakṣaṇa spandaḥ cit vāyuḥ ajaḍa ātmakaḥ

original: svayaṃ vicitravalanaṃ cidvāri na nikhātagam // MU_3,14.65
analyzed: svayam vicitra valanam cit vāri na nikhāta gam
vilakṣaṇa spandaḥ bāhya vāyoḥ vyatirikta spanda yuktaḥ

original: atra hetutvena viśeṣaṇam āha ajaḍātmaka iti /
analyzed: atra hetu tvena viśeṣaṇam āha ajaḍa ātmakaḥ iti

original: jaḍājaḍayoḥ spando 'vaśyaṃ vilakṣaṇa eva syād iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: jaḍa ajaḍayoḥ spandaḥ vaśyam vilakṣaṇaḥ eva syāt iti bhāvaḥ
cit vāri tu nikhāta gam sat
svayam vicitra dhātu uccais cit śṛṅgam apanirmitam
svayam citra rasa ullāsā cit jyotsnā satata uditā
vicitra dhātu uccaiḥ tuḥ ca i t uccaiḥ
uccais cit śṛṅgam apanirmitam nirmāṇa rahitam
śṛṅgam api vicitra dhātu vicitra gairika ādi dhātu yuktam bhavati
svayam cit jyotsnā citra rasa ullāsā nānāvidha cetya rasa ullāsa yuktā
kim tu śukla pakṣe eva uditā
svayam sadā eva prakaṭaḥ cit ālokaḥ mala ātmakaḥ

original: svayam astaṅgatevājñe jñe jñānād uditā citiḥ // MU_3,14.67
analyzed: svayam a staṅgata iva a jñe jñe jñānāt uditā citiḥ
ālokasya prakaṭa tā guṇa yukta tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: astaṅgatatvaṃ ca asyāḥ sthitāyāḥ api jñānāviṣayībhāva evāta ivaśabdopādānam /
analyzed: ca asyāḥ sthitāyāḥ api jñāna aviṣayībhāvaḥ eva atas iva śabda upādānam

original: yathākāśe jvalann api sūryo 'ndhaṃ praty anuditaḥ /
analyzed: yathā ākāśe jvalan api sūryaḥ ndham prati an uditaḥ
tu uditaḥ evam iyam api iti bhāvaḥ

original: svayaṃ jaḍeṣu jāḍyena padaṃ sauṣuptam āgatā /
analyzed: svayam jaḍeṣu jāḍyena padam sauṣuptam āgatā

original: svayaṃ spandi tathāspandi cittvāc citimahānabhaḥ // MU_3,14.68
analyzed: svayam spandi tathā aspandi cit tvāt citi mahā nabhaḥ
svayam spandi sphurat tā yuktam bhavati
tathā tena prakāreṇa aspandi śānta tā yuktaḥ bhavati
bāhya ākāśasya tu vāta rūpeṇa sa spanda tvam sva rūpeṇa aspanda tvam

original: guṇini guṇavat citi jagataḥ sadasattvaṃ kathayati
analyzed: guṇini guṇavat citi jagataḥ sat asat tvam kathayati

original: citprakāśaprakāśo hi jagad asti ca nāsti ca /
analyzed: cit prakāśa prakāśaḥ hi jagat asti ca na asti ca

original: cidākāśaikaśūnyatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca // MU_3,14.69
analyzed: cit ākāśa eka śūnyatvam jagat asti ca na asti ca
jagat asti ca na asti ca
cakāraḥ svayam astitva nāstitvayoḥ sama pradhāna tvam dyotayati

original: guṇini ālokākhyo guṇaḥ bhedena bhāsamānatvāt asti /
analyzed: guṇini āloka ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ bhedena bhāsamāna tvāt asti

original: nāsti / tathā jagad api cidākhye ādhārabhūte guṇini bhāsamānatvād asti /
analyzed: na asti tathā jagat api cit ākhye ādhāra bhūte guṇini bhāsamāna tvāt asti
tad vyatirekeṇa labdhum aśakya tvāt na asti iti

original: cidālokamahārūpaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca /
analyzed: cit āloka mahā rūpam jagat asti ca na asti ca

original: cinmārutaghanaspando jagad asti ca nāsti ca // MU_3,14.70
analyzed: cit māruta ghana spandaḥ jagat asti ca na asti ca
spandasya ca vāyu guṇa tvam prasiddham eva

original: cidghanadhvāntakṛṣṇatvaṃ jagad asti ca nāsti ca /
analyzed: cit ghana dhvānta kṛṣṇa tvam jagat asti ca na asti ca

original: cidarkālokadivaso jagad asti ca nāsti ca // MU_3,14.71
analyzed: cit arka āloka divasaḥ jagat asti ca na asti ca
divasasya arka āloka anuvidhāyi tvāt tad guṇa tvam

original: pūrvoktaṃ dṛḍhayituṃ sarvathā cidguṇatvam eva jagataḥ kathayati
analyzed: pūrva uktam dṛḍhayitum sarvathā cit guṇa tvam eva jagataḥ kathayati
cit eva kajjala rajaḥ śailaḥ añjana adriḥ
jagat cit śaila jaṭharam cit jala drava tā jagat
jagat cit ikṣu mādhuryam cit kṣīra snigdha tā jagat

original: jagat cicchailasya jaṭharam antaḥsthaḥ sārarūpaḥ bhāgaḥ /
analyzed: jagat cit śailasya jaṭharam antaḥsthaḥ sāra rūpaḥ bhāgaḥ
jagat cit hima śīta tvam cit jvālā jvalanam jagat

original: jagac citsarpiṣi sneho vīciś citsarito jagat // MU_3,14.74
analyzed: jagat cit sarpiṣi snehaḥ vīciḥ cit saritaḥ jagat
vīceḥ racanā rūpa tvāt jala guṇa tvam
jagat cit kṣaudra mādhuryam jagat cit kanaka aṅgadam
jagat cit puṣpa saugandhyam cit latā agra phalam jagat
phalasya latā guṇa tvam tad āśrita tvena upacārāt
cit sattā eva jagat sattā jagat sattā eva cit vapuḥ

original: atra bhedavikārādi na khe malam iva sthitam // MU_3,14.76
analyzed: atra bheda vikāra ādi na khe malam iva sthitam
atas cit sattā eva jagat sattā bhavati
jagat sattā eva cit vapuḥ bhavati

original: na hi guṇasattā guṇino bhinnā guṇisattā ca guṇād bhinnā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: na hi guṇa sattā guṇinaḥ bhinnā guṇi sattā ca guṇāt bhinnā bhavati iti bhāvaḥ
jagataḥ sat asat maya tām upasaṃharati
iti idam sat maya tvena sat asat bhuvanatrayam

original: avikalpyatadātmatvāt sattāsatte tad eva vā // MU_3,14.77
analyzed: a vikalpya tad ātma tvāt sattā satte tat eva vā
sat maya tvena sat svarūpa cit vikāra tvena

original: mūlakāraṇāyāḥ citaḥ sadasadasattve sattāsattādhāratvakṛtaṃ bhedam āśaṅkyāha
analyzed: mūla kāraṇāyāḥ citaḥ sat asat asat tve sattā asattā ādhāra tva kṛtam bhedam āśaṅkya āha
sat asat iti pada dvayam asti nāsti kriyā kartāram kathayati
tathā ca kartṛ karma vikalpaḥ durnivāraḥ

original: sattāsatte tu śuddhanirālambāstināstikriyāvācake 'vikalpyaṃ citsvarūpam eva kathayataḥ /
analyzed: sattā asatte tu śuddha nirālamba astināsti kriyā vācake vikalpyam cit svarūpam eva kathayataḥ
eva yuktam na sat asat tvam iti
śuddha nirālamba asti nāsti kriyā vācake
nanu jagat brahmaṇoḥ avayava avayavi bhāvaḥ stu iti atra āha
avayava avayavi tā śabda arthau śaśa śṛṅga vat

original: anubhūtyapalāpāya kalpitau yair dhig astu tān // MU_3,14.78
analyzed: anubhūti apalāpāya kalpitau yaiḥ dhik astu tān
anubhūti apalāpāya jagat cit aikya ākhyam anubhavam apalapitum
avayava avayavi tā śabdaḥ avayava avayavi bhāva ākhyaḥ śabdaḥ
tau avayava avayavi tā śabda arthau

original: yathā kaścid bahir asad api śaśaśṛṅgaṃ kalpayati /
analyzed: yathā kaścid bahis asat api śaśa śṛṅgam kalpayati

original: tān dhig astu te dhikkāraviṣayā evety arthaḥ /
analyzed: tān dhik astu te dhikkāra viṣayāḥ eva iti arthaḥ
dhikkāra viṣaya tvam ca teṣām avayava abhinnasya avayavinaḥ

original: na hy avayavabhinno 'vayavī nāma kaścid astīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_3,14.78)
analyzed: na hi avayava bhinnaḥ vayavī nāma kaścid asti iti bhāvaḥ
na vidyate jagat yatra sa adri dyūrvī nadī īśvaram

original: cidekatvāt prasaṅgaḥ syāt kas tatretaravibhrame // MU_3,14.79
analyzed: cit eka tvāt prasaṅgaḥ syāt kaḥ tatra itara vibhrame
yatra yasmin cit rūpa ākhye sthāne
sa adri dyūrvī nadī īśvaram parvata ākāśa bhūmi samudra sahitam
tatra itara vibhrame ṣaṣṭhī arthe saptamī
citaḥ sarva maya tvam śilā dṛṣṭāntena kathayati
śilā hṛdaya pīnā api su ākāśa viśadā eva cit

original: dhatte 'ntar akhilaṃ śāntaṃ sanniveṣaṃ yathā śilā // MU_3,14.80
analyzed: dhatte ntar akhilam śāntam sat niveṣam yathā śilā
cit śāntam paramārthataḥ bhāva abhāva ādi kṣobha rahitam
sanniveśam ca iti ākhyam racanā viśeṣam
prakāśa ākhya sāra bharita tvena śilā hṛdaya vat pīnā api satī

original: śilā yathā sāreṇa pūritāpi lekhaughākhyaṃ sanniveśaṃ antar dhatte /
analyzed: śilā yathā sāreṇa pūritā api lekha ogha ākhyam sanniveśam antar dhatte

original: nanu tathāpy ahaṃ praṣṭā bhinna evāsmy /
analyzed: nanu tathā api aham praṣṭā bhinnaḥ evā asmi
anyathā praśna ayogāt iti atra āha
padārtha nikara ākāśe tvam ākāśa lava upamaḥ
tvattā matta ātmatā tvattā matta ullekhāḥ na santi te
saḥ eva na kiñcid rūpa tvena avakāśaḥ
tvattā matta ātmatā tvattā matta ullekhāḥ
tvad tā matta ātma tayā tvad bhāva mad bhāva rūpa tvena
tvad tā matta ullekhāḥ tvad bhāva mad bhāva vikalpāḥ
tvad bhāva rūpa tvena sthitāḥ tvattā vikalpāḥ
mad bhāva rūpa tvena sthitāḥ matta a vikalpāḥ
pallava dṛṣṭāntena prakṛtam citaḥ sarva maya tvam kathayati
pallava antara lekhā ogha sanniveśa vat ātatam

original: anyānanyātmakam idaṃ dhatte 'ntaś cit svabhāvataḥ // MU_3,14.82
analyzed: anya an anya ātmakam idam dhatte cit svabhāvataḥ
nanu kayā api prayojana apekṣayā kathaṃbhūtam
lekhā ogha sanniveśaḥ iva pallava antara lekhā ogha sanniveśa vat

original: pallave lekhaughasya ca bhāsamānatvena bhinnatvaṃ pṛthakkṛtya labdhum aśakyatvād
analyzed: pallave lekha oghasya ca bhāsamāna tvena bhinna tvam pṛthakkṛtya labdhum aśakya tvāt

original: abhinnatvaṃ ca sphuṭam sthitam evety upamānam //
analyzed: abhinna tvam ca sphuṭam sthitam eva iti upamānam
samasta kāraṇa oghānām kāraṇa ādi pitāmaham
svabhāvataḥ sva rūpeṇa anubhūtitaḥ sva anubhavena
na tu mad kathana mātreṇa akāraṇa ātma akāraṇaḥ
kāraṇa rahitaḥ ātmā sva rūpam yasya
kāraṇa nāmnā ādi bhūtaḥ yaḥ pitāmahaḥ
ahaṅkāraḥ tad kāraṇam cit tvam iti

original: nanu jagadvat cid api asatyaiva bhavatv ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu jagadvat cit api asatyā eva bhavatu iti atra āha

original: na cāsattvam acetyāyāś cito vācāpi sidhyati /
analyzed: na ca asattvam acetyāyāḥ citaḥ vācā api sidhyati

original: yad asti tad udetīti dṛṣṭaṃ bījād ivāṅkuram // MU_3,14.84
analyzed: yat asti tat udeti iti dṛṣṭam bījāt iva aṅkuram

original: citaḥ asattvaṃ vācāpi na sidhyati vaktum apīdaṃ na yogyam ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: citaḥ asattvam vācā api na sidhyati vaktum api idam na yogyam iti arthaḥ
atra hetu tvena uttara ardham āha yat iti

original: yataḥ yad asti tad udeti anyatayā prādurbhavati /
analyzed: yatas yat asti tat udeti anya tayā prādurbhavati

original: yathā bījabhāvena sthitam aṅkuraṃ bījāt udeti /
analyzed: yathā bīja bhāvena sthitam aṅkuram bījāt udeti
tathā cit mātra svarūpeṇa sthitam cetyam api
cit mātrasya asatya tvam na yuktam iti
sarga anta ślokena pūrva uktam saṅgṛhṇāti

original: gaganam iva suśūnyabhedam asti tribhuvanam aṅga mahācito 'ntar asyāḥ /
analyzed: gaganam iva su śūnya bhedam asti tribhuvanam aṅga mahā citaḥ ntar asyāḥ

original: paramapadamayaṃ samastadṛśyaṃ tv idam iti niścayavān bhavānubhūteḥ // MU_3,14.85
analyzed: parama pada mayam samasta dṛśyam tu idam iti niścayavān bhava anubhūteḥ

original: he aṅga / tribhuvanaṃ asyāḥ mahācitaḥ cinmātrasyāntaḥ madhye /
analyzed: he aṅga tribhuvanam asyāḥ mahā citaḥ cit mātrasya antar madhye
su śūnyaḥ atiśayena na kiñcid rūpaḥ
sarvathā svarūpa bheda rahitam iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ tvaṃ iti niścayavān evaṃ niścayayukto /
analyzed: atas tvam iti niścayavān evam niścaya yuktaḥ

original: na tu maduktyā kṛtena śraddhāmātreṇa iti /
analyzed: na tu mad uktyā kṛtena śraddhā mātreṇa iti
samasta dṛśyam parama pada mayam sarva uttīrṇa cit svarūpam eva bhavati

original: śrīvālmīkir bharadvājaṃ prati tatratyaṃ sargāntaślokena dināvasānaṃ kathayati
analyzed: śrī vālmīkiḥ bharadvājam prati tatratyam sarga anta ślokena dina avasānam kathayati

original: ity uktavaty atha munau divaso jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye 'stam ino jagāma /
analyzed: iti uktavati atha munau divasaḥ jagāma sāyantanāya vidhaye stam inaḥ jagāma

original: snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikaraiś ca sahājagāma // MU_3,14.86
analyzed: snātum sabhā kṛta namaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmā kṣaye ravi karaiḥ ca saha ājagāma
atha pūrva śloka ukta upadeśa anantaram
sāyantana vidhaye sāyantana agnihotra ādi artham
snānam vinā kutra api vidhau adhikāra abhāvāt
sā sabhā śyāmā kṣaye rātri avasāne
śravaṇa artham iti śeṣaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyām utpattiprakaraṇe caturdaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām utpatti prakaraṇe caturdaśaḥ sargaḥ
om śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ pūrva dine kathyamānam upastauti

original: jagad ākāśam evedaṃ yathā hi vyomni mauktikam /
analyzed: jagat ākāśam eva idam yathā hi vyomni mauktikam

original: vimale bhāti khātmaiva jagac cidgagane tathā // MU_3,15.1
analyzed: vimale bhāti kha ātmā eva jagat cit gagane tathā

original: atra hetutvena dṛṣṭāntayuktaṃ vākyam āha yathā hīti /
analyzed: atra hetu tvena dṛṣṭānta yuktam vākyam āha yathā hi iti
kha ātmā eva cit ākāśa svarūpam eva

original: yathā gagane bhramadṛṣṭyā dṛśyamānaṃ mauktikam ākāśam eva tathā cidgagane
analyzed: yathā gagane bhrama dṛṣṭyā dṛśyamānam mauktikam ākāśam eva tathā cit gagane
dṛśyamānam jagat api cidgaganam eva iti
an utkīrṇā eva bhāti iva trijagat sālabhañjikā

original: citstambhe na ca sotkīrṇā na cotkartātra vidyate // MU_3,15.2
analyzed: cit stambhe na ca sā utkīrṇā na ca utkartā atra vidyate
trijagat sālabhañjikā trijagat ākhyā putrikā an utkīrṇā eva satī
paramārthataḥ tu na bhāti iti iva śabda upādānam
nanu kimartham na utkīrṇā asti iti
arha pratyaya arthaḥ tra svayam boddhavyaḥ
na ca atra utkartā utkaraṇa kartā
samudre ntar jala āspandāḥ svabhāvāt acyutāḥ api

original: vidi vedyā bhavantīva pare dṛśyavidas tathā // MU_3,15.3
analyzed: vidi vedyāḥ bhavanti iva pare dṛśya vidaḥ tathā
samudre ntar samudra antar bhāge sthitāḥ

original: svabhāvād acyutā api jalākhyāt svarūpād abhraṣṭā api /
analyzed: svabhāvāt acyutāḥ api jala ākhyāt svarūpāt abhraṣṭāḥ api
paramārthataḥ tu na bhavanti iti iva śabda upādānam

original: jagadbhānaṃ prati sthūlāny aṇuṃ prati yathācalāḥ // MU_3,15.4
analyzed: jagat bhānam prati sthūlāni aṇum prati yathā acalāḥ
jalasya antargatā sūrya ābhā jala antargata sūrya ābhā
tasyāḥ jālaka āracanāni jala antargata sūrya ābhā jālaka āracanāni api

original: svabhāvaś cāyaṃ jalāntargatā sūryābhā jālakarūpā sampadyate /
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ ca ayam jala antargatā sūrya ābhā jālaka rūpā sampadyate

original: tāni jagadbhānaṃ prati tathā sthūlāni bhavanti /
analyzed: tāni jagat bhānam prati tathā sthūlāni bhavanti
jagat bhānam abhā nābham brahmaṇaḥ vyatirekataḥ
jala sūrya aṃśu jālam tu vyatireka anubhūti dam
brahmaṇaḥ avyatirekataḥ brahma rūpa tvāt iti arthaḥ
jala sūrya aṃśu jālam vyatireka anubhūti dam bheda prathā kāri bhavati
atas tra sthūla tvam yuktam iti bhāvaḥ
anubhūtāni api imāni jagati vyoma rūpiṇi

original: pṛthvyādīni na santy eva svapnasaṅkalpayor iva // MU_3,15.6
analyzed: pṛthvī ādīni na santi eva svapna saṅkalpayoḥ iva
vyoma rūpiṇi cit mātra ākāśa svarūpe

original: svapne saṅkalpe ca anubhūtāny api pṛthvyādīni /
analyzed: svapne saṅkalpe ca anubhūtāni api pṛthvī ādīni
piṇḍa grāhaḥ sat iti asmin vijñāna ākāśa rūpiṇi

original: marunadyāṃ jalam iva na sambhavati kutracit // MU_3,15.7
analyzed: maru nadyām jalam iva na sambhavati kutracid
sat iti piṇḍa grāhaḥ sat vyavahāra hetuḥ piṇḍa grāhaḥ
atra dṛṣṭāntam āha maru nadyām iti

original: nanv asatsvarūpe jagati dṛśyatā kathaṃ bhāti ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu asat svarūpe jagati dṛśya tā katham bhāti iti atra āha
jagati a piṇḍa grāhe smin saṅkalpa nagara upame

original: marau sarid ivābhāti dṛśyatā bhrāntirūpiṇī // MU_3,15.8
analyzed: marau sarit iva ābhāti dṛśya tā bhrānti rūpiṇī
saṅkalpa nagara upame saṅkalpa ullikhita nagara sadṛśe
smin jagati dṛśya tā dṛśya bhāvaḥ
bhrama rūpa tvena asat rūpasya jagataḥ svapna vat tulā deśa āpūraṇam kathayati
svapna adriṇā iva jagatā tulā deśau na kaucana

original: pūritau kalanonmuktā dṛśyaśrīr vyoma kevalam // MU_3,15.9
analyzed: pūritau kalanā unmuktā dṛśya śrīḥ vyoma kevalam
svapna adriṇā iva svapna adri vat
jagatā tulā deśau pūritau na bhavataḥ
guru tvasya asat rūpa tvāt tulāpūraṇam
vistārasya asat rūpa tvāt deśa āpūraṇam

original: etac ca svapnādau sarvapratītisiddham eveti tasya dṛṣṭāntatā /
analyzed: etat ca svapna ādau sarva pratīti siddham eva iti tasya dṛṣṭānta tā
varjayitvā ajña vijñāta jagat śabda artha bhāvanām

original: jagadbrahmakhaśabdānām arthe nāsty eva bhinnatā // MU_3,15.10
analyzed: jagat brahma kha śabdānām arthe na asti eva bhinna tā
tām ajña vijñāta jagat śabda artha bhāvanām varjayitvā parityajya
paryāya rūpāḥ eva ete śabdāḥ iti arthaḥ
ajñasya ajñāta tattva tayā jagataḥ ākāśa rūpa tvam

original: na siddham iti jagatsatyatvaniṣṭhāyāḥ tadbhāvanāyāḥ parityāga uktaḥ //
analyzed: na siddham iti jagat satya tva niṣṭhāyāḥ tad bhāvanāyāḥ parityāgaḥ uktaḥ

original: idaṃ tv acetyacinmātrabhānor bhānaṃ nabhaḥ prati /
analyzed: idam tu acetya cit mātra bhānoḥ bhānam nabhaḥ prati

original: tathā sūkṣmaṃ yathā meghaṃ prati saṅkalpavāridaḥ // MU_3,15.11
analyzed: tathā sūkṣmam yathā megham prati saṅkalpa vāridaḥ
tu viśeṣe acetya cit mātra bhānoḥ cetyā dūṣita cit sūryasya
yathā megham prati jāgrat dṛṣṭa megha apekṣayā
saṅkalpa vāridaḥ sva vikalpa ullekhitaḥ meghaḥ sūkṣmaḥ bhavati
yathā svapna puram svaccham jāgrat pura varam prati

original: tathā jagad idaṃ svacchaṃ saṅkalpitajagat prati // MU_3,15.12
analyzed: tathā jagat idam svaccham saṅkalpita jagat prati

original: jāgratpuravaraṃ prati svapnapuraṃ svacchaṃ kevalābhāsarūpatvena sthūlatākhyamalarahitaṃ /
analyzed: jāgrat pura varam prati svapna puram svaccham kevala ābhāsa rūpa tvena sthūla tā ākhya mala rahitam
saṅkalpita jagat prati svaccham saṅkalpa ākhya mala rahita śuddha cit mātra rūpa tvāt nirmalam bhavati

original: svapnapuram api tādṛśam eva tathāpy ajñabodhanārtham evam uktam // (MT_3,15.12)
analyzed: svapna puram api tādṛśam eva tathā api ajña bodhana artham evam uktam
tasmāt acetya cit rūpam jagat vyomā eva kevalam

original: śūnyau vyomajagacchabdau paryāyau viddhi cinmayau // MU_3,15.13
analyzed: śūnyau vyoma jagat śabdau paryāyau viddhi cit mayau
acetya cit rūpam śuddha cit mātra rūpam
atas śūnyau piṇḍa grāha abhāvena na kiñcid rūpau
vyoma jagat śabdau paryāyau viddhi ekārtha vācaka tvāt
vakṣyamāṇa vṛttānta ākāṅkṣayā pūrva uktam upasaṃharati tribhiḥ

original: tasmān na kiñcid utpannaṃ jagadādīha dṛśyakam /
analyzed: tasmāt na kiñcid utpannam jagat ādi iha dṛśyakam
an ākhyam an abhivyaktam yathāsthitam avasthitam
tasmāt cit eka maya tvāt hetoḥ
jagat ādi dṛśyam kiñcid leśena api
atra hetu tvena viśeṣaṇam āha anabhivyaktam indriya agocaram
anya rūpa tvena anabhivyaktasya hi nāma ayuktam

original: jagataḥ syād ity āśaṅkya viśeṣaṇam āhāvasthitam iti /
analyzed: jagataḥ syāt iti āśaṅkya viśeṣaṇam āha avasthitam iti
na tu apūrva tayā iti arthaḥ

original: rajjuḥ tataḥ rajjutayā jñātāpi pūrvavad eva tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: rajjuḥ tatas rajju tayā jñātā api pūrvavat eva tiṣṭhati
na tu anya rūpa tām prāpnoti
jagat eva mahā ākāśam cit ākāśam a bhittimat
tat deśasya aṇu mātrasya tulāyāḥ ca a prapūrakam
mahākāśam bāhya ākāśa apekṣayā mahat tvāt mahākāśa ākhyā yuktam
atas tat cit ākāśa mayam jagat

original: gurutvābhāvena vaipulyābhāvena cāṇumātrasya deśasya tulāyāś cāpūrakam bhavati /
analyzed: guru tva abhāvena vaipulya abhāvena ca aṇu mātrasya deśasya tulāyāḥ ca āpūrakam bhavati

original: vyomni vyomamayaṃ citraṃ saṅkalpapuravat sthitam // MU_3,15.16
analyzed: vyomni vyoma mayam citram saṅkalpa pura vat sthitam
ākāśa rūpam eva na kiñcid rūpam eva
yuktam ca ākāśasya piṇḍa graha rahita tvam
saṅkalpa pura vat saṅkalpa ullikhita pura vat

original: saṅkalpapurasya cākāśamayatvaṃ tulādeśāpūrakatvaṃ ca yuktam eveti
analyzed: saṅkalpa purasya ca ākāśa maya tvam tulā deśāpūraka tvam ca yuktam eva iti

yat ca utpattiḥ pūrvam uktā sā api

original: atha jagataḥ tulādeśādyapūrakatvasādhakaṃ mahāvṛttāntaṃ vṛttāntakāmān prati kṛpayā
analyzed: atha jagataḥ tulā deśa ādya pūraka tva sādhakam mahā vṛttāntam vṛttānta kāmān prati kṛpayā

original: niḥsandeho yathaiṣo 'rthaś citte viśrāntim eṣyati // MU_3,15.17
analyzed: niḥsandehaḥ yathā eṣaḥ rthaḥ citte viśrāntim eṣyati
tvam atra jagataḥ deśa ādya pūraka tve

original: tvarayāviṣṭaḥ śrīrāmaḥ maṇḍapākhyānaṃ prati śrīvasiṣṭhaṃ prārthayati
analyzed: tvarayā āviṣṭaḥ śrī rāmaḥ maṇḍapa ākhyānam prati śrī vasiṣṭham prārthayati

candra tvam asya tad vikāsa kāri tvena

original: yad eva tat satyam anādimadhyaṃ jagat tad eva sthitam ity avehi // MU_4,1.34
analyzed: yat eva tat satyam an ādi madhyam jagat tat eva sthitam iti avehi  /

an ādi madhyam ādi madhyayoḥ api sākṣi tvena

original: vastu asti / tad eva na tu tatkāryam /
analyzed: vastu asti tat eva na tu tad kāryam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ janyajanakanirākaraṇaṃ sthitiprakaraṇe prathamaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām janya janaka nirākaraṇam sthiti prakaraṇe prathamaḥ sargaḥ

analyzed: na syāt sarvajña tvam ca atra sarva kartṛ tāyām viśrāntam

original: na hi yaḥ sarvaṃ na jānāti
analyzed: na hi yaḥ sarvam na jānāti
kulāla ādau ghaṭa ādi jñānasya niyata tvena darśanāt
vicitra varṇa tā yadvat dṛśyate kaṭhina ātape
vicitra śakti tā tadvat deveśe sat asat mayī
vicitra rūpā udeti iyam a vicitrāt sthitiḥ śivāt
eka varṇāt payovāhāt śakra cāpala tā yathā
ajaḍāt jaḍa tā udeti jāḍya bhāvana hetukā

original: ūrṇanābhād yathā tantur yathā puṃsaḥ suṣuptatā // MU_4,11.55
analyzed: ūrṇanābhāt yathā tantuḥ yathā puṃsaḥ suṣupta tā
acittaḥ caitasīm śaktim sva bandhāya icchayā śivaḥ

original: tanoti tāntavaṃ kośaṃ kośakārakrimir yathā // MU_4,11.56
analyzed: tanoti tāntavam kośam kośa kārakrimiḥ yathā
acittaḥ atyanta śuddha tvena citta rahitaḥ
sva icchayā ātmā ātmanaḥ brahman bhāvayitvā svakam vapuḥ

original: saṃsārān mokṣam āyāti svālānād iva vāraṇaḥ // MU_4,11.57
analyzed: saṃsārāt mokṣam āyāti su ālānāt iva vāraṇaḥ
bhāvayitvā sva svarūpa tvena bhāvanā viṣaya tām nītvā
sva icchā śabdaḥ icchā mātra vācakaḥ

original: yad eva bhāvayaty ātmā satatam bhāvitaḥ svayam /
analyzed: yat eva bhāvayati ātmā satatam bhāvitaḥ svayam

original: tayaivāpūryate śaktyā śīghram eva mahān api // MU_4,11.58
analyzed: tayā eva āpūryate śaktyā śīghram eva mahān api

original: bhāvitā śaktir ātmānam ātmatāṃ nayati kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: bhāvitā śaktiḥ ātmānam ātma tām nayati kṣaṇāt

original: anantam api kham prāvṛṇmihikā mahatī yathā // MU_4,11.59
analyzed: anantam api kham prāvṛṇmihikā mahatī yathā

original: yā śaktir uditā śīghraṃ yāti tanmayatām ajaḥ /
analyzed: yā śaktiḥ uditā śīghram yāti tad maya tām ajaḥ

original: yām eva tu sthitiṃ yātas tanmayo bhavati drumaḥ // MU_4,11.60
analyzed: yām eva tu sthitim yātaḥ tad mayaḥ bhavati drumaḥ
ādhāra bhūta bhūmi anurūpa tvena ārohaṇāt

original: na mokṣo mokṣa īśasya na bandho bandha ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: na mokṣaḥ mokṣaḥ īśasya na bandhaḥ bandhaḥ ātmanaḥ

original: bandhamokṣadṛśau loke na jāne protthite kutaḥ // MU_4,11.61
analyzed: bandha mokṣa dṛśau loke na jāne protthite kutas
tarhi bandha mokṣau kasya bhavataḥ iti

original: bandhamokṣayor utthānam eva paramārthato nāstīti kā tadādhāracinteti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: bandha mokṣayoḥ utthānam eva paramārthataḥ nā asti iti kā tad ādhāra cintā iti bhāvaḥ

original: nāsya bandho na mokso ḥsti tanmayaś caiva lakṣyate /
analyzed: na asya bandhaḥ na moksaḥ tad mayaḥ ca eva lakṣyate

original: grastaṃ nityam asatyena māyāmayam aho jagat // MU_4,11.62
analyzed: grastam nityam asatyena māyā mayam aho jagat
kim tu āmukhataḥ tad mayaḥ bandha mokṣa mayaḥ
bandha mokṣa kalanā katham asti iti
jagat śabdena atra jagat gatāḥ pramātāraḥ lakṣyante
asatyena asatya bhūtena bandha mokṣa ākhyena kena api

original: kṛtam / atra hetuṃ viśeṣaṇadvāreṇāha māyāmayam iti /
analyzed: kṛtam atra hetum viśeṣaṇa dvāreṇa āha māyā mayam iti
māyā maya tvāt eva asatyena grasta tvam iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu katham ātmā bandhamokṣādikalanāgrasta iva sampanna ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham ātmā bandha mokṣa ādi kalanā grastaḥ iva sampannaḥ iti atra āha
yadā eva cittam kalitam akalena kila ātmanā
kośa kīṭa vat ātmā ayam anena āvalitaḥ tadā

original: anenātmanā yadaiva cittaṃ kalitam kalanayā prakaṭīkṛtam
analyzed: anena ātmanā yadā eva cittam kalitam kalanayā prakaṭīkṛtam
tadā anena ātmanā kośa kīṭa vat kośakāra krimi vat

original: nanv etenātmanā kalitam manaḥ kasmād upādānān nirgatam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu etena ātmanā kalitam manaḥ kasmāt upādānāt nirgatam iti atra āha
ananya rūpāḥ tu anya tva vikalpita śarīrakāḥ

original: manaḥśaktaya etasmād imā niryānti koṭiśaḥ // MU_4,11.64
analyzed: manaḥ śaktayaḥ etasmāt imāḥ niryānti koṭiśas

original: tatsthās tajjāḥ pṛthagrūpāḥ samudrād iva vīcayaḥ /
analyzed: tad sthāḥ tad jāḥ pṛthagrūpāḥ samudrāt iva vīcayaḥ

original: tatsthās tajjāḥ pṛthaksthāś ca candrād iva marīcayaḥ // MU_4,11.65
analyzed: tad sthāḥ tad jāḥ pṛthak sthāḥ ca candrāt iva marīcayaḥ
dvitīyam dṛṣṭāntam kathayati tad sthāḥ iti
asmin spanda maye sphāre paramātma mahā ambudhau
cit jale vitata ābhoge cit mātra rasa śālini
kāścid sthitāḥ hari brahma rudra cit valana adhikāḥ
laharyaḥ prasphuranti etāḥ svabhāva udbhāvita ātmikāḥ
cit mātram cetya an unmukhā cit

original: / tādṛśe / rasaḥ jalasya sārabhūtaḥ āsvādākhyo guṇaḥ jñeyaḥ /
analyzed: tādṛśe rasaḥ jalasya sāra bhūtaḥ āsvāda ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ jñeyaḥ
hari brahma rudra rūpāḥ yāḥ cit valanā cit spandāḥ
kāścid laharyaḥ hari brahma rudra rūpa tayā sphuranti iti bhāvaḥ
kāścid yama mahendra arka vahni vaiśravaṇa ādikāḥ

original: ghnanti kurvanti tiṣṭhanti laharyaś capalaiṣaṇāḥ // MU_4,11.68
analyzed: ghnanti kurvanti tiṣṭhanti laharyaḥ capala eṣaṇāḥ
kāścid kinnara gandharva vidyādhara sura ādikāḥ

original: utpatanti patanty ugrā laharyaḥ parivalgitāḥ // MU_4,11.69

analyzed: kāścid kiñcid sthita ākārāḥ yathā kamalaja ādikāḥ
kāścid utpanna vidhvastāḥ yathā sura nara ādikāḥ
krimi kīṭa pataṅga ādi gonāsa ajagara ādikāḥ

original: kāścit tasmin mahāmbhodhau sphuranty eteṣu binduvat // MU_4,11.71
analyzed: kāścid tasmin mahā ambhodhau sphuranti eteṣu bindu vat
eteṣu iti bahuvacanam pāda pūraṇa artham
tena etasmin mahā ambhodhau iti yojyam
kāścid cala ānana mṛga gṛdhra vañjulaka ādayaḥ
sphuranti giri kuñjeṣu velā vana taṭeṣu iva
su dīrgha jīvitāḥ kāścid kāścid ati alpa jīvitāḥ
sva tuccha bhāvanāt tucchāt kāścid tuccha śarīrikāḥ
sva tuccha bhāvanāt sva viṣayāt tuccha vikalpanāt
saṃsāra svapna saṃrambhe kāścid sthairyeṇa bhāvitāḥ

original: svavikalpahatāḥ kāścic chaṅkante susthiraṃ jagat // MU_4,11.74
analyzed: sva vikalpa hatāḥ kāścid śaṅkante susthiram jagat

original: bhāvitāḥ sthiro ḥyaṃ saṃsāra iti vāsanāyuktāḥ kṛtāḥ // (MT_4,11.74)
analyzed: bhāvitāḥ sthiraḥ ḥyam saṃsāraḥ iti vāsanā yuktāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: kṛśo ḥtiduḥkhī mūḍho ḥham iti duḥkhair dṛḍhīkṛtāḥ // MU_4,11.75
analyzed: kṛśaḥ mūḍhaḥ ḥham iti duḥkhaiḥ dṛḍhīkṛtāḥ
atra bhāvanāyāḥ alpa alpa tvam ati mauḍhyena jñeyam

original: kāścit sthāvaratāṃ yātāḥ kāścid devatvam āgatāḥ /
analyzed: kāścid sthāvara tām yātāḥ kāścid deva tvam āgatāḥ

original: kāścit puruṣatām prāptāḥ kāścid dānavatāṃ gatāḥ // MU_4,11.76
analyzed: kāścid puruṣa tām prāptāḥ kāścid dānava tām gatāḥ

original: kāścit sthitā jagati kalpaśatāny analpāḥ kāścid vrajanti paramam puruṣaṃ suśuddhāḥ /
analyzed: kāścid sthitāḥ jagati kalpa śatāni analpāḥ kāścid vrajanti paramam puruṣam su śuddhāḥ

original: brahmārṇavāt samuditā laharīvilolāś citsaṃvido hi mananāparanāmavatyaḥ // MU_4,11.77

original: brahmārṇavād abhinnās te satyam etan mṛṣetarat // MU_4,12.1
analyzed: brahma arṇavāt abhinnāḥ te satyam etat mṛṣā itarat
etat sura asura nara ākārāḥ yāḥ saṃvidaḥ

original: na brahma vayam ity antarniścayena hy adhogatāḥ // MU_4,12.2
analyzed: na brahma vayam iti antar niścayena hi adhas gatāḥ

original: kalaṅkitatve uttarārdhena hetuṃ kathayati na brahmeti /

analyzed: yāḥ etāḥ saṃvidaḥ brāhmyaḥ mune na eka kalaṅkitāḥ

original: etat tat karmaṇām bījam atha karmaiva viddhi vā // MU_4,12.4
analyzed: etat tat karmaṇām bījam atha karma eva viddhi vā

original: / tat etat tā etāḥ brāhmīḥ saṃvidaḥ /
analyzed: tat etat tāḥ etāḥ brāhmīḥ saṃvidaḥ

original: na hi saṃvitparāmarśam antareṇa bāhyakarmaṇaḥ utthānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā //
analyzed: na hi saṃvid parāmarśam antareṇa bāhya karmaṇaḥ utthānam dṛṣṭam yuktam vā

karma jāla karañjānām bīja muṣṭyā karālayā

original: tiṣṭhanti parivalganti rudanti ca hasanti ca // MU_4,12.6
analyzed: tiṣṭhanti parivalganti rudanti ca hasanti ca

original: ullasanti niyacchanti mlāyanti vihasanti ca // MU_4,12.7

analyzed: he mune saṅkalpa rūpayā saṅkalpa svarūpayā

original: tiṣṭhanti parivalganti rudanti ca hasanti ullasanti niyacchanti mlāyanti vihasanti ca upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat /

analyzed: yathā pavanaḥ sva antaḥsthaiḥ spandanaiḥ nānāvidhāḥ kriyāḥ karoti

original: tā etāḥ kāścid atyacchā yathā hariharādayaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ etāḥ kāścid atyacchāḥ yathā hari hara ādayaḥ

kāścid tṛṇa vat uhyante dūre brahma mahā udadheḥ
aprāpta bhūmikāḥ etāḥ yathā uraga nara ādayaḥ

original: tadāsādane hi punaḥ punaḥ kṛtāntanikhananaṃ na
analyzed: tad āsādane hi punar punar kṛtānta nikhananam na

alpa moha anvitāḥ kāścid tam eva brahma vāridhim
adṛṣṭa rāga roga ogham avalambya vyavasthitāḥ
kāścid bhoktavya janma oghāḥ bhukta janma ogha koṭayaḥ
vandhyāḥ prakāśa tāmasyaḥ saṃsthitāḥ bhūta jātayaḥ

original: kāścid ūrdhvād adho yānti tathādhastān mahat padam /
analyzed: kāścid ūrdhvāt adhas yānti tathā adhastāt mahat padam

original: ūrdhvād ūrdhvataraṃ kāścid adhastāt kāścid apy adhaḥ // MU_4,12.15
analyzed: ūrdhvāt ūrdhvataram kāścid adhastāt kāścid api adhas

original: paramapadāvagamāt prayāti nāśaṃ vihagapatismaraṇād viṣavyatheva // MU_4,12.16
analyzed: parama pada avagamāt prayāti nāśam vihaga pati smaraṇāt viṣa vyathā iva

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe dvādaśaḥ sargaḥ
om śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ śrī rāmam prati āha

original: vicārayantas tattvajñā iti te jāgatīr gatīḥ /
analyzed: vicārayantaḥ tattva jñāḥ iti te jāgatīḥ gatīḥ

original: samaṅgāyās taṭāt tasmāt praceluś cañcalāṃśavaḥ // MU_4,15.1
analyzed: samaṅgāyāḥ taṭāt tasmāt praceluḥ cañcala aṃśavaḥ

original: dadarśa bhārgavaḥ śuṣkām pūrvajanmodbhavāṃ tanum // MU_4,15.3
analyzed: dadarśa bhārgavaḥ śuṣkām pūrva janma udbhavām tanum

original: uvāca cedaṃ he tāta tanvī tanur iyaṃ hi sā /
analyzed: uvāca ca idam he tāta tanvī tanuḥ iyam hi sā

analyzed: yā tvayā sukha sambhogaiḥ purā samabhilālitā

original: ciraṃ vilasitaṃ seyaṃ śuṣkakaṅkālatāṃ gatā // MU_4,15.7
analyzed: ciram vilasitam sā iyam śuṣka kaṅkāla tām gatā

original: cetovṛttyā rahitayā tanveha mama śuṣyate // MU_4,15.8
analyzed: cetaḥ vṛttyā rahitayā tanvā iha mama śuṣyate

original: teṣu teṣu vilāseṣu tāsu tāsu daśāsu ca /
analyzed: teṣu teṣu vilāseṣu tāsu tāsu daśāsu ca

original: tathā tā bhāvanā baddhvā kathaṃ svastho ḥsi dehaka // MU_4,15.9
analyzed: tathā tāḥ bhāvanāḥ baddhvā katham svasthaḥ ḥsi dehaka

original: karaṅkatām prayātāsi mām bhāvayasi durbhage // MU_4,15.10
analyzed: karaṅka tām prayātāsi mām bhāvayasi durbhage  /

original: kaṅkalatām upagatāt tasmād eva bibhemy aham // MU_4,15.11
analyzed: kaṅkala tām upagatāt tasmāt eva bibhemi aham

original: kaṅkalatām upagatāt tasmād eva dehāt / aham
analyzed: kaṅkala tām upagatāt tasmāt eva dehāt aham

original: mamorasi nilīyante paśya tatra pipīlakāḥ // MU_4,15.12
analyzed: mama urasi nilīyante paśya tatra pipīlakāḥ
dravat kāñcana kāntena lobham nītāḥ vara aṅganāḥ

original: yena madvapuṣā tena paśya kaṅkalatohyate // MU_4,15.13
analyzed: yena mad vapuṣā tena paśya kaṅkalatā uhyate
paśya me vitata āsyena tāpa saṃśuṣka kṛttinā
mad kaṅkālaku vaktreṇa vitrāsyante vane mṛgāḥ
vitrāsyante vikāra yukta tvena trāsa yuktāḥ kriyante
paśya ati saṃśuṣka tayā śava udara darī mama
prakāśa arka aṃśu jālena vivekena iva śobhate
śavodaram mṛta śarīra udaram eva darī
mad tanuḥ pariśuṣkā iyam sthita uttānā vana avanau
vairāgyam nayati iva ātma tuccha tvena ambara sthitān
śabda rūpa rasa sparśa gandha lobha vimuktayā
nirvikalpa samādhyā iva mama tanvā uṣyate girau
saṃśānte citta vetāle yām ānanda kalām tanuḥ

original: yāti tām api rājyena jāgatena na gacchati // MU_4,15.18
analyzed: yāti tām api rājyena jāgatena na gacchati
paśya viśrānta sarva īham vigata aśeṣa kautukam
nirasta kalpanā jālam sukham śete kalevaram
citta markaṭa saṃrambha saṅkṣubdhaḥ kāya pādapaḥ

original: tathā vegena calati yathā mūlāni kṛntati // MU_4,15.20
analyzed: tathā vegena calati yathā mūlāni kṛntati
mūla kṛntanam vyāvahārika kṣobha rūpam jñeyam
citta anartha vimuktaḥ gaja abhra hari vibhramam

original: nāyam paśyati me dehaḥ parānanda iva sthitaḥ // MU_4,15.21
analyzed: na ayam paśyati me dehaḥ para ānandaḥ iva sthitaḥ
gaja abhra harīṇām gaja megha siṃhānām
sarva āśā jvara sammoha mihikā śarad āgamam

original: acittatvaṃ vinā nānyac chreyaḥ paśyāmi jantuṣu // MU_4,15.22
analyzed: acitta tvam vinā nā anyat śreyaḥ paśyāmi jantuṣu
te eva sukha sambhoga sīmāntam samupāgatāḥ

original: mahādhiyaḥ śāntadhiyo ye yātā vimanaskatām // MU_4,15.23
analyzed: mahā dhiyaḥ śānta dhiyaḥ ye yātāḥ vimanaska tām
sarva duḥkha daśā muktām saṃśāntām vigata jvarām

original: diṣṭyā paśyāmy amananāṃ vane tanum imām aham // MU_4,15.24
analyzed: diṣṭyā paśyāmi a mananām vane tanum imām aham

original: subahūny upabhuktāni śarīrāṇi punaḥ punaḥ // MU_4,15.25
analyzed: su bahūni upabhuktāni śarīrāṇi punar punar

original: bhṛguṇotpādite kāye tat tasmiṃs tasya kim mune /
analyzed: bhṛguṇā utpādite kāye tat tasmin tasya kim mune

original: mahān atiśayo jātaḥ paridevanam eva vā // MU_4,15.26
analyzed: mahān atiśayaḥ jātaḥ paridevanam eva vā

original: śukrasya kalanā rāma yāsau jīvadaśāṃ gatā /
analyzed: śukrasya kalanā rāma yā asau jīva daśām gatā
karma ātmikā samutpannā bhṛgoḥ bhārgava rūpiṇī
śukrasya jīva daśām śukra sambandhi jīva avasthām
bhṛgoḥ iti pañcamī sā iti śeṣaḥ
sā hi idam prathama tvena sametya paramāt padāt
bhūtākāśa padam prāpya vāta vyāvalitā satī
prāṇa apāna pravāheṇa praviśya hṛdayam bhṛgoḥ

original: krameṇa vīryatām etya sampannauśanasī tanuḥ // MU_4,15.29
analyzed: krameṇa vīrya tām etya sampannā auśanasī tanuḥ
idam prathama tvena tad pūrva tvena
vihita brāhma saṃskārā tatas sā pituḥ agragā
kālena mahatā prāptā śuṣka kaṅkāla rūpa tām

original: idamprathamam āyātā yadā sā brahmaṇas tanuḥ /
analyzed: idam prathamam āyātā yadā sā brahmaṇaḥ tanuḥ

original: atas tām prati śukreṇa tadā tat paridevitam // MU_4,15.31
analyzed: atas tām prati śukreṇa tadā tat paridevitam

original: svāṃ śuśoca tanuṃ śukraḥ svabhāvo hy eṣa dehajaḥ // MU_4,15.32
analyzed: svām śuśoca tanum śukraḥ svabhāvaḥ hi eṣa deha jaḥ

original: kiṃ tu pradarśitaṃ tena śokavyājena dhīmatām /
analyzed: kim tu pradarśitam tena śoka vyājena dhīmatām

original: tathā ca paropakārārtham eva śukreṇa paridevanaṃ kṛtam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca para upakāra artham eva śukreṇa paridevanam kṛtam iti bhāvaḥ

original: jñasyājñasya ca dehasya yāvajjīvam ayaṃ kramaḥ /
analyzed: jñasya ajñasya ca dehasya yāvajjīvam ayam kramaḥ

original: lokavad vyavahāro yat saktyāsaktyātha vā sadā // MU_4,15.34
analyzed: loka vat vyavahāraḥ yat saktyā asaktyā atha vā sadā

original: tathā ca jñasya dehasyājñasya vā dehasyety arthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca jñasya dehasya ajñasya vā dehasya iti arthaḥ
ye parijñāta gatayaḥ ye ca ajñāḥ paśu dharmiṇaḥ
loka saṃvyavahāreṣu te sthitāḥ vana jāla vat
vana jālam sthita tva mātre upamānam jñeyam  /
vyavahārī yathā eva ajñaḥ tathā eva kila paṇḍitaḥ
vāsanā mātra bhedaḥ u tra kāraṇam bandha mokṣayoḥ
vāsanā mātra bhedaḥ śuddha tva aśuddha tvena jñeyaḥ

original: yāvac charīraṃ tāvad dhi duḥkhe duḥkhaṃ sukhe sukham /
analyzed: yāvat śarīram tāvat hi duḥkhe duḥkham sukhe sukham
asaṃsakta dhiyaḥ dhīrāḥ darśayanti aprabuddha vat

original: mahātmāno hi dṛśyante nūnam antas tu śītalāḥ // MU_4,15.38
analyzed: mahātmānaḥ hi dṛśyante nūnam antar tu śītalāḥ
śītalāḥ sukha duḥkha kṛta kṣobha rahitāḥ

original: stambhasya pratibimbāni kṣubhyanti na vapuḥ sthiram /
analyzed: stambhasya pratibimbāni kṣubhyanti na vapuḥ sthiram

original: jñasya karmendriyāṇy eva kṣubhyanti na manaḥ sthiram // MU_4,15.39
analyzed: jñasya karmendriyāṇi eva kṣubhyanti na manaḥ sthiram
sthiram vapuḥ dṛḍham stambha ākhyam svarūpam

original: adhaḥsthitir iva svaccham pratibimbeṣu bhāskaraḥ // MU_4,15.40
analyzed: adhas sthitiḥ iva su accham pratibimbeṣu bhāskaraḥ
san tyakta loka karmā api baddhaḥ evā aprabuddha dhīḥ

original: atyaktamohalīlo ḥpi mukta eva prabuddhadhīḥ // MU_4,15.41

analyzed: prabuddha dhī tva aprabuddha dhī tvayoḥ eva atra bandha mokṣau prati kāraṇa tvam iti bhāvaḥ

original: baddhabuddhīndriyo baddho muktakarmendriyo ḥpi hi // MU_4,15.42
analyzed: baddha buddhīndriyaḥ baddhaḥ mukta karmendriyaḥ hi

original: hetur buddhīndriyāṇy eva tejāṃsīva prakāśane // MU_4,15.43
analyzed: hetuḥ buddhīndriyāṇi eva tejāṃsi iva prakāśane

original: samo ḥsann iva tiṣṭha tvaṃ saṃśāntasakalaiṣaṇaḥ // MU_4,15.44
analyzed: iva tiṣṭha tvam saṃśānta sakala eṣaṇaḥ

original: kuru karmāṇi kāryāṇi nūnaṃ sāmanasi sthitiḥ // MU_4,15.45
analyzed: kuru karmāṇi kāryāṇi nūnam sā amanasi sthitiḥ

original: ata eva ātmani na tu anātmarūpeṣu viṣayeṣu
analyzed: atas eva ātmani na tu anātma rūpeṣu viṣayeṣu

analyzed: amanasi sthitiḥ manasi sthitiḥ na bhavati

original: na tvam bhāveṣu no bhāvās tvayi tāmarasekṣaṇa /
analyzed: na tvam bhāveṣu no bhāvāḥ tvayi tāmarasa īkṣaṇa

original: śuddhabuddhasvabhāvas tvam ātmasaṃsthaḥ sthiro bhava // MU_4,15.47
analyzed: śuddha buddha svabhāvaḥ tvam ātma saṃsthaḥ sthiraḥ bhava

original: prabhavasi yadi cetaso mahātmaṃs tad atidhiye mahate sate namas te // MU_4,15.48

original: / yadi cetasaḥ prabhavasi cetaḥ jetuṃ samartho bhavasi /

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe pañcadaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: athākṣipya vacas tasya tanayasya tadā bhṛgoḥ /
analyzed: athā ākṣipya vacaḥ tasya tanayasya tadā bhṛgoḥ

original: uvāca bhagavān kālo vaco gambhīraniḥsvanam // MU_4,16.1
analyzed: uvāca bhagavān kālaḥ vacaḥ gambhīra niḥsvanam

original: kāle pūrvajayā tanvā tapaḥ kṛtvānayā punaḥ /

original: kalyāṇam astu vāṃ yāmo vayaṃ tv abhimatāṃ diśam /

original: na kiñcid api tac cittaṃ yasya nābhimatam bhavet // MU_4,16.6

original: ato mamāpi sacittatvād abhimatam astīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_4,16.6)
analyzed: atas mama api sa citta tvāt abhimatam asti iti bhāvaḥ

original: ity uktvā muñcatoḥ puṣpaṃ tayoḥ so ḥntaradhīyata /
analyzed: iti uktvā muñcatoḥ puṣpam tayoḥ saḥ antaradhīyata

original: taptāṃśur iva rodasyoḥ samam aṃśubhir aṃśumān // MU_4,16.7

analyzed: gate tasmin bhagavati tām uktvā bhavitavya tām

analyzed: viveśa tām tanum bālām su latām iva mādhavaḥ

original: bhāvī puṣpavat śubhaḥ udayaḥ yasyāḥ / tām // (MT_4,16.8-9)

original: sarvanāḍyaḥ tatas tanvyās tasyāḥ pūrṇā virejire /

original: nalinī prāvṛṣīvāsau madhāv iva navā latā /

original: pitātha prāktanīṃ tasyāpy āliliṅga tanuṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: pitā atha prāktanīm tasya api āliliṅga tanum tatas

original: snehārdravṛttir jaladaś cirād giritaṭīm iva // MU_4,16.16
analyzed: sneha ārdra vṛttiḥ jaladaḥ cirāt giri taṭīm iva

original: bhṛgur dadarśa sasneham prāktanīṃ tānayīṃ tanum /
analyzed: bhṛguḥ dadarśa sa sneham prāktanīm tānayīm tanum

original: matto jāto ḥyam ity āsthā haraty api mahāmatim // MU_4,16.17
analyzed: mattaḥ jātaḥ u ḥyam iti āsthā harati api mahāmatim

original: nanu tādṛgjñānayuktena tena kathaṃ tānayī tanuḥ sasnehaṃ
analyzed: nanu tādṛś jñāna yuktena tena katham tānayī tanuḥ sa sneham

original: matputro ḥyam iti sneho bhṛgum apy aharat tadā /
analyzed: mad putraḥ iti snehaḥ bhṛgum api aharat tadā
paratā ātmīya tā ca iyam yāvadākṛti bhāvinī
niśā avasāna muditau arka padma ākarau iva
atra eva anya dṛṣṭānta dvayam kathayati
cira saṅgama sambaddhau iva cakrāhva dampatī
ghana āgama ghana snehau mayūra jaladau iva
cira kāla dṛḍha utkaṇṭha yogyayā kathayā tayā

original: sthitvā tatra muhūrtaṃ tāv athotthāya mahāmatī // MU_4,16.21
analyzed: sthitvā tatra muhūrtam tau atha utthāya mahāmatī  /

original: ko hi nāma jagajjāta ācāraṃ nānutiṣṭhati // MU_4,16.22
analyzed: kaḥ hi nāma jagat jātaḥ ācāram na anutiṣṭhati

original: evaṃ tau kānane tasmin pāvane bhṛgubhārgavau /

original: saṃsthitau tapasā dīptau divīva śaśibhāskarau // MU_4,16.23
analyzed: saṃsthitau tapasā dīptau divi iva śaśi bhāskarau

original: bhṛgur apy ātmano yogye pade ḥtiṣṭhad anāmaye // MU_4,16.25
analyzed: bhṛguḥ api ātmanaḥ yogye pade ḥtiṣṭhat anāmaye

original: sargāntaślokena śukravṛttāntaṃ saṅkṣipya kathayati śukro ḥsāv iti /
analyzed: sarga anta ślokena śukra vṛttāntam saṅkṣipya kathayati iti

original: śukro ḥsau prathamam iti krameṇa jāta etasmāt paramapadād udārakīrtiḥ /
analyzed: śukro ḥ asau prathamam iti krameṇa jātaḥ etasmāt parama padāt udāra kīrtiḥ

original: svenāśu smṛtipadavibhrameṇa paścād evaṃ ca pravilulito daśāntareṣu // MU_4,16.26
analyzed: svena āśu smṛti pada vibhrameṇa paścāt evam ca pravilulitaḥ daśā antareṣu

parama padāt cit mātra ākhyāt uttamāt sthānāt

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe ṣoḍaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe ṣoḍaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: yathāsya saphalā jātā tathānyasya na kim bhavet // MU_4,17.1
analyzed: yathā asya saphalā jātā tathā anyasya na kim bhavet

original: svasambandhī vā samaṅgātāpasaviṣayo ḥnubhavaḥ na yuktaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sva sambandhī vā na yuktaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: sā pratibhā saphalā kim katham / na bhavet
analyzed: sā pratibhā saphalā kim katham na bhavet

original: / na hi svapne pratibhātaṃ svasmin gajāditvam pratyakṣam anubhūyate //
analyzed: na hi svapne pratibhātam svasmin gaja ādi tvam pratyakṣam anubhūyate

original: idamprathamam utpannā sā tadā brahmaṇaḥ padāt /
analyzed: idamprathamam utpannā sā tadā brahmaṇaḥ padāt
śuddhā matiḥ bhārgavasya na anya janma kalaṅki tā
śuddhā pūrva janma vāsanā nicayā a kaluṣitā

original: āsīt / tataḥ tasya sā nānāyonigamanarūpā pratibhā saphalā jātā /
analyzed: āsīt tatas tasya sā nānā yoni gamana rūpā pratibhā saphalā jātā

original: utpannatvāt madhye nānājanmāntarotthavāsanājālakalaṅkitāḥ santaḥ na svapratibhānam pratyakṣam anubhavantīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: utpanna tvāt madhye nānā janmāntara uttha vāsanā jāla kalaṅkitāḥ santaḥ na sva pratibhānam pratyakṣam anubhavanti iti bhāvaḥ
nānā janmāntara uttha vāsanā jāla kalaṅkitāḥ

original: nanv asyāḥ śuddhāyāḥ mateḥ svarūpaṃ kīdṛg astīty /
analyzed: nanu asyāḥ śuddhāyāḥ mateḥ svarūpam kīdṛś asti iti

original: sarvaiṣaṇānāṃ saṃśāntau śuddhā cittasya yā sthitiḥ /
analyzed: sarva eṣaṇānām saṃśāntau śuddhā cittasya yā sthitiḥ

original: tat sattvam ucyate saiṣā vimalā cid udāhṛtā // MU_4,17.3
analyzed: tat sattvam ucyate sā eṣā vimalā cit udāhṛtā
sarva eṣaṇānām nānā bhogya jāla viṣayāṇām samastānām icchānām
śāntau suṣupti ādi prabhāvena samyak jñāna ādinā

original: sā eva vimalā cit vimalā matiḥ /
analyzed: sā eva vimalā cit vimalā matiḥ

original: matiḥ idamprathamam utpannasya ca bhavati jīvanmuktasya ca bhavati /
analyzed: matiḥ idamprathamam utpannasya ca bhavati jīvanmuktasya ca bhavati
jīvanmuktasya tu tyajyamāna bāhya iti viśeṣaḥ

original: tat tathāśu bhavaty eva yathāvarto ḥrṇave ḥmbhasaḥ // MU_4,17.4
analyzed: tat tathā āśu bhavati eva yathā āvartaḥ ḥrṇave ḥmbhasaḥ

āvartaḥ sadyas anya prakāra yuktaḥ bhavati
anena vṛttāntena siddham sva manīṣitam kathayati
yathā bhṛgu sutasya eṣa vibhramaḥ proditaḥ svayam

original: pratyekam apy evam eva dṛṣṭānto ḥtra bhṛgoḥ sutaḥ // MU_4,17.5
analyzed: pratyekam api evam eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ atra bhṛgoḥ sutaḥ
