original: / udeti / sarve eva svamanaḥpratibhāsarūpam eva jagat paśyantīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: udeti sarve eva sva manaḥ pratibhāsa rūpam eva jagat paśyanti iti bhāvaḥ

original: dṛḍhīkaraṇārtham punar api śukrasya dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ kathayati dṛṣṭānto ḥtreti // (MT_4,17.5)
analyzed: dṛḍhīkaraṇa artham punar api śukrasya dṛṣṭānta tvam kathayati
etat eva nānā dṛṣṭāntaiḥ sugamam karoti
bījasya aṅkura pattra ādi svam camatkurute yathā

original: sarveṣām bhūtasaṅghānām bhramaṣaṇḍas tathaiva hi // MU_4,17.6
analyzed: sarveṣām bhūta saṅghānām bhrama ṣaṇḍaḥ tathā eva hi

original: yathā bījasya svam na tv anyabījasādhāraṇam /
analyzed: yathā bījasya svam na tu anya bīja sādhāraṇam
tathā eva camatkurute nānā āsvāda saukhyam karoti

original: / sādhāraṇatvena bhāsamāno ḥpy ayaṃ saṃsāraḥ pratyekam bhinna eveti bhāvaḥ // (MT_4,17.6)
analyzed: sādhāraṇa tvena bhāsamānaḥ ayam saṃsāraḥ pratyekam bhinnaḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: yad idaṃ dṛśyate viśvam evam evākhilaṃ hi tat /
analyzed: yat idam dṛśyate viśvam evam eva akhilam hi tat

original: pratyekam uditam mithyā mithyaivāstam upaiti ca // MU_4,17.7
analyzed: pratyekam uditam mithyā mithyā eva astam upaiti ca

original: ktaḥ / mithyā evāstam upaiti ca paracitsvarūpatvena sarvadaiva tathaiva sthitatvāt /
analyzed: ktaḥ mithyā eva astam upaiti ca para cit svarūpa tvena sarvadā eva tathā eva sthita tvāt
satya bhūta udaya astamaya viṣaya tva ayogāt iti bhāvaḥ
satya bhūta udaya astamaya viṣaya tva ayogāt

original: nāstam eti na codeti jagat kiñcana kasyacit /
analyzed: na astam eti na ca udeti jagat kiñcana kasyacid

original: bhrāntimātram idam māyā mudhaiva parijṛmbhate // MU_4,17.8
analyzed: bhrānti mātram idam māyā mudhā eva parijṛmbhate
yathā asmad pratibhāsa sthaḥ saḥ ḥyam saṃsāra ṣaṇḍakaḥ

original: tathā teṣāṃ sahasrāṇi mitho ḥdṛṣṭāni santi hi // MU_4,17.9
analyzed: tathā teṣām sahasrāṇi mithas ḥdṛṣṭāni santi hi
yathā asmad pratibhāsa sthaḥ saḥ ayam sarva indriya atīta cit mātra rūpa tvena indriya atītaḥ
san idantayā sphuritaḥ saṃsāra ṣaṇḍaḥ asti

original: santi / nanu kathaṃ tāni na dṛśyante ity apekṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇam āha mitho ḥdṛṣṭānīti
analyzed: santi nanu katham tāni na dṛśyante iti apekṣāyām viśeṣaṇam āha mithas dṛṣṭāni iti
adṛṣṭāni darśana viṣaya tām na nītāni

original: pṛthag yathā na dṛśyante tathaite saṃsṛtibhramāḥ // MU_4,17.10
analyzed: pṛthak yathā na dṛśyante tathā ete saṃsṛti bhramāḥ

original: yathā anyasya svapnādi anyo nānubhavati tathānyasya saṃsāram anyo nānubhavatīti piṇḍārthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā anyasya svapna ādi anyaḥ na anubhavati tathā anyasya saṃsāram anyaḥ na anubhavati iti piṇḍa arthaḥ

original: nanu kathaṃ sargānām pratipuruṣam bhedaḥ iti cet /
analyzed: nanu katham sargānām pratipuruṣam bhedaḥ iti ced
vastuni puruṣa bhedena heya tva upādeya tva darśanāt
evam nagara vṛndāni nabhaḥ saṅkalpa rūpiṇām

original: santi tāni na dṛśyante mitho jñānadṛśaṃ vinā // MU_4,17.11
analyzed: santi tāni na dṛśyante mithas jñāna dṛśam vinā

original: evaṃ sati / nabhasi yaḥ saṅkalpaḥ purādisaṅkalpaḥ /
analyzed: evam sati nabhasi yaḥ saṅkalpaḥ purā ādi saṅkalpaḥ
samāse upasarjanī bhūtasya nagara padasya viśeṣaṇa dānam ārṣam
taiḥ nagara vṛndaiḥ tāni nagara vṛndāni
jñāna dṛśam vinā cit mātra jñāna ākhyām dṛṣṭim vinā
na dṛśyante na anubhūyante jñāna dṛśā

original: ata evāhaṃ tān paśyāmi tvaṃ na paśyasīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva aham tān paśyāmi tvam na paśyasi iti bhāvaḥ
sarva prasiddhānām piśāca ādīnām api etad rūpa tvam kathayati
piśāca yakṣa rakṣāṃsi santi evaṃrūpakāṇi hi
saṅkalpa mātra dehāni sukha duḥkha mayāni ca
svasmin api etad rūpa tvam eva atidiśati

original: evam eva vayaṃ ceme sampannā raghunandana /
analyzed: evam eva vayam ca ime sampannāḥ raghunandana
sva saṅkalpa ātmaka ākārāḥ mithyā satya tva bhāvitāḥ
mithyā satya tve sva satya tāyām

original: evaṃ stokaṃ viśeṣeṇoktvā punar api sāmānyena kathayati
analyzed: evam stokam viśeṣeṇa uktvā punar api sāmānyena kathayati
evaṃrūpā eva hi pare vartate sarga saṃsṛtiḥ

original: na vāstavī vastutas tu saṃsthiteyam avastuni // MU_4,17.14
analyzed: na vāstavī vastutas tu saṃsthitā iyam avastuni
sarga iti nāmadheyā saṃsṛtiḥ sarga saṃsṛtiḥ
vastu tvena sthite cit mātre avastu bhūta sarga ādhāra tva ayogāt
pūrva ukta nyāyena siddhasya sva abhīṣṭasya upasaṃhāram karoti

original: pratyekam uditaṃ viśvam evam eva mudhaiva hi /
analyzed: pratyekam uditam viśvam evam eva mudhā eva hi
nava gulmaka rūpeṇa vāsantika rasaḥ yathā

original: prathamo ḥyaṃ svasaṅkalpaḥ suprathām āgatas tathā /
analyzed: prathamaḥ sva saṅkalpaḥ suprathām āgataḥ tathā
yathā ati pāramārthyena dṛḍhena ittham vibhāvyate
ayam prathamaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tad pūrva tvena utthitaḥ
pratyekam uditam cittam sva svabhāva udara sthitam

original: idam itthaṃsamārambhaṃ jagat paśyad vinaśyati // MU_4,17.17
analyzed: idam itthat samārambham jagat paśyat vinaśyati
anubhavat vinaśyati sva rūpa parāmarśāt bhraśyati iti arthaḥ
pratibhāsa vaśāt asti na asti vastu avalokanāt

original: dīrghaḥ svapno jagajjālam ālānaṃ cittadantinaḥ // MU_4,17.18
analyzed: dīrghaḥ svapnaḥ jagat jālam ālānam citta dantinaḥ

original: na hi asataḥ pratibhāsaḥ yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi asataḥ pratibhāsaḥ yukta iti bhāvaḥ
na hi samyak jñānena jagat tiṣṭhati
citta sattā eva hi jagat jagat sattā eva cittakam

original: ekābhāve dvayor nāśas tac ca satyavicāraṇāt // MU_4,17.19
analyzed: eka abhāve dvayoḥ nāśaḥ tat ca satya vicāraṇāt
śrī rāma kṛtasya praśnasya uttaram anusmarati

original: śuddhasya pratibhāso hi satyo bhavati cetasaḥ /
analyzed: śuddhasya pratibhāsaḥ hi satyaḥ bhavati cetasaḥ

original: niṣkalaṅke hi lagati paṭe kuṅkumarañjanā // MU_4,17.20
analyzed: niṣkalaṅke hi lagati paṭe kuṅkuma rañjanā
anyena an āhṛtasya anyaḥ guṇaḥ avaśyam vivardhate
an ākrāntasya saṅkalpaiḥ pratibhā udeti cetasaḥ
dṛṣṭāntam uktvā dārṣṭāntikam kathayati an ākrāntasya iti

original: suvarṇo na sthitiṃ yāti malavaty aṃśuke yathā /
analyzed: suvarṇaḥ na sthitim yāti malavati aṃśuke yathā

original: ekā dṛṣṭiḥ sthitiṃ yāti na mlāne cittake tathā // MU_4,17.22
analyzed: ekā dṛṣṭiḥ sthitim yāti na mlāne cittake tathā

original: pramārjanād iva maṇes tāmrasyeva ca yuktitaḥ /
analyzed: pramārjanāt iva maṇeḥ tāmrasya iva ca yuktitaḥ

original: ciram ekadṛḍhābhyāsāc chuddhir bhavati cetasaḥ // MU_4,17.23
analyzed: ciram eka dṛḍha abhyāsāt śuddhiḥ bhavati cetasaḥ
yaḥ dṛḍha abhyāsaḥ nairantaryeṇa tad cintanam tasmāt
pratibhāsa ātmani jagati ete kāla kriyā kramāḥ

original: sodayāstamayā jātāḥ kathaṃ śukrasya cetasaḥ // MU_4,17.24
analyzed: sa udaya astamayāḥ jātāḥ katham śukrasya cetasaḥ

original: pratibhāsātmani jagati sphuritānāṃ kālakriyākramāṇāṃ sodayāstamayatvam na yuktam /
analyzed: pratibhāsa ātmani jagati sphuritānām kāla kriyā kramāṇām sa udaya astamaya tvam na yuktam

original: tac ca śukracetasaḥ kathaṃ jātam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca śukra cetasaḥ katham jātam iti bhāvaḥ

original: yādṛg jagad idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śukreṇa pitṛmātṛtaḥ /
analyzed: yādṛś jagat idam dṛṣṭam śukreṇa pitṛ mātṛtaḥ

original: tādṛk tasya sthitaṃ citte mayūrāṇḍe mayūravat // MU_4,17.25
analyzed: tādṛś tasya sthitam citte mayūra aṇḍe mayūra vat

original: pitṛmātṛtaḥ utpannena śukreṇa yādṛk idaṃ jagat dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: pitṛ mātṛtaḥ utpannena śukreṇa yādṛś idam jagat dṛṣṭam
svabhāva kośāt svaditam tat anena krama uditam
bījena aṅkura pattra ādi latā puṣpa phalam yathā
svabhāva kośāt citta rūpaḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ
krama uditam sat svaditam āsvāda viṣayīkṛtam
jīvaḥ yad vāsanā sāraḥ tat eva antar prapaśyati

original: svapna evātra dṛṣṭānto dīrghasvapnas tv idaṃ jagat // MU_4,17.27
analyzed: svapnaḥ eva atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ dīrghasvapnaḥ tu idam jagat

original: nanu katham atra svapnaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ astīty /
analyzed: nanu katham atra svapnaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ asti iti
atra āha dīrgha svapnaḥ eva iti
ca atra cira pratibhāsa vaśāt jñeyam
pratyekam uditaḥ rāma nanu saṃsāra ṣaṇḍakaḥ
rātrau sainya nara svapna jāla vat sva ātmani sphuṭaḥ

original: rātrau hi sainyanarasvarūpaṃ svapnajālam pratyekam pṛthag / udeti // (MT_4,17.28)
analyzed: rātrau hi sainya nara sva rūpam svapna jālam pratyekam pṛthak udeti
eṣa saṃsṛti ṣaṇḍa oghaḥ mithas sammilati svayam

original: no vāpi yadi tan me tvaṃ yathāvad vaktum arhasi // MU_4,17.29
analyzed: no vā api yadi tat me tvam yathāvat vaktum arhasi
eṣaḥ saṃsṛti ṣaṇḍa oghaḥ svayam svabhāvena
vaktum arhasi samyak kathaya iti yāvat

original: malinaṃ hi mano ḥvīryaṃ na mithaḥ śleṣam arhati /
analyzed: malinam hi manaḥ ḥvīryam na mithas śleṣam arhati

original: ayo ḥyasīvāsantapte śuddhe tapte tu līyate // MU_4,17.30

analyzed: hi niścaye malinam rāga ādi mala dūṣitam
yathā ayaḥ a santapte ayasi śleṣam na arhati

original: ekarūpāṇi toyāni yānty aikyaṃ nābilāni hi // MU_4,17.31
analyzed: eka rūpāṇi toyāni yānti aikyam na abilāni hi
sarga anta ślokena api etat eva kathayati

original: śuddhir hi cittasya vivāsanatvam abhūtasaṃvedanarūpam ekam /
analyzed: śuddhiḥ hi cittasya vivāsana tvam abhūta saṃvedana rūpam ekam

original: tasyāḥ suṣuptātmapadāt prabudhya tanmātrayuktyā parasaṅgam eti // MU_4,17.32
analyzed: tasyāḥ suṣupta ātma padāt prabudhya tanmātra yuktyā para saṅgam eti
hi niścaye abhūta saṃvedana ātma asiddha padārtha saṃvedana svarūpam
prāpya tanmātra yuktyā sūkṣma bhūta yogena

original: / tanmātrayuktyā melanaṃ ca svena saha sarvasyaikopādānatvajñānam eva jñeyam / iti śivam //
iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe saptādaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe saptādaśaḥ sargaḥ
śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe

original: oṃ / nanu kathaṃ tanmātrayuktyā cetaḥ anyaiḥ saha milatīty / atrāha
analyzed: om nanu katham tanmātra yuktyā cetaḥ anyaiḥ saha milati iti atra āha
sarva saṃsṛti ṣaṇḍeṣu bīja rūpa kalā ātmanaḥ
tanmātra pratibhāsasya pratibhāse na bhinna tā
sthūla bhūta bīja rūpasya iti yāvat
sarva saṃsṛti ṣaṇḍeṣu samasteṣu sarga rūpeṣu ṣaṇḍeṣu
mṛdaḥ iva ghaṭa ādiṣu sphuraṇe atas

original: tanmātrāṇi ca sthūlabhūtabījabhūtāni saṃskāramātraśarīrāṇi ākāśādibhyo buddhyā pṛthakkṛtāni pañca śabdādīni jñeyāni //
analyzed: tanmātrāṇi ca sthūlabhūta bīja bhūtāni saṃskāra mātra śarīrāṇi ākāśa ādibhyaḥ buddhyā pṛthakkṛtāni pañca śabda ādīni jñeyāni

original: na kevalaṃ sargaiḥ saha melanam eva tanmātrayuktyā bhavati kiṃ tu brahmaṇi melanam
analyzed: na kevalam sargaiḥ saha melanam eva tanmātra yuktyā bhavati kim tu brahmaṇi melanam
api tayā eva iti abhiprāyeṇa āha
pravṛttiḥ vā nivṛttiḥ vā tanmātra āpatti pūrvakam
sarvasya jīva jātasya suṣupta tvāt anantaram

original: / pravṛttiḥ vā anyasargaiḥ saha melanaṃ vā /
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ vā anya sargaiḥ saha melanam vā
nivṛttiḥ vā sargebhyaḥ nivṛtti rūpam brahmaṇi
melanam vā tanmātra āpatti pūrvakam tanmātra yoga pūrvakam eva
bīja tvena avasthānāt nivṛtti asambhavaḥ sargāṇām prākaṭyena anavasthānāt pravṛtti asambhava
iti suṣupta tvāt anantaram iti uktam

original: anantaram iti kathanena ca suṣupter atrāvaśyambhāvaḥ
analyzed: anantaram iti kathanena ca suṣupteḥ atra avaśyambhāvaḥ

original: sūcitaḥ / brahmasargayoḥ setutvena sthitāyāḥ suṣupter avaśyambhāvasya suspaṣṭatvāt
/ atra ca pravṛttiḥ jīvanmuktānāṃ nivṛttiḥ videhamuktānām iti viṣayavibhāgo draṣṭavyaḥ
analyzed: atra ca pravṛttiḥ jīvanmuktānām nivṛttiḥ videha muktānām iti viṣaya vibhāgaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: / itareṣām pravṛttis tu ajñānamūlatvena neha vaktuṃ yuktā //
analyzed: itareṣām pravṛttiḥ tu ajñāna mūla tvena na iha vaktum yuktā
prakṛta tvāt pravṛtteḥ tanmātra āpatti pūrvakatvam pṛthak kathayati

original: pravṛttibhājo ye jīvās te tanmātrapadaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: pravṛtti bhājaḥ ye jīvāḥ te tanmātra padam gatāḥ

original: tanmātraikatayā sargān mithaḥ paśyanti kalpitān // MU_4,18.3
analyzed: tanmātra eka tayā sargān mithas paśyanti kalpitān
pravṛtti bhājaḥ sattva śeṣa tayā pravṛtti yuktāḥ
bhavanti te tanmātra ekatayā tanmātra yuktyā
kalpitān parama artha tayā kalpita svarūpān
jīvanmuktānām manāṃsi anyoḥ nyam milanti iti
tanmātra aikya praṇālena citrāḥ sarga jalāśayāḥ

original: parasparaṃ sammilanti ghanatāṃ yānti cābhitaḥ // MU_4,18.4
analyzed: parasparam sammilanti ghana tām yānti ca abhitas
tat eva praṇālaḥ jala pravāha mārgaḥ tena

original: nanu sarve sargaughāḥ tanmātraikyapraṇālena milanty atha vā katipaye evety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu sarve sarga oghāḥ tanmātra aikya praṇālena milanti atha vā katipaye eva iti atra āha

original: kecit pṛthak sthitim itāḥ pṛthag eva layaṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: kecid pṛthak sthitim itāḥ pṛthak eva layam gatāḥ

original: kecin mithaḥ sammilitā jagatṣaṇḍāḥ sthitāḥ kṛtāḥ // MU_4,18.5
analyzed: kecid mithas sammilitāḥ jagat ṣaṇḍāḥ sthitāḥ kṛtāḥ

original: nanv etādṛśāḥ sargaughāḥ kasminn ādhāre sthitāḥ bhavantīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu etādṛśāḥ sarga oghāḥ kasmin ādhāre sthitāḥ bhavanti iti atra āha
jagat ṣaṇḍa sahasrāṇi yatra asaṅkhyāni aṇau aṇau

original: aparasparalagnāni kānanam brahma nāma tat // MU_4,18.6
mithaḥ sa melanaṃ naiti ghanatāṃ samupāgataḥ /
analyzed: mithas sa melanam nā eti ghana tām samupāgataḥ

original: yad yad yatra yathā rūḍhaṃ tat tat paśyati netarat // MU_4,18.7
analyzed: yat yat yatra yathā rūḍham tat tat paśyati na itarat

original: mithaḥ sa melanaṃ naiti na gacchati / yataḥ
analyzed: mithas sa melanam na eti na gacchati yatas
pramātuḥ aśuddha mati tvam hetu tvena bahuśas uktam
vartamāna manaḥ rājya vaśāt jīva paramparāḥ

original: bhavanti / samānamanorājyatvāj jīvāḥ parasparam milantīti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: bhavanti samāna manorājya tvāt jīvāḥ parasparam milanti iti bhāvaḥ
śuddha matīnām sargāḥ tanmātra aikya praṇālena sarvadā milanti
aśuddha matīnām tu kadācid eka saṅkalpa tvena iti

original: nanu katham iyaṃ dehasattā prākaṭyaṃ gatā yadvaśoditasaṅkalpākhyamalāvṛtabuddhīnāṃ
analyzed: nanu katham iyam deha sattā prākaṭyam gatā yad vaśa udita saṅkalpa ākhya mala āvṛta buddhīnām

original: tanmātraikyapraṇālenānyasargaiḥ saha melanaṃ na bhavatīty / atrāha
analyzed: tanmātra aikya praṇālena anya sargaiḥ saha melanam na bhavati iti atra āha

original: dehasattā bhṛśaṃ rūḍhā dehābhāvas tu vismṛtaḥ /
analyzed: deha sattā bhṛśam rūḍhā deha abhāvaḥ tu vismṛtaḥ
deha tva parirūḍha tvāt cit vyomnā vismṛta ātmanā

original: cidvyomnā dehatvaparirūḍhatvāt cidvyomakartṛkāt dehabhāve parirūḍhatvāt / cidvyomnā
analyzed: cit vyomnā deha tva parirūḍha tvāt cit vyoma kartṛkāt deha bhāve parirūḍha tvāt cit vyomnā
deha abhāvaḥ paramārtha san deha pratiyogikaḥ traikālikaḥ
atha anyena dṛṣṭāntena anya sargaiḥ sammelanam kathayati
yathā śuddha prāṇa marut para prāṇa abhivedhanāt

original: vetti vedhyamanorājyaṃ tathā sargān narāśrayī // MU_4,18.10
analyzed: vetti vedhya manaḥ rājyam tathā sargān nara āśrayī
yathā śuddha prāṇa marut prāṇāyāma ādinā śuddha prāṇaḥ

original: tanmātrapraṇālenānyapuruṣāviṣṭaḥ jīvanmuktaḥ puruṣaḥ brahmaṇaḥ prathamam utthitaḥ puruṣo vā /
analyzed: tanmātra praṇālena anya puruṣa āviṣṭaḥ jīvanmuktaḥ puruṣaḥ brahmaṇaḥ prathamam utthitaḥ puruṣaḥ vā

original: evaṃ śrīrāmakṛte praśne uttaraṃ samyag uktvā pūrvatra yatra tatroktāni viśīrṇāni upadeśavākyāni kathayati
analyzed: evam śrī rāma kṛte praśne uttaram samyak uktvā pūrvatra yatra tatra uktāni viśīrṇāni upadeśa vākyāni kathayati
sarveṣām jīva rāśīnām ātma avasthā trayam śritaḥ

original: jagratsvapnasuṣuptākhyam atra deho na kāraṇam // MU_4,18.11
analyzed: jagrat svapna suṣupta ākhyam atra dehaḥ na kāraṇam
evam ātmani jīva tvam anya avasthā traya ātmani

original: tāpāmbhasīva vīcitvam asmin kacati dehatā // MU_4,18.12
analyzed: tāpa ambhasi iva vīci tvam asmin kacati deha tā
yat avasthā trayam jāgrat ādi avasthā trayam
cit kalā padam āsādya suṣupta anta pade sthitam

original: buddho nivartate jīvo mūḍhaḥ sarge pravartate // MU_4,18.13
analyzed: buddhaḥ nivartate jīvaḥ mūḍhaḥ sarge pravartate

original: svabhāvaśuddhir hi yadā tadā maitrī pravartate /
analyzed: svabhāva śuddhiḥ hi yadā tadā maitrī pravartate
dvayoḥ eka tva rūpā eva su sauhārda nidarśanā
dvayoḥ eka tvam eva hi maitrī śabda arthaḥ
su sauhārde hi dvayoḥ eka tvam

original: ajñaḥ suṣuptāt sambuddho jīvaḥ kaścit svasargabhāk /
analyzed: ajñaḥ suṣuptāt sambuddhaḥ jīvaḥ kaścid sva sarga bhāj

original: sarvagatvāc citaḥ kaścit parasargeṇa nīyate // MU_4,18.15
analyzed: sarva ga tvāt citaḥ kaścid parasargeṇa nīyate
sva sarga bhāj suṣupta avasthāyāḥ pūrvam yādṛś svabhāvaḥ āsīt
śukra ādi sarga dṛṣṭāntena vā para sarga nayanam

original: nanu tasmin sarge ḥnyaḥ sargaḥ kutrāsti yenāsau nīyata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tasmin sarge ḥnyaḥ sargaḥ kutra asti yena asau nīyate iti atra āha

original: sarge sarge pṛthagrūpaṃ santi sargāntarāṇy api /
analyzed: sarge sarge pṛthak rūpam santi sarga antarāṇi api

original: yathā kadalīdaleṣv antar anyāni dalāni santi teṣv antar apy anyāni tathā sargeṣv api
analyzed: yathā kadalī daleṣu antar anyāni dalāni santi teṣu antar api anyāni tathā sargeṣu api

original: teṣv antar apy anyāni santīti piṇḍārthaḥ // (MT_4,18.16)
analyzed: teṣu antar api anyāni santi iti piṇḍa arthaḥ
sarge sarga antara āpūra pattra pīvara vṛttimān
yaḥ sarga antara āpūraḥ anya sarga samūhaḥ

original: kadalyām anyatā nāsti yathā pattraśateṣv api /
analyzed: kadalyām anya tā nā asti yathā pattra śateṣu api

original: brahmatattve ḥnyatā nāsti tathā sargaśateṣv api // MU_4,18.18
analyzed: brahma tattve nā asti tathā sarga śateṣu api

original: bījāt phalaṃ rasād bhūtvā yathā bījam punar bhavet /
analyzed: bījāt phalam rasāt bhūtvā yathā bījam punar bhavet

original: tathā brahma mano bhūtvā bodhād brahma punar bhavet // MU_4,18.19
analyzed: tathā brahma manaḥ bhūtvā bodhāt brahma punar bhavet
yathā phalam bījāt upādāna bhūtāt bījāt
rasa kāraṇakam bījam phala bhāvena jṛmbhate

original: rasasya kāraṇaṃ kiṃ syād iti vaktuṃ na yujyate /
analyzed: rasasya kāraṇam kim syāt iti vaktum na yujyate

original: svabhāvo nirviśeṣatvāt paraṃ vaktuṃ na yujyate // MU_4,18.21
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ nirviśeṣa tvāt param vaktum na yujyate

original: sarveṣu svabhāveṣv abhiyogaḥ prāpnotīti nirviśeṣatvād iti padasyābhiprāyaḥ // (MT_4,18.21)
analyzed: sarveṣu svabhāveṣu abhiyogaḥ prāpnoti iti nirviśeṣa tvāt iti padasya abhiprāyaḥ

original: na cāsattā sarvamaye vaktuṃ kvacana śakyate /
analyzed: na ca asattā sarva maye vaktum kvacana śakyate

original: nākāraṇe kāraṇādi pare vāsty ādikāraṇe // MU_4,18.22
analyzed: na akāraṇe kāraṇa ādi pare vā asti ādi kāraṇe
asataḥ sarva maya tva ayogāt iti bhāvaḥ
tādṛśe ādikāraṇe pare utkṛṣṭe cit mātre
ādi kāraṇa tva apāyāt iti bhāvaḥ
bījam jahat nija vapuḥ phalībhūtam vilokyate

original: brahmājahan nijavapuḥ phalam bījaṃ ca saṃsthitam // MU_4,18.23
analyzed: brahmā ajahat nija vapuḥ phalam bījam ca saṃsthitam

original: vilokyate ] N17: phal(aṃ bījaṃ ca saṃsthitaṃ)

analyzed: vilokyate bījasya ākṛtimat sarvam tena anākṛti

original: brahmaṇaḥ bījatvāvasthāne nijavapuṣaḥ ahānam eva hetuḥ // (MT_4,18.23)
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ bīja tva avasthāne nija vapuṣaḥ ahānam eva hetuḥ
bījasya ākṛtimat sarvam tena anākṛti tat padam

original: na yujyate samīkartuṃ tasmān nāsty upamā śive // MU_4,18.24
analyzed: na yujyate samīkartum tasmāt nā asti upamā śive

original: kham eva jāyate khābhān na ca taj jāyate ḥnyadṛk /
analyzed: kham eva jāyate kha ābhāt na ca tat jāyate

original: ato na jātaṃ vā jātaṃ viddhi brahmanabho jagat // MU_4,18.25
analyzed: atas na jātam vā jātam viddhi brahma nabhaḥ jagat
kha ābhāt atyanta nairmalyena ākāśa tulyāt brahmaṇaḥ
anya dṛś brahma itara dṛś rūpam

original: dṛśyam paśyan svam ātmānaṃ na draṣṭā samprapaśyati /
analyzed: dṛśyam paśyan svam ātmānam na draṣṭā samprapaśyati
prapañca ākrānta saṃvitteḥ kasya udeti nijā sthitiḥ
draṣṭā dṛśyam dṛśi kriyā viṣayībhūtam bhāva jātam
svam ātmānam draṣṭṛ rūpam nijam ātmānam
prapañcena ākrāntā sva unmukha tām nītā saṃvittiḥ

original: vidagdhatāyāṃ satyāṃ tu kevāsau mṛgatṛṣṇikā // MU_4,18.27
analyzed: vidagdha tāyām satyām tu kā iva asau mṛgatṛṣṇikā

original: ato vidagdhatā eva satsaṅgamādinā poṣaṇīyeti bhāvaḥ // (MT_4,18.27)
analyzed: atas vidagdha tā eva sat saṅgama ādinā poṣaṇīyā iti bhāvaḥ

original: ākāśaviśado draṣṭā sarvago ḥpi na paśyati /
analyzed: ākāśa viśadaḥ draṣṭā sarva gaḥ na paśyati

original: netraṃ nijam ivātmānaṃ dṛśībhūtam aho bhramaḥ // MU_4,18.28
analyzed: netram nijam iva ātmānam dṛśībhūtam aho bhramaḥ
ākāśa vat viśadaḥ śuddha cit mātra rūpa tvena atyanta nirmalaḥ
ākāśa viśadam brahma yatnena api na labhyate

original: dṛśye dṛśyatayādṛṣṭe tv asya lābhaḥ sudūrataḥ // MU_4,18.29
analyzed: dṛśye dṛśya tayā adṛṣṭe tu asya lābhaḥ su dūrataḥ

original: tvādṛksthūlo ḥvadhānena vinā yatra na dṛśyate /
analyzed: tvādṛś sthūlaḥ vinā yatra na dṛśyate

original: / sūkṣmasya draṣṭuḥ dṛśyatā atidūrodastā eva bhavati /
analyzed: sūkṣmasya draṣṭuḥ dṛśya tā ati dūra udastā eva bhavati

original: draṣṭā draṣṭaiva bhavati na tu spṛśati dṛśyatām /
analyzed: draṣṭā draṣṭā eva bhavati na tu spṛśati dṛśya tām

original: dṛśyaṃ ca dṛśyate tena draṣṭā rāma na dṛśyate // MU_4,18.31
analyzed: dṛśyam ca dṛśyate tena draṣṭā rāma na dṛśyate

original: draṣṭaiva sambhavaty eko na tu dṛśyam ihāsti hi /
analyzed: draṣṭā eva sambhavati ekaḥ na tu dṛśyam iha asti hi

original: draṣṭā sarvātmako dṛśyaṃ sthitaś cet keva dṛśyatā // MU_4,18.32
analyzed: draṣṭā sarva ātmakaḥ dṛśyam sthitaḥ ced kā iva dṛśya tā

original: nanu kathaṃ draṣṭā dṛśyatvena tiṣṭhatīty āśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntaṃ kathayati
analyzed: nanu katham draṣṭā dṛśya tvena tiṣṭhati iti āśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntam kathayati

original: sarvaśaktimatā rājñā yat yat sampādyate yathā /
analyzed: sarvaśaktimatā rājñā yat yat sampādyate yathā

original: tat tat tathā bhavaty āśu sa evodeti tattayā // MU_4,18.33
analyzed: tat tat tathā bhavati āśu saḥ eva udeti tad tayā

sampādyate sampādana kriyā viṣaya tām nīyate

original: / vicāre kriyamāṇe sa eva rājā eva /
analyzed: vicāre kriyamāṇe saḥ eva rājā eva
tad tayā tad tad vastu rūpeṇa
yathā sarva śaktimān rājā sva avyatirikta jñāna dvāreṇa jñāna vivarta bhūta sampadyamāna vastu tayā
sphurati tathā draṣṭā sva avyatirikta dṛśi kriyā dvāreṇa dṛśi kriyā vivarta bhūta dṛśyamāna padārtha tayā sphurati iti
yathā madhu rasa ullāsaḥ ṣaṇḍaḥ bhavati bhāsuraḥ
rasa tām ajahat ca eva phala puṣpa dala unnataḥ

original: cidullāsas tathā jīvo bhūtvā bhavati dehakaḥ /
cinmātratāṃ tām ajahad eva darśanadṛṅmayaḥ // MU_4,18.35
analyzed: cit mātra tām tām ajahat eva darśana dṛś mayaḥ
darśana dṛś mayaḥ karma sādhanaḥ ḥyam darśana śabdaḥ
tena dṛśya dṛś mayaḥ iti arthaḥ yugmam

original: yathodeti raso bhaumaś cit tathodety ahambhramaiḥ // MU_4,18.36
analyzed: yathā udeti rasaḥ bhaumaḥ cit tathā udeti ahambhramaiḥ
cit rasa ullāsa vṛkṣāṇām kacatām ātmanā ātmani

original: svādayaty evam eṣā cit pṛthak paśyati saṃsṛtīḥ // MU_4,18.38
analyzed: svādayati evam eṣā cit pṛthak paśyati saṃsṛtīḥ
rasena kṛtām ucchūna tā rūpām camatkṛtim rasa camatkṛtim

original: yā yodeti yathā yasyā jīvaśakteḥ svasaṃsṛtiḥ /
analyzed: yā yā udeti yathā yasyāḥ jīva śakteḥ sva saṃsṛtiḥ

original: tām tāṃ tathaiti sā svāntaś cid bhūtabhuvanasthitim // MU_4,18.39
analyzed: tām tām tathā eti sā sva antaḥ cit bhūta bhuvana sthitim

original: svayaṃ vihṛtya saṃsāre śāmyanti cirakālataḥ // MU_4,18.40
analyzed: svayam vihṛtya saṃsāre śāmyanti cira kālataḥ

original: sūkṣmayā parayā dṛṣṭyā svam paśyasy anayā tathā /
analyzed: sūkṣmayā parayā dṛṣṭyā svam paśyasi anayā tathā
jagat jāla sahasrāṇi paramāṇu antareṣu api
tvam svam cit mātra ākhyam sva ātmānam
sūkṣmayā sūkṣma vastu viṣaya tvena sūkṣma rūpayā
tathā paramāṇu antareṣu api jagat jāla sahasrāṇi paśyasi
api śabdaḥ paramāṇu antareṣu jagat jāla sahasra darśana asambhava dyotakaḥ

original: bhittau nabhasi pāṣāṇe jvālāyām anile jale /
analyzed: bhittau nabhasi pāṣāṇe jvālāyām anile jale

original: santi saṃsāralakṣyāṇi tile tailam ivākhile // MU_4,18.42
analyzed: santi saṃsāra lakṣyāṇi tile tailam iva akhile

original: śuddham eti yadā cetas tadā jīvo bhavec citiḥ /
analyzed: śuddham eti yadā cetaḥ tadā jīvaḥ bhavet citiḥ

original: śuddhā ca sā sarvagatā tena sammelanam mithaḥ // MU_4,18.43
analyzed: śuddhā ca sā sarva gatā tena sammelanam mithas

original: tenopalambhaḥ kuḍyādāv āsāṃ dṛḍhataraḥ sthitaḥ // MU_4,18.45
analyzed: tena upalambhaḥ kuḍya ādau āsām dṛḍhataraḥ sthitaḥ
kuḍya ādau dṛḍhataraḥ upalambhaḥ sthitaḥ asti
idam kuḍyam ityādi rūpam jñānam asti

original: yad yatra cid bhāvayati tat tatrāśu bhavaty alam /
analyzed: yat yatra cit bhāvayati tat tatra āśu bhavati alam

original: tayā svapne ḥpi yad dṛṣṭaṃ tatkāle satyam eva tat // MU_4,18.46
analyzed: tayā svapne yat dṛṣṭam tad kāle satyam eva tat
cit aṇoḥ antare santi samasta anubhava aṇavaḥ
yathā bīja antare pattra latā puṣpa phala aṇavaḥ
samastāḥ samasta ghaṭa paṭa ādi ākārāḥ

original: līnam ākāśam ākāśe dvaitaikyabhramam utsṛja // MU_4,18.48
analyzed: līnam ākāśam ākāśe dvaita aikya bhramam utsṛja

original: etasya phalaṃ kathayati dvaitaikyam iti / ataḥ tvam
analyzed: etasya phalam kathayati dvaita aikyam iti atas tvam
eka tayā api vaktum aśakyasya kevalasya cit mātrasya

original: aṇūn anubhavaty antar itarāṇor asambhavāt // MU_4,18.49
analyzed: aṇūn anubhavati antar itara aṇoḥ asambhavāt
deśa ādi rūpasya cit vyatiriktasya aṇoḥ

brahma ādeḥ kīṭa niṣṭhasya deha dṛṣṭyā anubhāvitaḥ
deha dṛṣṭyā anubhāvitaḥ anubhava viṣaya tām nītaḥ

original: kacitaṃ kiñcid eveha vastutas tu na kiñcana /
analyzed: kacitam kiñcid evā iha vastutas tu na kiñcana

original: svayaṃ svatvaṃ svādayante dvaitaṃ citparamāṇavaḥ // MU_4,18.51
analyzed: svayam sva tvam svādayante dvaitam cit paramāṇavaḥ
svayam prakacati sphāra dehaḥ cit aṇu ṣaṇḍakaḥ
netra ādi kusuma dvāraiḥ saṃvid āmodam udgiran
sampaśyati itarān kaścid bahī rūpeṇa cit ghanān

original: sarvagatvād anāśatvād dṛśyabījasya vai citeḥ // MU_4,18.53
analyzed: sarvaga tvāt anāśa tvāt dṛśya bījasya vai citeḥ

original: bahīrūpeṇa paśyati bāhyā ete iti anubhavati // (MT_4,18.53)
analyzed: bahīrūpeṇa paśyati bāhyāḥ ete iti anubhavati

original: antar evākhilaṃ kaścit paśyaty avikalaṃ jagat /
analyzed: antar eva akhilam kaścid paśyati avikalam jagat

original: antar eva svasminn eva / na tu bāhye // (MT_4,18.54)
analyzed: antar eva svasmin eva na tu bāhye

original: svapnāt svapnāntaraṃ tatra tathā paśyan punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: svapnāt svapna antaram tatra tathā paśyan punar punar

original: svapnāt svapnāntaram punaḥ punaḥ paśyan iti pūrveṇaiva sambandhaḥ
analyzed: svapnāt svapna antaram punar punar paśyan iti pūrveṇa eva sambandhaḥ
avaṭeṣu bhāva abhāva ākhyeṣu avaṭeṣu luṭhitaḥ
kā iva śikhara cyutā śilā iva

original: kecit sammīlitāḥ kecid ātmany eva bhrame sthitāḥ /
analyzed: kecid sammīlitāḥ kecid ātmani eva bhrame sthitāḥ
magnāḥ sva saṃvid rasataḥ sphurantaḥ dehi ṣaṇḍakāḥ
svayam antar prapaśyanti ye jagat jīva sambhramam

original: taiḥ kaiścit tat tathā dṛśyam asatsvapnavad āśritam // MU_4,18.57
analyzed: taiḥ kaiścid tat tathā dṛśyam asat svapna vat āśritam

original: taiḥ kaiścit tat dṛśyaṃ tathā āśritam antastvenaivāśritam /
analyzed: taiḥ kaiścid tat dṛśyam tathā āśritam antar tvena eva āśritam

original: turyāvasthāviṣṭā jīvanmuktā hi bāhyam api jagat svapnavad antaḥstham evānubhavanti
analyzed: turya avasthā āviṣṭāḥ jīvanmuktāḥ hi bāhyam api jagat svapna vat antaḥstham evā anubhavanti

original: sarvātmatvāt svabhāvasya tad dṛśyaṃ satyam ātmani /
analyzed: sarva ātma tvāt svabhāvasya tat dṛśyam satyam ātmani

original: sarvago vidyate yatra tatra sarvam udeti hi // MU_4,18.58
analyzed: sarvagaḥ vidyate yatra tatra sarvam udeti hi
sarva ātma tvāt sarva rūpeṇa vartamāna tvāt
siddhena dṛśya tvena asatyam api sat
atra āha sarvagaḥ iti hi yasmāt
sarva gaḥ sarva vyāpakam svabhāva apara paryāyam cit mātra tvam
atas svabhāva bhūta cit mātra vat

original: tatsattāvinābhāvi dṛśyam api satyam eveti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tad sattā avinābhāvi dṛśyam api satyam eva iti bhāvaḥ
jīva antar pratibhāsasya sargasya punar antare

original: jīvaṣaṇḍa udety uccais tasyāntar itaro ḥpi ca // MU_4,18.59
analyzed: jīva ṣaṇḍaḥ udeti uccais tasya antar ca

original: jīvāntar jāyate jīvas tasyāntar api jīvakaḥ /
analyzed: jīva antar jāyate jīvaḥ tasya antar api jīvakaḥ
sarvatra rambhā dalavat jīva bījam prajīvati
prajīvati prakṛṣṭāyāḥ jīvana kriyāyāḥ kartṛ tvam bhajati
dṛśya buddhi parāvṛddhi samam etat anantakam
hemni iva kaṭaka ādi tvam parijñaptyā eva naśyati
parijñaptyā eva cit mātram eva idam
na tu anyena kena api hetunā
dṛśya buddhyā dṛśyam idam iti buddhyā
yathā hemni sthitam kaṭaka ādi tvam parijñaptyā
hema eva idam iti jñānena naśyati

original: vicāro yasya nodeti ko ḥhaṃ kim idam ity alam /
analyzed: vicāraḥ yasya nā udeti kaḥ ḥham kim idam iti alam
tasya ādi anta avimuktaḥ ḥsau dīrghaḥ jīva jvara bhramaḥ
ḥ sau ādya tnta avimuktaḥ m ḥ sau

original: jīvo ḥham iti jvararūpaḥ bhramaḥ jīvajvarabhramaḥ //
analyzed: iti jvara rūpaḥ bhramaḥ jīva jvara bhramaḥ

original: vicāraḥ phalitas tasya vijñeyo yasya sanmateḥ /
analyzed: vicāraḥ phalitaḥ tasya vijñeyaḥ yasya sat mateḥ
dinānudinam āyāti tānavam bhoga gṛdhnu tā

original: yathā dehopayuktaṃ hi karoty ārogyam auṣadham /
analyzed: yathā deha upayuktam hi karoti ārogyam auṣadham

original: tathendriyajaye nyasto vivekaḥ phalito bhavet // MU_4,18.64
analyzed: tathā indriya jaye nyastaḥ vivekaḥ phalitaḥ bhavet

original: mokṣam prati sākṣād upāyatvād iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_4,18.64)
analyzed: mokṣam prati sākṣāt upāya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: viveko ḥsti vacasy eva citre ḥgnir iva bhāsvaraḥ /
analyzed: vivekaḥ u asti vacasi eva citre agniḥ iva bhāsvaraḥ

original: yasya tena parityaktā duḥkhāyaiva vivekitā // MU_4,18.65
analyzed: yasya tena parityaktā duḥkhāya eva viveki tā
yasya iti asya pūrva ardhena sambandhaḥ

original: yathā sparśena pavanaḥ sattām āyāti no girā /
analyzed: yathā sparśena pavanaḥ sattām āyāti no girā

original: citrāmṛtaṃ nāmṛtam eva viddhi citrānalaṃ nānalam eva viddhi /
analyzed: citra amṛtam na amṛtam eva viddhi citra analam na analam eva viddhi

original: citre ḥṅganā nūnam anaṅganaiva vācā vivekas tv aviveka eva // MU_4,18.67
analyzed: citre ḥṅganā nūnam an aṅganā eva vācā vivekaḥ tu a vivekaḥ eva
yathā citra sthasya amṛta ādeḥ tṛpti ādi arthakriyā kāri tva abhāvāt anamṛta ādi rūpatvam eva

original: ata eva indriyajayāsādhakasya vivekasya mokṣākhyārthakriyākāritvābhāvād avivekatvam eveti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva indriya jaya asādhakasya vivekasya mokṣa ākhya arthakriyā kāri tva abhāvāt aviveka tvam eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ vivekena tanutvam eti rāgo ḥtha vairaṃ ca samūlam eva /
analyzed: pūrvam vivekena tanu tvam eti rāgaḥ ca sa mūlam eva

original: paścāt parikṣīyata eva yatra sa pāvanas tatra vivekitāsti // MU_4,18.68
analyzed: paścāt parikṣīyate eva yatra sa pāvanaḥ tatra viveki tā asti

original: / asti / na tu vākyamātreṇa sadasannirṇāyake ity arthaḥ / iti śivam //
analyzed: asti na tu vākya mātreṇa sat asat nirṇāyake iti arthaḥ iti śivam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmoksopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe ḥṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī moksopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe ḥṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ
sargaḥ   śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe ḥṣṭādaśaḥ sargaḥ

original: atidurbodhatvena punar api pūrvoktam evārthaṃ kathayati
analyzed: ati durbodha tvena punar api pūrva uktam eva artham kathayati

original: jīvabījam param brahma sarvatra kham iva sthitam /
analyzed: jīvabījam param brahma sarvatra kham iva sthitam

original: tena jīvodarajagaty api jīvo ḥsty anekadhā // MU_4,19.1
analyzed: tena jīva udara jagatī api anekadhā
param brahma kham iva ākāśa vat
sthitam svarūpa sāra tayā sthitam bhavati

original: tatrasthitaṃ yat jagat svapnādirūpaṃ jagat / tasmin api
analyzed: tatra sthitam yat jagat svapna ādi rūpam jagat tasmin api
anekadhā nānāvidha sthāvara jaṅgama ātmaka prakāreṇa nānā prakāraḥ

original: kadalīdalavat santi kīṭā iva narodare // MU_4,19.2
analyzed: kadalī dala vat santi kīṭāḥ iva nara udare
tasya bhāvaḥ cidghana eka ātma tvam
jīva jātayaḥ kadalī dala vat santi

original: nanu jīvaḥ kuta utpadyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu jīvaḥ kutas utpadyate iti atra āha

original: yo yo rāma yathā grīṣme kalkasvedād bhavet krimiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ rāma yathā grīṣme kalka svedāt bhavet krimiḥ

original: tattannāma tathā cittvāt khaṃ jīvībhavati svataḥ // MU_4,19.3
analyzed: tat tat nāma tathā cit tvāt kham jīvībhavati svatas
grīṣme tāvat nānāvidhāḥ krimayaḥ kalka svedāt

original: jāyante / teṣāṃ śarīraṃ tāvat kalkasvedamayam bhavatu /
analyzed: jāyante teṣām śarīram tāvat kalka sveda mayam bhavatu
tad cālakaḥ tu jīvaḥ jīva tva anyathā anupapattyā
kalka svedasya śarīra mātra sampādane parisamāpta tvāt tad anyasya asannidhānāt ca
atas sarve jīvāḥ ākāśārūpāḥ eva iti
tad anyasya a sannidhānāt na aśc

original: yathā yathā yatante te jīvakāḥ svātmasiddhaye /
analyzed: yathā yathā yatante te jīvakāḥ sva ātma siddhaye

original: tathā tathā bhavanty āśu vicitropāsanakramaiḥ // MU_4,19.4
analyzed: tathā tathā bhavanti āśu vicitra upāsana kramaiḥ

original: svātmasiddhaye yathā yathā yatante vicitropāsanākramaiḥ yatanarūpaiḥ nānāvidhair upāsanākramaiḥ
analyzed: sva ātma siddhaye yathā yathā yatante vicitra upāsanā kramaiḥ yatana rūpaiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ upāsanā kramaiḥ

original: devān devayajo yakṣayajo yakṣān vrajanti hi /
analyzed: devān deva yajaḥ yakṣa yajaḥ yakṣān vrajanti hi

original: brahma brahmayajo yānti yad atucchaṃ tad āśrayet // MU_4,19.5
analyzed: brahma brahmayajaḥ yānti yat a tuccham tat āśrayet

original: ataḥ puruṣaḥ yat atuccham bhavati / tat
analyzed: atas puruṣaḥ yat atuccham bhavati tat

original: nanu tarhi śukraḥ kathaṃ svayatanaṃ vinā nānārūpatāṃ gata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi śukraḥ katham svayatanam vinā nānā rūpa tām gataḥ iti atra āha

original: sa śukro bhṛguputro hi nirmalatvāt svasaṃvidaḥ /
analyzed: sa śukraḥ bhṛgu putraḥ hi nirmala tvāt sva saṃvidaḥ
baddhaḥ prathama dṛṣṭena dṛśyena āśu svabhāvataḥ

original: svasaṃvidaḥ nirmalatvāt prathamadṛṣṭena dṛśyena svabhāvataḥ prayatanaṃ vināśu baddhaḥ svonmukhaḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sva saṃvidaḥ nirmala tvāt prathama dṛṣṭena dṛśyena svabhāvataḥ prayatanam vinā āśu baddhaḥ sva unmukhaḥ kṛtaḥ
abhijātā a parimlānā bālā yat prathamam puras

original: saṃvit prāpnoti tadrūpā bhavaty anyā na kācana // MU_4,19.7
analyzed: saṃvid prāpnoti tad rūpā bhavati anyā na kācana
atas eva a parimlānā tāvat kāluṣyam a gatā

original: pūrvaṃ sphuritam praśnaṃ śrīrāmaḥ asmin samaye pṛcchati
analyzed: pūrvam sphuritam praśnam śrī rāmaḥ asmin samaye pṛcchati
jāgrat svapna daśā bhedam bhagavan vaktum arhasi

original: kathaṃ ca jāgraj jāgrat syāt svapno ḥjāgrat katham bhavet // MU_4,19.8
analyzed: katham ca jāgrat jāgrat syāt svapnaḥ katham bhavet

original: kiṃ kathayāmīty apekṣāyām āha katham iti /
analyzed: kim kathayāmi iti apekṣāyām āha katham iti

original: etad eva kathaya me iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: etat eva kathaya me iti bhāvaḥ

original: sthirapratyayayuktaṃ yat taj jāgrad iti kathyate /
analyzed: sthira pratyaya yuktam yat tat jāgrat iti kathyate

original: asthirapratyayaṃ yat syāt sa svapnaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ // MU_4,19.9
analyzed: asthira pratyayam yat syāt sa svapnaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ

original: sthirapratyayena sa evāyam ity evaṃrūpapratyabhijñāyāṃ kṣameṇa sthirajñānena /
analyzed: sthira pratyayena saḥ eva ayam iti evaṃrūpa pratyabhijñāyām kṣameṇa sthira jñānena
yat asthira pratyayam pratyabhijñā kṣamā sthira jñāna yuktam
jāgrat svapnayoḥ kadācid sambhava yuktam svapna jāgrat tvam kathayati

original: jāgrac cet kṣaṇadṛṣṭaḥ syāt svapnaḥ kālāntarasthitaḥ /
analyzed: jāgrat ced kṣaṇa dṛṣṭaḥ syāt svapnaḥ kāla antara sthitaḥ

original: taj jāgrat svapnatām eti svapno jāgrattvam ṛcchati // MU_4,19.10
analyzed: tat jāgrat svapna tām eti svapnaḥ jāgrat tvam ṛcchati
jāgran lakṣaṇayā jāgrat jñāna viṣayībhūtam vastu
kṣaṇa dṛṣṭaḥ kṣaṇam eva dṛṣṭaḥ syāt
tathā svapnaḥ svapna jñāna viṣayībhūtam vastu
kadācid hi svapna dṛṣṭam api vastu
nanu katham etat iti atra āha
jāgrat svapna daśā bhedaḥ na sthira asthira tām vinā

original: samaḥ sadaiva sarvatra samastānubhavo ḥnayoḥ // MU_4,19.11
analyzed: samaḥ sadā eva sarvatra samasta anubhavaḥ

original: yataḥ jāgratsvapnadaśābhedaḥ sthiratāsthiratāṃ vinā na bhavati /
analyzed: yatas jāgrat svapna daśā bhedaḥ sthiratā sthiratām vinā na bhavati

original: svapnatvaṃ sthirasvapnasya jāgrattvaṃ yuktam eveti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: svapna tvam sthira svapnasya jāgrat tvam yuktam eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: yad eva sthiratām eti taj jāgrad iti kathyate /
analyzed: yat eva sthira tām eti tat jāgrat iti kathyate

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgātmakaḥ svapno yathā bhavati tac chṛṇu // MU_4,19.12
analyzed: kṣaṇa bhaṅga ātmakaḥ svapnaḥ yathā bhavati tat śṛṇu

original: ataḥ yad eva sthiratām eti paṇḍitaiḥ tat svapno ḥpi san jāgrad iti kathyate / yaḥ
analyzed: atas yat eva sthira tām eti paṇḍitaiḥ tat svapnaḥ san jāgrat iti kathyate yaḥ

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgātmakaḥ saḥ jāgrad api san svapnaḥ bhavati /
analyzed: kṣaṇa bhaṅga ātmakaḥ saḥ jāgrat api san svapnaḥ bhavati
yathā etat bhavati tvam tat śṛṇu
yathā jāgrat svapnayoḥ sthira tva asthira tvam

original: jīvadhātuḥ śarīre ḥntar vidyate yena jīvyate /
analyzed: jīvadhātuḥ śarīre ḥntar vidyate yena jīvyate

original: tejo vīryaṃ jīvadhātur ityādyabhidham aṅga tat // MU_4,19.13
analyzed: tejaḥ vīryam jīvadhātuḥ ityādi abhidham aṅga tat
tejaḥ vīryam jīvadhātuḥ ityādi abhidham bhavati
atra ca dhātu śabdaḥ majja ādi vat śarīra antaḥ

original: vyavahārī yadā kāyo manasā karmaṇā girā /
analyzed: vyavahārī yadā kāyaḥ manasā karmaṇā girā

original: bhavet tadā sa sampanno jīvadhātuḥ prasarpati // MU_4,19.14
analyzed: bhavet tadā sa sampannaḥ jīvadhātuḥ prasarpati

original: tadā saḥ jīvadhātuḥ sampannaḥ sampūrṇaḥ san /
analyzed: tadā saḥ jīvadhātuḥ sampannaḥ sampūrṇaḥ san
sarvasmin śarīre sañcāram karoti iti arthaḥ

original: tasmin prasarpaty aṅgeṣu sparśāt saṃvid udeti hi /
analyzed: tasmin prasarpati aṅgeṣu sparśāt saṃvid udeti hi
puṣṭa tvāt sā eti citta ākhyām antar līna jagat bhramā

original: hi niścaye / saṃvit jīvadhātuspandabhūtā śītoṣṇādisañcetanarūpā saṃvit /
analyzed: hi niścaye saṃvid jīva dhātu spanda bhūtā śīta uṣṇa ādi sañcetana rūpā saṃvid
sā saṃvid antar līna jagat bhramā satī
puṣṭa tvāt jīvadhātu prasarpaṇena puṣṭa tvāt

original: nanu antarlīnajagadbhramatvaṃ saṃvidaḥ katham iti cet / satyam
analyzed: nanu antar līna jagat bhrama tvam saṃvidaḥ katham iti ced satyam
jīvadhātuḥ ca pitṛ jīvadhātoḥ utthāna samaye
atas saṃvidaḥ antar līna jagat bhrama tvam
sā īkṣaṇa ādiṣu randhreṣu prasarpantī bahis mayam
nānā ākāra vikāra āḍhyam rūpam ātmani paśyati
sā saṃvid īkṣaṇā ādi randhreṣu prasarpantī satī
nānā ākāra vikāraiḥ ghaṭa paṭa ādi rūpaiḥ
antar iva saṅkalpa siddha ghaṭa paṭa ādi tām
na ca etat katham iti vācyam
yathā svapne saṃvid eva nānā rūpaiḥ

original: bhāti / tathā bahir apīti na virodhaḥ //
analyzed: bhāti tathā bahis api iti na virodhaḥ

original: tat sthiratvāt tayaivātha jāgrad ity avagamyate /
analyzed: tat sthira tvāt tayā eva atha jāgrat iti avagamyate

original: jāgratkrama iti proktaḥ suṣuptādikramaṃ śṛṇu // MU_4,19.17
analyzed: jāgrat kramaḥ iti proktaḥ suṣupta ādi kramam śṛṇu
na tu anyena deha ādinā jaḍena
tat nānā ākāra vikāra āḍhyam nijam

original: svarūpam / sthiratvāt kam api kālam tathaiva sthitatvāt /
analyzed: svarūpam sthira tvāt kam api kālam tathā eva sthita tvāt
jāgrat prakriyā upasaṃhāra pūrvam suṣupta ādi prakriyām vaktum pratijānīte jāgrat krama

original: manasā karmaṇā vācā yadā kṣubhyati no vapuḥ /
analyzed: manasā karmaṇā vācā yadā kṣubhyati naḥ vapuḥ

original: śānta ātiṣṭhati svaccho jīvadhātus tadā tv asau // MU_4,19.18
analyzed: śāntaḥ ātiṣṭhati svacchaḥ jīvadhātuḥ tadā tu asau

original: yady api suṣuptaviṣayaḥ śrīrāmakṛtaḥ praśno nāsti tathāpi jāgratsvapnayor
analyzed: yadi api suṣupta viṣayaḥ śrī rāma kṛtaḥ praśnaḥ na asti tathā api jāgrat svapnayoḥ
avaśyam madhya varti tvāt suṣupti nirṇayaḥ

original: na hi jāgrataḥ nirgatya suṣuptim agatvā
analyzed: na hi jāgrataḥ nirgatya suṣuptim a gatvā
setu vat sarvatra maryādā tvena suṣupteḥ sthita tvāt

original: / yady api śuddhacid api sarvatra madhye setutvena vartata eva tathāpi vidyuddyotaratnavat sthūladṛṣṭyaviṣayatvāt tasyāḥ setutvākathanam /
analyzed: yadi api śuddha cit api sarvatra madhye setu tvena vartate eva tathā api vidyut dyota ratna vat sthūla dṛṣṭi aviṣaya tvāt tasyāḥ setu tva a kathanam
tadā kim sampatsyate iti atra āha

original: samatām āgatair vātaiḥ kṣobhyate na hṛdantare /
analyzed: sama tām āgataiḥ vātaiḥ kṣobhyate na hṛd antare
nirvāta sadane dīpaḥ yathā loka eka kārakaḥ
samatām manaḥ kṛta kṣobha abhāvāt samavāhi tvam

original: hṛdantare na kṣobhyate kṣobhayukto na kriyate /
analyzed: hṛd antare na kṣobhyate kṣobha yuktaḥ na kriyate
anena manaḥ nāśena prāṇa rodhaḥ prāṇa rodhena
tatra api keṣāñcid prāṇa rodhena manaḥ nāśaḥ mataḥ
asmākam tu samyak jñāna sādhitena manaḥ nāśena eva prāṇa rodhaḥ
tatas sarvathā manaḥ nāśaḥ prāṇa rodhena
manaḥ nāśaḥ tu madirā ādi prayukta manaḥ nāśavan

original: atra pratibhānvitā eva pramāṇam ity alam bahunā /
analyzed: atra pratibhā anvitāḥ eva pramāṇam iti alam bahunā

original: yathā nirvātasadane vātaiḥ ālokaikakārakaḥ dīpo na kṣobhyate
analyzed: yathā nirvāta sadane vātaiḥ āloka eka kārakaḥ dīpaḥ na kṣobhyate
tatas kim sampadyate iti atra āha

original: tataḥ sarati nāṅgeṣu saṃvit kṣubhyati tena no /
analyzed: tatas sarati na aṅgeṣu saṃvid kṣubhyati tena no

original: na cekṣaṇādīny āyāti randhrāṇy āyāti no bahiḥ // MU_4,19.20
analyzed: na ca īkṣaṇa ādīni āyāti randhrāṇi āyāti no bahis

original: aṅgeṣu na sarati sañcāraṃ na karoti /
analyzed: aṅgeṣu na sarati sañcāram na karoti

original: randhrāṇi na cāyāti bahiḥ no āyāti // (MT_4,19.20)
analyzed: randhrāṇi na ca āyāti bahis na u āyāti
tadā asau kutra tiṣṭhati iti apekṣāyām āha

original: jīve ḥntar eva sphurati tailasaṃvid yathā tile /
analyzed: jīve ḥntar eva sphurati taila saṃvid yathā tile

original: śītasaṃvid dhima iva snehasaṃvid yathā ghṛte // MU_4,19.21
analyzed: śīta saṃvid himaḥ iva sneha saṃvid yathā ghṛte

original: asau saṃvit jīve ḥntaḥ svadharmibhūtajīvamadhye eva /
analyzed: asau saṃvid jīve svadharmi bhūta jīva madhye eva

original: nanu tadā jīvaḥ kiṃ karotīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tadā jīvaḥ kim karoti iti atra āha
jīvaḥ kāla kalām kāñcid tiṣṭhan śānta tayā ātmani

original: daśām āyāti sauṣuptīṃ saumyavātāṃ vicetanām // MU_4,19.22
tadā jīvaḥ kāñcit atisūkṣmatayā vaktum aśakyām /
analyzed: tadā jīvaḥ kāñcid ati sūkṣma tayā vaktum aśakyām
kāla kalām kāla leśam tāvat śānta tayā
anena jāgrat suṣuptayoḥ madhye sūkṣma dṛṣṭibhiḥ
anena eva ca abhiprāyeṇa nidrā ādau jāgarasya ante ityādi

original: nanu suṣupta eva jīvaḥ kṣobharāhityāt kathaṃ na turyavān astīty apekṣāyām āha
analyzed: nanu suṣuptaḥ eva jīvaḥ kṣobha rāhityāt katham na turyavān asti iti apekṣāyām āha

original: jñātvā cetasy uparate śāmyan vyavaharann api /
analyzed: jñātvā cetasi uparate śāmyan vyavaharan api
jāgrat svapna suṣupteṣu prabuddhaḥ turyavān smṛtaḥ
jñātvā śuddha cit mātra rūpam sva ātmānam samyak jñātvā

original: vyavaharann api śarīrayātrānimittaṃ vyavahāraṃ kurvann api /
analyzed: vyavaharan api śarīra yātrā nimittam vyavahāram kurvan api
śāmyan vyavahāra kṛtam kṣobham atyanta naipuṇyāt agacchan
prabuddhaḥ kīdṛś rūpāṇi etāni iti samyak jñāna yuktaḥ

original: smṛtaḥ / suṣuptas tu naitādṛśo ḥstīti nāsau turyavān iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_4,19.23)

original: tathā spando ḥsya karmākhyas tathā śākhā vimuñcati // MU_4,21.20
analyzed: tathā spandaḥ karma ākhyaḥ tathā śākhāḥ vimuñcati
tathā kriyām tad phala dām niṣpādayati ca ādarāt

original: tatas tad eva cāsvādam anubhūyāśu badhyate // MU_4,21.21
analyzed: tatas tat eva ca āsvādam anubhūya āśu badhyate
tat eva bhāva viṣayīkṛtam vastu eva

original: yaṃ yam bhāvam upādatte tat tad vastv iti vindati /
analyzed: yam yam bhāvam upādatte tat tat vastu iti vindati

original: tac chreyo ḥnyat tu nāstīti niścayo ḥsya prajāyate // MU_4,21.22
analyzed: tat śreyaḥ ḥ anyat tu na asti iti niścayaḥ ḥsya prajāyate
dharma artha kāma mokṣa artham prayatante sadā eva hi

original: manāṃsi dṛḍhabhāvāni pratipattyā svayaiva hi // MU_4,21.23
analyzed: manāṃsi dṛḍha bhāvāni pratipattyā svayā eva hi
svayā pratipattyā na tu para preraṇayā

original: yadartham iyam prakriyā kṛtā tad eva kathayati
analyzed: yad artham iyam prakriyā kṛtā tat eva kathayati

original: manobhiḥ kāpilānāṃ tu pratipattiṃ nijām alam /
analyzed: manobhiḥ kāpilānām tu pratipattim nijām alam
śāstra dṛṣṭayaḥ prakṛti puruṣa pratipādikāḥ śāstra dṛṣṭayaḥ kalpitāḥ

original: mokṣe tu nānyathā prāptir iti bhāvitacetasaḥ /
analyzed: mokṣe tu nā anyathā prāptiḥ iti bhāvita cetasaḥ

original: svāṃ dṛṣṭim pravivṛṇvantaḥ sthitāḥ svaniyamabhramaiḥ // MU_4,21.25
analyzed: svām dṛṣṭim pravivṛṇvantaḥ sthitāḥ sva niyama bhramaiḥ

original: eṣām api manovaśād eva matabhedo ḥstīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: eṣām api manaḥ vaśāt eva mata bhedaḥ ḥsti iti bhāvaḥ
vedānta vādinaḥ buddhyā brahma idam iti dṛḍhayā

original: yuktiṃ śamadamopetāṃ nirṇīya parikalpya ca // MU_4,21.26
analyzed: yuktim śama dama upetām nirṇīya parikalpya ca

original: muktau tu nānyathā prāptir iti bhāvitacetasaḥ /
analyzed: muktau tu nā anyathā prāptiḥ iti bhāvita cetasaḥ

original: svāṃ dṛṣṭim pravivṛṇvantaḥ sthitāḥ svaniyamabhramaiḥ // MU_4,21.27
analyzed: svām dṛṣṭim pravivṛṇvantaḥ sthitāḥ sva niyama bhramaiḥ
vijñāna vādinaḥ buddhyā sphurat sva bhrama rūpayā

original: svāṃ dṛṣṭim pravivṛṇvanti svair eva niyamabhramaiḥ // MU_4,21.28
analyzed: svām dṛṣṭim pravivṛṇvanti svaiḥ eva niyama bhramaiḥ
vijñāna vādinaḥ vijñāna advaita vādinaḥ bauddhāḥ
svām dṛṣṭim vijñānam eva idam iti rūpām
ārhata ādibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca svayā abhimatayā icchayā
citrāḥ citra samācārāḥ kalpitāḥ śāstra dṛṣṭayaḥ
nirnimitta uttha saumya ambu budbuda oghaiḥ iva utthitaiḥ

original: svaniścayair iti prauḍhā nānākārā hi rītayaḥ // MU_4,21.30
analyzed: sva niścayaiḥ iti prauḍhāḥ nānā ākārāḥ hi rītayaḥ

original: sarvāsām eva caitāsāṃ rītīnām eka ākaraḥ /
analyzed: sarvāsām eva ca etāsām rītīnām ekaḥ ākaraḥ

original: mano nāma mahābāho maṇīnām iva sāgaraḥ // MU_4,21.31
analyzed: manaḥ nāma mahā bāho maṇīnām iva sāgaraḥ
na nimba ikṣū kaṭu svādū śīta uṣṇau na indu pāvakau

original: yad yathā manasābhyastam upalabdhaṃ tathaiva tat // MU_4,21.32
analyzed: yat yathā manasā abhyastam upalabdham tathā eva tat

original: anyathā cittavṛttibhedena heyopādeyatvaṃ na syāt / yad eva
analyzed: anyathā citta vṛtti bhedena heya upādeya tvam na syāt yat eva

original: hi yasya heyatvena sthitaṃ tad evānyasyopādeyatayā // (MT_4,21.32)
analyzed: hi yasya heya tvena sthitam tat eva anyasya upādeya tayā

original: yas tv akṛtrima ānandas tadartham prayateta na vai /
analyzed: yaḥ tu akṛtrimaḥ ānandaḥ tad artham prayateta na vai

original: manas tanmayatāṃ neyaṃ tenāsau samavāpyate // MU_4,21.33
analyzed: manaḥ tad maya tām neyam tena asau samavāpyate

original: yataḥ kasmiṃścid api bāhye vastuni svabhāvena svādutā nāsti
analyzed: yatas kasmiṃścid api bāhye vastuni svabhāvena svādu tā nā asti

original: / ataḥ yaḥ akṛtrimaḥ bhogādiviṣayanirapekṣatvena sthitatvāt svābhāvikaḥ / ānandaḥ
analyzed: atas yaḥ akṛtrimaḥ bhoga ādi viṣaya nirapekṣa tvena sthita tvāt svābhāvikaḥ ānandaḥ
nanu kena yatnena asau prāpyate iti
tad maya tām sva ātma bhūta ānanda rūpa tām
tena manasaḥ tad maya tva nayana mātreṇa yatnena asau

original: nanu sukhaduḥkhavaśīkṛtam manaḥ kathaṃ tanmayatāṃ neyam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu sukha duḥkha vaśīkṛtam manaḥ katham tad maya tām neyam iti atra āha
dṛśyam saṃsāra ḍimba stham tuccham parijahan manaḥ
tad jābhyām sukha duḥkhābhyām na avaśaḥ parikṛṣyate
dṛśyam dṛśi kriyā viṣayam bhāva jātam
jahat sva aunmukhya viṣaya tām nayat
na avaśaḥ parikṛṣyate na balātkāreṇa asvādhīnīkriyate

original: nanu dṛśye ko doṣo ḥstīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu dṛśye kaḥ doṣaḥ asti iti atra āha
apavitram asat rūpam mohanam bhaya kāraṇam

original: dṛśyam ābhāsam ābhogi bandham mā bhāvayānagha // MU_4,21.35
analyzed: dṛśyam ābhāsam ābhogi bandham mā bhāvaya anagha

original: anagha / dṛśyabhāvanānarhatvaṃ dṛśyam mā bhāvaya manoḥnusandhānaviṣayam mā kuru /
analyzed: anagha dṛśya bhāvanā anarha tvam dṛśyam mā bhāvaya manoḥ anusandhāna viṣayam mā kuru

original: kimarthaṃ na bhāvayāmīty apekṣāyāṃ viśeṣaṇāny āha apavitram ityādi /
analyzed: kimartham na bhāvayāmi iti apekṣāyām viśeṣaṇāni āha apavitram ityādi
apavitram rāga ādi rūpa pāpa utpādaka tvāt
asat rūpam kiṃrūpam iti vicāra asaha tvāt pāramārthika sattā rahitam

original: māyaiṣā sā hy avidyaiṣā bhāvanaiṣā bhayāvahā /
analyzed: māyā eṣā sā hi avidyā eṣā bhāvanā eṣā bhaya āvahā

original: saṃvidas tanmayatvaṃ yat tat karmeti vidur budhāḥ // MU_4,21.36
analyzed: saṃvidaḥ tanmaya tvam yat tat karma iti viduḥ budhāḥ
nanu tarhi karma kiṃrūpam asti iti
tad maya tvam dṛśya maya tvam
budhāḥ tat karma iti viduḥ karmā api

original: nanu manaḥ kiṃrūpam asti yena kṛtā dṛśyabhāvanā māyādināmatvenoktety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu manaḥ kiṃrūpam asti yena kṛtā dṛśya bhāvanā māyā ādi nāma tvena uktā iti atra āha

original: draṣṭur dṛśyaikatānatvaṃ viddhi tvam mohanam manaḥ /
analyzed: draṣṭuḥ dṛśya ekatāna tvam viddhi tvam mohanam manaḥ

original: bhramāyaiva ca tan mithyā mahīmakkolakarmavat // MU_4,21.37
analyzed: bhramāya eva ca tat mithyā mahī makkola karma vat
dṛśya eka tāna tvam dṛśyam prati sammukha tām
vastu sat na bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: / tadvat / yathā mṛttikāyāṃ kṛtasudhālepaḥ vastutaḥ san nāsti /
analyzed: tadvat yathā mṛttikāyām kṛta sudhā lepaḥ vastutas san na asti

original: mṛttikāyāḥ eva tathā sthitatvāt sudhāyāḥ lepatayaiva
analyzed: mṛttikāyāḥ eva tathā sthita tvāt sudhāyāḥ lepa tayā eva

original: bhāvāt / tathā cinmātre bhāsamānam manaḥ vastutaḥ nāsti cinmātrasyaiva tathā sthitatvāt
analyzed: bhāvāt tathā cit mātre bhāsamānam manaḥ vastutas na asti cit mātrasya eva tathā sthita tvāt

original: nanu kathaṃ draṣṭṛdṛśyaikatānatārūpam manaḥ mithyārūpam astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham draṣṭṛ dṛśya ekatāna tā rūpam manaḥ mithyā rūpam asti iti atra āha
draṣṭṛ dṛśya eka tāna tā rūpam
dṛśya tad maya tā yā eṣā svabhāvasya anubhūyate

original: saṃsāramadirā seyam avidyety ucyate budhaiḥ // MU_4,21.38
analyzed: saṃsāra madirā sā iyam avidyā iti ucyate budhaiḥ
yā dṛśya tad maya tā dṛśya eka tāna tā

original: / dṛśyate / budhaiḥ sā iyam bhramotpādakatvāt saṃsāramadirārūpā avidyeti ucyate /
analyzed: dṛśyate budhaiḥ sā iyam bhrama utpādaka tvāt saṃsāra madirā rūpā avidyā iti ucyate

original: ato manaḥ avidyārūpam evāvastubhūtam ity arthaḥ // (MT_4,21.38)
analyzed: atas manaḥ avidyā rūpam eva avastu bhūtam iti arthaḥ

original: ko ḥnarthaḥ anayāvidyayā kriyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: kaḥ anarthaḥ anayā avidyayā kriyate iti atra āha
anayā upahataḥ lokaḥ kalyāṇam na adhigacchati
bhāsvaram tapana ālokam paṭala andha īkṣaṇaḥ yathā
anayā draṣṭuḥ dṛśya tad maya tā rūpayā

original: nanu sā kuta utpadyata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu sā kutas utpadyate iti atra āha

original: svayam utpadyate sā ca saṅkalpād vyomavṛkṣavat /
analyzed: svayam utpadyate sā ca saṅkalpāt vyoma vṛkṣa vat
a saṅkalpana mātreṇa svayam eva vinaśyati
atra āha a saṅkalpana mātrā iti

original: nanv avidyānāśena kiṃ sampadyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu avidyā nāśena kim sampadyate iti atra āha
asaṃsaṅge padārtheṣu sarveṣu sthira tām gate

original: satyadṛṣṭau prasannāyām asatye kṣayam āgate // MU_4,21.42
analyzed: satya dṛṣṭau prasannāyām asatye kṣayam āgate
nirvikalpa cit acchā ātmā saḥ ātmā samavāpyate

original: nāsattā yasya no sattā na sukhaṃ nāpi duḥkhitā // MU_4,21.43
analyzed: na asattā yasya no sattā na sukham na api duḥkhi tā
sva prasādena sva ātma prasādena utpannena iti
nirvikalpaḥ dṛśya viṣaya vikalpa niṣkrāntā yā cit tad rūpaḥ
na tu acit rūpa deha ādi svarūpaḥ iti arthaḥ
atas nā avidyā nāśasya vaiphalyam iti bhāvaḥ

original: kīdṛśo ḥsāv ātmety apekṣāyām āha nāsatteti
analyzed: kīdṛśaḥ ātmā iti apekṣāyām āha na asattā iti
bāhya antaḥkaraṇa aviṣaya tvāt śaśa śṛṅga vat
sukha ādeḥ antaḥkaraṇa adhikaraṇa tvāt anyathā
punar kim tatra asti iti atra āha
abhavyayā bhāvanayā na citta indriya dṛṣṭibhiḥ
labdha eka rūpasya labhya tā yogāt

original: labdhṛtvam api tatra na yuktam ity alam vikalpāpādikayā vācā /
analyzed: labdhṛ tvam api tatra na yuktam iti alam vikalpa āpādikayā vācā

original: tanmuvraṇayā vā abhavyayā bhāvanayā na labhyate /
analyzed: tat muvraṇayā vai abhavyayā bhāvanayā na labhyate
citta indriya dṛṣṭibhiḥ ca na labhyate
ātmanaḥ an anya bhūtābhiḥ api yaḥ parivarjitaḥ
vāsanābhiḥ anantābhiḥ vyoma iva vana rājibhiḥ

original: yaḥ ātmā / ātmanaḥ ananyabhūtābhir api svasvarūpabhūtābhir api /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmā ātmanaḥ ananya bhūtābhiḥ api sva svarūpa bhūtābhiḥ api
bhavati śuddha cit mātra svarūpa tvāt
vāsanānām ca ātma rūpa tvam tad viṣaya tvam vinā asiddha bhāva prayuktam

original: eva jñeyam / na hi cinmātrāviṣayīkṛtā vāsanā vāsanā bhavati /
analyzed: eva jñeyam na hi cit mātrā viṣayīkṛtā vāsanā vāsanā bhavati

original: eva yuktā / sambandhaś ca vicāritaḥ san ekatāyāṃ viśrāmyati /
analyzed: eva yuktā sambandhaḥ ca vicāritaḥ san ekatāyām viśrāmyati
dvi tve tu virodha labdha siddheḥ

original: na hi viruddhayoḥ tamaḥprakāśayoḥ sambandhaḥ yukta
analyzed: na hi viruddhayoḥ tamaḥ prakāśayoḥ sambandhaḥ yukta

original: nanu yadi kevalaḥ sa evātmāsti tarhi dṛśyarūpaḥ bandhaḥ kuta āgata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi kevalaḥ saḥ eva ātmā asti tarhi dṛśya rūpaḥ bandhaḥ kutas āgataḥ iti atra āha

original: sandigdhāyāṃ yathā rajjvāṃ sarpatvaṃ tadvad eva hi /
analyzed: sandigdhāyām yathā rajjvām sarpa tvam tadvat eva hi

original: cidākāśātmanā bandhas tv abaddhenaiva kalpitaḥ // MU_4,21.46
analyzed: cit ākāśa ātmanā bandhaḥ tu abaddhena eva kalpitaḥ

original: yathā puruṣeṇa sandigdhāyāṃ rajjvāṃ sarpatvam kalpyate /
analyzed: yathā puruṣeṇa sandigdhāyām rajjvām sarpa tvam kalpyate

original: nanu kalpita eṣa bandhaḥ kathaṃ naśyatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kalpitaḥ eṣa bandhaḥ katham naśyati iti atra āha

original: tad evānyatvam ādatte kham ahorātrayor iva // MU_4,21.47
analyzed: tat eva anya tvam ādatte kham ahar rātrayoḥ iva
kalpitam kalpitam vastu sarvam kalpita vastu

original: kham ahorātrayoḥ tad eva sat anyatām ādatte /
analyzed: kham ahorātrayoḥ tat eva sat anyatām ādatte

original: nanv atucchatvādiguṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kalpito nāstīti kathaṃ saḥ kalpyate yena tucchatvādiguṇaviśiṣṭasaṃsārakalpanā
analyzed: nanu a tuccha tva ādi guṇa viśiṣṭaḥ kalpitaḥ na asti iti katham saḥ kalpyate yena tuccha tva ādi guṇa viśiṣṭa saṃsāra kalpanā

original: naśyati / na ca kalpanāṃ vinā kalpanāyāḥ nāśaḥ śakyakriyaḥ ayasaḥ ivāyo vinety / atrāha
analyzed: naśyati na ca kalpanām vinā kalpanāyāḥ nāśaḥ śakya kriyaḥ ayasaḥ iva ayaḥ vinā iti atra āha
yat a tuccham an āyāsam an upādhi gata bhramam

original: tat tatkalpanayā tādṛk tat sukhāyaiva kalpate // MU_4,21.48
analyzed: tat tad kalpanayā tādṛś tat sukhāya eva kalpate
yat vastu atuccham tuccha guṇa rahitam
gata bhramam śuddha satya bodha svarūpa tvāt bhrama sparśa rahitam bhavati
tad kalpanayā tasya a tuccha tva ādeḥ kalpanayā eva
bhavati śuddhe svarūpe tuccha tva a tuccha tva ādi sāpekṣa śabda avakāśa abhāvāt nanu tarhi
atra āha tat sukhāya eva iti
tat a tuccha tva ādi guṇakam vastu kalpitam
api sukhāya eva tuccha tva a tuccha tva rahita śuddha svarūpa viśrāntaye eva
tathā ca a tuccha tva ādi guṇaka kalpanayā pratipakṣa bhūtayā tuccha tva ādi guṇaka kalpanā

original: nanu satyabhūtasya dṛśyarūpasya bandhasya kathaṃ kalpanāmātreṇa nāśaḥ śakyakriyaḥ
analyzed: nanu satya bhūtasya dṛśya rūpasya bandhasya katham kalpanā mātreṇa nāśaḥ śakya kriyaḥ

original: śūnya eva kusūle ḥntaḥ siṃho ḥstīti bhayaṃ yathā /
analyzed: śūnye eva kusūle ḥntar siṃhaḥ ḥsti iti bhayam yathā

original: śūnya eva śarīre ḥntar baddho ḥsmīti bhayaṃ tathā // MU_4,21.49
analyzed: śūnye eva śarīre antar baddhaḥ u asmi iti bhayam tathā
kusūlaḥ siṃha bandhana artham yantra rūpam koṣṭhakam

original: tathāpi paramārthataḥ śuddhacidrūpasya bhavataḥ saḥ bandhakārī na bhavati
analyzed: tathā api paramārthataḥ śuddha cit rūpasya bhavataḥ saḥ bandha kārī na bhavati

original: / na hy ambaraṃ rajjubhiḥ badhyate iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na hi ambaram rajjubhiḥ badhyate iti bhāvaḥ

original: yathā śūnye kusūle ḥntaḥ prekṣya siṃho na labhyate /
analyzed: yathā śūnye kusūle prekṣya siṃhaḥ na labhyate

original: tathā saṃsārabandhārhaḥ prekṣitaḥ san na labhyate // MU_4,21.50
analyzed: tathā saṃsāra bandha arhaḥ prekṣitaḥ san na labhyate

original: nanu tarhi idaṃ jagat ayam aham ity evam bandhabadhyarūpā pratītiḥ katham astīty /
analyzed: nanu tarhi idam jagat ayam aham iti evam bandha badhya rūpā pratītiḥ katham asti iti

original: idaṃ jagad ayaṃ cāham itīyam bhrāntir utthitā /
analyzed: idam jagat ayam ca aham iti iyam bhrāntiḥ utthitā

original: bālānāṃ śyāmale kāle chāyā vaitālikī yathā // MU_4,21.51
analyzed: bālānām śyāmale kāle chāyā vaitālikī yathā

original: idaṃ jagat ayam aham ity evaṃrūpā pratītiḥ /
analyzed: idam jagat ayam aham iti evaṃrūpā pratītiḥ

original: nanu etādṛśī bhrāntiḥ katham utthitety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu etādṛśī bhrāntiḥ katham utthitā iti atra āha
kalpanā vaśataḥ jantoḥ bhāva abhāvāḥ śubha aśubhāḥ

original: kṣaṇād asattām āyānti sattām api punaḥ punaḥ // MU_4,21.52
analyzed: kṣaṇāt asat tām āyānti sat tām api punar punar
mātā eva gṛhiṇī bhāva gṛhītā kaṇṭha lambinī
karoti gṛhiṇī kāryam surata ānanda dāyinī
kāntā eva mātṛ bhāvena gṛhītā ā kaṇṭha lambinī
dūram vismārayati eva manmatha unmāda bhāvanām
iyam ca avasthā madhyama pāpi prabhṛtīnām jñeyā

original: mahāpāpināṃ tu atrāpi ratir eva jāyate //
analyzed: mahā pāpinām tu atra api ratiḥ eva jāyate
bhāva anusāri phala dam padārtha ogham avekṣya ca

original: na jñeneha padārtheṣu rūpam ekam udīryate // MU_4,21.55
analyzed: na jñena iha padārtheṣu rūpam ekam udīryate
padārtha ogham bhāva anusāri phalam dadāti iti tādṛśam

original: / padārtheṣv ekaṃ rūpaṃ na udīryate na kathyate //
analyzed: padārtheṣu ekam rūpam na udīryate na kathyate

original: dṛḍhabhāvanayā ceto yad yathā bhāvayaty alam /
analyzed: dṛḍha bhāvanayā cetaḥ yat yathā bhāvayati alam

original: tat tatphalaṃ tadākāraṃ tāvatkālam prapaśyati // MU_4,21.56
analyzed: tat tat phalam tad ākāram tāvatkālam prapaśyati

original: na tad asti na yat satyaṃ na tad asti na yan mṛṣā /
analyzed: na tat asti na yat satyam na tat asti na yat mṛṣā

original: yad yathā yena nirṇītaṃ tat tathā tena lakṣyate // MU_4,21.57
analyzed: yat yathā yena nirṇītam tat tathā tena lakṣyate

original: anyathā ekam eva vastu ekasya harṣadam anyasya duḥkhadaṃ na syād
analyzed: anyathā ekam eva vastu ekasya harṣa dam anyasya duḥkha dam na syāt
bhāvita ākāśa mātaṅgam vyomahasti tayā manaḥ
vyoma kānana mātaṅgīm vyoma sthām anudhāvati
vyoma hasti tayā vyoma hasti bhāvena
kānana ādhāra bhūte vyomni tiṣṭhati iti
tasmāt saṅkalpam eva tvam sarva bhāva maya ātmakam

original: tyaja rāghava susvasthaḥ svātmanaiva bhavātmani // MU_4,21.59
analyzed: tyaja rāghava su svasthaḥ sva ātmanā eva bhava ātmani

original: prādurbhūte ḥpi upekṣām eva kurv ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: prādurbhūte upekṣām eva kuru iti arthaḥ

original: na hi sarvathā tyāgaḥ videhamuktiṃ yāvat śakyakriyaḥ // (MT_4,21.59)
analyzed: na hi sarvathā tyāgaḥ videha muktim yāvat śakya kriyaḥ

original: nanu katham āgacchantaṃ saṅkalpaṃ tyajāmīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham āgacchantam saṅkalpam tyajāmi iti atra āha
maṇiḥ hi pratibimbānām pratiṣedha kriyām prati

original: aśakto jaḍabhāvena na tu rāma bhavādṛśaḥ // MU_4,21.60
analyzed: aśaktaḥ jaḍa bhāvena na tu rāma bhavādṛśaḥ
tat ca tava asti eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: yad yan manomaṇau rāma taveha pratibimbati /
analyzed: yat yat manaḥ maṇau rāma tava iha pratibimbati

original: tad avastv iti nirṇīya mā tenāgaccha rañjanām // MU_4,21.61
analyzed: tat avastu iti nirṇīya mā tena āgaccha rañjanām

original: tad eva satyam iti vāpy abhinnam paramātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tat eva satyam iti vā api abhinnam paramātmanaḥ

original: manvānas tvam anādyantam bhāvayātmānam ātmanā // MU_4,21.62
analyzed: manvānaḥ tvam anādi antam bhāvaya ātmānam ātmanā

original: sarvasya paramātmanaḥ abhinnatvabhāvanena hi anādyantātmabhāvanam eva sampadyate // (MT_4,21.62)
analyzed: sarvasya paramātmanaḥ abhinna tva bhāvanena hi anādi anta ātma bhāvanam eva sampadyate

original: cetasi pratibimbanti ye bhāvās tava rāghava /
analyzed: cetasi pratibimbanti ye bhāvāḥ tava rāghava

original: rañjayantv anyasaktātman mā te tvāṃ sphaṭikaṃ yathā // MU_4,21.63
analyzed: rañjayantu anya sakta ātman mā te tvām sphaṭikam yathā

original: anyathā pratibimbitabhāvarañjanābhāvo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: anyathā pratibimbita bhāva rañjana abhāvaḥ na yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: yathā anyarāgayuktaṃ sphaṭikam anyarāgakṛtā rañjanā na rañjayati /
analyzed: yathā anya rāga yuktam sphaṭikam anya rāga kṛtā rañjanā na rañjayati

original: nanu kathaṃ rañjanābhāvo dehaṃ tāvat śakya ity /
analyzed: nanu katham rañjana abhāvaḥ deham tāvat śakyaḥ iti

original: sphaṭikam apamalaṃ yathā viśanti prakaṭatayā navarañjanā vicitrāḥ /
analyzed: sphaṭikam apamalam yathā viśanti prakaṭa tayā nava rañjanāḥ vicitrāḥ

original: iha hi vimananaṃ tathā viśantu prakaṭatayā bhuvaṇaiṣaṇā bhavantam // MU_4,21.64
analyzed: iha hi vimananam tathā viśantu prakaṭa tayā bhuvaṇa eṣaṇāḥ bhavantam
vimananam manana ākhya manaḥ dharma rahitam

original: viśanti / tathā mananāparaparyāyānusandhānarāhityena śuddham bhavantam api padārthasaṅkalpanārūpāḥ
analyzed: viśanti tathā manana apara paryāya anusandhāna rāhityena śuddham bhavantam api padārtha saṅkalpanā rūpāḥ

original: lepākāriṇī rañjanā yady āyāti tadā na kācid dhānir
analyzed: lepa ākāriṇī rañjanā yadi āyāti tadā na kācid hāniḥ

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe ekaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe ekaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ
sargaḥ iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe

original: pūrvoktam evārthaṃ sthitiprakaraṇavācyatayā sthitatvāt punar api kathayati
analyzed: pūrva uktam eva artham sthiti prakaraṇa vācya tayā sthita tvāt punar api kathayati

original: mananaṃ tyajato jñatvāt kiñcit parigatātmanaḥ // MU_4,22.1
analyzed: mananam tyajataḥ jña tvāt kiñcid parigata ātmanaḥ

original: draṣṭāram paśyato dṛśyam adraṣṭāram apaśyataḥ // MU_4,22.2
analyzed: draṣṭāram paśyataḥ dṛśyam a draṣṭāram a paśyataḥ
suptasya ghana sammoha maye saṃsāra vartmani
paryanta atyanta vairasyāt araseṣu raseṣu api
vrajati ātma ambhasā eka tvam jīrṇa jāḍye manasi alam
galati apagata āsaṅge hima pūre iva ātape
taraṅgitāsu kallola jāla lola antarāsu ca

original: śāmyantīṣv atha tṛṣṇāsu nadīṣv iva ghanātyaye // MU_4,22.6
analyzed: śāmyantīṣu atha tṛṣṇāsu nadīṣu iva ghanātyaye

original: katakam phalam āsādya yathā vāri prasīdati /
analyzed: katakam phalam āsādya yathā vāri prasīdati
vijñāna vaśataḥ śuddha ātma jñāna vaśena

original: yathā katakam phalam āsādya vāri prasīdati
analyzed: yathā katakam phalam āsādya vāri prasīdati

original: / keṣu satsu prasīdatīty apekṣāyām āha vrajaty ātmetyādi /
analyzed: keṣu satsu prasīdati iti apekṣāyām āha vrajati ātmā ityādi
apagata āsaṅge naṣṭa āsakti ākhya doṣe
ākhunā iva khaga jāle troṭite sati

original: kṛtaḥ vicāraḥ ko ḥhaṃ kasya saṃsāra ity evaṃrūpaḥ vivekaḥ yena /
analyzed: kṛtaḥ vicāraḥ kaḥ ḥham kasya saṃsāraḥ iti evaṃrūpaḥ vivekaḥ yena
jñasya eva hi manana tyāge śaktiḥ
asti iti jña tvāt iti uktam
na tu aparokṣa tayā iti arthaḥ

original: anyat kiṃ tasya sampatsyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: anyat kim tasya sampatsyate iti atra āha

original: viniryāti mano mohād vihagaḥ pañjarād iva // MU_4,22.9
analyzed: viniryāti manaḥ mohāt vihagaḥ pañjarāt iva

original: paripūrṇāntaraṃ cetaḥ pūrṇendur iva rājate // MU_4,22.10
analyzed: paripūrṇa antaram cetaḥ pūrṇa induḥ iva rājate

sama tayā hi puruṣaḥ sadā eva prasanna vadanaḥ

andhakāra mayī mūḍhā jāḍya jarjarita antarā

original: tanutām eti saṃsāravāsaneva prage kṣapā // MU_4,22.12
analyzed: tanu tām eti saṃsāra vāsanā iva prage kṣapā
iva śabdaḥ kṣapā iti anena sambadhyate

original: vikasaty amaloddyotā prātar dyaur iva rūpiṇī // MU_4,22.13
analyzed: vikasati amala uddyotā prātar dyauḥ iva rūpiṇī

original: nodeti naiva yāty astam abhūtākāśakośavat // MU_4,22.15
analyzed: na udeti na eva yāti astam a bhūta ākāśa kośa vat

original: na udeti astaṃ nāyāti cinmātrākhyāt svasvarūpān na cyavata ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: na udeti astam na āyāti cit mātra ākhyāt sva svarūpāt na cyavate iti arthaḥ
abhūta ākāśa kośa vat parama ākāśa madhya vat
abhūta ākāśa kośa vat kośa vat

original: sṛṣṭinirmāṇādikṣobhadarśanāt asya dayā jāyate ity arthaḥ // (MT_4,22.16)
analyzed: sṛṣṭi nirmāṇa ādi kṣobha darśanāt asya dayā jāyate iti arthaḥ

original: nāpnuvanti vikalpās tam mṛgatṛṣṇāmbv ivaiṇakāḥ // MU_4,22.17
analyzed: na āpnuvanti vikalpāḥ tam mṛgatṛṣṇā ambu iva aiṇakāḥ

original: taraṅgavad amī lokāḥ prayānty āyānti cābhitaḥ /
analyzed: taraṅga vat amī lokāḥ prayānti āyānti ca abhitas

original: kroḍīkuruta ātmotthe na jñam maraṇajanmanī // MU_4,22.18
analyzed: kroḍīkurutaḥ ātma utthe na jñam maraṇa janmanī  /
deha abhimāna abhāvena tad stha mṛti janma abhimāna abhāvāt

analyzed: iti tābhyām samāloke ramate na sa khidyate

original: hi vastubhiḥ ramata eva na khidyate /
analyzed: hi vastubhiḥ ramate eva na khidyate

original: na jāyate na mriyate kumbhe kumbhanabho yathā /
analyzed: na jāyate na mriyate kumbhe kumbha nabhaḥ yathā

original: bhūṣite dūṣite vāpi dehe tadvad ihātmavān // MU_4,22.20
analyzed: bhūṣite dūṣite vā api dehe tadvat iha ātmavān

original: kṣīyate vāsanā sābhre mṛgatṛṣṇā marāv iva // MU_4,22.21

original: sābhre hi marau mṛgatṛṣṇā kṣīyata eva /
analyzed: sa abhre hi marau mṛgatṛṣṇā kṣīyate eva

original: ko ḥhaṃ katham idaṃ veti yāvan na pravicāritam /
analyzed: kaḥ ḥham katham idam vā iti yāvat na pravicāritam

original: andhakāro ḥpi kiṃrūpo ḥyam iti vicāraḥ /

analyzed: mithyā bhrama bhara udbhūtam śarīram padam āpadām

original: ātmabhāvanayā nedaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.23
analyzed: ātma bhāvanayā na idam yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: saḥ paśyati samyak paśyati iti piṇḍārthaḥ // (MT_4,22.23)
analyzed: saḥ paśyati samyak paśyati iti piṇḍa arthaḥ

original: śarīrasukhaduḥkhāni yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.24
analyzed: śarīra sukha duḥkhāni yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: sarvaṃ cijjyotir eveti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.25
analyzed: sarvam cit jyotiḥ eva iti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: aham eveti sarvatra yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.26
analyzed: aham eva iti sarvatra yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati  /

original: nabhaś ca dik ca kālaś ca /
analyzed: nabhaḥ ca diś ca kālaḥ ca
tat nabhaḥ diś kāla ādi apāra paryantam pāra paryanta rahitam

original: ca tat / nabhodikkālādirūpaṃ jagat aham evāsmi /
analyzed: ca tat nabhaḥ diś kāla ādi rūpam jagat aham eva asmi
ahantā sārasya cit mātra tattvasya eva
anyathā aham iti sarvatra na sphuret
cetana vat sattā bhāj tva aviśeṣāt

original: tatrāpi tatsphuraṇānumānasya śakyatvāt na sarvatrety asyānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: tatra api tad sphuraṇa anumānasya śakya tvāt na sarvatra iti asya anupapatteḥ
api kriyāyāḥ pṛthak nirdeśaḥ prādhānya khyāpana arthaḥ
śakya tvāt sphuraṇa anupmānasya śakṛya tvāt

original: ahaṃ sūkṣma iti vyāpī yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.27
analyzed: aham sūkṣmaḥ iti vyāpī yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: advitīyaś cid ity antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.28
analyzed: a dvitīyaḥ cit iti antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: sarvaśaktiḥ anyathā nānārūpaṃ jagat na prādurbhavet
analyzed: sarva śaktiḥ anyathā nānā rūpam jagat na prādurbhavet

original: / anantātmā antasyāpi tasminn eva nigīrṇatvāt tadrahitaḥ /

original: na hi nigīrṇa eva nigarituḥ rūpam ācchādayituṃ śaktaḥ /
analyzed: na hi nigīrṇaḥ eva nigarituḥ rūpam ācchādayitum śaktaḥ

original: deho nāham iti prājño yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.29
analyzed: dehaḥ na aham iti prājñaḥ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: tiryag ūrdhvam adhastāc ca vyāpako mahimā mama /
analyzed: tiryak ūrdhvam adhastāt ca vyāpakaḥ mahimā mama

original: na dvitīyo mamāstīti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.30
analyzed: na dvitīyaḥ mama asti iti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: mayi sarvam idam protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva /
analyzed: mayi sarvam idam protam sūtre maṇi gaṇāḥ iva

original: cittantur aham eveti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.31
analyzed: cit tantuḥ aham eva iti yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: / tantutvaṃ ca citaḥ vyāpakatayā sūkṣmatayā ca jñeyam // (MT_4,22.31)
analyzed: tantu tvam ca citaḥ vyāpaka tayā sūkṣma tayā ca jñeyam

original: nāhaṃ na cānyad astīha brahmaivāsti na cāsti tat /
analyzed: na aham na ca anyat asti iha brahmā eva asti na ca asti tat

original: itthaṃ sadasator madhyaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.32
analyzed: ittham sat asatoḥ madhyam yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
iha loke aham paricchinna deha ādi rūpaḥ aham

original: evam / sadasatoḥ madhyam sandhibhūtaṃ śuddhacinmātrākhyaṃ vastu /
analyzed: evam sat asatoḥ madhyam sandhi bhūtam śuddha cit mātra ākhyam vastu

original: yan nāma kiñcit trailokyaṃ sa eko ḥvayavo mama /
analyzed: yat nāma kiñcid trailokyam saḥ ekaḥ ḥvayavaḥ mama

original: taraṅgo ḥbdhāv ivety antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.33
analyzed: taraṅgaḥ iva iti antar yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: svapne hi cinmātrāvayavabhūtaṃ jagat sarvo ḥnubhavati // (MT_4,22.33)
analyzed: svapne hi cit mātra avayava bhūtam jagat

original: śocyā pālyā mayaiveyaṃ svaseyam me kanīyasī /
analyzed: śocyā pālyā mayā evā iyam svasā iyam me kanīyasī

original: trilokī pelavety uccair yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.34
analyzed: trilokī pelavā iti uccais yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: bhāvād uparate nūnaṃ sa paśyati sulocanaḥ // MU_4,22.35
analyzed: bhāvāt uparate nūnam sa paśyati su locanaḥ

original: āpūritajagajjālaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // MU_4,22.36
analyzed: āpūrita jagat jālam yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: cetyānupātarahitaḥ yaḥ cidbhairavaḥ sarvagrāsakatvāt cidākhyaḥ bhairavaḥ / tanmayaṃ

analyzed: sukham duḥkham viveka kalanāḥ ca yāḥ

original: ahaṃ na veti nūnaṃ vā paśyan na parihīyate // MU_4,22.37
analyzed: aham na vā iti nūnam vā paśyan na parihīyate

original: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavaḥ abhāvaḥ vivekakalanāś cāham asmi iti paśyan /
analyzed: sukham duḥkham bhavaḥ abhāvaḥ viveka kalanāḥ ca aham asmi iti paśyan

original: / na hi śuddhacinmātraṃ vinā kaścid vyāpakaḥ uttīrṇo vā bhavati // (MT_4,22.37)
analyzed: na hi śuddha cit mātram vinā kaścid vyāpakaḥ uttīrṇaḥ vā bhavati

original: kim me heyaṃ kim ādeyam iti paśyan sadṛg naraḥ // MU_4,22.38
analyzed: kim me heyam kim ādeyam iti paśyan sadṛś naraḥ
sva ātmanaḥ śuddha cit mātra rūpasya sva ātmanaḥ

original: svātmanaḥ heyatvāyogāt na kiñcid apīty arthaḥ
analyzed: svātmanaḥ heya tva ayogāt na kiñcid api iti arthaḥ

original: svātmanaḥ sarvadā prāptatvāt na kiñcid apīty arthaḥ / iti evam
analyzed: sva ātmanaḥ sarvadā prāpta tvāt na kiñcid api iti arthaḥ iti evam

original: apratarkyam anābhāsaṃ sanmātram idam ity alam /
analyzed: apratarkyam an ābhāsam sat mātram idam iti alam

original: heyopādeyakalanā yasya kṣīṇā namāmi tam // MU_4,22.39
analyzed: heya upādeya kalanā yasya kṣīṇā namāmi tam

original: / sa eva sarvebhya utkṛṣṭa iti bhāvaḥ //

analyzed: ca yena tat sura aṅganānām tu sākṣāt eva ākāśe sthitiḥ iti tāsām a kathanam garuḍa iti

original: mantrodbhāvitās tu śailāḥ astrarūpāḥ sākṣāt prahitāḥ
analyzed: mantra udbhāvitāḥ tu śailāḥ astra rūpāḥ sākṣāt prahitāḥ
garuḍa guḍa guḍa ākula antarikṣa pravisṛta heti hutāśa parvata oghaiḥ
jagat abhavat asahya kalpa kāla jvalita surālaya bhū tala antarālam
asahyaḥ yaḥ kalpa kālaḥ pralaya kālaḥ
tatra eva jvalitāni surālaya bhū tala antarāṇi yasya

original: udapatan vasudhātalato ḥsurā gaganam adritaṭād iva pakṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: udapatan vasudhā talataḥ ḥsurāḥ gaganam adri taṭāt iva pakṣiṇaḥ

original: atibalād apatan vibudhā bhuvi pralayacālitaśailaśilā iva // MU_4,28.16
analyzed: ati balāt apatan vibudhāḥ bhuvi pralaya cālita śaila śilāḥ iva
ati balāt iti asya pūrva ardhena sambandhaḥ
śarīra rūḍha unnata heti vṛkṣa vana āvalī lagna mahā agni dāhāḥ
sura asurāḥ prāpuḥ atha ambara antar kalpa anila āndolita śaila śobhām
atha sura asurāḥ ambara antar ākāśa madhye
sura asura adri indra śarīra muktaiḥ rakta pravāhaiḥ abhitas bhramadbhiḥ

original: babhāra pūrṇam parito ḥmbarābdhiḥ sandhyāruṇodyacchatagaṅgam aṅgam // MU_4,28.18
analyzed: babhāra pūrṇam paritas ambara abdhiḥ sandhyā aruṇa udyat śatagaṅgam aṅgam  /
giri varṣaṇam ambu varṣaṇam vividha ugra āyudha varṣaṇam tathā

original: viṣamāśanivarṣaṇaṃ ca te śamam anyoḥnyam athāgnivarṣaṇam // MU_4,28.19
analyzed: viṣama aśani varṣaṇam ca te śamam anyoḥnyam atha agni varṣaṇam

original: sasṛjuś ca samaṃ samantataḥ kakubaṅgeṣv iva puṣpavarṣaṇam // MU_4,28.20
analyzed: sasṛjuḥ ca samam samantataḥ kakubaṅgeṣu iva puṣpa varṣaṇam

original: etāni varṣaṇāni samantataḥ śamam anayan / etāni
analyzed: etāni varṣaṇāni samantataḥ śamam anayan etāni
ca kim iva puṣpa varṣaṇam iva
deva asurāḥ sarasa saṅgara sambhrama ārtāḥ anyoḥnyam aṅga dalana ākula heti hastāḥ

original: dāmendraḍimbadahanāḥ pṛthupīṭhapīṭhaiḥ kīrṇāsṛjo nabhasi babhramur ākṣipantaḥ // MU_4,28.21
analyzed: dāma indra ḍimba dahanāḥ pṛthu pīṭha pīṭhaiḥ kīrṇa asṛjaḥ nabhasi babhramuḥ ākṣipantaḥ
sa rasa saṅgara sambhrama ārtā gem mṭ
dāma indrayoḥ ḍimba dahanāḥ manaḥ santāpa kāri tvāt cañcala agnayaḥ

original: tatrāpi dāmnaḥ devāḥ indrasyāsurāḥ iti vibhāgaḥ
analyzed: tatra api dāmnaḥ devāḥ indrasya asurāḥ iti vibhāgaḥ

original: chinnaiḥ śiraḥkarabhujorubharair bhramadbhir ākāśakośaśalabhair aśivais tadānīm /
analyzed: chinnaiḥ śiraḥ kara bhuja ūru bharaiḥ bhramadbhiḥ ākāśa kośa śalabhaiḥ aśivaiḥ tadānīm

original: āsīj jagajjaṭharam abhravarair ivograir ābhāskaraṃ sthagitadiktaṭaśailajālam // MU_4,28.22
analyzed: āsīt jagat jaṭharam abhra varaiḥ iva ugraiḥ ābhāskaram sthagita diś taṭa śaila jālam

original: ata eva ca ākāśe śalabhaiḥ śalabharūpaiḥ / aśivaiḥ
analyzed: atas eva ca ākāśe śalabhaiḥ śalabha rūpaiḥ aśivaiḥ
jagat jaṭharam ā bhāskaram sūryam tāvat
sthagitāni diś taṭāni śaila jālāni ca yasya

original: bhrāntam bhṛśam bhramitadiktaṭam adrikūṭair ātmapramāṇaghanahetihatai raṇadbhiḥ /
analyzed: bhrāntam bhṛśam bhramita diś taṭam adri kūṭaiḥ ātma pramāṇa ghana heti hataiḥ raṇadbhiḥ

original: kūjadbhir ārtibhir ivāgraguhaughavātaiḥ krandadbhir āpatitasiṃharavair adabhraiḥ // MU_4,28.24
analyzed: kūjadbhiḥ ārtibhiḥ iva agra guhā ogha vātaiḥ krandadbhiḥ āpatita siṃha ravaiḥ adabhraiḥ

bhrāntam śira stra śara śakti gadā astra varṣaiḥ vāta avakīrṇa vana parṇa vat ambara antar

original: / na hi ambaramadhyasya bhramo yukta ity apekṣāyām āha māyānadītyādi /
analyzed: na hi ambara madhyasya bhramaḥ yuktaḥ iti apekṣāyām āha māyā nadī ityādi

original: cāriṇām māyānadyādīnām eva bhramaḥ ambarāntaḥ bhramatvenāropitaḥ //
analyzed: cāriṇām māyā nadī ādīnām eva bhramaḥ ambara antar bhrama tvena āropitaḥ
adri indra pakṣa parimāṇa gama āgama eka durvāra hasta tala dāruṇa tāḍanaiḥ drāk
āsīt patat bhaṭa śarīra giri indra ghāta vibhraṣṭa deva pura pūrṇa jala arṇava oghaḥ
adri indra pakṣa parimāṇāḥ ca te gama āgama eka durvārāḥ ca
ca asau arṇava oghaḥ samudra saptakam
ghana ghuṅghuma pūrita antarikṣā kṣataja ākṣālita bhūdhara antarālā
rudhira hrada vṛtti vartinī vā bhuvana ābhoga guhā tadā ākulā abhūt
tena āpūritam antarikṣam yasyāḥ sā tādṛśī

original: guhā ca maṣakaghuṅghumapūritāntarikṣā vṛṣṭikṣālitabhūdharāntarālā hradavartinī ca
analyzed: guhā ca maṣaka ghuṅghuma pūrita antarikṣā vṛṣṭi kṣālita bhūdhara antarālā hrada vartinī ca

original: raṇakriyāsurasurasaṅghasaṅkaṭā tadābhavat khalu sadṛśīha saṃsṛteḥ // MU_4,28.28
analyzed: raṇa kriyā asura sura saṅgha saṅkaṭā tadā abhavat khalu sadṛśī iha saṃsṛteḥ

original: sukhaduḥkhadāyinī nānāpadārthasaṅkaṭā ca bhavati / iti śivam //

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe aṣṭāviṃśaḥ sargaḥ //

analyzed: devaiḥ triṃśat pañca ca varṣāṇi pañcatriṃśat varṣāṇi

original: / kena kena prakāreṇa kṛta ity apekṣāyām māyayetyādi /

original: varṣāṇi divasān māsān daśāṣṭau pañca sapta ca /

pañca sapta ca dvādaśa iti yāvat
etāvatā tu kālena dṛḍha abhyāsāt ahaṅkṛteḥ

original: dāmādayo ḥham ity āsthāṃ jagṛhur grastacetasaḥ // MU_4,29.5

original: abhyāsātiśayāt tadvat te ḥpy ahaṅkāritāṃ gatāḥ // MU_4,29.6
analyzed: abhyāsa atiśayāt tadvat te api ahaṅkāri tām gatāḥ

analyzed: padārtha vāsanā tadvat anabhyāsāt na jāyate

original: tadā me jīvitam me ḥrtha iti dainyam upāgaman // MU_4,29.8

original: tadā me jīvitam me artha iti evaṃrūpam /
analyzed: tadā me jīvitam me artha iti evaṃrūpam

analyzed: tu prāpta ādhāra tvena tat durnivāram evā iti bhāvaḥ

original: āśāpāśanibaddhās te tataḥ kṛpaṇatāṃ gatāḥ // MU_4,29.9

kṛpaṇa tām dainyasya parām kāṣṭhām gatāḥ

original: nanu tataḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ sampannam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tatas kim teṣām sampannam iti atra āha

original: rajjvām bhujaṅgatvam iva dāmavyālakaṭais tataḥ // MU_4,29.10
analyzed: rajjvām bhujaṅga tvam iva dāma vyāla kaṭaiḥ tatas

original: iti baddhadhiyāṃ teṣāṃ dhairyam antardhim āyayau // MU_4,29.12

a vāsana tvāt vapuṣām an āstha tvāt suradviṣām

ahaṅkāra prabhāvena deha nāśa ādi bhaya utpādāt iti arthaḥ

original: kathaṃ sthirā jagaty asmin bhavema iti cintayā /
analyzed: katham sthirāḥ jagati asmin bhavema iti cintayā

original: vedhitā dīnatāṃ jagmuḥ padmā iva nirambhasaḥ // MU_4,29.14

original: svā ahaṅkṛtir dehaviṣayaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ vidyate yeṣām /

sāpekṣa tvam mā mariṣyāmaḥ iti evaṃrūpa apekṣā sahita tvam

original: mandam mandaṃ kila bhremuḥ kupitairāvaṇe raṇe // MU_4,29.17
analyzed: mandam mandam kila bhremuḥ kupita airāvaṇe raṇe

original: alpasattvatayā mūrdhni kṛtam āpatpradam padam // MU_4,29.18
analyzed: alpa sattva tayā mūrdhni kṛtam āpad pradam padam

original: atha pramlānasattvās te hantum agragatam bhaṭam /
analyzed: atha pramlāna sattvāḥ te hantum agra gatam bhaṭam

original: na śekur indhanakṣīṇā havir dagdhum ivāgnayaḥ // MU_4,29.19
analyzed: na śekuḥ indhana kṣīṇāḥ haviḥ dagdhum iva agnayaḥ

original: daityā deveṣu valgatsu dudruvuḥ samarājirāt // MU_4,29.21
analyzed: daityāḥ deveṣu valgatsu dudruvuḥ samara ajirāt

original: taddaityasainyam apatat khād vidrutam itas tataḥ /
analyzed: tat daitya sainyam apatat khāt vidrutam itas tatas
kalpānta pavana ādhūtam tārā jālam iva abhitas
amara acala kuñjeṣu śikharāṇām śilāsu ca
taṭeṣu vāri rāśīnām payoda paṭaleṣu ca

original: jaṅgaleṣu diganteṣu jvalatsu vipineṣu ca // MU_4,29.25
analyzed: jaṅgaleṣu diś anteṣu jvalatsu vipineṣu ca
tad raṇa utsanna kośeṣu grāmeṣu nagareṣu ca
aṭavīṣu ugra yakṣāsu maruṣu udyat dava agniṣu
lokāloka acala anteṣu parvateṣu hradeṣu ca
andhra dramiḍa kāśmīra pārasīka pureṣu ca
nānā ambhodhi taraṅgāsu gaṅgā jala ghaṭāsu ca
dvīpa antareṣu dūreṣu jambu ṣaṇḍa latāsu ca

śākhā lagna antra tantrīkāḥ mukta rakta vaha chaṭāḥ
vyasta aṅga khura mūrdhānaḥ niṣkrānta kupita īkṣaṇāḥ
sva āyudhāḥ valana āvega chinna kaṅkaṭa hetayaḥ

original: tataḥ ugrā bhītiḥ yeṣām / te / tādṛśāḥ //
analyzed: tatas ugrā bhītiḥ yeṣām te tādṛśāḥ
śalmali agra dṛḍha āpāta prota kaṅkaṭa śaṅkavaḥ

original: sarva eva sakalāsu saśastrāḥ pātamātrasamanantaram eva /
analyzed: sarve eva sakalāsu sa śastrāḥ pāta mātra samanantaram eva

original: dikṣu nāśam agamann asurendrāḥ pāṃsavo ḥmbudhigatāḥ payasīva // MU_4,29.34
analyzed: dikṣu nāśam agaman asura indrāḥ pāṃsavaḥ ḥmbudhi gatāḥ payasi iva

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇa ekonatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe ekonatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ

original: oṃ / tadā dāmādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ sampannā ity / atrāha
analyzed: om tadā dāma ādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ sampannāḥ iti atra āha

original: iti tuṣṭeṣu deveṣu dānaveṣu hateṣu ca /
analyzed: iti tuṣṭeṣu deveṣu dānaveṣu hateṣu ca
dāma vyāla kaṭāḥ dīnāḥ babhūvuḥ bhaya vihvalāḥ

original: nanu śambaraḥ kiṃ kṛtavān ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu śambaraḥ kim kṛtavān iti atra āha

original: jajvāla kupitaḥ kopī kalpāntāgnir iva jvalan /
analyzed: jajvāla kupitaḥ kopī kalpa anta agniḥ iva jvalan
