original: dāmādīn prati śambaraḥ kupito ḥbhūd iti piṇḍārthaḥ // (MT_4,30.2)
analyzed: dāma ādīn prati śambaraḥ kupitaḥ iti piṇḍa arthaḥ

original: śambarasya bhayād gatvā pātālam atha saptamam /
analyzed: śambarasya bhayāt gatvā pātālam atha saptamam
dāma vyāla kaṭāḥ tasthuḥ tyaktvā dānava maṇḍalam
yamasya kiṅkarāḥ tatra vetāla trāsana kṣamāḥ
kukuhāḥ nāma tiṣṭhanti naraka arṇava pālakāḥ

original: taiḥ sārdhaṃ nītavantas te tatra dāmādayo ḥvadhim /
analyzed: taiḥ sārdham nītavantaḥ te tatra dāma ādayoḥ
daśa varṣa sahasra antām ātta ananta kuvāsanāḥ
daśa varṣa sahasra antām daśa varṣa sahasra saṅkhyā paryantām
te dāma ādayaḥ nītavantaḥ nayanti sma
dhāritāḥ kuvāsanāḥ dhana ādi viṣayāḥ ninditāḥ saṃskārāḥ

original: iyam me vanitā ramyā mameyam prabhuteti ca /
analyzed: iyam me vanitā ramyā mama iyam prabhu tā iti ca
kukuha sneha baddhānām kālaḥ teṣām vyavartata

original: dharmarājo ḥtha taṃ deśaṃ kadācit samupāyayau /

analyzed: mahā naraka kāryāṇām vicāra artham yadṛcchayā

analyzed: a parijñātam enam te dharmarājam trayaḥ surāḥ

analyzed: na praṇemuḥ vināśāya sāmānyam iva kiṅkaram

analyzed: dagdhāḥ sa parṇa viṭapāḥ vṛkṣāḥ iva dava analaiḥ

analyzed: bhava jaladhi gatāḥ te vāsanā vāta nunnāḥ tṛṇam iva ciram ūḍhāḥ deha rūpaiḥ taraṅgaiḥ

analyzed: upaśamam anuyātā rāma na adya api anantam parikalaya mahā tvam dāruṇam vāsanāyāḥ

analyzed: phalitam kathayati anantam iti atas iti

analyzed: yatas dāma ādibhiḥ vāsanā vaśataḥ evaṃvidhā yātanā prāptā atas tvam

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe triṃśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe triṃśaḥ sargaḥ

analyzed: atas prabodhāya tava vacmi rāma mahāmate

a viveka anusandhānāt cittam āpadam īdṛśīm

īdṛśīm dāma ādi anubhūta āpad sadṛśīm

analyzed: atas ḥ vivekaḥ eva tyājyaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: vāsanātyāgam prati uttejanāya dāmādibhir anubhūtāṃ vipadaṃ kathayati
analyzed: vāsanā tyāgam prati uttejanāya dāma ādibhiḥ anubhūtām vipadam kathayati
kva kila amara vidhvaṃsi śambara anīka nātha tā
kva tāpa tapta jambāla jala jarjara mīna tā  /

kva kirāta mahīpāla kṣudra kiṅkara rūpa tā

kva mithyā vāsanā āveśāt ahaṅkāra kukalpanā

original: manaḥ / tena yā udāradhīratā maraṇādibhayarāhityena udārabhāvaḥ dhīrabhāvaś ca / sā
analyzed: manaḥ tena yā udāra dhīra tā maraṇa ādi bhaya rāhityena udāra bhāvaḥ dhīra bhāvaḥ ca sā

original: / ahaṅkārakukalpanā deho ḥham ity evaṃrūpāhaṅkārarūpā ninditā kalpanā /
analyzed: ahaṅkāra kukalpanā dehaḥ iti evaṃrūpa ahaṅkāra rūpā ninditā kalpanā

original: / anayor antaraṃ svayam eva paśyeti bhāvaḥ // (MT_4,31.5)
analyzed: anayoḥ antaram svayam eva paśya iti bhāvaḥ
ahaṅkāra aṅkurāt eva samudeti iyam ātatā

saṃsāraḥ eva viṣamañjarī viṣa latā kartrī

original: ahaṅkārābhāve kasya kiṃrūpaḥ saṃsāraḥ syāt / suṣuptau
analyzed: ahaṅkāra abhāve kasya kiṃrūpaḥ saṃsāraḥ syāt suṣuptau

original: hi ahaṅkāravilaye sarve saṃsāraṃ nānubhavantīti bhāvaḥ // (MT_4,31.6)
analyzed: hi ahaṅkāra vilaye sarve saṃsāram na anubhavanti iti bhāvaḥ
ahaṅkāram atas rāma mārjaya antar prayatnataḥ

original: ahaṃ na kaścid eveti mārjayitvā sukhī bhava // MU_4,31.7
analyzed: aham na kaścid eva iti mārjayitvā sukhī bhava

original: he rāma / yasmāt ahaṅkāra evāpad asti ataḥ tvam ahaṅkāram deho ḥham ityādirūpaṃ sthūlam
analyzed: he rāma yasmāt ahaṅkāraḥ eva āpad asti atas tvam ahaṅkāram ityādi rūpam sthūlam
aham sthūla deha ādi rūpaḥ aham na eva
śuddha cit mātra tattvasya eva sattā bhāktva yogāt

original: arthāt ahaṅkāram mārjayitvā tvam sukhī dehādinairapekṣyakṛtamahāsukhayuktaḥ /
analyzed: arthāt ahaṅkāram mārjayitvā tvam sukhī deha ādi nairapekṣya kṛta mahā sukha yuktaḥ

original: dehādyapekṣāvaśād eva hi puruṣaḥ duḥkhī bhavati /
analyzed: deha ādi apekṣā vaśāt eva hi puruṣaḥ duḥkhī bhavati

original: nanu dehaṃ tāvat dehāpekṣā kva gacchatīti cen / na
analyzed: nanu deham tāvat deha apekṣā kva gacchati iti ced na

original: gacchati / kiṃ tu tadviṣayāhambhāvahīnatayā tadbhāvābhāvacintāḥ na vyākulīkurvanti
analyzed: gacchati kim tu tad viṣaya ahambhāva hīna tayā tad bhāva abhāva cintāḥ na vyākulīkurvanti

original: / tadyātrāmātranimittaṃ kṛtasya pravāhāgatasya prayatnasya tu na tādṛśī duḥkhakāritāstīty
analyzed: tad yātrā mātra nimittam kṛtasya pravāha āgatasya prayatnasya tu na tādṛśī duḥkha kāri tā asti iti

original: nanv ahaṅkāreṇa ko doṣa utpādyate yena puruṣo duḥkhī bhavatīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu ahaṅkāreṇa kaḥ doṣaḥ utpādyate yena puruṣaḥ duḥkhī bhavati iti atra āha
rasāyana mayam śītam adṛśya tvam upāgatam
saḥ eva āhlāda kāri tvāt induḥ

original: ahaṅkāra eva deho ḥham ity evaṃrūpaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ eva / ambudaḥ
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ eva dehaḥ ḥ ham iti evaṃrūpaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ eva ambudaḥ
adṛśya tvam ahamparāmarśa viṣaya tva ayogya tām upāgatam

original: / dehābhimānāviṣṭo hi puruṣaḥ paramārthataḥ svarūpabhūtam api cinmātratattvaṃ nāhantayā
analyzed: deha abhimāna āviṣṭaḥ hi puruṣaḥ paramārthataḥ sva rūpa bhūtam api cit mātra tattvam na ahaṃtayā
atas eva śītam apekṣā sva rūpa santāpa rahitam
atas ca sukha sva rūpa paramātma ācchādaka tvena
yuktam eva ahaṅkārasya santāpa kāri doṣa utpādaka tvam iti bhāvaḥ
ahaṅkāra prabhāvena eva tvam prādurbhūtaḥ asi iti abhiprāyeṇa āha
ahaṅkāra piśāca āttāḥ dāma vyāla kaṭāḥ trayaḥ

original: gatāḥ sattām asanto ḥpi māyāmāhātmyadānavāḥ // MU_4,31.9
analyzed: gatāḥ sattām asantaḥ māyā māhātmya dānavāḥ

original: yātāḥ / ata evāsantaḥ api trayaḥ damavyālakaṭāḥ /
analyzed: yātāḥ atas eva asantaḥ api trayaḥ dama vyāla kaṭāḥ

original: sattām vayaṃ dāmādaya ity evaṃrūpāṃ sattām / gatāḥ /
analyzed: sattām vayam dāma ādayaḥ iti evaṃrūpām sattām gatāḥ

original: evaṃ tvam api māyāmāhātmyena manuṣyarūpatāṃ yātaḥ /
analyzed: evam tvam api māyā māhātmyena manuṣya rūpa tām yātaḥ
atas eva āsan api sva ahaṅkāra vaśāt
eva sva sattām anubhavasi iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu te dāmādayaḥ kaśmīreṣu kasmin palvale santīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu te dāma ādayaḥ kaśmīreṣu kasmin palvale santi iti atra āha

original: adya matsyāḥ sthitā rāma śevālalavalālasāḥ // MU_4,31.10
analyzed: adya matsyāḥ sthitāḥ rāma śevāla lava lālasāḥ

original: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
analyzed: na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ

original: te hy asantaḥ kathaṃ santaḥ sampannā iti me vada // MU_4,31.11
analyzed: te hi asantaḥ katham santaḥ sampannāḥ iti me vada

original: ataḥ asantaḥ śambaramāyodbhāvitatvena sattākartṛtvam abhajanto ḥpi
analyzed: atas asantaḥ śambara māyā udbhāvita tvena sattā kartṛ tvam

original: evam etan mahābāho nāsad bhavati hi kvacit /
analyzed: evam etat mahā bāho na asat bhavati hi kvacid

original: kadācit kiñcid apy etad bṛhad bhavati vā tanu // MU_4,31.12
analyzed: kadācid kiñcid api etat bṛhat bhavati vā tanu

original: kāle vā / sat na bhavati sattāṃ na bhajati /
analyzed: kāle vā sat na bhavati sattām na bhajati

original: arthāt sad asad veti jñeyam / nanu tarhi
analyzed: arthāt sat asat vā iti jñeyam nanu tarhi

original: katham indriyāgocaratvenāsatām paramāṇūnām indriyalabhyatvena satsvarūpasya ghaṭasya
analyzed: katham indriya agocara tvena asatām paramāṇūnām indriya labhya tvena sat svarūpasya ghaṭasya

original: bhāvaḥ dṛśyate sataḥ ghaṭasya kālavaśataḥ asatsvarūpaparamāṇutā cety /
analyzed: bhāvaḥ dṛśyate sataḥ ghaṭasya kāla vaśataḥ asat svarūpa paramāṇu tā ca iti

original: iti / kiñcit api paramārthataḥ anirvacanīyasanmātrarūpatvenāvasthitam api /
analyzed: iti kiñcid api paramārthataḥ anirvacanīya sanmātra rūpa tvena avasthitam api

original: ca puraḥsphurat sattvāsattvābhyāṃ jñātaṃ ghaṭaparamāṇvādirūpaṃ vastu /
analyzed: ca puras sphurat sattva asattvābhyām jñātam ghaṭa paramāṇu ādi rūpam vastu

original: tathā ca nātra sato ḥsattvam asato vā sattvam iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_4,31.12)
analyzed: tathā ca na atra sataḥ asattvam asataḥ vā sattvam iti bhāvaḥ

original: tathā ca dāmādiṣu ko nyāya ity / atrāha
analyzed: tathā ca dāma ādiṣu kaḥ nyāyaḥ iti atra āha

original: kim asat sat sthitam brūhi kiṃ tat sad vāpy asat sthitam /
analyzed: kim asat sat sthitam brūhi kim tat sat vā api asat sthitam

original: kim bravīmīty apekṣāyām āha kim itīti /
analyzed: kim bravīmi iti apekṣāyām āha kim iti iti
bhavat asat sthitam asat rūpam sampannam

original: santa eva sthitāḥ santo brahman vayam amī kila /
analyzed: santaḥ eva sthitāḥ santaḥ brahman vayam amī kila

original: dāmādayas tv asanto ḥpi vacmi santaḥ sthitā iti // MU_4,31.14
analyzed: dāma ādayaḥ tu asantaḥ vacmi santaḥ sthitāḥ iti

original: na hi asmākam asattvaṃ kenāpi prakāreṇa yuktam parasparam ālāpādyarthakriyāsambhavāt
analyzed: na hi asmākam asattvam kena api prakāreṇa yuktam parasparam ālāpa ādi arthakriyā sambhavāt

original: dāmādayaḥ asantaḥ api śambaramāyodbhāvitatvenāsanto ḥpi santaḥ /

analyzed: śrī vasiṣṭhaḥ anena nidarśanena śrī rāmasya bodhanam karoti

original: yathā dāmādayo rāma sthitā māyāmayā iha /
analyzed: yathā dāma ādayaḥ rāma sthitāḥ māyā mayāḥ iha
asatyā eva satya ābhā mṛgatṛṣṇā ambupūra vat
tathā eva ime vayam api sa sura asura dānavāḥ

original: asatyā eva valgāmo yāma āyāma eva ca // MU_4,31.16
analyzed: asatyāḥ eva valgāmaḥ yāme āyāme eva ca

original: nanu vayaṃ kathaṃ dāmādivad asadrūpā ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu vayam katham dāma ādi vat asat rūpāḥ iti atra āha

original: alīkam eva tvadbhāvo madbhāvo ḥlīkam eva ca /
analyzed: alīkam eva tvad bhāvaḥ mad bhāvaḥ eva ca

original: anubhūto ḥpy asadrūpaḥ svapne svamaraṇaṃ yathā // MU_4,31.17
analyzed: anubhūtaḥ u ḥpī asat rūpaḥ svapne sva maraṇam yathā
tvad bhāvaḥ rāma iti nāmnaḥ tava sattā

original: yathā puruṣaḥ svapne svamaraṇam asatyam eva paśyati / anyathā
analyzed: yathā puruṣaḥ svapne sva maraṇam asatyam eva paśyati anyathā
svapna draṣṭuḥ abhāvena kaḥ sva maraṇam paśyet
tathā tvad bhāva mad bhāvau api āvām paśyāvaḥ

original: / anyathā tvayi tvattāyām eva mayi mattāyām eva niṣṭhitāyāṃ tvam mām prati tvam iti na paśyeḥ /
analyzed: anyathā tvayi tvattāyām eva mayi mattāyām eva niṣṭhitāyām tvam mām prati tvam iti na paśyeḥ

original: svam praty aham iti tvayi tvattvasya
analyzed: svam prati aham iti tvayi tvattvasya

original: mṛto bandhur yathā svapne ḥpy anubhūto ḥpy asanmayaḥ /
analyzed: mṛtaḥ bandhuḥ yathā svapne anubhūtaḥ asat mayaḥ

original: mṛto ḥyam iti ca jñaptir bhaved evam idaṃ jagat // MU_4,31.18
analyzed: iti ca jñaptiḥ bhavet evam idam jagat

original: yathā mṛtaḥ bandhuḥ svapne anubhūtaḥ api asanmayaḥ asatya eva /
analyzed: yathā mṛtaḥ bandhuḥ svapne anubhūtaḥ api asanmayaḥ asatya eva

original: / ca yataḥ / mṛto ḥyam iti jñaptiḥ jāgratkālīnaḥ bodhaḥ yataḥ asti /
analyzed: ca yatas iti jñaptiḥ jāgrat kālīnaḥ bodhaḥ yatas asti

original: jñānināṃ nāstīty atadviṣayo bodho bhavati / ajñānāṃ
analyzed: jñāninām na asti iti a tad viṣayaḥ bodhaḥ bhavati ajñānām

original: anyathā nāsīd iti jāgratkālīnaparāmarśāsambhavād iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: anyathā na āsīt iti jāgrat kālīna parāmarśa asambhavāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tarhi sarveṣāṃ kathaṃ na maduktānuguṇyenaiva bodho ḥstīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi sarveṣām katham na mad ukta ānuguṇyena eva bodhaḥ asti iti atra āha

original: eṣā hi mūḍhaviṣayā noktir eva virājate /
analyzed: eṣā hi mūḍha viṣayā na uktiḥ eva virājate
abhyāsena vinā udeti na anubhūteḥ apahnavaḥ
eṣā uktiḥ tava iti śeṣaḥ tava
nanu tarhi tvad mad bhāva anubhūteḥ kim karomi iti
atas tvam api tvad bhāva sadbhāva asatya tā anubhavam eva

original: kuru yena tvadbhāvasadbhāvānubhūtiḥ na syād iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: kuru yena tvad bhāva sadbhāva anubhūtiḥ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanv abhyāsena vinā katham anubhūter apahnavaḥ na sampadyate ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu abhyāsena vinā katham anubhūteḥ apahnavaḥ na sampadyate iti atra āha

original: niścayo ḥntaḥ prarūḍho yaḥ sa yatnābhyasanaṃ vinā /
analyzed: niścayaḥ prarūḍhaḥ yaḥ sa yatna abhyasanam vinā

original: nāśam āyāti loke ḥsmin na kadācana kasyacit // MU_4,31.20
analyzed: nāśam āyāti loke ḥsmin na kadācana kasyacid

original: nanu tarhi karuṇākrāntāḥ tajjñāḥ sarveṣāṃ kathaṃ naitad evopadiśantīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi karuṇā ākrāntāḥ tajjñāḥ sarveṣām katham na etat eva upadiśanti iti atra āha

original: idaṃ jagad asad brahma satyam ity eva vakti yaḥ /
analyzed: idam jagat asat brahma satyam iti eva vakti yaḥ

original: tam unmattam ivonmattā vimūḍhā vihasanty alam // MU_4,31.21
analyzed: tam unmattam iva unmattāḥ vimūḍhāḥ vihasanti alam
unmattāḥ sva artha aparijñānena unmatta rūpāḥ
tad upadeśa śravaṇasya tu kā kathā iti
atas ḥ asau na vakti iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu kimarthaṃ te taṃ hasantīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kimartham te tam hasanti iti atra āha
akṣība kṣībayoḥ aikyam kva kila iha ajña tajjñayoḥ

original: āndhyaprakāśayor bodhe syāc chāyātapayor iva // MU_4,31.22
analyzed: āndhya prakāśayoḥ bodhe syāt chāyā ātapayoḥ iva

original: akṣībakṣībayoḥ svātmānandākhyamadhupānena tadapānena ca saṃsāram prati vismaraṇāvismaraṇaśīlayoḥ
analyzed: akṣība kṣībayoḥ sva ātma ānanda ākhya madhu pānena tad apānena ca saṃsāram prati vismaraṇa avismaraṇa śīlayoḥ

original: aikyam parasparasammatirūpam aikyam / kva syāt / na
analyzed: aikyam paraspara sammati rūpam aikyam kva syāt na

original: na hi kṣībākṣībayor iha bodhe sammatiḥ dṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ / ataḥ
analyzed: na hi kṣība akṣībayoḥ iha bodhe sammatiḥ dṛśyate iti bhāvaḥ atas
chāyā ātapayoḥ bodhe padārtha prakaṭana ākhye bodhe

original: nanu kimarthaṃ tayoḥ bodhe aikyaṃ nāstīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kimartham tayoḥ bodhe aikyam na asti iti atra āha

original: yatnenāpy anubhūte ḥrthe satye kartum apahnavam /
analyzed: yatnena api anubhūte ḥrthe satye kartum apahnavam

original: tajjño ḥjñaś ca na śaknoti śava ākramaṇaṃ yathā // MU_4,31.23
analyzed: ca na śaknoti śavaḥ ākramaṇam yathā

original: anubhūte / ata eva satye satyatayā jñāte /
analyzed: anubhūte atas eva satye satya tayā jñāte
arthe cit mātra ākhye jagat ākhye ca vastuni

original: / tajjñaḥ ajñaḥ ca yatnenāpi apahnavaṃ kartuṃ na śaknoti /
analyzed: tad jñaḥ ajñaḥ ca yatnena api apahnavam kartum na śaknoti

original: puraḥ sphurat vastu kaścid apahnotuṃ śaknoti /
analyzed: puras sphurat vastu kaścid apahnotum śaknoti

original: ata eva tayoḥ bodhe aikyaṃ nāstīti
analyzed: atas eva tayoḥ bodhe aikyam na asti iti

original: nanu tarhi ajño ḥpy etad eva kathayatv ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi etat eva kathayatu iti atra āha

original: brahma sarvaṃ jagad iti vaktuṃ tajjñasya yujyate /
analyzed: brahma sarvam jagat iti vaktum tad jñasya yujyate

original: yato ḥvidyānanubhave sa tad evānubhūtavān // MU_4,31.24

analyzed: vaktum tad jñasya cit mātra ākhya brahma svarūpa jñasya

original: sati / avidyāyāḥ ananubhave jagatpadārtharūpaiḥ bhāvābhāvaiḥ upalakṣitāyāḥ avidyāyāḥ
analyzed: sati avidyāyāḥ ananubhave jagat padārtha rūpaiḥ bhāva abhāvaiḥ upalakṣitāyāḥ avidyāyāḥ
cit mātra ākhya brahma svarūpa jñasya

original: prabuddhaviṣaye hy eṣā rāma vāk pravirājate /
analyzed: prabuddha viṣaye hi eṣā rāma vāc pravirājate

original: buddhasyāsmīti rūpeṇa kila nāsty eva kiñcana // MU_4,31.25
analyzed: buddhasya asmi iti rūpeṇa kila na asti eva kiñcana

original: he rāma / eṣā vāk sarvam brahmeti vāk /
analyzed: he rāma eṣā vāc sarvam brahma iti vāc

original: prabuddhākhyo yaḥ viṣayaḥ yogyo deśaḥ / tatra
analyzed: prabuddha ākhyaḥ yaḥ viṣayaḥ yogyaḥ deśaḥ tatra

original: arthāt abuddhaviṣaye na rājate iti jñeyam /
analyzed: arthāt abuddha viṣaye na rājate iti jñeyam

original: yataḥ buddhasya kiñcana kiñcid api śarīrādikam
analyzed: yatas buddhasya kiñcana kiñcid api śarīra ādikam

original: / asmīti rūpeṇa nāsti asmīti jñānaviṣayaṃ nāsti /
analyzed: asmi iti rūpeṇa na asti asmi iti jñāna viṣayam na asti

original: niścitaḥ tadupayogīni vastūny api satyānīti jānāti /
analyzed: niścitaḥ tad upayogīni vastūni api satyāni iti jānāti

original: jñas tu dehābhimānābhāvāt tadupayogiṣu satyatāṃ na jānāti /
analyzed: jñaḥ tu deha abhimāna abhāvāt tad upayogiṣu satyatām na jānāti

original: iti tajjñasyaiva sarvam brahmeti vaktuṃ yuktaṃ
analyzed: iti tad jñasya eva sarvam brahma iti vaktum yuktam

original: nanu tajjñasyāsyā anubhūteḥ kadācid apahnavo ḥsti na vety / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tad jñasya asyāḥ anubhūteḥ kadācid apahnavaḥ ḥsti na vā iti atra āha

original: brahmaivedam paraṃ śāntam ity evānubhavan sudhīḥ /
analyzed: brahma eva idam param śāntam iti eva anubhavan sudhīḥ

original: apahnavaḥ svānubhūteḥ kartuṃ tasya na yujyate // MU_4,31.26
analyzed: apahnavaḥ sva anubhūteḥ kartum tasya na yujyate

original: asyāḥ svānubhūteḥ apahnavaḥ kartuṃ na yujyate yukto
analyzed: asyāḥ sva anubhūteḥ apahnavaḥ kartum na yujyate

original: nanu tarhi tvaṃ kathaṃ śrīvasiṣṭha iti nāmayogyo ḥsīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi tvam katham śrīvasiṣṭhaḥ iti nāma yogyaḥ asi iti atra āha
parasmāt vyatirekeṇa na aham ātmani kiñcana

original: hemanīvormikāditvaṃ na mayy asti vasiṣṭhatā // MU_4,31.27
nāsmi / tvaṃ tu yat paśyasi tat paśyeti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na asmi tvam tu yat paśyasi tat paśya iti bhāvaḥ
atas mayi vasiṣṭha tā vasiṣṭha iti nāma yogya tā

original: ato ḥham api vasiṣṭho nāsmīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas ḥham api vasiṣṭhaḥ na asmi iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu yadi tvaṃ svātmanīdṛśo ḥsi tarhi mūḍhaḥ kīdṛśo ḥstīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi tvam sva ātmani īdṛśaḥ u ḥsi tarhi mūḍhaḥ atra āha
bhūta tva vyatirekeṇa mūḍhaḥ na ātmani kiñcana

original: ūrmyādibuddhau hemeva nājñe ḥsti paramārthatā // MU_4,31.28
analyzed: ūrmi ādi buddhau hem iva na ajñe asti parama artha tā
bhūta tva vyatirekeṇa deha bhāvāt ṛte

original: tajjñas tu taṃ yadrūpam paśyati tadrūpam
analyzed: tad jñaḥ tu tam yad rūpam paśyati tad rūpam
yatas ajñe paramārtha tā paramārtha bhūta cit mātra bhāvaḥ na asti

original: / sa hi svaṃ cinmātrarūpaṃ na paśyati /
analyzed: sa hi svam cit mātra rūpam na paśyati
yathā ūrmi ādi buddhau ūrmika ādi buddhau
mithyā hantā mayaḥ mūḍhaḥ satya eka ātma mayaḥ sudhīḥ

original: yujyate na kvacin nāma svabhāvāpahnavo ḥnayoḥ // MU_4,31.29
analyzed: yujyate na kvacid nāma svabhāva apahnavaḥ
mithyā bhūtā yā ahantā deha viṣayaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ
svabhāvasya mithyā ahaṅkāra ākhyasya paramārtha ākhyasya
na hi puras sphurat sva svarūpam

original: yo yanmayas tasya tasmin yujyate ḥpahnavaḥ katham /
analyzed: yaḥ yad mayaḥ tasya tasmin yujyate ḥpahnavaḥ katham

original: puruṣasya ghaṭo ḥsmīti vākyam unmattataiva hi // MU_4,31.30
analyzed: puruṣasya ghaṭaḥ asmi iti vākyam unmatta tā eva hi
yad mayaḥ niścaya dvāreṇa yad svarūpaḥ syāt

original: puruṣasya ghaṭo ḥsmīti vākyam unmattatā eva bhavati /
analyzed: puruṣasya ghaṭaḥ asmi iti vākyam unmatta tā eva bhavati
atas brahma ātma tve niścitasya jñasya sthūladeha ātma tve

original: niścitasyājñasya ca svānubhūter apahnavaḥ na yukta iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: niścitasya ajñasya ca sva anubhūteḥ apahnavaḥ na yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: tasmān neme vayaṃ satyā na ca dāmādayaḥ kvacit /
analyzed: tasmāt na ime vayam satyāḥ na ca dāma ādayaḥ kvacid

original: asatyās te vayaṃ ceme nāsti naḥ khalu sambhavaḥ // MU_4,31.31
analyzed: asatyāḥ te vayam ca ime na asti naḥ khalu sambhavaḥ

original: yataḥ svapratītisiddham evāsmākaṃ dāmādīnāṃ ca svarūpaṃ tasmāt tato hetoḥ / ime vayaṃ
analyzed: yatas sva pratīti siddham eva asmākam dāma ādīnām ca sva rūpam tasmāt tatas hetoḥ ime vayam
dāma ādayaḥ ca satyāḥ na bhavanti
bhavanti ime vayam ca asatyāḥ bhavāmaḥ

original: na hi pratītimātreṇāsad vastu sad bhavitum arhati /
analyzed: na hi pratīti mātreṇa asat vastu sat bhavitum arhati

original: nanu tarhi tajjñasyāpi cinmātrākhyaṃ svarūpam asmadādivat pratītisiddham evāstīti so ḥpi asad eva syād ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi tad jñasya api cit mātra ākhyam svarūpam asmat ādi vat pratīti siddham eva asti iti asat eva syāt iti atra āha
satya saṃvedanam śuddham bodha ākāśam nirañjanam

original: satyaṃ sarvagataṃ śāntam asty anastamitodayam // MU_4,31.32
analyzed: satyam sarva gatam śāntam asti an astamita udayam
tad rūpam ghaṭa ādi saṃvedya a dūṣita saṃvedana rūpam iti yāvat na
hi ghaṭa ādi saṃvedya upahitasya saṃvedanasya satya tvam yuktam
na api saṃvedyasya satya tvam yuktam
śuddham ca iti ākhya mala ā dūṣitam
satyam sarva sāra tvena sthita tvāt satyam rūpam
sākṣi tayā sāra tvena ca sthita tvāt sarva vyāpakam
an astamita udayam bodha ākāśam cit mātra ākāśam
atas pratīti mātra siddha tva abhāvāt

original: paramārthasati cinmātrasvarūpe svatayā niścitasya jñasya nāsatyatvam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: paramārtha sati cit mātra svarūpe svatayā niścitasya jñasya na asatya tvam iti bhāvaḥ
ca iti ākhya mala ā dūṣitam ārdū

original: sarvaṃ sat tac ca niḥśūnyaṃ nakiñcid iva saṃsthitam /
analyzed: sarvam sat tat ca niḥśūnyam na kiñcid iva saṃsthitam

original: tatra vyomni vibhāntīmā nijā bhāso ḥṅga dṛṣṭayaḥ // MU_4,31.33
analyzed: tatra vyomni vibhānti imāḥ nijāḥ bhāsaḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ
sat sarva upādana tvena sthita tvāt sat svarūpam
atas eva niḥśūnyam śūnya itara svarūpam
tathā api na kiñcid iva sthitam bāhya antaḥkaraṇa agocara tvāt
hetu tvena uttara ardham kathayati tatra iti
yatas tatra vyomni cit mātra ākāśe
na tu sva vyatiriktāḥ iti arthaḥ
sarva saṃvid sākṣikeṇa svapna dṛṣṭānte etat sva siddham
yathā taimirika akṣasya sahajāḥ eva dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: keśoṇḍukādivad bhānti tathemās tatra sṛṣṭayaḥ // MU_4,31.34
analyzed: keśoṇḍuka ādi vat bhānti tathā imāḥ tatra sṛṣṭayaḥ
yathā taimirika akṣasya timira roga upahata netrasya puruṣasya
keśoṇḍuka ādi vat keśakūrca ādi vat
etāḥ api cit mātra raśmi rūpāḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu kena yatnena nijaraśmirūpaṃ jagad asau karotīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kena yatnena nija raśmi rūpam jagat asau karoti iti atra āha

original: sa ātmānaṃ yathā vetti tathānubhavati kṣaṇāt /
analyzed: saḥ ātmānam yathā vetti tathā anubhavati kṣaṇāt

original: cidākāśas tato ḥsatyam api satyaṃ tadīkṣaṇāt // MU_4,31.35
analyzed: cit ākāśaḥ tatas api satyam tad īkṣaṇāt
svapna jagat iva svapna draṣṭrā vīkṣaṇāt

original: ato yatnarahitam evāsau etat karotīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas yatna rahitam eva asau etat karoti iti bhāvaḥ

original: na satyam asti nāsatyam iha tasmāj jagattraye /
analyzed: na satyam asti na asatyam iha tasmāt jagattraye

original: yad yathā vetti cidrūpaṃ tat tathodety asaṃśayam // MU_4,31.36
analyzed: yat yathā vetti cit rūpam tat tathā udeti asaṃśayam

original: iha jagattraye kiñcit na satyam asti nāpi asatyam asti / cidrūpam
analyzed: iha jagattraye kiñcid na satyam asti na api asatyam asti cit rūpam
anena phalitam dāma ādi sāmyam svasya kathayati

original: yathā dāmādayas tadvad eveme ḥbhyuditā vayam /
analyzed: yathā dāma ādayaḥ tadvat eva ime vayam

original: satyāsatyāḥ kim atrāṅga tān praty api vikalpanā // MU_4,31.37
analyzed: satya asatyāḥ kim atra aṅga tān prati api vikalpanā

original: ataḥ yathā dāmādayaḥ satyāsatyāḥ bhāsamānatvena satyāḥ paramārthatas
analyzed: atas yathā dāma ādayaḥ satya asatyāḥ bhāsamāna tvena satyāḥ paramārthatas

original: ime vayaṃ tadvad eva satyāsatyāḥ abhyuditāḥ bhavāmaḥ /
analyzed: ime vayam tadvat eva satya asatyāḥ abhyuditāḥ bhavāmaḥ

original: tān praty api tān praty eva / vikalpanā
analyzed: tān prati api tān prati eva vikalpanā

original: yadi svasatyaṃ kalpayasi tarhi tān api kurv iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: yadi sva satyam kalpayasi tarhi tān api kuru iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu kathaṃ dāmādīnām asmākaṃ ca parasparaṃ sāmyam astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham dāma ādīnām asmākam ca parasparam sāmyam asti iti atra āha
asya anantasya cit vyomnaḥ sarvagasya nirākṛteḥ

original: cid udeti yathā yāntas tathā sā tatra bhāty alam // MU_4,31.38
analyzed: cit udeti yathā yāntaḥ tathā sā tatra bhāti alam
anantasya anta sākṣi tvena api sthita tvāt anta rahitasya
sā cit tatra tasyām cit mātra bhittau

original: nanu tathāpi kim prakṛte āyātam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tathā api kim prakṛte āyātam iti atra āha
yatra dāma ādi rūpeṇa saṃvid prakacate svayam
tathā asau tatra sampannā tathākāra anubhūtitaḥ
tathā ākārasya dāma ādi ākārasya yā anubhūtiḥ tatas
asmat ādi svarūpeṇa saṃvid yatra uditā svayam
tathā asau tatra sampannā tathākāra anubhūtitaḥ
tathā ca dāma ādibhiḥ saha asmākam
sva svapna pratibhāsasya jagat iti abhidhā kṛtā
cit vyomnaḥ vyoma vapuṣaḥ tāpasya iva mṛga ambu tā  /

original: tasya jagad iti abhidhā jagad iti nāma /
analyzed: tasya jagat iti abhidhā jagat iti nāma
kā iva mṛga ambu tā iva

original: yathā tāpasya mṛgāmbutāmbu iti nāma kriyate /
nanu tarhi sarvaṃ cidvyoma jaganmayam eva kim astīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi sarvam cit vyoma jagat mayam eva kim asti iti atra āha

original: yatra prabuddhaṃ cidvyoma tatra dṛśyābhidhā kṛtā /
analyzed: yatra prabuddham cit vyoma tatra dṛśyā abhidhā kṛtā

original: yatra suptaṃ tu tenaiva tatra mokṣābhidhā kṛtā // MU_4,31.42
analyzed: yatra suptam tu tena eva tatra mokṣa abhidhā kṛtā
prabuddham jagat rūpa sva parāmarśa yuktam
suptam jagat rūpa svarūpa āmarśa rahitam
bhavati tatra tena eva mokṣa abhidhā kṛtā

original: tathā ca na sarvaṃ cidvyoma jagatsamayevāstīti
analyzed: tathā ca na sarvam cit vyoma jagat samayā iva asti iti

original: nanu tarhi cidvyomnaḥ sāṃśatvam āgatam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi cit vyomnaḥ sa aṃśa tvam āgatam iti atra āha

original: na ca tat kvacid āsuptaṃ na prabuddhaṃ kadācana /
analyzed: na ca tat kvacid āsuptam na prabuddham kadācana

original: cidvyoma kevalaṃ dṛśyaṃ jagad ity avagamyatām // MU_4,31.43
analyzed: cit vyoma kevalam dṛśyam jagat iti avagamyatām

original: na bhavati / prabuddhaṃ ca na bhavati /
analyzed: na bhavati prabuddham ca na bhavati
tad sākṣikayoḥ svāpa prabodhayoḥ tad vyatirekeṇa

original: na ca tad eva tasya viśeṣakam bhavati /
analyzed: na ca tat eva tasya viśeṣakam bhavati
ghaṭasya api ghaṭa viśeṣaka tva prasaṅgāt

original: ataḥ paramārthavicārayuktena tvayā dṛśyaṃ jagat kevalam svāpabodhādidharmarahitam
analyzed: atas parama artha vicāra yuktena tvayā dṛśyam jagat kevalam svāpa bodha ādi dharma rahitam
atyanta rahasya tvāt punar pūrva śloka pūrva ardha uktam eva artham kathayati

original: nirvāṇam eva sargaśrīḥ sargaśrīr eva nirvṛtiḥ /
analyzed: nirvāṇam eva sarga śrīḥ sarga śrīḥ eva nirvṛtiḥ

original: nānayoḥ śabdayor arthabhedaḥ paryāyayor iva // MU_4,31.44
analyzed: na anayoḥ śabdayoḥ artha bhedaḥ paryāyayoḥ iva
yathā taraṅga jalayoḥ bhedaḥ na yuktaḥ

original: / tathā sarganirvāṇayor api bhedo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ // (MT_4,31.44)
analyzed: tathā sarga nirvāṇayoḥ api bhedaḥ na yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu tarhi jagad iti śabdajñānayoḥ kā gatir ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi jagat iti śabda jñānayoḥ kā gatiḥ iti atra āha

original: paramārthe jagad iti rūpaṃ vetti svayaṃ svakam /
analyzed: paramārthe jagat iti rūpam vetti svayam svakam

original: yathā taimirikaṃ cakṣuḥ keśoṇḍukam ivekṣitam // MU_4,31.45
analyzed: yathā taimirikam cakṣuḥ keśoṇḍukam iva īkṣitam
asau acetya cit ātmā paramārthe paramārtha bhūte sva svarūpe

original: yathā taimirikam taimirikasambandhi cakṣuḥ svakam raśmirūpaṃ
analyzed: yathā taimirikam taimirika sambandhi cakṣuḥ svakam raśmi rūpam

original: nanu tarhi keśoṇḍukavat bhāsamānatvāt jagat kiñcid asti /
analyzed: nanu tarhi keśoṇḍuka vat bhāsamāna tvāt jagat kiñcid asti
tat katham asya nirvāṇa rūpa tvam

original: na tat keśoṇḍukaṃ kiñcit sā hi dṛṣṭis tathā sthitā /
analyzed: na tat keśoṇḍukam kiñcid sā hi dṛṣṭiḥ tathā sthitā

original: naivaṃ dṛśyam idaṃ kiñcid itthaṃ cidvyoma saṃsthitam // MU_4,31.46
analyzed: na evam dṛśyam idam kiñcid ittham cit vyoma saṃsthitam

original: na cānyat tatra tadadhiṣṭhānatvayogyaṃ vastv asti / ato
analyzed: na ca anyat tatra tad adhiṣṭhāna tva yogyam vastu asti atas

original: jñāyate dṛṣṭir eva tathātvena bhāsate iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: jñāyate dṛṣṭiḥ eva tathātvena bhāsate iti bhāvaḥ

original: proktaṃ nyāyam prakṛte ḥpi saṅghaṭayati naivam iti /
analyzed: proktam nyāyam prakṛte saṅghaṭayati na evam iti
na bhavati cit vyoma cit ākāśam
hi cit vyomnaḥ jagat rūpeṇa saṃsthitiḥ dṛṣṭā

original: sarvatra sarvam idam asti yathānubhūtaṃ no kiñcana kvacid ihāsti ca nānubhūtam /
analyzed: sarvatra sarvam idam asti yathā anubhūtam no kiñcana kvacid iha asti ca na anubhūtam

original: śāntaṃ sad ekam idam ātatam ittham āste santyaktaśaṅkam apabhedam atas tvam āssva // MU_4,31.47
analyzed: śāntam sat ekam idam ātatam ittham āste sat tyakta śaṅkam apabhedam atas tvam āssva

bhuktam bhoktavyam akhilam dṛṣṭāḥ draṣṭavya dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: kim anyad bhavabhaṅgāya bhūyo bhogeṣv alubdhatā // MU_4,32.45
analyzed: kim anyat bhava bhaṅgāya bhūyas bhogeṣu alubdha tā

original: kiñcidbhogadvāreṇa tatsamānayogakṣemāḥ sarve bhogā bhuktā ity arthaḥ /

analyzed: kiñcid api na asti iti arthaḥ

original: sthīyatām mucyatām antar bhogagārdhyam avāstavam // MU_4,32.46
analyzed: sthīyatām mucyatām antar bhoga gārdhyam avāstavam
na tu ācāra antara niṣṭha tayā

original: na tu gṛhasthaḥ san vanasthatayā vanastho vā san gṛhasthatayety
analyzed: na tu gṛhasthaḥ san vanastha tayā vanasthaḥ vā san gṛhastha tayā iti

original: trāyante mṛtyunopetaṃ na kadācana bhogakāḥ // MU_4,32.47
analyzed: trāyante mṛtyunā upetam na kadācana bhogakāḥ

original: nopayujyante kiṃ taiḥ saha saṃstaveneti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na upayujyante kim taiḥ saha saṃstavena iti bhāvaḥ

original: gītibhir gaganābhoge te jīvanti mṛtāḥ pare // MU_4,32.48
analyzed: gītibhiḥ gagana ābhoge te jīvanti mṛtāḥ pare

original: nanu yadi proktaguṇārjanenāpi na kiñcit setsyati tadā kiṃ kāryam ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu yadi prokta guṇa arjanena api na kiñcid setsyati tadā kim kāryam iti atra āha

original: yathāśāstram anudvegam ācārāt ko na siddhibhāk // MU_4,32.49
analyzed: yathāśāstram anudvegam ācārāt kaḥ na siddhi bhāj

original: udyoga vgl. MṬ (II) 5,12 sowie MṬ ad (IV) 32,57. Ś1,
nanu yadā kadācin mayā guṇārjane yatnaḥ kṛta eva kiṃ tena sampannam ity / atrāha

original: yathāśāstraṃ viharatā tvarā kāryā na siddhiṣu /
analyzed: yathāśāstram viharatā tvarā kāryā na siddhiṣu
cira kāla para apakvā siddhiḥ puṣṭa phalā bhavet

original: vyavahāro yathāśāstraṃ kriyatām mā vinaśyatām // MU_4,32.51

analyzed: jīvaḥ jīrṇa andhakūpeṣu bhaveṣu antardhim āgataḥ
bhavatām bhūri bhaṅgānām adhunā uddhriyatām atas
jīvaḥ jīrṇa andhakūpeṣu duḥkha da tvena jīrṇa andhakūpa rūpeṣu

original: ataḥ yuṣmābhiḥ adhunā saḥ jīvaḥ uddhriyatām /
analyzed: ataḥ yuṣmābhiḥ adhunā saḥ jīvaḥ uddhriyatām

original: hi uddharaṇam avaśyam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: hi uddharaṇam avaśyam eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ

original: itaḥ prabhṛti mā bhūyo gamyatām adharād adhaḥ /
analyzed: itas prabhṛti mā bhūyas gamyatām adharāt adhas

original: nirdhāryatāṃ ] N17: ni[r]dhā° mit Ś1, Ś3.
yuṣmābhiḥ / itaḥ prabhṛti asmān madupadeśāt prabhṛti /

original: / idam kim / āpannivāraṇe astram astrabhūtam āpannivārakam ity arthaḥ //
analyzed: idam kim āpad nivāraṇe astram astra bhūtam āpad nivārakam iti arthaḥ

original: kim arthamātrayā kāryam āryāḥ śāstram avekṣyatām // MU_4,32.54

analyzed: raṇa ādi kāryam tyaktvā idam eva śāstram avekṣyatām iti piṇḍa arthaḥ

original: als Randglosse in Ś1; Randglosse Ś3:
idam bimbam idaṃ nimbam iti matyā vicāryatām /

original: svayā parapreraṇayā yāta mā paśavo yathā // MU_4,32.55
analyzed: svayā para preraṇayā yāta mā paśavaḥ yathā

analyzed: yathā yathā paśavaḥ para preraṇayā yānti tathā yūyam mā yāta iti arthaḥ
daurbhāgya dāyinī dīnā śubha hīnā avicāraṇā
ghana dīrgha mahā nidrā tyajyatām samprabudhyatām

original: yuṣmābhiḥ / avicāraṇā avicārākhyā ghanadīrghā cāsau mahānidrā /
analyzed: yuṣmābhiḥ avicāraṇā avicāra ākhyā ghana dīrghā ca asau mahānidrā

yuṣmābhiḥ vṛddha manda kacchapa vat suptaiḥ sva ātma vicāre vimukhaiḥ
vṛddha manda kacchapaḥ hi suptaḥ tiṣṭhati
sat śāstra vicāra ādi kriyatām iti arthaḥ

original: nanu sukhasādhanadhanādyarjanam apahāya kimartham anyat kurma ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu sukha sādhana dhana ādi arjanam apahāya kimartham anyat kurmaḥ iti atra āha

original: āpade sampadaḥ sarvāḥ sarvatrānādaro jayaḥ // MU_4,32.58
analyzed: āpade sampadaḥ sarvāḥ sarvatra anādaraḥ jayaḥ

sarvatra samaste dhana ādau bhāva jāte
śāstra ācāra aviruddhena karmaṇā śarma sidhyati
loka tantra anusāreṇa loka ācāra anusāreṇa
sarga anta ślokena api etat eva kathayati
su ācāra cāru caritasya vivikta vṛtteḥ saṃsāra duḥkha lava saukhya daśāsu a gṛdhnoḥ

original: āyur yaśāṃsi ca guṇāś ca sahaiva lakṣmyā phullanti mādhavalatā iva satphalāya // MU_4,32.60
analyzed: āyuḥ yaśāṃsi ca guṇāḥ ca saha eva lakṣmyā phullanti mādhava latāḥ iva sat phalāya

original: tathā duḥkhalavarūpāḥ ca tāḥ saukhyadaśāḥ duḥkhalavasaukhyadaśāḥ
analyzed: tathā duḥkha lava rūpāḥ ca tāḥ saukhya daśāḥ duḥkha lava saukhya daśāḥ

original: āyuḥ yaśāṃsi guṇāś cety etāni vastūni /

original: iti śrībhāskarakaṇṭhaviracitāyāṃ śrīmokṣopāyaṭīkāyāṃ sthitiprakaraṇe dvātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ //
analyzed: iti śrī bhāskarakaṇṭha viracitāyām śrī mokṣopāya ṭīkāyām sthiti prakaraṇe dvātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ

original: sambhavaty eva tasmāt svaṃ śubhodyogaṃ na santyajet // MU_4,33.1
analyzed: sambhavati eva tasmāt svam śubha udyogam na santyajet

analyzed: yatas atiśaya prayuktānām sarveṣām yatnānām sāphalyam asti

original: ataḥ sarvatra sarvadā sarvaṃ sambhavaty eveti
analyzed: atas sarvatra sarvadā sarvam sambhavati eva iti

original: eva ] N17: eva (bhedaḥ yenaivaṃ kathayasīty atrāha)

original: sarasīśvaram ārādhya mṛtyur apy upanirjitaḥ // MU_4,33.2
analyzed: sarasi īśvaram ārādhya mṛtyuḥ api upanirjitaḥ

original: dānavair dānavāryāḍhyair gajaiḥ padmākarā iva // MU_4,33.3

marutta nṛpateḥ yajñe saṃvartena mahā ṛṣiṇā

original: bhūyo bhūyaḥ prayuktena duṣprāpā tapasārjitā // MU_4,33.5

piṣṭātaka ambu duṣprāpam rasāyanam iva aśnatā

original: paralokād upānītaḥ sāvitryā satyavān patiḥ // MU_4,33.8
analyzed: para lokāt upānītaḥ sāvitryā satyavān patiḥ

analyzed: aśubhaḥ yatnaḥ na kāryaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: mūlaṃ kaṣakaraṃ tasmād bhāvyaṃ tatrātiśāyinā // MU_4,33.10

original: ātmajñānam ko ḥham ity evam ātmavicāraḥ /

original: duḥkhād ṛte nirābādhaṃ sukhaṃ kiñcid avāpyate // MU_4,33.11
analyzed: duḥkhāt ṛte nirābādham sukham kiñcid avāpyate

original: aśamaḥ paramam brahma śamaś ca paramam padam /

original: yady apy evaṃ tathāpy enam praśamaṃ viddhi śaṅkaram // MU_4,33.12

original: ataḥ sukhakārivat duḥkhakāriṇo ḥpi svarūpamātraprādhānyena brahmatvānapāyān na tvaccodyāvakāśaḥ /

original: nanu tarhi ānandaikarūpatvaṃ katham brahmaṇaḥ kathayantīti

original: cet / tatratya ānandaḥ na tvadanubhūta[ ]ttirūpānandarūpo bhavati /

analyzed: kim tu apekṣā rāhitya mātra rūpaḥ eva asau

original: abhimānam mayedṛśaḥ śamaḥ kṛta ity evaṃrūpaṃ darpam /

original: nanu āryatvasādhanam prasiddhaṃ tapastīrthādikaṃ tyaktvā kim ity aprasiddhaṃ sajjanasevanaṃ
analyzed: nanu ārya tva sādhanam prasiddham tapaḥ tīrtha ādikam tyaktvā kim iti aprasiddham sat jana sevanam

original: na tapāṃsi na tīrthāni na śāstrāṇi jayanti vaḥ /
analyzed: na tapāṃsi na tīrthāni na śāstrāṇi jayanti vaḥ
saṃsāra sāgara uttāre sat jana āsevanam yathā

original: nanu kiṃlakṣaṇo ḥsau sajjanaḥ yasya sevanaṃ kartavyatvenopadiśasīty / atrāha
analyzed: nanu kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ ḥsau sat janaḥ yasya sevanam kartavya tvena upadiśasi iti atra āha

original: yathāśāstraṃ viharataḥ svakarmasu sa sajjanaḥ // MU_4,33.15
analyzed: yathāśāstram viharataḥ sva karmasu sa sat janaḥ

anudinam lobha moha ruṣām tanu tā bhavet
nanu mūrkha śrotriyāḥ api lobha ādi tānavayuktāḥ dṛśyante

original: teṣāṃ saṅgenāpi kiñcit setsyaty atha vā nety / atrāha
analyzed: teṣām saṅgena api kiñcid setsyati atha vā na iti atra āha

original: adhyātmaviduṣaḥ saṅgāt tasya sā dhīḥ pravartate /
analyzed: adhyātma viduṣaḥ saṅgāt tasya sā dhīḥ pravartate

original: atyantābhāva evāsya yayā dṛśyasya dṛśyate // MU_4,33.16
analyzed: atyanta abhāvaḥ eva asya yayā dṛśyasya dṛśyate

original: ata indriyāsāmarthyādinā lobhāditānavavato ḥpi mūrkhasya saṅgān na kiñcid
analyzed: atas indriya asāmarthya ādinā mūrkhasya saṅgāt na kiñcid
nanu dṛśya atyanta abhāva darśanena kim setsyati iti atra āha

original: anyābhāvavaśād āśu jīvas tatraiva līyate // MU_4,33.17
analyzed: anya abhāva vaśāt āśu jīvaḥ tatra eva līyate

original: tu niścaye / dṛśyātyantābhāvataḥ lakṣaṇayā dṛśyātyantābhāvadarśanād dhetoḥ / param
analyzed: tu niścaye dṛśya atyanta abhāvataḥ lakṣaṇayā dṛśya atyanta abhāva darśanāt hetoḥ param
dṛśya adhiṣṭhāna tvāt muktam uttīrṇam cit mātra ākhyam vastu

original: so ḥpi tadrūpatvena dṛśyate iti yāvat /
analyzed: tad rūpa tvena dṛśyate iti yāvat

original: tu dṛśyātyantābhāvaḥ jīvalayaḥ ca[ ]śenopādhimukta eva jñeyaḥ //
analyzed: tu dṛśya atyanta abhāvaḥ jīva layaḥ ca śena upādhi muktaḥ eva jñeyaḥ

original: na cotpannaṃ na caivāsīd dṛśyaṃ na ca bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: na ca utpannam na ca eva āsīt dṛśyam na ca bhaviṣyati

original: vartamāne ḥpi naivāsti param evāsty aveditam // MU_4,33.18
analyzed: vartamāne na eva asti param eva asti a veditam

original: nanu yadi dṛśyaṃ nāsīt nāsti na bhaviṣyati tarhi kim asti
analyzed: nanu yadi dṛśyam na āsīt na asti na bhaviṣyati tarhi kim asti

original: / na hi abhāvasya etādṛk prapañcādhiṣṭhānatvaṃ yuktam ity /
analyzed: na hi abhāvasya etādṛś prapañca adhiṣṭhāna tvam yuktam iti
atra āha param eva iti param
sākṣi tvena sthita tvāt sarva uttīrṇam cit mātram
svapne tasya eva prapañca adhiṣṭhāna tvena dṛṣṭa tvāt
nanu katham etat asti iti atra āha

original: etad yuktisahasreṇa darśitaṃ darśyate ḥpi ca /
analyzed: etat yukti sahasreṇa darśitam darśyate ca

original: sarvair evānubhūtaṃ hi darśayiṣyāmi cādhunā // MU_4,33.19
analyzed: sarvaiḥ eva anubhūtam hi darśayiṣyāmi ca adhunā

original: etat dṛśyaṃ nāsīt nāsti na bhaviṣyatīty etat /
analyzed: etat dṛśyam na āsīt na asti na bhaviṣyati iti etat

original: nanu katham aprasiddham etat darśitam darśyate darśayiṣyasi cety /
analyzed: nanu katham aprasiddham etat darśitam darśyate darśayiṣyasi ca iti
suṣuptau hi sarve dṛśya atyanta abhāvam
abhyāsa artham punar etat eva kathayati

original: idaṃ tattvaṃ tv asattvādi kuto ḥtra syāt kathañcana // MU_4,33.20
analyzed: idam tattvam tu asattva ādi kutas syāt kathañcana

original: cidākāśam bhavatīti yathā iti yat bhavati /

original: evamādi / kathañcana kutaḥ syāt kathañcanāpi na syād ity arthaḥ /
analyzed: evamādi kathañcana kutas syāt kathañcana api na syāt iti arthaḥ

original: dṛṣṭaṃ ca svapnajagataḥ saṃvidākāśātmakatvam iti na virodhaḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭam ca svapna jagataḥ saṃvid ākāśa ātmaka tvam iti na virodhaḥ

original: nanu tarhi jagad iti śabdapratyayau kathaṃ rūḍhiṃ gatāv ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tarhi jagat iti śabda pratyayau katham rūḍhim gatau iti atra āha
cit camatkurute cāru cañcala a cañcala ātmani

original: yat tayaiva tad evedaṃ jagad ity avabudhyate // MU_4,33.21
analyzed: yat tayā eva tat eva idam jagat iti avabudhyate
acañcala ātmani paramārthataḥ tathā sthita tvāt
yat camatkurute sva rūpa āmarśa rūpam āsvādam karoti

original: / na jagannāma kiñcid aparaṃ vastu asti /
analyzed: na jagat nāma kiñcid aparam vastu asti

original: nanu tathāpi katham bheda iva dṛśyata ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu tathā api katham bhedaḥ iva dṛśyate iti atra āha
trailokya rūpaḥ cit āditya aṃśu maṇḍalam

original: kva vendvaṃśumator bhedo nirvikatthana kathyatām // MU_4,33.22
analyzed: kva vā indu aṃśumatoḥ bhedaḥ nirvikatthana kathyatām
indu aṃśumatoḥ jala maṇḍala pratibimbita sūrya aṃśu maṇḍala rūpasya
yathā jala pratibimbita sūrya aṃśu maṇḍala rūpasya

original: candrasya sūryasya ca bhāsamāno ḥpi bhedaḥ paramārthataḥ nāsti /
analyzed: candrasya sūryasya ca bhāsamānaḥ bhedaḥ paramārthataḥ na asti
tathā bāhya antaḥkaraṇa pratibimbita cit āditya aṃśu maṇḍala rūpasya

original: jagataḥ cidādityasya ca bhāsamāno ḥpi bhedaḥ nāsty evety arthaḥ //
analyzed: jagataḥ cit ādityasya ca bhāsamānaḥ u ḥpi bhedaḥ na asti eva iti arthaḥ
svabhāvataḥ cit dṛṣṭeḥ ye unmeṣa nimeṣaṇe
jagat rūpa anubhūteḥ tau etau astamaya udayau

original: ye unmeṣaṇanimeṣaṇe svavyatiriktaparāmarśarūpam unmeṣaṇaṃ svamātraparāmarśarūpaṃ nimeṣaṇaṃ ca bhavataḥ
analyzed: ye unmeṣaṇa nimeṣaṇe sva vyatirikta parāmarśa rūpam unmeṣaṇam sva mātra parāmarśa rūpam nimeṣaṇam ca bhavataḥ
atha vā unmeṣaṇam sva rūpa prasāraḥ

original: yojyam / tathā ca bhedagandho ḥpi nāsti /
analyzed: yojyam tathā ca bheda gandhaḥ na asti

original: na hi unmeṣanimeṣavataḥ unmeṣanimeṣau bhinnau iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na hi unmeṣa nimeṣavataḥ unmeṣa nimeṣau bhinnau iti bhāvaḥ

original: etac ca svapne suṣuptau ca sarvapratītisākṣikam
analyzed: etat ca svapne suṣuptau ca sarva pratīti sākṣikam
kāraṇa tvena samasta jagat pradhāna bhūta ahaṅkāra varṇanam prastauti

original: parijñāto ḥhamarthas tu paramārthāmbaram bhavet // MU_4,33.24
analyzed: parijñātaḥ ḥhamarthaḥ tu parama artha ambaram bhavet
aham arthaḥ aham iti śabda abhidheyam vastu
deha rūpa tayā avasthānena tad ācchādaka tvāt
ācchādaka tvam eva hi malasya svarūpam
evaṃrūpaḥ u ḥsau iti jñātaḥ san
paramārtha ambaram cit mātra ākāśaḥ eva bhavati

original: abhyāsārtham punaḥ punaḥ etad eva kathayati
analyzed: abhyāsa artham punar punar etat eva kathayati
ahambhāvaḥ parijñātaḥ na ahambhāve bhavati alam
eka tām ambunā iva ambu yāti cit nabhasā ātmanā

original: parijñātaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭho ḥyam iti jñātaḥ /
analyzed: parijñātaḥ paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭhaḥ ḥyam iti jñātaḥ

original: iti / yataḥ saḥ ahambhāvaḥ cinnabhasā cidākāśarūpeṇa /
analyzed: iti yatas saḥ ahambhāvaḥ cit nabhasā cit ākāśa rūpeṇa
yathā ambu ambunā eka tām yāti

original: paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭho ḥyam iti ahaṅkāraparamārthasvarūpe jñāte sati ahaṅkāraḥ paramātmaniṣṭho
analyzed: paramārthataḥ kiṃniṣṭhaḥ iti ahaṅkāra paramārtha svarūpe jñāte sati ahaṅkāraḥ paramātma niṣṭhaḥ

original: bhavati / tataḥ śarīraniṣṭhatārūpām parimitatāṃ nāyātīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: bhavati tatas śarīra niṣṭha tā rūpām parimita tām na āyāti iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu katham parijñātaḥ ahambhāvaḥ cidātmanā ekatvaṃ yāti ity / atrāha
analyzed: nanu katham parijñātaḥ ahambhāvaḥ cit ātmanā ekatvam yāti iti atra āha
aham ādi jagat dṛśyam kila nā asti eva vastutas

original: avaśyam eva tat kasmāc chiṣyate ḥhaṃvicāriṇaḥ // MU_4,33.26
analyzed: avaśyam eva tat kasmāt śiṣyate ḥhaṃvicāriṇaḥ
